30b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim na gnas pa'i ces pa dang /
30b3(dkon brtsegs): sdom pa dang / spod pa dang / rab tu byung ba'i yon tan gyi phan yon 'di legs par gsungs pa ni ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das 'dug cas kyang 'dir khyis na gnas pa la nyes pa'i skyon chags pa/
30b4(dkon brtsegs): ji sprad pa dang // rab tu byung ba'i yon tan gyi phan yon mtha' yas pa mngon sum du gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cab rnams rab tu byung ste/ bde bar gshegs pas legs par bshad pa'i chos
30b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dul ba la bsten par rdzogs par mdzad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ khyim bdag de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khrim bdag rnams rab tu
30b6(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba ni 'byung bar dka' ste/ spyod pa shing tu rnam par dag par bsgrub par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la khyim bdag de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to//
30b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das rab tu 'byung ba'ang 'byung bar dka' lags mod kyi/ 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag rab tu 'byung ba'i slad du skabs dbye bar gsol/ bdag cag bcom ldan
31a1(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis bstan pa la nan tan gyis bsgrub par 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag de dag la rab tu 'byung ba'i skabs kyi ste/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
31a2(dkon brtsegs): kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa thams cad rnam par dag pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// skyes bu dam pa khyed gnyis kyis khyim bdag 'di
31a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams rab tu phyung la bstan par rdzogs par gyis shig ces bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas// byang chub sems dpa' byams pas khyim bdag dgu stong rab tu phyung ngo // byang chub se dpa' myod tham
31a4(dkon brtsegs): cad rnam par rig pas ni/ khyim bdag bdun stong rab tu phyung ngo // byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa rnams kyi bslab pa'i rgyun bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ srog chags stong du tshang ba dag
31a5(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// / bam po gsum pa ste tha ma'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ khyim bdag drag shub
31a6(dkon brtsegs): can gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa rnams kyi khyim gyis dang / khyim na gnas pa'i nongs pa dag ni bshed lags na bcom ldan 'das kyis byang
31a7(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rab tu byung bar gtogs pa rnams kyis rab tu byung ba'i bsgrub pa dang / tshul khrims dang / thos pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / yo byad bstangs pa dang / spyod pa dang /
31b1(dkon brtsegs): cho ga phun sum tshogs pa de legs par bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na legs par bshang ba'i chos 'dul ba la byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung nas/ gus par smra ba dang /
31b2(dkon brtsegs): phyag 'tshal ba dang / ldang ba dang / thal mo sbyar ba dang / 'dud pa'i las don ma mchis par mi bgyid pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ khyim bdag drig shul can la 'di skad ces
31b3(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal to// khyim bdag khyod gang de bzhin gshegs pa la rab tu byung ba'i bsgrub pa dang // tshul khripas dang / thos pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / yo byad bsnyungs pa dang / spyod pa dang
31b4(dkon brtsegs): cho ga phun sum tshogs pa kun 'dri ba ni legs so legs so// khyim bdag de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang / byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung bar gtogs pas ji ltar gan
31b5(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba dang / ji ltar bsgrub par bya ba ngas khyod la bshad do// bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol nas khyim bdag drag shul can bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang
31b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khyim bdag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung bas 'di ltar bdag su'i cheng la khyim nas khyim ma yin par rab tu byung
31b7(dkon brtsegs): snyam du gzhal bar bya ste/ des mgo dang gos la me 'bar ba bzhin du ye shes yongs su btsal ba la brtson 'grus brtsam par bya'o// de de ltar yongs su 'jal ba'i thob pa nyid du
32a1(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa'i rigs bzhi po de dag la rab tu gnas shing spangs pa'i yon tan dang / yo byad bsnyungs pa la mngon par dga' bar bya'o// khyim dang/
32a2(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba 'phags pa'i rigs pani po de dag la rab tu gnas pa yin te nA khyim bdag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba na chos gos da don gyis chog par
32a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa yin/ chos gos ngan ngon gyis chog par 'dzin pa'i bsngags pa'ang rjod pa yin te/ de chos gos kyi phyir tshul dang mi 'dra bas tshol bar mi byed do// chos gos ma rnyed na'ang yi mi 'chad cing
32a4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su gdung ba med do// chos gos rnyed na'ang chags pa med/ rmongs pa med/ dga' ba med// zhen pa med cing zhen par mi 'gyur te/ nyes dmigs mthong la 'byung ba rab tu shes nas chags pa med
32a5(dkon brtsegs): par spyod de/ chos gos ngan ngon gyis chog par 'dzin pa de bdag la mi bstod cing gzhan la mi smod do// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba ni bsod snyoms ngan ngon gyis chog
32a6(dkon brtsegs): shes par 'dzin pa yin// bsod snyoms ngan ngon gyis chog par 'dzin pa'i bsngags pa'ang rjod pa yin te/ des bsod snyoms kyi phyir tshul dang mi 'dra bas tshol bar mi byed do// bsod snyoms pa rnyed na'ang yi/
32a7(dkon brtsegs): mi 'chang cing yongs su gdung ba med do// bsod snyoms rnyed na'ang chags pa med do// rmongs pa med/ dga' ba med/ zhen pa med cing zhen par mi 'gyur te/ nyes dmigs mthong la 'byung bar rab tu
32b1(dkon brtsegs): shes nas chags pa meng par spod de/ bsod snyoms dang ngon gyis chog par 'dzin pa de bdag la mi bstod cing gzhan la pi spyod do// khyis pa gzhan yang byang chub pacwa
32b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rab tu byung ba ni mal cha ngan ngon gyis chog par 'dzin pa yin// mal chang ngan ngon gyis chog par 'dzin pa'i bsngags pa'ang rjod pa yin te/ de mal cha'i phyir tshul dang mi 'dra bas tshol bar mo byed de//
32b3(dkon brtsegs): mal cha ba rnyeng na'ang yi mi 'chad cing yongs su gdung ba med do// mal cha rnyed na'ang chags pa med/ rmongs pa med/ dga' ba med/ zhen pa med cing zhen par mi 'gyur te// nyes dmigs mthong la/
32b4(dkon brtsegs): 'byung bar rab tu shes nas chags pa med par spod de// mal changan ngon gyis chog par 'dzin pa de bdag la mi bstod cing gzhan la mi spong ngo // khyim bdag gzhan yang bung
32b5(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba ni na ba'i gsos sman dang yo byad ngan ngon gyis chog par 'dzin pa yin// na ba'i gsos sman dang yo byad ngan don gyis chog par 'dzin pa'i bsngags pa'ang rjod
32b6(dkon brtsegs): ba yin te/ de na ba'i gsos sman dang yo byad kyi phyir tshul dang mi 'dra bas tshol bar mi byed do// ra ba'i gsos ldan dang yo byad ma rnyed na'ang yi mi 'chad cing yongs su gdung ba med do/ na
32b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i gsos sman dang yo byad rnyed na'ang chags pa med/ rmongs pa med/ dga' ba med/ zher ba med cing zhen par mi 'gyur te/ nyes dmigs mthong la 'byung ba rab tu shes nas chags pa med par spyod do//
33a1(dkon brtsegs): rab gsos ldan dang so zung ba dan kyis chos par 'dzin pa bdag pa mi brjod cing ga'anal mdzadado// spongs saga' babang snyin te/ rdzo ba mapos gang spyo pa pa
33a2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sbyor ba la brtson no// de sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams sangs pas dgu' bar gyur te/ ma sbyangs pas ni ma yin no// de bsgom pa la dga' ba yin te/ bsgom pa la dga' ba'i sbyor ba la so/
33a3(dkon brtsegs): no// mi dge ba'i chos bsgoms pas ni ma yin no// spong ba la dga' ba/ spong ba la mos pa/ spong ba la dka' ba'i sbyor ba la brtson pa/ bsgobs pa la dga' ba/ bsgom pa la mos pa
33a4(dkon brtsegs): bsgom pa la dga' ba'i sbyor ba la brtson pa de bdag la mi bstod cing gzhan la mi smod do// khyim bdag de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba 'phags pa'i rigs bzhi po dag la gnas pa yin no//
33a5(dkon brtsegs): ci'i phyir 'phags pa'i rigs zhes bya zhe na/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad 'di la gnas pas de'i phyir 'phags pa'i rigs zhes bya'o// khyim bdag gzhan
33a6(dkon brtsegs): yang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung bas phan yon la dga' ba bcus chos gos lus la bcang bar bya ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ngo tsha zhing 'dzem pas dbye ba dang /
33a7(dkon brtsegs): sbrang dang / sbrang bu dang / rlung dang / nyi ma dang / sdig sbrul gyis reg par 'gyur ba g.yog pa dang / dge sbyong gi kha dog dang // rtags bstan pa dang / dur smrig de dag ni lha dang / pi dang
33b1(dkon brtsegs): lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mchod rten yin no snyam nas/ mchod rten gyi phyir yang dag par gzung bar bya ba dang / de dag ni yid 'byung ba dang / 'dod chags dang bral bas bdog
33b2(dkon brtsegs): bsgyur ba yin te/ 'di dag ni 'dod chags kyis kha dog bskur ba ma yin pa dang / 'di dag ni nye ba rab+hU dang mthun pa yin gyi// 'di dag ni nyon mongs pa 'byur ba dang mthun pa ma yin pa dang / dur
33b3(dkon brtsegs): smig 'di dag gis dkris shing g.yogs nas/ sdig pa las ldog par bya ba dang legs par bya ba'i las bya ba dang / chos gos kyis cha bar sbyor ba la brtson pa ma yin pa dang / ngur smrig 'di dag 'phags pa'i
33b4(dkon brtsegs): lam gyi tshogs dang mthun pa yin par shes nas/ ci nas skad cig gcig la'ang rnyog pa mang ba dang / 'grogs par bya bar ngur smrig rnams bcang bar bya ba ste/ khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung bas
33b5(dkon brtsegs): phan yon pa dga' ba bcu po de dag gis chos gos lus la bcang bar bya'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung bas phan yon bcu mthong nas/ ji srid 'tshe'i mtha'
33b6(dkon brtsegs): bar du bsod snyoms spyod pa de dag kyang gtang bar me bya ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ rang dbang du gyur pa'i tshul gyis 'tsho bar bya'i// gzhan laragalus pa ma yin pa dang / sems cad gang dgang ngag pa mo stobs 'dod pa la
33b7(dkon brtsegs): bsod stobs byed pa dedas kyang dkon mchog gsum la bkod de/ phyis bsod stobs blang bar bya ba dang / sems cad gang ngag pamang snyom sa 'dod pa la bsod snyoms mi ster ba de dag la snying rje chen po skyed nas/ sem can
34a1(dkon brtsegs): de dag gtong ba la gzung ba'i phyir brtson 'grus brtsam par bya ba dang / bya ba byas te bsod snyoms bza' ba dang / bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' dang mthun par byas
34a2(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba dang / dgang sla zhing gso sla bar bya ba'i phyir bdag kyis rgyu bskyed par 'gyur ba dang / bdag gis nga rgyal bcag pa bstan par 'gyur ba dang / bdag gis spyig cug bltar mi mthong ba'i dge ba'i rtsa
34a3(dkon brtsegs): ba bsags par 'gyur ba dang bdag mthong nas de bzhin du slob par 'gyur zhing / bdag skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo la brten par mi 'gyur ba dang / bsod snyoms yang dag par blang
34a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i spyod pa'ang / bdag sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi tshigs su 'gyur ba ste/ khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung bas phan yon bcu po
34a5(dkon brtsegs): de dag mthong nas/ ji srid 'tsho'i mtha'i bar du bsod snyoms spyod pa mi gtang bar bya'o// gal te de la la zhig gis mgron du bos na des lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / dad pa dang / dang ba bskyed pa'i
34a6(dkon brtsegs): phyir 'gro bar bya ste/ 'drid pa dang 'chos pas ni ma yin no// gang la la bsod snyoms blangs te/ bdag dang gzhan gyi don rdzogs par byed nus na ngas byang chub sems dpa' de mgron du 'gro bar gnang
34a7(dkon brtsegs): khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung bas phan yon bcu mthong nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du sman bkus pas cho ga shes par bya ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ de bzhin gsheg/
34b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bstan pa la zhugs par 'gyur ba dang / gzhan gyi ngor lta bar mi 'gyur ba dang / bdag gis mi sdug pa'i 'du shes bsten par 'gyur ba dang / bdag mi mthur pa'i 'du shes so sor nye bar gnas par
34b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba dang / ro brob la chags pa'ang bdag gis tshegs chung ngus spangs par 'gyur ba dang // byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad bdag la yid rngon par 'gyur ba dang // bdag ba zas bsnyungs pa
34b3(dkon brtsegs): mngon du gyur par 'gyur ba dang / bdag la sman yongs su tshol ba'i 'phongs pa med par 'gyur ba dang / bdag gi sems la nyon mongs pa'i nad kyis gnod pa med par byas par 'gyur
34b4(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / de ltar zhugs na myur du nyon mongs pa'i nang dang bral bar 'thob par 'gyur ba ste/ khyi ba bdag byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung bas phan yon bcu po de dag mthong nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar
34b5(dkon brtsegs): du sman bkus pas chog shes par bya'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung bas phan yon bcu mthong nas ji srid 'tshe'i mtha'i bar du dgon pa la gnA
34b6(dkon brtsegs): pa yongs su mi gtang bar bya ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ bdag gi nyam rangs dang bdag gi dbang du 'gro ba dang / nga'i baM med cing yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mal cha lkug par gtong ba dang // kon
34b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gnal dga' ba dang ma bral ba dang / gnas rnams su dong nyung zhing breng banyung ba dang / g.yog gi tshogs 'dor zhing lus dang srog la mi lta ba dang / dben par dga' zhing 'du 'di yongs su spong
35a1(dkon brtsegs): dang / las byas pa'i yon tan gyi phan yon yongs su gtong ba dang / ting nge 'dzin dang mthun pa'i sems rtse gcig pa dang / yid la byed pa bla gab med pa yid la byed pa
35a2(dkon brtsegs): sgrib pa med pa ste/ khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung bas phan yon bcu po de dag mthong nas ji srid 'tshe'i bar du dgon pa la gnas pa yongs su mi gtang bar bya'o//
35a3(dkon brtsegs): khyim bdag gal te byang chub sems dpa' dogonas pa gnas pa chos nyan par 'dod dam/ slob dpon dang mkhan po blta bar 'dod dam/ rna ba 'dri ba'i phyir grong gi gnas su 'ongs na nges
35a4(dkon brtsegs): dgongs su slar ldog par bya ba'i phyir 'gro ba'i sems bskyed par bya'o// de gal te lung mnod pa dang / kha ton bya ba gzhan la rag las te/ gtsug lag yang na gnas na'ang des dgon pa la
35a5(dkon brtsegs): gzhol ba'i sems kyis gang dngos po thams cad la dgon par 'du shes pa dang / chos tshol bas mi ngoms pa de nyid dgon pa pa la gnas pa yin no snyam du bsam mo// khyim bdag gzhan
35a6(dkon brtsegs): yang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba dgon pa la gangs pas 'di ltar bdag ci'i phyir dkon pa la gnas/ dgon pa la gnas pa 'ba' zhig ni dge sbyong ma yin te/ 'di na ni ma byang ba/ ma
35a7(dkon brtsegs): sbas pa ma zhib pa dul ba/ mi 'grus pa/ rab tu mi brtson pa 'di lta ste/ ri dgas dang spre'u dang bya mang po dang / chom rkun dang / gdol pa dag kyang bang du gnas te/
35b1(dkon brtsegs): deng sa kyang dge slong gi yon tan dang ldan pa ma yin pas gang gi phyir bdag dgon pa la gnas pa/ 'di lta ste/ dge sbyong gi do de yongs su rdzogs par bya'o rnams du btag par bya'o// pa dang/
35b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba'i dge sbyong gi don gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa dang / shes bzhin dang / mi g.yeng ba dang / gzungs rab tu thob pa dang / byabs pa bsten pa dang / snying rje bsten pa
35b3(dkon brtsegs): dang mngon par shes pa rnams la dbang sgyur ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems yongs su mi gtong ba dang / thabs
35b4(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa'i ye shes bsgom pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi yongs su mi gtang ba dang / rjes su dran pa drug rjes su dran pa dang / thos pa dang brtson 'grus mi
35b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dor ba dang / tshul bzhin du chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa dang / yang dag par rnam par grol ba'i phyir brtson pa dang / 'bras bu thob pa rnams shes pa dang / skyon med pa la 'jug par gnas pa dang / dam pa'i chos bsrung ba dang /
35b6(dkon brtsegs): las kyi rnam par smin pa la yid ches pas yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa thams cad rab tu chad pas yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang / mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos ston pas yang dag pa'i ngag dang / las
35b7(dkon brtsegs): zad pa yongs su rdzogs pas yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / bag chags kyi mchabs sbyor ba yangs par bcom pas yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang / rdzogs pa'i byang chung 'ong du chung bas yang dag pa'i
36a1(dkon brtsegs): rtsol ba dang / brjed pa med pa'i chos nyid kyis yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su thob pas yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / stong pa nyid kyis mi ska/
36a2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / mtshan ma med pa la mi zhum pa dang / smon pa med pa la mi 'gong ba dang / bsams bzhin du ye shes kyis srid pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang / don la rngon gyi/ yi ge la mi rjod pa dang / ye shes
36a3(dkon brtsegs): la rton gyi/ rnam par shes pa la mi rton pa dang / chos la rton gyi/ gang zag la mi rton pa dang / nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde la rton gyi/ drang ba'i don gyi mdo sde la mi rton pa dang / thog ma nas ma byung zhing mi
36a4(dkon brtsegs): 'jig pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid la mi rtog pa de ni/ khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba'i dge sbyong gi don ces bya'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rab
36a5(dkon brtsegs): tu byung bas 'grogs pa med pa mang du bya'o// des 'di ltar yang bdag ni sems can dang 'dre bar mi bya ste/ bdag gis sems can gcig gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par mi bya'i/ bdag gis sems
36a6(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bsreng par bya'o snyam du brtag par bya'o// de lnga mod kyi khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba'i 'grobras pa bzhi po 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas gnang
36a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhi gang se na/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'grogs pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir 'grogs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang rim gro bya ba'i phyir 'grobs pa dang
36b1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems 'grogs pa med pa dang 'grogs pa ste/ khyim bdas byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba'i 'phrogs pa ba'i po de dag ning ba'idi gshegs pas gnang ba'o//
36b2(dkon brtsegs): bdag de bas na byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung bas 'grogs pa las rnam par grol bar bya'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba dgon pa la gnas pas/
36b3(dkon brtsegs): bdag ci'i phyir dgon par 'ongs snyam du brtag par bya ste/ des yang 'di ltar bdag ni 'jigs shing skrag pa'i phyir dgon par 'ongs so// ci zhig gis 'jigs shing skrag ce na/ 'du 'jis
36b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs shing skrag go// 'grogs pas 'jigs shing skrag go/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gis 'jigs shing skrag go// nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / 'chab pa sa 'jigs
36b5(dkon brtsegs): shing skrag go/ chags pa dang / phrag dog dang / ser snas 'jigs shing skrag go// gzugs dang / sgra dang / dI dang / ro dang / reg byas 'jigs shing skrag go// phung po'i bdud kyis 'jigs shing skrag go//
36b6(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs pa'i bdud kyis 'jigs shing skrag go gi 'chi bdag gi bdud kyis 'jigs shing skrag go/ pi rtag pa la rtag par phyin ci log pas 'dzegs shing skrag go// sdug bsngal la bde bar byin
36b7(dkon brtsegs): ci log pas 'jigs shing skrag go/ bdag med pa la bdag tu phyin ci log pas 'jigs shing skrag go/ pi gtsang bar phyin ci log pas 'jigs shing skrag go/ sems dang / yid dang / rnam par
37a1(dkon brtsegs): shes pas 'jigs shing skrag go/ sred pas 'jigs shing skrag go/ 'khor bas 'jigs shing skrag go// sgrib pa dang / chod pa dang / kun nas ldang bas 'jig
37a2(dkon brtsegs): shing skrag go// 'jig tshogs la lta bas 'jigs shing skrag go/ bdag tu 'dzin pa dang bdag gir 'dzin pas 'jigs shing skrag go// rgong pas 'jigs shing skrag go/ 'gyod pa dang the tshom
37a3(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs shing skrag go/ sdig pa'i grogs pos 'jigs shing skrag go/ rnyed pa dang bkur stis 'jigs shing skrag go/ mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis 'jigs shing skrag go// ma mthong bar mtho
37a4(dkon brtsegs): ngo snyam du 'dzin pas 'jigs shing skrag go/ ma thos par thos so snyam du 'dzin pas 'jigs shing skrag go// ma dran par dran no snyam du 'dzin pas 'jigs skrag go// bye brag ma phyed par
37a5(dkon brtsegs): bye brag phyed ngo snyam du 'dzin pas 'jigs shing skrag go/ mi shes par shes so snyam du 'dzin pas 'jigs shing skrag go/ dge sbyong gi dri mas 'jigs shing skrag go/ gcig la
37a6(dkon brtsegs): gcig gnod par sems pas 'jigs shing skrag go// 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams kyis 'jigs shing skrag go/ srid pa'i 'gro ba tham
37a7(dkon brtsegs): cad du 'chi 'pho ba dang skye bas 'jigs shing skrag go/ sems can dmyal ba dang // dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / yid dgas kyi yul du 'gro bas 'jigs shing skrag go/ mi khom pas 'jig
37b1(dkon brtsegs): shing skrag go// mdor na mi dge ba'i chos thams cad yid la byed pas 'jigs shing skrag ste/ bdag de lta bu'i 'jigs shing skrag pa de dag gis 'jigs nas dgon par 'ongs te khyim na gnas pa
37b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / 'du 'ji la gnas pa dang / mi 'grus shing rnal 'byor la mi brjod pa dang / tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa la gnas pas ni 'di lta bu'i 'jigs shing skrag pa de dag las yongs sunar
37b3(dkon brtsegs): par mi nus te/ gang dag 'das pa'i dus na byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad kyang dgon pa la gnas nas/ 'jigs pa thams cad las rnam par grol te/ 'di lta
37b4(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'jigs pa med pa thob bo// gang dag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad kyang dkon pa la gnas/
37b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs pa thams cad las rnam par grol te/ 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'jigs pa med pa thob par 'gyur ro// gang dag da ltar byung ba'i dus kyi byang chub sems
37b6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob pa de dag thams cad kyang dgon pa la gnas nas/ 'jigs pa thams cad las rnam par grol te/ 'di lta ste/
37b7(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'jigs pa med pa thob po// de bas na bdag kyang 'di la 'jigs shing srag ste/ 'jigs pa thams cad las shin tu ni 'da' bar 'dod
38a1(dkon brtsegs): mi 'jigs pa ni rjes su thob par 'dod pas dgon pa la gnas par bya'o snyam du yongs su dpyad par bya'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rab
38a2(dkon brtsegs): byung ba 'jigs shing sgrag nas dgon pa'i gnas la gnas pas/ 'di la gang cung zad 'jigs pa skye ba de dag thams cad ni bdag tu 'dzin pa las skyes so// bdag tu mngon par chags pa dang /
38a3(dkon brtsegs): bdag tu yongs su 'dzin pa dang / bdag gi gzhi dang / bdag tu 'du shes pa dang / bdag tu smra ba nye bar len pa dang / bdag tu lta ba dang bdag gi gnas dang bdag tu yongs su rtog pa dang /
38a4(dkon brtsegs): bdag srung ba las skyes te/ gal te bdag dgon pa na gnas la bdag tu 'dzin pa yongs su ma spangs bdag tu mngon par chags pa dang / bdag tu yongs su 'dzin pa dang / bdag
38a5(dkon brtsegs): gi gzhi dang / bdag la sred pa dang / bdag tu 'du shes pa dang / bdag tu smra ba nye bar len pa dang / bdag tu lta ba dang / bdag gi gnas dang / bdag tu yongs su rtog pa dang
38a6(dkon brtsegs): bdag srung ba yongs su ma spangs na ni bdag dgon pa la gnas pa don med par 'gyur ro snyam du bslab par bya ste/ bdag tu 'du shes pa la dgon pa la gnas pa med do// gzhan du 'du shes
38a7(dkon brtsegs): pa la'ang med // ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pa la ni dgon pa la gnas pa med // dmigs par lta ba la ni dgon pa la gnas pa med do// phyin ci log tu
38b1(dkon brtsegs): lnga ba la ni dgon pa la gnas pa med do// khyim bdag mya ngan las 'da' bar 'du shes pa la'ang dgon pa la gnas pa med na/ 'on mongs pa thams cad kyi 'du shes cad lta ci smos/ khyim bdag
38b2(dkon brtsegs): dgon pa la gnas pa zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad la mi rten par gnas pa'o// chos thams cad la mi 'dzin par gnas pa'o// mtshan ma thams cad la mi chags par gnas pa'o// gzug
38b3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la mirten par gnas pa'o// swa dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya thams cad la bri rten par gnas pa'o// chos thams cad marnam parjing dang mi 'bal bar gnas pa'o//
38b4(dkon brtsegs): sems shin tu zhi bas shin tu sbyangs par gnas pa'o// 'jigs pa thams cad spangs pas mi 'jigs par gnas pa'o// nyon mongs pa thams cad las rnam par grol bas chu bo las
38b5(dkon brtsegs): brgal bar gnas pa'o// brtan par gnas pa'o// ngan ngon gyis chog shes par 'dzin cing 'dod pa chung ba 'phags pa'i rigs rnams la rab tu dga' bar gnas pa'o// dgang sla zhing gso sla bas
38b6(dkon brtsegs): chog par 'dzin par gnas pa'o// shes rab kyi phyir tshul bzhin pa sbyor bas thos pa la gnas pa'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la so so//
38b7(dkon brtsegs): rtog pas thar par gnas pa'o// bcings pa bcad pas rnam par grol bar gnas pa'o// rten cing 'breb par 'byung ba dang mthun pas ma dul ba rnams de bar zhi bar gnas pa'o// shin tu rna ba
39a1(dkon brtsegs): par dag pas bya ba byas par gnas pa'o// khyim bdag 'di lta ste/ dper na dgon pa la rtsa dngag shing gel ba dang / nags tshal gnas kyang 'jigs pa med cing mi skrag skrag
39a2(dkon brtsegs): par mi 'gyur ro// khyim bdag de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba dgon pa la gnas pas kyang lus la rtswa dang gshing gel ba dang / sman dang / rtsig pa dang / shing dang
39a3(dkon brtsegs): mig yor lta bu dang / sgyu ma dang mtshungs pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya ste/ 'di la su zhig 'jigs par 'gyur/ su zhig skrab par 'gyur snyam pa'i sems bskyed par bya'o// de 'jigs shing sgrub pa
39a4(dkon brtsegs): stan 'di ltar lus 'di la ni bdag gam/ sems can nam srog gram/ skye ba po 'am/ gso ba 'am/ skyes bu 'am/ gang zag gam/ shed las skyes sam gshed bu med de/
39a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar 'jigs pa zhes bya ba 'di ni yang dag pa ma yin pa kun brtags pa yin gyis bdag gis ni yang dag pa ma yin pa kun brtags pa de la brtag par mi bya'o snyam du lus la tshul bzhin brtag/
39a6(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o// des ji ltar dgon pa la rta dang ga shing gel ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal gnas pa rnams nga'i ba med pa/ yongs su 'dzin pa med pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang nga'i ba med pa/
39a7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su 'dzin pa med pas chos thams cad dkor ba dad do snyam du shes nas nye bar bsgrubs te gnas par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe nag dgor pa la gnas pa ni nyon mongs pa gcod pa ste/ nga'i ba med
39b1(dkon brtsegs): pa yongs su 'dzin pa med pa'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba dkon pa la gnas pas/ 'di la dkon pa la gnas pani tshul thibs kyi zung po
39b2(dkon brtsegs): mthur ba'o// dgon pa la gnas pa ni ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po la gzhol ba'o// dgon pa la gnas pa ni shes rab kyi phung po tshags pa'o// dgon pa la gnas pa ni rnam par grol ba'i phung po 'grub ba'o/
39b3(dkon brtsegs): dgon pa la gnas pa ni rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po skye ba'o// dgon pa la gnas pa ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams rab tu bsten pa'o// dkon pa la gnas pa'i sbyangs pa'i yon
39b4(dkon brtsegs): tan bcu gnyis po dag sdud pa'o// dkon pa la gnas pa ni bden pa rnams rtogs pa'o// dgon pa la gnas pa ni phung po rnams yongasu shes pa'o// dgon pa la gnas pa ni khams rnams chos kyi dbyings
39b5(dkon brtsegs): dang mnyam par 'jal ba'o// dgon pa la gnas pa ni skye mched rnams sel ba'o// dgon pa la gnas pa ni byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa'o// dgon pa la gnas pa ni stong pa nyidadi las
39b6(dkon brtsegs): sor rtog pas srab pa med pa'o// dgon pa la gnas pa ni chos kun tu 'dzin pa'o// dgon pa la gnas pa ni dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad chung mi gzon pa'o// dgon pa la gnas pa
39b7(dkon brtsegs): ni sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsngags pa'o// dgon pa la gnas pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bstod pa'o// dgon pa la gnas pa ni 'phags pa rnams kyis bkur ba'o//
40a1(dkon brtsegs): dpon pa la gnas pa ni thar pa 'dod pa rnams kyis bsten pa'o// dkon pa la gnas pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir bsnyen pa'o snyam du bslab
40a2(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba dgon pa la gnas pa ni tshegs chung ngus pha rol tu phyin pa drug bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//
40a3(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang dgon pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni lus dang srog la'ang mi lta ba yin te/ de ltar dgon pa la gnas pa de'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgo ba pa yongs su rdzogs/
40a4(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro// khyim bdag ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba dgon pa la gnas pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhe na/ khyim bdag gang brang
40a5(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba dgon pa la gnas pa ni sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang yo byad bsnyungs pa la rab tu gnas nas/ sdom pa gsum gyis yang dag par bsgrubs te de ltar dgon pa la gnas pa/
40a6(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// khyim bdag ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba dgon pa la gnas pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
40a7(dkon brtsegs): pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhe na/ khyim bdag gang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba dkon pa la gnas pa ni sems can la gnod sems med cing sems can thams cad la byabs par byed la
40b1(dkon brtsegs): de thabs cad ma khyer pa nyid la'ang bzod pa yin te/ de ltar dgon pa la gnas pa de'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// khyim bdag ji ltar da byang chub sems dpa' rab tu
40b2(dkon brtsegs): byung ba dgon pa la gnas pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhe na/ khyim bdag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba ni mi skye ba la bzod pa rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir
40b3(dkon brtsegs): bdag dgon pa 'di las ldog par mi bya'o snyam du slob ste/ de ltar dgon pa la gnas pa de'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// khyim bdag ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rang
40b4(dkon brtsegs): tu byung ba dgon pa la gnas pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhe na/ khyim bdag gang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba dgon pa la gnas pa ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
40b5(dkon brtsegs): byin pa rab tu 'thob ste/ sems can yongs su smin par byed pa rang yal bar mi 'dor la 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba 'ang sogs par 'dod pa yin te/ de ltar dgon pa la gnas pa de'i bsam
40b6(dkon brtsegs): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// khyim bdag ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba dgon pa la gnas pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa
40b7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhe na khyim bdag gang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba ni 'di la lus ji lta ba dgon pa'ang de bzhin no// lus ji lta ba byang chub kyang de bzhin no// snyam du
41a1(dkon brtsegs): slob cing de bzhin nyid kyis mi rtog rnam par mi rtog ste/ de ltar dgon pa la gnas pa de'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// khyim bdag de ltar na byung
41a2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba dgon pa la gnas pa tshogs chung ngus pha rol tu phyin pa drug bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba chos
41a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhi dang ldan na/ dgon pa la gnas par gnang ba yin no// bzhi gang zhe na/ khyim bdag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba mang du thos pa yin te/ thos pa 'dzin pa chos rnam par nges pa la mkhas/
41a4(dkon brtsegs): pa tshul bzhin yid la byed pa la brtson zhing chos dang chos kyi rjes su mthun par sgrub pa de sa dgon pa la gnas par bya'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba nyon mongs pa'i shas
41a5(dkon brtsegs): che na des nyon mongs pa rnams zhi bar bya ba'i phyir 'grogs pa med par dgon pa la gnas par bya ste/ des nyon mongs pa tshar gcad par bya'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba/
41a6(dkon brtsegs): ni mngon par shes pa lnga po dag thob pa yin te/ des lnga dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir dgon pa la gnas par bya'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa
41a7(dkon brtsegs): rab tu byung bas sangs rgyas kyis dgon pa la gnas par bka' stsal bar shes nas dgon pa la gnas par bya ste/ der dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// dge ba'i rtsa bas nye bar brten nas phyil
41b1(dkon brtsegs): zong dang khrong byed dang zong 'dang ljongs da yul 'khor dang / phozang 'khor dag tu zhugs te chos bstan par bya'o// khyim 'ang zang chub sems dpar rab tu byung bachos bdi ba de dag dang ldadang/ god pa
41b2(dkon brtsegs): la gnas par gnang ngo // khyim bdag phal te byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba lung dang kha ton mdod pa'i phyir tshogs kyi nang du 'jug na/ des der bus pa dang bcas par bya ste/
41b3(dkon brtsegs): slob dpon dang / mkhan po rnams dang / gnas brtan dang / bar ma dang / dge slong gsar bu rnams la zhes dang bcas par bya/ tshul mkhas par bya'o// skom las med par rang gis pa
41b4(dkon brtsegs): bdang / gzhan la gdung ba med par bya'o// nges bsnyen bkur la gdung bar mi bya'o// des 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rte dang /
41b5(dkon brtsegs): bdud dang bcas pa dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram ze'i skye dgu dang bcas pa/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pas mchod pa/ sbyin gnas su gyur pa de'ang sems can tham
41b6(dkon brtsegs): cad la gang las kyang rim gror bya ba bdag gir mi mdzad na/ bdag cag ma bsrabs pa slob 'dod pa rnams lnga ci smos te/ bdag gis ni sems can thams cad la bstan bkur bya'i// gang pas
41b7(dkon brtsegs): kyang brjer bkur bya ba bdag gir ni mi bya'o snyam du brtag par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ khyim bdag dge slong bsnyen bkur la gdub ni yon tan gyi chos rjes su bzung ba chung bsor pa yin te
42a1(dkon brtsegs): des gang dag sdud pa de dag kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag ni bsnyen bkur gyi phyir sdud kyi/ chos kyi phyir ma yin no snyam ste/ de dag nyid kyi dad pa chung gson to//
42a2(dkon brtsegs): gang dag de la bsnyen bkur byed pa 'jig rten gyi zang zing dang ldan pa de dag gi'ang don chen por mi 'gyur ro// 'bras bu chen por 'gyur te/ de slob dpon dang mkhan po'i gan du 'gro na'ang slob po//
42a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / mkhan pos ma dad pa'i bag gang yang rung ba zhig las brtags nas bdag la lung dbog pa dang ga kha ton bya ba dang / rjes su bstan pas phan 'dogs par mi 'gyur du 'ong zhes lus dang sems las
42a4(dkon brtsegs): su rung ba dang / sems cad shes pas 'gro bar bya'o// des lung mnod pa dang kha ton gyi phyir lus dang srog la'ang mi blta bar bya'o// chos 'dod pas slob dpon dang mkhan po rnams kyi bsam pa yod
42a5(dkon brtsegs): su rdzogs par bya'o// yon tan don du gnyer bas rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa thams cad don du mi gnyer bar bya'o// khyim bdag gal te byang chub sems dpa' lung mnod/
42a6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / kha ton bya ba don du gnyer bas gzhan dag la tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa tsam mam/ sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang ldan
42a7(dkon brtsegs): pa 'am ga byang chub sems dpa' lam gyi tshogs sogs pa dang ldan pa'i tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa su las mnyan ta ma/ lung mnos sam/ blangs pa'i slob dpon de la des chos kyis gu/
42b1(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o// ming dang / tshig dang / yi ge ji snyed kyis tshigs su bcad pa bstan pa de snyed kyi bskal par gal te slob dpon de la g.yo med par rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / mchod pa thams cad kyis rim gro
42b2(dkon brtsegs): rang ba snyen bkur byas kyang / khyim bdag bdung du slob dpon la slob dpon du gus par bya ba rdzogs pa ma yin na chos ma yin pa'i gus pas lta ci spos khyim bdag dad pas mnyan cing bsgom pa dang kha ton la
42b3(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa do sems dang sems las byung ba dge ba dang ldan pa 'am/ sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'am/ chos dang ldan pa 'am/ dge 'dun dang ldan pa 'am/ kyo zhing 'dod chags dang bral ba dang ldan pa
42b4(dkon brtsegs): blang ba dang / dul ba dang / zhi ba dang ldan pa'i 'jug pa ji snyed pa gal te de snyed kyi bskal par slob dpon la bsnyen bkur byas su zin kyang / khyim bdag da dung slob dpon du ri mo bya ba rdzogs pa ma yin no//
42b5(dkon brtsegs): khyim bdag rnam grangs 'dis kyang ji ltar rnam par smin pa'i chos tshad med cing ye shes khong du chud pa tshad med pa de ltar rig par bya'o// khyim bdag de lta bas na rnam par smin pa'i chos tshad med pa dang /
42b6(dkon brtsegs): ye shes khong du chud pa tshad med pa dris pas// bdag gi slob dpon yang tshad med do snyam nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chos la ri mo tshad med par bya'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chu
42b7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rab tu byung bas rab tu byung ba'i bsgrub pa la gnas par bya'o// khyim bdag ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba rab tu byung ba'i bsgrub pa la gnas yin zhe na/ khyim bdag 'di la byang chub
43a1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rab tu byung ba tshul khrims yongs su dag pa thos na de la slob steg bzhi po 'di dag ni tshul khrims yongs su dag pa'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'phags pa'i rigs
43a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams la gnas pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang yo byad bsrusnyungs pa la mngon par dga' ba dang / khyim na gnas pa dang rab tu byung ba rnams dang ma 'dre ba dang / tshul 'chos pa med par dgon pa la gnas pa ste/
43a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhi po de dag ni tshul khrims yongs su dag pa'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang tshul khrims yongs su dag pa bzhi stegabazhi gang zhe na/ lus bsdams pas lus mi dmigs pa dang / ngag
43a4(dkon brtsegs): bsdams pas dag mi dmigs pa dang / yid bsdangs pas yid mi dmigs pa dang / lta ba dang bral ngas thams cad mkhyen par sems bskyed pa ste/ bzhi po de dag ni tshul khrims yongs su dag pa'o//
43a5(dkon brtsegs): khyim bdag gzhan yang tshul khrims yongs su dag pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ ngar 'dzin pa spangs pa dang ga nga yir 'dzin pa dor ba dang / chad pa dang rtag pa dang bral ba dang / rten pa'i tshes la
43a6(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa ste/ bzhi po de dag ni tshul khrims yongs su dag pa'o// khyim bdag gad yang tshul khrims yongs su dag pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ phung po rnams la 'byung ba dang 'jig par rdzo
43a7(dkon brtsegs): dang khams rnams la chos kyi dbyings su yongs su 'jal ba dang / skye mched rnams la grong stong par 'du shes pa dang / tha skad bcags pa rnams la mngon par mazhen pa ste/ bzhi po de dag ni tshul khrims
43b1(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pa'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang tshul khrims yongs su dag pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ bdag la bdag med par 'du shes pas bdag la mi bstod pa dang / gzhan la/
43b2(dkon brtsegs): mi dmigs pas gzhan la mi smod pa dang / sems shin tu sbyangs pas/ rlom sems med pa dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas g.yo ba med pa ste/ bzhi po de dag ni tshul khrims yongs su
43b3(dkon brtsegs): dag pa'o// drim bdag gzhan yang tshul khrims yongs su dag pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ stong pa nyidadi la mo pa dang / mtshan ma med pas mi skrag pa dang / sems can thams cad la che
43b4(dkon brtsegs): snying rje ba dang / bdag med pa la bzod pa ste/ bzhi po de dag ni tshul khrims yongs su dag pa'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba ting nge 'dzin yongs su dag pacwo
43b5(dkon brtsegs): na de la slob ste/ ting nge 'dzin yongs su dag pa de gang zhe na/ gang chos thams cad la rtsol ba med pa dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas gnyis su dbyer med pa dang / sems las su rung ba dang
43b6(dkon brtsegs): sems rtse bcig pa dang / sems nges par 'byung ba dang / sems mi 'gro ba dang / sems kun tu mi rgyu ba dang / sems mi gnas pa dang / sems nges par sems par byin gyis rnyob pa dang / sems
43b7(dkon brtsegs): la dbang sgyur ba dang / sems 'dod pa'i yon tan rnams la mi chags pa dang / sems chos la sgyu mar so sor rtog pa dang / ji ltar chos kyi dbyings mngon par 'du mi byed pa dang / ji ltar mi skye mi 'byung zhing
44a1(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa nyid pa de ltar/ khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba ting nge 'dzin yongs su dag pa la so sor rtog / khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems/
44a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rab tu byung ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa thos na de la slob ste/ shes rab yongs su dag pa de gang zhe na/ de 'di ltar so sor tog ste/ chos thams cad mngon sum du shes pa dang /
44a3(dkon brtsegs): tshig rab tu dbye ba shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa la 'jug pa shes pa dang / sems can gzhan dag la chos go bar byed pa shes pa ste/ khyim bdag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba shes rab
44a4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pa la so sor rtog go khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba 'di ye shes rab 'di ni lus med pas thogs pa med pa'i mtshan nyid do// rgyu ba med pa
44a5(dkon brtsegs): bzung ba med pa'i mtshan nyid do// skye ba med pas gnas med pa'i mtshan nyid do// nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid pas mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i mtshan nyid do snyam du rab tu slob bo// khyim bdag de ltar na gang
44a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar chos la so sor rtog pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba'i bsgrub pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ srog chags brgyad stong gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par
44a7(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// khyim bdag de dag thams cad las phal cher ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob bo// srog chags sum khri nyis stong ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul dang
44b1(dkon brtsegs): bral zhing dri ma med pa rnam par dag go de nas khyim bdag drag shul can dgar la yi rangs shing rab tu dga' nas mgu ba dang yid bde ba skyes te / brgya skyong ri ba'i ras bcos bu zung
44b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la gsol nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di sems can thams cad la stsal to// bdag gi dag pa'i rtsa ba 'dis byang chub sems
44b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' khyim pa rnams kyi bslab pa ji ltar bcas pa de ltar byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa gang lags pa de dag gi chos yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rab tu
44b4(dkon brtsegs): byung ba rnams kyi bslab pa bcas pa'ang de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba gang dag lags pa de dag gi chos yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig bcom ldan 'das la'ang zhu bar 'chal
44b5(dkon brtsegs): te/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa khyim na gnas pa chos du zhig dang ldan na rab tu byung ba'i bslab pa la slob pa lags de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ khyim
44b6(dkon brtsegs): bdag drag shul can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khyim bdag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa khyim na gnas pa chos lnga dang ldan na rab tu byung ba'i bslab pa la slob pa yin te/ lnga gang zhe na
44b7(dkon brtsegs): khyim bdag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa khyim na gnas pa mi lta bar dngos po thams cad yongs su gtong ba yin te/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ldan pas rnam par smin pa
45a1(dkon brtsegs): pa sa nga / khyis pagag n+ya yang byang chub sems dpa' drim pa cos dganas pa ngas par ya ba yi // sri tha~M gul du 'dod pa sa
45a2(dkon brtsegs): gnyis sbed pa'am// yan lag pa yin par 'jug pa stani zlos pa dang / khyim bdapag dan yang byung chub sems dpa' khyim pa rgyam na gnas pa yang dag pa rtson mang ba pa mi rig cing rjem stong
45a3(dkon brtsegs): zhugs nas// thangs kyis mngon par bsgrub pa bsam gtan pazhi po dag la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa byim na pa nas pa sems cad thams cad byed par
45a4(dkon brtsegs): byed pa la brtson pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas nges par 'byung bar brjod 'grus rtsom pa dang / khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa khyim na gnas pa dadag kyang dam pa'i chos yongs su
45a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin cing gzhan yang dam pa'i chos la sbyor bar byed pa ste/ khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa khyim na gnas pa chos lnga po de dag dang ldar na rab tu byung ba'i bslab pa la slob pa yin no// de nas
45a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la/ khyim bdag drug shul can gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bka' bzhin du bgyi bar 'tshal lo// rab tu byung ba'i bslab pa
45a7(dkon brtsegs): la slob bo// chos mnyam pa nyid 'di lta bu la'ang 'jug par bgyi'o// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad do// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi
45b1(dkon brtsegs): tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od 'phro ba ba dog sna tshegs byung ba 'di lta ste sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / le banar dang gshel/
45b2(dkon brtsegs): dang dngul gyi kha dog lta bu ste/ de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa rnams su 'od kyi snang bas khyab par byas nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par 'phags te/ slar log nas bcom
45b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub par gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus stan las langs
45b4(dkon brtsegs): nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gtsugs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la bde logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
45b5(dkon brtsegs): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rgyu ma mchis rkyer ma mchis par ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'dzum pa mi mdzad na 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags rkyen gang lags// de skad ces gsol
45b6(dkon brtsegs): bu dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo khyod kyis khyim bdag drag shul can 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byas kyi
45b7(dkon brtsegs): chos bsgrub pa'i phyir seng ge'i sgra bsgrags pa mthong ngam gsol ba bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bde bar gshegs pa mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyi
46a1(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyim bdag drag shul cang 'di ni gang dag bskal pa bzang po 'di la 'byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la rim mo byed bur 'gyur ro//
46a2(dkon brtsegs): bsti stang dang mchod pa thams cad kyis mchod par 'gyur ro// dam pa'i chos kyang 'dzin par 'gyur ro// rtag tu'ang khyim bdag tu gyur nas rab tu byung ba'i bslab pa la gnas so//
46a3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub de'ang rgyas par byed par 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos khyim bdag drag shul can la 'di skad ces smras so// khyim ba/
46a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyu gang dang rkyen gang gis gang khyim na gnas shing rdul la gnas pa la dga' bar byed// drag shul can gyis smras pa/ btsun pa kun dga' bo rdul ni rdul cung zad kyang med de/ snying rje chen po dang ldan
46a5(dkon brtsegs): pas bdag bde ba la mi re ba yin no// btsun pa kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' ni sdug bsngal thams cad kyis gzir kyang bzod de/ sems can rnams yongs su mi gtong ngo //
46a6(dkon brtsegs): de skad ces spras pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo khyim bdag drag shul can 'di khyim gyi sa la gnas nas/
46a7(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa bzang po 'di la sems can rab tu mang po yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur te/ rab tu byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni bskal pa stong ngam/ bskal pa brgya stong du'ang de ltar mi nus so//
46b1(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo 'di ltar khyim bdag 'di la yod pa'i yon tan rnams ni rab tu byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' spyong la'ang med do// de nas bcom ldan 'das pa/
46b2(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i mong ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar gyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
46b3(dkon brtsegs): dga' bo de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di drag shul can gyis zhus pa zhes bya bar zung zhig/ khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba'i bslab pa la bsgrub pa zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ lhag pa'i bsam pas bla ma la
46b4(dkon brtsegs): bsnyen bkur bya ba'i le'u zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ kun dga' bo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa thag tu byang chub sems dpa' yon tan dang / brtson 'grus dang / chos mang po rab tu 'thob ste/
46b5(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus zhan pas bskal pa brgyar tshangs par spyad pa la gnas pas ni de lta ma yin no// kun dga' bo de bas na bdag kyang 'di la brtson 'grus bskyed par 'dod pa dang / gzhan yang brtson 'grus
46b6(dkon brtsegs): la gzung bar 'dod pa dang / bdag kyang yod tan gyi chos mnyam pa nyid thams cad la gnas par 'dod pa dang / gzhan yang yon tan gyi chos mnyam pa nyid thams cad la dkor bar 'dod pas chos
46b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi rnab grangs 'di mnyan par bya/ kun chub par bya/ bklag par bya/ gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya'o// kun dga' bo ngas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
47a1(dkon brtsegs): yang dang yang rgyu cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir khyod la yongs su gtang ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i nang du yon tan thams cad 'du
47a2(dkon brtsegs): par de bzhin gshegs pas bshad pa'i phyir ro// kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dang mi 'bral bar gnas pa de sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang mi 'bral lo// kun
47a3(dkon brtsegs): dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan tam 'dzin tam klog pa dang mi 'bral ba de sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba dang mi 'bral la
47a4(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i nang du yon tan thams cad 'dus shing chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i nang du bslab pa bsgrub pa'i lam gyi yon tan thams cad 'dus
47a5(dkon brtsegs): par de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par rab tu bshad pa'i phyir ro// kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer bdag gis stong
47a6(dkon brtsegs): gsub gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mes rab tu gang ba'ang 'bogs te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan par bya/ kun chub par bya'o// kun dga' ba stong gsum gyi stong
47a7(dkon brtsegs): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khabs rin po che sna bdun gyis rab tu dang ba tsam yang ri mor byas te/ slob dpon la phul nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan par bya'o// kun chub par bya'o/
47b1(dkon brtsegs): kun dbar bo byang chub sems dpa' bang gis 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mchod rten rin po che las so sor byas te mchod pa thams cad kyis brjod pa de bAnir dung star byung
47b2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rnams la ji srid 'tshe'i bar du bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyer bkur byed cing / gang ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas bcog
47b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bran dang slob par khas blangs te bsnyen bkur byas su zin kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mi 'dzin mi chung / me klog
47b4(dkon brtsegs): kun chub par mi byed/ 'jug par mi byed cing / bsgrub pa 'di la'ang mi gnas na/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' des 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa
47b5(dkon brtsegs): rnams la mchod pa byas par mi 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan cing kun chub par byed la/ dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bya ba dang
47b6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi rigs rgyun mi 'chad par bya ba'i phyir/ gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston cing bsgrub pa 'di la'ang gnas na/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' nges 'das bdag
47b7(dkon brtsegs): ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro// gus pa dang bcas pas bsnyen bkur byas par yang 'gyur ro// rgyabacom
48a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / khyim bdag drag shul can dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / kyang
48a2(dkon brtsegs): mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam
48a3(dkon brtsegs): grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ drag shul can gyis zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ 'dus pa bcu dgu pa rdzogs so// / sh+lau ka dgu brgya bam po gsum mo// rgya gar gyi
48a4(dkon brtsegs): mkhan po su ren dra bo d+ho dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba zhar ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa'o// //
48a5(dkon brtsegs): bod skad du/ glog thob kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// / bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//
48a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khar bya rgod phung po'i r-i la dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang yon tan khyad par du 'phags pa phur sum
48a7(dkon brtsegs): tshegs shing seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa stong dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lnga brgya dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de dag thams cad kyang gzungs rab tu thob pa/ spongs pa thog
48b1(dkon brtsegs): ba med par gyur pa/ mi skye ba'i bzod pa mngon sum du byas pa/ phyir mi ldog pa la gnas pa/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dang ldan pa/ mngon par shes pas rnam par rtsen pa sems
48b2(dkon brtsegs): can gyi sems kyi spyod pa'i tshul rab tu rtogs pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma'i rgyal mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa' zla ba'i rgyal mtshan dang / byang chub sems
48b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' kun tu 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' zla ba'i rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' shin tu mtho bsal dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang byed dang // byang chub sems
48b4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' seng ge'i blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i yon tan 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' don thams cad grub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi rkyen dang ldan pa dang / byang chub sems
48b5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' smon lam dang spyod pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' stong pa'i blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' mnyam pa'i sems dang / byang chub sems dpa' dga' sred
48b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'khor lo mos pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' glog
48b7(dkon brtsegs): thob dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnam par rgyal ba'i spobs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i nga ro dang / byang chub sems dpa' rab dbyangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' sang byed dang /
49a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa sgyur ba la mkhas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rab tu zhi ba'i spyod pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag ni gtso
49a2(dkon brtsegs): bor gyur to// gzhan yang brgya byin lha'i dbang po dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'i rgyal po dang / mthu chen po dang ldan pa'i lha dang /
49a3(dkon brtsegs): klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa'i 'khor tshad med pa rnams dang yang thabs cig tu zhugs so//
49a4(dkon brtsegs): de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' glog thob ces bya bas 'khor mang po rab tu zhi zhing yongs su dag pa dag 'dus par gyur pa mthong ba dang / stan las langs te bla gos phrag
49a5(dkon brtsegs): ba gcig tu zar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
49a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das bdag la the tsom cung zad cig mchis te deng zhu bar 'tshal na/ de bzhin gshegs pas thugs rjes gsan cing gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi/
49a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' grog thob la bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis khyod la skabs phyes/ khyod cingang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / khyod la yang dag par
49b1(dkon brtsegs): bstan par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' glog thob kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems
49b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po chos ji lta bu zhig dang ldan par gyur na/ bsams pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid cing / skyon rnabs kyis gos par mi 'gyur ba dang / dbang po dang / rang bzhin rje//
49b3(dkon brtsegs): ba bzhin du thabs mkhas pas sems can de dag drangs te/ lus zhig pa'i 'og tu ngan 'gro rnams su ltung bar mi 'gyur zhing / gdon mi 'tshal bar mnyam pa nyid rtogs par 'gyur ba dang /
49b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten na gnas kyang pad+ma bzhin skyon gyis gos par mi 'gyur ba dang / chos kyi dbyings las ma g.yos par yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun tu rgyu zhing / rtag par de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyi sku mthong ba
49b5(dkon brtsegs): dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba dang / rnam par thar pa gsum la rab tu gnas kyang / snyoms par mi 'jug par sems can gyi mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa yongs su sbyangs nas skang
49b6(dkon brtsegs): cig ma gcig la pUr du blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'chang rgya bar 'gyur lags/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po slob thob kyis/ bcom
49b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshigs su bcad de zhu ba zhus pa/ bla na ma mchis mi yi gtso// mkhyen dang gzigs pa tshad pa mchis/ ma 'dres chos la bzhugs nas ri// 'jig rten rnams la phan
50a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dogs mdzad/ sems can kun la snyoms par gzigs/ 'jig rten kun gyi mgon skyabs mdzad/ log dang yang dag lam bstan nas// mthar thug pa de la dgod par mdzad
50a2(dkon brtsegs): yon tan mchog ni rab bsags pas rin chen sna tshogs phung po 'dra/ 'jig rten shes rab nyi ma khyod// khams gsum mchod 'os gtso bo lags// theg pa chen po bkas bshad nas/
50a3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub la ma ni rdzogs par mdzod// zhal mtshan zla ba nya ba 'dra// zhi gnas dag ni phun sum tshogs// nyer 'i chos ni rab bstan nas// nyon mongs rnams ni zhi bar mdzad// byang chub spyod pa
50a4(dkon brtsegs): bkas bshad nas// sems can rnams la phan mdzad gsol// sangs rgyas zhing dang sku tshe dang // gzugs sku dang ni 'khor rnams dang // 'phrin las gsum dang chos rnams kyang /
50a5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kun ni rnam par dag/ bcom ldan byang chub sems dpa' yi// rnam dag spyod pa bkas bshad gsol// ji ltar bdud ni gdul bar bgyi// ji ltar chos ni bstan par bgyi// ji ltar dran
50a6(dkon brtsegs): pa nyams mi 'gyur// khyod kyi bkas ni bshad du gsol/ ji ltar dpa' bo dag gis ni// 'khor ba kun tu zhugs gyur kyang // mtshan nyid gcig la gnas bgyid cing // chos la rtag tu g.yo
50a7(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur// ji ltar sangs rgyas rnams la ni// brten cing mchod pa bgyis nas ni// rtag par sangs rgyas sku bltas kyang // mthar ni mtshan ma spong 'gyur lags// rnam thar
50b1(dkon brtsegs): gsum po mngon dathos kyang // mkha' la bya ri 'phur ba bzhin// yon tan phur tshogs ma gyur par// nam yang mya ngan mi 'danga' lags// dbang po rang bzhin yongs rtogs nas// 'jig pa pa
50b2(dkon brtsegs): mchis rjes 'brang zhing // mngon par zhen pa ma mchis par// sems cadan de dag smin bgyid lags// sngar ni 'jig rten bde btang nas// slad kyis dang ba'i sems skyed de/ ye shes bya
50b3(dkon brtsegs): nom phun tshogs pas// bla med byang chub 'thob 'gyur ba// 'di 'dra'i zam mo gya nom don// de bzhin gshegs pas bkas bshad gsol/ de nas bcom ldan
50b4(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po glog thob la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis sems can tshad med pa rnams la phan zhing bde bar bya ba dang / da ltar gyi lha dang bcas
50b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'jig rten dang / ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams yongs su gzung ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di lta bu zhus pa legs so legs so// de'i phyir klog thob shin
50b6(dkon brtsegs): tu legs par nyon la yid la zung zhig dang / khyod la yang dag par bstan par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' klog thob kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du thos par 'tshal lo zhes gsol
50b7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ glog thob byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni gter chen po dang / zad mi shes pa'i gter dang / kun tu zad mi she
51a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gter dang / mtha' med pa'i gter rnab pa lnga dang ldan pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu'i gter phun sum tshogs par gyur pas rgud pa rnams gtan du spong zhing
51a2(dkon brtsegs): gong du bstan pa lta bu'i yon tan khyad par du 'phags pa'ang yongs su rdzogs par byed la tshegs chung ngus myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang 'thob par 'gyur ro// lnga gang zhe na/
51a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ 'dod chags spyod pa'i gter dang / zhe sdang spyod pa'i gter dang / gti mug spyod pa'i gtor dang / cha mnyam pa'i spyod pa'i gter dang / chos thams cad kyi gter gang yin
51a4(dkon brtsegs): ba'o// glog thob byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'dod tshogs spyod pa'i gter zhes bya ba ji lta bu yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can rnams ni 'dod
51a5(dkon brtsegs): chags kyi spyod pa'i rjes su mthun zhing / phyin ci log gis bcings pas mtshan ma rnams kyi rjes su gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang ro dang reg bya dang / chos la sogs pa'i
51a6(dkon brtsegs): yul dag la rnam pa sna tshogs su rnab par brtags nas/ brtan pa nyid du mngon par zhen pa dang / bde ba la chags shing myos par gyur pa yin la byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can de
51a7(dkon brtsegs): ngag gi sems kyi spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs gang yin pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes pas sems can de dag gang la mos shing 'dun pa dang / spyod yul gang la chags shing goms pas mthu can du gyur
51b1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / dang pa ji lta bu dang lngar zhing phun sum tshogs par gyur pa dang / sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba ji lta bu bskyed pa dang / theg pa gang la gzhol bar byed pa dang // dge ba'i rtsa ba ji snyed yong pa dag na bzhig na yongs su smin pa/
51b2(dkon brtsegs): zur pa'ang rab tu shes te/ byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can de dag gi 'dod pa thams cad yongs su spang ba'i phyir dang / de dag gi dge ba'i sems rtag par rgyun ma 'chad par bya ba'i phyir shin tu legs
51b3(dkon brtsegs): par brtags nas yongs su gso bar byed do// klog thob sems can rnams kyi dbang po dang / spyod pa'i bye brag shin tu shes par dka' bar rig par bya ste/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams
51b4(dkon brtsegs): cad kyis kyang rig par mi nus na/ so so'i skye bo dang mu stegs can rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos glog thob sems can kha cig ni 'dod pa rnams la mngon par zhen par gyur kyang bla na med pa yang
51b5(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su smin par byed pa'ang yod do// sems can kha cig ni 'dod pa'i yul reg pa tsam mam/ 'dod pa'i sems kyis tshig smras pa tsam gyis bla na med
51b6(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su smin par byed pa'ang yod do// sems can kha cig ni gzugs sdug gu dag mthong nas/ 'dod chags kyi sems skyes pa las gzugs de rnam par
51b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur zhing zhig par mthong ba nyid kyis khong du chud par gyur nas 'dod pa'i gdung ba nye bar zhi ste/ mi rtag pa nyid shin tu yid la byed pa nyid kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
52a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub yongs su smin par byed pa'ang yod do// sems can kha cig ni bud med mthong ba na/ mngon par rten pa skyes pa med kyang / byis yid la dran pa'i dbang gis
52a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags kyi sems skyes nas de'i kha dog dang dbyibs yid la byas nas rjes su chags pa skye bar 'gyur ba'ang yod do// sems can kha cig ni rmi lam na gzugs yid du 'ong ba dag mthong ba'i
52a3(dkon brtsegs): dbang gis 'dod chags kyi mngon par zhen pa bskyed nas/ yid la byed cing yongs su gnyer bar byed pa'ang yod do// sems can kha cig ni bud med kyi sgo zos pa tsam gyis 'dod chags kyi
52a4(dkon brtsegs): sred pa skyed par byed la/ res 'ga' ni mthong ba tsam gyis 'dod chags kyi sems dang bral nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su smin par byed pa'ang yod pas/ de'i phyir glo gzos
52a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' ni 'dod chags kyi nang rnam pa sna tshogs gang yin pa dang / 'dod chags kyi sman rnam pa sna tshogs gang yin pa de dag thabs mkhas pas legs par khong du chud kyang / chos
52a6(dkon brtsegs): dbyings la gnyis su 'dzin pa'i mtshan ma'ang med la chos kyi dbyings la rmongs par gyur pa'i sems can de dag la'ang snying rje chen po bskyed par bya'o// glog thob 'dod chags dang
52a7(dkon brtsegs): zhe sdang dang / gti mug ces bya ba dang chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes zhes bya ba'i chos cung zad tsam yang dmigs su med pas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du bdag gis/
52b1(dkon brtsegs): mthong ba ltar na sems can rnams ni mtshan ma med pa/ rang bzhin gyis stong zhing dben pa/ btags pa tsam du rnam par gzhag pa/ tshegs shing 'dus pa'i chos 'di la 'dod chams/
52b2(dkon brtsegs): dang zhe sdang dang / gti mug skyed par byed pas/ bdag gis 'di dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor brtags nas/ 'dod chags kyis rmongs par gyur pa'i sems can de dag gi ched du ming
52b3(dkon brtsegs): rje chen po la gnas nas/ sngon gyi smon lam yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// chos kyi dbyings las ma g.yos par rtsol ba med pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su smin par bya'o snyam du sems so//
52b4(dkon brtsegs): skyes pa gang zhig bud med dag la yang dag pa ma yin pas sdug pa'i 'du shes bskyed nas/ 'dod chags lci ba skyes par gyur na byang chub sems dpas bud med shin tu sdug cing mdzes pa/ gzugs kyi mtshan
52b5(dkon brtsegs): khyad par du 'phags pa/ rin po che'i rgyan 'phreng dang ldan pa/ rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan pas lha'i bu mo dang 'dra bar gyur pa/ sngon ma mthong ba dag tu bsgyur nasasems can de dag gis
52b6(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar sred cing rjes su chags pa dang // shin tu mngon par zhen par gyur pa ston par byed do// de dag gi nus pa dang sbyar nas thabs kyis 'dod chags kyi dug mnga' dbyung ba'i ched du rang dbang du
52b7(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa'i mthus bud med kyi gzugs su bsgyur nas de'i mdun du snang bar byas nas chos bstan pa nyid kyis sems can de dag chos kyi dbyings rtogs par byas te mi snang bar gyur te//
53a1(dkon brtsegs): bud med kyang zhig skyes pa dgra la 'dod chags kyi sems skyes par gyur na// byang chub sems dpas skyes pa'i lus bstan nas/ 'dod chags kyi drug mdar
53a2(dkon brtsegs): dbyung ba'i ched du chos bstan pa nyid kyis chos kyi dbyings la zhugs par byas nas mi sdung bar byed do// srog thob 'dod chags kyi spyod pa te khri tshig stong dang / spyod pa ga' de dag kyang to/
53a3(dkon brtsegs): par brgyad khri ba'i stong du gyur pa de dag byang chub sems dpas rtsol ba med pa'i ye shes kyi sgo mo bye ba stong phrag tshad med pa bskyed de/ sems can yong du chud par byas nas thams cad rnam par grob
53a4(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur kyang / bdag gis sems can la 'di lta bu'i chos bstan to snyam du sems pa'ang med la/ sems can rnam par grol bar gyur pa'ang mi dmigs so// glog thob 'di lta ste/ dper na rgya mtshe ma
53a5(dkon brtsegs): dros pa'i klu'i rgyal po ni las kyi mthu'i dbang gis de'i pho brang gi nang nas chu klung chen po bzhi byung nas// sems can chu dang skam la gnas pa dag dbyar tsha ba'i dus kyi tshe bsil ba dang / rlan gyis me tog dang 'bras
53a6(dkon brtsegs): bu dag rgyas shong / 'bru rnams 'phel bar gyur nas sem can mang po shin tu ba bar byed kyang / klur rgyal po bdag gis mu grang ba'i po 'di dag byung ngo // dbyung bar bya'osnyam du mi sems mod kyi/ 'on kyang chu zung bzhi po dag rtswa tu
53a7(dkon brtsegs): 'bab cing sems can rnams nye bar spyod par byed do// byang chub sems dpa' yang de bzhin du sngon gyi smon lam yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa'i dbang gis rtsol ba med pa'i ye shes kyis 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi
53b1(dkon brtsegs): bstan nas/ 'khor ba'i yongs su gdung ba thams cad bsal te/ lha dang mi rnams la 'phags pa'i rnam par grol ba'i bde basbyin par byed kyang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis chos bstan to// bstan/
53b2(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o snyam du mi sems yod kyi/ 'on kyang rang gi rang gis snying rje chen po'i bsams pa la gnas nas/ sems can rnams la so sor brtags te/ tsi rigs par chos ston par byed do// gzhan yang /
53b3(dkon brtsegs): glog thob 'di lta ste/ dper na brgya byin lha'i dbang po la lha'i bu mo khrag khrig phrag bcu gnyis yod pa de dag/ brgya byin lnga'i dbang po'i rang dbang gi mthu'i dbang gis lus mang po bstan nas/ lha'i bu mo de
53b4(dkon brtsegs): ngag de dang lhan cig 'dod pa'i bde ba yongs su rdzogs par myong bas/ de dag so so nas 'di snyam du bdag gcig pu ni deng lha'i dbang po dang lhan cig rtses so snyam du sems kyang / yang dag par lha'i dbang
53b5(dkon brtsegs): po de la mngon par zhen par gyur pa ci'ang med do// byang chub sems dpa' yang de bzhin du sems can gang yongs su bzla ba'i 'os su gyur pa de dag gi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su smin par
53b6(dkon brtsegs): byed kyang byang chub sems dpa' la mngon par zhen par gyur pa med do// gzhan yang glog thob 'di lta ste/ dper na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ri mthon po'i rtsa la shar ba'i tshe/ 'od kyis 'dzam bu'i gling
53b7(dkon brtsegs): kun tu snang bar byed pas// gang du snang bar byas pa'i gnas de dag tu kha dog sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa sna tshogs rab tu ston par byed kyang / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de ni kha dog gcig
54a1(dkon brtsegs): pa/ 'od gcig pa nyid de/ tha dad pa'i mtshan ma med do// byang chub sems dpa' yang de bzhin du shes rab kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis chos kyi dbyings snang bar byas nas/
54a2(dkon brtsegs): sems can gyi mngon par zhen pa'i ri'i rtse mo de dag tu shar ba na/ dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid gcig tu gyur cing // de dag gi mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos ston par byed kyang / chos kyi dbyings la gnyis
54a3(dkon brtsegs): su gyur pa'i mtshan nyid med do// glog thob 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'dod chags kyi spyod pa'i gter ces bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' gang gis gter 'di thob
54a4(dkon brtsegs): par gyur na bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa las lhag par sems can rnams kyi mos pa sna tshogs ji lta ba bzhin du lus tshad med po bstan nas// tshig rnam pa sna tshogs kyis chos ston par byed kyang / chos kyi
54a5(dkon brtsegs): dbyings la gnyis su gyur pa'i mtshan nyid med do// gzhan yang glog thob 'di lta ste/ dper na gser yang dag pa ni mgar ba'i thabs mkhas pa'i mthu'i dbang gis mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du rgyun rnam pa sna tshogs su byas te/
54a6(dkon brtsegs): mtshan nyid tha dad par gyur kyang / gser gyi rang bzhin la ni tha dad du gyur pa ci'ang med do// byang chub sems dpa' yang de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings shin tu legs par brtags nas/ sems can mos pa rnam pa sna tshogs ji lta ba bzhin
54a7(dkon brtsegs): du lus tshad med pa dag bstan nas/ tshig rnam pa sna tshogs kyis ston par byed kyang / chos kyi dbyings la ni gnyis su gyur pa'i mtshan nyid med do// 'di ni rtag par chos kyi dbyings la zhugs pas mtshan nyid gcig tu
54b1(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' gang gser 'di lta bu thob par gyur na/ sems can gyi ched du rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sgo nas chos ston par byed pas/ de dag gis chos thos pa'i dbang gis
54b2(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa'i nor phur sum tshogs pa'i dbang phyug dang ldan par gyur pas/ 'khor ba'i chung ba dag gtan du yongs su spong bar byed do// / gzhan yang thog thob byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
54b3(dkon brtsegs): chen po rnams kyi ne sdang spyod pa'i gter ces bya ba ji lta bu zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can rnams ni nga rgyal dang mtshungs par ldan pa/ bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa dang bcas pa/ bdag dang bdag gi mtshan
54b4(dkon brtsegs): ma la gnas pas/ yun ring po nas byams pa dang bzod pa ma bsgoms pa/ zhe sdang gi gdung bas rang gi sems shig par gyur pa/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran par ma gyur pa/
54b5(dkon brtsegs): zhe sdang gi gdug pas g.yogs pa/ chos nyid la rmongs par gyur pa yin yang / byang chub sems dpa' ni zhe sdang mang ba'i sems can de dag la nam yang gnod sems dang rnam par 'tshe ba skyed par mi byed
54b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi/ 'di snyam du kye ma sems can 'di dag ni gti mug gis mongs pas chos rnams bzod pa nyid nas rab tu dben zhing zhi ba/ dri ma dang rnyog pa med pa/ 'dus pa med pa gcod pa med pa/ rab tu na pa'i
54b7(dkon brtsegs): chos nyid la phyin ci log dang mtshungs par ldan par gyur pa'i dbang gis yang dag pa ma yin pa'i ni sdang dang / khon du 'dzin pa bskyed par gyur to snyam du sems pa kho nar bad do// de snyam du bsams nas kyang
55a1(dkon brtsegs): snying rje chen po la gnas te/ rtag par bdag nyid 'gyod cing bshags par yang byed la/ gal te lu Ni yan lag dang nying lag gcod pa zhig yod na'ang / zhe sdang spyod
55a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems can de dag 'dul bar 'dod pa'i phyir bzod pa la rab tu gnas par byed do// gal te zhe sdang spyod pa'i sems can tshad med pa de dag phan tshun gcig la gcig rgyab kyis phyogs shing //
55a3(dkon brtsegs): zhe sdang dang khon du 'dzin pa'i las yongs su rdzogs pa'i dbang gis sbrul gdug pa ngan 'gro'i lus su ltung bar gyur pa dag la ni byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa la rab tu gnas pa des/ 'di ltar byams
55a4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang dran pa'i stobs kyis sems can de dag btul nas ngan 'gro'i rnam par smin pa len par 'gyur zhing / gdon mi za bar mnyam pa nyid rtogs par byed pa gang yin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' thabs
55a5(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pas/ sems can gyi zhe sdang gi spyod pa yongs su bsal bar byed pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang glog thob byang chub sems dpa' ni gal te sems can zhe sdang can dag mthong bar gyur na/ 'di snyam du chos
55a6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa yin na/ kye ma sems can 'di dag ni zhe sdang gi rjes su 'brangs nas/ yang dag pa ma yin pas rnam par rtog pa bskyed nas/ mnyam zhing rtsod pa med pa chos nyid
55a7(dkon brtsegs): 'di la zhe sdang gi bsams pa bskyed pas/ sems can 'di dag chos kyi dbyings nyid ma rtogs par gyur to// gal te sems can 'di dag chos nyid mthong bar gyur na ni/ gzhan dag la gnod sems bskyed
55b1(dkon brtsegs): par mi 'gyur ba gan chos kyi dbyings nyid ma rtogs par gyur to// de'i phyir de wad gyes par 'gyur ro zhes byang chu ba sems dpa' des te sdang mang ba'i sems ca dag pa zag par snying ba bar byed sa nyi rten pas
55b2(dkon brtsegs): gnas te/ sngon gyi smon las yang yongs su rdzogs par byed la ga rtsol ba med pa'i ye shes kyis sems can kyi e klung gi spyong pa rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir/ chos kyi go mo rnam pa sna tshogs yang dag par ston par byed chub
55b3(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis sems can gyi zhe sdang bsal ba'i phyir chos bstan to snyam du mi sems so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings kyi mtshan nyid shin tu legs par rtogs pa'i phyir ro// 'di ni byang chub
55b4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa'i mtshan nyid la gnas nas/ nyon mongs pa'i spyod pa rab tu bsal ba zhes bya'o// glog thob 'di lta ste/ dper na mun pa bsal nas sdang ba 'thob par 'gyur yang /
55b5(dkon brtsegs): pun bsel bar byed pa med de/ 'di ltar mun pa dang snang ba'i ngo bo nyid ram mkha' dang mtshungs shing dbyer med pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa'i ye shes de la
55b6(dkon brtsegs): brten nas/ thabs la mkhas pas chos rab tu bstan te/ zhe sdang spyod pa'i sems can rnam pa sna tshogs 'dul zhing zhi bar byed kyang chos kyi dbyings la tha dad du gyur pa med do// glog thob 'di lta ste/ dper na nyi
55b7(dkon brtsegs): ma'i dkyil 'khor shar nas 'od kyis gang dang gang du snang bar byas pa de dag thams cad ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis bsdus pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang zhe sdang gi spyod pa gdul zhing bsal
56a1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sbyi/ ma sa cig tu rjod pa thams cad chos kyi 'bor po yin la chos kyi dbyings pa ni tha dang du myu smad de/ 'du par ra dang / spyod ba rlos ljo / ma
56a2(dkon brtsegs): gzhan gtogs par brgyang khri ba'i stong du gyur pa de dngag byang chub sems dpa' rtsol ba med pa'i ye shes yongs su grub pas sems can de dag gi zhe sdang gi spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rjes su chos ston par
56a3(dkon brtsegs): byed kyang / bdag gis sems can la chos bston to// snyan to// ston par 'gyur ro snyam du sems pa med de/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi zhe sdang spyod pa'i ba
56a4(dkon brtsegs): ces bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' gang gis gter 'di thob par gyur na bsal pa 'am/ bskal pa las lhag par sems can gyi mos pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rjes su tshig 'bru dang / yi ge dang /
56a5(dkon brtsegs): brjod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi thabs mkhas pas chos ston par byed kyang / zhe sdang spyod pa'i mtha' rnyed par mi 'gyur la/ byang chub sems dpa' de'i shes rab dang spobs pa'ang gtugs par mi 'gyur te/
56a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa'i mtshan nyid legs par bshad pas thob pa'i zhe sdang spyod pa'i gter ces bya'o// / gzhan yang glog thob byang chub sems dpa'
56a7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi gti mug spyod pa'i gter ces bya ba ji lta bu zhe na/ glog thob byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa 'di lta bu 'di ni shin tu dka' ba'i dngos po yin te/ 'di ltar sem can
56b1(dkon brtsegs): rnams ni nyon mongs pa'i rjes su 'brang ba/ gzhan la gnod pa byed pa/ ma rig pa'i mngal kyi grongs kun tu dkris pas dar gyi srin bu bzhin du bdag nyid bcings pas chos kyi dbyings rtonas pan
56b2(dkon brtsegs): thabs med pa/ bya ba dag la legs par so sor mi rdzog pa/ bdag tu lta ba/ mngon par len pa/ lam log par zhugs pa/ bul ba'i spyod pa la gnas pa/ nges par 'byung bar dga' ba yin pas / 'di lta bu
56b3(dkon brtsegs): la sogs pas rmongs par gyur pa'i sems can dag gi ched du dang po sems bskyed pa nas sbyor ba chen po bskyed de/ ngal zhing sdug bsngal ba'ang med/ le lo'ang med par rkyen gang dang / mos pa gang dang / chos bstan pa
56b4(dkon brtsegs): ji lta bu zhig gis sems can 'di dag byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bdud de/ rnam par grol ba thob par 'gyur snyam du sems te/ byang chub sems dpa' sngoran gyi chos kyi dbyings legs par so sor brtags pas
56b5(dkon brtsegs): rtsol ba med pa'i ye shes kyis snying rje chen po la gnas te/ sems can de dag chos kyi dbyings la rmongs par gyur par rig nas/ ci nus ci stsogs kyis chos bstan nas rab tu dul bar byed kyang bdag gis chos bstan to//
56b6(dkon brtsegs): ston to// ston par 'gyur ro snyam du sems pa med do// 'on kyang de'i sngon gyi smon lam gyi mthus// rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba legs par so sor brtags nas rang gi dang gis chos kyi sa mo bcu stong du ma bstan to//
56b7(dkon brtsegs): sems can de dag gi ma rig pa'i las kyi 'du byed bsal nas rnam par grol ba 'thob par byed do// glog thob 'di lta ste/ dper na sma ba bzang po nang mang po gso ba la mkhas pa/ sngar sman dpyad rnams la shin tu
57a1(dkon brtsegs): goms par gyur pa ni nad kyi mtshan ma mthong ma thag tu/ sngags dang ldan btang ba thams cad rab tu rtogs par gyur pas/ des gsos pas gang yang ma gsos pa med do// de bzhinadu
57a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' yang 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings shin tu legs par rtogs pas/ rtsol ba med pa'i ye shes kyis gti mug gi spyod pa bsags pa'i sems can de dag gi dbang po dang / rang bzhin ji lta ba bzhin du
57a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi sgo mo brgya stong du ma bstan nas/ thams cad rab tu gsal bar rtogs par byed do// glog thob 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi gti mug spyod pa'i gter ces bya'o// byang chub sems
57a4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' gang gis gter 'di thob par gyur na/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba shin tu legs par so sor brtags nas ka gti mug spyod pa'i sems can de dag gi ched du bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa las lhag par de dag
57a5(dkon brtsegs): gi rang bzhin dang / 'dun pa ji lta ba bzhin du tshig 'bru dang / yi ge dang / brjod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi thabs mkhas pas chos ston par byed kyang / gti mug spyod pa'i mtha' yang rnyed par mi 'gyur la/
57a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' de'i shes rab dang spobs pa'ang gtugs par mi 'gyur te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad dbyer med pa'i mtshan nyid legs par bshad pas thob pa'i gti mug/
57a7(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa'i gter ces bya'o// 'di gti mug gi spyod pa nyi khri chig stong dang / spyod pa gzhan gtogs par brgyad khri bzhi stong du gyur pa de dag byang chub sems dpas yongs su spang ba'i phyir chos kyi sgo
57b1(dkon brtsegs): mo brgya stong du rab tu phyenas/ yang dag par ston pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i gti mug spyod pa'i gter ces bya'o// / gzhan yang klog thob byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
57b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi cha mnyam pa'i spyod pa'i gter ces bya ba ji lta bu yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dper na me long gi dkyil 'khor shin tu dag cing yongs su gsal ba/ dri ma med pa/ lam gyi bzhi mdor bzhag na/
57b3(dkon brtsegs): gzugs brnyan rnams der snang zhing 'phel ba dang 'grib pa med kyang / me long gi dkyil 'khor de bdag ni gzugs brnyan rnam pa sna tshogs 'di dag ston par byed do zhes mi sems mod kyi/ 'on kyang
57b4(dkon brtsegs): me long gi dkyil 'khor de shin tu byi dor legs par byas na/ gzugs brnyan gyi rnam pa thams cad rang gis rab tu snang bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang chos kyi dbyings kyi me
57b5(dkon brtsegs): long gi dkyil 'khor de shin tu legs par byi dor byas pas/ rtsol ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas nas/ sems can rnams kyi sems kyi spyod pa'i bye brag ji lta ba bzhin du chos kyi sgo mo brgya stong
57b6(dkon brtsegs): du ma rnam par phye ste bstan nas/ de dag thams cad rab tu rtogs shing rnam par grol ba thob par byas kyang / chos kyi mtshan ma dang / sems ca gyi mtshan ma skyed par mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chu/
