57b7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' des chos kyi dbyings kyi mtshan nyid shin tu legs par rtogs pa'i phyir dang / spyod pa bzhi po 'di dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems can gang yin pa de dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu
58a1(dkon brtsegs): rtogs pas de dag gi dbang po dang / rang bzhin du chos ston par byed kyang / chos kyi dbyings dang / sems can gyi khams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor rtog par byed pas
58a2(dkon brtsegs): gnyis su 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid kyang med do// chos kyi dbyings dang / sems can gyi khams ji snyed pa de dag gnyis su med cing tha dad par bsal bar mthong ba'i phyir ro// klog thob 'di lta ste
58a3(dkon brtsegs): dper na nam mkha' la tha dad pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi mtshan ma'ang med la/ rnam par gzhag pa'ang med do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang chos kyi dbyings shin tu legs par so sor
58a4(dkon brtsegs): brtags nas/ chos thams cad mtshan nyid gcig tu 'jug par rtogs pa dang / sngon gyi smon lam gyi mthus sems can gyi spyod pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos rnam pa sna tshogs ston par byed kyang / chos kyi
58a5(dkon brtsegs): dbyings la ni tha dad du gyur pa med do// glog thob cha mnyam pa'i spyod pa 'di la nyi khri chig stong yod pa dang / spyod pa gzhan gartogs par brgyad khri ba ni stong du gyur pa de dag kyang // byang chub sems dpas so sor
58a6(dkon brtsegs): brtags nas/ thams cad bsal bar rtogs par 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na sman pa mkhas pa nang dang / sman gtong ba rab tu shes pa bzhin du rtsol ba med pa'i ye shes kyis chos rnam pa sna tshogs ston par
58a7(dkon brtsegs): byed pa gang yin pa 'di ni// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi cha mnyam pa spyod pa'i gter ces bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' gang gis gter 'di thob par gyur na/ sems can rnams kyi
58b1(dkon brtsegs): du bsal pa 'as/ bskal pa las lhag par de dag mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du brjod pa rnam pa sna chos kyi thabs mkhas pas chos ston par byed kyang / spyod pa de dag gi mtha' yang rnyed par mi 'gyur ba/
58b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' de'i shes rab dang spobs pa'ang gtugs par mi 'gyur te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa'i mtshan nyid legs par bshad pas thob pa'i cha mnyam pa
58b3(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa'i gter ces bya'o// / bam po gnyis pa ste tha ma// gzhan yang klog thob byang chub sems dpa' des de lta bu'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs pa
58b4(dkon brtsegs): gyur pas/ sems can rnams kyi dbang po dang / spyong ba dang / bsam pa'ang thabs mkhas pas rab tu rtogs pas// gal te 'dod chags mang ba'i sems can mthong bar gyur na/ de dag rab tu dul zhing de
58b5(dkon brtsegs): ngag gi nad gso ba'i phyir/ so so'i skye bo dang mthun par 'dod pa rnams la yongs su spyod pa dang / bu dang / chung ma dang / khyim gyi so ches phun sum tshogs par ston par byed kyang / pad+ma bzhin du
58b6(dkon brtsegs): mgos shing mngon par rten par gyur pa med do// sems can gang gti mug cing blo dang mi ldan pa de dag ni// byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa mi shes pas/ 'di snyam du po dang ldan pa su zhig sa ma
58b7(dkon brtsegs): sre bo dang tha me ngang bar 'dod pa rnams nyams su len par byed ces/ byang chub sems dpa' de la 'di ni byang chub sangs pa yin nosam du sems par byed de/ sems can de bu dang / nisams
59a1(dkon brtsegs): yongs su mi gtsang ba'i phyir/ zhe sdang chen po skyes nas gus par mi 'gyur bas/ las de'i dbang gis lus zhig ste shi ba'i 'og tu sems can dmyal ba chen por ltung bar
59a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur yang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' shin tu gsang bas gdul ba'i rgyu dang rkyen gyis pa na ma tho ba'i rnam pa yongs su zad nas/ gdon mi za ba'i mnyam pa nyid 'thob pa la rab tu bkod par byed do//
59a3(dkon brtsegs): glog thob 'di lta ste/ dper na me rab tu 'bar ba ni rtswa dang shing dang phrad par gyur pa na/ thams cad rab tu 'bar zhing me'i phung po nyid du mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du byang chub sems
59a4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' yang ye shes kyi me 'bar bar gyur pa na/ sems can rnams kyi 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / dge ba dang / mi dge ba ji snyed pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' dang lhan cig 'grogs
59a5(dkon brtsegs): shing thams cad rab tu 'bar nas/ shes rab nyid du mngon par 'grub par 'gyur te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i ma 'dres pa'i chos shes bya'o// gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ dper na ri'i rgyal po ri rab
59a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi ma 'dres pa'i mtshan nyid ni/ 'di lta ste/ rin po che sna bzhi las mngon par grub pa yin pas/ sems can rnams kyang de'i rjes su kha dog sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po
59a7(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa sna tshogs kyi mtshan nyid du gyur par byed de/ gal te bai DUR+Ya'i ngos su phyin na ni/ thams cad kyang bai DUR+Ya'i kha dog gcig pa nyid du 'gyur bar byed do// gser gyi kha dog gi ngos su phyin na ni
59b1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad gser gyi kha dog nyid du 'gyur bar byed do// dngul dang chu shel gyi 'dod du gyur pa'ang de bzhin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang ma 'dres pa'i chos thob pas/ sems can
59b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / dge ba dang / mi dge ba ji snyed pa de dag byang chub sems dpa'i thad du phyin cing lhan cig 'grogs par gyur na/ thams cad byang chub sems
59b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i ye shes la 'jug pa nyid du gyur bar byed kyang // de'i sems mi gtsang zhing / rang gi sdig pa'i las kyi dbang gis sems can dmyal po dang / dung 'gror ste gnas dang / shin rje'i 'jig rten du byung bgyur/
59b4(dkon brtsegs): bas/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i ma 'dres pa'i yon tan dang / smon lam gyi stobs kyis khan ma tho ba'i rnam par smin pa zad pa'i 'og tu gdon mi za bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
59b5(dkon brtsegs): chub thob par gyur pa la bkod par byed do// glog thob sngon byung ba 'das pa bskal pa tshad med pa/ dpag tu med pa/ grangs med pa na/ snyigs ma lnga'i dus kyi tshe/ de bzhin gshes
59b6(dkon brtsegs): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ bla na med pa'i skyes bu 'dul ba/ kha lo sgyur ba/ lha dang
59b7(dkon brtsegs): mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i phung po yon tan gyi sgra zhes bya ba byung ste/ de'i tshe skye dgu rnams tshe lo brgya nyi shu thub par gyur te/ da ltar nga ji lta ba bzhin no//
60a1(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe sems can rnams 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug shin tu che bas/ nyon mongs pa rnams kyis zil gyis non pas/ pha ma dang / phu nu dang / grogs po'i yid dang ga
60a2(dkon brtsegs): bar byed pa/ mkhan po dang slob dpon gyi rjes su mi 'brang ba/ byas pa'i drin mi gzo ba/ rtag par gnod sems dang bcas pa/ g.yo sgyu dang rkun bu'i sems dang ldan pa/ phan tshun gcig la gcig gnod
60a3(dkon brtsegs): pa byed pa/ tshul bzhin ma yin par spyod pa/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la gus pa med pa// ser snas zil gyis non pas yi dgas kyi chos spyod pa'i sems can de lta bu sha stag/ sangs
60a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing de na gnas par gyur pas ni shin tu gdul dka' bar gyur to// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de'ang sngon gyi smon lam gyi mthus// dus ngan pa de'i tshe bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
60a5(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de la nyan thos chen po'i tshogs ni nyi khri nyis stong mnga' bar gyur to// de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po rgyal cher byin pa zhes bya ba 'dzam bu gling
60a6(dkon brtsegs): la dbang ba'i dbang phyug dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la sems shin tu dang bar gyur pa zhig yod pa des// de bzhin gshegs pa de nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas par dbyar zla ba gsum spyan drangs te/
60a7(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa rgya cher bshams nas mchod cing rim gro byas so// de'i tshe dge slong dri ma med pa zhes bya ba spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa/ chos ston pa'i thabs la mkhas pas 'khor mang po rnams nyan par slo/
60b1(dkon brtsegs): sems can yongs su smin par byed pa la rtag par dal ba med pa/ re ba med par chos ston pa/ mdog gsal zhing gsong por smra ba/ gzugs dang stobs phun sum tshogs pa/ byang bzhin sdug cing ma
60b2(dkon brtsegs): ba sems can rnams kyis mthong bar mos shing / rim gro dang / bkur sti dang bla mar byed cing bsngags pa brjod pa zhig yod de/ dge slong gsar bu dag kyang dag par dri ma med pa'i rjes/
60b3(dkon brtsegs): su 'brang zhing / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du 'byung zhing 'jug pa dag la thogs pa med par gyur pas gos dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / mal stan dang / na ba'i gsos sman rnam pasna
60b4(dkon brtsegs): tshogs kyis kyang rim gro byas par gyur to// de'i tshe 'khor mang po de las dge slong phal cher lus kyi sdom pa dang / sems kyi shes rab sgom pa mi shes pa sangs rgyas dang / chos dang
60b5(dkon brtsegs): dge 'dun la gus pa med pa/ rtag par lta ba dang / chad par lta ba dang / bdag tu lta ba la sogs pa dang ldan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos la skur pa 'debs pa/ rnam par g.yer zhing gdul
60b6(dkon brtsegs): dka'/ dbang po rnams mi sdom pa/ chos bzhin ma yin pa la gnas pa/ dge slong gi tshul med par bdag nyid dge sbyong du khas 'che ba/ lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las thams cad log par
60b7(dkon brtsegs): zhugs pa sha stag gnas par gyur to// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de dbyar 'das nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang / rgyal po rgya cher byin pas tsan dan dmar pos sku zhugs la bzhen nas mchod pa byas te/
61a1(dkon brtsegs): ring bsrel gyi mchod rten ngos bzhi kun tu tsan dan dmar po'i mu khyud kyis bskor ba/ pad+ma gser gyi kha dog dang ldan pa bye ba phrag brgyad cu brtsigs so// de'i tshe dge slong dri ma med pa ni
61a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das des mang du thos pa'i mchog tu lung bstan pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu dam pa'i chos rgya cher spel te/ grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal gang dang
61a3(dkon brtsegs): gang du song ba der/ sems can brgya stong tshad med pa snyed yongs su btul nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bkod par gyur te/ de'i tshe dge slong sdig can mang po rnal 'byor khong
61a4(dkon brtsegs): du ma chud pa/ rtag par phrag dog dang bcas pa/ bdud kyis bslas pa rnams rgyal po de ga la ba der dong ste/ 'di skad du rgyal pos bkur ba'i dge slong dri ma med pa ni rgyal po'i pho brang du 'byung zhing
61a5(dkon brtsegs): 'jug la thags thogs ma mchis te/ dge slong 'di 'dod chags dang bral ba'ang ma lags la/ dus ma lags par yang zas 'tshal te/ spos dang 'phreng ba dag gis kyang lus brgyan par bgyid pas//
61a6(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par tshangs par spyod pa ma lags pas/ mchod pa mdzad pa'i mi rigs so// bdag cag ni don 'di'o slad du 'dir mchis nas rgyal po la gsol ba lags kyis/ slad kyis 'gyod par yang
61a7(dkon brtsegs): ma mdzad cig/ sangs rgyas kyi yang dag pa'i bstan pa la thugs mi ches pa'ang mi bskyed du gsol zhes smras so// de'i tshe bdud sdig can zhes bya ba zhig kyang bdag nyid dge slong gi
61b1(dkon brtsegs): gzugs su bsgyur nas rgyal po dag la ba der song ste snga ma bzhin du smras pa/ de'i tshe rgyal po rtse cher byin pa'ang yang nas yang du de gang sbas pa thos nas/ 'di snyam du dge slong ngom med pa ni rab tu bcon zhing rje
61b2(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pas bdag gis bla mar bkur ba yin te/ dngos po 'di lta bu byed pa ni gnas med do snyam mo// de nas de'i tshe bdud kyi 'khor rnams par snang las lus byed bstan nas rgyal po de la tshigs su bcad de sbas kyi/
61b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po bzo yi dUT la spobs// dus tshod dag la mkhas par gyis// rgyal po de ni ma shes na// mi rgyal rtags dang ldan ma yin// sangs rgyas nyan thos dgra bcom pa// ye shes chen po ldan pa
61b4(dkon brtsegs): pi tshig ga la nom rten par// ci yi phyir na chad par lta// dge slong rnabs ni phan gdags phyir// khyod la bden tshig smra ba yin// chang sma ngan 'gror 'gro ba'i mi// yang dag tshangs
61b5(dkon brtsegs): spyod ma yin pas// de ni rgyal po'i pho brang du// btsun mo dag dang lhan cig rtse// rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa yis// legs par rtogs la the tsom sol// rgyal pos dngos po 'ang
61b6(dkon brtsegs): thos pas// sems la sreg cing mya ngan skyes// 'khor rnams dang ni lhan cig tu// mur zhing rings par pho brang dong // de tshe dri mang pho brang nang // chos rnams rang bzhin stong pa dang // bdag dang
61b7(dkon brtsegs): sems can med pa yi// dam pa'i don ni ston par byed// rgyal po dmag 'khor bcas pa rnams// thams cad bdud kyis bslus pa na// pho brang nang gi btsun mo rnams// dge slong yongs bskor mthong
62a1(dkon brtsegs): ba dang // zhe sdang glang chen mos pa bzhin// gshed ma dag la rab bsgob// dge slong nga yi btsun mo bslus// sdug bsngal chos kyis chad pas chod// blon po 'bor dang bcas pa rnams/
62a2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad bdud kyis zin pas na// dge slong nyes pa med pa la// sems kyis gnod pa bya bar bsams// gshed ma mtshon thogs 'ongs pa dang // dri med snying brtse mchi ma byung // rgyal pos khrod
62a3(dkon brtsegs): ni chos min na// ci yi phyir na mchi ma byung // dri med rgyal po la smras pa// dngos po 'di ni yid ches dka'// re zhig skad cig sdod cig dang / bdag la gsad pa'i dbang yod do//
62a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal pos dge slong tshig thos nas// gshed ma dag la sdod cig bsgo// bden pa'i dngos po ci zhig yod// khyed kyis myur du smra ba'i rigs// lhag pa'i bsam pa ldan gyur cing
62a5(dkon brtsegs): snying rjes 'jig rten phan 'dogs pas// sor mo bcu yi thal sbyar te// bden pa'i tshig ni 'di skad smras// rgyal po chen pos mkhyen par mdzod// gal te yang dag nyes med na sa rga
62a6(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa drug tu g.yos// mkha' la me tog char phob cig/ de skad tshig ni smras ma thag/ sa chen rnam pa drug tu g.yos// mkha' la pU yi me tog babs// bdud 'khor mya ngan skyes par 'gyur//
62a7(dkon brtsegs): de tshe rgyal po dang ba skyes// rkang la phyag byas bzod par gsol// bdag ni dmyal bar lhung 'gyur na// mgon mang bdag la skyobs mdzod cig/ kyi hud sdig pa de phrad pas// gdug pa'i samA ni skyes par
62b1(dkon brtsegs): gyur sdig pa'i tshogs po'i rjes 'brangs pas// mngon dang skabs byed su yang med/ stor pa chen po ma gtogs par// phyogs bcur dag gi mgor byeng med/ bang gis rgyas rtsing spangs ras so//
62b2(dkon brtsegs): nam 'tsho'i bar du skabs su mchi// dge slong des ni rgyal po dang // g.yog 'khor bsam pa rig kur nas// dam pa'i don ni rib tu bshad// rgyal pos thos nas dang bathog/ 'khor ni bye ba rartsa stong dang /
62b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyal srid spangs nas rab tu byung // sbyangs pa'i sdom pa blangs pas na// gzhan gyis mgron gnyer yong mi len// de tshe rgyal po'i pho brang nang // btsun mo 'khor bcas brkyang khri rnams/ dam
62b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i don ni thos pas na/ phyir mi ldog la gnas par gyur// rgyal pos sangs rgyas gsungs pa bzhin/ lo ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i bar// nyin mtshan rtag par sdig bshags kyang // 'on kyang sdig pa'i
62b5(dkon brtsegs): khas ma zad// lo ni bye mang sdug bsngal myong // sdig zad de bzhin gshegs dang phrad // sngon ni skrag par byas pa'i rgyus// rnam smin lhag ma rtag par dman// mthar gyis rnal 'byor rab bsgoms
62b6(dkon brtsegs): te sangs rgyas bye ba stong mchod nas// so sor zhing khams gzhan dag tu// thams cad mngon par rdzogs sangs rgyas// thams cad kun kyang mtshan mthun par// yon tan grags pa zhes
62b7(dkon brtsegs): byar gyur// de tshe rgyal po rgya cher byin// dge slong byams bzod de la ni// gdug pa'i sems ni bskyed pas na// lo ni bye ba mang por yang // sngon gyi sdig las mngon gyur pas//
63a1(dkon brtsegs): ngu 'bod chen por ltung bar thun/ rnam smin de ni grang nas kyang // slar yang mi lus thob kun te/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun spyan phrad// rtag tu bsnyen bkun rimagro/
63a2(dkon brtsegs): byas// gzhan yang sangs rgyas bye ba phrag/ brgyad cu dag ni rim gro byas// de yi 'og tu sangs rgyas pa// de ni nga bdag nyid yin no// chos smra nyes pa med pa la// gnod pa byas pa'i dge slong ni/
63a3(dkon brtsegs): ma 'ongs mngon par 'tshang rgya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa yin// de tshe rgyal po pho brang nang / btsun mo 'khor ni brgyad khri rnams// shin tu dang bas dge rtsa bskyed// sangs rgyas tshad med rim
63a4(dkon brtsegs): gro byas// de ltar spyod pa rab bskyed nas// sems can phan btags smon lam btab/ sangs rgyas bye ba stong mchod nas/ so sor mngon par 'tshang yang rgya// ngas deng khyod la bsgo ba ni/
63a5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad gnod sems ma skyed cig/ gang zhig byams bsgoms sangs rgyas bsngags// myur du byang chub chen po 'thob de lta bas na glog thob sems can rnams kyi dbang po dang /
63a6(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin dang / bsam pa dag la mi mkhas pa dag gis dus thams cad du gnod sems bskyed par mi bya'o// glog thob 'di lta ste/ dper na ri rnams kyi nang na ri rab mchog tu gyur pa de bzhin du
63a7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyang ye shes rnams kyi nang na/ mchog dang / gtso bo dang / bla na med par gyur pa yin no// 'di lta ste/ dper na chu bo thams cad kyi nang na rgya mtsho chen po mchog tu gyur/
63b1(dkon brtsegs): ba de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyang ye shes rnams kyi nang na mchog tu zab cing rgya che bar gyur pa yin no// gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ dper na rgyal po rnams kyi nang na 'khor los sgyur ba
63b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po mchog dang / gtso bo dang / bla mar thun pa de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyang ye shes rnams kyi nang na gong na med par gyur pa yin no// glog thob de bzhin gshegs pa ni nga
63b3(dkon brtsegs): lta bu'i mkhyen pa dang ldan pa'i phyir sems can thams cad kyi 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug spyod pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba 'jug cing 'gyur ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad
63b4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen cing se so la gtogs pa gcig la thams cad yongs su sdud par mdzad do// klog thob de bzhin gshegs pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pas/ 'di lta ste/
63b5(dkon brtsegs): dper na skyes bu mig dang ldan pas rtsol ba la mi ltos par rang gi lag mthil na skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu gsal bar mthong zhing the tsom med pa de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'ang sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi
63b6(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa ji snyed pa dag rab tu mkhyen pas/ 'khor mang po'i nang du chos rnam pa sna tshogs yang dag par ston par mdzad do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag na
63b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags kyi spyod pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems can rnams 'dod chags kyis yongs su gdungs nas nyin mtshan du yid la byed cing don med par dus las 'das par byed pa'ang ngas rab tu mkhyen/
64a1(dkon brtsegs): cing gzigs so// 'dod chags kyi gdung bas lus dang ngag gi las rnam pa sna tshogs slong bar byed pa dag kyang ngas rab tu mkhyen cing gzigs so// zhe sdang spyod pa'i sems can zhes
64a2(dkon brtsegs): gi zil gyis non nas/ gcig la gcig zhe sdang gis brag dog byed pa dang / gnod pa byas pa'i phyir mnar med pa'i gnas su ltung bar 'gyur ba dag kyang ngas rab tu mkhyen cing gzigs so// gti mug spyod pa dang/
64a3(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems can rnams ma rig pa'i mun nag gis bsgribs shing rmongs pa'i mngon par zhen pa dang / log par lta ba'i rjes su 'brang ba la mos par gyur pa dag kyang ngas rab tu mkhyen to//
64a4(dkon brtsegs): 'os su gyur pa dang / 'os su mi 'gyur ba dang / 'phel zhing col ba dang bcas pa dang / ldog cing nyams par gyur pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg par dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang /
64a5(dkon brtsegs): rang sangs rgyas kyi theg par dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg par dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dag kyang ngas rab tu mkhyen to// de bzhin gshegs pa ni de lta bu'i mkhyen pa dang ldan pas
64a6(dkon brtsegs): 'khor mang po'i nang du bzhugs nas sems can gyi sems kyi spyod pa'i bye brag kyang rab tu mkhyen pas gal te dus la ma bab par rig par gyur na ni/ cang mi gsung zhing btitang snyoms
64a7(dkon brtsegs): su bzhag nas sems can 'di dag ni chos la rmongs par gyur pas khong du chud bar ma gyur to snyam du dgongs so// de bzhin gshegs pa ni dbang po dang stobs khyang par 'phags pa phun sum tshogs shing /
64b1(dkon brtsegs): dus rab tu mkhyen pa'i phyir gdul ba'i 'os su gyur pa dang / bsam pa mchog tu gyur pa dang / bzod par nus pa'i 'os su gyur pa dang / tshig legs par can par gyur pa dag kyang ngas rab tu mkhyen te/
64b2(dkon brtsegs): de ltar mkhyen par gyur nas kyang sems can de dag yongs su sdud cing phan 'dogs par byed do// de lta bas ni klog thob byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa yang dag pa'i gnas skabs su ma zhugs pa
64b3(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa legs par khong du ma chud pa dag gis khyim na gnas pa dam/ rab tu byung ba'ang rung ste/ thams cad kun la smod cing gnod sems bskyed nas/ yun ring
64b4(dkon brtsegs): bor bdag nyid la gnod par 'gyur bar mi bya'o// de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dang po sems bskyed pa nas/ theg pa chen po la gnas pa thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// sems
64b5(dkon brtsegs): can gzhan dag sdig pa mi dge ba'i las byed par mthong na'ang gnod sems bskyed par mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pas rtag tu sems can gang rnam par dkar zhing yongs su dag pa'i tshe
64b6(dkon brtsegs): las cung zad cig nyan par gyur na/ nams kyang yongs su mya ngan pas mi 'da' bar mi 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pas so// byang chub sems dpa' ni gal te 'dod chags spyod pa'i sems can mthong na/
64b7(dkon brtsegs): sems 'di dag 'dod chags kyi gdung bas bsregs par gyur pa'ang bdag gis nyes pa yin no snyam du sems so// zhe sdang dang gti mug gi gdung bas bsregs par gyur pa de dag mthong na'ang
65a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag thams cad ni bdag gis nyes pa yin no snyam du sems so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag gis sems can thams cad na ba'i sdug bsngal dang ldan par gyur pa de dag mthong bar gyur na/
65a2(dkon brtsegs): sman yongs su btsal te/ thabs mkhas pas yongs su gso ba'i rigs pa las bdag sngon sems can gyi nang bsal bar yi dam bcas na/ deng yal bar dor ba 'di nyid bdag gi nyes yin no snyam du sems
65a3(dkon brtsegs): pas so// byang chub sems dpa' ni de lta bu'i bsam pa dang ldan pas bdag nyid kyi nyes pa la lta zhing / sems can rnams la byams pa'i sems skyed par byed do// gal te gsod pa 'am/ lus kyi yan
65a4(dkon brtsegs): lag dang nying lag gcod cing gtub pa zhig dang phrad par gyur na'ang / pha rol gnod pa byas pa de dag la lan bya'o snyam pa'i bsam pa med do// glog thob byang chub sems dpa' de ltar yang dag par sgom pa na
65a5(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa'i mi dge ba'i las ji snyed pa dag kyang gtan du zad cing / ma lus par 'byang bar 'gyur la/ ma 'ongs pa'i mi dge ba rnams ni yang ldang bar mi 'gyur ro// glog thob sngon byung
65a6(dkon brtsegs): ba 'das pa'i bskal pa tshad med grangs med pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyi yang ches snga rol na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su
65a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa bla na med pa'i skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mchog tu skyes pa zhes bya ba
65b1(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten du byung ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams ni 'od zer can zhes bya ba ste/ rgyal po'i zong khyer rab tu bde ba zhes bya ba'i tshal na bzhugs so// de'i tshe shun pa 'jigs su rung ba
65b2(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba khrig tum che zhing gsod pa la dga' ba/ bzod pa dang byams pa'i sems med pa/ lag pa khrag gis bkrus pa mthong ba thams cad skrag par 'gyur ba zhig yod de/ de'i tshe shan pa des gleng zhig
65b3(dkon brtsegs): khang pa'i nang du bcings te/ nang du zhugs nas gsod par byas pa las/ glang des de mthong nas shin tu skrag pas thag pa bcad de bros nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa mchog tu skyes pa bzhugs pa'i tshal ga la
65b4(dkon brtsegs): ba der song ngo // de'i tshe shan pa de'ang mtshon thogs nas phyi bzhin du bsnyags pas/ klang de skrag nas g.yangs zab mo zhig tu lhung bas srog chad la thug pa tsam dun zhing sdug bsngal bas smra byung ngo //
65b5(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe shan pas glang de mthong nas/ zhe sdang cher skyes te g.yangs zab mo de nyid du zhugs nas mtshon thogs te/ gsad par byas pa las mtshon ma btab po'i bar skabs der/
65b6(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa mchog tu skyes pa tshal der 'khor mang po brgya stong tshad med pas yongs su bskor ba dag la/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta
65b7(dkon brtsegs): ste ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug skye
66a1(dkon brtsegs): mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher ba/ tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/ sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/ len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/ srid pa'i rkyen gyis
66a2(dkon brtsegs): skye ba/ skye ba'i rkyen gyis rba shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'dod pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang 'khrug pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de ltar na rten cing 'brel par
66a3(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba 'di dag thams cad ni sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig go zhes rgya cher rnam par phye ste ston par mdzad pas/ klog thob rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'di la ma rig pa'ang 'du byed
66a4(dkon brtsegs): la mi sems mi rtog la 'du byed kyang ma rig pa la mi sems mi rtog go// de bzhin du skye ba'ang rga shi la mi sems mi rtog la/ rga shi'ang skye ba la mi sems mi rtog pas/ de ltar na chos thams cad ni//
66a5(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin dmigs su med pas mngon par 'du bya ba med pa/ dran pa med pa/ bdag dang bdag gi ba med pa/ rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa/ ngab tsun cigagis gcig mi rig pa yin no// so so'i skye bo rnams 'di lta bu'i chos ma thob pa'i
66a6(dkon brtsegs): phyir gzugs ni bdag yin no// bdag ni gzugs rnams dang ldan no// gzugs ni bdag gi yin no zhes 'dzin par byed de/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i
66a7(dkon brtsegs): bar la'ang de bzhin no// bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa la mngon par len pa 'di'i dbang gis mi chag pa la rtag par 'dzin par byed/ sdug bsngal la bde bar 'dzin par byed/ mi sdug pa la sdug pa nyid du 'dzin par byed/
66b1(dkon brtsegs): bdag med pa la bdag tu 'dzin cing phyin ci log bzhi skyed par byed do// phyin ci log tu lta ba'i phyir ma rig pas rmongs nas/ yang dag par tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing / sems kyi rjes su mngon par zhen par
66b2(dkon brtsegs): gyur pas/ srid pa'i sred pa 'ching ba gcod par mi nus shing / 'khor ba'i 'khor bar rgyun mi 'chad par 'khor bar gyur pa yin no// mkhas pa dag ni chos kyi dbyings kyi mtshan nyid la shin tu legs par
66b3(dkon brtsegs): rtog par byed ba'i phyir bdag dang / gang zag dang / sems can zhes bya ba nas/ srog ces bya ba'i bar du cung zad tsam yang yod par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong la/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang /
66b4(dkon brtsegs): 'chi ba dang / gsong ba dang / gnod pa byed pa dag kyang mi dmigs so zhes gsungs pa dang / klog thob de'i tshe shan pa 'jigs su rung bas/ rgyang nas de bzhin gshegs pas tshe
66b5(dkon brtsegs): bshad pa'i sgra thos nas go bar gyur pas/ de ma thag tu gsod pa'i sems nye bar zhi bar gyur nas mtshon cha spangs te g.yang sa nas byung nas bcom ldan 'das de ga la ba der song ste/ bcom ldan 'ad
66b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos gtugs nas phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni deng de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa
66b7(dkon brtsegs): kha rab tu byung nas lam bsgrub par 'tshal lo zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de rigs so// dge slong legs par 'ongs sam zhes gsungs ma thag tu/ dge slong gi dngos por bsgyur
67a1(dkon brtsegs): nas rdzogs par bsnyen par gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mchog tu skyes pas/ de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas/ mthar gyis yongs su smin par mdzad cing /
67a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnams rgya cher yang dag par bstan pa 'jigs su rung bas thos pas/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob nas/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa las phyir mi ldog pa thob par gyur to//
67a3(dkon brtsegs): glang de'ang de bzhin gshegs pa des rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i chos kyi tshig ston pa'i gsung sgra shin tu gya nom pa thos nas// sems la rab tu dga' ba skyes pas/ shi 'phos pa'i 'og tu dga' ldan gyi
67a4(dkon brtsegs): lha'i gnas su skyes nas/ byams pa dang phrad de yang dag pa'i dad pa dang ldan par gyur to// klog thob de ltar na sems can rnams kyi spyod pa ni shin tu zab pa dang / rnam par rig par dkar
67a5(dkon brtsegs): zhing / shes par dka' ba yin te/ de'i phyir klog thob byang chub sems dpa' gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su gnyer bar 'dod pas/ sems can gyi dbang po dang /
67a6(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa dag la shin tu mkhas par byas nas/ sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems dang / bogs pa med pa'i sems la rab tu gnas te/ chos thams cad la rtag tu mngon par zhen pa
67a7(dkon brtsegs): med par bya'o// ci bdog pa'i rnams yongs su spangs te/ tshul khrims rnam par dag pa bsgrub par bya'o// bzod pa la gnas par bya'o// brtson 'grus bskyed par bya'o// bsam gtan dang ting
67b1(dkon brtsegs): nge 'dzin la mnyam par gagag par bya'o// yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid laso sor btag par bya'o// thog tho ba byang chub sems dpa' grang chos drug po 'di dag yongs su rdzogs par
67b2(dkon brtsegs): kuran/ rul blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bangon par rdzogs par 'tshang rje bar 'gyur ro// ji ltar yongs su rdzogs par byed ce na/ 'di lta ste/ thabs cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes
67b3(dkon brtsegs): la brten nas mngon par sgrub par byed pa'i phyir ro// glog thob byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos ga/ ter gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpas gzugs thams
67b4(dkon brtsegs): ca yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtogs shing / gzod pa nyid nas skye ba med pa dang / rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag par mthong ba gang yin pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' ni gzugs la
67b5(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa thob pa'i phyir so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang ldan par 'gyur ro// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ don so so yang dag par rig pa dang / chos so so yang dag par rig pa dang / nges pa'i
67b6(dkon brtsegs): tshig so so yang dag par rig pa dang / spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa'o// don so so yang dag par rig pa ni/ gzugs kyi don rnams la thogs pa med par gyur ba'i phyir ro//
67b7(dkon brtsegs): gzugs kyi don gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ don dam pa gang yin pa'o// don dam pa gang zhe na/ gzugs dmigs su med pa gang yin pa ste/ don dam pa'i ye shes la 'di lta bu dang ldan pa gang yin pa de ni/
68a1(dkon brtsegs): don so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya'o// chos so so yang dag par rig pa ni/ gzugs kyi chos rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor rabartags nas/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
68a2(dkon brtsegs): du rab tu shes pa gang yin pa de ni/ chos so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya'o// nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs rnams la thogs pa med pa'i ye shes kyi thabs pa
68a3(dkon brtsegs): pas nges pa'i tshig rnam pa sna tshogs kyis rnam par 'byed pa gang yin pa de ni/ nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya'o// spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs
68a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi chos rnams sems can gyi dbang po ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par phye ste ston par byed kyang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing / mngon par zhen pa med pa gang yin pa de ni/ spobs pa so so yang dag par
68a5(dkon brtsegs): rig pa zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' ni 'di lta bu'i ye shes dang ldan pas/ gzugs kyi chos la rmongs shing mngon par zhen par gyur pa'i sems can thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang / 'dun pa ji
68a6(dkon brtsegs): lta ba bzhin du rtsol ba med pa'i ye shes kyis ci rigs par chos ston par byed kyang / chos kyi dbyings la mtshan nyid gnyis su gyur pa med de/ sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos kyi bar la'
68a7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du rgyas par sbyar te/ glog thob 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi chos kyi gter zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' gang gis gter 'di thob par gyur na/ spyod yul rnams la rmongs
68b1(dkon brtsegs): par gyur pa'i sems can de lta bu dag yongs su gdul bar 'dod pa'i phyir/ de dag gi mos pa ji lta bzhin du de ngag re re la'ang bkal pa'am/ bskal ba las lhag par tshig rnam pa sna tshogs kyi thabs la mkhas pas chos
68b2(dkon brtsegs): ston par byed kyang / de dag gi mtha' yang rnyed par mi 'gyur la/ byang chub sems dpa' de'i shes rab la'ang 'grib pa med cing / chos kyi dbyings dang mi 'bral bar gnyis su med cing dbyer med pa'i rjes su 'brang ba
68b3(dkon brtsegs): gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pas chos thams cad dbyer med pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pas 'thob pa'i chos kyi gcer ces bya'o// chos kyi gter 'dis sems cad dag la ci rigs par tshe
68b4(dkon brtsegs): bstan nas/ zang mi shes pa'i chos kyi gter phun sum tshogs par gyur te/ 'khor ba'i rgung pa gtan du spong ba gang yin pa 'di ni/ klog thob byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi gcer
68b5(dkon brtsegs): chen po dang / zad mi shes pa'i gter dang / kun tu zad mi shes pa'i gter dang / mtha' med pa'i gter rnam pa lnga zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' gang gter 'di lta bu dang ldan par gyur na/
68b6(dkon brtsegs): yon 'a lung bar du 'phags pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa'i phyir tshegs chung ngus mur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rnga bar 'gyur ro// chos kyi
68b7(dkon brtsegs): gter bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' klog thob ni gzungs rab tu thob par gyur to// byang chub sems dpar lnga brgya ni glog gi 'od zer zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
69a1(dkon brtsegs): thob par gyur to// lha'i bu sum khri drug stong ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to// / de nas bcom ldan 'das la
69a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' zla ba'i rgyal mtshan gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad du rtsol ba ma mchis pa'i ye shes zhes gang gsungs pa de'i don ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan
69a3(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' gang gis dge ba'i chos rnams la/ lus dang sems kyi rjes su mthun pas dmigs shing mngon par 'du byed pa gang yin pa de ni rtsol ba dang
69a4(dkon brtsegs): bcas pa zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' gang lus dang sems rab tu dul bar gyur na/ dran pa med pa/ gnas pa med pa/ rnal 'byor sgom pa'i mtshan ma dang bral bar gyur pa dang / de sngon gyi smon
69a5(dkon brtsegs): lam dang ye shes yongs su rdzogs par gyur pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba stong phrag mang po rnams su rnam pa sna tshogs su ston par byed kyang / chos kyi dbyings la g.yo ba med pa dang rtag tu tshwa ston
69a6(dkon brtsegs): par byed pas chos kyi mtshan ma cung zad kyang med pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sems can yongs su smin par byas kyang / sems can gang yongs su bzlas pa med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing
69a7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad yongs su sbyangs kyang / sangs rgyas kyi yongs su dag pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba dang / rtag par sangs rgyas rnams rjes su dran par byed kyang / gzugs kyi mtshan nyid du mi lta ba dang /
69b1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun tu rgyu bar byed kyang / chos kyi dbyings dang mi 'bral 'gang yin pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rtsol ba med pa'i ye shes shes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'di lta bu'i/
69b2(dkon brtsegs): ye shes dang ldan pa'i phyir/ sems can thams cad kyi re ba yongs su rdzogs par byas kyang gang byas pa de dag la mngon par zhen pa'ang med do// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis
69b3(dkon brtsegs): rtsol ba med pa'i ye shes 'di bstan pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur to// brgya byin khru'i dbang po'ang sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang bcu
69b4(dkon brtsegs): par steng gi ba ra snang las me to ga man da ra ba dang / ut+pa la dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dang / puN+Da ri ka dang / tsan dan gyi phye ma'i char mngon par pha ba ste/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor to// lha'i rnga rnams
69b5(dkon brtsegs): kyang rang sgra byung bar gyur to// ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i snang ba chen pos kyang kun tu snang bar byas te/ sems can grang la reg par gyur pa de'i lus kyang shin tu bsil bar gyur to//
69b6(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' glog thob la bka' stsal pa/ glog thob 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis kyang
69b7(dkon brtsegs): gnas 'dir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu gsungs so// ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ba'i tshe'ang gnas 'dir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu gsung bar 'gyur ro//
70a1(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag na/ da ltar bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rgyun mi 'chad par mdzad pa'i phyir 'od zer tshe/
70a2(dkon brtsegs): po phyed par mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dka' bos stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan
70a3(dkon brtsegs): 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ bdag gis ji ltar yongs su gadrung
70a4(dkon brtsegs): bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni mi zad pa'i gter bstan pa zhes bya'o// chos thams cad dbyer med pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa zhes kyang
70a5(dkon brtsegs): bya ste/ khyod kyis de ltar mi yongs su gzung bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' glog thob dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /
70a6(dkon brtsegs): 'khor bzhi po rnams dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten thams cad/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yi rangs te/ mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa
70a7(dkon brtsegs): dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ mi zad pa'i gter bstan pa'i le'u b+he/ 'dus pa nyi shu pa rdzogs so// /
70b1(dkon brtsegs): rgya gar sad du/ b+ha dra mA ya kar bA kA ra Nan ma ma hA yAn sU tra/ bong skad du/ sgyu ma mkhan bzang po lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// bam po gcig/
70b2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ril dge slong sto
70b3(dkon brtsegs): nyis bcwa lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par grags pa// mngon par shes pa thob pa/ gzungs thob pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phru thob pa// mi ts+tsha
70b4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa lnga stong la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa'
70b5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po tsan dan bzang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kha lo skur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kha lo sgyur ba chen po dang / byang chub sems
70b6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od byed dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od gzi brjid dang ldan zhing nga ro snyan pa dang / byang chub
70b7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od bkod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gsal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can gyi snying po dang / byang chub sems
71a1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems cam pa lo sgyur bdul ba dang ldan pa dang / byams pa la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad dang
71a2(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gzhon nur kun pa dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lnga stong dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang yang thabs cig go// mi mjed
71a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang yang thabs cig go// rgyal po chen po bzhi dang yang thabs cig go// khru dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye
71a4(dkon brtsegs): chen po du mas kyang yongs su bskor to// de nas bcom ldan 'das ni rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po la rten cing bzhugs te/ rgyal po dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / bram ze dang /
71a5(dkon brtsegs): khyim bdag dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs kyi mi rnams kyis ni gus par byas// bla mar byas/ bsnyen bkur byas/ mchod pa byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis chos gos dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang /
71a6(dkon brtsegs): gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong ni bsnyes/ bcom ldan 'das kyi grags pa dang / snyan pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa rgya chen po ni mngon par 'phags te/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
71a7(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
71b1(dkon brtsegs): de ni thams cad mkhyen pa/ thams cad gzigs pa dang ldan pa ste/ thams cad ni mkhyen/ thams cad ni gzigs/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ni ldan// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'dzin
71b2(dkon brtsegs): ba bzhi dang ni ldan// so so yang dag par rig bzhi dang ni ldan/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rang ni ldan/ byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po dang ni ldan/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan nyams pa mi ma
71b3(dkon brtsegs): ba dang ni ldan/ spyan lnga dang ni ldan/ cho 'phrul yang brnye sa te/ kun rjod pa'i cho 'phrul ni brnyes/ rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul ni brnyes/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul ni brnyes so// bzhed na stong gsum
71b4(dkon brtsegs): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig can gyi khams grong khyer dang bcas pa/ zong rdal dang bcas pa/ sa dang bcas pa/ 'gro ba dang bcas pa/ ri rab dang bcas pa/ rgya mtsho'i mthas gtugs pa lnga'i
71b5(dkon brtsegs): gnas dang bcas pa/ khor yug dang 'obs su bcas pa// rtswa dang / shing dang / rir bcas pa 'di nam mkha' la bskal pa'am// bskal pa bas lhag par skra'i rtse me'i cha shas kyis 'dzin par mdzad
71b6(dkon brtsegs): yang de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po na sgyu ma mkhan bzang po zhes bya ba bstan bcos la shin tu mkhas pa/ gsang sngagal shin tu mkhas pa/ bzo dang rig pa
71b7(dkon brtsegs): la 'byams pa/ las kyi mtha' byas zin pa// rab tu byed pa byas pa/ sgra grags pa/ yul ma ka d+ha na sgyu ma mkhan nam sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma ji snyed pa de dag gi mchog tu gag pa/
72a1(dkon brtsegs): phul du grags pa zhig gnas te/ des yul mug d+ha ril gyi skye bo'i tshogs thams cad 'dun par byas/ rmongs par byas/ mgo 'khor bar byas nas/ kaya mtshan gyi chos la
72a2(dkon brtsegs): bkod de/ bden pa mthong ba rnams dang / dad pa dang / chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams ni me togs so// des sgyu mas rmongs par byed pa'i
72a3(dkon brtsegs): rig pa'i stobs bskyed pas rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa'ang lhag par rnyed do// sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos bcom ldan 'das kyi grags pa dang / snyan pa dang
72a4(dkon brtsegs): tshigs su bcad pa lhag par mngon par 'phags te/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/
72a5(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de ni thams cad mkhyen pa/ thams cad gzigs pa ste/
72a6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad ni mkhyen/ thams cad ni gzigs/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ni ldan/ de bzhin gshegs pa'o mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang ni ldan pa so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang ni ldan
72a7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brkyang dang ni ldan/ byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po dang ni ldan sangs rgyas kyi spyan nyams pa mi mnga' ba dang ni ldan/ spyan lnga dang ni ldan pa cho 'phrul
72b1(dkon brtsegs): yang brnyes te/ kun rjod pa'i tshe 'bral ni brnyes rjes su brtan pa'i cho 'phrul ni brnyes/ rdzu 'phrul kyi cho 'phrul ni brnyes so// shed na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyilams thong ce
72b2(dkon brtsegs): dang bcas pa/ grong rdal dang bcas pa sa dang bcas pa/ 'gro ba dang bcas pa ri rab dang bcas pa rgya mtsho'i mthas gtugs pa lnga'i gnas dang bcas pa/ khor yug dang 'obs
72b3(dkon brtsegs): su bcas pa D+ha dang / shing dang / rir bcas pa 'di nam mkha' la bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa bas lhag par skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas tsam la 'dzin par mdzad do zhes thos so// thos nas
72b4(dkon brtsegs): kyang de 'di snyam du sems te/ yul ma ga d+ha ril gyi skye bo thams cad bdag gis 'dun par byas/ rmongs par byas// mgo 'khor bar byas nas/ ya mtshan gyi chos la bkod de/ bram ze dang /
72b5(dkon brtsegs): khyim bdag chen po gang dag yin pa de dag kyang bdag gi ming gis rab tu mgu bar gyur na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de gcig pu da dung ma bsams
72b6(dkon brtsegs): rmongs par ma byasamago 'khor bar ma byas kyis/ ma la bdag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ga la ba der 'gro bar bya'o// song nas kyang bkram par byas te/
72b7(dkon brtsegs): gal te rmongs pa 'am/ mgo 'khor bar byas nus pa lta na/ de lta na yul ma ga d+ha thams cad bdag la gcig tu 'dul/ bdag gi rnyed pa dang bkur sti'ang ches stobs dang ldan par 'gyur ro snyam mo//
73a1(dkon brtsegs): de nas yang sgyu ma mkhan bzang po sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas bskul ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi mthus rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas byung ste/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i rog lab dang / bcom ldan
73a2(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa la ba der song ngo // song nas kyang sku ma mkhan bzang pos de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma bye ba phrag 'bum pas lhag pa'i 'od zer 'bar ba/ zhal zla ba bye ba phrag 'bum pas lhag par dri ma med pa
73a3(dkon brtsegs): sku shing n+ya gro d+ha'i rgyal po ltar chu zheng gab pa/ mdzod spu nor bu dri ma med pa'i 'od dag pa ltar gsal ba spyan pad+ma dang ut+pa la sngon po kha bye ba lta bu'i bkrag yod pa/ spyi gtsug tshangs pas kyang ba ltar
73a4(dkon brtsegs): mi mthong ba/ 'khor gyi nang na gsung dbyangs yan lag drug cu dang ldan pas chos ston pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang de'i sku de lta bu mthong gsung gi 'phrin las de lta bu thos nas sem dang bar
73a5(dkon brtsegs): gyur cing de 'di snyam du sems te/ ma la bdag gis 'di ci thams cad mkhyen la/ thams cad gzigs pa dang ldan pa zhig yin nam su 'on te ma yin pagam par byasagor ma chag snyam mo// de nas
73a6(dkon brtsegs): yang sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bgam pa'i bsams pas sang gi gdugs tshed la spyan 'dren to zhes gsol to// 'di snyam du'ang sems te/
73a7(dkon brtsegs): ci 'dis bdag gi sems shes sam/ 'on te mi shes shig gu gal te shes na ni der 'ong bar mi 'gyur ro// ji ste mi shes na ni des na 'ong bar 'gyur ro snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis smra/
73b1(dkon brtsegs): ma mkhan bzang po gdul ba'i dbang du'ang mdzad/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i skye bo phal po che gdul ba'i dbang du'ang mdzad nas/ mkhyen bzhin du zlum mkhan bzang po la dge slong gi dge 'dun
73b2(dkon brtsegs): dang bcas te/ cang mi gsung bas gnang bar mdzad do// de nas yang sgyu ma mkhan bzang po 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di dag rnam par mtho 'tsham pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa la/ 'dir khas len pa dang sbyar na 'di
73b3(dkon brtsegs): ni thams cad mkhyen pa'ang ma yin lag thams cad gzigs pa dang ldan pa'ang ma yin no snyam nas/ de nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang po/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan
73b4(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyi thad nas song ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos ni sgyu ma'i za ma tog gis dge
73b5(dkon brtsegs): slong gi dge 'dun 'di la mtho 'tsham par 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu khyod snying las chung bar gyis shig dang / ngas yun ring po nas spyad pa bsgrubs pas
73b6(dkon brtsegs): na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'dir dus mkhyen pa yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis kyang mtho 'tsham par mi nus so// mo'u 'gal gyi bu gzhan yang 'dod
73b7(dkon brtsegs): chags ni mtho 'tsham par byed pa yin zhe sdang ni mtho 'tsham par byed pa yin/ gti mug ni mtho 'tsham par byed pa yin na/ de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la bag la nyal ba dang bcas te zang bral
74a1(dkon brtsegs): yongs su gyur/ bzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i chos can yin te/ des na de bzhin gshegs pa la lnga dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis kyang mtho 'tsham par mi nus so//
74a2(dkon brtsegs): mo'u 'gal gyi bu gzhan yang sgyu ma mkhan bzang po'i sgyu ma ni phyogs gcig pa yin pas/ sgyu ma yang dag pa ma yin gyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgyu ma ni yang dag pa yin te/ des na chos thams cad sgyum
74a3(dkon brtsegs): lta bur mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mo'u 'gal gyi bu sems can gyi khams su gdags par 'dogs pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad 'di lta ste/ sgyu ma mkhan bzang po'i sgyu ma 'di lta bu dang
74a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan par gyur kyang / de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgyu ma la brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro/ stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro/ bye ba 'bum gyi char yang / grangs su'ang / char yang /
74a5(dkon brtsegs): bgrang bar yang / dper yang nye bar ma 'gro'o// mo ru 'gal gyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par
74a6(dkon brtsegs): kun tu skyon nus sam/ gsol pa/ ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni bzhed na 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed brgyan cing de thams
74a7(dkon brtsegs): cad kyang skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas tsam la kun tu ston par mdzad kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgyu ma ril gyis bstan par ni mi 'gyur ro// mo'u 'gal gyi bu phyogs bcu na rlung gi dkyil 'khor gang dag
74b1(dkon brtsegs): yod pa 'di lta ste/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor rnam par 'thor byed ces bya ba dang / rlung gi dkyil 'khor yongs su gcod byed ces bya ba gang dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dra
74b2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su gcod par byed cing / yongs su bcad nas kyang 'jig par byed pa dang / rlung gi dkyil 'khor kun tu 'thor byed dang / rnam par 'thor byed ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi bar na nu ba gang dag yin pa dang /
74b3(dkon brtsegs): rlung gi dkyil 'khor kun nas yongs su 'jog pa zhes bya ba srid pa'i rtse mo na rgyu ba gang dag yin pa dang / rlung gi dkyil 'khor rnam par 'jig pa zhes bya ba ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyang rnam par 'jig par byed na/
74b4(dkon brtsegs): ri phal ba lta smos kyang ci dgos pa gang dag yin pa dang / rlung gi dkyil 'khor 'bar byed ces bya ba sreg pa'i bskal pa'i tshe ldang zhing gang gis na me lce de dag tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar 'phen par byed pa dang /
74b5(dkon brtsegs): rlung gi dkyil 'khor rnam par sgrub byed ces bya ba gang gis sreg pa'i bskal pa'i me de zhi bar byed pa dang / rlung gi dkyil 'khor rab tu tshim byed ces bya ba gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
74b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di sprin gyi dra ba gcig gis kun tu khebs par byed pa dang / rlung gi dkyil 'khor chus 'debs zhes bya ba gang gis na/ sreg pa'i bskal pa'i tshe char 'bebs par byed pa dang rlung gi dkyil
74b7(dkon brtsegs): 'khor lhag par skems shes bya ba gang gis na chus 'jig pa de lhag par skems par byed pa yod do// mo'u 'gal gyi bu ngas rlung gi dkyil 'khor las brtsams te/ bskal pa 'am
75a1(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa las lhag par chos bstan kyang de bzhin gshegs pas rlung gi dkyil 'khor las brtsams te chos bstan pa las mtha' thug pa med do// mo'u 'gal gyi bu 'di ji snyam du sem/
75a2(dkon brtsegs): sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos rlung gi dkyil 'khor de dag gi nang du 'dug par nus sam/ gsol pa ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu nga ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor de
75a3(dkon brtsegs): ngag thams cad kyi nang du spyod la ma bzhis gnas par byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa ni bzhed na rlung gi dkyil 'khor thams cad yungs 'bru gcig gi nang du 'jog par mdzad 'jug par mdzad la/
75a4(dkon brtsegs): yungs 'bru de'ang rnam par 'jig par mi 'gyur zhing / yungs 'bru de'i nang du rlung gi dkyil 'khor de dag thams cad kyi bya ba thams cad kyang nye bar ston par mdzad la rlung de dag phan tshun thug par
75a5(dkon brtsegs): yang mi 'gyur/ ltung bar yang mi 'gyur ro// mo'u 'gal gyi bu nga ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid de lta bu dang / de ma yin pa gzhan yang tshad med pa dang ldan no// de nas tshe dang ldan pa
75a6(dkon brtsegs): mo'u 'gal gyi bu cheni po dang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngo mtshar du gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ ngag mthun par tshig tu smras pa bcom ldan
75a7(dkon brtsegs): 'das bdag cag gis rnyed pa legs pa rnyed de ston pa 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba 'di ltar dbang che bar grags pa 'di ltar mthu che ba ni bdag cag gis legs par rnyed legs so//
75b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul 'di thos nas mos par bgyid cing / mos par bgyis nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed par bgyid
75b2(dkon brtsegs): bde dag kyang rnyeng pa legs par rnyed pa lags so// de nas sgyum mkhan bzang po rgyal pol bab kyi grong khyer chen po ga la ba der song ste/ de nyid kyi nub mo rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po mis
75b3(dkon brtsegs): gang ba'i phyogs gang na grong khyer thams cad kyi bcog dgu dang mi mthun pa thams cad 'bab pa dang 'byung ba'i sa phyogs der 'khor gyi khyams chen po da gyi lnga ldi dang / gdugs dang / rgyal
75b4(dkon brtsegs): mtshan dang ba dan bsgreng bas brgyan pa/ gzhi lag mthil ltar mnyam pa me tog bkram pa/ spos bzang po mchog gis bdugs pa/ steng du bla re bres pa zhig mngon par sprul to//
75b5(dkon brtsegs): 'khor gyi khyams de'i nang du'ang rin po che'i shing ljon pa me tog dang 'bras bur bcas pa brgya stong mngon par sprul to// rin po che'i shing ljon pa thams cad kyi drung du 'di seng ge'i khri ras bcos
75b6(dkon brtsegs): bu du mas g.yogs pa/ rin po che'i ba dan thams cad kyis brgyan pa mngon par sprul to// seng ge'i khri'i g.yas g.yon du rang rin po che'i shing ljon pa me tog dang 'bras bur bcas pa
75b7(dkon brtsegs): bzhi bzhi mngon par sprul to// bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su longs spyad par bya ba'i zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa'ang mngon par sprul to// rim gro byed pa gos
76a1(dkon brtsegs): dkar po bgos pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa lnga brgya'ang mngon par sprul to// sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos bkod pa de lta bu sprul ma thag tu/ de nas de'i mod
76a2(dkon brtsegs): la rgyal po chen po bzhi lus chen por sprul nas/ sgyu ma mkhan bzang po'i 'khor gyi khyams kyi bkod pa ga la ba der song nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so// bzang po khyod
76a3(dkon brtsegs): kyis de bzhin gshegs pa sang gdugs tshod la spyan drangs pa dang / khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pas yong su longs spyad par bya ba'i 'khor gyi khyams kyi bkod pa 'di lta bu 'di mngon par sprul pa ni rnyed pa
76a4(dkon brtsegs): legs par rnyed do// bzang po gzhan yang kho bo cag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las bya ba la/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yongs su longs spyad pa dang / khyod la btang ba'i phyir 'khor gyi
76a5(dkon brtsegs): khyams kyi bkod pa 'di lta bu gnyis pa cung zhig ston par byed na kho bo cag la gnang bar gyis shig/ de nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang po shin tu ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ rgyal po chen po bzhi la
76a6(dkon brtsegs): gnang ba dang / de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das kyis yongs su longs spyad par bya ba'i 'khor gyi khyams de lta bu zhig mngon par sprul to// de nas yang lnga rnams
76a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi dbang po brgya byin lha'i bu sum khri dang lhan cig bzang po'i 'khor gyi byams kyi bkod pa ga la ba der song nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so// bzang po khyod kyis
76b1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa sang gdugs tshod la spyan drangs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su longs spyad par bya ba'i 'khor gyi khyams kyi bkod pa 'di lta bu 'di mngon par sprul pa ni rnyed pa legs
76b2(dkon brtsegs): par rnyed do// bzang po kho bo cag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las bya zhing / bcom ldan 'das kyis yongs su longs spyad pa dang / khyod la btang ba'i phyir 'khor gyi khyams
76b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi bkod pa 'di lta bu gnyis pa cung zhig ston par byed na/ kho bo cag la gnang bar gyis shig/ de nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang po shin tu ngo mtshar du gyur nas ka lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la gnang
76b4(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yongs su longs spyad par bya ba sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi khang bzangs rnam par rgyal byed dang / yod 'dus
76b5(dkon brtsegs): brtol bas ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i 'khor gyi khyams gcig mngon par sprul te/ 'khor gyi khyams des sgyu ma mkhan bzang po'i bkod pa dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi'i bkod pa'ang mog mog por byas par gyur
76b6(dkon brtsegs): to/ de nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang po 'di snyam du sems te/ lha'i bu 'di lta bu 'di dag kyang bcom ldan 'das la rim gro bya ba dang / mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir mngon par brtson te lpags pa dang sbyar na/
76b7(dkon brtsegs): sems can 'di ni tha mal pa ma yin pas bdag gis sem can mchog de lta bu la mtho ba tsams par gyur na mi rung gis bya ba 'di lta bu 'a'adi dag dor gor ma chag snyam mo//
77a1(dkon brtsegs): de nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang po sprul pa'i bya ba de dag 'dor bar byed/ de dag med par byed do// gsang sngags dang rig sngags kyi stobs bskyed pa thams cad kyis med par byed cing mi
77a2(dkon brtsegs): snang bar bya bar brgal kyang zhal zas dang / rim gro pa dang / 'khor gyi byams kyi bkod pa dang / seng ge'i khri'ang de kho na bzhin du snang ste/ gsang sngags dang rig sngags kyi stobs bskyed pa thams
77a3(dkon brtsegs): cad kyis med par bya ma nus pa dang / de shin tu ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag sngon chad ni 'dod ni sgyu ma ston par yang byed/ 'dod na sgyu ma med par yang byed na//
77a4(dkon brtsegs): da ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ched du gnas kyi bkod pa byas pa med par byed ma nus so snyam mo// / de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis sgyu ma mkhan bzang po'i sem kyi rnam
77a5(dkon brtsegs): par rtog pa sems kyis yongs su shes nas/ sgyu ma mkhan bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so// bzang po ji ltar khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyir gnas kyi bkod pa byas pa 'di med
77a6(dkon brtsegs): par bya ma nus pa de bzhin du/ bzang po gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa la sems bskyed pa 'ga' tsam thob pa de dag gi sems bskyed pa de'ang med par mi 'gyur te/ de dag gi de ni yongs su mya ngan las
77a7(dkon brtsegs): radas pa'i bar gyi rgyur 'gyur ro// de nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang po dga' mgu yi rangs te rab tu dba' zhing yid bde bar gyur nas/ de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das pa dang bcom ldan
77b1(dkon brtsegs): 'das la bdubs tshed la bab bskul bar byed de/ bcom ldan 'das gdugs tshed lags pa'i dus dang tsheng la bab na/ da gdugs tshed la bab par dgongs su gsol zhes gsol to// de nas
77b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das snga dro'i dus kyi tshe/ sham thams mnabs chos gos gsol/ lhung bzed thogs te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor cing / dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi dang la gshegs te rgyal
77b3(dkon brtsegs): po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por gshegs nas/ sgyu ma mkhan bzang po'i 'khor gyi khyams ga la ba der gshegs te/ gang gi na sgyu ma mkhan bzang po'ang de bzhin gshegs pa ni bdag gis sprul pa'i bkod pa na
77b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhugs so snyam du shes/ rgyal po chen po bzhi'ang de bzhin gshegs pa ni bdag cag gis sprul pa'i bkod pa na bzhugs so snyam du shes/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni bdag gis sprus
77b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bkod pa na bzhugs so snyam du shes par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par mdzad do// rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po de na gzhan mu stegs can dang / spyod pa pa dang /
77b6(dkon brtsegs): kun tu r+b+ba dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag gang dag gis thos pa de dag ni ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ 'khor gyi khyams der song ste/ de ring dge sbyong go'u ta ma la mtho 'tsham pa blta bar bya'o snyam mo// rgyal po'i khab kyi
77b7(dkon brtsegs): grong khyer chen po de na dad pa'i dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma gang dag 'khod pa de dag ni 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor der dong nas// de ring de bzhin gshegs pa la bsam pa'ang mnyan
78a1(dkon brtsegs): par bya/ cho 'phrul chen po'ang blta bar bya'o snyam mo// de nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / khengs pa nges par bcom nas
78a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rnam par mtho ba tsam pa'i bsam pa chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa
78a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dir gshegs su gsol ba gang lags pa'i nongs pa 'chags so// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang zhal zas sprul pa dang / rim gro bgyid pa sprul pa dang / seng ge'i khri sprul pa dang / 'khor gyi khyams
78a4(dkon brtsegs): sprul pa de la bdag 'di snyam du sems can mchog de lta bu de la bslus par gyur na mi rung gis/ bya ba 'di ma mchis par bgyi snyam ste shin tu spangs kyang ma mchis par ma btub// sang sngags dang
78a5(dkon brtsegs): rig sngags kyi stobs bskyed pa thams cad kyis kyang ma mchis par bgyi rngo ma thog nas/ zhal zas dang rim gro bgyid pa dang / seng ge'i khri dang / 'khor gyi khyams kyi bkod pa'ang de kho na bzhin du gda'a'o//
78a6(dkon brtsegs): de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ sgyu ma mkhan bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bzang po sems can thams cad kyi nye bar spyad pa dang / yongs su sbyang ba'ang
78a7(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ las kyi sgyu mas sprul pa yin no// bzang po dge slong gi dge 'dun 'di 'ang 'di ste/ chos kyi sgyu mas sprul pa yin te/ bzang po nga'ang 'di lta ste/ ye shes kyi sgyu bas sprul pa yin no//
78b1(dkon brtsegs): bzang po stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten khams 'di'ang 'di lta ste/ sna tshogs mngon par 'grub par byed pa'i sgyu mas sprul pa yin no// bzang po chos thams cad kyang 'di lta ste/ rkyen tshogs
78b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sgyu mas sprul pa yin no// bzang po 'on kyang de'i dus la bab par shes na/ ji ltar sprul pa'i bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / myang ba dang / bldag pa dag khyod kyis phul cig/ de nas sgyu ma mkhan
78b3(dkon brtsegs): bzang pos sprul pa'i rim gro pa de dag dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dag dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'khor dang bcas pa dang / lhan cig sprul pa'i bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / myang ba dang / bldag pa de/
78b4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun yang dag par tshim par byed do// de nas de'i tsheg na brtan 'od srungs chen pos tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so// sbyin pa 'dzin ci
78b5(dkon brtsegs): zhig 'dra// len par byed pa ci 'dra bar// de 'dra'i chos nyid thob 'gyur bar// yon ni rnam par spyong gyur cig/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos smras pa/ gdan ni ji ltar bshams pa dang // de la gang dag
78b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhugs pa rnams// mi mnyam ma mchis mtshungs pa ste// mchod sbyin dge ba bla na med// shA ri'i bus smras pa// rim gro byed pa'i sems gang dang // len par byed pa'i sems gang dang /
78b7(dkon brtsegs): sbyin par byed pa ji lta bar// yon ni myur du sbyong bar shog/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ gtong med sbyin pa 'di btang ba// len pa med pa rnams kyis blangs// gang dag 'dir ni gshegs pa rnams/
79a1(dkon brtsegs): de dag yon sbyong byed pa yin// kun dga' bos smras pa// 'di ni nam mkha'i sbyin pa ste// bsam gyis mi khyab rnams kyis spyad// gang dag sems lus grol bde//
79a2(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten na ni yon sbyong ma cho ga byang chub sems dpa' 'od tog gis smras pa/ ji lta bur na sgyu ma'i mkhan// bzang pos bkod pa sprul byas pa// dngos kun de dang 'dra ba ste// byis pas de ni
79a3(dkon brtsegs): mi rtogs so// byang chub sems dpa' 'od bkod pas smras pa// ji ltar gdan dang ljon shing dag/ du ma mngon par sprul byas pa// yid kyi sgyu ma lta bur stong // 'di la khyad par 'ga' yang med//
79a4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' seng ges smras pa seng ge'i smra ni ma thos na// wa ni nags tshal nang na sgrogs// de yis seng ge'i sgra thos nas// phyogs bcu dag tu 'bros par 'gyur// de bzhin /
79a5(dkon brtsegs): mkhan bzang pa yang // de bzhin gshegs pa ma mthong na// mu stegs nang du rgyal ba bas/ bdag nyid mchog ces sgrog par byed// bzang po de bzhin gshegs pa yi// sgyu mas sgyu ma rtogs
79a6(dkon brtsegs): byed pa// tshad mar gyur pa gsung na ni// de la bdud kyis gting mi dpogs// byang chub sems dpa'a'i seng ge'i blo gros kyis smras pa// zhal zas 'di ni sprul pa ste// bsnyen bkuni byeng ba 'ang /
79a7(dkon brtsegs): sprul pa yin// spyong bar byed pa'ang sprul pa ste// sbyin pa dge ba bla na meng // byang chub sems dpa' byams pas smras pa// me ni mar dang til mar gyis// byi phyir zhing ni rab tu mched// de bzhin
79b1(dkon brtsegs): babang po'i sbrum yis// sangs rgyas sbru ma nges par brtan// 'jam pal gson nur gyur pas smras pa// ji ltar 'din sngon gnas pa// thams cad byed pa med pa ltar// de bzhin chos rnams thams cad ni//
79b2(dkon brtsegs): sngon gyi mtha' nas rtag tu mnyam/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sgyu ma mthun bzang po shin tu gdul ba'i dbang du mdzad nas/ khyim bdag gcig sprul te 'khor gyi khyams de'i nang du
79b3(dkon brtsegs): zhugs nas/ sgyu ma mkhan bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so// bzang po ci byed/ smras pa/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma 'di gdugs tshod gsol bar byed do// des smras pa/ bzang po zong de skad ma zer/
79b4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa de ni dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i khab na gdugs chod gsol zhing bzhugs so// sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos kyang / sangs rgyas kyi mthus de bzhin
79b5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i khab na gdugs tshod gsol bar mthong ngo // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag gnyis pa zhig mngon par sprul na
79b6(dkon brtsegs): de nang du zhugs te/ sgyu ma mkhan bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so// bzang po ci byed/ smras pa/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma 'di gdugs tshe de gsol bar byed do// des smras pa/ zod de skad mi ze/
79b7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa de ni dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu kun tu rgyu'i srang na bsod snyoms kyi phyir rgyu zhing bzhugs so// sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos kyang / sangs rgyas kyi mthus de bzhin gshegs
80a1(dkon brtsegs): pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu kun tu rgyu'i srang na bsod snyoms kyi phyir rgyu ba mthong ngo // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag gzhan zhig sprul
80a2(dkon brtsegs): de nang du zhugs nas/ sgyu ma mkhan bzang po la 'dri skad ces smras so// bzang po ci byed/ smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'dir gdugs tshod gsol bar byed do// des smras pa/ bzang po thong
80a3(dkon brtsegs): skad ma zer/ de bzhin gshegs pa de ni 'tsho byed kyi skyed mos tshal na 'khor bzhi la chos skyon cing bzhugs so// sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos kyang / sangs rgyas kyi mthus de bzhin gshegs pa
80a4(dkon brtsegs): 'tshe byed kyi skyed mos tshal na 'khor bzhi la chos ston par mthong ngo // de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin sgyu ma mkhan bzang po ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ sgyu ma mkhan
80a5(dkon brtsegs): bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so// bzang po ci byed/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma 'di gdugs tshed gsol bar byed do// des smras pa/ bzang po thong de skad ma zer/ de bzhin gshegs pa de ni sum cu rtsa
80a6(dkon brtsegs): gsum pa'i gnas na shing yongs 'du'i drung na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams la chos ston cing bzhugs so// bzang pos kyang de bzhin gshegs pa sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i gnas na shing yongs 'du'i drung na
80a7(dkon brtsegs): chos ston par mthong ngo // de nas yang sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos shing ljon pa sprul pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyi lo ma thams cad dang / me tog thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
80b1(dkon brtsegs): mtshan gyis brgyan pa/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor ba mthong ngo // sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos seng ge'i khri sprul pa gang dag yin pa dang / rgyal po chen po bzhis seng ge'i khri sprul pa gang dag yin pa de
80b2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la'ang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mtshan gyis brgyan pa/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor ba mthong ngo // rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen pon cig pa 'am/ khyim mam// khang
80b3(dkon brtsegs): bzangs mam/ srang ngam/ lam po che ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mtshan gyis brgyan pa mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
80b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas de dag thams cad kyi spyan snga na'ang/ sgyu ma mkhan bzang po bdag nyid phyag 'tshal nas nyes pa 'chags par mthong zhing // de na sgyu ma mkhan bzang po'i mig lam na gang cung zad ci snang ba thams cad de
80b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa ma gtogs pa gzhan cung zad kyang ma mthong nas/ de tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde bar gyur to// de dga' ba dang yid bde ba de nyid kyis dad pa rjes
80b6(dkon brtsegs): su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo// de ting nge 'dzin de las langs ma thag tu thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to// bad
80b7(dkon brtsegs): nabargya phrag stong las lhag gyur cing // dper na gang+gA'i klung gi bye snyed kyi// sangs rgyas ma 'o sprul par mdzad pa yi// de bzhin gshegs kyi rdzu 'phrul de la mos// bdag gis sngon bslabs sgyu ma'i sa ma
81a1(dkon brtsegs): lags// 'dzam bu'i gling na bdag 'dra med snyam na// de ring rgyal ba'i rdzu 'phrul 'di mthong na// 'di yi grangs dang char yang ma spyod do// bdag gi sha li mig gis gang mthong ba/
81a2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad rgyal ba'i mtshan gyis brgyan pa'i sku// chos kyi rgyal po la ni 'di dag zhus// rgyal ba yang dag gang lags bka' stsol cig/ gang zhig mchod na legs par mchod pa lags// gang la
81a3(dkon brtsegs): 'bras bu chen por 'gyur ba lags// gang gi byang chub mthun par gzung ba 'di// kun tu spyan gyis bdag la bka' stsol cig/ de ring 'jig rten mgon la bgam bgyis pa'i// nongs pa gang
81a4(dkon brtsegs): lags deng 'dir kun tu 'chags// gang dag sems can mchog la gus mi gnas// sems can de dag rgyal ba'i bde las nyams// bdag la lha dang brgya byin tshangs pa dang // 'khor 'dus gyur pa 'di
81a5(dkon brtsegs): ngag kun gson cig/ sems can thams cad rab tu dgrol slad du/ byang chub sems ni bdag gis bskyed par bgyi// bdag gis sems can thams cad mgron du gnyer// bdud rtsi bde bas yang dag
81a6(dkon brtsegs): tshim par bgyi// gnyid kyis rab log sems can shes par bgyi// mthu dang sgrub pas rnam par sang par gyi// rnam par 'phrul pa 'di 'ang mthong kur cing // bde bar gshegs bka'
81a7(dkon brtsegs): yid 'ong ye shes dang // chags pa med pa'i spyod mchog thos nas ni// su zhig dag pa'i rgyu sems skyed mi bgyid// byang chub sems mkhas ji ltar spyod pa yi// byang chub lam ni bdag la bshad du so/
81b1(dkon brtsegs): gang la nyan thos rnams kyis mi dpogs pa'i// de dag rnams kyi spyod pa ji lta bu// cho ga spyod pa'i yon tan ji lta bu// mnyan par 'dod la gus pa ji lta bu// nges pa rnams kyi spyod lam ci 'dra ba// bdag la the/
81b2(dkon brtsegs): tsam ma mchis de bzhin gsungs// ji ltar thos pa tshol la goms pa lags// thos pa snying por bgyid pa'i dang pogang // gzhan la gsal bar ston pa ji lta bu// srog chags thams cad ji ltar chos
81b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang // ji ltar 'di dag shes kyi khe mi tshol// zang zing med pa'i sems la ji ltar gnas// byas pa shes shing rab tu phan 'dogs dang // sems can mi byed gnas par ji ltar 'gyur//
81b4(dkon brtsegs): grogs po gang dag bsten bgyi ji lta bu// sdig pa'i grogs rnams ji ltar rnam par spong // ji ltar sangs rgyas rnams dang phrad par 'gyur// de dag mthong nas ji ltar mchod par bgyi// ji ltar
81b5(dkon brtsegs): bslab pa dag la gus pa lags// de yi bslab pa bca' ba gang zhig lags// tshul khrims ji ltar rnam par dag par 'gyur// ting 'dzin rnam par dag pa ji ltar 'thob// ji ltar tshul bzhin
81b6(dkon brtsegs): rab tu sbyor ba lags// tshul bzhin ma lags ji ltar spong ba lags// ji ltar shin tu nges par bsams yid dang // nyon mongs bdud kyi 'ching bas mi thub lags// ji ltar dang ldan ri//
81b7(dkon brtsegs): sems bgyid cing // sems kyis sems can rnams ni mi gtong lags// ji ltar sems can yongs su smin bgyid cing // nor mchog 'dzin pa med la dpa' ba lags// ji ltar sems can spyod//
82a1(dkon brtsegs): la 'jug pa dang // thabs dang byams pa snying rjes gnas pa lags// mngon par shes pa ji ltar yongs rdzogs 'gyur// dran dang blo gros gang gis rnam dag cing /
82a2(dkon brtsegs): so so yang dag rig gzungs bzod par 'gyur// smon lam rnam dag spyod lam mi ldog cing // zab mo shes ldan don dam mkhas pa lags// smon lam thams cad ji ltar 'grub par 'gyur// ji ltar
82a3(dkon brtsegs): de dag pha rol phyin 'phags shing // de bzhini byang chub rjes su mthun par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa kun shes shing // byang chub phyir ni spyod pa mi ldog pa// kun mkhyen legs par don
82a4(dkon brtsegs): bsams shes rab mtshe// ye shes 'byung gnas 'di ni bdag la gsungs// bcom ldan phan yon bdag la bstan du gsol// bdag gis nan tan snying por bgyi bar 'tshal/ de nas
82a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis/ sgyu ma mkhan bzang po la slar tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ chos kun sprul par gang gis shes pa de// sangs rgyas bye ba phrag stong sprul par byed// sprul pa de dag zhing rnams
82a6(dkon brtsegs): bye bar 'gro// de dag song nas sems can bye ba 'grel// ji ltar bzang po khyod kyis gzugs med las// sna tshogs mtha' yas gzugs ni ston byed cing // de dag skye ba med cing 'gag med la// 'gro
82a7(dkon brtsegs): med 'od med gnas pa med pa ltar// bzang po skyes bu khyu mchog rgyal ba yis// phung po dge 'dun tshogs bcas sbrul de 'dra// de dang ye shes med par mi 'gyur te// sangs rgyal bsam pa
82b1(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul yin// ji ltar skums rmongs byas skye bo na// sems pa yong min de bzhin ngartul med// 'di 'grub pa med cing rdzas yong min// phyin ci log gi sems kyis mthong ba ltar/
82b2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin sangs rgyas gzugs med kha dog dang // dbyibs min spyod pa ston yang spyod lam med// 'jib tshogs lta bas kun nas bslang ma yin// sangs rgyas sangs rgyas snyam du 'du shes med//
82b3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas gzugs su mi blta mtshan dang ni// na tshod rigs su ma yin spa dang ni// 'chad par 'gyur bar ma yin sems dang ni// rnam shes yid kyis rab tu phye ma yin// chos nyid gang yin
82b4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// dus gsum stong zhing mtshan yang ma skyes pa// rtag tu sgyu ma'i rang bzhin rnam par grol// de la chos su bgrang bar rab tu phye ba med// sangs rgyas 'byung gang chos nyid
82b5(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba med// de la phung po yod min khams mi 'byung // chos de gnas pa mi g.yo rten pa med// de ni mig lnga'i gnas kyang ma yin no// gang zhig bdag gis sangs rgyas blta snyam sems// des
82b6(dkon brtsegs): ni gzhar yang sangs rgyas mthong mi 'gyur// 'dren pa mthong ba med pa mthong ba ste// dper na nam mkha' la ni bya rjes bzhin// bzang po gang khyod cung zad sangs rgyas lta// de kun don gcig yin
82b7(dkon brtsegs): bar shes par gyis// nga dang gzhan gang yin pa de kun mtshungs// bar snang mthong dang 'dra bar mnyam pa yin// de dag cing 'dzin mnyam zhing shes rab mnyam// de dag rnam par grol bar mnyam pa yin/
83a1(dkon brtsegs): nam grol ye shes mthong zhing stobs dang ni// rgyal ba'i yon tan kun gyis mnyam pa yin// de dag stong don go 'bang gnas par mnyam// thams cad chags pa med pa'i chos nyid
83a2(dkon brtsegs): gnas// kun kyang sgyu ma'i rang bzhin rnam par grol// de dag 'byung ba med par 'byung ba yin// bzang po rgyal ba gcig la mchod byed na// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas pa ni mchod 'gyur te// 'di ltar de dgang
83a3(dkon brtsegs): yi chos dbyings dang // tha dad bya ba nam yang yod ma yin// de dag thams cad yon pa zhes sbyong bar mdzad// kun la phul ba'ang 'bras bu che bar 'gyur// de kun chos nyid dag pa mnyam pa brnyes//
83a4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas rnams la tha dad bya ba'ang med// rgyal ba yang dag gang yin pa shed bya yis// rtse gcig sems dang dran pa nyer gzhag cing // chos tshul rtogs la rnam par lta bas de// legs par nges
83a5(dkon brtsegs): bsams sems kyis nga la nyon// bzang po de kun ma skyes yang dag min// phyin ci log gis de kun mthong bar zad// gal te dngos po'i ngo bo yang dag na// dngos po thams cad du ni zad
83a6(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur// de phyir shin tu ma skyes yang dag min// de dag skye meng zad la gnas pa med// des na bltar med ngo bo de dag snang // rnam par bltas na gnas pa yod ma yin// ji ltar bzang
83a7(dkon brtsegs): pos rgyal ba mthong ba dang // ji ltar phyogs su mngon par sprul mthong ba// gang gzhan phung po rgya chen rten stob dang // phung po lnga po'ang de dang 'dra bar ltos// chos rnams thams cad rang bzhin med pa ste/
83b1(dkon brtsegs): sems can dang ni sangs rgyas mtshan nyid med// mtshan nyid med la mtshan du 'dod pa de// sangs rgyas las ni shin tu ring bar 'gyur// chos yod ma yin kun tu rtog pas bskrad/
83b2(dkon brtsegs): dngos po med par yang ni btan nas shes/ 'byed pa med cing byed pa po las 'das// ming du 'dzin pas song par rab tu ston// gang gis chung byed po rkyen mi shes// des ni chags bral bur ba'i chos kyang shes
83b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags bral ba'i chos ni shes gyur na// des ni rnam dag mig gis sangs rgyas mthong // yang de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa dag brjod de bstan pa na/ sgyu ma mkhan bzang po chos la nges par dog pa dang mthun pa'i
83b4(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa chung ngu skyes so// srog chags lnga stong ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems sngon ma bskyed pa skyes so// byang chub sems dpa' nyis brgya ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod
83b5(dkon brtsegs): pa thob par gyur to// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal zas sprul pa de gsol nas/ sgyu ma mkhan bzang po'i yon yongs su sbyang bar bya ba'i phyir/ de'i tshe tshigs su
83b6(dkon brtsegs): bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// gang gis sbyin dang gang la sbyin// sbyin pa ji ltar mi rtog pa/ sbyin pa mnyam pa de nyid ni/ bzang po la ni yongs rdzogs shog/ de nas
83b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'khor gyi khyams 'di rgyan gyis brgyan bzhin du dgung bdun du gnas shing mi gda' bar mi 'gyur
84a1(dkon brtsegs): bar byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor gyi khyams de ji ltar rgyan gyis brgyan bzhin du zhag bdun du gnas shing mi snang bar mi 'gyur
84a2(dkon brtsegs): bar byin gyis brlab pa mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas te/ gdan las bzhengs nas gshegs so// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das nang du yang
84a3(dkon brtsegs): ngag 'jog las bzhengs nas/ chos bstun pa'i phyir bzhugs so// dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za de dag kyang chos mnyan
84a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du dong ngo // de nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang po yang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo
84a5(dkon brtsegs): bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ gus pa dang bcas/ zhe sa dang bcas par thal mo sbyar te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas
84a6(dkon brtsegs): kyang / bcom ldan 'das la sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' lam gang la zhugs na byang chub kyi snying por mchi bar 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems/
84a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams kyi lam pa shang du gsol de skad ces gsol ba dang bcom ldan 'das kyis sgyu ma mkhan bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bzang po de'i phyir
84b1(dkon brtsegs): legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang ngas bshad do// sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes bsol te/ bcom ldan 'das la nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
84b2(dkon brtsegs): kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' lam gang le zhugs na/ byang chub kyi snying por 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam
84b3(dkon brtsegs): yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems mi 'dor ba dang / sems can yongs su mi gtong ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad tshol ba la ngoms mi shes pa nyid dang / dam pa'i chos
84b4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa ste/ bzang po bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' lam gang la zhugs na// byang chub kyi snying por 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam yin no//
84b5(dkon brtsegs): bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sdom pa gsum yongs su dag pa dang / gnas yongs su dag pa dang / shes pa yongs su dag pa dang / skye ba
84b6(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pa ste/ bzhi pa de dag yin no// bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni gang la nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gting mi dpogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ bsam gtan
