84b7(dkon brtsegs): zlog pa dang / sems kyis rnam par 'byed pa dang / sems can rnams la snying rje che ba dang / spobs pa dang skad sna tshogs pa nyid de/ bzhi po de dag yin no// bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'phags
85a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i spyod pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ dgon pa na gnas pa dang / 'du 'dzil mi dga' ba dang / de na gnas nas sems can rnams la byams pa dang / 'du byed rnams gang nas kyang mi
85a2(dkon brtsegs): 'od gang du'ang mi 'gro bar shes pa ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no// bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na sri zhu che zhing gus pa la gnas pa zhes brjod par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub sems
85a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' lus dang srog la mi lta ba dang / sems rtag tu dga' ba dang / nga rgyal dang dregs pa spong ba dang // ji skad smra ba de bzhin du sgrub pa ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no// bzang po byang chub sems dpa'
85a4(dkon brtsegs): chos bzhi dang ldan na spyod lam phun sum tshogs pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ dus shes pa dang / tshed shes pa dang / rab tu dben pa dang / yang dag pa nyid de/ bzhi po de dag yin no// bzang po byang chub
85a5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na the tsom med pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'gyod pa kun nas ldang ba rnam par gnon pa dang / mkhas pa dang shes rab chen po la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / thos pa'i don
85a6(dkon brtsegs): sems pa dang / gzhan gyi nyes pa mi gleng zhing / gleng ba gang yin pa'ang byams pas gleng gi/ skyon gtsor byed pas ma yin pa ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no// bzang po byang chub sems dpa' phan yon bzhi po 'di dag mthog
85a7(dkon brtsegs): thos pa tshol bar byed de/ bzhi ga pa zhen// bdag dang gzhan gyi shes rab skyong ba dang / phyogs bzhi nas lpags pa rnams kyi the tsom gcod pa dang / dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi bsngag pazang mi she ba ste/
85b1(dkon brtsegs): bzhi po de dag yin no// bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mang du thos pa'i snying po yin no// bzhi gang zhe na/ thos nas chos bye brag tu shes pa 'di ni 'di'i snying po yin
85b2(dkon brtsegs): no/ thos nas bya ba ma yin pa mi byed pa 'di ni 'di'i snying po yin no// thos nas gzhan la ston par byed pa 'di ni 'di'i snying po yin no// thos nas don de nyid rnam par grol ba 'di lta ste
85b3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub la gtod par byed pa 'di ni 'di'i snying po yin te/ bzhi po de dag yin no// bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' chos ston par byed
85b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phan yon yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ las byas nas zas la yongs su spyod pa dang / chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / nad gsos dang / sman zong rnams rnyed
85b5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / gzhan gyi phyogs mthu chung bar byed pa dang / chos 'dod pa'i lnga rnams phyi bzhin 'brang zhing / de dag gis bsrungs pas bdud kyis glags mi rnyed pa ste/ bzang po bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems
85b6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chos ston par byed pa'i phan yon no// byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na gzhan dag la chos ston par byed cing / 'di'i tshig gi lam gzung bar 'os par yang 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na
85b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa chung ba dang / cho ga shes pa dang / ngang tshul can bzang zhing mnyen pa dang / bdag nyid kyi chos sgrub pa ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no// bzang po byang chub sems dpa'i chos bzhi dang ldan na
86a1(dkon brtsegs): shes kyi me las 'byol zhing zang zing med par chos ston pa'ang yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'khor ba la 'jigs pa skyed pa dang / 'jig rten gyi zang zing dang 'du 'dzi don du mi gnyer
86a2(dkon brtsegs): bdang / pha rol rjes su srung ba dang / 'phags pa'i rigs la gnas pa ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no// bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ byas pa gzo ba dang / byas pa tshor ba dang /
86a3(dkon brtsegs): byas pa la lan du phan 'dogs pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ gzhan byang chub yang dag par len du 'jug pa dang / las byas pa chud mi gzon pa dang / bdag nyid la byams pa ltar gzhan la yang byams pa
86a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / skyes bu dam pa'i rtsa la don du gnyer ba ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no// byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ sems can rnams la mdza' bshes mi byed par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/
86a5(dkon brtsegs): brjod pa'i stobs kyi go bgos pa dang / lan du phan 'dogs par cung zad kyang re ba med pa dang / snying rje chen po mi 'dor ba dang / log par zhugs pa rnams mi spong ba ste/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi por
86a6(dkon brtsegs): ngag dang ldan na/ sems can rnams la mdza' ba shes mi phyed par 'gyur ro// bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpal bsten par bya ba'i grogs po yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyor pa
86a7(dkon brtsegs): phun sum tshogs pa dang bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / spyod pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / gang dag 'di'i byang chuche bar rton par byed pa ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no// bzang po bzhi po 'dings/
86b1(dkon brtsegs): ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mi dge ba'i grogs po yin par rig par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ theg pa dman pa ston pa dang / byang chub kyi sems la 'dun pa rlog par byed pa dang / gang dag bsten na mi dge ba'i/
86b2(dkon brtsegs): chos 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i chos rnams las yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no// bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
86b3(dkon brtsegs): 'das rnams dang phrad par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ dran pa rtse gcig pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bsngags pa yang dang yang du sgrogs pa dang // tshul khrims yongs su
86b4(dkon brtsegs): dag pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pas smon lam 'debs pa ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no// bzang po byang chub sems dpas phan yon bzhi po 'di dag mthong na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa
86b5(dkon brtsegs): bya bar spro bar 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ yon gnas mchog la mchod par 'gyur ba dang / bdag mthong nas sems can gzhan dag kyang de bzhin du mchod pa byed par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa
86b6(dkon brtsegs): legs par mchod na byang chub kyi sems brtan par 'gyur ba dang / skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa mngon sum du mthong na dge ba'i rtsa ba sogs par 'gyur ba ste/ bzang po byang chub sems dpas
86b7(dkon brtsegs): phan yon bzhi po de dag mthong na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bya bar spro bar 'gyur ro// bzang po de bzhin du byang chub sems dpas don gyi dbang bzhi mthong na bslab pa lhur len par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/
87a1(dkon brtsegs): ngan 'gro las yang dag par 'da' ba dang / bde 'gro 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la gus pa dang / smon lam yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no//
87a2(dkon brtsegs): bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub kyi sems mi 'dor ba dang / sems can thams cad la mnyam par sbyor ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su
87a3(dkon brtsegs): tshol ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa mnyam pa la mi skrag pa ste/ bzang po bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa yin no// bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems
87a4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa yongs su dag pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ bya ba ma yin pa mi spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid la mos pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mi spong ba dang / lta ba bag la nyal ba dang /
87a5(dkon brtsegs): bcas pa yang dag par 'joms pa ste/ bzang po bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa yongs su dag pa yin no// bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
87a6(dkon brtsegs): ting nge 'dzin gyi rigs yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du 'dzi med pa dang / rab tu dben pa dang / sems kyi rnyog pa med pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba nye bar rngon pa ste/ bzang po bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sem
87a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rigs yin to// bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul bzhin rab tu sbyor ba yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba skyes na byang chub kyi sems
87b1(dkon brtsegs): mngon du byed pa dang / nang du yang dag 'jog pa la sgrib pa med pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo dag la 'dris par byed pa dang / nyes pa la mi 'jug pa ste/ bzang po bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams
87b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi tshul bzhin rab tu sbyor ba yin no// bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i sems skye ba bzlog par bya ba yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'khor ba'i 'jigs pas
87b3(dkon brtsegs): skrag pa dang / rnal 'byor spyod pa dag la ma mos pa dang / dgongs pa dag la mi dga' ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams mngon par 'du mi byed pa ste/ bzang po bzhi po de dag ni tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i
87b4(dkon brtsegs): sems skye ba brlog par bya ba yin no// bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems kyis nges par bsam pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sems can 'ga'i don gyi phyir yang bskal pa phyi ma'i
87b5(dkon brtsegs): mthar thug par 'khor ba na 'khor bar bya'o snyam pa 'di ni sems kyis nges par bsam pa dang po yin no// bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa rnams kyi shes par bya zhing // de dag ga nyin/
87b6(dkon brtsegs): mongs pa rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes par bya ba'i phyir chos bstan par bya'o snyam pa 'di ni sems kyis nges par bsam pa gnyis pa yin no// bdag gis mi dge
87b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i chos thams cad spangs shing dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan par byas nasabyang chub kyi snying po la 'dug ste/ bdud kyi dpung pham par byas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
88a1(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam pa 'di ni sems kyis nges par bsam pa gsum pa yin no// stong gsum gyi snong chen de'i 'jig rten gyi khams skad cig gcig gis
88a2(dkon brtsegs): bar byas te chos bstan par bya'o snyam pa 'di ni sems kyis nges par bsam pa bzhi pa yin te/ bzang po bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems kyis nges par bsam pa yin no// bzang
88a3(dkon brtsegs): po chos bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdud 'dul ba yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ chos la sgyu ma lta bur so sor rtog pa dang / tshul bzhin du sbyor ba dang / chos thams cad la rnam par/
88a4(dkon brtsegs): mi rtog pa dang / mtshan ma thams cad la mi gnas pa ste/ bzang po chos bzhi po de dag ni bdud 'dul ba yin no// bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi don sems pa yin te/
88a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhi gang zhe na/ gang zag med pa'i phyir chos rnams brten nas skye ba yin gyi/ chos 'ga' yang rgyu med par ni mi skye ba dang / brten nas skyes pa'i chos gang yin pa de ma skyes pa dang / dngos po med pa dang byang
88a6(dkon brtsegs): chub kyi phyir chud mi za ba ste/ bzang po bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi don sems pa yin no// bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sems can rnams mi gtong ba yin te/
88a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhi gang zhe na/ sngon gyi smon lam mi 'dor ba dang / yongs su skyo ba bzod pa dang / lus dang srog la mi lta ba dang // bsdu ba'i dngos pos sdud pa ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no// bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub
88b1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams kyi yongasu smin par byed pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi zang bring sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba dang / yongs su smin pa la chos ston pa yongs su gtong ba dang / dus dus
88b2(dkon brtsegs): su skul bas dran par byed pa yongs su gtong ba dang / bdag nyid kyi bde ba spangs nas/ gzhan gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ston pa dang yongs su smin par byed pa ste/ bzang po bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'
88b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi yongs su smin par byed pa yin no// bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ ma bsdus pa sdud par byed pa la mi 'jigs pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba
88b4(dkon brtsegs): chung ngu la'ang mos pa dang / rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par gzhan gyi don byed par spro ba dang / sbyin pa dang / dul ba dang / nges pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs
88b5(dkon brtsegs): su bcad pa thams cad la don du gnyer ba med pa ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no// bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sems can gyi spyod pa la 'jug pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/
88b6(dkon brtsegs): mngon par shes pa thob pa dang / ye shes thob pa dang / ting nge 'dzin chen por gyur pa tshad med pa la 'jug pa dang / rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid sgom zhing rnam par grol
88b7(dkon brtsegs): ba dang ma 'dres pa ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no// bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ thabs la mkhas pa yin par rig par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sems bskyed pa thams cad la byang
89a1(dkon brtsegs): chub kyi sems sngon du 'gro ste/ tha na nyon mongs pa'i sems la'ang rung na/ dge ba'i sems la lta smos kyang ci dgos pa dang / sems can thams cad chos kyi snod nyid yin
89a2(dkon brtsegs): par lta ba dang / ngo bo nyid med par bong du chud pas chos thams cad log pa nyid du nges pa yin par lta ba dang / rnam par grol bar 'dod pas snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med pa'i 'du shes
89a3(dkon brtsegs): sgom par byed pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ thabs la mkhas pa yin par rig par bya'o// bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byams pa sgom pa yin no// bzhi
89a4(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ bdag gis sems can thams cad bskyab par bya'o snyam du byams pa sgom pa dang / bdag gis sems can thams cad bsgral bar bya'o snyam du byams pa sgom pa dang / bdag gis sems can thams cad bskul bar
89a5(dkon brtsegs): bya'o snyam du byams pa sgom pa dang / bdag gis sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla'o snyam du byams pa sgom pa ste/ bzang po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byams pa sgom pa yin no// bzang po bzhi po ni
89a6(dkon brtsegs): dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying rje yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ ngan song du skyes pa rnams bde 'gro'i lam la dbod pa'i snying rje dang / sdig pa'i las dang ldan pa rnams dge pa'i chos la sbyor ba'i snying rje dang /
89a7(dkon brtsegs): theg pa dman pa la mos pa rnams theg pa chen po yang dag par len du 'jug pa'i snying rje dang / sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla'o snyam pa'i snying rje ni bzhi pa yin te/ bzhi po de dag yin no//
89b1(dkon brtsegs): bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ mngon par shes pa 'thob par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ lus dang sems yang ba dang / sgyu ma'i rang bzhin du rnam par 'byed pa dang / sems
89b2(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad la gus pa dang rim gro'i sems bskyed pa dang / zhi gnas la rtse gcig tu gyur pas rnam par g.yeng ba med pa yin no// bzang po byang chub sems dpa' tshos bzhi dang ldan na/ so so yang
89b3(dkon brtsegs): bar rig pa 'thob par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ don la rton pa yin gyi tshig 'bru la mi rton pa yin/ chos la rton pa yin gyi gang zag la mi rton pa dang / chos thams cad bdag med pa'i nges pa'i tshig dang / yi ge/
89b4(dkon brtsegs): mi zad par shes nas chags pa med cing thogs pa med par ston pas ston par byed pa ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no// bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ gzungs 'thob par 'gyur te/ bzhig
89b5(dkon brtsegs): zhen/ mang du thos pas ngoms mi shes pa dang / mang du thos pa rnams la chos bzhin du gus par bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / rtag tu gzhan dag la chos ston par brtson pa dang / tshig dang yi ge thams cad gtan la
89b6(dkon brtsegs): dbab pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs te gsungs pa la 'jug pa yin no// bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na// bzod pa 'thob par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ mos pa dang /
89b7(dkon brtsegs): phyir mi ldog pa dang / tshogs dang / yongs su mi skyo ba ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no// bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ spobs pa dag pa 'thob par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/
90a1(dkon brtsegs): chos smra ba gzhan dag gis bshad pa dang 'gal bar mi byed pa dang / chos smra ba la gus pa dang bcas shing zhes dang bcas par chos nyan pa dang / thos pas khengs pa med pa dang / thos
90a2(dkon brtsegs): pa nyung ngu rnams la rnyas par mi byed pa ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no// bzang po chos bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsgyur ba ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti
90a3(dkon brtsegs): mug bskur ba dang / nyan thos las bsgyur ba dang / rang sangs rgyas las bsgyur ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i chos la 'du shes bsgyur ba ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no// bzang po chos bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub
90a4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams kyi don zab mo la sbyor ba yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar rtogs par byed pa dang / dgongs pa rtogs par byed pa dang / bdag gi ngo bo nyid rtogs par byed pa dang /
90a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar stong pa'i don du chos de dag thams cad don gcig par rtogs par byed pa ste/ bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi don zab mo la sbyor ba yin no// bzang po byang chub sems dpa'
90a6(dkon brtsegs): chos bzhi dang ldan na/ smon lam 'grub par 'gyur te bzhi gang zhe na/ tshul khrims dang bslab pa yongs su dag pa dang / las kyi sgrib pa rnam par sbyong ba dang / g.yo sgyu med pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa
90a7(dkon brtsegs): ba bskyed pa la sems dbang byed pa ste/ bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi smon lam 'grub par 'gyur ba'o// bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na// pha rol tu phyin pa thams
90b1(dkon brtsegs): cad kyis 'phags shing phyir mi ldog pa'i chos can du 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ thabs mangs pa dang ldan pas pha rol tu phyin pa gcig gi nang du pha rol tu phyin pa gzhan thams cad kyang sdud par byed pa dang /
90b2(dkon brtsegs): thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pas sems can gcig gi rang bzhin rtogs pas/ de las gzhan pa'i sems can thams cad kyang shes pa dang / thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pas chos rnam par dag pa gcig gi
90b3(dkon brtsegs): tshul rtogs pas/ chos gzhan dag gi rnam par dag pa'ang shes pa dang / chos nyid yin pas sangs rgyas thams cad sangs rgyas gcig tu mos pa ste/ brdang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po dgas ldan
90b4(dkon brtsegs): na pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyis 'phags shing phyir mi ldog pa'i chos can du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhi pa bsgrub pa 'di bshad pa na/ sgyu ma mkhan bzang po mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pazo
90b5(dkon brtsegs): nas tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde bar gyur nas// dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba de nyid kyis shing ta la bdun srid tsam gyi steng gi nam mkha' la 'phags so//
90b6(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do// 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer grangs med dpag tu med pa bkye bas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad 'od
90b7(dkon brtsegs): zer des khyab par byas nas slar yang bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub po// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te/ chos gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas
91a1(dkon brtsegs): pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la bde logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa
91a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni rgyu ma mchis pa dang / rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/ 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
91a3(dkon brtsegs): kyang gsol to// ye shes 'byung gnas gzi brjid gzhal yas shes rab grags// 'jig rten gsum du yon tan pha rol phyin pa snyes grags// rgyal ba rang byung gang gi slad du 'dzum bstan pa/ mi yi
91a4(dkon brtsegs): dbang pos de ni bdag la bka' stsal gsol// phyogs rnams na ni 'gro bar sems can ji snyed gnas// de dag kun gyi sems kyi spyod pa rnams dang ni// dman dang mchog dang tha ma bar ma rgyu ldan mkhyen//
91a5(dkon brtsegs): ci slad 'dzum pa mdzad pa bdag la bstan du gsol// lha dang de bzhin zhugs 'bar sgra ni gang lags dang // mi 'am ci dang mi dang brgya byin lha mi dang // mkha' lding lto'i 'phye tshangs pa'i sgra dang sgra gzhan
91a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams// sangs rgyas rdul bral gsung sgra'i char yang ga la spyod// 'od bzang nyi ma'i 'od dang nor bu'i 'od rnams dang // brgya byin 'od dang tshangs pa'i 'od rnams ji snyed pa// ji ltar sangs rgyas 'od
91a7(dkon brtsegs): kyis khyab par gda' ba ltar// 'od rnams de dag thams cad rnam par gsal ma lags// sangs rgyas zhing de zab mo tshe chos ni rjes su thog/ stong pa bdag med sems can gang zag med mkhyen nas/
91b1(dkon brtsegs): yod dang med pa'i mtha' gnyis rnam par spangs nas su// dus bsum chu zla 'dra bar rab tu mkhyen pa po// deng 'dir su zhig theg pa'i mchog la sems btud de// su zhig sangs rgyas rigs dang
91b2(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rigs la gnas// su zhig dkon mchog gsum po rgya cher skyed par bgyid// bang gi ched du 'dzum pa mdzad pa legs par gsungs// bal te rgyal ba nyan thos rnams la don ldan gsungs//
91b3(dkon brtsegs): de tshe de gshegs 'dzum pa zhabs kyi pus mor nub// gal te rkyen gyi theg pa gsung na phrag par nub// gang tshe sangs rgyas theg gsung de tshe spyi bor nub// ji ltar khyod kyis 'od zer 'bum skyed rang
91b4(dkon brtsegs): btang ba/ bde bar gshegs kyi gtsug tu nub par gyur las na// phan mdzad lha yi lnga ste phan pa mdzad pa po// 'dir ni sangs rgyas theg par lung ston dogs ma mchis/ de nas
91b5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis rigs kyi bu bzang po mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bka' stsal pa// kun dga' bo//
91b6(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu bzang po 'di bskal pa dgu khri nyis stong na/ bskal pa legs par sprul pa la/ 'jig rten gyi khams bkod pa chen por de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam
91b7(dkon brtsegs): par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po zhes bya bar 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur te/ kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po de'i 'jig rten gyi
92a1(dkon brtsegs): 'anas spyod pa chen po zhes bya 'i sngon pa thun/ rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / dede po gas pa du/ nyams dku bad/ mid skye po sang pos pang par 'gyur nga/ gam
92a2(dkon brtsegs): ltar mnyam pa dang / ka tsa li na di ltar reg na 'jam pa dang / me tog gi shing ljon pas brgyan pa dang / rol mo sna tshogs sgrobs pa dang / spos sna tshogs kyis bdugs pa dang / rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bdugs
92a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng bar 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo bza' ba dang btung ba ni dper na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi longs spyod ltar bsams pa tsam gyis 'grub ste/ mi de dag gi rje bar spyad
92a4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / yongs su spyad pa ni de lta bur 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams bkod pa chen po de rtag tu bkod pa thams cad nye bar ston par byed de// des na 'jig rten gyi khams de bkod pa chen po zhes
92a5(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// kun dga' bo sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems can gang dag skyes pa de dag thams cad kyang rgya chen po la mos pa/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa sha stag tu 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs
92a6(dkon brtsegs): pa rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po'i tshe'i tshad ni lo khrir 'gyur ro// yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang dam pa'i chos le bye bar gnas par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par
92a7(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul pa'i rgyal po yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba de'i tshe yang / byang chub sems dpa' sgra rnam par grags pa 'di nga'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi
92b1(dkon brtsegs): khyab bdag ces bya bar 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// zhes byang chub sems dpa' sgra rnam par grags pa lung bstan nas/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' 'o// de nas rigs kyi bu
92b2(dkon brtsegs): bzang po bar snang de las babs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bo phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcol ldan 'das bdag gis deng slan chad de bzhin
92b3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba 'bum phrag du ma dang / chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin nyid gang gis de bzhin nyid las
92b4(dkon brtsegs): slar ma log pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / dbyer ma mchis pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / ma tshang ba ma mchis pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / rnam par mi rtog pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / skye ba ma mchis
92b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / mngon par 'du bgyid pa ma mchis pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin nyid gsung ba bzhin du bdag kyang de skad mchi'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun
92b6(dkon brtsegs): dga' bos/ rigs kyi bu bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so// bzang po khyod de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid rjes su thob pa ma ci na/ khyed ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin nyid gsung ba ltar khyod de skad smra/
92b7(dkon brtsegs): bzang pos smras pa/ btsun pa kun dga' bo chos thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid thob pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ btsun pa kun dga' bo 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin nyid dbyer med
93a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sasmra su na de/ de sa da bye pa nga sprin den hA/ snru po pa kyi sasas can thams byung chu na/ dI sems smras su smram
93a2(dkon brtsegs): chos nas du na su me sa sa ma kyi nga stsal // sa sa mas semapa ma pa ma
93a3(dkon brtsegs): sa su ses pa 'i go cang bya na/ 'du shes yongs su shes par shes pashes sarnapa kyi shes sa padu'o// skyes bcom ldan sa pa sa
93a4(dkon brtsegs): chos 'dis ces gsol to// com ldan 'das rigs kyi drubazang po'i lha dang bsdus pa'i 'gri nam po rmongs par 'aspong ba ste/ sngon yang sgyuma'i chos nyid kyis me ga mongs par gyis so// de m+bu
93a5(dkon brtsegs): shes rab dang ye shes kyis mtho mongs pan bgyid do// de ci'i spyang du zhe na/ 'di'i shes rab dang ye shes kyi spobs pa ni de la bu lags pa'i srid du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/
93a6(dkon brtsegs): sgyu mam pan bzang po la 'di sad ces bka' stsal lo// babang po spyod lnga dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten mapo rmongs par byed pa bden dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ldan mgo rmongs par mdzas
93a7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du bdag kyang mgo mongs par bgyid lags so// de ci'i srang du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ bdag med pa nyid kyis sems can du tha stang btags te chos ston pa dang / srog med pa dang /
93b1(dkon brtsegs): gang zag med pa nyid kyis gang zag tu chos ston pa 'di ni mgo rmongs par bgyid pa chen po lags pa'i slad du'o// de bzhin gshegs pas ni byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs nas// chos 'ga' yang 'chi
93b2(dkon brtsegs): 'pho ba 'am/ 'gro ba'am/ skye ba ma gzigs mod kyi/ 'chi 'pho ba dang / 'gro ba dang / skye ba'i chos ston par yang mdzad de/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang ga
93b3(dkon brtsegs): par gsung ba bka' stsol ba lnga lnga dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi yul ga la lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ sgyu ma mkhan bzang po la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi bu
93b4(dkon brtsegs): legs so legs so// khyod ji skad smra ba de kho na bzhin te/ 'di lta ste/ bdag med pa nyid kyis sems can du tha snyang btags te/ chos ston pa dang / srog med pa dang / gang zag med pa nyid kyis gang zag tu tshon
93b5(dkon brtsegs): ston pa 'di ni mge rmongs pa chen po yin no// de bzhin gshegs pas ni byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs nas/ chos 'ga' yang 'chi 'pho ba 'am/ 'gro ba 'am/ skye ba ma gzibs mod kyi/ 'chi 'pho ba dang / 'gro ba
93b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / skye ba'i chos ston par yang mdzad de/ 'di la yongs su mya ngan las 'dab pa 'am/ yong su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir chos bstan pa'i chos ni bga' yang med po/ rgyade nas rigs kyi bu bzang pos bcom ldan 'das
93b7(dkon brtsegs): la rab tu 'byung bar gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ byams pa khyod kyis rigs kyi bu bzang po rab tu phyung zhig/ de nas byams pas rigs kyi/
94a1(dkon brtsegs): bu bzang po rab tu phyung rdzogs par bsnyen par byas so// rab tu phyung rdzogs par bsnyen nas kyang // bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub
94a2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams ni kha dog dang / rtags dang / tshul gyis rab tu 'byung ba ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig mtshan ma thams cad la'ang
94a3(dkon brtsegs): chags pa ma mchis la/ sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du khams gsum na'ang gnas na/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rab tu byung ba lags so// yang de'i tshe bstan pa 'di
94a4(dkon brtsegs): bshad pa na/ srog chags lnga stong gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// dge slong nyis brgya ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo//
94a5(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di'i ming ji skad ces gzung bar bgyi//
94a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sgyu ma mkhan bzang po lung bstan pa zhes bya bar zung zhig/ rim gyis byang chub yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa'
94a7(dkon brtsegs): gang de bzhin gshegs pa blta bar 'dod pa dang / sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bya bar 'dod pa des/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ bklag par bya/ gzhan dag la'ang bstan par bya'o// /
94b1(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo bang gis 'di bzung ba dang / bcangs pa dang / bamags pa dang / gzhan dag la'ang rab tu bstan pa des ni// de bzhin ga shegs pa mthong ba yin/ des ni sems can rnams la
94b2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa'ang byas pa yin no// kun dga' bo de lta bas na khyod kyis skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / 'di lta ste/ lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang bde
94b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung zhig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ kun dga' bo chos gang dag gis byang chub yang dag par 'byung ba dang / theg pa chen po 'di la'ang yang dag
94b4(dkon brtsegs): par 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag ni/ theg pa chen po 'di las yang dag par rab tu ston te/ des na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byang chub la yang dag par byung ba zhes bya'o// kun 'ga' bo khyod mos par bya'o//
94b5(dkon brtsegs): khong du chud par bya'o// gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di glegs bam du byed pa 'am/ lus la bsrel ba de'i lus la de bzhin gshegs pa yod pa yin na/ gang dag gis thos nas de bzhin nyid du sgrub pa lta smos
94b6(dkon brtsegs): kyang ci dgos/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ rigs kyi bu bzang pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba skul ba zhes bgyi lags so// de ci'i
94b7(dkon brtsegs): slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba sngon bsags pa thams cad mngon sum du gyur pa'i slad du lags so//
95a1(dkon brtsegs): / bcom ldan 'das kyis degad ces bka' stsal nas/ rigs kyi du bzang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dpa' bo dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / khwa dang / mi/
95a2(dkon brtsegs): lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u
95a3(dkon brtsegs): stod phrag brgya pa las/ sgyu ma mkhan bzang po lung bstan pa zhes bya ste/ 'dus pa nyi shu cu gcig pa rdzogs so// / rgya ban gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / pradz+nyA bar ma dang /
95a4(dkon brtsegs): zhu chen gyi lo tsab ban de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ sh+lo ka bzhi brgya sum cu/ bam po gcig dang sh+log brgya sum cu'o//
95a5(dkon brtsegs): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ma hA pra ti hAr+ya u pa de sho nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bode skad du/ 'phags pa cho 'phrul chen po bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po
95a6(dkon brtsegs): po sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di sang bdagagis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mam yod na rgyal bu rgya la phreng kyi tshal mgron med pas
95a7(dkon brtsegs): sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' brkyang stong dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de nas lu'i bu ded dpon zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du/
95b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dus par gyur te 'dug go// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'ang 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ lha'i bu ded dpon gyis 'di skad ces
95b2(dkon brtsegs): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa cho 'phrul du zhig gris sems can rnams 'dul bar mdzad lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa ka lnga'i bu nga ni cho 'phrul
95b3(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa gsum gyis sems can rnams 'dul bar byed do// gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ kun rjod pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi tshe 'phrul lo//
95b4(dkon brtsegs): de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i kun rjod pa'i cho 'phrul de gang zhe na/ thogs pa med pa'i ye shes kyis ma 'ongs pa'i dus gzigs pa gang yin pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems
95b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi spyod pa mkhyen cing gzigs pa dang / dkon mchog gsum po dag la ma dad pa rnams dad par mdzad pa dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa la 'jug pa mkhyen pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pas gang zab gang
95b6(dkon brtsegs): la da ltar byung ba na nyes par spyad pa'i gzhis ngan song dang / ngan 'gro gang yang rung ba dag tu skye bar 'gyur ba de ni de kho na bzhin du 'gyur gyi gzhan du ma yin no zhes kun rjod par mdzad pa dang / gang zag
95b7(dkon brtsegs): de sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus ngan song rnams las thar nas lha dang mi dag tu skye bar 'gyur zhing theg pa gang gis nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / yang nanyan thos kyi thab pa 'am/
96a1(dkon brtsegs): yang na rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ yang na theg pa chen pos nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin du bde ba dang sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba dang / bskal pa ji snyed
96a2(dkon brtsegs): cig gis nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / spyod pa ji lta bus sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig mthong bar 'gyur ba dang / mnyes par byed par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pas
96a3(dkon brtsegs): rab tu mkhyen to// mkhyen nas kyang de ni de kho na bzhin du 'gyur gyi gzhan du ma yin no zhes de kho na bzhin du kun rjod par mdzad pa dang / gang zag gang dge ba'i rtsu ba yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus 'dod
96a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i khams rnams su skye bar 'gyur ba dang / gzug kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams kyi skye mched gang yang rung ba dag du skye bar 'gyur ba de'ang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to//
96a5(dkon brtsegs): theg pa gang gis nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / bskal pa ji snyed gcig gis nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / spyod pa ji lta bus sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig mthong bar 'gyur
96a6(dkon brtsegs): zhing mnyes par byed par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang / de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to// mkhyen nas kyang dri ni de kho na bzhin du kun rjod cing lung ston par mdzad pa dang / dge ba'am/
96a7(dkon brtsegs): mi dge ba 'amadaman pa 'amabar ma 'am mchog gam tha na sems bskyed pa gcig kyang mi 'da' ste/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i kun rjod pa'i cho 'phrul yin
96b1(dkon brtsegs): node la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su bstan pa'i tshe 'phru lu gang zhe na/ bslab pa bsrung ba'i don gyi phyir rjes su son par mdzad pa gang yin pa ste/ 'din bya ba'o// 'dun
96b2(dkon brtsegs): bya ba ma yin pa'o// 'di ni bsten par bya'o// 'di ni bsten par bya ba ma yin pa'o// 'di ni sgrub pa'o// 'di ni log par sgrub pa'o// chos 'di dag ni kun nas nyon mongs pa'i cha dang mthun pa'o//
96b3(dkon brtsegs): chos 'di dag ni rnam par byang ba'i tshe dang mthun pa'o zhes de ltar yon tan thams cad yang dag par blang ba rjes su ston pa dang / mi dge ba thams cad spang ba rjes su ston pa dang / dge ba'i lam gyi tshogs thams
96b4(dkon brtsegs): cad blang ba rjes su ston pa dang / lam 'di ni nyan thos kyi theg pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'o// lam 'di ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'o// lam 'di ni theg pa chen po
96b5(dkon brtsegs): yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'o zhes rjes su ston pa gang yin pa ste/ de dag ji skad bstan pa bzhin du bsgrubs na gnas gang yin pa de rjes su thob par mi 'gyur ba ni gnas ma yin/ skabs ma yin te/ de ni gnas
96b6(dkon brtsegs): med do// las 'di yang dag par blangs na ni sems can dmyal ba rnams su khrid par byed do// las 'di yang dag par blangs na ni dud 'gro'i skye gnas rnams su khrid par byed do// las 'di yang dag
96b7(dkon brtsegs): par blangs na ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten rnams su khrid par byed do// las 'di yang dag par blangs na ni lha rnams su khrid par byed do// las 'di yang dag par blangs na ni mi rnam su khrid par byed do//
97a1(dkon brtsegs): de la gang dag mi dge ba spangs nas/ dge ba yang dag par blangs pa'i phyir 'jug pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam du 'jug pa de dag ni lha dang mi rnams su skyes nas/ rim gyis
97a2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos can du 'gyur ba dang / tshul de lta bu kha na ma tho ba dang / rmongs pa med pa dang / rjes su ston par mdzad pa gang yin pa ste/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su
97a3(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa'i tshe 'phrul yin no// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gang zhe na/ gang dag rdzu 'phrul gyis 'dul ba'i sems can nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / dregs pas
97a4(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa rnams la rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul kun tu ston par mdzad de/ 'di lta ste/ gcig tu gyur nas du mar 'gyur ro// du mar gyur nas gcig tu 'gyur ro// snang bar gyur cing mi snang bar yang 'gyur ro// rtsig pa
97a5(dkon brtsegs): wa'ang zad kar 'gro'o// ra ba la'ang thang kar 'gro'o// / ri la'ang mi thogs par thad kar 'gro'o// sa la'ang steng du 'byung ba dang byi'u rdul byed de/ dper na tshul bya ba bzhin no// chu la'ang mi nub par 'gro ste
97a6(dkon brtsegs): dper nas la bya ba bzhin no// nam mkha' la'ang 'gro sten dper na 'dab chags bya bzhin no// lus kyi stod nas me 'bar bar byed cing / lus kyi smad nas chu'i rgyun 'bab par byed de// lus kyi smad nas me 'bar bar byed/
97a7(dkon brtsegs): cing / lus kyi stong nas chu'i rgyun 'bab par byed do// nyi ma dang zla ba 'di gnyis 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/ 'di ltar mthu che ba/ 'di ltar gzi brjid che ba la'ang lag pas 'dzin cing kun tu nyug par byed do// tshangs pa'i 'jig
97b1(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi bar du'ang lus kyis dbang sgyur ro// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'ang kun tu 'bar bar ston te/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul ba'i
97b2(dkon brtsegs): byang bar ci dang ci lta bus sems can rnams 'dul bar 'gyur ba de dang de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa dag mngon par sgrub par byed de/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi tshe 'phrul yin no// lha'i bu nga ni tshe
97b3(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul bsum po de dag gis sems can rnams 'dul bar byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ lha'i bu ded dpon gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das cho 'phrul de dag ma
97b4(dkon brtsegs): lags pa'i cho 'phrul dam pa gzhan ci zhig mnga' lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu yod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
97b5(dkon brtsegs): pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal cho 'phrul bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs gang thos na/ zab mo la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bzod pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / bdud kyi
97b6(dkon brtsegs): phyogs kyang nga shin tu tshar bcad par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub 'di'ang yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ba'i cho 'phrul bstan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs la khyod spobs par gyis shig
97b7(dkon brtsegs): de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni bzhed na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
98a1(dkon brtsegs): khams kyi rgya mtsho chen po'i chab kyi phung po gang lags pa de thams cad phyag gi byor ba ya gcig tu stsal kyang chab kyi sems can rnams la'ang gnod par mi 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
98a2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa la ni tshe 'phrul 'di mnga' lags so// yang 'di ni cho 'phrul dam pa lags te/ gang de bzhin gshegs pas brjod du ma mchis pa dang / yig ma mchis pa dang / bsnyad du ma mchis pa dang / skye 'am
98a3(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa dang / 'byung ba ma mchis pa dang / ming ma mchis pa dang / mtshan ma mchis pa dang / sgra ma mchis pa dang / dbyangs ma mchis pa dang / tshig gi lam ma mchis pa dang / rgyu mtshan ma mchis pa dang /
98a4(dkon brtsegs): mtshan nyid ma mchis pa dang / spyod pa ma mchis pa dang / rgyu ba ma mchis pa dang / kun tu 'byung ba ma mchis pa dang / rnam par rig pa ma mchis pa dang / 'dus ma bgyis pa dang / sems dang / yid dang /
98a5(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa dang bral ba dang / tha snyad thams cad yang dag par chad pa dang / zhi ba dang / byang ba dang / phra ba dang / mthong bar dka' ba dang / brtag tu ma mchis pa dang / rtog ge'i spyod yul ma lags
98a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ yi ge dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / brda dang / tha snyad kyi lam de dang de dag gis chos de gzhan dag la rnam par rig par mdzad pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe 'dral
98a7(dkon brtsegs): chen po lags so// lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis de'i gting mi rtogs shing dmigs pa dang / mtshan ma dang / yongs su rtog pa dang bcas pa'i dge sbyong dang bram ze thams cad dang zhing 'jug par mi 'dum
98b1(dkon brtsegs): bde'ang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul chen po lags so// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni bzhed na stong gsum kyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi thams 'di zhal bya
98b2(dkon brtsegs): sgor srul kyang / gling chen po bzhi'i sems can rnams dang / dgung zla dang / gdugs dag dang / 'khor yug rnams dang / ran dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal rnams la'ang sgrib par mi 'gyur
98b3(dkon brtsegs): bdang / slar phyung ste gnas ji lta ba bzhin du bkod kyang sems can rnams kyis 'di ltar bdag cag yul bang du dkod pa dang / bdag cag yul gang nas brtson pa'ang ma 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das de'ang de ban
98b4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul chen po lags so// 'di cho 'phrul chen po dam pa lags te/ gang de bzhin gshegs pas brjod du ma mchis pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa dang / bsnyad du ma mchis pa dang / ming
98b5(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis pa dang / mtshan ma mchis pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa dang bral ba dang / tha snyad thams cad yang dag par chad pa dang / zhi ba dang / byang ba dang / phra ba dang /
98b6(dkon brtsegs): mthong bar dka' ba dang / brtag tu ma mchis pa dang / rtog ge'i spyod yul ma lags pa'i bar gyi chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ yi ge dung / nges pa'i tshig dang / brda dang / ba skad
98b7(dkon brtsegs): lam de dang de dag gi chos de bstan pa de'ang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul chen po lags so// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang ldan pa'i cho 'phrul de dag thams cad
99a1(dkon brtsegs): ni mtshan ma'i dngos po dang bcas pa'i sems can rnams kun nas 'dren par mdzad pa lags so// 'di'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul chen po lags te/ 'di lta ste
99a2(dkon brtsegs): bdag ma mchis pa la bdag tu tha snyad 'dogs pa dang / sems can ma mchis pa la sems can du tha snyad 'dogs pa dang / srog ma mchis pa la srog du tha snyad 'dogs pa dang / gso ba ma mchis pa la gso bar tha snyad
99a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dogs pa dang / gang zag ma mchis pa la gang zag tu tha snyad 'dogs pa dang / shed las skyes ma mchis pa la shed las skyes su tha snyad 'dogs pa dang / shed bu ma mchis pa la shed bur tha snyad 'dogs pa
99a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / ming ma mchis pa la ming du tha snyad 'dogs pa dang / gzugs ma mchis pa la gzugs su tha snyad 'dogs pa dang / tshor ba ma mchis pa la tshor bar tha snyad 'dogs pa dang / 'du shes ma mchis pa la 'du
99a5(dkon brtsegs): shes su tha snyad 'dogs pa dang / 'du byed rnams ma mchis pa la 'du byed rnams su tha snyad 'dogs pa dang / rnam par shes pa ma mchis pa la rnam par shes par tha snyad 'dogs pa dang / phung po ma mchis
99a6(dkon brtsegs): pa la phung por tha snyad 'dogs pa dang / khams ma mchis pa la khams su tha snyad 'dogs pa dang / skye mched ma mchis pa la skye mched du tha snyad 'dogs pa dang / mig stong zhes bgyi bar tha snyad
99a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dogs kyang mig ni 'di snyam du bdag stong ngo snyam du mi sems pa dang / gzugs stong zhes bgyi bar tha snyad 'dogs kyang gzugs ni 'di snyam du bdag stong ngo snyam du mi sems pa dang / mig gi rnam par
99b1(dkon brtsegs): shes pa stong zhes bgyi bar tha snyad 'dogs kyang / mig gi rnam par shes pa ni 'di snyam du bdag stong ngo snyam du mi sems pa dang / de bzhin du rna ba dang / sgra dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / snang nga/
99b2(dkon brtsegs): dri dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce dang / ro dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus dang / reg bya dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid stong zhes bgyi bar tha snyad 'dogs kyang
99b3(dkon brtsegs): yid ni 'di snyam du bdag stong ngo snyam du mi sems pa dang / chos rnams stong ngo zhes bgyi bar tha snyad 'dogs kyang / chos rnams ni 'di snyam du bdag stong ngo snyam du mi sems pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes
99b4(dkon brtsegs): pa stong ngo zhes bgyi bar tha snyad 'dogs kyang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni 'di snyam du bdag stong ngo snyam du mi sems te/ 'di ltar bems po dang / sems pa ma mchis pa dang / dngos po ma mchis pa dang /
99b5(dkon brtsegs): ming ma mchis pa dang / mtshan ma mchis pa'i chos 'di lta bu 'di dag sems can gzhan dag dang / gang zag gzhan dag la yang dag par go bar mdzad pa gang lags pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul chen
99b6(dkon brtsegs): po lags te/ cho 'phrul de ni mig dang ldan pa'ang ma lags/ gzugs dang ldan pa'ang ma lags/ mig gi rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa'ang ma labs/ rna ba dang ldan pa'ang ma lags/ sgra dang ldan pa'ang
99b7(dkon brtsegs): ma lags/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa'ang ma lags/ sna dang ldan pa'ang ma lags/ dri dang ldan pa'ang ma lags/ sna'i rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa'ang ma lag/ lce dang ldan pa'ang ma lags/
100a1(dkon brtsegs): ro dang ldan pa'ang ma lags/ lce'i rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa'ang ma lags/ lus dang ldan pa'ang ma lags reb bya dang ldan pa'ang ma lags/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang ldan
100a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'ang ma lags/ yid dang ldan pa'ang ma lags chos rnams dang ldan pa'ang ma lags/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa'ang ma lags te/ de lta bu'i tshe 'phrul de ni yul ma mchis pa'i tshe 'phrul lags/
100a3(dkon brtsegs): so/ de ni yul dang bral ba'i cho 'phrul lags te/ cho 'phrul de ni lus dang ldan par blta ba ma lags/ sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa dang ldan par blta ba ma lags te/ de'i slad du cho 'phrul
100a4(dkon brtsegs): de ni 'jig rten thams cad glob mi ches par 'gyur ba lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'jig rten zhes bgyi ba ni phung po lnga po dag lags te/ phung po lnga po mi rtag pa de la byis pa rnams mngon par zhen cing /
100a5(dkon brtsegs): de dag gis phung po lnga po dag rtag par bzung ba'i skad du ste/ de'i slad du cho 'phrul de ni 'jig rten thams cad glo ba mi ches par 'gyur ba lags so// 'jig rten ni phung po lnga po dag rtag ces bgyi bar glo ba ches
100a6(dkon brtsegs): pas nas/ de dag mi rtag go zhes bshad na 'jig rten thams cad slob mi ches lags so// 'jig rten ni phung po lnga po dag bde zhes bgyi bar klong ches pas na/ de dag sdug bsngal lo zhes bshad na 'jig
100a7(dkon brtsegs): rten thams cad glong mi ches lags so// 'jig rten ni phung po lnga po dag bdag ces bgyi bar glob ches pas na de dag bdag ma mchis so zhes bshad na 'jig rten thams cad glob mi ches lags so//
100b1(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten ni phung po lnga po dag sdug ces bgyi bar glo ba ches pas na/ de dag mi sdug ge zhes bsha na 'jig rten thams cad glo ba mi ches lags so// 'jig rten ni phung po lnga po rab bdag gi zhes bgyidang
100b2(dkon brtsegs): glo ba ches pas na/ de dag bdag po ma mchis so zhes bshad na 'jig rten thams cad blo ba mi ches lags so// 'jig rten ni phung po lnga po dag yang dag pa zhes bgyi bar glo ba ches pas na/ de dag yang
100b3(dkon brtsegs): dag pa ma lags so zhes bshad na 'jig rten thams cad glo ba mi ches lags te/ de'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul de ni 'jig rten thams cad slob ma ches par 'byur ba lags so//
100b4(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul de la ni sems rangs par mi 'gyur lags te/ tshe 'phrul de ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa lags so// tshe 'phrul de ni mig tu bgrang ba ma lags/ gzugs su bgrang ngam labs te/ cho 'phrul de ni
100b5(dkon brtsegs): mig dang gzugs kyi yul las yang dag par 'das pa lags so// tshe 'phrul de ni rna bar bgrang ba ma lags// sgrar bgrang ba ma lags teg tshe 'phrul de ni rna ba dang sgra'i yul las yang dag par 'das
100b6(dkon brtsegs): pa lags so// de bzhin du sbyar te/ cho 'phrul de ni yid du bgrang ba ma lags/ chos su bgrang ba ma lags te/ cho 'phrul de ni yid dang chos kyi yul las yang dag par 'das pa lags so// cho la
100b7(dkon brtsegs): de ni shes pa'i spyod yul ma logs/ rangs par bgyid pa ma lags te/ tshe 'phrul de ni rnam par rig par bgyi ba ma lags so// stong pa nyid ni brjod du ma mchis pa lags na/ stong pa nyid brjod pa de ni che
101a1(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul lags so// mtshan ma ma mchis pa ni brjod du ma mchis pa lags na/ mtshan ma ma mchis pa brjod pa de ni cho 'phrul lags so// smon pa ma mchis pa ni brjod du ma mchis pa
101a2(dkon brtsegs): lags na/ smon pa ma mchis pa brjod pa de ni cho 'phrul lags so// mngon par 'du bgyi ba mchis pa ni brjod du ma mchis pa lags na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa brjod pa de ni cho 'phrul lag
101a3(dkon brtsegs): so// skye ba ma mchis pa ni brjod du ma mchis pa lags na/ skye ba ma mchis pa brjod pa de ni cho 'phrul lags so// 'byung ba ma mchis pa ni brjod du ma mchis pa lags na/ 'byung ngam mchis pa brjed//
101a4(dkon brtsegs): pa de ni cho 'phrul lags so// dngos po ma mchis pa ni brjod du ma mchis pa lags na/ dngos po ma mchis pa brjod pa de ni cho 'phrul lags so// mtshan nyid ma mchis pa ni brjod du ma mchis pa lags na//
101a5(dkon brtsegs): mtshan nyid ma mchis pa brjod pa de ni cho 'phrul lags so// 'gag pa ma mchis pa ni brjod du ma mchis pa lags na/ 'bab pa ma mchis pa brjod pa de ni cho 'phrul lags so// mya ngan las 'das pa ni brjod du
101a6(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis pa lags na/ mya ngan las 'das pa brjod pa de ni tshe 'phrul lags so// 'di lta ste/ bdab tu dmigs pa ma mchis pa dang / sems can du kun tu 'byung ba ma mchis pa dang / byang chub la rlom
101a7(dkon brtsegs): sems ma mchis pa'i 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i sbyin pa de ni cho 'phrul lags so// 'di lta ste/ lus g.yo ba ma mchis pa dang / ngag brjod pa ma mchis pa dang / sems rgyu ba ma mchis pa'i 'bor gsum
101b1(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pa'i tshul khrims de ni tshe 'phrul lags so// 'di lta ste/ sred par spro 'dogs pa ma mchis pa dang / sems skad cig tu 'jig pa dang / lus dang sems rnam par mi rtog pa'i 'khor gsum yongs su
101b2(dkon brtsegs): dag pa'i bzod pa de ni tshe phrul lags so// 'di lta ste/ blang ba ma mchis pa dang / dor ba ma mchis pa dang / gnas pa ma mchis pa'i 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i brtson 'grus de ni tshe 'phrul lags so//
101b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ nang nye bar zhi ba dang / phyir rol tu chub ma mchis pa dang / sems bsags pa ma mchis pa'i 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i bsam ga tan don cho 'phrul lags so// 'di lta ste/ ngar 'dzin
101b4(dkon brtsegs): pa rnam par spangs pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa dor ba dang / lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad dang bral ba'i 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i shes rab de ni cho 'phrul lags so// chos thams cad ni rnam par bral ba ma
101b5(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa lags na/ de dag rnam par bral bar bshad pa ni cho 'phrul lags so// chos thams cad ni dngos po ma mchis pa lags na/ rang gi jo bo dang bral bar bshad pa de ni tshe 'phrul lags so// chos thams
101b6(dkon brtsegs): cad ni dbyer ma mchis pa lags na/ yi ges kun tu phye ste bshad pa ni cho 'phrul lags so// chos thams cad ni 'ong ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gro ba ma mchis pa lags na/ 'ong ba dang 'gro bar bshad pa ni tshe
101b7(dkon brtsegs): 'brul lags so// chos thams cad ni 'byung ba ma mchis pa lags na/ 'byung bar bshad pa ni cho 'phrul lags so// chos thams cad ni mngon par rtogs pa gcig pa lags na/ 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa bshad
102a1(dkon brtsegs): pa ni cho 'phrul lags so// chos thams cad ni ro gcig pa lags na/ theg pa gsum du rnam par dgod pa bshad pa ni cho 'phrul lags so// chos kyi dbyings ni dbyer ma mchis
102a2(dkon brtsegs): pa lags na/ chos thams cad rnam par dgod par bshad pa ni tshe 'phrul lags so// sangs rgyas thams cad ni sangs rgyas gcig pa lags na/ sangs rgyas dpag tum mchis pa bshad pa ni
102a3(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul lags so// zhing thams cad ni zhing gcig pa lags na/ zhing sna tshogs bshad pa ni cho 'phrul lags so// sems can thams cad ni sems can gcig pa lags na/ sems can gyi rim pa bshad pa ni
102a4(dkon brtsegs): tshe 'phrul lags so// chos thams cad ni chos gcig pa lags na/ tha ma dang / mchog dang / bar mar bshad pa ni cho 'phrul lags so// chos thams cad ni rnam par bsgrubs pa ma mchis pa lags na
102a5(dkon brtsegs): rnam par bsgrubs pa'i mtshan nyid bshad pa ni cho 'phrul lags so// chos thams cad ni rnam par rig pa ma mchis pa lags na/ gzhan la rnam par rig pa ba shad pa ni tshe 'phrul lags so//
102a6(dkon brtsegs): de nas lha'i bu ded dpon gyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal khyod kyis ji skad smras pa'i don kho bos shes pa ltar na/ ji tsam du brjod pa'i chos de rab thams cad
102a7(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul yin no// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ chos thams cad ni brjod du med pa yin pas/ de dag la brjod pa gang yin pa de ni cho 'phrul chen po yin no//
102b1(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa 'di bshad pa na lha'i bu bri nyis stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so// byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to//
102b2(dkon brtsegs): de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA rAdwa to'i bus/ lha'i bu ded dpon la 'di skad ces smras so// lha'i bu ci khyod cho 'brul bstan pa 'di thos nas skrag par mi 'gyur ram/ lha'i bus smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa tI'i bu bo
102b3(dkon brtsegs): bo nyid kyang cho 'phrul yin na/ de la kho bo skrag par 'gyur du ci yod/ shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ lha'i bu khyod ce las bsams te de skad sme/ lha'i bus smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad ni 'gro
102b4(dkon brtsegs): med pa yin na/ de la dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos 'pho ba gang yin pa/ de ni cho 'phrul chen po yin no// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu dge ba'i las mngon par 'du bya ba gang gis kho bo lnga rnams kyi nang du skyes te/ bdag nyid chen po
102b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di'ang thob pa'i dge ba'i las mngon par 'du bya ba gang yin pa de ni sems par mi byed cing rnam par shes par mi byed do// de bas na sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba'ang sems par mi byed cing rnam
102b6(dkon brtsegs): par shes par mi byed de/ sems par mi byed cing rnam par shes par mi byed pa gang yin pa de ni cho 'phrul chen po yin te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad du las rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni bsam
102b7(dkon brtsegs): gyis mi khyang po// klurnams kyi klu'i yul yang bsam gyis mi byab // bsam gtan pa rnams kyi bsam gtan gyi yul yang bsam gyis mi byaba'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul yang bsam gyis
103a1(dkon brtsegs): mi khyad de zhes gsungs pa de lta bu ste/ de lta bas na chos thams cad ni bsam gyis mi khyad pa ste/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa gang yin pa de ni cho 'phrul chen po yin no// yang gnas brtan shA rang
103a2(dkon brtsegs): ti'i bus 'di skad du lha'i bu ci khyod bcom ldan 'das kyis cho 'phrul bstan pa gang yin pa de thos na skrag par mi 'gyur ram zhes zer ba ni/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ci de bzhin gshegs pas cho 'brul bstan
103a3(dkon brtsegs): pa gang yin pa des nam mkha'i khams skrag par 'gyur ram/ smras pa/ lha'i bu de ni ma yin no// smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gal te de bzhin gshegs pas cho 'phrul bstan pa des nam mkha'i khams
103a4(dkon brtsegs): skrag par mi 'gyur na/ kho bo'ang skrag par mi 'gyur ro// smras pa/ lha'i bu ci khyod nam mkha' yin nam/ smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu kho bo nam mkha' yin no// smras pa/ lha'i bu khyod ci las bsams te/
103a5(dkon brtsegs): de skad smra/ smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ci bcom ldan 'das kyis nang gi nam mkha'i khams su gsungs pa gang yin pa dang / phyi rol gyi nam mkha'i khams su gsungs pa gang yin pa de nyid nam mkha'i khams ma yin/
103a6(dkon brtsegs): nam/ smras pa/ lnga'i bu de ni yin no// smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de lta bas na sems can thams cad kyang nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin can yin no// smras pa/ lha'i bu ji ltar khyod kyis bstan pa
103a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du khyod nyid kyang ring por mi thogs par cho 'phrul de dag nyid nye bar ston par 'gyur ro// smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu cho 'phrul de dag ni nye bar bstan par mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ cho 'phrul
103b1(dkon brtsegs): de ngag ni yul thams cad las yang ngas par 'das pa yin pa'i phyir ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shAr dwa ti'i dus 'di gad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das lnga'i budadu dpon dru na/
103b2(dkon brtsegs): bu stor pa las na/ 'dis ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bgyi ba bgyis shing / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la'ang bsnyen bkur bgyis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkra' stsal ba/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no//
103b3(dkon brtsegs): ji skad du smras pa de bzhin te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu lha'i buded dpon 'di ni 'jam dpal gzhon nu pas yongs su smin par byas pa yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa nga
103b4(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i yang ches grangs med pa 'das par gyun pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/ bskul pa mngon po'i dgra' ba zhes bya ba la 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba zhes bya bar/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
103b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ri rab lta bu
103b6(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung bar gyur to// shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'jog rten gyi khams bde ba zhes bya ba de'ang 'jig rten gyi khams de na sems can rnams bded thams cad dang ldan par gnas shing sdug bsngal dang yang
103b7(dkon brtsegs): mi bde ba'i sgra 'ga' tsam med pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams derang rin po che sna bzhi gser dang / dngul dang / be ruR+Ya dang / shel las grub cing / lag mthil ltar mnyam la/ katsal na do'o gos ltaran regan 'jam nis
104a1(dkon brtsegs): mi khom pa ngan song rnams dang bral la/ lha dang mi rnams kyis kun tu bang zhing / yid la bsams pa tsam gyis bza' ba dang btung ba dag 'byor la bde ba tshad med pa dang ldan pas na/ de'i
104a2(dkon brtsegs): phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de bde ba zhes bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa de'i dge 'dun ni byang chub sems dpa' 'da' zhig ste/ brtson 'grus 'bar ba/ shes rab kyi snang thob pa// gzungs dang mdo rje'i rgyal ldob pa
104a3(dkon brtsegs): spobs pa mi chod pa/ tshig thams cad rab tu 'byed cing ston pa'i shes pa la mkhas pa/ mngon par shes pas rnam par shes pa khong du chud pa/ bdud dang / phyir rgol ba nges par bcom pa/ sgrib pa med
104a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rnam par thar pa'i ye shes kyi bzod pa dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa la ji ltar rigs pa bzhin du chos kyi sman sbyor ba la mkhas pa/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs chen po
104a5(dkon brtsegs): bsags pa/ gsol ba ma btab par sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen byed pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'gro ba'i shes pa la mkhas pa/ dran pa dang / blo gros dang /
104a6(dkon brtsegs): rtogs pa dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang / brtan pa dang / blo rgya mtsho'i rjes su zhugs pa/ sbyin pa dang / dul ba dang / legs par sdom pa dang / tshul khrims dang / thos pa dang / shes rab la
104a7(dkon brtsegs): shin tu gnas pa/ thabs mtha' yas pas dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su sngo ba la mkhas po/ stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la lhag pa'i bsam pas shin tu
104b1(dkon brtsegs): zhugs pa/ bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pas rnam par rtse ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sha stag go/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de'i tshe de'i dus
104b2(dkon brtsegs): nabacom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab lta bu de'i gsung rab la 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa zhes bya ba chos dang ldan pa
104b3(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rgyal po gling bzhi'i dbang phyug rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa mi'i dbang por gyur pa zhig byung bar gyur to// de'i bu stong du tshang bar gyur te/ de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
104b4(dkon brtsegs): la yang dag par zhugs pa sha stag go// sha ra dwa ti'i bu rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa de'ang btsun mo'i tshogs rnams dang lhan cig tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs
104b5(dkon brtsegs): par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab lta bu de'i sku tshe'i tshad dang / mi de dag gi tshe'i tshad ni le dung phyur phrag bdun du gyur to//
104b6(dkon brtsegs): de nas rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa bu stong dang lhan cig btsun mo'i 'khor dang lhan cig tu chos la dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba dang dang ba thob nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
104b7(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab lta bu byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang bcas pa de la lo 'bum tshang bar thugs la dgongs pa bzhin du na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dag snyan gyi
105a1(dkon brtsegs): gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams dang / bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas so// rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa 'bor dang bcas pas rtag par rgyun du// de bzhin ga shegs pa
105a2(dkon brtsegs): de la mngon sum du nyin gcig mi 'chad par rang gi lag nas gus par phul zhing rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par chos nyan pa la'ang 'jug par gyur to// de bu dang bcas/ btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pas lo 'dum 'das
105a3(dkon brtsegs): kyang yang dang yang du sangs rgyas mthong zhing / yang dang yang du de la chos nyan pas rjes su dran pa bzhi thob par gyur to// bzhi gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / tshes rjes su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang /
105a4(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa dang ldan zhing byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa'i tshul khrims rjes su dran pa ste/ rjes su dran pa bzhi po de dag thob par gyur to// de rjes su dran pa bzhi po de dag dang ldan pas nyin mtshan du sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / chos
105a5(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par 'gro ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun mthong ba dang bral bar ma gyur to// de nas dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa bu dang bcas/ btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa de chos
105a6(dkon brtsegs): mnyan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab lta bu dag la ba der song ngo // de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
105a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sangs rgyas ri rang lta bu des byang chub sems dpa' de dag la cho 'phrul rnam pa du mas rjes su gdams pa mdzad par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
105b1(dkon brtsegs): nga'i sangs rgyas ri rang lta bu de la/ rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa des 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das tshe 'phrul de dag ma lags pa'i mo 'phrul dam pa gzhan mchis lags sam// de skad ces gsol
105b2(dkon brtsegs): padang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rang lta bu des/ rgyal po dpe pa'i bkod pa de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po che smrar
105b3(dkon brtsegs): de dag ma yin pa'i cho 'phrul dam pa gzhan yang yod do// de'ang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems dang sems las byung ba gzugs can ma yin pa rnams bshad pa dang / sems dang sems las byung ba 'gags pa
105b4(dkon brtsegs): rnams bshad pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sems dang sems las byung ba mi gnas pa rnams smos pa dang / ma skyes ma byung ba'i lam bshad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo ro gcig pa rnams la yan lag gsum du
105b5(dkon brtsegs): smos pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa gcig tu 'dus pa la bden pa bzhir yongs su brjod pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / rnam pa med pa dang / 'dus ma byas pa'i byang chub la yongs su sgrub par byed pa dang / ste
105b6(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos rnams bshad pa dang / phyin ci log dang nyon mongs pas grub pa'i sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa dang / blang ba med pa dang / dor ba med pa'i
105b7(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang / byas pa med pa'i chos rnams la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa dang / 'byung ba med cing skad cig pa'i chos
106a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa dang / lus dang sems dben pa'i chos rnams la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa dang / bsdus pa dang rnam par g.yengs pa med pa'i chos
106a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams la bsamag tan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa dang / pha rol dang tshu rol med pa'i chos rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa dang / bzhag pa dang bsal ba med de'i chos rnams la thabs mkhas pa yod pa dag /
106a3(dkon brtsegs): spyod ba med pa dang rton pa med pa'i chos rnams la byams bsgom pa dang / bya ba med pa dang gzhig pa med pa'i chos rnams la snying rjes sbyor ba dang / dga' ba med pa'i chos rnams la dpa' ba mngon par sgrub pa dang / gnas
106a4(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa'i chos rnams la btang snyoms sgom pa dang / shes pa med pa dang mthong ba med pa'i chos rnams la lha'i mig mngon par sgrub pa dang / thos pa med pa dang rnam par rig pa med pa'i chos rnams la
106a5(dkon brtsegs): lha'i rna ba mngon par sgrub pa dang / dmigs pa dang sems dang rnam par bral ba'i chos rnams la pha rol gyi sems shes pa yod pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' dang bral ba'i chos rnams la sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran
106a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i shes pa yod pa dang / sems dang / lus dang / sgra dang / brtson 'grus dang bral ba'i chos rnams la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa thob pa dang / gnas pa med pa'i chos rnams la dran panye bar gzhag pa sgom pa dang /
106a7(dkon brtsegs): skyed med pa dang 'gag pa med pa'i chos rnams la yang dag pa'i spong ba sgom pa dang / dbang po med pa'i chos rnams la dbang po bstan pa dang / stobs med pa dang nyam chung ba'i chos rnams la stobs
106b1(dkon brtsegs): yongs su rjod pa dang / nye bar zhi ba'i chos rnams la byang chub kyi yan lag bshad pa dang / khyang par med pa'i chos rnams la lam smos pa dang / zhi ba'i mthar song ba'i chos rnams la zhi gnas skyed pa dang /
106b2(dkon brtsegs): rnam par grol ba'i mtshan nyid kyi chos rnams la lhag mthong la mkhas pa dang / rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos rnams la mya ngan las 'das pa smos pa'o zhes/ bcom ldan 'das de
106b3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab lta bu des/ rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa de dang / bu stong po de dag dang / btsun mo'i tshogs de dag la cho 'phrul bstan pa'i chos kyi
106b4(dkon brtsegs): rnam grangs de nyid las brtsams te de lta de ltar chos bstan pa dang / srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so// rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa dang / de'i
106b5(dkon brtsegs): du stong gis ni chos rnams la rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa thob par gyur to// de dag gis bzod pa thob nas sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang rang gi spobs pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
106b6(dkon brtsegs): pa dgra bcom yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab lta bu de la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// ji ltar rgya mtsho'i dbus na ni// lhun po'i rgyal po mdzes pa ltar// de bzhin dge
106b7(dkon brtsegs): dbus na ni// chos kyi rgyal po rnam par mdzes// ji ltar nyi ma 'char ba yis// mun pa thams cad sel ba ltar// de bzhin sangs rgyas mdzod spu yang // sangs rgyas zhing rnams snang bar bgyid// ji ltar zla ba nya ba yis//
107a1(dkon brtsegs): zla ba yongs rdzogs ljang de ltar// sangs rgyas chos rnams rdzogs pa yi// 'jig rten mgon yang ldang de lags// ji ltar me tog pad+ma ni// chab kyi nang du mi gos ltar// de bzhin 'jig rten
107a2(dkon brtsegs): mgon po yang // 'jig rten chos kyis mi gos lags// ji ltar seng ge ri dgas rgyal// nags na sgra skad sgrog pa ltar// de bzhin skyes bu seng ge yang // stong pa nyid kyi sgra skad sgrog/ mchis sam yang na ma mchis
107a3(dkon brtsegs): dang // mchis dang ma mchis thams cad dang // mthar lta ba las rnam 'das pa// nges pa'i seng ge'i sgra nas bgyi// skye ba'am yang na 'jig pa'ang rung // de dag mtshan mar bstan mdzad cing // mi sbya bag thamasachis
107a4(dkon brtsegs): pa nges par seng ge'i sgra zhes bgyi// pha rol dang ni tshu rol dag/ de dag rnam par rtog par bstan// chos rnams kun la mi gnas pa// nges par seng ge'i sgo zhes bgyi// kun nas nyon mongs rnam byang ba// de gnyis mtshan
107a5(dkon brtsegs): nyid ma mchis te// shin tu dri ma ma mchis so// nges par seng ge'i sgra zhes bgyi// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug ni// yongs su rtog las byung ba ste// cog bral rnam rtog ma mchis pa// nges par seng ge'i sgra zhes gyi//
107a6(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das// de dag lam du gzhug pa ste// chos rnams shin tu gsog lags pa// nges par seng ge'i sgra zhes bgyi// skye dang 'chi dang 'khor ba ni// phyin ci log las byung ba ste// mi rtag sdug bsngal bdag med do// /
107a7(dkon brtsegs): nges par seng ge'i sgra zhes bgyi// lha dang dmigs pa gnas lags te// de dag gis ni 'jig rten 'jug/ chos rnams stong par rab bshad po// nges par seng ge'i sgra zhes bgyi// 'jig rten mgon pos tshe 'phrul ni// gang dag
107b1(dkon brtsegs): ji snying bstan mdzad pa// de ga thams cad bshad pa ni// nges par seng ge'i snga zhes kyi// sems ni mnyam pa nyid slad du// rjes su mthun dang mi mthun pa'i// gang la'ang sems ni mi 'jug pa// den rjes mthun brjod pa
107b2(dkon brtsegs): lags// sangs rgyas rnams kyis bshad pa yi// zab cing zhi la mthun pa gyid cing // de la rtsod par mi bgyid pa// de ni rjes mthun bzod pa lags// mi ge thams cad ma gartogs pa// dge chos rnams la
107b3(dkon brtsegs): 'jug 'gyur zhing // de la'ang gnas par mi dgyid pa// de ni rjes mthun bzod pa lags// stong pa'i sgra dang sems can skye// de bzhin lta nga'i sgra dang ni// sgra rnams kun lam chags pa// de ni rjes
107b4(dkon brtsegs): mthun bzod pa lags// sangs rgyas sgra dang nyon mongs sgra// rnam mang chos kyi sgra rnams dang // gang gi sgra la'ang mi rtog pa// de ni rjes mthun bzod pa lags// sbyin dang tshul khrims thos pa dang /
107b5(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus bsam gtan shes rab dang // de bzhin kun la brtson bgyid pa// de ni rjes mthun bzod pa lags// thams cad dag la sems mnyam zhing // byang chub sems nom spong la// byang chub
107b6(dkon brtsegs): lam ni ston bgyid pa// de ni rjes mthun bzod pa lags// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bdag cag la// de 'dra'i chos ni bstan mdzad de// de la som nyi ma mchis pa// de ni rjes mthun bzod pa lags// bdag
107b7(dkon brtsegs): kyang byang chub sangs rgyas shing // seng ge'i sgra skad bsgrags nas ni// ji ltar 'dren pas bstan mdzad pa'i// cho 'phrul nges par bstan par bgyi// zhing 'di bsam gyis mi bya ba ste// bla med bsod nam zhing de la//
108a1(dkon brtsegs): bdag gi sa bon btab pas na// bdag ni slar ldog ma mchis lags// dogs thams cad rdol 'gyur zhing // rgya mtsho 'dabs par 'gyur gdanga' yi// rdzogs sangs rgyas la bskrun pa yi//
108a2(dkon brtsegs): sa bon nams kyang chab mi 'tshal// sems can rnams kyi sems 'tshal cing // nam mkha' gzhal bar rngo thog gi/ byang chub tu ni bskrun pa'i sems// de yi bsod nams tshad ma mchis// bdag gi
108a3(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa ci 'dra ba'i// dbang du lba dang dri za dang // mi rnams gzhan dag ma mchis te// bcom ldan 'das nyid bdag gi dbang // 'dren pa padag ni longs spyod dang // gzugs dang mtho ris mi 'tshal gyi// mi
108a4(dkon brtsegs): mchog khyod kyis mkhyen pa ni// ci 'dra de ltar bdag gyur cig/ byang chub la ni dmigs bgyis nas// bdag gis dgung lo 'bum du ni// ma chags sdang ba ma mchis par// bdag gis bde gshegs bsnyen bkun
108a5(dkon brtsegs): bgyis// bdag gi byis pa stong rnams dang // mchis brang yongs su smin bgyis pa// gang lags 'di dag sangs rgyas kyi// byang chub slad du spro bar mdzad// bdag gis bde gshegs legs mthong zhing//
108a6(dkon brtsegs): chos 'di legs par thos pa dang // byang chub la ni rtag dga' ba// bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed// gang zhig byang chub dga' bgyid pa// de ni chos la'ang rtag tu dga'// chos rnams spong bar mi bgyid pa//
108a7(dkon brtsegs): sems can kun la rtag dga' lags// de nas 'khor de nyid du chos smra ba'i dge slong chos kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba zhig 'dus te 'dug par gyur pa des/ rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa la 'di skad ces
108b1(dkon brtsegs): smras so// rgyal po chen po khyod kyis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul de dang mthun par ma byas kyi/ mi mthun par byas pas na khyod ni gnas ma yin pa la gnas pa yin no// de ci byor zhe na/ rgyal poman
108b2(dkon brtsegs): de byang chub rna chos kyi dbyings kyi gnas pa gnas pas 'jug pa med pa'o// rgyal po chen po byang chub na tshor ba thams cad med pas shes pa med pa'i mtshan cid yin no// rgyal po chen po byang chub na blangs pa
108b3(dkon brtsegs): med cing dor ba med pas blang ba med la dor ba med pa yin no// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni nam mkha'i khams la bris pa dang 'dra bas gzugs med pa/ kha dog med pa/ rtags med pa// dbyibs med pa
108b4(dkon brtsegs): yin no// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pas gnyen po med pa yin no// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni chos thams cad dang mnyam pas thams cad kyi rjes su song ba yin no// rgyal
108b5(dkon brtsegs): po chen po byang chub ni mtshan ma thams cad dang bral bas g.yo ba med pa yin no// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni rab tu zhi ba'i mtshan nyid yin pas zhi ba'o// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni bzhag pa dang bsal ba
108b6(dkon brtsegs): bral bas nye bar zhi ba'o// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni mo mthun pa med pas lhag par g.yo ba med pa'o// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni yongs su grub pa med pas sems mnyam pa'o// rgyal po chen po byang
108b7(dkon brtsegs): chub ni gzod ma nas ma skyes pas sems can dang mtshungs pa'o// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin pas skye ba med pas rab tu bye ba'o// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni sem dang //
109a1(dkon brtsegs): yid dang / rnam par shes pa dang bral bas rnam par rig pa med pa'o// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das pas rgyu ba med pa'o// rgyal po chen po byang chu
109a2(dkon brtsegs): ni rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral bas spros pa med pa'o// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid yin pas stong pa'o// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni mtshan ma thams cad dang bral bas mtshan ma
109a3(dkon brtsegs): med pa'o// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni smon pa dang bral bas smon pa med pa'o// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni las kyi rnam par smin pa med pas mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'o// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni mtshan nyid
109a4(dkon brtsegs): gsum dang bral bas 'dus ma byas pa ste/ rgyal po chen po gang dag byang chub kyi mtshan nyid de lta bu dang / ngo bo nyid de lta bu la sgrub par byed pa dang / gang dag smon lam 'debs par byed pa dang / gang dag mngon par dga' ba
109a5(dkon brtsegs): byed pa dang / gang dag 'dod par byed pa de dag thams cad ni log par rtsol ba yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyal po chen po byang chub ci 'dra bar byang chub sems dpa'i spyong pa'ang de 'dra ba yin pas na/ gang dag de ltar
109a6(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa de dag ni yang dag par spyod pa yin pa'i phyir ro// // bam po gnyis pa// / de nas rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pas/ chos smra ba'i dge slong chos kyi rgyal mtshan
109a7(dkon brtsegs): lo 'di skad ces sbas so// rigs kyi bu khyod byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yang dag pa nyid kyi spyod pa la spobs par gyis shig/ de skad ces smras pa dang / chos smraba'i dge slong chos kyi rgyal mtsha gyi/
109b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po dge ba'i dkod pal 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal po chen po sems can thams cad la rlom sems med pa mnyam pa nyid kyis dog pa thams cad yongs su gtong nga'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
109b2(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa yin no// tshul khrims kyis rlom sems su mi byed pa mnyam pa nyid kyis tshul khrims dang / bslab dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan thams cad yang dag par len pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa
109b3(dkon brtsegs): yin no// brjod pas rlom sems su mi byed pa mnyam pa nyid kyis tha ba dang / khro ba dang / gnod sems dang / 'chab pa'i yongs su gdung ba dang / zhe sdang gi yongs su gdung ba thams cad 'byin par byed pa ni byang
109b4(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// brtson 'grus kyis rlom sems su mi byed pa mnyam pa nyid kyis brtson 'grus brtan zhing 'bar ba dang / zhum pa med pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa
109b5(dkon brtsegs): yin no// bsam gtan gyis rlom sems su mi byed pa mnyam pa nyid kyis bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa sgrub pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
109b6(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa yin no// shes rab kyis rlom sems su mi byed pa mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyan pa'i shes rab kyi tshogs yongs su tshol ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// gnyis dang bral
109b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i btang snyoms mnyam pa nyid kyis tshangs pa'i gnas pa skyed pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// mngon par shes pas rlom sems su mi byed pa mnyam pa nyid kyis mngon par
110a1(dkon brtsegs): shes pa skyed pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// don dang chos la nges par sems pa mnyam pa nyid kyis so so yang dag par rig pa la 'jug pa ni byang chub sems dpa'
110a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// chos kyi dbyings g.yo ba med pa mnyam pa nyid kyis rton pa la rmongs pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// yang dag par skyo ba med pa'i sems kyis nges par sems
110a3(dkon brtsegs): pa mnyam pa nyid kyis byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yang dag par sdud pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// don mthun pa mnyam pa nyid kyis bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi yang dag par 'dzin pa ni
110a4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// sems kyis rlom sems su mi byed pa mnyam pa nyid kyis sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no//
110a5(dkon brtsegs): nam mkha' yongs su dag pa dang / sems yongs su dag pa dang / zhing yongs su dag pa mnyam pa nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no//
110a6(dkon brtsegs): mtshan nyid med pa'i chos la so sor rtog pa mnyam pa nyid kyis mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi tshogs yang dag par sdud pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// lus dang / ngag dang / sems
110a7(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa nyid kyis lus dang / ngag dang / sems brgyan pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// sems can thams cad la bdag med par mnyam pa nyid kyis sems can thams cad bci
110b1(dkon brtsegs): zhig bya snyam du spong ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// rmi lam gyi rang bzhin lta bur mos pa mnyam pa nyid kyis 'khor bas yongs su mi skyo ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// las
110b2(dkon brtsegs): dang las kyi rnam par smin pa la mos pa med pa mnyam pa nyid kyis legs par spyod pa'i las byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// chos sgyu ma lta bur so sor rtog pa mnyam pa nyid kyis
110b3(dkon brtsegs): brtul zhugs dang dka' thub kyi go cha bgos pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// sdug bsngal skye ba med par shes pa mnyam pa nyid kyis sdug bsngal thams cad bzod pa ni byang chub sems
110b4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams kyi spyod ba yin no// mdza' bshes dang mdza' bshes ma yin pa la sems snyoms pa mnyam pa nyid kyis mdza' ba brtan pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyong ba yin no// lan la reb med
110b5(dkon brtsegs): ba mnyam pa nyid kyis lhag pa'i bsam pa la sbyor ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// thos pa dang sgrub pa mnyam pa nyid kyis thos pa tshol bas mi ngoms pa ni byang chub sems dpa'
110b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// zang zing med pa'i chos ston pa mnyam pa nyid kyis chos la slob dpon gyi dpe ma byung med po ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// chos dben pa mnyam pa nyid
