110b7(dkon brtsegs): kyis dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// don dam pa'i daden pa mnyam pa nyid kyis bden pa'i shes pa yongs su tshol ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rnam
111a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi spyod pa yin no// sems can la shin tu 'dud pa mnyam pa nyid kyis nga rgyal nges par bcom pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// yon tan thams cad yang
111a2(dkon brtsegs): dag par blangs pas rlom sems med pa mnyam pa nyid kyis yon tan thams cad yang dag par bsdu ba yongs su tshol ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// de
111a3(dkon brtsegs): nas rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yang dag pa nyid kyi spyod pa de dag thos nas dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / yi rangs pa dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / dga' zhing yid bde
111a4(dkon brtsegs): bskyes nas/ gos dang rgyan ci gyon pa rnams kyis chos smra ba'i dge slong chos kyi rgyal mtshan la mngon par bkab bo// bu stong po de dag gis kyang rang rang gi rgyan dag gis chos smra ba'i dge slong chos kyi rgyal
111a5(dkon brtsegs): mtshan la bkab nas// tshig 'di skad du gang bdag cag gis skyes bu dam pa 'di lta bu la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dag rnyed pa ni bdag cag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do// sems can thams
111a6(dkon brtsegs): cad kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa de lta bu dang / spobs pa de lta bu dag thob par gyur cig ces kyang smras so// de nas chos smra ba'i dge slong chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis/ rgyal po dge ba'i
111a7(dkon brtsegs): bkod pa la 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste/ gos dang rgyan tsam gyis mchod pa de ni mchod pa chen po ma yin gyi// de las gzhan pa'i mchod pa khyad par du 'phags pa dag kyang yod kyis/
111b1(dkon brtsegs): de dag khyod kyis sgrubs shig/ de'ang gang zhe na/ de nas de'i tshe chos smra ba'i dge slong chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// gang dag stong chen sems can de dag kun// byang chub byir ni
111b2(dkon brtsegs): rab tu zhugs kyu cing // mthum sems kyis bskal pa rdzogs par ni// bu dang chung ma'i sbyin pa byas papas// gang gis byang chub phyir ni sems bskyed nas// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su bslab pa dang /
111b3(dkon brtsegs): rab 'byung sems kyis gom pa gcig por rab// de ni de bas bsod nams byed par 'phags// gang dag sngan chad drung ba'i sangs rgyas dang // gang dag ma byon 'byung dang bzhugs pa rnams// de dag skyon mang bab
111b4(dkon brtsegs): ni ma spangs par// bla mad byang chub zhi ba thob pa med// rab 'byung de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis// rab tu bstod cing bsngags la bkur ba ste// gang zhig sangs rgyas kun la mchod 'dod pa// rgyal
111b5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i bstan la rab 'byung gzung bar gyis// gang zhig khyim gnas rin chen khyim brgyan pa'i// gang+gA'i bye snyed sangs rgyas zhing byin dang // gang zhig rab 'byung nyin dang mtshan gcig tu// mi rtag sdug bsngal bdag
111b6(dkon brtsegs): med sems byed na// gang zhig rab 'byung bag yod gyur pa yi// byang chub sems dpa' byang chub nye ba dang // bdud kyi dkyil 'khor shin tu bcom byas shing // dge ba'i phyogs kyang mi 'grib 'phel
111b7(dkon brtsegs): ba yin// rab 'byung de ni lam ngan spangs pa dang // lam gyi rjes mthun 'phags pa'i skye bos bstod// do ni dge ba chung za ma yin zhing // de ni yongs su 'dzin pa spangs pa yin// khyim las grol ba
112a1(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs mi 'phel zhing // nyon mongs rnam grol bdud kyi 'ching ba med// rnam grol sems ni byang chub spyad pa spyod// spyod pa dag pas byang chub rnyed mi dka'/
112a2(dkon brtsegs): de nas rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pas tshigs su bcad pa de dag thos pa dang / 'dod pa'i dga' ba dang / longs spyod pa dang / rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug de dag la mi lta bar gyur cing skyol 'dod chags dang /
112a3(dkon brtsegs): bral ba skyes par gyur te/ rab tu byung ba la sems gzhol bar gnas nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab lta bu de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag legs par gsungs
112a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'thob pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab lta bu des bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po rab tu byung
112a5(dkon brtsegs): ba ni dgag pa med pa ste/ sems can thams cad la'ang bar du mi gcod cing skabs yod do// khyim na gnas pa ni nyon mongs pa'i nang du gnas pa yin gyis/ gal te 'dod na ngas khyod la gdams shing rjes su
112a6(dkon brtsegs): bstan gyis/ khyod kyis kyang btams shing rjes su bstan pa bzhin du bsgrub par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das des rab tu 'byung ba'i skabs phye ba dang / rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pas bu stong po de dag la smras pa/
112a7(dkon brtsegs): khyed cag las rgyal srid sgrub pa dang / sems can rnams chos yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa la spro ba su yod/ de dag thams cad kyis smras pa// yab bdag cag kyang dad pas khyim nas khyim ma mchis par
112b1(dkon brtsegs): rab tu 'byung lags kyis/ bdag cam ma dor bar gsol/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gal te byed cag thams cad rab tu byung na gling bzhi par 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi skye ba'i tshigs thams cad da /
112b2(dkon brtsegs): chudang zos par 'gyur gyis/ byed cag pas gang sems can rnams la brtan pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug par 'thun pades rgyal srid sbubs la/ sems can rnams la chos yang dag par 'dzin du rgyun
112b3(dkon brtsegs): cigade nas rgyal du gzhon nu de dag gi nang nas/ rgyal bu gzhon nu snying rje cher sems shes bya ba des rang gi ba de dang / rgan rabs de dag la tshigs su bcad de smras pa// rab 'byung yon
112b4(dkon brtsegs): tan du ma bsags pa zhes// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis gsungs mod kyi// de lta lags kyang snying rjer gyur pas na// 'gro la phan phyir rgyal srid bdag gis bsgrub// ji srid 'tshe bar bdag ni
112b5(dkon brtsegs): tshangs spyod cing // gso sbyong yan lag brgyang pa blang bar bgyi// me tog rnams dang dri dang byug pa dang // de bzhin chang yang myang bar mi dgyi'o// lus la rgyan rnams kyang ni mi thogs shing // mchil ldum ma/
112b6(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal ron chen gtsug pud min// bri rkang gser las bgyis par mi nyal zhing // rgyal po'i rkyen gyi gos kyang mi 'tshal lo// sil snyan glu dbyangs sgra la mi dga' zhing // rma bya ngang pa'i sgra la'ang dga' mi bkyi
112b7(dkon brtsegs): skye bos mdun bdar bud med gnas spong zhing // gcig pu mal na mchis nyal rlung migayab// bdag ni gling nas gling du mchi bgyi zhing // don pa bcu rnams rab tu bshad par bgyi// khyim na gnas pa'i nongs
113a1(dkon brtsegs): pa bstan bgyi zhing // rab tu 'byung ba'i bsngags pa'ang brjod par bgyi// gzugs dang longs spyod dbang phyug dregs pa yis// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun bgrod mi
113a2(dkon brtsegs): bgyi// byang chub sems ni bskud par mi bgyi zhing // rtag tu yid 'byung srid gsum spyad par bgyi// skyon dang snyan smra de na spyod don mthun pas// sems can bsdu ba la ni brtson bgyi zhing // bla med
113a3(dkon brtsegs): theg chen dam pa 'di la yang // srog chags bye ba mang po yongs smin bgyi// chos don mnyan cing bshad par bgyi slad du// nyin mo dus gsum mtshan mo dus gsum du// ri rab lta bu'i spyan sngar
113a4(dkon brtsegs): nyer mchi zhing // de bzhin gshegs pa la ni mchod pa'ang bgyi/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab lta bu des// rgyal bu gzhon nu snying rje char sems la logs so
113a5(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba byin te/ skyes bu dam pa legs so legs so// bslab pa brgyad kyi tshul khrims yang dag par blangs pa'i chos kyi yon tan des na/ khyim par gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang rab tu byung ba
113a6(dkon brtsegs): dang yon tan mtshungs pa yin no// khyod kyi snying rje chen po des na rab tu byung ba'i yon tan bsgrub pa'ang sgrub par byed pa yin no// de nas rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pas rgyal bu gzhon nu stong
113a7(dkon brtsegs): cher sems rgyal srid la bzhag nas/ bu stong du gcig gis ma tshang ba dang / lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan pa la dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar gyur to// de dag rab tu byung nas kyang
113b1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa des cho 'phrul bstan pa 'di nyid kyis de lta de ltar btams shing rjes su bstan pas/ de dag gis ring po ma thogs par mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed par gyur to// gzugs dang / dran pa dang / chos mnyan
113b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i shes pa'ang bskyed par gyur to// rgyal bu gzhon nu snying rje cher sems kyang rgyal srid la dbang bskur nas/ zla banya'o cog na gling chen po bzhi po dag du rjes su ston par byed de/ ci nas kyang srog chags dung phyur
113b3(dkon brtsegs): phrag dgu dang / bye ba phrag gnyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar sems can rnams la chos ston par gyur to// de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan
113b4(dkon brtsegs): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab lta bu de'i bstan pa la dad pas khyim nas phyi ma med par rab tu byung nas theg pa chen po 'dis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa sha stab tu
113b5(dkon brtsegs): gyur to// shA ra dwa ti'i bu khyod kyis ji tsam du dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / yongs su sbyang ba byas pa'i sems can rnams kyi rten du gyur cing / dad pa bskyed par gyur pa'i gsung rab de la ltos
113b6(dkon brtsegs): shA ra dwa ti'i bu de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod som nyidang yid gnyis za bar gyur na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu khyod
113b7(dkon brtsegs): kyis de ltar ming lta ste/ lnga'i bu ded dpon 'di'i de de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dag pa'i bkod pa zhes bya bar gyur to// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de'i tshe de'i dus na chos smra ba'i dge slong chos kyi rgyal mtshan
114a1(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod som nyi dang yid gnyis dra bar gyur na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di cid de'i tshe de'i dus
114a2(dkon brtsegs): na chos smra ba'i dge slong chos kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya bar gyur to// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa de'i bu stong tham par gyur pa de dag gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du byong som ci dang yid gnyis
114a3(dkon brtsegs): za bar gyur na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid kyi sangs rgyas stong po de dag de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa de'i bu stong tham par gyur to// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de'i tshe de'i
114a4(dkon brtsegs): dus na rgyal bu gzhon nu snying rje cher sems shes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod som nyi dang yid gnyis za bar gyur na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal
114a5(dkon brtsegs): du gzhon nu snying rje cher sems shes bya bar gyur to// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' bag yod pa rnams ni/ lhag pa'i bsam pa dang shes bzhin gyi spyod pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
114a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub tu nges par byung ba yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon gyi tshul dang ldan pa'i gtam 'di bshad pa na/ lha dang mi rnams kyi skye dgu las srog chags sum khri nyis stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
114a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal khyod ni lha'i bu ded dpon 'di dang lhan
114b1(dkon brtsegs): cig tu yun ring po nas tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa dang / sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas shing dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa yin no// 'jam dpal gyis sbas pa/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshangs par spyod pa
114b2(dkon brtsegs): zhes byung de ni/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i tshig blangags yin la/ lam ni 'dus byas yin gyi/ kho bo na 'dus ma byas su togs pa yin pas/ de'i phyir 'i bo ni yun ring po nas tshangs par spyad pa
114b3(dkon brtsegs): ma yin no// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni spyod pa'i mtshan nyid yin gyi/ khe bo ni spyod pa med pa dang rab tu spyod pa med pa yin te/ de'i phyir kho bo ni yun ring po nas tshangs par spyod
114b4(dkon brtsegs): ba ma yin no// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su sbyor ba yin gyi/ khe bo ni gnas su sbyor ba'ang ma yin la/ gnyis su med par sbyor ba'ang ma yin te/ de'i phyir be rje
114b5(dkon brtsegs): yun ring po nas tshangs par spyad pa ma yin no// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni nyon mongs pa'i gnyen po yin gyi/ khe bo ni gnyen pos rab tu phye ba ma yin te/ de'i phyir kho bo ni
114b6(dkon brtsegs): yun ring po nas tshangs par spyad pa ma yin no// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos las 'byol ba yin gyi/ kho bo ni
114b7(dkon brtsegs): gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos las 'byol ba ma yin te/ de'i phyir kho bo ni yun ring po nas tshangs par spyad pa ma yin no// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu tshangs par spyod pa zhes
115a1(dkon brtsegs): bya ba de ni bdud kyi lam las yang dag par 'da' ba yin gyi/ kho bo ni bdud kyi lam las yang dag par 'da' ba ma yin te/ de'i phyir kho bo ni yun ring po nas tshangs par spyad pa ma yin no// btsun
115a2(dkon brtsegs): pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad yin gyi/ kho bo ni dge ba dang sdig pa la nges par sbyor ba mi byed de/ de'i phyir kho bo ni yun ring po nas tshangs par spyad pa ma
115a3(dkon brtsegs): yin no// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi skyon med pa thob pa yin gyi/ kho bo ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi skyon med pa thob pa ma yin te/ de'i phyir
115a4(dkon brtsegs): kho bo ni yun ring po nas tshangs par spyad pa ma yin no// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni 'khor ba las 'byol ba yin gyi/ kho bo ni 'khor ba las 'byol ba ma yin te/ de'i phyir kho bo ni
115a5(dkon brtsegs): yun ring po nas tshangs par spyad pa ma yin no// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni mya ngan las 'da' ba'i lam du 'gro ba yin gyi/ kho bo ni mya ngan las 'da' ba don du gnyer ba ma yin
115a6(dkon brtsegs): te/ de'i phyir kho bo ni yun ring po nas tshangs par spyad pa ma yin no// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du 'jam dpal khyod ni sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa yin no zhes
115a7(dkon brtsegs): zer ba ni/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa la ni bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni gzugs med cing bstan du med pa yin pas/ de la bsnyen
115b1(dkon brtsegs): bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni tshor ba med cing tshor ba thams cad rgyu na bcad pa yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'dus shes med cing
115b2(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes kyi mdung pa thams cad dang bral ba yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'du byed rnams med cing 'dus ma byas bsnyen pa yin pas// de la bsnyen bdur
115b3(dkon brtsegs): bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni rnam par shes pa med cing yid gnas pa med pa yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni mig dang gzugs kyi yul
115b4(dkon brtsegs): ma yin zhing stong pa nyid kyi spyod yul yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni rna ba dang sgra'i yul ma yin zhing mtshan ma med pa'i mu yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya
115b5(dkon brtsegs): bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni sna dang dri'i yul ma yin zhing gnyis dang bral ba yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni lce dang ro'i yul ma yin zhing
115b6(dkon brtsegs): rnam par rig pa med pa'i mtshan cing yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni lus dang reg bya'i yul ma yin zhing thogs pa med pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas/
115b7(dkon brtsegs): de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni yid dang chos kyi yul ma yin zhing chos kyi dbyings su yang dag par 'du ba yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin
116a1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa ni de bzhin nyid la gnas pa yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni yang dag pa'i mtha' dang mthun par zhugs pa yin pas/
116a2(dkon brtsegs): de la bsten bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos kyi dbyings kyis rab tu phye ba yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni chen po stong pa nyidadi la zhugs pa yin pas/
116a3(dkon brtsegs): de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni spros pa thams cad yang dag par chad pa
116a4(dkon brtsegs): yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni dmigs pa med pa la bzhugs pa yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni rnam par
116a5(dkon brtsegs): shes pa la mi gnas pa yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gang shegs pa ni khams gsum na mi gnas pa yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin
116a6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa ni zag pa med pa yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'jig rten 'di dang 'jig rten pha rol la mi gnas pa yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur
116a7(dkon brtsegs): bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni zhi zhing rab tu zhi lenye bar zhi ba yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni lus dang / ngag dang / yid dang bral ba yin pas/
116b1(dkon brtsegs): de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin ga shegs pa ni kha dog dang / gzugs dang / dbyibs dang bral ba yin pas// de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni rnam
116b2(dkon brtsegs): cad du ma spang cing ba na mtho ba med pa yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni spyod lam thams cad la yang dag par mi gnas pa yin pas// de la bsnyen bku
116b3(dkon brtsegs): bya bar mi nus pa dang / btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni thams cad du skur pa gdab tu med cing nam mkha' la bris pa lta bu yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa'i phyir ro// btsun
116b4(dkon brtsegs): pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du 'jam dpal khyod ni dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa yin no zhes zer ba la// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu dge ba'i rtsa ba de ni 'jig tshogs rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / ma rig pa dang srid pa'i
116b5(dkon brtsegs): sred pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / phyin ci log bzhi rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / phung po lnga rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / skye mched drug rtsa ba ma yin pa dang /
116b6(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa'i gnas bdun rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / log pa brgyad rtse ba ma yin pa dang / kun nas mnar sems kyi dngos po dgu rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / sems can gyi gnas dgun pa ma yin pa dang /
116b7(dkon brtsegs): mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rtsa ba ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu bgrod pa gcig pa'i lam la mngon par zhen pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang // rig pa dang rnam
117a1(dkon brtsegs): par grol ba la yongs su rtog pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi daslab pa dang / lhag pa'i sems kyi bslab pa dang / lhag pa'i shes rab kyi bslab pas rlom
117a2(dkon brtsegs): sems su byed pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / bden pa bzhi po dag la yongs su rtog pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / dbang po lngar 'du shes pa rwa ma yin pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug la dmigs pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang /
117a3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi lam bdun la sgro 'dogs pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas rlom sems su byed pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la lta ba
117a4(dkon brtsegs): skyed pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / mi slob pa'i chos bcu la mngon par zhen pa rtsa ba ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no// phung po'i bdud rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i bdud rtsa ba ma yin pa dang /
117a5(dkon brtsegs): 'chi bdag gi bdud rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / lha'i bu'i bdud rtsa ba ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no// sgrib partsa ba ma yin pa dang / chod pa dang kun nas ldang ba rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / 'gyod pa rtsa ba ma yin
117a6(dkon brtsegs): pa gang yin pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no// bdag tu lta ba rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / sems can du ltu brtsa ba ma yin pa dang / srog tu lta ba rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / gso ba dang gang zag tu lta ba rdza ba ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni dge
117a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rtsa ba yin no// 'byung bar lta rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / 'jig par lta ba rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / chad par lta rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / rtag par lta ba rtsa ba ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no//
117b1(dkon brtsegs): tshul bzhin ma min pa cang ma yin pa dang / ma rig pa cang ma yin pa dang / 'du byed rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / ming dang gzugs rna ba ma yin pa dang skye mched drug cub ma yin dang/
117b2(dkon brtsegs): reg pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / tsher brtsang ma yin pa dang / sred pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / len pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / srid pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / skye brtsa ba ma yin pa dang / rga shi d+ha ba ma yin pa dang / nang dang /
117b3(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'brug pa rtsa ba ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no// 'dod pa'i khams ca ba ma yin pa dang / gzugs kyi khams rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / gzugs med pa'i
117b4(dkon brtsegs): khams rtsa ba ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no// sbyin pas rlom sems su byed pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang /
117b5(dkon brtsegs): shes rab kyis rlom sems su byed pa rtsa ba ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no// byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms kyis rlom sems su byed pa rtsa ba ma yin pa/
117b6(dkon brtsegs): gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas 'dod pa rtsa ba ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no// byams pa chen po dang /
117b7(dkon brtsegs): snying rje chen po'i rtsa ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems mi 'dor ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i rtsa ba dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i rtsa ba dang
118a1(dkon brtsegs): bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i rtsa ba dang / rnam par smin pa la re ba med pa'i rtsa ba dang / tshul khrims dang bslab pa thams cad yang dag par len pa'i rtsa ba dang / brgya byin sa/
118a2(dkon brtsegs): tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba'ang mi 'dod pa'i rtsa ba dang / bzod pa dang / zhi ba dang / dul ba dang / nges pa'i rtsa ba dang / bdag dang gzhan la'ang mi gnod pa'i rtsa ba dang / brtan pa'i brtson 'grus chen po
118a3(dkon brtsegs): rtsom pa'i rtsa ba dang / dman pa'i chos yang dag par mi sdud pa'i rtsa ba dang / bsam gtan gyi rtsa ba dang / bsam gtan gyi ro myang bar mi byed pa'i rtsa ba dang / shes rab kyi rtsa ba dang / gtang snyoms kyang ma yin pa'i
118a4(dkon brtsegs): rtsa ba dang / thabs kyi rtsa ba dang / thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i rtsa ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no// dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyan mi gcod pa'i rtsa ba dang / stobs bcu dang /
118a5(dkon brtsegs): mi 'jigs pa'i rtsa ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su sgrub pa'i rtsa ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no// lus dang / ngag dang / sems kyi rgyan gyi rtsa ba gang yin pa da ni
118a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no// gzungs kyi shes pa thob pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no// spobs pa mi mchod pa'i rtsa ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba
118a7(dkon brtsegs): ca yin no// mngon par shes pa dang rig pa thob pa'i rtsa ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa'i rtsa ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems
118b1(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i dge ba'i rtswa yin no// byang chub kyi snying por 'gro byin gyis rlod pa'i dra ba gang yin pa dang / lan gsum du bzlas te chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa bcu gnyis su sbyor ba'i rna ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub
118b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas don gyi gzhi rnam par nges par bstan pa gsum po 'di bshad pa na/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des legs so zhes bya ba byin
118b3(dkon brtsegs): nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des/ bcom ldan 'das dang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la me tog rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis mngon par gtor nas/ tshig 'di skad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing gangan
118b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gnas pa der ni de bzhin gshegs pa gnyis byung ba yin mar rig par bya'o// sems can gang dag 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bstan pa 'di thos na mi skrag mi dang
118b5(dkon brtsegs): zhing / dngang bar mi 'gyur ba de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan don dang ldan pa ma yin no// de dag gis ni bdud kyi las thams cad bkag pa yin no// de dag ni theg pa chen po la snang ba thob pa yin no zhes
118b6(dkon brtsegs): kyang smras so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor nges smras pa la rjes su thugs rangs pa mdzad nas/ lha'i bu ded dpon la 'di skad ces bka'
118b7(dkon brtsegs): stsal to// lha'i bu gang dag 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bshad pa de thos nas mos par 'gyur ba de 'ang cho 'phrul chen po yin te// de dag ni de las gzhan pa'i tshe 'dru la nam gyis skrag par mi 'gyur ro//
119a1(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu 'di lta ste/ rtag par 'du shes pa'i sems can rnams la mi rtag par bshad pa dang / bde bar 'du shes pa rnams la sdug bsngal bar bshad pa dang / bdag tu
119a2(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes pa rnams la bdag med par bshad pa dang / sdug par 'du shes pa rnams la mi sdug par bshad pa dang / dngos por 'du shes pa rnams la dngos po med par bshad pa dang / lta bar 'du shes pa rnams//
119a3(dkon brtsegs): ba steng pa'ang shad pa dang / mtshan mar 'du shes pa rnams la mtshan ma med par bshad pa dang / khams gsum par 'du shes pa rnams la smon pa med par bshad pa dang / ngar 'dzin pa dang nga yir 'dzin
119a4(dkon brtsegs): par 'du shes pa rnams la lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad dang bral bar bshad pa de ni 'jig rten gyi 'jigs pa chen po yin te/ gang dag de la skrag par mi 'gyur ba de dag ni yang dag par dul ba yin pas na/
119a5(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par dul ba rnams ni gang la'ang skrag par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de gang las skrag par 'gyur ba'i chos 'di lta ste/ ngar 'dzin pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa yongs su/
119a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa de dag des yong sum bzungs pas/ yongs su ma bzung ba la rten med pa dang / rten med pa la g.yo ba med pa dang / g.yo ba med pa la 'gul ba med pa dang / 'gul ba med pa la brang ba med pa dang
119a7(dkon brtsegs): blang ba med pa la dor ba med pa dang / dor ba med pa la 'dzin pa med pa dang / 'dzin pa med pa la mchog tu 'dzin pa med pa dang / mchog tu 'dzin pa med pa la phyin ci log med pa dang / phyin ci log med pa la log
119b1(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid med pa dang / log pa nyid dang bral ba ni yang dag par sgrub pa yin pa dang / yang dag par bsgrub pa ni yang dag par lta yin pa dang / yang dag par lta ba ni yang dag pa'i ting 'dzin gyi bar nga
119b2(dkon brtsegs): yin pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting 'dzin la gnas pa la rnam par g.yeng ba med pa dang / sems rnam par mi g.yeng ba la gnas pa med pa dang / sems mi gnas pa la gnas med pa dang / sems kyisan
119b3(dkon brtsegs): med pa la rnam par shes pa'i gnas med pa dang / rnam par rig pa med pa la brtag cing bsal ba med pa dang / brtag cing bsal ba dang bral bas dmigs pa spangs pa dang / dmigs pa med par
119b4(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa la sgrib pa med pa dang / sgrib pa med par gnas pa la rlom sems med pa dang / gang gi tshe rlom sems med pa de'i tshe lhag par rlom pa med pa dang / gang gi tshe lhag par rlom pa med pa de'i tshe bdag
119b5(dkon brtsegs): dang gzhan du mthong ba med pa dang / mthong ba med pa la yongs su gdung ba med pa dang / yongs su gdung ba med pa la sgyid lug pa med pa dang / sgyid lug pa med pa la nyon mongs pa'i rgyu med pa dang / nyon mongs
119b6(dkon brtsegs): pa can ma yin pa'i sems la bsal bsnang ba dang / bsal ba thob pas ye shes mthong ba dang / ye shes mthong ba la gnas pa'i sems kyi shes pa rgya che ba dang / sems kyi shes pa rgya chen po la gnas pa
119b7(dkon brtsegs): la bdud kyis glags mi rnyed pa dang / bdud dang phyir rgol ba nges par bcom pa la sgrib pa med pa mngon du 'gyur ba dang / sgrib pa med pa la gnas pa la sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro//
120a1(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu gang byas pa med cing skye ba med pa'i chos rnams la chos kyi go rims kyi mtshams sbyar ba de ltar ston pa de'ang cho 'phrul chen po yin no// de nas tshe dang ldan
120a2(dkon brtsegs): pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// kho bo cag 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la ci dang ci 'dri bde dang de nyid kyi tshig gi mtshams las sangs rgyas kyi chos thams
120a3(dkon brtsegs): cad sdang ngo // 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad ni bdag po med pa ste/ de dag ni ji ltar 'dod pa de bzhin du sgrub par byed do// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad ni mi
120a4(dkon brtsegs): zad pa ste/ de dag ni ji ltar 'dod pa de bzhin du ston par byed do// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad ni bem po ste/ de dag ni ji ltar 'dod pa de bzhin du rjod par byed do// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad ni ther
120a5(dkon brtsegs): zug tu gnas pa ma yin pa ste/ de dag ni ji ltar 'dod pa de bzhin du rnam par 'jog par byed do// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad ni mthong ba med pa ste/ de dag ni ji ltar 'dod pa de bzhin du rnam par dgod par
120a6(dkon brtsegs): byed do// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad ni btang snyoms pa ste/ de dag ni ji ltar 'dod pa de bzhin du 'chad par byed do// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i du chos de dag ni gang nas kyang ma blangs gang du'ang ma khrid pa/
120a7(dkon brtsegs): ste/ de dag ni bsags pa'ang ma yin/ spangs pa'ang ma yin no// de dag ni bshad kyang rung ma bshad kyang rung ste/ chos kyi bzhin nyid de mi 'dor yin no// sems can thams cad kyi yi ge 'byung ba gang yin pa/
120b1(dkon brtsegs): dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos bstan pa'i yi ge 'byung dgang yin pa'i yi ge de dag thams cad ni lus las kyang ma byung / sems las kyang ma byung ste/ rgyu dang rkyen nyid las byung ba yin no// ji ltar yi ge
120b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams la bsags pa med pa de bzhin du sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams pa rang bsags pa med do// ji ltar sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams la bsags pa med pa de bzhin du
120b3(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs pa'i dmigs pa thams cad la'ang bsags pa med do// ji ltar nyon mongs pa'i dmigs pa thams cad la bsags pa med pa de bzhin du shes pa gang gis nyon mongs pa rnams spangs pa'i/
120b4(dkon brtsegs): shes pa de la'ang bsags pa med de/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad ni shes pas gang mi gnas pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams spangs pa de'ang cho 'phrul chen po yin no//
120b5(dkon brtsegs): nas lha'i bu ded dpon gyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes pa gang yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu
120b6(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal yongs su shes pa'i shes pa dang / phung po yongs su spang ba la yongs su skyo ba med pa'i shes pa dang / kun 'byung ba shes pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bsdu ba shes pa dang /
120b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gog pa shes pa dang / skye ba dang 'byung ba shes pa dang / lam shes pa dang / lam ngan pa rnam par bcad pa shes pa dang / rgyu shes pa dang // chung mi za ba shes pa dang / 'bras bu shes pa dang /
121a1(dkon brtsegs): bya/ mngon sum du bya ba spang ba shes pa dang / rkyen shes pa dang / tshogs bsags pa shes pa dang / bden pa shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la lta zhing thob par bya ba shes pa dang /
121a2(dkon brtsegs): rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba shes pa dang / 'byung ba shes la mngon par zhen pa med pa shes pa dang / phung po shes pa dang / phung po'i bdud spang ba shes pa dang / khams shes pa dang / chos kyi dbyings
121a3(dkon brtsegs): dbyer med pa shes pa dang / skye mched shes pa dang / grong stong pa lta bur so sor rtog pa shes pa dang / sbyin pa shes pa dang / dus dang dus ma yin pa las mi 'da' ba shes pa dang / tshul khrims shes
121a4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / tshul khrims 'chal pa'i sems can yongs su smin par bya ba shes pa dang / bzod pa shes pa dang / sems can rjes su bsrungs pa shes pa dang / brtson 'grus shes pa dang / legs par bya ba'i/
121a5(dkon brtsegs): las bya ba shes pa dang / bsam gtan shes pa dang / bsam gtan las ldog pa shes pa dang / shes rab shes pa dang / lta ba yongs su shes pa shes pa dang / thabs shes pa dang / sems can yongs
121a6(dkon brtsegs): su smin par bya ba shes pa dang / byams pa shes pa dang / sems can bskyab pa shes pa dang / snying rje shes pa dang // yongs su mi skyo ba shes pa dang / dga' ba shes pa dang / chos la dga' zhing rab tu
121a7(dkon brtsegs): dga' la mchog tu dga' ba shes pa dang / btang snyoms shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su bsgrub pa shes pa dang / sems can gzhug dpa shes pa dang / tha snyad shes pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag
121b1(dkon brtsegs): ba shes pa dang / gnas med pa la gnas pa shes pa dang / yang dag pa'i spong ba shes pa dang / mnyam pa nyid dang mi 'gal ba shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa shes pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa
121b2(dkon brtsegs): so sor rtog pa shes pa dang / dad pa'i dbang po dang stobs shes pa dang / chags pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba shes pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang stobs shes pa dang / nyon mongs
121b3(dkon brtsegs): pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa shes pa dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang stobs shes pa dang / chos thams cad mi brjod pa shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang stobs shes pa dang / chos thams cad
121b4(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa nyid du shes pa dang / shes rab kyi dbang po dang stobs shes pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag shes pa dang / rang byung gi
121b5(dkon brtsegs): ye shes rjes su rtog pa shes pa dang / lam shes pa dang / lam ngan pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba shes pa dang / snying rje chen po la lhag par dmigs pa shes pa dang / zad pa shes pa
121b6(dkon brtsegs): dang dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mi zad pa shes pa dang / skye ba med pa shes pa dang / mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa shes pa dang / sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku yongs su
121b7(dkon brtsegs): 'grub pa shes pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa shes pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor ba shes pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa shes pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun yang
122a1(dkon brtsegs): dag par 'du ba shes pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa shes pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba shes pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa shes pa dang / smon lam/
122a2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba shes pa dang / lha rjes su dran pa shes pa dang / sdig pa thams cad mi bya ba shes pa dang / sems can gyi dbang po shes pa dang / rim pa rjes su rtogs pa shes pa
122a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / thos pa'i tshogs yongs su rdzogs par bya ba shes pa dang / tshogs thams cad kyis mi ngoms pa shes pa dang / sman thams cad shes pa dang / rkyen ji lta ba bzhin du sbyor ba shes pa dang / gnas dang /
122a4(dkon brtsegs): gnas ma yin pa shes pa dang / gnas ma yin pa mi bya bar shes pa dang / stobs bcu shes pa dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi theg pa dang rjes su mthun pa shes pa dang / mi 'jigs pa/
122a5(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang / bar du gcod pa dang bar du gcod pa ma yin pa'i chos rjes su rtogs pa shes pa dang / 'das pa'i dus la ma thogs pa'i shes pa dang / rnam par shes pa mi gnas par shes pa dang /
122a6(dkon brtsegs): ma 'ongs pa'i dus lam thogs pa'i shes pa dang / chos thams cad las yang dag par mi 'da' ba shes pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus lam thogs pa'i shes pa dang / gnas pa med pa dang rab tu
122a7(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa med pa shes pa dang / lus sngon du 'gro ba shes pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi lus la 'jug pa shes pa dang / ngag sngon du 'gro ba shes pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sgra rab tu
122b1(dkon brtsegs): dbye ba shes pa dang / yid sngon du 'gro ba shes pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa rnam par g.yo ba rjes su rtogs pa'i shes pa dang / 'brul pa med pa'i shes pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi
122b2(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul pa rjes su rtogs pa'i shes pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang bral ba shes pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa dang rjod pa nye bar zhi bar bya ba shes pa dang / mi brjod pa'i shes pa dang / sems rnam
122b3(dkon brtsegs): bar g.yengs pa'i sems can dran pa la 'jog pa shes pa dang / dgongs pa rangab tu 'dzin pa shes pa dang / sems can le lo can yongs su gzung ba shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa shes pa dang /
122b4(dkon brtsegs): gdul ba'i sems can 'dul ba rjes su rtogs pa'i shes pa dang / thabs shes pa dang / shes rab shes pa ste/ lhang du de ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa yin te/ shes pa de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems/
122b5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' ni sangs rgyas kyi ye shes chags pa med pa 'thob bo// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji tsam du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dang / 'jig rten gsum po
122b6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad las byung bar du 'phags pa'i shes pa de ni ngo mtshar te/ shes pa de ni go cha ngan ngon dang ldan pas yang dag par bsdu bar mi nus so// 'jam dpal gang de lta bu'i shes pa skyed par byed pa derang
122b7(dkon brtsegs): cho 'phrul chen po yin no// / bam po gsum pa ste tha ma/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' go cha legs par bgos pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/
123a1(dkon brtsegs): lha'i du gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sems can rnams la skrag par mi 'gyur ba de lta bu ni byang chub sems dpa' go cha legs par bgos
123a2(dkon brtsegs): ba yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya/ smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub kyi gnas kyi rjes su 'jug pas byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci'i phyir sems
123a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po zhes bya/ smras pa/ lha'i bu brtsam pa chen po nyams 'og tu chud par byed pa dang / ye shes chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed pas sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// smras pa/ 'jam dpal tsan
123a4(dkon brtsegs): phyir sems can mchog ces bya// smras pa/ lha'i bu shes rab kyis gzung ba med pa'i chos la 'jug pa dang / thabs kyis chos thams cad yang dag par bsdus pas de'i phyir sems can mchog ces bya'o//
123a5(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci'i phyir sems can dag pa zhes bya/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang nyon mongs pa'i dri ma rnams dang lhan cig mi gnas shing sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa spang ba'i phyir/
123a6(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus rtsom par yang byed pas de'i phyir sems can dag pa zhes bya'o// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci'i phyir sems can rnam par dag pa zhes bya// smras pa/ lha'i bu 'di ltar sems can thams cad
123a7(dkon brtsegs): nges par 'byung ba'i lam rnam par sbyong bar byed pas de'i phyir sems can rnam par dag pa zhes bya'o// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci'i phyir 'dren pa zhes bya/ smras pa/ lha'i bu 'di ltar lam de la gnas nas
123b1(dkon brtsegs): sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa dag yongs su smin par byed pas de'i phyir 'dren pa zhes bya'o// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci'i phyir rnam par 'dren pa zhes bya/ smras pa/ lha'i bu 'di ltar gang ba 'i
123b2(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams shin tu 'dul ba la rab tu 'god par byed pas de'i phyir rnam par 'dren pa zhes bya'o// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dpa' ba yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu ji tsam
123b3(dkon brtsegs): gyis bdud dang phyir rgol ba nges par bcom zhing / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir sring pa len par byed pa de tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa'adapa' ba yin no// smras pa// 'jam dpal
123b4(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' thul bar dka' ba yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu 'di ltar sngon dam bcas pa dang / sngon gyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pas nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa
123b5(dkon brtsegs): dag la 'dod par mi byed pa de lta bu ni thul bar dka' ba yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mngon par 'phags pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe 'phags pa'i shes rab
123b6(dkon brtsegs): dang thabs kyis sems can yongs su smon par bya ba dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir kun tu snang ba de tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' mngon par 'phags pa yin no// smras pa/ 'jam
123b7(dkon brtsegs): dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos smra ba yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe sangs rgyas kyis yongs su gzung ba'i tshig gis sems can thams cad kyi nyes par smra bzil gyis gnon par byed pa de lta
124a1(dkon brtsegs): du ni chos smra ba yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na 'dul ba smra ba yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe bangag tshul khrims la gnas la sems can thams cad kyi 'gyod pa dang kun nas/
124a2(dkon brtsegs): ldang ba rnam par bsal ba'i phyir chos ston par byed pa de lta bu ni 'dul ba smra ba yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na don smra ba yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe chos thos pa thams cad la nan tan snying por byed
124a3(dkon brtsegs): cing don rjes su rtogs pa de lta bu ni don smra ba yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la phan pa'i gzhi phun sum tshogs pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe
124a4(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bsgrubs pa thams cad sems can rnams la stobs par byed pa de lta bu ni/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i gzhi phun sum tshogs pa yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang
124a5(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' drang po yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe bdag gi nyes pa mi 'chab pa de lta bu ni drang po yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dam pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi
124a6(dkon brtsegs): tshe sems can 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi gya gyu can rnams la khong khro dar mi byed pa de'i phyir dam pa yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na g.yo med pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe ji
124a7(dkon brtsegs): skad smras pa'i tshig las mi 'da' ba de lta du ni g.yo med pa yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na skye med pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe ji ltar sems kyis mngon par bsgrubs pa de bzhin du tshig tu brjod/
124b1(dkon brtsegs): ba de lta bu ni sna med pa yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar nang rgyal med pa yin/ smras pa/ lu'i bu gang gi tshe sems can thams cad la 'dud par byed cing mi dge ba mi byed pa de lta du rnyeng d+hal med pa yin no//
124b2(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpar sbyin bdag yin/ smras pa/ lnga'i bu gang gi tshe yongs su bsdus pa'i byang chub kyang gtong bar byed na/ dngos po gzhan dag lta smos kyang ci dgos pas
124b3(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe gang tshul khrims 'tshal ba mthong na srog gi phyir yang byang chub kyi sems mi gtong ba yin no// smras pa/
124b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal ji ltar na bzod pa smrad yin/ smras pa/ lha'i du gang gi tshe gnod pa 'azod cing gzhan la gnod pa mi byed pa yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na brtson 'grus dang ldan pa yin/ smras pa/
124b5(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu gang rnam par bsams na/ chos 'ga' yang mi dmigs pa yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na bsam gtan la bsam gtan pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang 'dod pa'i khams su
124b6(dkon brtsegs): phyis mi snang ba yin no// smras pa// 'jam dpal ji ltar na shes rab dang ldan pa yin/ smras pa/ gang shes rab kyis bya ba sgrub par mi byed pa yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byams pa
124b7(dkon brtsegs): la gnas pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe sems can gyi khams la stong pa nyid du rnam par lta nga yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na snying rje la gnas pa yin/ smras pa// lha'i bu gang gi
125a1(dkon brtsegs): tshe chos thams cad nam mkha' lta bur shes nus/ byang chub la brtson 'grus mi 'dor ba yin no// spras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na dga' ba la gnas pa yin/ smras pa/
125a2(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu grang gi tshe thub cing zhi la rab tu zhi ba thob cing chos yongs su tshol ba la dga' bas mi ngoms pa yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na btang snyoms la gnas pa yin/ smras pa
125a3(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu sems can yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir 'jig rten na spyod kyang 'jig rten gyi chos rnams kyis mi 'phrogs pa yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lus
125a4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe yid las byung ba'i lus kyis sems can thams cad kyi lus dang mthun par ston pa yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na ngag
125a5(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe sems can thams cad kyi sgra yongs su rdzogs pas 'bras bu yod par chos ston pa yin no// smras pa / 'jam dpal ji ltar na sems
125a6(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe sems gcig gis sems can thams cad kyi sems rnams rab tu shes pa yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems
125a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' lha'i mig dang ldan pa yin// smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe gzugs snang ba thams cad kyang mthong la/ gzugs dben par yang ston pa yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na lha'i
125b1(dkon brtsegs): rna brjod pa yin/ sbas pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe sgra thams cad thos la sgra dben par yang ston pa yin no// sbas pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na pha rol gyi sems la mkhas pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i dus
125b2(dkon brtsegs): gi tshe sems skyes pa zhig par gyur pa rnams kyi sems kyi rgyun rab tu shes pa yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na sngon gyi gnas la mkhas pa yin/ smras pa/ lnga'i bu gang gi tshe sngon gyi
125b3(dkon brtsegs): mtha'i mu rjes su dran zhing yang dag pa'i mtha' las kyang mi g.yo ba yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na rdzu 'phrul gyi bya ba shes pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang dadung thams cad kyang ston la/
125b4(dkon brtsegs): bdud kyi las rnams kyis kyang mi gos pa yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na 'dul ba yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe ma dul ba rnams 'dul ba yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal
125b5(dkon brtsegs): ltar na bsrungs pa yin/ smras pa/ lnga'i bu dbang po thams cad mi g.yeng ba yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na rnam par dul ba yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe mi 'khrugs pa'i chos su
125b6(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na zhi ba yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu nyon mongs pa'i yongs su gdung ba thams cad kyis gdung ba med la/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa spang ba'i
125b7(dkon brtsegs): phyir yang chos ston pa yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na dad pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang sangs rgyas kyi sku'i gzugs kyis phye'ang mi phyed pa yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub
126a1(dkon brtsegs): #sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa yin/ spras pa/ lha'i du gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad 'byung chub ga las par mthong ba yin no// bstan pa 'di/
126a2(dkon brtsegs): bshad pa na srog chags bri nyis stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so// byang chub sems dpa' lnga ban+d+ha ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to//
126a3(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la legs so zhes bya byir te/ 'jam dpal legs so legs so// khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ming bshad pa de dang /
126a4(dkon brtsegs): skyes bu dam pa de dag gi yon tan de dag legs par smras te/ gzhan yang dpag tu med pa dag yod do// lha'i bu ded dpon gyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la gzhan yang 'di skad
126a5(dkon brtsegs): ces smras so// 'jam dpal khyod kyis sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed cig la bsnyen bkur byas na/ khyod spobs pa 'di lta bu dang ldan// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ d+ha'i bu ma sprul pa'i sgyu ma'i skye
126a6(dkon brtsegs): bu'i sems dang sems las byung ba ji skad 'gags pa de snyed do// smras pa/ 'jam dpal sprul pa nyid la 'ang sems dang sems las byung bdag med na ma sprul pa lta bu la ci smos/ smras pa/ lha'i bu bzhin
126a7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa de dag kyang ngo bo nyid de lta bu'i mtshan nyid yin la/ de dag la bsnyen bkur bya ba'i mtshan nyid kyang de lta bu yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis yun ring po ji srid cig nas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
126b1(dkon brtsegs): pa la spyang / sbas pa/ lba'i drug le te de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa zhig la khyod kyis yun ring po ji srid cig nas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad ces dris na/ cing lan ljon par byed dam/ smras pa/ 'jamangs
126b2(dkon brtsegs): de ni cung zad kyang lan ldon par mi byed do// smras pa/ lha'i bu kho'i'ang sprul pa de nyid kyi mtshan nyid yin pas na// be bos ji skad du be bo yun ring po 'di tsam zhig nas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad do zhes lan gangs
126b3(dkon brtsegs): par bya/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'on ci byod sar sna can yin nam/ smras pa/ lha'i bu de bzhin te/ kho bo ni ser sna can yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ci las bsams te de skad sma/ smras pa/ lhu'i bu
126b4(dkon brtsegs): gang yongs su mi gtong ba de ser sna can ma yin nam/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal byed ci zhig yongs su mi gtong / smras pa/ lha'i bu kho bo ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang / sems can thams cad mongs
126b5(dkon brtsegs): su mi gtong ba yin te/ de'i phyir kho bo ni ser sna can yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis ji skad smras pa'i don po bos shes pa ltar na khyod ni tshul khrims 'chal pa yin nam// smras pa/ lha'i bu
126b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin te/ kho bo ni tshul khrims 'chal pa yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ci las bsams te de skad smra/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang tshul khrims 'chal pa de ngan song gsum po dag tu ltung ba yin nam
126b7(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin no// smras pa/ lnga'i bu kho bo dang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir bsams bzhin du ngan song rnams su 'gro ste/ de'i phyir lo bo ni tshul khrims 'chal pa yin no//
127a1(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci byod gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa yin nam/ spras pa/ lha'i bu de bzhin te/ kho bo na gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa yin no// smras pa/
127a2(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal rjod tsa las bsams te de skad s+thA/ smras pa/ lha'i bugang gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa de rjes su chags pa med pa ma yin nam/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin no// smras pa/
127a3(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu kho bo rang nyon mongs pa thams cad dang / byis pa thams cad dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis thams cad la rjes su chags pa med de/ de'i phyir kho bo ni gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa yin
127a4(dkon brtsegs): no// smras pa 'jam dpal ci khyod le lo can yin nam/ smras pa/ lnga'i bu de bzhin te/ kho bo ni le lo can yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ci las bsams te de skad smra/ smras pa/ lha'i bu le
127a5(dkon brtsegs): lo can zhes bya ba ni gang lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyis mi rtsom pa yin la/ kho bo'ang rtsom pa med cing brtul bar mi byed pa dang / len pa med pa dang / dor ba med pa yin te/ de'i phyir kho bo ni le lo can
127a6(dkon brtsegs): yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci khyod sems rnam par g.yengs pa yin nam/ smras pa/ lha'i bu de bzhin te/ kho bo ni sems rnam par g.yengs pa yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal byed ci
127a7(dkon brtsegs): las ci bsams te de skad smra/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi sems rnam par grol ba la mi gnas pa de sems rnam par g.yengs pa ma yin nam// smras pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin no// smras pa//
127b1(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu kho bo'ang 'phags pa rnams kyi rnam par grol ba la sems mi gnas pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir sems rnam par g.yengs pa yin te/ de'i phyir kho bo ni sems rnam par
127b2(dkon brtsegs): g.yengs pa yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci byod shes rab 'chas pa yin nam/ smras pa/ lha'i bu de bzhin te/ kho bon shes rab 'chal pa yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ci las bsams te
127b3(dkon brtsegs): de skad smra/ smras pa/ lnga'i bu gang 'kho bas mi skrag cing // sems can rmongs pa rnams dang lhan cig dga' ba de shes rab 'chal pa ma yin nam/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin no// spras pa/ lha bu
127b4(dkon brtsegs): be bo'ang 'khor bas mi skrag cing de dag nyid yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ sems can rmongs pa rnams dang lhan cig na dga' ba yin te/ de'i phyir khe bo ni shes rab 'chal pa yin no// smras pa/ 'jam
127b5(dkon brtsegs): dpal 'jig rten gyi sbyin gnas su yin/ smras pa lha'i bu gang dag bsad pa gsod pa'i sems skyed pa rnams so// smras pa/ 'jam dpal byod ci las bsams te de skad smra/ smras
127b6(dkon brtsegs): pa lha'i bu bsang po zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams te/ gang de dag gsod par byed pa de ni bsad pa gsod par byed pa yin pas de ni 'jig rten na sbyin gnas
127b7(dkon brtsegs): yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis bshad pa de lta bu ni 'jig rten gnas pa skrag par 'gyur ba yin no// smras pa/ lha'i bugal te yang dag pa'i mthar skrag par 'gyur na ni 'jig rte na gnas pan
128a1(dkon brtsegs): skrag par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten ni yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas pa yin pa'i phyir ro// smras pa/ 'jam dpal gang dag khyod kyis bshad pa 'di spong /
128a2(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ba de dag gang du 'gro bar 'gyur/ smras pa/ lha'i bu de dag ni mya ngan las 'das par 'gro bar 'gyur ro// smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ci las bsams te de skad smra/ smras pa
128a3(dkon brtsegs): lnga'i bu pha rol gyi sgra nyan pa ma spangs par ni 'phags pa'i rnam par grol ba thob par mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ skyon meng par zhugs pa la ni yi ge'i 'jug pa med pas na/ gang dag mos par gyur pa
128a4(dkon brtsegs): de dag ni rnam par grol bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ci las bsams te de skad smra/ smras pa/ lha'i bu rnam par grol ba ni yang rnam par grol bar 'gyur ba med do// smras pa/
128a5(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal dam pa'i chos spong ba rnams ni sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba yin no// smras pa/ lha'i bu gang dag rnam par grol ba de dag thams cad sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba yin nam/ smras pa/
128a6(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal khyod kyis chos bstan pa ni gnyen po med pa yin no// smras pa/ lha'i bu stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la ni gnyen po brjod par mi nus so// smras pa/
128a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal stong pa nyid la gnas pa ni ci zhig la gnas pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu stong pa nyid la gnas pa ni sems can thams cad la byams par gnas pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na
128b1(dkon brtsegs): sems can ma gtogs par stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir ro// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi khams kyi mthar khong du chud pa yin/ smras pa/ ljang bu gang gi tshe
128b2(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar mthong zhing de la rtag pa dang / chad pa'i mthar lta bar mi ltung ba de lta bu ni byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi khams kyi mthar khong du chud pa yin no//
128b3(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ 'jam dpal sems can gyi khams gang dang ldan pa yin// smras pa/ lha'i bu sems can gyi khams ni chos kyi dbyings kyi khams dang ldan pa yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal chos kyi
128b4(dkon brtsegs): dbyings khams gang dang ldan pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid kyi khams dang ldan pa yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal nam mkha'i khams gang dang ldan pa yin/ smras pa/
128b5(dkon brtsegs): lnga'i bu yul thams cad las yang dag par 'dres pa'i khams dang ldan pa yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal yul gang sangs rgyas kyi yul yin/ smras pa/ lha'i du mig gi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yub
128b6(dkon brtsegs): yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni mig dang / gzugs dang / rnam par shes pa'i yul ma yin no// rna ba'i yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni rna ba dang / sgra dang
128b7(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa'i yul ma yin no// snga'i yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni sna dang / dri dang / rnam par shes pa'i yul ma yin no// lce'i yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/
129a1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi yul ni lce dang / ro dang / rnam par shes pa'i yul ma yin no// lus kyi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni lus dang / re bya dang
129a2(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa'i yul ma yin no// yid kyi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni yid dang / chos dang / rnam par shes pa'i yul ma yin no// gzugs kyi yul ni/
129a3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni gzugs su rung ba'i yul ma yin no// tshor ba'i yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni myong ba'i yul ma yin no//
129a4(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes kyi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni kun tu g.yo ba'i yul ma yin no// 'du byed kyi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni mngon par 'du byed
129a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i yul ma yin no// rnam par shes pa'i yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni rnam par rig pa'i yul ma yin no// ma rig pa'i yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/
129a6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi yul ni rgyu dang rkyen gyi yul ma yin no// rga shi'i bar dag gi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni nying mtshams sbyor ba'i yul ma yin no// 'dod pa'i khams
129a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni 'dod chags so sor rnam par rig pa'i yul ma yin no// gzugs kyi khams kyi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi yun
129b1(dkon brtsegs): ni 'dod chags kyi gnyen po'i yul ma yin no// gzugs med pa'i khams kyi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni lta ba las rnam par grol nga'i yul yin no// 'dus ma byas kyi
129b2(dkon brtsegs): khams kyi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni gnyis su sbyor ba'i yul ma yin no// 'dus byas kyi khams kyi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni mtshan nyid
129b3(dkon brtsegs): gsum dang ldan pa'i yul ma yin no// lha'i bu de ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/ mtha' dang mtha' ma yin pa yul yin pa'i phyir yul der ni yul thams cad 'dus shing khong du chud pa yin no// lha'i bu byang chub
129b4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' ni yul de lta bur zhugs shing don gyi yul thams cad la rnam par spyod kyang bdud kyi yul thob pa'ang ma yin te/ des ni 'dud kyi yul dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul yang mnyam zhing dben pa'i yul
129b5(dkon brtsegs): du mngon par rdzogs par khong du chud do// lha'i bu gang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed kyang / mnyam pa nyid las kyang mi 'da' ba 'di'ang cho 'phrul chen po
129b6(dkon brtsegs): yin no// de la mnyam pa nyid ni gang / mi mnyam pa nyid ni gang zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad stong pa nyid du mnyam pa nyid yin no// gang dag mnyam pa nyid la mi 'jug pa de dag ni mi mnyam par gnas pa yin te/ byang
129b7(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' ni de dag yongs su smin par byed kyang stong pa nyid kyi mnyam pa nyid las kyang mi g.yo'o// chos thams cad mtshan ma med par mnyam pa nyid du mnyam pa de ni mnyam pa nyid yin no// gang dag mnyam pa
130a1(dkon brtsegs): nyid de la mi 'jug pa de dag ni mi mnyam par gnas pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' ni de dag yongs su smin par byed kyang mtshan ma med pa'i mnyam pa nyid las mi g.yo'o//
130a2(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad smon pa med par mnyam pa nyid du mnyam pa de ni mnyam pa nyid yin no// gang dag mnyam pa nyid de la mi 'jug pa de dag ni mi mnyam par gnas pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa'
130a3(dkon brtsegs): ni de dag yongs su smin par byed kyang smon pa med pa'i mnyam pa nyid las kyang mi g.yo'o// chos thams cad mngon pa 'du byed pa med par mnyam pa nyid du mnyam pa de ni mnyam pa nyid yin no// gang
130a4(dkon brtsegs): ngag mnyam pa nyid de la mi 'jug pa de dag ni mi mnyam par gnas pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' ni de dag yongs su smin par byed kyang mngon par 'du byed ba med pa'i mnyam pa nyid las kyang mi g.yo'o//
130a5(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad skye ba med par mnyam pa nyid dang 'byung ba med par mnyam pa nyid dang / 'gag pa med par mnyam pa nyid dang / 'dod chags dang bral bar mnyam pa nyid dang / dben par mnyam pa nyid dang /
130a6(dkon brtsegs): dngos po med par mnyam pa nyid dang / 'gog par mnyam pa nyid dang / chos thams cad mya ngan las 'das par mnyam pa nyid du mnyam pa de ni mnyam pa nyid yin no// gang dag mnyam pa nyid de la mi 'jug pa de dag ni mi
130a7(dkon brtsegs): mnyam par gnas pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' ni de dag yongs su smin par byed kyang mya ngan las 'das pa'i mnyam pa nyid las kyang mi g.yo ste/ lha'i bu de ltar mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa la spyod pa'i byang
130b1(dkon brtsegs): chu sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa la spyod pa yin no// de nas d+ha'i du dang dpon gyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon dur myur pa la 'di sa ces smras so// 'jam dpa la khyod drung
130b2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa la spobs par gyis shig/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa ni bsam gyis mi thub pa yin no// smras pa 'jams/
130b3(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin/ smras pa/ lnga'i bu 'dod chags kyi spyod pa bsam gyis mi byub pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa'ang bsam gyis/
130b4(dkon brtsegs): mi bya ba ste/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'i spyod pa ni ma yin no// zhe sdang gi spyod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa'ang bsam byis mi bya ba ste/ zhe sdang dang bral ba'i spyod pa ni ma yin no//
130b5(dkon brtsegs): gti mug gi spyong ba bsam gyis mi byab pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa'ang bsam gyis mi khrob ste/ shes rab kyi bya ba sgrub par byed pa'i spyod pa ni ma yin no// ser sna meng pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub
130b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin te/ sbyin pas rlom sems su byed pa'i spyod pa ni ma yin no// 'chal pa'i tshul khrims dang bral ba'i spyod po ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yinate/ tshul khrims kyi rlom
130b7(dkon brtsegs): sems su byed pa'i sbyor ba ni ma yin no// gnod sems med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin te/ bzod pas rlom sems su byed pa'i spyod pa ni ma yin no// le lo med pa'i spyod pa ni byang ma/
131a1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin te/ brtson 'grus kyis rlom sems su byed pa'i spyor pa ni ma yin no// rnam par g.yeng ba med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin te/
131a2(dkon brtsegs): bsam gtan gyis rlom sems su byed pa'i spyod pa ni ma yin no// 'chal pa'i shes rab med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin te/ shes rab kyis rlom sems su byed pa'i spyod pa ni ma yin no//
131a3(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs pa med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin te/ nyon mongs pa med pas rlom sems su byed pa'i spyod pa ni ma yin no// nang dang phyi'i dngos po yongs su gtong bas brtse ba med pa'i spyod
131a4(dkon brtsegs): pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// bu dang / bu mo dang / chung ma yongs su gtong bas mngon par dka' ba med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// 'dod pa'i
131a5(dkon brtsegs): yon tan la smod pas rtag tu gnod sems kyi spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par sdud pas mi lta ba'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod
131a6(dkon brtsegs): pa yin no// lus dang srog la mi lta bas lta ba med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// sdug pa dang mi sdug pa yongs su gtong bas chem tshom med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub semangs
131a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// 'khor ba dpag tu med pas mi skrag pas 'jigs pa med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// sems can thams cad kyi khur sgrol bas bur chen po
131b1(dkon brtsegs): sgrol ba'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stong ba yin no// sngar ngam bcas pathams su lon par byed pas phyir mi ldog pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// rjes pa yod pa
131b2(dkon brtsegs): pas yid la gcugs pa med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// theg pa thams cad zil gyis mnan pas mngon par 'phags pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yino no//
131b3(dkon brtsegs): yi dam ma zhig pas gon rdo rje lta bu'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// sems can thams cad kyi sems la nges par sems pas rang gi sems la nges par sems pa'i spyod pa mi byang
131b4(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// las byas pa chud mi za ba'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pas tha dad pa med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub
131b5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// ngagrag thams cad nges par bcom pas dpa' ba'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// skal ba mnyam pa'i skye bo dang mthun par 'jug pas ma
131b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dres pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// gshe ba dang sdang ba thams cad rab tu dga' bar byed pas rab tu dga' bar byed pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin
131b7(dkon brtsegs): no sangs rgyas blta ba dang / chos mnyan pa dang / bla ma la bsnyen bkur bya ba la mchog tu dga' bas dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnam kyi spyod pa yin//
132a1(dkon brtsegs): lus dang / dag dang / sems dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgyan par byed pas rgyun gyi spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// mnyam pa dang mi mnyam par
132a2(dkon brtsegs): gnyen por gyur pas zil gyis mi non pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// skye bo mkhas shing mdzangs pa rnams kyis rab tu bsngags pas ngan pa ma yin pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub
132a3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// tshul bzhin gyis nyon mongs pa rnams shin tu nges par brtag pas mi brdzi ba'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// khur blangs pa nyams
132a4(dkon brtsegs): su lon pas skyes bu dam pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// brtson 'grus brtan pos phyir mi ldog pas khyad par du 'gro ba'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no//
132a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos yang dag par sdud pas chos spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// sangs rgyas kyi gdung rgyun mi gcod pas byas pa shes shing byas pa gzo ba'i spyod pa ni byang
132a6(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// dkon mchog gsum 'bri bar mi byed pas dkon mchog gi spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// sdud pa dang yongs su gcod pas
132a7(dkon brtsegs): shes rab dang thabs kyi spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ spyod pa la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' lnga
132b1(dkon brtsegs): brgyas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thong par gyur to// de nas lha'i bu ded dpon gyis/ 'jam ngapa la gzhon nur gyur pa la 'jigad ces smras so// 'jam dpal rtsod kyis byang chub
132b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpar rnams kyi spyod pa de ni legs par smras so// byang chub sems dpa' gang dag spyod pa de dang ma bral ba de dag ni de nyid kyis lung bstan pa yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
132b3(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ lha'i bu gang gi tshong spyod pa de dang ma bral bar gyur pa de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chu
132b4(dkon brtsegs): tu lung bstan pa/ der ngas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo// lha'i bu gang spyod pa rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid kyi chos rnams la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa de lta bu de dag rab tu 'byed par byed
132b5(dkon brtsegs): pa de'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul chen po yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ lha'i bu ded dpon gyis 'di skad ces gsob to// bcom ldan 'das mi skye ba zhes bgyi ba ni
132b6(dkon brtsegs): ci lags/ 'jug pa gang gis na byang chub sems dpar mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu mi skye ba zhes bya ba de ni gzong ma nas ma skyes pa'i mu'i
132b7(dkon brtsegs): mtshan nyid kyi tshig bla dgas yin te/ de ni sngon byung bar gyur la byis ma byung bar gyur pa ma yin te/ de ni gzod ma nas ma byung ba nyid yin no// de ni sngon srid par gyur la phyis mi srid par gyur pa ma yin
133a1(dkon brtsegs): te/ de ni gzod ma nas mi srid pa nyid yin no// de ni sngon skyes par gyur la byis ma skyes par gyur pa ma yin te/ de ni gzod ma nas ma skyes pa nyid yin no// de ni sngon mngon par
133a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dus byas pa yin la gyis mngon par 'dus ma byas pa ma yin te/ de ni gzod mnas mngon par 'dus mabyas pa nyid yin no// de ni sngon yod par tshurol gyis med par gyur pa ma yin te/ den
133a3(dkon brtsegs): gzod ma nas 'gyur ba med pa nyid yin no// de ni sngon gang zag tu bgrang bar gyur la phyis gang zag tu mi bgrang bar gyur pa ma yin te/ de ni gzod ma nas stong pa nyid yin no// de ni sngon mtshan mar bgrang bar
133a4(dkon brtsegs): gyur la phyis mtshan mar mi bgrang bar gyur pa ma yin te/ de ni gzod ma nas mtshan ma med pa nyid yin no// gang gis de ltar rjes su rtogs pa dang / sems kyi skye ba dang / 'jig pa la mngon par zhen pa
133a5(dkon brtsegs): med par rtogs pa de ni mi skye ba zhes bya'o// de la bzod pa gang zhe na/ de dag ji ltar mi skye ba de bzhin du sems can thams cad la'ang bzod pa de ni bzod pa zhes bya'o// de dag ji ltar mi skye ba de bzhin du zhing thams cad
133a6(dkon brtsegs): la'ang bzod pa de ni bzod pa zhes bya'o// de dag ji ltar mi skye ba de bzhin du slob pa dang / mi slob pa dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad la'ang bzod pa de ni bzod pa zhes bya'o// de dag ji ltar mi skye ba de bzhin du
133a7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad dang / sangs rgyas thams cad la'ang bzod pa de ni bzod pa zhes bya'o// de dag ji ltar mi skye ba de bzhin du chos thams cad la rang
133b1(dkon brtsegs): brjod pa de ni bzod pa zhes bya'o// bzod pa de'ang sang cig pa yin te/ gang gis gang cig pa yin ne na/ mang cig pa nyid kyis mang cig pa yin no// stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid kyis gang cig pa yin no// mtshan
133b2(dkon brtsegs): mamed pa ni mtshan ma med pas skad cig pa yin no// ji ltar stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pas skad cig pa yin pa de bzhin du gzugs kyang gzugs kyi mtshan nyid kyis skang cig
133b3(dkon brtsegs): ba yin no// ji ltar stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pas skad cig pa yin pa de bzhin du/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'ang
133b4(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid kyis skad cig pa yin no// ji ltar stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pas skad cig pa yin pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi khams
133b5(dkon brtsegs): kyang chos kyi khams kyi mtshan nyid kyis skad cig pa yin no// ji ltar stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pas skad cig pa yin pa de bzhin du skye mched thams cad kyang
133b6(dkon brtsegs): skye mched rnams kyi mtshan nyid kyis skad cig pa yin te/ skad cig pa gang yin pa de ni ya ma brla yin no// ya ma brla gang yin pa de ni gsog yin no// gsog gang yin pa de ni gso ba yin no// gsob gang
133b7(dkon brtsegs): yin pa de ni 'dod chags med pa yin no// 'dod chags med pa gang yin pa de ni 'dod chags dang bral ba yin no// 'dod chags dang bral ba gang yin pa de ni ngo bo nyid med pa yin no// ngo bo nyid med pa
134a1(dkon brtsegs): gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa yin te/ de ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / skad cig pa dang / ya ma brla dang / dben pa dang / gsog ces bya ste/ chos thams cad la de ltar
134a2(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa zhes bya'o// bzod pade'ang bzod pa nyid kyis gang cig pa yin te/ de ltar mnyam pa cid thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni lung bstan pa dang / mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pathob pa yin no//
134a3(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa de'ang dmigs pas rab tu phye ba ma yin te/ de la dmigs pa gang zhe na/ gang gi tshe bdag dang bzod pa gnyis kar dmigs na de ni dmigs pa zhes bya'o// sems can dang / srog dang / gso ba dang / gang zag
134a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / bzod pa gnyis kar dmigs na de ni dmigs pa zhes bya'o// de la dmigs pa med pa gang zhe na/ gang gi tshe bdag dang bzod pa gnyis kar mi dmigs pa de ni dmigs pa med pa zhes bya'o// sems
134a5(dkon brtsegs): can dang / srog dang / gso ba dang / gang zag dang bzod pa gnyis kar mi dmigs pa de ni dmigs pa med pa zhes bya'o// de bzhin du sbyar te/ phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams kyi
134a6(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de ni ngo bo nyid gtan med pa yin no// ngo bo nyid gtan med pa gang yin pa de ni 'dus ma byas pa yin te/ ngo bo nyid de dang bzod pa de la gnyis su rjes su//
134a7(dkon brtsegs): rtog par mi byed pa gang yin pa de ni dmigs pa med pa zhes bya'o// lha'i bu bzod pa de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bskal pa grangs med par spyod pa de'ang de bzhin gshegs
134b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i tshe rdul chen po bstan pa yin no// bzod pa bstan pa 'di bshad ban/ stong gsum gyi spyod chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos so// 'dzag rten
134b2(dkon brtsegs): 'di snang ba chen pos kyang khung bar gyur to// sil snyan brgya stong yang ma dkrol bar sgra' khrol bar gyur to// me tog gi char ba dag kyang rab tu bab bo// srog chags pani khri nyis spyong gis ni bA na
134b3(dkon brtsegs): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' dgu khri drug stong gis chos rnams la rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa thob par gyur to// 'jig rten
134b4(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams mi mjed 'dir ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa mor me mdzad rgyal po'i pho brang pad+ma can du zhugs par gyur pa de lta bu'ang kun tu snang bar gyur to// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan
134b5(dkon brtsegs): 'das 'dzum pa mdzad do// gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe/ chos nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer du ma kha dog sna tshogs bdag
134b6(dkon brtsegs): 'bum phrag dum 'di lnga ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / btsod la dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung bar gyur te/ de dag gis 'jig rten gyi
134b7(dkon brtsegs): khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag snang bas khyab par byas nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par 'phags te/ nyi ma dang zla ba dag gi 'od kyang zil gyis mnan nas yang phyir log ste/
135a1(dkon brtsegs): / bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub par gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las/
135a2(dkon brtsegs): langs te/ chos gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lhang sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la mngon/
135a3(dkon brtsegs): sum du tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to// thub pa ci spang 'dzum pa mdzad gyur pa// mi mnyam gzi brjid mnga' ba khyod la nu// 'od kyi bkod pa mdzad pa khyod la nu// ra
135a4(dkon brtsegs): rib nyon mongs spong ba khyod la zhu// bde gshegs ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad pa// gti mug tshogs rnams 'joms pa khyod la zhu// 'dud dpung tha mar mdzad pa khyod la nu// stobs bcu'i
135a5(dkon brtsegs): stobs dang ldan pa khyod la zhu// rgyal ba ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad pa// sum cu rtsa gnyis yon tan mtshan brgyan pa// bde gshegs rab dga' bde ba mdzad pa po// gzugs kyi dam pa mnga' ba/
135a6(dkon brtsegs): khyod la zhu// bcom ldan ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad pa// mkhyen pa mtha' yas yon tan bstod pa po// ye shes 'byung gnas 'gro ba shes mdzad pa// ye shes ljon shing mkhyen pa
135a7(dkon brtsegs): mchog le zhu// 'jig rten gsum grags grags pa mtha' yas pa// gsum rig dri gsum tha mar mdzad pa po// 'jig rten gsum rig rnam thar gsum mthar byon// ci yi slad du 'dzum
135b1(dkon brtsegs): pa bstan pa mdzad// sman pa dam pa skyen mthar mdzad pa// bcom ldan zhabs la dra mchog 'khor lo mngang// sred med sras po rdo rje mabregs pa po// thub pa 'dzum mdzad sbyor ba bka'
135b2(dkon brtsegs): srul gsol// gang gis spyod pa de ni rnam sbyangs sam// gang 'dir bzod pa de dag yongs rdzogs sam// gang sems sangs rgyas yon tan nges gyur tam// ci yi slad du thub chen 'dzum pa/
135b3(dkon brtsegs): mdzad// bde gshegs zla med rgyu zhig mi mnga' bar// bcom ldan 'dren pa 'dzum pa mi ston pas// de thos sems can glo ba rangs gyur gyis// tshangs pa'i dbyangs can legs
135b4(dkon brtsegs): par gsung dpung gsol// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo chos kyi rnam grangs
135b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di bshad pa ni/ srog chags bdun dri nyis stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sum khri cis stong gis ni ma skye
135b6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// kun dga' bo gzhan yang khyod kyis lha'i bu ded dpon 'di mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das
135b7(dkon brtsegs): kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo lha'i bu deng dpon 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa grang ba las yang dag par 'das pa dag la bsti stang du byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/
136a1(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa byas/ yongs su zhu ba byas/ yongs su dri ba byas shing / sems can dpag tu med pa dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du
136a2(dkon brtsegs): bcug go// kun dga' bo lha'i bu ded dpon 'di ni bskal pa grangs med pa sum brgya 'das pa'i 'og tu bskal pa dri ma med pa zhes bya ba la/ 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag pa zhes bya bar bla na
136a3(dkon brtsegs): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa
136a4(dkon brtsegs): bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba// bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yon tan rgyal po'i 'od ces bya bar 'jig rten
136a5(dkon brtsegs): du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag pa de'ang rin po che sna bdun 'di lta ste/ gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / shel dang / rdo'i snying po dang / spug dang / mu tig
136a6(dkon brtsegs): dmar po las grub cing lag mthil ltar mnyam la/ rin po che'i dra ba sna tshogs kyis mig mangs ris su kun nas bkab par 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams der nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dag gi
136a7(dkon brtsegs): ming yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang / kun tu rgyu dag dang / bdud rnams dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba'i sems can rnams kyi ming yang med cing mi 'byung bar 'gyur ro// /
136b1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na mi khom pa brgyad po dag kyang med la/ bza' ba dang btung ba dag kyang yid la bsams pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na ltung ba dang / 'phrul
136b2(dkon brtsegs): nyes pa dang / sdug bsngal gyi sgra'ang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// sems can de dag gi longs spyod dang nye bar spyod pa'ang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi longs spyod dang nye bar spyod pa ci 'dra/
136b3(dkon brtsegs): ba de lta bur 'gyur ro// sems can de dag thams cad kyang gser gyi mdog 'dra zhing skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan par 'gyur zhing / phal cher bla na med pa yang dag par
136b4(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa sha stag 'byung bar 'gyur bas// de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de ni yongs su dag pa zhes bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon
136b5(dkon brtsegs): tan rgyal po'i 'od de'i sku tshe'i tshad ni bar gyi bskal pa bzhi bcur 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang smon lam gyi dbang gis bar ma dor 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs
136b6(dkon brtsegs): pa de'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun ni dung phyur phrag drug dang / bye ba phrag gnyis su 'gyur te/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
