136b7(dkon brtsegs): tu sems bskyed par gyur pa dang / gang dag gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur pa de dag 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag par der skye bar 'gyur ro// de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan
137a1(dkon brtsegs): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan rgyal po'i 'od kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing der/ de bzhin gshegs pas bla na med pa yang
137a2(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ro// de nas 'khor de nyid du lha'i bu spyan ras gzigs shes bya ba zhig 'dus te 'dug par gyur pa des/ bcom ldan
137a3(dkon brtsegs): 'das la lha'i me tog man da ra ba dag gis mngon par gtor nas tshig 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang gang gi tshe/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgyal
137a4(dkon brtsegs): po'i 'od de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe/ 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag pa der skye zhing 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur nas/
137a5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang bcas pa de la bsnyen bkur bgyi zhing / bcom ldan 'das de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams der
137a6(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun
137a7(dkon brtsegs): dga' bo lha'i bu spyan ras gzigs 'di ni gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgyal po'i 'od de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang/
137b1(dkon brtsegs): rgya bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe/ 'di'ang der 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po legs mthong zhes bya bar gyur te/ des bcom ldan 'das de la mchod pa dpag tu med pa byas shing / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos
137b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyang yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang chu bar
137b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo
137b4(dkon brtsegs): sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kun tu 'od ces bya bar 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo rgyal po legs mthong de'ang dus gzhan
137b5(dkon brtsegs): zhig na/ bu thu bo rgyal srid la bzhag nas/ bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan pa la dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa de'ang yongs su mya ngan
137b6(dkon brtsegs): las 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe// byang chub sems dpa' de la byang chub sems dpa' legs mthong 'di ni nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
137b7(dkon brtsegs): tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan nas/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ lha'i bu deng
138a1(dkon brtsegs): dpon la 'di skad ces smras so// lha'i bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan tam/ smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu kho bo ni ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa
138a2(dkon brtsegs): lung bstan pa ltar lung bstan te/ da ltar gyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang de lta bu yin pas/ de bzhin cid de la ni 'phel ba'ang med la/ yongs su 'grib pa'ang
138a3(dkon brtsegs): med do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung zhig/ chod shig/ lcogs shi/
138a4(dkon brtsegs): shod cig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phan pa dang bde ba rjes su yongs
138a5(dkon brtsegs): su gzung ba'i phyir gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston cig/ kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis gzung lags na/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'do'o//
138a6(dkon brtsegs): ming ci lags/ 'ang ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni cho 'phrul chen po bstan pa zhes bya bar zung zhig/ 'di ni
138a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa bstan pa zhes bya ba dang / rin po che thams cad kyi le'u zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ kun dga' bo rogs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag chos kyi rnam
138b1(dkon brtsegs): grangs 'ang 'dzin pa dang / mos pa dang / mos nas kyang yi ger 'bri ba dang / klog pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / gzhan dag la rang tu cher yang dag par rab tu skor bar byed pa de dag na bso
138b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams thams cad yongs su zin par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / lha'i bu ded dpon dang
138b3(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / maM dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das
138b4(dkon brtsegs): kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya pa las/ cho 'phrul chen po bstan pa lha'i bu deng
138b5(dkon brtsegs): dpon gyis zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa rdzogs so// / sh+lau ka dgu brgya bam po gsum mo// rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mri tA dang / su ren dra bo
138b6(dkon brtsegs): dI dang / lo tsa bzhang ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtAn la phab pa// rgya bur skad du/ Ar+ya me tre ya mahA seng chen
138b7(dkon brtsegs): ngan nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa byams pa'i seng ge'i sgra chen po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// // bam po dang po// sangs rgyas da
139a1(dkon brtsegs): bya/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal
139a2(dkon brtsegs): mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong lnga stong tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang
139a3(dkon brtsegs): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / mthu chen thob dang / dpal gyi snying po dang / byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' brgyang stong dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de na bcom ldan
139a4(dkon brtsegs): 'ongs 'khor 'bum phrag dri mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te chos ston to// de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po 'khor de nyid du 'dus te 'dug par gyur to//
139a5(dkon brtsegs): de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po stan las langs te/ blagros zag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la gcugs te/ bcom ldan 'das kai la bi logs su bral mo
139a6(dkon brtsegs): myu bu gyur nas/ bco ldan 'das pa'idi skang ces gsol to// la te nus nas nub sung bstan pa'i yang du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdastsal sa byas phyen bdas bcom lda sa ma
139a7(dkon brtsegs): shegs pa mgyogs cag zhig nu ba lags so// de sa ces gsol pa dang // bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po la 'di skad ces paka' phul to// 'od drum
139b1(dkon brtsegs): khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa de bzhin gshegs pa la dris shig dang / ngas dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la// nga
139b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa 'od srungs chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'tshal bas legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dus
139b3(dkon brtsegs): bal rab tu byung nas ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar spyad par bgyi/ ji ltar rnal 'byor du bkyi lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa
139b4(dkon brtsegs): rod srungs chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'od srungs legs so legs so// 'od srungs khyod 'di ltar skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rte nus
139b5(dkon brtsegs): snying brje ba dang / lha dang ma rnams kyi skyobo la po che'i don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir zhugs te/ khyod de ba'i ga shegs pa la don de ltab yongs su dra bar sems pa ni 'ang myong legs so//
139b6(dkon brtsegs): 'od srungs de'i phyir khyod legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang / ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen pos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol te/ bcom
139b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'od srungs 'di la rigs kyi bu mo yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'dod pas legs par gsungs
140a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung nas tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang / so sor thar pa'i sdom pas bsdams pa dang / cho ga phun sum tshogs pa dang / spyod yul phun sum tshogs pa
140a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / kha na ma tho ba phra rab tsam dag la'ang 'jigs par lta ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi rnam yang dag par blangs te bslab par bya'o// brkam chags med pa dang / tshul 'chos pa med pa dang / khagasag
140a3(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang / gzhog slongs med pa dang / thob kyi sa 'jal ba med pa dang / rnyed pas rnyed par byed 'dod pa med pa dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang ldan pa dang / khrel yod pa dang ldan pa dang / 'dzem
140a4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang ldan par bya'o// 'khor ba la yid skrag pa dang / nges par 'byung ba la mkhas pa dang / nges par 'byung ba la mngon par brtson pa dang / 'khor ba la rtag tu yid skyob dang / mya ngan las
140a5(dkon brtsegs): 'da' ba la phan yon du blta bar bya zhing / shing drung na 'dug kyang rung / ri la 'dug kyang rung / gnas khang ni 'dug kyang rung / phug na 'dug kyang rung / des de bzhin gshegs pa rnam pa las yid
140a6(dkon brtsegs): la bya ste/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa// 'jig rten mkhyen pa/
140a7(dkon brtsegs): skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gdung brgyud phun sum tshogs pa/ rigs phun sum tshogs pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba
140b1(dkon brtsegs): bran sum tshogs pa/ tshul khrims kyis dpag tu med pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas dpag tu med pa
140b2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyis dpag tu med pa/ yon tan gyi tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / gzha du med pa dang / tshad med pa dang ldan pa/ bden pa gsungs pa
140b3(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa gsungs pa/ ji skad gsungs pa de bzhin du mdzad pa// mi slu bar mdzad pa/ 'phags pa/ sman pa chen po/ drug rngu 'byin pa/ ma gsol bar ga shes gnyen mdzad pa// thugs rje dang ldan pa/
140b4(dkon brtsegs): de dang pon chen po yin te/ de ni chos mya ngan las 'das pa/ zab pa zab par snang ba/ zhi ba zhi par ston pa/ stong pa/ sems can med pa/ 'khrul pa med pa/ mtshan ma med pa/ mtshan
140b5(dkon brtsegs): ma yang dag par chad pa/ smon pa med pa/ smon pa dang bral ba/ spros pa med pa/ spros pa dang bral ba/ mthong bar dka' ba/ rtogs par dka' ba/ nye bar gtod pa/ dngos po dang bral
140b6(dkon brtsegs): ba dben pa dben pa dang bral ba/ dngos po med pa/ dngos pos mgos pa/ rgyu ba med pa/ rgyu ba yang dag par chad pa/ 'gro dang bral ba/ brjod du med pa/ brjod pa dang bral ba
140b7(dkon brtsegs): rlom sems med pa/ kun tu bstan pa/ rnyog pa med pa/ rnyog pa dang bral ba/ blang ba med pa/ dor ba med pa/ sdug bsngal nye bar zhi ba/ sred pa yang dag par chad pa/ ston par mdzad pa/
141a1(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par ston par mdzad pa yin no zhes rnam pa las yid la bya'o// 'od srungs de la dge slong gcig pu dben par song ste nang du yang dgra 'jog la zhugs pas ni
141a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnam pa las yid la bya ste/ bdag gis mi'i lus thob cing rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po'ang thobabadag gis de bzhin
141a3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'ang mnyes par byas pas na/ bdag le lo byed pa dang / bya ba sna tshogs kyi 'du 'dzis g.yen spyo zhing gnas pa ni bdag gi mchi'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag la 'bras bu ma
141a4(dkon brtsegs): thob pa kho nar 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ba gang yin pa'i gnas de lta bu'ang yod la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'di lta ste/ dper na u dum+ba ra'i me tog ltar
141a5(dkon brtsegs): brgya la ngargya lam na 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur bas de lta na bdag gis da ltar byung ba dang ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par byas par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes de
141a6(dkon brtsegs): ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnam pa las yid la bya'o// 'od srungs de la dge slong gis ni khyod dang gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi rjes su bslab par bya ste/ 'od srungs 'di ltar khyod nga ma mthong ma thos par
141a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten na dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag bzhugs pa de ngag gi rjes su slob pa na rab tu byung ba ni/ 'od srungs chos 'dul ba 'di nyid la mdzes par gyur pa yin pa'i
141b1(dkon brtsegs): phyir ro// gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa mngon du mthong zhing / mthong nas kyang nye bar 'ongs te/ rab tu 'byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po gsol bar byed pa de dag
141b2(dkon brtsegs): gi rab tu byung ba ni/ de'i 'og tu rang de bzhin gshegs pas rjes su mkhyen to// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi dri mngon gyi dbang gnyis mthong bas ni/ legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba
141b3(dkon brtsegs): la rab tu 'byung bar khas blang bar bya ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ tshe 'di la 'bras bu 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / ma 'ongs pa na bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos mthong ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'o// 'od srus
141b4(dkon brtsegs): de la skyes bu blun po kha cig de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar gos ngur smrig dag bgos shing rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po khas blangs te sa bslab pa rnams
141b5(dkon brtsegs): khas blangs nas gnas khang du song ngam/ phug tu song ste/ sgo bcad nus 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa dag la rnam par rtog par byed cing gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dang
141b6(dkon brtsegs): rnam par 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa dag dang / lhung bzed dang chos gos kyi rnam par rtog pa dag dang mdza' ba shes kyi khyim dang slongs mo ster ba'i khyim gyi rnam par rtog pa dag
141b7(dkon brtsegs): la rnam par rtog par yang byed la/ de dag 'di snyam du'ang sems te/ bdag cag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mi mkhyen / mi rig/ rnam par mi rtogs so snyam du'ang sems so//
142a1(dkon brtsegs): bya/ 'od srungs gang gi tshe dge slong gnas khang na 'dug kyang rung / phug na 'dug kyang rung 'chags na 'dug kyang rung ste/ 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa dag gam
142a2(dkon brtsegs): gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dag gam/ rnam par 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa dag gam/ mi dge ba'i rnam par rtog pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag la rnam par rtog par byed pa de'i tshe ga gnas
142a3(dkon brtsegs): khang ngam/ phug gam/ 'chags de na lha gang dag gnyug ma gnyug mar gnas pa de dag gis/ dge slong de'i sems sems kyis shes nas/ de dag 'di snyam du dge slong 'di gang gi
142a4(dkon brtsegs): phyir legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung la// sdig pa mi dge ba'i rnam par rtog pa de lta bu dag la rnam par rtog par byed pa ni mi rigs so snyam nas ye ma rangs pa dang
142a5(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde bar gyur te/ 'od srungs de la lha de dag la kha cig ni skul bar yang byed/ kha cig gis ni snod ma yin par rig nas khyad du bsad de 'khod par yang byed do// /
142a6(dkon brtsegs): 'od srungs ltos dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu dang / shes pa chung ngu dang ldan pa'i lha de dag gis kyang gzhan gyi sems shes na/ de bzhin gshegs pa bskal pa bye ba phra khrig 'bum phrag grangs med
142a7(dkon brtsegs): pa nas legs par spyod pa spyad pas lta smos kyang ci dgos 'od srungs de bzhin gshegs pa la ni mi mkhyen pa 'am/ ma gzigs pa 'am/ thugs su ma chud pa 'am/ mngon sum du
142b1(dkon brtsegs): ma mdzad pa ci rang mi mnga' ste/ 'od srungs de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba dang / dus las rnam par grol ba dang / brjod par mi bya ba'i shes
142b2(dkon brtsegs): bu rnam lnga la ye shes thogs pa med pa dang ldan zhing the tsom dang bral ba yin no// 'od srungs de lta bas na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la
142b3(dkon brtsegs): rab tu byung bas bdag nyid la rag lus par shes nas/ de bzhin gshegs pas kyang bdag gi sems thugs kyis mkhyen la/ gang dag phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi
142b4(dkon brtsegs): khams na bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis kyang bdag gi sems thugs kyis mkhyen pas na/ bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la
142b5(dkon brtsegs): rab tu byung nas dge sbyong gi chom rkun mi bya'o zhes bslab par bya'o// 'od srungs de la dge sbyong gi chom rkun gang zhe na/ bzhi po 'di dag ni dge sbyong gi chom rkun yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/
142b6(dkon brtsegs): 'od srungs 'di la dge slong dge sbyong gi kha dog dang / rtags dang / dbyibs la gnas shing / de'ang tshul khrims 'chal pa dang sdig pa'i chos can yin par gyur na/ de ni dge sbyong gi chos
142b7(dkon brtsegs): rkun dang po yin no// dben pa'i gnas su song ste gnas pa na/ mi dge ba'i rnam par rtog pa dag la rnam par rtog par byed na/ de ni dge sbyong gi chom rkun gnyis pa yin no// bdag nyid 'bras bu ma thob ci
143a1(dkon brtsegs): bya/ so so'i skye bo yin par shes bzhin du rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa 'dod pas zil gyis non pas gzhan dag gi mdun du bdag nyid dgra bcom pa yin par
143a2(dkon brtsegs): khas 'che bar byed na/ de ni dge sbyong gi chom rkun gsum pa yin no// bdag la bstod cing gzhan la smod par byed na/ de ni dge sbyong gi chom rkun bzhi pa yin te/ 'od srungs bzhi po de dag ni dge
143a3(dkon brtsegs): sbyong gi chom rkun yin no// 'od srungs mi gtum pa/ brlang ba drag shul gyi las dang ldan pa/ nyam stobs dang ldan pa/ stobs chen po shugs dang ldan pa gang la la zhig byung bar gyur la/
143a4(dkon brtsegs): 'od srungs skyes bu nges 'dzam bu gling pa'i mi gang ji snyed pa rnams dbyug pas brdegs sam/ mtshon gyis btab bam/ khu tshur gyis bsnun te bab par byas nas/ nye bar spyad pa'i longs
143a5(dkon brtsegs): spyod 'gron bu dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / b+hu ru dang / sa le sbram dang / dngul dang / rin po che sna tshogs dang khang khyim dang /
143a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhon pa dang / gos dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / mal che dang / stan gyi che bar spyad pa dang / yongs su spyad pa dang / dga' ba da / rtse ba'i longs spyod ji snyed pa de dag thams cad
143a7(dkon brtsegs): bcom zhing phrogs te khyer bar gyur na/ 'od srungs 'di ngo snyam du sems/ gzhi de las mi de bsod nams ma yin pa mang du skyed snyam mam/ 'od srungs kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang du skyed
143b1(dkon brtsegs): lags so// bde bar shegs pa mang du skyed lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srungs khyod mos par bya// khyod kyis khong du chud bar bya ste/ gang zhig bdag nyid 'bras/
143b2(dkon brtsegs): bu ma thob cing so so'i skye bo yin par shes bzhin du/ de rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa 'dod pas zil gyis non pas/ gzhan dag gi mdun du bdag nyid rgyun du zhugs pa yin
143b3(dkon brtsegs): bar khas 'che bar byed cing / tha na bsod snyoms gcig tsam yongs su longs spyod par byed na/ de ni de bas ches bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung po mang du skyed de/ de ni de bas ches bsod nams ma
143b4(dkon brtsegs): yin pa'i phung po mi zad pa skyed pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ gnas brtan 'od srungs chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du de bzhin
143b5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas dpe bstan pas bsdams pa'i gnas bka' stsal bde ni ngo mtshar lags te/ bcom ldan 'das dpe rin po che de lta bu thos na su zhig 'bras bu ma thob par/ tha na dad pas stsal ba
143b6(dkon brtsegs): chab snod gang tsam yang len par 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srungs de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ mgo dang gos la me 'bar ba lta bus gnas
143b7(dkon brtsegs): par bya zhing 'bras bu ma thob par tha na dad pas byin pa chu snod gang tsam yang blang bar mi bya'o// 'od srungs mi gnyis pa ches gtum pa/ ches brlang ba/ ches drag shul gyi las dang ldan pa/
144a1(dkon brtsegs): ches nyams stobs dang ldan pa/ ches stobs chen po'i dgugs dang ldan pa/ gang la la zhig byung bar gyur la/ 'od srungs mi nges gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na mig /
144a2(dkon brtsegs): ji snyed pa rnams dbyug pas brdegs sam/ mtshon gyis btab bams khu tshur gyis bsnun te pham par byas nas/ nye bar spyad pa'i longs spyod 'gron bu dang / gser dang / nor bu dang
144a3(dkon brtsegs): mu tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / b+hu ru dang / sa le snga ma dang / dngul dang / rin po che sna tshogs dang / khang khyim dang / gzhon pa dang / gos dang / bza'
144a4(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / btung ba dang / mal cha dang / stan gyi che bar spyad pa dang / yongs su spyad pa dang / dga' ba dang / rtse ba'i longs spyod ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bcom nying thogs te khyer bar gyur/
144a5(dkon brtsegs): na/ 'od srungs 'di ji snyam du sems/ gzhi de las mo de bsod nams ma yin pa mang du skyeng snyam mam/ 'od srungs kyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang du skyed lags so//
144a6(dkon brtsegs): bde bar gshegs pa mang du skyed lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srungs khyod mos par bya/ khyod kyis khong du chud par bya ste/ gang zhig bdag cad 'bras bu ma thob cing
144a7(dkon brtsegs): so so'i skye bo yin par shes datson du/ de rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa 'dod pas zil gyis non pas/ gzhan dag gi mdun du bdag nyid lan cig phyir 'ong ba yin par las/
144b1(dkon brtsegs): 'che bar byed cing / zan bsod snyoms gcig tsam yongs su longs spyod par byed na/ de ni de bas ches bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung po mang du skyed de/ de ni de bas ches bsod nams ma yin pa'i phu
144b2(dkon brtsegs): po mi zang bskyed pa yin no// 'od srungs gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na mi gang ji snyed pa thams cad kyi nye bar spyad pa'i longs spyod rnams lta zhog gi/ 'od srungs mi gsung ba ches shin tu
144b3(dkon brtsegs): gtum pa/ ches shin tu brlang ba/ ches shin tu drag shul gyi las dang ldan pa/ ches shin tu nyams stobs dang ldan pa/ ches shin tu stobs chen po'i shugs dang ldan pa gang la la zhig byung
144b4(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur la/ 'od srungs mi des stob chung ngu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na mi gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag dbyug pas brdegs sam/ mtshon gyis btab bam/ khu tshur gyis bsnun te pham par byas
144b5(dkon brtsegs): nasanye bar spyad pa'i longs spyod 'gron bu dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bain+duR+Ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / b+hu ru dang / sa le sngam dang / dngul dang / rin po che sna tshogs
144b6(dkon brtsegs): dang khang khyim dang / bzhon pa dang / gos dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / mal ma dang / stan gyi nye bar spyad pa dang / yongs su spyad pa dang / dga' ba dang / rtse ba'i longs spyod ji snyed pa de dag
144b7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad bcom zhing phrogs te khyer bar gyur na/ 'od srungs 'di ji snyam du sems/ gzhi de las mi de bsod nams ma yin pa mang du skyed snyam mama'od srungs kyis gsol pa/
145a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das mang du skyeng lags so// bde bar gshegs pa mang du skyed lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba 'od srungs khyod mos par bya
145a2(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis khong du chud bar bya ste/ gang zhig bdag nyid 'bras bu ma thob cing so so'i skye bo yin par shes bzhin du ka de rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa 'dod pas zil gyis non pas/
145a3(dkon brtsegs): gzhan dag gi mdun du bdag nyid phyir mi 'ong ba yin par khas 'che bar byed cing / tha na bsod snyoms gcig tsam yongs su longs spyod par byed na/ de ni de bas ches bsod nams ma yin pa'i
145a4(dkon brtsegs): phung po mang du skyed de/ de ni debs ches bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung po mi zad pa skyed pa yin no// 'od srungs stong chung ngu phra mo'i 'jig rten gyi khams na mi gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyi nye bar
145a5(dkon brtsegs): spyad pa'i longs spyod rnams lta zhog gi/ 'od srungs mi bzhi pa ches shin tu rab tu gtum pa/ ches shin tu rab tu brlang ba ches shin tu rab tu drag shul gyi las dang ldan pa/ ches shin tu
145a6(dkon brtsegs): rab tu nyams stobs dang ldan pa/ ches shin tu rab tu stobs chen po'i shugs dang ldan pa gang la la zhig byung bar gyur la ga 'od srungs mo des stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams na lha dang / klu dang /
145a7(dkon brtsegs): gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa'i sems can gang ji snyed ba de dag thams cad dbyug pas
145b1(dkon brtsegs): brdegs sam/ mtshon gyis btab bam/ khu tshur gyis bsnun te pham par byas nas/ nye bar spyad pa'i longs spyod 'gron bu dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / baiDUR+Ya dang / dung dang
145b2(dkon brtsegs): man shel dang / byu ru dang / sa le sbram dang / dngul dang / rin po che sna tshogs dang / khang khyim dang / bzhon pa dang / gos dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / mal cha dang / stan gyi
145b3(dkon brtsegs): bar spyad pa dang / yongs su spyad pa dang / dga' ba dang / rtse ba'i bde ba'i yo byad ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bcom zhing phrogs te khyer bar gyur na/ 'od srungs 'di ji snyam du sems gzhi de las
145b4(dkon brtsegs): mi de bsod nams ma yin pa mang du skyed snyam mam/ 'od srungs kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang du skyed lags so// bde bar gshegs pa mang du skyed lags so// bcom ldan
145b5(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srungs khyod mos par bya/ khyod kyis khong du chud par bya ste/ gang zhig bdag nyid 'bras bu ma thob cing so so'i skye bo yin par shes bzhin du/ de rnyed pa dang /
145b6(dkon brtsegs): bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa 'dod pas zil gyis non pas// gzhan dag gi mdun du bdag nyid dgra bcom pa yin par khas 'che bar byed cing / ci nas kyang gzhan dag gis dgra bcom pa
145b7(dkon brtsegs): yin par shes par bya'o snyam nas/ dgra bcom pa stong du 'byung ba ltar steng du 'byung bar byed/ dgra bcom pa'i dpe ston pa ltar dpe ston par yang byed la/ de la sdig pa can gyi 'dod pa de
146a1(dkon brtsegs): lta bu dang ldan pas tha na gzhan gyis byin pa'i ngad pas byin pa bsod snyoms gcig tsam yongs su longs spyod par byed na/ de ni de bas ches bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung po mang du skyed de/
146a2(dkon brtsegs): de ni de bas ches bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung po mi zad pa skyed pa yin no// 'od srungs de lta bas na gang stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad kyi bde ba'i yo byad thams cad 'phrogs par
146a3(dkon brtsegs): spro ba de ni/ sdig pa can gyi 'dod pa de lta bu des dad pas byin pa yongs su longs spyod par byed de/ 'od srungs ngas ni sdig pa can gyi 'dod pa de las gzhan pa rab tu byung ba'i chos shin tu tha chad cig
146a4(dkon brtsegs): shos gzhan ma mthong ngo // 'od srungs bzhi po 'di dag ni nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rab tu byung ba'i sdig pa 'dod pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas mthong bar 'dod pa dang / 'bor
146a5(dkon brtsegs): los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid 'dod pa dang / gzhan yang rgyal rigs kyi rigs dag 'dod pa dang / bram ze'i rigs dag 'dod pa ste/ bzhi po de dag ni nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rab tu byung ba'i sdig pa 'dod pa yin
146a6(dkon brtsegs): gang du 'ga' zhig la smon par byed na/ cher na mya ngan las 'das pa la smon par byed na'ang / de'ang de'i sdig pa 'dod pa nyid yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pas de la dgongs nas/ dge slong dag
146a7(dkon brtsegs): nicher na phung po lhag ma dang bcas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'ang rung ste/ skad cig tsam skye ba la'ang bsngags pa mi brjod do zhes ston no// 'od srungs bzhi po 'di dag ni dge sbyong gyi dri ma ste/ rab tu/
146b1(dkon brtsegs): byung bas de dag thams cad kyi thams cad du mi bya'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'jig tshogs la mngon par zhen pa dang / gang zag tu 'dzin pa dang / bslab pa las 'da' ba dang / ma 'ongs pa'i sangs
146b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas mthong bar 'dod pa ste/ bzhi po de dag ni dge sbyong gi dri ma yin te/ rab tu byung bas de dag thams cad kyi thams cad du mi bya'o// 'od srungs dge sbyong dang bram ze 'tshe ba yongs su dag pa sdig
146b3(dkon brtsegs): pa 'dod pa med pa/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ drang po'i rang bzhin can// g.yo med pa sgyu can ma yin pa/ khengs pa ma yin pa/ yongs su mya ngan las 'angarab 'dod pa rnams kyi cheng du
146b4(dkon brtsegs): ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas na/ 'od srungs de dag dbugs 'byin par byed par brjod par bya ste/ de thos na rnal 'byor pa
146b5(dkon brtsegs): rnal 'byor spyod pa dag dga' ba dang mgu bar 'gyur ro// 'od srungs rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can gang
146b6(dkon brtsegs): ji snyed pa de dag thams cad la bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa las lhag par bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas pa bas ni yang dag par zhugs
146b7(dkon brtsegs): pa tshul khrims yongs su dag pa 'tsho ba yongs su dag pa zhig gis/ sbyin pa po gang gis dang pas byin pa tha na chu snod gang tsam zhig bdag gir byas par gyur na/ de nyid de la bsod nams kyi phung
147a1(dkon brtsegs): po ches rgya cher 'gyur gyi/ gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad la bskal pa'am/ bskal pa las lhag par bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bkur
147a2(dkon brtsegs): sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas pa de la ni de lta ma yin no// 'od srungs ji ltar mi blun po sdig pa 'dod pa dang ldan pa des gang gi drung nas chos gos sam/ bsod snyoms
147a3(dkon brtsegs): yongs su longs spyad pa de'i don de yongs su nyams par byed pa de ltar ni dgra bo dang / gshed ma dang / phyir rgol ba dang / phas kyi dgras kyang yongs su nyams par byed mi nus so// 'od srungs
147a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhi po 'di dag ni rab tu byung ba'i nyon mongs pa cha phra ba rnams yin te/ rab tu byung ba nyon mongs pa cha phra ba de dag dang ldan na 'di lta ste/ dper na mnga' 'phangs pa de bzhin du sems can dmyal
147a5(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gro ba yin par brjod par bya'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ gzhan gyi rnyed pa la phrag dog gi chos nyid dang ldan pa dang / sdom pa dang ldan pa'i mdo sde thos nas tshul khrims kyi nyes pa 'byin
147a6(dkon brtsegs): par byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' las 'das sam/ bslab pa las 'das na lhag pa'i nga rgyal gyis 'chab par byed cing / rnam par 'byed par mi byed chags par mi byed pa
147a7(dkon brtsegs): dngashes shing rtogs bzhin du dad pas byin pa yongs su longs spyod par byed pa ste/ 'od srungs bzhi po de dag ni rab tu byung ba'i nyon mongs par phra ba rnams yin te/ rab tu byung ba
147b1(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs par za ba de dag dang ldan na/ 'di lta ste/ dper na mnga' 'phangs pa de bzhin du sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba yin par brjod par bya'o// 'od srungs bzhi po 'di ngag ni dge sbyong ltar bcos
147b2(dkon brtsegs): pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ tshul khrims 'chal pa dang / bdag tu lta ba dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba dang / 'jig rten rgyang 'phen pa ste/ bzhi po de dag ni dge sbyong ltar bcos pa yin no//
147b3(dkon brtsegs): 'od srungs bzhi po 'di dag ni rab tu byung ba'i rgyags shing bkra med pa yin te/ rab tu byung ba rgyags shing bag med pa de dag dang ldan na sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba yin par brjod par
147b4(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ mang du thos pas rgyags shing / de mang du thos pas bag med par 'gyur ba dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pas rgyags shing // de rnyed
147b5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pas zil gyis non pas bag med par 'gyur ba dang / mdza' bshes kyi khyim dang / slongs mo ster ba'i khyim gyis rgyags shing
147b6(dkon brtsegs): de mdza' bshes kyi khyim dang slongs mo ster ba'i khyim gyis spags pas bag med par 'gyur ba dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang yo byad ba spungs pas rgyags shing // de sbyangs pa'i yon
147b7(dkon brtsegs): tan dang yo byad bsnyungs pas rgyags pas bdag la bstod par byed/ gzhan la smod par byed pa de ni bag med pa zhes bya ste/ 'od srungs bzhi pi de dag ni rab tu byung ba'i rgyags shing bag
148a1(dkon brtsegs): med pa yin te/ rab tu byung ba rgyags shing brag med pa de dag dang ldan na sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba yin par brjod par bya'o// de nas
148a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la/ gnas brtan 'od srungs chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la dge sbyong dge sbyong ltar bcos pa/ ngur smrig
148a3(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal ba gang dag de bzhin gshegs pas bskal pa bye ba grangs ma mchis par yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di nub par bgyid par 'gyur ba
148a4(dkon brtsegs): ci 'dra ba dag 'byung bar 'gyur lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'od srungs de bzhin
148a5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa la gtam 'di yongs su dris pas khyod la ci byas thong zhig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'od srungs gal te de bzhin gshegs pas mi blun po de dag gi sdig pa 'dod pa dang / yang dag pa ma
148a6(dkon brtsegs): yin par 'dzin pa dang / g.yo dang / chom rkun dang / phyin ci log dang / bdud kyi nyes pa dang / bdud kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis skyon yang dag pa thams cad brjod cing yang dag par bshad par gyur
148a7(dkon brtsegs): na 'od srungs khyod kyis skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa de dag gi sdig pa kun spyod pa de dag thos na/ yang dag pa yin yang snang bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// de nas bcom ldan
148b1(dkon brtsegs): 'das la/ gnas brtan 'od srungs chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas chos 'dul ba 'di ci nas kyang yun ring du gnas
148b2(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur bar byin gyis brlab tu gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'od srungs de bzhin gshegs pa ni ring
148b3(dkon brtsegs): po mi thogs par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro// 'od srungs kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dam pa'i chos kun tu bsrungs pa'i skud du/ bcom ldan 'das
148b4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa las lhag par bzhugs su gsol// de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po la 'di skad
148b5(dkon brtsegs): ces bka' stsal to// 'od srungs gal te sangs rgyas stong snyed cig gis mi blun po de dag la cho 'phrul dang bcas pa'i chos bstan du zin kyang skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa de dag sdig pa 'dod pa dang /
148b6(dkon brtsegs): sdig pa 'dzin pa de dag las phyir gzung ba 'am/ bzlog par mi spyod do// 'od srungs gzhan yang khyod phyi ma'i tshe/ phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos bsrung bar spro 'am
148b7(dkon brtsegs): sems can bsam pa dge ba gang dag khyod kyis bshad pa la gus par nyan paskyed par 'gyur ba dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/
149a1(dkon brtsegs): gnas brtan 'od srungs chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams grong dang / grong khyer dang /
149a2(dkon brtsegs): grong rdal dang bcas pa/ brag dang ri bo'i zom dang bcas pa/ rgya mtsho dang / chu klung dang / nags tshal dang bcas pa'ang bskal pa 'am/ bskul pa las lhag par phrag pa 'am
149a3(dkon brtsegs): spyi bo la 'tshal bar ni spro lags kyi/ bcom ldan 'das bdag skyes bu dam pa ma lags pa de dag gi log par smra ba'i sug las de dag nyan par ni mi spro lags so// bcom ldan
149a4(dkon brtsegs): 'angs bdag rgyu shug gam/ til lam/ 'bras bu gcig gis bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa las lhag par 'tsho bar ni spro lags kyi/ bcom ldan 'das bdag skyes bu dam pa ma lag
149a5(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag gi log par smra ba'i sug las de dag nyan par ni mi spro lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su bskal pa'i zhugs chen po
149a6(dkon brtsegs): 'bar/ kur tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar bar gyur pa'i nang du spyod lam bzhi po dag gis dgung lo bye ba snyed du gnas par ni spro lags kyi/ bcom ldan 'das bdag skyes bu dam
149a7(dkon brtsegs): pa ma lags pa de dag gi log par smra ba'i sug las de dag nyan par ni mi spro lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag sems can thams cad las khro ba dang / spro ba dang / smad pa dang / gshung ba dang //
149b1(dkon brtsegs): bsdigs pa dang / brdeg bcog dag bzod pas dang du len par ni spro lags kyi bcom ldan 'das bdag mi blun po chos kyi rkun po// chos kyi chom rkun pa/ chos la mu cor smra ba / chos sngar
149b2(dkon brtsegs): bcos pa ston pa de dag gi log par smra ba'i sug las de dag nyan par ni mi spro lags te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni rdo che bar spyod pany+tsi tshe ba'i shes pa dang ldan pa lags pas/ de lta
149b3(dkon brtsegs): bu'i khur 'jig pa'i rngo mo thog legs kyi/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas ni de lta bu'i khur 'dzeg par rje thog lags so// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang 'di la bdag
149b4(dkon brtsegs): dpe brjod par spobs lags te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na mi la la zhog rgas shing gtugs la 'khogs par gyur cing / de rang na tshong dgung lo brgya nyi shu tsam
149b5(dkon brtsegs): lags par gyur la/ mi de dro nad kyis thebs shing glo ba mi ba nas/ mchis mal gyi khri steng du mchis nyal bar gyur pa na/ mi shes rab 'chal pa'i rang bzhin can byug pa/
149b6(dkon brtsegs): nor mang ba/ longs spyod che ba la la zhig der mchis nas/ mi mchis mal gyi bri steng na mchis nyal ba de la/ kye skyes du kho bo'i gter 'di khyod la gtams kyis/ kho bo gang gi tshe
149b7(dkon brtsegs): lo bcu 'am/ le nyi shu tsam na yul gzhan nas bdag phyir 'ong ba de'i tshe khyod kyis gter 'di kho bo la phyir byin cig ces de'i sug par gter 'doms par bgyid cing / de ltar gtams
150a1(dkon brtsegs): nas yul gzhan du mchis par gyur la/ mi mchis mal gyi khri steng na mchis nyal ba de la'ang bu'ang ma mchis/ bu mo'ang ma mchis/ 'khor yang ma mchis la/
150a2(dkon brtsegs): de nas mi de yul gzhan du mchis nas/ ring po ma lags par de'ang 'gum pa'i dus bgyid 'gyur na/ nor gyi tshogs de dag thams cad kyang chab 'tshal bar gyur pa'i skad na/ mi de slar mchi
150a3(dkon brtsegs): na su la ji skad bgyir yang ma mchis pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das gang zhig nyan thos nyi tshe bar spyod pa'i tshe ba'i shes pa dang ldan pa// zla bo ma mchis pa/ yun ring por mi gnas pa ladam
150a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos kyi gter 'doms par bgyid na/ de'ang yun ring du gnas par mi 'gyur bar 'tshal bar bgyi lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srungs legs so sogs so//
150a5(dkon brtsegs): ngas kyang de ltar shes te/ 'on kyang khyod las dpe'i spobs pa de lta bu thos na skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa de dag kun tu skyo ba'i sems skye bar 'gyur bas na/ ngas shes bzhin du khyod la dris pa yin no//
150a6(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ gnas brtan 'od srungs chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di la bdag depe gnyis brjod par yang spobs lags te/ bcom ldan
150a7(dkon brtsegs): 'das 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na mi bro nang ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin can bro nang dang bral ba/ dgung lo 'bum phrag du mar 'tshe ba/ bzhon nu thor bu lang tshe la bab pa/ g.yog 'khor phun sum chog pa/
150b1(dkon brtsegs): longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa/ rus phun sum tshogs pa/ rigs phun sum tshogs pa/ dge ba'i ngang tshul can/ byams pa dang ldan pa/ snying rje che ba/ yid dga' ba dang ldan pa/ sems can
150b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi skyon dang nyon mongs pa'i skyon rnams la btang snyoms su 'jog pa/ skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi skye bo phal po che'i don
150b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / sman pa dang / bde ba'i slad du zhugs pa dang / brtul ba brtan pa la la zhig mchis par gyur la/ skyes bu dam pa de'i gan du mi la la zhig mchis nas/ 'di skad ces kye skyes bu kho za
150b4(dkon brtsegs): gter 'di khyod la gtams kyis/ khyod kyis gter 'dri legs par sbab dang / legs par bsrung bar gyis shig/ kho bo gang gi tshe lo bcu 'am/ nyi shu tsam na yul gzhan nas phyir 'ong bde
150b5(dkon brtsegs): che khyod kyis gter 'di khe bo la phyir byin cig ces smras te/ de'i sug par gter de dag gtams na/ mi de ni gte reng blangs nas legs par sbed pa dang / srung bar bgyid cing mi de slar
150b6(dkon brtsegs): mchis nas kyang gter de slar stsol bar bgyid pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das gang zhig byang chub sems dpa' la dam pa'i chos kyi gter 'doms par bgyid na/ de ni bskal pa bye ba
150b7(dkon brtsegs): khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang por yang cha ba 'tshal bar mi 'gyur zhing / skye bo mang po la'ang slar thogs par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi gdung dang / chos kyi gdung dang / dge 'dun gyi gdung rgyun mi 'chad par yang 'gyur
151a1(dkon brtsegs): lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni byang chub sems dpas gang yongs su sgrub par bgyid pa'i bgyi ba de dang don de yongs su sgrub par rngo mi thog
151a2(dkon brtsegs): lags kyi/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa 'di 'khor 'di nyid du 'dus te/ mngon du mchis lags pas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di la
151a3(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsol cig dang / 'dis ni slad ma'i tshe slangad ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ba'i dus kyi tshe na/ de bzhin gshegs pas bskal pa bye ba grangs ma
151a4(dkon brtsegs): mchis par yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di 'dzin par 'gyur/ rgyas par bgyid par 'gyur lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom
151a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'og tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang /
151a6(dkon brtsegs): rgya bar 'gyur ba lags pa'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i bu thu bo gang lags pa de ni/ rgyal po'i 'og tu rgyal
151a7(dkon brtsegs): srid bgyid du stsol bar 'gyur ba lags pas// de ni rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba de nyid mchis bzhin du'ang / rgyal srid la spro bar bgyid cing chos dang ldan par yang 'gyur la/
151b1(dkon brtsegs): de 'di snyam du rang sems lags te/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba 'di'i 'og tu ni/ bdag gis rgyal po bgyi'o snyam nas dbugs 'byin pa thob par yang 'gyur zhing / 'di ltar rgyal po
151b2(dkon brtsegs): bgyi ba gang dag lags pa de dag la'ang mngon par brtson par bgyid pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'das pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa 'di'
151b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ dam pa'i chos kyi rgyab srid kyi rgyal srid chen po dgyid du stsol bar 'gyur ba lags pas/ 'dis ni dam pa'i chos kun tu bsrungs pa la mngon par brtson par bgyi 'tshal lags so//
151b4(dkon brtsegs): de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gnas brtan 'od srungs chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'od srungs legs sa legs so// ji skad smras pa de bzhin no//
151b5(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag g.yas pa gser gyi mdog can brkyang nas/ bskal pa bye ba grangs med par dge ba'i rtsa bas yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i phyag 'jam pa/ mchog tu
151b6(dkon brtsegs): mnyen pa/ ka tsa lin di ka ltar reg na bde ba/ rgya skyegs kyi khu bas bsgos pa'i mdog 'dra ba/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i mgo bor bzhag ste byugs nas 'di skad ces
151b7(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal to// byams pa khyod phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ba'i dus la bab pa'i tshe na/ dam pa'i chos kun tu bsrung ba dang / yun ring du gnas par
152a1(dkon brtsegs): bya/ 'gyur ba dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun gyi gdung rgyun mi 'chang bar bya ba'i phyir spro bar gyis shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems
152a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i spyi bor phyag g.yas pa gser gyi mdog can bzhag ma thag tug de nas skad cig de nyid la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di lan gsum du rab tu
152a3(dkon brtsegs): g.yos te/ g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ 'gul/ rab tu 'gul kun tu rab tu 'gul/ ldeg/ rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg cing / 'jig rten du snang ba chen po
152a4(dkon brtsegs): byung bar gyur/ sa bla ba dang / bar snang la gnas pa dang / 'og mir gyi bar gyi lha rnams kyis kyang thal mo sbyar te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la/ dpags pa byams
152a5(dkon brtsegs): pa khyod skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi skye bo bal po che'i don dang / sman pa dang / bde ba'i slad du dam pa'i chos kun tu bsrung ba dang /
152a6(dkon brtsegs): yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba dang / yongs su gzung bar spro bar mdzod cig ces smras so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa stan las langs te/
152a7(dkon brtsegs): bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btung nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
152b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can gcig gi don gyi slang du'ang slad ma'i mtha'i mu'i bar du 'bor ba nang khor bar yang spro lags na/ dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i slad du lta smos kyang rtsi
152b2(dkon brtsegs): te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pas bskal pa bye bgrangs ma mchis par yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di kun tu bsrung ba dang
152b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas par bgyi lags so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas pus mo g.yas pa'i lpangs la btsugs ma thag tu/ de nas yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten//
152b4(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams 'dri rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos so// / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
152b5(dkon brtsegs): 'das bdag ni su la'ang 'gran par mi bgyid/ nga rgyal mi 'gyid lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba 'di dag ni skyes bu dam pa'i sug las
152b6(dkon brtsegs): lags te/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas khur gang 'deg par bgyid pa'i khur de lta bu de ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis 'deg par rngo mo thog pa'i slad du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/
152b7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ byams pa legs se legs so// ji ltar nga'i spyan snga na khyod dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir seng ge'i sgra
153a1(dkon brtsegs): bya/ 'di lta bu sgrogs par byed pa de bzhin du/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi spyan snga dag na'ang byang chub sems dpa' rnams seng ge'i sgra
153a2(dkon brtsegs): sgrogs shing dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par byed do// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces
153a3(dkon brtsegs): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas skyes bu dam pa ma lags pa byang chub sems dpar mchid kyis 'che ba/ dge sbyong du mchid kyis 'che ba/ glen pa blun po rnyed
153a4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang bkur sti 'tshal ba/ rnyed pa dang bkur sti la gdu ba dang / mdza' ba shes kyi sdum pa dang / slongs mo ster ba'i sdum pa la gdu ba/ bsod nyams la sbyor bar brtson pa/ de dag gi
153a5(dkon brtsegs): nongs pa'i gnas bdag la bka' stsal du gsol/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bdag gis rgyu de dag thos na/ de dag rtogs pas myur ba myur bar gcod par bgyid
153a6(dkon brtsegs): cing nongs pa de dag las bdag nyid srung bar bgyid pa dang // skyes bu dam pa ma lags pa de dag las kyang la la de de bzhin gshegs pas bdag mkhyen cing de bzhin gshegs pas
153a7(dkon brtsegs): bdag rtogs so// rab tu rtogs so zhes de bzhin gshegs pa la dang ba skye bar 'gyur ba'i slad du'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'
153b1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byams pa de'i sbyor legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang / skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa de dag gi nyes pa'i
153b2(dkon brtsegs): gnas gang yin pa cung zad tsam zhig bstan par bya ste/ byams pa de la phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya ba tha mal byang chub sems dpar khas 'che ba mang po 'byung ba de dag gi sdig pa
153b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa gang yin pa de dag bshang bar bya'o// byams pa byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' khas 'che ba yin par rig par bye ste/ bzhi gang zhe na rnyed
153b4(dkon brtsegs): ba 'dod pa dang / bkur sti 'dod pa dang / g.yo byed pa dang / yang ba'i 'tsho bas 'tsho bar byed pa yin te/ byams pa byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na byang chub
153b5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpar khas 'che ba yin par rig par bya'o// byams pa de la phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la byang chub sems dpar khas 'che ba khyi'i chos kun tu spyod pa mang po dag
153b6(dkon brtsegs): 'byung bar 'gyur te/ byams pa 'di lta ste/ dper na byi ni sngon lan 'ga' phyir pa'i khyim gzhan zhig tu byi gzhan zhig rgyang rang po nas 'ong ba mthong na/ khyim 'di ni bdag gi yin no snyam ras
153b7(dkon brtsegs): de la zugs par byed/ 'then skad 'byin khro bas lta bar byed/ gnod sems kyis nyes pa skyed par byed de/ gzhan gyi khyim bdag gir byed cing bdag gi yin par 'du shes skyed par byed do//
154a1(dkon brtsegs): byams pa de bzhin du phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la byang chub sems dpar bas 'che ba khyi'i chos kun tu spyod pa mang po 'byung bar 'gyur ba gang dag yin pa de
154a2(dkon brtsegs): dag kyang / gzhan gyi khyim dang gzhan gyi grong dag la bdag nyid kyi yin par 'du shes skyed par byed cing / bdag nyid kyi yin par 'du shes bskyeng nas kyang yongs su 'dzin par byed de/ dge slong
154a3(dkon brtsegs): des sngon phyin pa'i khyim der dge slong gzhan zhig 'ong ba mthong na/ de khyim 'di ni bdag gi yin no snyam nas khro bas lta bar byed/ gnod sems skyed par byed/ 'thab mo dang / 'thab pa dang /
154a4(dkon brtsegs): rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa skyed par byed/ phan tshun dbyen gyi tshig smra bar byed/ tshig rtsub po rjod par byed/ gcig la gcig dge slong che ge mo zhes bya ba la nyes pa 'di lta bu yod do// dge slong
154a5(dkon brtsegs): ma che ge mo zhes bya ba la nyes pa 'di lta bu yod do zhes mi snyan pa rjed par byed cing / khyim bdag la'ang gal te khyod ngo bo dang sten par 'dod na/ dge slong che ge mo zhig dang bsten par mi
154a6(dkon brtsegs): bya zhing / dge slong ma che ge mo zhig dang yang ma sten cig ces zer te/ de dag ni skyugs pa'i rgyur gyur pa ring du mi gnas pa smad par bya ba'i kha zas tsam gyi phyir bsod nams ma yin pa
154a7(dkon brtsegs): mang po skyed pa yin no// de dag ni yi dgas kyi yon tan gyi chos kun tu spyod cing / dbul ba dang / sems dman pa dang / ser sna dang ldan pa dang / bdag nyid gso bar byed pa yin te/
154b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i ming gis byang chub sems dpa' yin par khas 'che bar byed cing / bdag nyid tshul khrims 'chal pa dang / sdig pa can gyi 'dod pa dang ldan pa dang
154b2(dkon brtsegs): sdig pa kun tu spyod pa yin bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa brjod/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi bsngags pa brjod cing byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa phun sum
154b3(dkon brtsegs): tshogs pa gzhan dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod nas zas dang gos sgrub par byed do// byams pa 'di ltar seng ge'i sgru ba skrag cing seng ge'i las rnams bya ba'i rigs pa/ wa'i sgra sgrogs shing
154b4(dkon brtsegs): wa'i las rnams byed pa dang / bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i bsngags pa rjod par byed cing 'jig rten gyi zar zing yun mi ring ba yongs su gtong bar mi byed la/ ser snas
154b5(dkon brtsegs): zil gyis non cing yo byad kyi dri mas spags pa de dag gis gtong ba phyi rol tu bya ba dang / phan pa'i dngos po'i bsngags pa rjod par byed cing gnod sems dang / tha ba dang / khong khro ba'i nyes pa
154b6(dkon brtsegs): mang po byed pa dang / bzod pa'i bsngags brjod par byed cing / gcig tu gnod sems kyi sems su byed pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po dag gi bsngags pa rjod par byed cing // sems
154b7(dkon brtsegs): can 'ga' yang sbyin pa 'am/ snyan par smra ba'am/ don spyod pa 'am// don mthun pas sdud par mi byed pa de dag ji tsam du mi bzang par 'gyur ba la ltos// de dag ni tshig tsam gyi dngos por
155a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba yin gyi/ de dag yon tan yang dag par blang ba dang 'dres pa'i spyod pas/ byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus la mos pa'i rjes su slob par byed pa ni ma yin no//
155a2(dkon brtsegs): byams pa sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa grangs med pa dang / ches grangs med pa dang / ches shin tu grangs med pa dang / rgya che ba dang / tshad med pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab
155a3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / dpag tu med pa dag 'das pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ye shes bla ma zhes bya ba rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar
155a4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shig 'jig rten du byung ste/ byams pade
155a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa de'ang 'di lta ste/ dper na da ltar rang bzhin du stsogs ma lnga dang ldan pa kho na'i 'jig rten du byung ngo // byams pa de'i tshe na dge slong brtson 'grus mes shes bya ba dran pa dang
155a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa/ rtogs pa dang ldan pa/ blo dang ldan pa/ 'dod pa chung ba/ chog shes pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la nan tan byed pa zhig byung bar gyur te/ de grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong /
155a7(dkon brtsegs): rdal dang / rgyal po'i pho brang dang / yul 'khor de dag tu song ste phyin pa dang / chos ston par byed cing / rgyal po dang blon po chen po dag dang / skye bo phal po che gzhan dag gis kyang ri mo byas
155b1(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa byas// bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas shes par byas/ yongs su shes par byas so// de khyim gar du zhugs shing / gang las tshig snyan pa dang / bdag la gus par can
155b2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba thob par gyur pa'i khyim der ni/ de lan gnyis su 'gro bar sems skyed par mi byed do// de 'jungs pa dang / ma dang pa dang / log par lta ba dang ldan pa'i
155b3(dkon brtsegs): khyim gzhan dag tu song zhing de rag tu son pa na/ de la de dag 'ongs pa legs so zhes kyang mi zer/ de dag tshig snyan pa'ang mi rjod pa'i steng du de la khro bar byed/ gshe bar byed nu'ang de bzod
155b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i go bgos shing / snying rje chen po la gnas pas 'gro la// khyim de dag tu yongs su gdung bar mi 'gyur zhing yid mi bde bar yang mi 'gyur ro// byams pa byang chub sems dpa'
155b5(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus mos nges khyim gang dag dang bar byas pa de dag ni/ 'di lta ste/ chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad dag gis
155b6(dkon brtsegs): dge slong gzhan dag gi nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems/ de khyim de dag tu 'ang 'gro bar mi byed cing / 'gro bar sems skyed par yang mi byed mod kyi/ 'on kyang
155b7(dkon brtsegs): de dag la phrag dog dang ser sna'i sems skyeng bar byed snyam mam/ byams pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bde bar gshegs pa de ni ma lags so//
156a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ byams pa de ltar byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus mos de khyim gang dag nas tshig snyan pa dang / bdag la gus par nyan pa dang /
156a2(dkon brtsegs): bza' ba dang btung ba rnyed pa'i khyim de dag mngon par dad par byas shing / dge slong gzhan dag gi nye bar 'tsho bar byas nas de dag tu lan gnyis su 'jug par mi byed pa dang / 'jus pa dang / ma dang
156a3(dkon brtsegs): dang log par lta ba dang ldan pa'i khyim gang dag yin pa de dag dad par byed cing / de dag khro zhing gshe na'ang yongs su gdung bar mi 'gyur zhing yid mi bde bar mi 'gyur ba'i phan pa'i dngos po nyid dang /
156a4(dkon brtsegs): lhag pa'i bsam pa nyid dang / 'dod pa chung ba nyid dang / chog shes pa nyid dang / nges pa nyid dang / snying rje dang ldan pa nyid la ltos/ byams pa de ltar na sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni khyim
156a5(dkon brtsegs): pa dag dang par byas shing / gzhan gyi nye bar 'tsho bar byed kyi/ bdag nyid chos gos dang bsod snyoms kyi don du byed pa ni ma yin no// byams pa de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' brtson
156a6(dkon brtsegs): 'grus mos shes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod yid gnyis dang the tsom za bar gyur na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus
156a7(dkon brtsegs): mos shes bya bar gyur teto// byams pa de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' khyim rnams 'dre bar 'dod pas ni byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus mos de'i rjes su bslab par yang bya//
156b1(dkon brtsegs): de las gzhan ba'i byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam baphun sum tshogs pa dag gi rjes su 'ang bslab par bya zhing / de dag gi chos kun tu spyad par yang bya'o//
156b2(dkon brtsegs): bam po gnyis pa// / byams pa yang phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tham la byang chub sems dpa' bas 'che ba'i dge slong ba cig 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag ni 'di lta ste/ rnyeng pa
156b3(dkon brtsegs): dang chos gos dang / bsod snyoms kyi don du khyim rnams su 'gro bar 'gyur gyi/ khyim pa rnams dang pa la dgod pa'i phyir ni ma yin te/ de dag ni gcig la gcig bsngags pa ma yin brjod
156b4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang 'byed pa dang / rtsod pa'i rang bzhin can du 'gyur ro// de dag ni ji ltar gzhan dag gis ma rnyed pas yi rangs par 'gyur ba ltar bdag nyid kyis rnyed pas ni de lta ma yin la// ji ltar
156b5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan dag gis rnyed par yid mi bde bar 'gyur ba ltar bdag nyid kyis ma rnyed pas ni de lta ma yin no// byams pa 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas ni bdag nyid kyi bde ba'i yo byad de dag
156b6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad lo mi lta bar gzhan la sbyin par bya ba yin na/ de dag ji tsam du byin ci log tu 'gyur ba la ltos/ de rje'i byor zhe na/ byams pa 'di ltar nges ni bdag gis sems can thams cad
156b7(dkon brtsegs): la bde ba bskyed par bya'o zhes snying rje chen po sngon du btang ba'i sems bskyed pa'i phyir ro// byams pa 'di lta ste/ dper na tshong dpon nam/ khyim bdag gcig la bu gcig pa sdug pa 'badra
157a1(dkon brtsegs): bya/ pa yid du 'ong ba zhig bdog par gyur pa de/ la lan 'ga' zhig gi phyir rgyal pos brtsonar rab cug par gyur na/ byam pa 'di ji snyam du sems/ tshong dpon nam/ khyim bdag de yid
157a2(dkon brtsegs): la byed pa'i sems ji lta bu dag gis rgyal po'i btson ra dar 'jug par 'gyur snyam mam/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
157a3(dkon brtsegs): byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar bu gcig pa de thar bar bgyi ba'i bsam pas bdag gis bu gcig pa 'di btson ra 'di nas myur du thar par bgyi'o snyam nas
157a4(dkon brtsegs): bu gcig pa yid la bgyid pa kho na dag gis btson re nger 'jug par bgyid de/ thar pa yid la bgyid pa dag gis 'jug cing 'byung bar bgyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pangs
157a5(dkon brtsegs): dpe de ni don shes par bya ba'i phyir brjod pa yin te/ 'dir don yang gang zhig yin par blta bar bya zhe na/ byams pa 'di lta ste dper na rgyal po'i btson rede ji lta ba de bzhin du ni 'khor ba'i btson rab lta
157a6(dkon brtsegs): bar bya'o// byams pa 'di lta ste/ dper na tshong dpon nam/ khyim bdag de ji lta ba de nin du ni byang chub sems dpa' blta bar bya'o// byams pa 'di lta ste/ dper na bu gcig pa de ji lta ba de bzhin
157a7(dkon brtsegs): du ni byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa dang 'dra ba'i 'du shes bskyed par bya ba blta bar bya'o// byams pa 'di lta ste/ dper na tshong dpon nam/ khyim bdag de rgyu gzhan gyi phyir
157b1(dkon brtsegs): ma yin zhing / ched ka gzhan gyi phyir ma yin gyi bu gcig pa de'i don du btson ra der 'jug par 'gyur ba ji lta ba de bzhin du ni bya mas pa byang chub sems dpas chos gos kyi ched dang / bsod snyoms kyi che
157b2(dkon brtsegs): du phyi ma rnams su 'gro bar ma bya'i/ 'di ltar sems can de dag nyid 'khor ba las yongs su thar par bya ba'i phyir gyis rnams su 'gro bar bya ba blta bar bya'o// thams pa yang phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus pa
157b3(dkon brtsegs): brgya pa tha ma la dge slong lus ma bsgoms pa/ sems ma bsgoms pa/ tshul khrims ma bsgoms pa/ shes rab ma bsgoms pa kha cig 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag ni chos gos dang bsod snyoms
157b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi ched me tog gi skyes ngag dang / 'bras bu'i skyes rag dang / lo ma'i skyes dag dang / yo byad kyi skyes dag dang / byas pa'i len gyi skyes dag gis khyim rnams su 'gro bar 'gyur bas khyams pa dge slong
157b5(dkon brtsegs): gis ni me tog 'phreng rgyu lta bur mi bya zhing bran dang las mi lta bur yang mi bya'o// byams pa dge slong khyim rnams su'ang 'gro bar 'dod pas ni chos kyi skyes kyis 'gro bar bya ba ma gtogs par
157b6(dkon brtsegs): skyes gzhan bskur bar mo bye ste/ des ni mang du thos pa dang / gzhung la shin tu zhugs pa dang / 'jigs pa med pa dang brkam chags med pa dang / tshul 'chos pa med pa dang / kha gsag med pa dang /
157b7(dkon brtsegs): bdag gir bya ba med par bya zhing / chos la dga' ba bskyed nas khyim rnams su 'gro bar bya'o// khyim rnams su son nas kyang sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa brjod par bya ba dang /
158a1(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi bsngags pa brjod par bya zhing chos kyi gtam bya ba'i sems ma gtogs par
158a2(dkon brtsegs): khang khyim gyi cheng ngam/ rnyed pa'i ched ngam/ reg pa bde ba'i gtam mam/ rgyal po'i gtam ma ma/ grong gi gtam mam/ grong khyer gyi gtam mam/ ljongs kyi gtam mamra/ bu'i gtam mam bu mo
158a3(dkon brtsegs): gtam ma ma/ gtam gzhan gyi skyes dag mi bya'o// byams pa gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su bkang ste/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi
158a4(dkon brtsegs): bu mo zhig la byin pa dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi bde ba'i yo byad gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bsdus te/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rig
158a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu mo de la byin par gyur na/ nor gyi phung po de tsam dang / bde ba'i yo byad de tsam gyis ni nges rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la snying brtse ba 'am/ phan gdags par mi 'gyur gyi/ de tshig bzhi pa'i tshogs
158a6(dkon brtsegs): su bcad pa gcig tsam zhig nyan du bcug ste/ de'ang de'i rna ba'i rnam par rig par grags shing thos pa tsam kho nar zad kyi/ re zhig dad pa thob par ma gyur tu zin kyang de ni rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de
158a7(dkon brtsegs): la rgyas pa dang / phan 'dogs pa dang / snying brtse ba ches shin tu mang du byed pa yin no// byams pa dge slong de dag khyim rnams su zhugs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi bka' spangs te/ 'jig rten pa'i gtam
158b1(dkon brtsegs): nye bar sbyor bar byed cing / ji tsam du don med pa chen pos kyi mder mngon par brtson par byed pa la ltos/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byams pa 'di ltar gser ram/ dngul lam/ nor bu dag gam/ rin po
158b2(dkon brtsegs): che dag gam/ mu tig dag gam/ bai DUn+da dag gam/ dung dag gam/ nal shel dag gam/ byu ru dag gram/ bde ba'i yo byad gzhan dag gis ni sems can skye ba'i chos can rnams skye ba las yongs su thar
158b3(dkon brtsegs): par mi 'gyur/ sems can na ba'i chos can rnams kyang nad rnams las yongs su thar par mi 'gyur/ sems can rga ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang
158b4(dkon brtsegs): yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa'i chos can rnams kyang rga ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa dag las yongs su thar par mi
158b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur gyi/ chos thos pas ni sems can skye ba'i chos can rnams kyang skye ba las yongs su thar par 'gyur la/ sems can na ba'i chos can rnams kyang nang rnams las yongs su thar par gyur
158b6(dkon brtsegs): sems can rga ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngar dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa'i chos can rnams kyang 'khrug pa las yongs su thar par 'gyur ba
158b7(dkon brtsegs): phyir te/ de las dgongs te de bzhin gshegs pa 'di skad ces// stong chen 'jig rten khams ni gser dag gis// bkang ste gang la sbyin par byed pa ni// tshig bzhi'o tshigs su bcad pa gcig brjod pas//
159a1(dkon brtsegs): dza ltar lan 'gas de ltar 'gyur ma yin// phan pa dogs byed par 'dod pagang zhigags// 'dzag rten gsum na sems canathams cad kyi// bde ba gang dag sod pa des kum/
159a2(dkon brtsegs): sems can gcig la sbyin pa byas pa bas// gang gis de la sangs rgyas lus kyi no// tshig bzhi'i tshogs su bcad pa gcig bsgrags na// de ni shin tu phan 'dogs mchog yin te// des ni sdug bsngal
159a3(dkon brtsegs): ngag las grob bar 'gyur// zhes ston to// byams pa byang chub sems dpas 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag rin po che sna bdun gyis rab tu bkang ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
159a4(dkon brtsegs): rnams la dbul bar phul ba bas ni snying rje chen po bskyed de/ sems can gcig la tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig cig gis bsgrags par gyur na/ de ni de bas ches bsod nams mang du sbyang bar 'gyu/
159a5(dkon brtsegs): ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ mi gang zhig gis gang+gA'i bye snyed kyi// 'jig rten khams mchog rin chen gang byas te// dga' mchog sems kyis rgyal la phul ba dang // gang gis sems can gcig la tshig
159a6(dkon brtsegs): bcad byin// rin chen byin pa shin tu rgya chen des// tshogs bcad sbyin pa snying rjes bsgrubs de la// char yang mi phod grangs su'ang ma yin na// gnyis sam gsum la bsam dug la yod//
159a7(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ byams pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag g.yas pa'i dkyil na bsod nams
159b1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mngon par bsgrubs pa'i rgyu mthun pas brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer mngon par grub pa yod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni bzhed na phyag g.yas pas skyong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
159b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi khams 'di thams cad kun tu yog par mdzad nas/ sems can thams cad la bde ba'i yo byad thams cad nye bar bsgrubs par mdzad cing / zas 'dod pa rnams la ni zas/ skom
159b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa rnams la ni skom/ gos 'dod pa rnams la ni gos/ rin po che 'dod pa rnams la ni rin po che rnams dang / gang ci dong ba de la sbyin par yang spyod mod kyi/ de tsam gyis sems can de dag
159b4(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho thog ma dang tha ma med pa nas/ chu srin 'dzin ze'i sdug bsngal chen po de las thar bar mi 'gyur bas/ byams pa nga ni 'jog rten pa'i bde ba'i yod byang de lta bu dag rnam par sdang
159b5(dkon brtsegs): nas/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bde ba chos rin po che yang dag par ston par mdzad de/ de thos na sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal gtan du nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro// byams pa de lta bas na byed kyis
159b6(dkon brtsegs): kyang por rjes su bslab par bya zhing // khyed zang zing la gdu bar mi bya'i/ khyed chos la gdu bar bya'o// byams pa yang phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ba'i dus la bab
159b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshe na/ byang chub sems dpar khas 'che ba kha cig 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag ni ltung ba lhag par 'byung bar 'gyur zhing lus ma bsdams pa dang / ngag ma bsdams pa dang / yid ma bsdams pas sdig
160a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i las lhag par spyad nas kyang nyes pa bshags pa tsam gyis dag par 'gyur bar sems kyis/ byin chad sdom pa yang mi byed la/ byin chad yang dag par bsdams
160a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir sdom par yang mi byed do// ngas ni sngon byas pa'i sdig pa'i las zad par bya ba'i phyir phung po gsum pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs bstan pa yin na/ de la mi blun po de dag ni lhag par
160a3(dkon brtsegs): ltung ba mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'dus byas nas/ nyes pa bshags shing sbyang ba tsam gyis dag par 'gyur bar sems shing / byin chad sdom par ni mi byed do// byams pa gzhan
160a4(dkon brtsegs): yang ngas byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyi las yongs su bsal ba byas pas na/ mi dge ba'i las chung ngus ni byang chub sems dpa'
160a5(dkon brtsegs): sems can dmyal ba'am/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten nam/ dbul por skye ba rnam pa sna tshogs gzhan dag tu'ang lta bar mi nus mod kyi/ 'on kyang byang chub
160a6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' ni myur du med par bya zhing 'dzem dog dang ldan pa dang / bslab par 'dod pa dang / 'jig rten pha rol la 'jigs par lta ba dang / rtag tu yid skye ba dang / srid par 'gro ba'i skye
160a7(dkon brtsegs): gnas thams cad la yid skrag par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byams pa 'di ltar byang chub sems ngabs ni bdag rgal nas/ khyed cag thams cad bsgral bar bya'o// grol nas dgrol
160b1(dkon brtsegs): bar bya'o// dbugs byin nas dbugs dbyung bar bya'o// yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhes sems can thams cad nye bar gzung ba'i phyir
160b2(dkon brtsegs): byams pangs ni lha dang bcas pa dang / bdud dang bcas pa dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram ze dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi sa'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng na//
160b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i las ji snyed pa dang / khur ji snyed pa dang / dgos pa ji snyed pa dang / don bya ba ji snyed pa dang / bya ba ji snyed pa de snyed ni sems can 'ga' la'ang ma mthong ngo // byams pa 'di lta ste/ dper na
160b4(dkon brtsegs): la la zhig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams brag dang / ri dang / rgya mtsho dang / chu klung dang / nags tshal dang bcas pa 'di mi la la zhig gis spyi bo 'am/ phrag pa'i steng du bzhag ste 'di skad ces kye
160b5(dkon brtsegs): skyes bu khyod kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams brag dang / ri dang / rgya mtsho dang / chu klung dang / nags tshal dang bcas pa 'di bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa las lhag pa 'am/ bskal pa
160b6(dkon brtsegs): brgya 'am/ bskal pa stong ngam/ bskal pa 'bum gyi bar du gdeg par bya zhing / gzhag par mi bya/ ral bas par mi bya'o zhes kyang bsgo bar gyur na/ byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems/ mi de'i bur de che ba dang /
160b7(dkon brtsegs): spro ba mthu dang ldan pa dang / mthu stobs mthu dang ldan pa dang / brtson 'grus mthu dang ldan pa yin snyam mam/ byams pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthu dang ldan pa lags so// bde bar gshegs
161a1(dkon brtsegs): pa mthu dang ldan pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa khyod mos par bya/ khyod kyis khong du chud par bya ste/ byams bde bas kyang gang zhig gis kyi sems
161a2(dkon brtsegs): can rnams ngas byed cag mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba la dgod par bya'o zhes/ sems can thams cad nye bar bzung ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i khur dang / spro ba dang / mthu stobs dang / brtson 'grus ches stong
161a3(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan par blta bar bya'o// byams pa 'di lta ste/ dper na mi la la zhig gis las stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi las ji tsam pa de tsam du
161a4(dkon brtsegs): gyur la/ des sems can thams cad kyi las de dag kyang se gol gtogs pa tsam gcig gis yongs su sgrub par byed cing / las kyi mtho' 'ga' tsam yang yongs su nyams par ma gyur na/ byams pa
161a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di ji snyam du sems/ mi de'i las de stobs dang ldan pa yin snyam mam/ byams pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lags so// bde bar gshegs pa de lta lags ste/ bcom ldan 'das stob
161a6(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa lags so// bde bar gshegs pa stobs dang ldan pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa khyod mos par bya/ khyod kyis bong du chud par bya ste/ byams pa de lta bas/
161a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' gang gis 'di skad du bdag gis sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las dgrol bar bya'o zhes tshig tu brjod na/ las su bya bar byed pa de ches stobs dang ldan pa yin no//
161b1(dkon brtsegs): byams pa 'di lta ste/ dper na khyim bdag la la zhig la bu gcig pa sdug pa 'phangs pa/ yid du 'ong ba/ mthong na mi mthun pa med pa zhig bdog par gyur la/ khyim bdag de nyes pa 'ga' zhig
161b2(dkon brtsegs): le lan gyis bu gcig pa dang chung ma dang bcas/ las byed pa dang zho shas 'tsho ba rnams dang bcas/ nor dang / dbyig dang / yo byad thams cad dang bcas te/ rgyal po'i pho brang du bkug par gyur cing
161b3(dkon brtsegs): de nas rgyal po nges khyim bdag de la 'di skad du/ kA ye khyim bdag khyod 'di nas dpag tshad 'bum gyi pha rol na/ grong khyer che ge mo zhes bya ba zhig yod par don 'di'i phyir zhag bdun gyis phyin par song pa/
161b4(dkon brtsegs): cha khyer te phyir yang zhag bdun gyis nga'i drung du phyin par shog cig dang / de lta na ngas khyod kyi bu gcig pa 'di dang / chung ma 'di dang / 'khor 'di dag thams cad dang / nor dang / dbyig dang / yo byad 'di dag
161b5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyang khyod la phyir sbyin par bya zhing / gzhan yang khyod la rgyal srid phyed kyi sbyin pa'ang lhag par sbyin par bya'o// gal te khyod song nas grong khyer de nas cha blangs te nyin mtshar bdun gyi phyir ma 'ongs
161b6(dkon brtsegs): na khyod la cung zad kyang sbyin par mi bya ba'i steng du khyod bu gcig pa dang bcas/ chung ma dang bcas/ 'khor dang bcas te chad bas gcad pa dang / srog dang bral zhing gsad par bya'o zhes bsgo bar gyur na/ byams
161b7(dkon brtsegs): ba 'di ji snyam du sems/ khyim bdag de de skad bsgo na bdag 'phangs pa dang ldan pa dang / bu 'phangs pa dang ldan pa dang / chung ma 'phangs pa dang ldan pa dang / 'khor 'phangs pa dang ldan pa dang / nor 'phangs pa dang ldan
162a1(dkon brtsegs): pas stobs dang ldan pa'i rtsom pa dang / stobs dang ldan pa'i mgyogs pas grong khyer der 'gro bar 'gyur snyam mam/ byams pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lags so//
162a2(dkon brtsegs): bde bar gshegs pa de lta lags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal bltar na/ do ni don de yongs su ma grub kyi bar du sems rnam par g.yeng bar mo bgyid/ mas
162a3(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes skyed par mo btsod / rmugs pa dang gcid kyi sems skyed par mi 'gyid lags so// de ci'i slad dra zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar ngor slong rol gyi dngos po gnan ngag lta nog lags /
162a4(dkon brtsegs): bdag ca 'i phangs pa'i skad du'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ thams bgul te sems can thams cad de lta bu'i brtson 'grus rtsom pa chen po dang ldan par gyur kyang / sems can
162a5(dkon brtsegs): de dag thams cad kyi 'dzin 'grus chen po de ni byang chub sems dpa'i brtsom grus chen po de'i brgya'i chen yang nye bar mi mo// stong gi tshe dang / 'bum gyi cha dang khyi ba ma ring / rje ba su'i chas
162a6(dkon brtsegs): bye ba drug stong gi cha dang / bye ba zag khrig phrag 'bum gyi rwa dang / depe dang / rgyu'i bar du 'ang nye bar mi 'gro'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byams pa 'di ltar byang chub sems dpar ni rgyun phyogs su
162a7(dkon brtsegs): pa sems can thams cad rgyan las bzlog pa g.yo ba med pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su rab tu 'god par byed pa'i phyir khyams pa 'di lta ste/ dper na mingaji tsam du stobs dang ldan pa
162b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di tsam du shugs dang ldan pa/ 'di tsam du mthu dang ldan pa/ 'di tsam du brtson 'grus dang ldan pa la la zhig skyes par gyur la/ des rgya mtsho chen po bzhi po dag na chu'i phung po gang ji sbed pa de dag rngams
162b2(dkon brtsegs): cang chu klung chen po'i rgyun gang dang gang dag nas rgya mtsho chen por zhugs par gyur pa'i chu klung chen po'i rgyun de dag nyid nas chu'i mtha' phyir bzlog nas/ rgyun las bzlog thabs kho nar mtsho chen po ma dros pa'i nang
162b3(dkon brtsegs): du phab par gyur na/ byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems/ mi de dka' ba byed pa dang / ngo mtshar che ba dang / brtson 'grus che ba yin snyam mama?/ byams pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lha lags so//
162b4(dkon brtsegs): bde bar gshegs pa de lta lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa khyod mos par bya/ khyod kyis khong du chud par bya ste/ de bas kyang gang dag lhag pa'i bsam pas sems can
162b5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi don du snying rje chen po kun tu bskyed nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de// nan tan gyis mdzes par byed pa de dag ches shin tu dka' ba byed pa
162b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / ngo mtshar che ba yin no// de bas kyang gang dag sangs rgyas yod do// chos yod do// dge 'dun yod do// legs par byas pa dang / nyes par byas pa'i las rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par
162b7(dkon brtsegs): smon pa yod do zhes nges par rtogs par byed pa de dag ches shin tu dka' ba byed pa dang / ngo mtshar che ba yin no// de bas kyang gang dag 'dod chags kyi sems skyes pa sel bar byed pa dang / zhe sdang gi/
163a1(dkon brtsegs): sems skyes pa sel bar byed pa dang / gti mug gi sems skyes pa sel bar byed pa de dag ches shin tu dka' 'byed pa dang / ngo mtshar che ba yin no// de bas kyang gang dag mdza' she/
163a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / gros grogs dang / nye du dang / rgan rabs rnams mi lta bar spangs shing / longs spyod chung ngu dang longs spyod chen po'i tshogs rnams kyang yongs su spangs nas kyang / legs par gsungs pa'i chos
163a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dul ba la dad pas rab tu 'byung ba'i sems kyis khyim gyi gnas nas gom pa bdun 'dor bar byed pa de dag chos shin tu dka' ba byed pa dang / ngo mtshar che ba yin no// de bas kyang gang dag gos rur
163a4(dkon brtsegs): smig dag bgos te/ legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la ngang pas khyim nas khyim med par legs pa kho nar rab tu 'byung bar byed pa de dag ches shin tu dka' ba byed pa dang / ngo mtshar
163a5(dkon brtsegs): che ba yin no// de bas kyang gang dag de ltar rab tu byung nas/ gdams pa dag la nan tan gyis mdzes par byed pa dang / bslab pa'i gzhi ji ltar bcas pa dag la slob par byed pa de dag ches shin tu
163a6(dkon brtsegs): dka' ba byed pa dang / ngo mtshar che ba yin no// de bas kyang gang dag 'du 'dzi'i gtam la 'jig par lta zhing dben par 'dod pas dgon pa la mngon par phyogs te/ gom pa bdun 'dor ba
163a7(dkon brtsegs): byed pa de dag ches shin tu dka' ba byed pa dang / ngo mtshar che ba yin no// de bas kyang gang dag chos thams cad stong pa'o zhes mos par byed pa de dag ches shin tu dka' ba byed pa dang / ngo mtshar che ba yin no// /
163b1(dkon brtsegs): de bas kyang gang dag chos zab mo rnams la rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa thob pa de dag ches shin tu dka' ba byed pa dang / ngo mtshar che ba yin no// de bas kyang gang dag rnam par thar pa'i
163b2(dkon brtsegs): sgo gsum po dag mngon sum du byas nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rjes su thob par byed pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar du rjes su thob par byed pa de dag ches shin tu dka' ba byed
163b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / ngo mtshar che ba yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byams pa 'di lta ste/ 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba la dad cing dang ba dang / rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po dang /
163b4(dkon brtsegs): 'bras bu thob pa de ni shin tu dka' ba byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro// byams pa de la yang phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha mal dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ba'i dus la bab pa'i tshe na/ byang chub sem
163b5(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i theg pa pa legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba 'di la rab tu byung nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i las spangs te/ byis pa'i las la rab tu gnas pa kha cig 'byung bar 'gyur te/
163b6(dkon brtsegs): byams pa de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi las gang zhe na/ nyi shu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi las yin te/ de dag yongs su ma rdzogs na byang chub sems dpa' byang
163b7(dkon brtsegs): chub kyi snying por 'gro ba mi nus so// nyi shu gang zhe na/ ser sna'i sems tshar gcad par bya ba dang / gtong ba chen po spel bar bya dang / 'chal pa'i tshul khrims yongs su spang bar bya ba dang
164a1(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / gnod sems dang tha ba'i skyon rnam par spang bar bya ba dang / bzod pa'i stobs la gnas par bya ba dang / le lo
164a2(dkon brtsegs): sems rnam par gnod par bya ba dang / brtson 'grus chen po brtsam par bya ba dang / brjed ngas pa'i sems yongs su spang bar bya ba dang / dran pa dang blo gros kyis bsam gtan rnams la mi rten par
164a3(dkon brtsegs): bsam gtan du bya ba dang / zab mo la bzod pa bsgom par bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rab tu rtogs par bya ba dang / rnam par rtog pa thams cad spang bar bya ba dang / mtshan ma med pas
164a4(dkon brtsegs): gnas par bya ba dang / smon pa dang bral bar bya ba dang / smon pa med pa'i yul yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtang bar bya ba dang / snying rje chen pos zin par
164a5(dkon brtsegs): bya ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la dga' ba'i sems yid la mi bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la mos shing nem nur med pa dang / yid ches par bya ste/ byams pa nyi shu po de
164a6(dkon brtsegs): rag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi las yin te/ las der ga yongs su ma rdzogs na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying por 'gro bar mi nus so// byams pa bzhi po 'ad dag ni byang chub sems
164a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams kyi yang dag pa'i dam bca' ba yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ bdag nyid kyi bde ba spong ba dang / chos kyis ngoms mi shes pa dang / chos yongs su tshol bas bdag sang rgyas su 'gyur bar bya'o//
