190b5(dkon brtsegs): zhe sdang dang bcas pa dang // gti mug dang bcas pa yin bzhin du 'tshe ba tsam gyi phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'dod chags dang bral ba/
190b6(dkon brtsegs): zhe sdang dang bral ba/ gti mug dang bral ba'i sku gdung dag la bkur sti bya ba dang / ri mor bya ba dang / mchod pa bya bar sems so// de dag ni bdag nyid ser sna can dang / 'jungs pa dang /
190b7(dkon brtsegs): gnod sems dang / tha ba'i nyes pa mang ba dang / le lo dang ldan pa dang / brjed dngas pa dang / shes bzhin med pa yin bzhin du 'tsho ba tsam gyi phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa sbyin bdag chen po ya
191a1(dkon brtsegs): dag pa'i gnas la rab tu gnas pa/ mnyam par bzhag pa/ thugs rtse gcig pa'i sku gdung dag la bkur sti bu ba dang / ri mor bya ba dang / mchod pa bya bar sems so//
191a2(dkon brtsegs): 'od srungs nga ni rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo las dang po pa dag gi sems mngon par dad par bya ba'i phyir/ sku gdung rnams byin gyis rlob par mdzad de/ gang dag de dag la mchod pa byed pa
191a3(dkon brtsegs): de dag ni lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa nyams su myong bar 'gyur zhing / de'ang de dag gi yongs su mya ngan las 'anga' ba'i bar gyi rgyur 'gyur ba yin na/ mi blun po de dag ni bstan pa 'di la rab tu
191a4(dkon brtsegs): byung nas/ ngas dge sbyong gi las su gsungs pa gang yin pa de ni/ de dag gis bor zhing btang la/ bdag nyid gso ba'i don dang / mdza' bshes kyi khyim dang / slongs mo ster ba'i khyim dag
191a5(dkon brtsegs): yongs su smin par bya ba'i don dang / lhung bzed dang chos gos yongs su btsal ba'i don dang / rnyed pa dang bkur sti mngon par bsgrub pa'i don dang / snyan pa dang / sgra dang / grags pa yongs
191a6(dkon brtsegs): su bsgrub pa'i don gyi phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung dang mchod rten la mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i las kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung dang mchod rten dgal bkur sti
191a7(dkon brtsegs): bar sgrub par byed do// 'od srungs de la dge sbyong gi las gang zhe na/ 'od srungasangs las gnyis po bsam gtan dang kha ton bya ba bstan pa gang dag yin pa dag ste/ las de gnyis kyang
191b1(dkon brtsegs): lam la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir bstan par zad kyi/ de dag kyang shin tu mthar thug pa dang / shin tu mthar phyin pa ni ma yin no// 'od srungs las gang las rang par bya ba'i phyir 'jug pa de ni ga/
191b2(dkon brtsegs): sbyong gi las yin te/ bya ba med pa dang / nyes pa mi 'byung ba dang / log par mi byed pa dang / dran pa med pa dang / yid la byed pa med pa dang / nyams pa med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / rnam par
191b3(dkon brtsegs): thar pa'i sgo gsum po dag mngon du byed pa dang / khams gsum du mtshams sbyor ba med pa dang / 'gro ba med pa dang / 'ong ba med pa gang yin pa de ni dge sbyong gi las shes bya ba yin na/ mi blun pa
191b4(dkon brtsegs): de dag ni dge sbyong gi las de lta bu de dag spangs te/ las gzhan dang gzhan dag yongs su tshol bar byed do// de dag ni ngas khyim na gnas pagos dkar po can rnams kyi bslab par gsungs pag
191b5(dkon brtsegs): yin pa de tsam la'ang slob par mi byed do// khyim na gnas pa gos dkar po can rnams kyang re zhig de bzhin gshegs pas bslab pa ji ltar bcas pa rnams la slob par byed pa na/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i/
191b6(dkon brtsegs): 'bras bu 'thob par 'gyur na/ mi blun po de dag ni bstan pa 'di la rab tu byung nas rnam par grol ba dang / rjes su mthun pa tsam yang sgom par mi byed na/ 'thob par lta ga la 'gyur te/ de ni gnas
191b7(dkon brtsegs): med do// 'od srungs yang phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma de la ming gis zil gyis non cing / kha dog dang / rtags dang / dbyibs kyil dge sbyong du 'gyur gyi/ tshul khrims kyis ma yin/
192a1(dkon brtsegs): ting nge 'dzin gyis ma yin/ shes rab kyis ma yin pa dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur te/ 'od srungs 'di lnga ste/ dper na mi gsang sngags dang sman dag gis gos la 'debs shing na/
192a2(dkon brtsegs): par byed la/ gang gis gos de gyon pa na/ zhag bdun nam zhag brgyad kyis de'i lus me lce gcig tu gyur cing kun tu 'bar bar byed pa la la zhig yod par gyur cing / des gos de gsang sngags dang sman
192a3(dkon brtsegs): dag gis btab cing yongs su bsgos nas mi 'dza' ba la la zhig la 'di lta ste/ mdza' bshes kyi tshul gyis byin par gyur la/ de nas mi nges kyang gos de mdzes pa yin par rig nas len par byed
192a4(dkon brtsegs): cing / blangs nas kyang gyon par gyur na/ de zhag bdun nam zhag brgyad kyi bar du ni gos de las dgab pa nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro// de nas zhag bdun nam zhag brgyad 'das nas mi de khyir du song
192a5(dkon brtsegs): ngam lam po cher song ba na/ gos de rab tu 'bar bar gyur cing / de nas mi de gzhi de las tshul ma yin pa'i sdug bsngal skyes par gyur te/ tshig par gyur/ shi bar gyur na/ 'od srungs 'di ji snyam du sems/
192a6(dkon brtsegs): gos de las ro myang ba ni ji tsam zhig yod/ nyes dmigs na ji tsam zhig yod skam/ 'od srungs kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ro myang ba ni chung lags kyi/ nyes dmigs ni dpag tu ma mchis
192a7(dkon brtsegs): lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srungs de bzhin du nga'i gis du smig tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang /
192b1(dkon brtsegs): rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas bsgos pa gang dag yin pa de dag kyang / bskal pa bye ba grangs med pa nas legs par spyad pas yang dag par bsgrub pa yin na/ mi blun po dge sbyong ltar bcos
192b2(dkon brtsegs): bde dag na drang srong gi rgyal mtshan gyon nas grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dag tu 'jug par 'gyur zhing / de nas bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa
192b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis de dag dge sbyong yin no snyam nas bkur sti byed/ bla mar byed/ ri mor byed// mchod pa byed par 'gyur zhing / de dag gos ngur smrig gi gzhi de las mchod pa rnyed par 'gyur bas/ de dag
192b4(dkon brtsegs): des dga' ba nyams su myed par yang 'gyur ro// de dag lus zhig nas na sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur zhing / de dag der lcags kyi glegs ma 'bar ba gyon par 'gyur/ lcags kyi thu lum za
192b5(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur/ lcags kyi khu ba bskol ba 'thung bar 'gyur/ mal stan rab tu 'bar bdag gi steng du nyal bar 'gyur ro// 'od srungs de dag ni reng gi las des lus zhig nas sems can dmyal bar 'gros
192b6(dkon brtsegs): zad kyi/ gzhi gang las mi blun po de dag gis kyang bde bar sbyar ba rnam pa du ma nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba'i gos ngur smrig ge dpal dang gzi brjid de 'dra ba la ltos/ 'od srungs ngas kyang de las dgod
192b7(dkon brtsegs): nas 'di skad ces/ lcags kyi glegs ma dag gyon pa ni bla'i// tshul khrims 'chal pas gos ngur smrig dag bgo ba ning lta ma yin no// lcags kyi thu lum dag bza' pa ni bla'i/ tshul khrims 'chal
193a1(dkon brtsegs): pas bsod snyoms dgal yongs su longs spyod pa ni de lta ma yin no zhes gsungs so// 'od srungs de la ro myang baji tsam yod pa dang / de la nyes dmigs rdo tsam dzan
193a2(dkon brtsegs): pa la ltos te/ 'od srungs de lta bas na cinas kyang tshul khrims yongs su dag par 'gyur ba dang / sdig pa 'chags par 'gyur ba de ltar bslab par bya'o// 'od srungs 'ang ji snyam du sems/
193a3(dkon brtsegs): lha 'am/ gru'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ dri za'am/ lha ma yin nam/ nam mkha' lding ngam/ lto bye chen po'am/ mo 'am/ ma ma yin pa sus kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku
193a4(dkon brtsegs): gzugs bya bar nus snyam mam/ 'od srungs kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni rdza ma mchis pa/ sku bsam gyis khyab pa lags pas// de
193a5(dkon brtsegs): slad du de dag gi sku gzugs bgyi ba ni slob ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srungs phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la dge slong lus ma bsgoms pa/
193a6(dkon brtsegs): sems ma bsgoms pa/ tshul khrims ma bsgoms pa/ shes rab ma ba sgom pa kha cig 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag ni res bcos bu dang / rtsig pa dang / rab dag gi ngos la de bzhin gshegs
193a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sku gzugs 'dri bar 'gyur zhing / de dag gis 'tshe bar sems par yang 'gyur te/ las nges bdag nyid rlom sems su byed/ bstod par byed cing / gzhan dag la brnyas pa dang / smod
193b1(dkon brtsegs): par yang byed do// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'on bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po
193b2(dkon brtsegs): gsal rgyal la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs byas na/ bsod nams 'di tsam du skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bka' ma stsal lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bong srung
193b3(dkon brtsegs): de ni de bzhin te/ rgyal po gsal rgyal ni khyim pa gos dkar po gyon pa yin pas/ des de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs byed du bcug na/ de ni de la mchod pa byed par 'gyur bar zad kyi/
193b4(dkon brtsegs): ga'i nges chos gos sam/ bsod snyoms sam/ rnyed ba cung zad kyang 'dod par mi byed do// 'od srungs mi blun po de ngag nig ni ngos 'tshe bar 'gyur bar sems te/ de dag ni don bya'o snyam du sem
193b5(dkon brtsegs): la/ don med pa kho na byed pa yin no// bong srungs rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo bsod nams 'dod pa kho na yin pa gang dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs byed du bcug na ni/ de dag la
193b6(dkon brtsegs): bsod nams dpag tu med pa skyed pa rab gyur ro// 'od srungs dud 'gro'o skye gnas su skyes pa rnams kyi sku gzugs 'tshong ba'ang legs pa ma yin na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs
193b7(dkon brtsegs): ba tshong ba lta smos kyang ci dgos na/ mi blun po de dag ni de bzhin gshegs po'i sku gzugs byed du bcug nas/ khyim pa'i lag tu 'tshong bar byed cing / nges 'tshe bar sems par yang byed do//
194a1(dkon brtsegs): bod srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na mi byos pa dang 'dra ba shes rab 'chal pa'i rang bzhin can la la zhig yod par gyur la/ des bdud rtsi yongs su spangs nas dug za bar byed
194a2(dkon brtsegs): bde bzhin du/ 'od srungs mi blun po gang dag zang zing gi phyir sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs byed du bcug nas/ bdag nyid dug dang bcas par byed pa de dag kyang des bu yin snyam dung sems so//
194a3(dkon brtsegs): 'od srungs legs par gsungs pa'i tshes 'dul ba 'di la dug ces bya ba de ni 'di lta ste/ rnyed pa yin na/ de la mi blun po khro bas zil gyis non po gcig la gcig 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / mtshang
194a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dru bar byed pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa d+ma'o zhes zer zhing bdag nyid sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar byed do// 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na mi thabs la mi mkhas pa la la
194a5(dkon brtsegs): zhig g.yul ngor zhugs pa na rang gi mtshon gyis rang la 'debs par byed pa de bzhin du/ 'od srungs mi blun po de dag kyang dam pa'i chos rnams kyis sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro//
194a6(dkon brtsegs): 'od srungs rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs rin po che sna bdun las byas pa/ shin tu zin par byas pa/ byi dor legs par byas pa chu zhing du ri
194a7(dkon brtsegs): rab tsam yod pa byed du bcug ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bzugs de lta bu de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag 'di lta ste/ dper na bu ram shing gi tshal lam/
194b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dam bu'i tshal lam/ 'bras kyi zhing ngam/ til gyi zhing ngam/ til gyi ming ltar 'dab chags su yongs su bkang bar gyur na/ 'od srungs 'ang ngo sam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo
194b2(dkon brtsegs): gni de las bsod nams mang du skyed par 'gyur snyam mam/ 'od srungs kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs ser mo'i phyogs tsam zhig bgying du stsal na/ phreng
194b3(dkon brtsegs): bsod nams mang du bskyed lags na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs ri rab tsam du bgyid du sbal ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srungs khyod
194b4(dkon brtsegs): mos par bya/ khyod kyis khong du chud par bya ste/ dengs kyang byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la rab tu rtog par byed pa na/ tha na se gol gtogs pa tsam zhig chos zab
194b5(dkon brtsegs): mo rnams la bzod pa thob par gyur na/ ngo ches bsod nams mang du skyed do// de bas kyang gang zhig tshul khrims kyi phung po la gnas shing tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcang ba gcig bzung nas/
194b6(dkon brtsegs): tshogs su bcad ba de'i don gang yin pa derang rtogs par byed la/ sems can gcig tsam la'ang ston par yang byed na/ de ches bsod nams mang du skyed par yang 'gyur ro//
194b7(dkon brtsegs): 'od srungs de la ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la rab tu brtag par bya zhe na/ 'od srungs 'di la byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen po'i rjes su bslab par bya ste/ 'od srung
195a1(dkon brtsegs): sngon byung ba 'angs pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa/ ches grangs med pa/ ches shin tu grangs med pa/ rgya che ba/ tshad med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ dpag tu med
195a2(dkon brtsegs): bdag 'das pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas skar bod ces bya ba rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten
195a3(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shig 'jig rten du byung ste/ 'od srungs de bzhin gshegs pa ska' bod de
195a4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen po zhes bya ba gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa zhig bri ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu zhig gi bur skyes
195a5(dkon brtsegs): par gyur to// 'od srungs de'i tshe de'i dus na/ bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan pa la'ang dge slong gang dag rab tu byung bar gyur ba de dag las bya ba sna tshogs kyi skrag pas sbags pa ni phal che'i// yang dag
195a6(dkon brtsegs): par zhugs pa ni nyung bar gyur te/ 'od srungs dge slong de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs par sku gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs dag byed du 'jug cing / ras bcos bu dang / dar dang / khang pa'i rtsog
195a7(dkon brtsegs): ngos dag la ri mo 'dra'i 'jug par yang byed do// de'i tshe na dge slong zhig gis ngab la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs legs par byas pa/ shin tu zin par byas pa zhig bris nas khyad
195b1(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen po po pa'i rgyal por pho brang du khyer ro// bong srungs de nas byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen po nges de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs de mthong nas 'ang
195b2(dkon brtsegs): snyam du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs 'di'ang 'di tsam du blta na sdug pa yin na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de lta smos kyang ci dgos te/
195b3(dkon brtsegs): bdag kyang lus 'di lta bu dag dang ldan par gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam nas/ dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba dang / dad pa skyes par gyur te/ de de'i tshe na khyim thams cad la mngon par mings
195b4(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur cing // de 'di snyam du khyim gyi gnas na gnas pas ni lus 'di lta bu bsgrub par mi nus pas de'i phyir bdag mngon par 'byung bar bya'o snyam du sems par yang gyur to// 'od srungs den
195b5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus chen po skyes nas lo bcu drug lon la dbang po rnams rgyas shing yongs su smin pa'ang rjes su thob nas/ rang gi pha ma gal ba der song ste phyin nas/ rang ging
195b6(dkon brtsegs): gnyis kyi rkang pa dag la phyag 'tshal te/ 'di skad ces smras so// yab yum bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la khyim nas khyim ma mchis par legs pa kho nar rab tu 'byung bar ci gnab
195b7(dkon brtsegs): pha mas smras pa/ gzhon nu khyod de skad ma zer cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de da gnyis la bu gcig pa sdug pa/ 'phangs pa/ yid du 'ong ba khyod las med pas/ gal te khyod ma mthong na 'chi ba'i
196a1(dkon brtsegs): dus byed par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// khye'us smras pa/ bdag gis ci nas kyang khyed gnyis kyang nongs par mi 'gyur la/ bdag kyang mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur ba de ltar
196a2(dkon brtsegs): lags so// pha ma sa smras pa/ gzhon nu ji ltar bya/ khye'us smras pa/ bdag deng slan chang ji srid du mngon par byung bar ma gyur pa de srid du 'tshal mabang mi 'tshal/ mal dudang mi 'jug
196a3(dkon brtsegs): mar gsar dang 'bru mar gyis kyang mi nyug/ sgom yang mi 'tshal/ dge ba'ang mi dge ba'i chog 'ga' yang mi smra lags so// 'od srungs de nas byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen po
196a4(dkon brtsegs): des phyogs byi der ma byas pa zhig tu 'dug ste/ cang mi smra bar gyur cing nyin gcig zan yang ma zos so// de nas de'i pha ma gnyis kyis bo brgya dang ldan pa'i kha zas thogs te/ gzhan tshig
196a5(dkon brtsegs): tu mi brjod cing nyin mtshan thog thag tu de la gsol ba btab kyang / de tshig tsam yang mi smra bar gyur to// 'od srungs de ltar byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen po de cang mi smra ba zhag
196a6(dkon brtsegs): gnyis kyi bar du zan ma zos pa dang / de nas ma'i nye du lnga brgya tsam dag gis ro brgya dang ldan pa'i khazas thogs te/ gzhan tshig tu ma brjod cing nyin mtshan thog thag tu gsol ba btab
196a7(dkon brtsegs): kyang / de dag gi gdong du'ang ma ldan/ tshig smra ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/ 'od srungs de ltar byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen po de cang mi smra bar zhagagasum gyi bar du banam
196b1(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / de nas pa'i nye du lnga brgya tsam dag gis ro brgya dang ldan pa'i kha zas thogs te/ gzhan tshig tu ma brjod cing nyin mtshan thog thag tu gsol ba btab kyang / de de dag gi gdong du'ang mi lta/ tshig
196b2(dkon brtsegs): kyang mi smra'o// 'od srungs de ltar byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen po de cang mi spa bar zhag bzhi'i bar du zan ma zos pa dang / de nas de'i ne'u ldangs lnga brgya dag gis ro brgya dang ldan pa'i kha
196b3(dkon brtsegs): zas thogs te/ gzhan tshig tu ma brjod cing nyin mtshan thog thag tu gsol ba btab kyang / de de dag gi gdong du'ang me ldan/ tshig smra ba lta spos kyang ci dgos/ drod srungs de ltar byang chub sems das
196b4(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus chen po cang mi slu bar zhag lda bar du bar ma zos pa dang / de nas de'i pham gnyis kyis rgyal po'i pho brang na 'gron bu dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUR+Sha dang / dung dang / man
196b5(dkon brtsegs): shel dang / sa le sbram dang / dngul dang / gzhan yang rin po che dang / gos dang / rgyan sna tshogs ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad phyogs gcig tu bzhag ste/ na chung lha'i bu mo 'dra brgyan thams cad
196b6(dkon brtsegs): kyis brgyan pa brgyad khri bzhi stong yang bkug ste phyogs gcig tu bkod de/ 'od srungs mdor na rgyal po'i pho brang de na nye bar spyad pa'i longs spyod ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad de'i mdun du
196b7(dkon brtsegs): bzhag ste/ de'i pham de gnyis kyis ma'i nye du lnga brgya tsam po de dag dang / pha'i nye du lnga brgya tsam po de dag dang / ne'u ldangs lnga brgya tsam po dag dang / na chung brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag dang / skye bo
197a1(dkon brtsegs): phal po che de dag thams cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen po ngo'i mdun du bkod nas ro brgya dang ldan pa'i kha zas thogs te/ gzhan tshig tu ma brjod cing nyin
197a2(dkon brtsegs): mtshan thog thag tu gsol ba 'debs te/ de la 'di skad ces gzhon nu longs la zan zo// khyim 'dir 'dug la sbyin pa dag kyang byin cig/ bsod nams ngag kyang gyis shig/ bud med 'ding ga dang ldan ci
197a3(dkon brtsegs): tu dga' ba dang / rtsed mo dang / dga' dgur spyad pa dag kyang gyi sa la/ rgyal po'i khyim pa ji lta bu yongs su ma gtang zhig ces kyang smras so// 'od srungs de ltar byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen
197a4(dkon brtsegs): bo de skye bo phal po che de ltar 'dus pa de dag la mig kyang mi lta/ phyir yang mi smra bar de bzhin du cang mi zer bar 'dug cing zhag drug gi bar du zan yang ma zos par/ de sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang 'brel
197a5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i yid la byed pa ma gtog par yid la byed pa gzhan thams cad dang bral zhing kha zas kyi 'du shes kyang ma bskyed do// 'od srungs de nas byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen po de'i pha ma de
197a6(dkon brtsegs): gnyis dang / skye bo ngal po che de dag dang / ne'u ldangs de dag dang / nye du'i tshogs chen po de dag dang / bud med brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag thams cad kyis bzhin la mchi rgyan grags shing rkang phung ste/
197a7(dkon brtsegs): dung mos btab nas/ byang chub sems dpab de'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs kyang // de de dag gi gdong du'ang mi lta'o// bong srungs de nas rgyal po'i pho brang de na lha zhig gnas par gyur
197b1(dkon brtsegs): pagang yin pa de steng gi bar snang la cho drul chen pos 'dug nas/ skye bo phal po med dag la tshigs su bcad de smras pa// gang dag byang chub phyir brtson pa// de dag lhun po'adra ba mi mthu bdun
197b2(dkon brtsegs): rab tu mi g.yo ste// yingam gtong bar mi byed do// sa rnams thams cad g.yo yang sring // me ni chur yang 'gyur srid kyi// grogs dag 'di ni gnas 'di las// bskyod par nus pa ma yin no//
197b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di las mi dga' phyis mi bya// sdig pa'i las rnams ma byed cig/ phyin chad dmus long 'dra bar ni// bskal pa bye bar 'khyams sa re// 'di ni sems can thams cad la// phan phyir
197b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub zhug pa ste// mngon par 'byung phyir brtson rnams ni// byang chub dam pa rnyed mi dkag/ 'dod pa'i phyir dang longs spyod phyir// byang chub spyad pa mi spyod kyi// sems can gang dgas
197b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi// ye shes tshol rnams ji ltar bde// stong gsum rin chen rnams dang ni// gos dang yul gzhan lha rdzas kyis// chal par bkang bar gyur kyang ni// de dag chags par bya mi nus/
197b6(dkon brtsegs): mi shes pa ni gang byas pa'i/ sdig pa'i las na bshags par gyis// mkhas pa nyes pa bshags nas ni// las dang lhan cig mi gnas so// 'od srungs de ltar lha nges bskul ba na/ byang chub
197b7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen po de'i pha ma de gnyis dang / mdza' bshes dang / gros grogs dang / nye du dang / rgan rabs de dag dang / skye bo ngal po che de dag gis nyes pa la nyes par bshags
198a1(dkon brtsegs): nas gzhon nu de la 'di skad ces smras te/ gzhon nu khyod ji ltar bsam pa bzhin song zhig/ rab tu bang byung zhig/ zan yang zo nag/ zas ma thos pas 'chi ba'i dus byas
198a2(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur ta re zhes byas so// 'od srungs de ltar byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen po nges zhag bdun gyi bar du zan bcad du zin kyang 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas dang 'brel ba'i yid la byed
198a3(dkon brtsegs): ba dang // zhag bdun gyi bar du lha rnams kyis de'i lus la mdangs bcug pas na/ dbang po rnams gzhan du gyur par yang ma gyur/ bzhin gyi mdangs yongs su nyams par yang ma gyur to//
198a4(dkon brtsegs): bong srungs byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen po des de ltar zhag bdun gyi bar du zar bcad de/ khyim gyi gnas la mi lta zhing rgyal sring chen po de mchil ma'i thal ba bzhin du bor nas/
198a5(dkon brtsegs): bud med brgyad khro bzhi stong po de dag dang / ba ma dang / nye du'i tshogs de dag gdong mtshams gang ste/ ngu bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs de khyer te rang gi grong khyer chen po nas/
198a6(dkon brtsegs): byung nas/ dgon pa mi med pa/ gcan gzan gdug pa gnas pa'i nags shig tu zhugs so// de der zhugs na sa ras bcos du ba~M gzhi gang la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs
198a7(dkon brtsegs): de bris pa'i ra sa bcos bu'i gzhi de bres nas/ ras bcos bu'i gzhi de nyid kyi mdun du rtswa'i gding ba bting ba'i steng du skyil mo krung bcas nas/ lus drang por bsrang ste 'dug nas//
198b1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs de la rtog par byed do// de de la rtog par byed pa na'adi snyam du sems te/ gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs 'di' ngadabang tsam du mdzes pa yin na/ bcom ldan
198b2(dkon brtsegs): bangs de lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de de tsam du mdzes pa ni ngo mtshar bas gang dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa de mthong ba de dag ni dpal yin can yin no snyam mo// de bangs
198b3(dkon brtsegs): du ji ltar de bzhin gshegs par lta bar bya snyam du sems par yang gyur to// de nas nags khrod de na lha zhig gnas par gyur pa gang yin pa nges byang chub sems dpa' de'i sems kyis rtog pa sems kyis
198b4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su shes nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de la'adi skad ces smras so// grogs po khyod ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa blta bar bya snyam du rnam par rtog par byed pa gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs
198b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sku gzugs 'di ji lta ba de bzhin du blta bar bya zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs 'di ji ltar mthong ba de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'ang blta bar bya ste/ de ltar mthong na de bzhir gshes
198b6(dkon brtsegs): pa legs par mthong ba yin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen po de 'di snyam du sems te/ ji ltar bltas na de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur bar de bzhin
198b7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i sku gzugs 'di la ji ltar blta bar bya snyam nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs 'di sems par mi byed/ rnam par shes par mi byed pa de bzhi/
199a1(dkon brtsegs): du/ chos thams cad kyang sems par mi byed rnam par shes par mi byed de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'ang mtshan nyid de lta bu yin no// ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs
199a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di mang du btags pa tsam du zad pa de bzhin du/ chos thams cad kyang ming du brtags pa tsam du zad la/ ming de'ang ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa dang / rang bzhin gyis g.yo ba med pa yin te/ de bzhin gshegs
199a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sku'ang mtshan nyid de lta bu kho na yin no// ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs bde la thob pa med pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa med pa dang / shes pa med pa dang / mngon sum du bya ba med pa dang /
199a4(dkon brtsegs): 'bras bu med pa dang / 'bras bu rtogs pa med pa dang / gnas med pa dang / rten med pa dang / 'gro ba med pa dang / 'ong ba med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /
199a5(dkon brtsegs): rnam par byang ba med pa dang / sgra med pa dang / tshul med pa dang / tshul ma yin pa med pa dang / 'dod chags zad pa med pa dang / zhe sdang zad pa med pa dang / gti mug zad pa med pa dang / phung po rnams med pa dang /
199a6(dkon brtsegs): khams rnams med pa dang / skye mched rnams med pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' med pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' med pa dang / dbus med pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang de dang 'dra ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
199a7(dkon brtsegs): sku gzugs kyang mtshan nyid de lta bu yin no// ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs 'ang g.yo ba med pa dang / spyod pa med pa de bzhin du chos thams kyang de dang 'dra ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chug
199b1(dkon brtsegs): mtshan nying de la bu khon yin no// ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs 'di lta bar mi byed/ nyan par mi byed/ sdom par mi byed/ myang bar me byed/ reg par mi byed/ sems par mi byed/ nyal
199b2(dkon brtsegs): bar mi byed/ ldang bar mi byed/ dbugs 'byung bar mi byed/ dbugs rngub par mi byed/ rnam par shes par mi byed pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang de dang 'dra ste/ chos thams cad ji lta ba de bzhin du
199b3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'ang mtshan nyid de lta bu yin no// ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs pa di 'dod pa'i khams su gtogs pa'ang ma yin/ gzugs kyi khams su gtogs pa'ang ma yi//
199b4(dkon brtsegs): gzugs med pa'i khams su gtogs pa'ang ma yin pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang de dang 'dra ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'ang mtshan nyid de lta bu yin no// ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
199b5(dkon brtsegs): gzugs 'di la tshu rol yang med/ pha rol yang med/ bar yang med/ thog ma'ang med/ rgyu ba'ang med/ spyod pa'ang med/ blang ba'ang med/ dor ba'ang med/ bya ba'ang med/ byed pa'ang med/ ltung ba'ang mes
199b6(dkon brtsegs): bden pa'ang med/ brdzun pa'ang med/ bden pa mngon par shes pa'ang med/ kun tu 'dod chags pa'ang med/ yid byung ba'ang med/ 'khor ba'ang med/ mya ngan las 'das pa'ang med pa de bzhin du/
199b7(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad kyang de dang 'dra ste/ chos thams cad ji lta ba de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'ang mtshan nyid de lta bu yin no snyam mo// 'od srungs de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la 'jug pa
200a1(dkon brtsegs): de lta bu nges rab tu rtog par byed pa na nyin mtshan du skyil mo krung zhig par ma gyur cing / des nyin mtshan de la mngon par shes pa lnga dang / tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi dang / spobs
200a2(dkon brtsegs): pa thogs pa med pa dag kyang bsgrubs par gyur/ ting nge 'dzin kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'ang bsgrubs par gyur nas/ de la snang ba'ang byung bar gyur te/ sdang ba byung bar gyur pa des lha'i mig rnam par dag
200a3(dkon brtsegs): mi'i las shin tu 'angs pas/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'angs dpag tu med pa grangs med pa dag kyang mthong ngo // lha'i rna ba sgrib pa med pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis chos
200a4(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa thams cad kyang thos te/ de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gis chos bstan pa'ang de bzhin gshegs pa gnyis pas chos bstan pa la sgrib par ma gyur cing / thams cad kyang mnyes par byas
200a5(dkon brtsegs): so dbong srungs byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen po de zla ba bdun gyi bar du 'chag cing 'dug par gyur te/ shes pa'i zas ma gtogs par zas gzhan yang mi za ning / lha rnams kyis
200a6(dkon brtsegs): de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa rog nas/ de'i lus la mngangs bcug par yang gyur to// 'od srungs byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen po des gos ngur smrig dag kyang ma dgos/ de bzhin ga
200a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'ang mngon sum du ma mthong / bslab pa'i gzhi rnams kyang ma blangs mod kyi/ 'on kyang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rjes su thob cing de ltar bslab pa 'dod par gyur pa la ltos/ 'od srung
200b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' ni 'ang ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i skurab tu rnam par 'byed de/ cinas kyang ba phel bar mi byed ba dang / 'bri bar mi byed pa de ltar rab tu rnam par 'byed // 'ang srungs bung drubasas
200b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' ni jo ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus chen po des de bzhin gshes pa'i sku la bsnyen babur byas 'des de bzhin gshegs para'i skul bsnyen bkur bya'o// des de
200b3(dkon brtsegs): bsnyen bkur byas shing yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtog par byed pa na/ ye shes chen po'i rnam pa'ang lta bu dag kyang bskyed par gyur to// ye shes kyi rnam pa des phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas
200b4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa dag kyang mthong bar gyur/ de dag chos ston pa dag kyang thos par gyur to// 'od srungs de nas byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen
200b5(dkon brtsegs): po de nags khrong de nas phyir byung ste/ grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dag tu zhugs nas/ sems can rnams la chos ston par byed cing /
200b6(dkon brtsegs): nges srog chags nyi khri ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems la bkod do// sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i bsod nam
200b7(dkon brtsegs): dag la bkod par gyur to// pha ma de gnyis dang / btsun mo'i 'khor de dag dang / 'khor gzhan thams cad ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par byas so//
201a1(dkon brtsegs): 'od srungs de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus chen po zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod nem nur dang / yid gnyis
201a2(dkon brtsegs): ngang / the tsom za bar gyur na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen po zhes bya ba der gyur pa'i phyir ro// 'od srungs de lta bas ma byang
201a3(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus chen po de dang / de las gzhan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams kyi
201a4(dkon brtsegs): rjes su bslab par bya'o// 'od srungs yang phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rig kyi bu mo thabs la mim ldag ma pa/ 'dod pas zil gyis non pa kha cig 'byung ba
201a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te/ de dag ni ras bcos du dang rtsig ngos la bris pa'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs gzhan dag la mchod pa byas pas/ dngos grub dang rdzu 'phrul 'thob par sems shing / de dag 'di snyam du bdag
201a6(dkon brtsegs): cag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byed pa yin gyi// gzhan dag ni mchod pa byed pa ma yin no snyam du rlom sems su'ang 'gyur te/ de dag dgi bcung bad tsam po des bdag la bstod par byed/ gzhan la spong
201a7(dkon brtsegs): par byed cing / gzhin des 'tshe bar sems par yang 'gyur ro// 'od srungs de'i tshe na gang dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs byed du bcug pa dang / 'dus pa dang / gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i
201b1(dkon brtsegs): masong pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag ma gtogs par/ de ltar lung mnod pa yongs su tshol bar mi 'gyur/ kha ton mo byed/ bsam gtan mo sbom/ nang du yang dag 'jog la gces par sems par sa 'gyur te/ de ga
201b2(dkon brtsegs): chom byom pa dang / rab tu byung bdag gis mchod pa dang / ri mo bya ba dang / shes pa pa dang / shin tu yongs su shes par yang 'gyur zhing / gzhi des de dag gis chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / sngan pa
201b3(dkon brtsegs): mnga'o gsos sman dang / yo byad dag kyang rnyed par 'gyur ro// 'od srungs ngas ni byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnams kyi las su 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims kyi phung po la gnas te/ mang du thos pa yongs su
201b4(dkon brtsegs): btsal bar bya'o zhes bstan na/ de dag ni de'i tshe na tshul khrims 'chal pa kho nar gnas shing chos yongs su btsal ba spangs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten ngag la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir brtson
201b5(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur zhing / gzhi nges 'tshe bar 'gyur bar sems pa la ltos/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ gnas brtan 'od srungs chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rje
201b6(dkon brtsegs): tsam du de bzhin gshegs pas skyes bu dam pa ma lags pa de dag gi sgyu dang / g.yo dang / gya gyu de dag mang du bka' stsal pa ni ngo mtshar lags so// bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar lags te/ bcom
201b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa dag gis mdo sde pa di lta bu thos nas su zhig tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su sbyong bar mi bgyid lags/ bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang 'di
202a1(dkon brtsegs): wA ste/ slad ma'i tshe spang ma'i dus na rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas/ bdag cag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen/ bdag cag ni de
202a2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pas gzigs pas na/ bdag cag yul bdi lta bu la spyod pa las phyir ldog par bya'o zhes kun tu skyo ba skye bar 'gyur zhing / rab tu spyod par 'gyur bar/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
202a3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gnas brtan bod srungs chen po la'adi skad ces bka' stsal to// 'od srungs
202a4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa gnas rnam pa 'di lta bu gang ci ston pa dang / yang dag par ston par mdzad pa de dag thams cad ni rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag nyid kyi ched du ste/ 'di ltar de dag gis chos
202a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi rnam grangs pade thos par 'gyur zhing / thos nas kyang skyon de dag yongs su spong bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ gnas pa rngan pong srung
202a6(dkon brtsegs): chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / 'jam dpal bzhin nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / dge slong de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang /
202a7(dkon brtsegs): dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod ngo // 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa theg pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya pa las
202b1(dkon brtsegs): byams pa'i seng ge'i sgra chen po po le'u zhes bya ste/ nyi shu gsum pa rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhar 'dzin mi thongang / su ren dra po dra dang / za par ma dang / zhu chen gyi laca
202b2(dkon brtsegs): ban de ye shes sde la sogs pas bskur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ shI ka song nyis brgyabam po bzhi'o// / rgya gar skang du/ Ar+ya bi mam ba
202b3(dkon brtsegs): ya u ba li ba ri pri tsA ra ma ma hA yAn suH/ bong sang du/ ba phags pa 'dul ba rnam par gtan la dbab pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i ma/ bam po dang po
202b4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skang bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyi gyi
202b5(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' ra ba ma/ dge slong lnga brgya chem gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' stong tham pa dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub
202b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la glang po che'i lta spangs kyis gzigs te bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu ngag khyed cag phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na/ dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir de
202b7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pas bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med par yang dag par bsgrubs pa/ bla na med par yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di yang dag par gzung ba dang / sems can
203a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir thabs dang / tshul dang / bsam pa sna tshogs kyis yongs su bskyang bar su spro/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
203a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po byams pa stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud
203a3(dkon brtsegs): nas da bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni slang ma'i tshe slang ma'i dus na dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i slad du/ de bzhin gshegs pas bskal pa bye ba
203a4(dkon brtsegs): khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs ma mchis par yang dag par bsgrubs pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di yang dag par 'dzin par spro lags so// byang chub sems dpa' seng
203a5(dkon brtsegs): ges gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni thabs dang / tshul dang / bsam pa sna tshogs kyis sems can rnams yongs su skyong bar spro lags so// byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes
203a6(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can rnams ngan song du mchi ba las yongs su thar par bgyid par spro lags so// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'dra
203a7(dkon brtsegs): bdag ni sems can rnams kyi gang zag gi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid par spro lags so// byang chub sems dpa' ye shes tog gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can
203b1(dkon brtsegs): ma'atshal ba rnams yongs su smin par bgyid par sngo lags so// byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi tog gis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni chos kyi sbyin pas sems can rnams yongs su smin
203b2(dkon brtsegs): par bgyid par spro lags so// byang chub sems dpa' zla ba'i tog gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni yon tan rnams kyis sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid par spro
203b3(dkon brtsegs): lags so// byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma'i tog gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni theg pa bde bas sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid par spro lags so// byang chub sems dpa
203b4(dkon brtsegs): bag tsha ba med pas gsol pas/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can gyi khams mtha' yas pa dag yongs su smin par bgyid pa dang / yong su 'dzin par spro lags so// byang chub sems dpa' bzang skyong
203b5(dkon brtsegs): gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni ma 'a bras bu mchis par sgrog pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid par spro lags so// byang chub sems dpa' blo glos mthod pas gsol pa/
203b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das bdag ni smon lam rgya chen pos sems can gyi khams pas ma 'tshal ba rnams yongs su thar par bgyid par sgrol bas so// byang chub sems dpa' zla 'ong gzhon nur gyur pas gsol pa
203b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis sems can rnams rab tu 'god par spro lags so// byang chub sems dpa' mig bzangs kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sem can
204a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi bde ba dang / yid bde ba'i rtsa ba nye bar bsgrubs par spro lags so// byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni ngan
204a2(dkon brtsegs): song ngan 'gro dag las sems can rnams yongs su skyob par spro lags so// byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni ngan song dag las ma brgal ba'i sems can
204a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams sgrol bar spro lags so// byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can ma dul ba rnams la dul ba'i shul nye bar ston par sprolags so// byang chub sems
204a4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' yid bzangs kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can dman pa la mos pa rnams yongs su smin par bgyid par spro lags so// byang chub sems dpa' nges pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan
204a5(dkon brtsegs): 'das bdag ni sems can shes rab dman pa rnams yongs su smin par bgyid par spro lags so// byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid phung pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can dud 'gro'i skye
204a6(dkon brtsegs): gnas su skyes pa rnams yongs su smin par bgyid par spro lags so// byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa med pa rtogs par khong du chud pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni shul yang dag par ston pa
204a7(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams yong su smin par bgyid par spro lags so// byang chub sems dpa' mthong dgas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can rnams la bde ba'i yo byad tshad ma mchis pa dag nye bar sgrub par
204b1(dkon brtsegs): lags so// byang chub sems dpa' dbang po bzang gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sdug bsngal dran par bgyid pas/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid par sgrolags so// byang chub dug
204b2(dkon brtsegs): rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la yang dag par zhugs pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bsams pa tsam gyis yi dgas kyi 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can rnams yongs su thar par bgyid par
204b3(dkon brtsegs): spro lags so// byang chub sems dpa' nyi 'od kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can yongs su ma smin pa rnams yongs su smin par bgyid par spro lags so// byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med par
204b4(dkon brtsegs): grags pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can rnams kyi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid par spro lags so// byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid stobs kyis gsol pa/
204b5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can rnams kyi ngan song gi shul 'gums par spro lags so// byang chub sems dpa' yid gnyis spong gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can dman pa rnam
204b6(dkon brtsegs): sgrol bar sgrolags so// byang chub sems dpa' bag tsha ba med par gnas pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can rnams bsdu ba'i slang du legs so zhes bgyi ba stsal bar spro lags so// dung
204b7(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' ye shes dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can mos pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa rnams mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su smin par bgyid par spro lags so// byang chub
205a1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' gnas pa dpag med kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can rnams la 'dus ma bgyis kyi shul nye bar ston par spro lags so// byang chub sems
205a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chos thams cad la bag tsha ba med par gnas pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni mos pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams la mos pa de lta ba bzhin yang dag par ston par spro
205a3(dkon brtsegs): lags so// byang chub sems dpa' rin chen dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'angs bdag ni sems can rnams la rin po che'i phung po kun tu ston par spro lags so// byang chub sems dpa' blo
205a4(dkon brtsegs): glos bzang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni gzugs sdug pa ston pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid par spro lags so// byang chub sems dpa' dri med gzi brjid
205a5(dkon brtsegs): kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni gcugs pas sems can rnams yang dag par 'dzin cing yongs su smin par bgyid par spro lags so// byang chub sems dpa' nor bu bzang gis
205a6(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ bcom ldan pades bdag ni sngon gyi skye ba rjes su dran par bgyid pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgying bar spro lags so// byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams 'od zer gyi
205a7(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni yang dag pa'i smon lam gyis sems can rnams 'dren par spro lags so// byang chub sems dpa' dpal bzang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni
205b1(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams sdug bsngal ngag las gtan yongs su thar par bgyid par sgrolags so// byang chub sems dpa' lagan rin po ches gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can rnams na
205b2(dkon brtsegs): po che dag gis bde bar bgyid par spro lags so// byang chub sems dpa' blo gros kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can dngul de rnams kyi dbul ba ma mchis par bgyid
205b3(dkon brtsegs): par sgro lags so// byang chub sems dada' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan pangs bdag ni sems can rnams nyon mongs pa thams cad las yongs su thar/
205b4(dkon brtsegs): par bgyid par spro lags so// byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i 'od kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can rnams la shul bzang po nye bar ston par spolags so// byang chub
205b5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' yon tan gzugs ston gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bsam pa thams cad rab tu dga' bar bgyid pas sems can rnams yongs su thar par bgyid par spro lags
205b6(dkon brtsegs): sor byang chub sems dpa' ches mngon par 'phags kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can rnams la chos kyi mig rnam par srung ba ston par spro lags so// byang chub sems
205b7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can rnams sgrib pa dag las yongs su thar bar bgyid par spro lags so// byang chub sems dpa' chos bathung gis gso sa
206a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das bdag ni chos kyi sa sems can rnams yongs su thar par bgying par sgrolags so// byang chub sems dpab ci yang min gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni
206a2(dkon brtsegs): can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa'i dug thams cad gzhig par sgrolags so// byang chub sems dpa' rdza mchog gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can rnams la chos kyi phyog bston par stsolags so//
206a3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' seng ge blo gros kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can rnams la chos kyi sbyin pa stsol bar spro lags so// byang chub sems dpa' gzhon nu bong gyos gsol da/ bcom ldan 'dra
206a4(dkon brtsegs): bdag ni sems can rnams dman pa'i gnas nas yongs su thab par bgyid par spro lags so// byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni shul bzang po ston pas
206a5(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams kyi ngan song gi shul 'gog par spro lags so// byang chub sems dpa' gser bod kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni lus ston pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgying pas
206a6(dkon brtsegs): spro lags so// byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can don bgying ba rnams kyi don bgyid par spro lags so// byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba 'dzin
206a7(dkon brtsegs): gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can rnams kyi sems can dmyal ba'i sgo 'gums par spro lags so// byang chub sems dpa' bdud rtsi 'chang gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
206b1(dkon brtsegs): bdag ni sems can rnams 'khor ba las sgrol bar sgrolags so// byang chub sems dpa' dra ba can gyi 'ong gzhon nur gyur pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni srang ma'i tshe sdang ma'i dus na/ 'ong bstan pas sems can
206b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi nyon mongs parab tu zhi bar bgyid par sgrolags so// de nas mo dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ byang chub sems dpab de dag gis sems cad yongs su spong bar bya ba'i go cha la 'jug pa bstan
206b3(dkon brtsegs): ba de lta bu de thos nas/ ngo mtshar dang rmang du byung ba 'dzin par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kye mji tsam du byang chub sems ngas sems dpa' chen po 'di dag snying rje chen
206b4(dkon brtsegs): bo dang / thabs la mkhas pa bsam gyis ma khyab cing / brtson 'grus brtan pa'i go cha chen po bgos pa dang / ji tsam du sems can thams cad kyis rdul bar dka' ba dang / gting dpag dka' ba dang / bsnyen par
206b5(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / rdzi bar dka' ba dang / zil gyis mi non pa'i gzi brjid dang ldan pa ni ngo mtshar lags te/ bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzi brjing zil gyis mnan
206b6(dkon brtsegs): ba rnams kyi drung du mgo dang / lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / mig slong ba dag mchis te/ dngos po thams cad spong bar bgyid kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kun tu zhum par mi
206b7(dkon brtsegs): bgyid/ sgyid lug par mi bgyid cing rab tu spro bar bgyid pa ni bdag ngo mtshar du 'dzin lags so// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang bdag 'di snyam du sems lags te/ sems can gang su dag gis bya
207a1(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la gnod par bgyis te/ nang dang phyi'o dngos po dag spong bar bgyid pa de dag thams cad ni rnam par thar pa bsam gyis ma khyab
207a2(dkon brtsegs): ba la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha stag tu gyur par sems lags so// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra'i bral
207a3(dkon brtsegs): bdi skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / thabs dang / shes rab dang / ye shes kyi spyod yul de ni de lta bu yin te/
207a4(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpab rnams kyi yul de ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ma yin no// shA ri'i bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni sems can rnams kyi bsam
207a5(dkon brtsegs): pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad kun tu ston par byed kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid las mi g.yo'o// shA ri'i bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sem
207a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen rnams ni sems can khyim bdag gi rgyags pas myos pa rnams la dbang phyug gis rgyags pa bsal ba'i phyir khyim bdag gi gzugs nye bar ston par byed do// sems can spo bas rgyags shing myos
207a7(dkon brtsegs): ba rnams la spro ba'i rgyags pa bsal ba'i phyir chen po che chen po'i stobs dang / sreng med kyi bu'i spro ba'i stobs nye bar ston par byed do// sems can mya ngan las 'das pa don du gnyer ba rnams la mya ngan
207b1(dkon brtsegs): las 'das pa'i lam sna tshogs nye bar ston par byed do// nyan thos kyi theg pa don du gnyer ba'i sems can rnams la ni nyan thos kyi theg pas yongs su mya ngan las 'das brdza ba'i phyir/ nyan thos kyi
207b2(dkon brtsegs): gzugs nye bar ston par byed do// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa don du gnyer ba'i sems can rnams la ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ rang sangs rgyas kyi gzugs nye bar ston
207b3(dkon brtsegs): par byed do/ byang chub don du nyer ba'i sems can rnams la ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par thob par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi gzugs nye bar ston par byed de// shA ri'i bu
207b4(dkon brtsegs): ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni thabs sna tshogs kyis sems can gyi khams yongs su smin par byas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la rab tu 'god par byed de//
207b5(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes shin tu mya ngan las 'das pa'i rnam par thar pa ma gtogs par sems can rnams kyi rnam par thar pa gzhan med de/ de'i phyir de bzhin
207b6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pas ni de bzhin nyid ji lta ba bzhin 'di thugs su chud de/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba dang / gdags
207b7(dkon brtsegs): pa sna tshogs kyis sems can rnams la rnam par rig par mdzad de/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan pa dang / mi dge ba'i chos thams cad
208a1(dkon brtsegs): spangs pas de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba dang / sems can bcings pa rnams las thar pa nye bar ston par mdzad pas de'i phyir de bzhin gshes
208a2(dkon brtsegs): pa zhes bya ba dang / sems can lam ngan par zhugs pa rnams la lam bzangs po nye bar ston par mdzad pas de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba dang / stong pa nyid gsung ba dang /
208a3(dkon brtsegs): stong pa nyid las nges par byung bas/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i phyir ro// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnam par rmod
208a4(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams la yang dag pa'i chos rjes su rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par rig pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis rnam par thar pa nye bar ston par byed kyang / byang chub sems das/
208a5(dkon brtsegs): chos nyid las mi g.yo'o// rim gyis byang chub kyi snying po thob par bya ba'i phyir/ sems can rnams la sgyu ma'i bkod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyang nye bar ston to// shA ri'i bu
208a6(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sem sa dpa' chen po khyim pa khyim na gnas pas ni sbyin pa gnyis la gnas par bya'o// gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos sbyin pa dang / zang zing
208a7(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa la ste/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyim pa khyim na gnas pas ni rjes su chags pa med pa dang / khong khro ba med pas sbyin pa de gnyis la gnas par du'o//
208b1(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu byung bar gtogs pas ni sbyin pa chen po bzhi la gnas par bya'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ smyu gu sbyin pa dang / sngag
208b2(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa dang / glegs bam sbyin pa dang / chos sbyin pa la ste/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu byung bar gtogs pas ni sbyin pa bzhi po de dag la gnas par
208b3(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pas ni gtong ba gsum la gnas par bya'o// gsum gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ gtong ba dang/
208b4(dkon brtsegs): gtong ba chen po dang / shin tu gtong ba la'o// de la gtong ba ni rgyal srid yongs su gtong ba'o// gtong ba chen po ni chung ma dang / bu dang / bu mo yongs su gtong ba'o// shin tu ga
208b5(dkon brtsegs): ba ni mgo dang / lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / mig dang / pags pa dang / rus pa dang / rkang yongs su gtong ba ste// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpab sems dpa' chen po mi skye ba'i chos la
208b6(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa thob pas ni yongs su gtong ba gsum po de dag la gnas par bya'o// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dang ba rnams 'dod chags kyis mi 'jigs pa lags sam/
208b7(dkon brtsegs): zhe sdang dang gti mug gis mi 'jigs pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi kha na ma tho ba chen po dang bcas pa'i nyes pa ni gnyis te/
209a1(dkon brtsegs): gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ zhe sdang dang ldan pa dang / gti mug dang ldan pa ste/ shA ri'i bu gnyis po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi khan ma tho ba chen po
209a2(dkon brtsegs): bcas pa'i nyes pa yin no// shA ri'i bu de la 'dod chags ni kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa chung la 'bral ba dul ba yin no// zhe sdang mi kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa che la ba bral ba myur ba yin no// gti mug ni
209a3(dkon brtsegs): na ma tho ba dang bcas pa che la 'bral ba bul ba yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu 'dod chags ni 'khor ba'i 'khri shing kun tu 'dzin pa'i phyir/ nying mtshams sbyor ba'i sa bon yin pa dang / zhe sdang ni myur
209a4(dkon brtsegs): du yongs su spong ba'i phyir/ ngan song du 'gro ba'i rgyur gyur pa yin pa dang / gti mug ni rnam par 'grol bar dka' ba'i phyir/ sems can dmyal ba chen po brgyad du rab tu ltung ba'i rgyur gyur ba yin pa'i phyir ro//
209a5(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu de la byang chub sems dpa' nyes pa dang po'i lci ba na tshigs bcu la drang por bshags par bya'o// bud med kyi lag pa mas 'dzin pa'i lag pa'i nyes pa lci ba ni tshogs lnga la bshags par bya'o//
209a6(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs pa can gyi sems kyi mig gis bltas pa'i nyes pa ni gang zag gcig gam gnyis kyi mdun du bshags par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' mtshams med pa lnga dang ldan pa'i nyes pa dang /
209a7(dkon brtsegs): bud med kyi nyes pa dang / khye'u'i nyes pa dang / lag pa'i nyes pa dang / mchod rten gyi nyes pa dang / dge 'dun gyi nyes pa dang / de las gzhan pa'i nyes pa lci ba rnams ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sus
209b1(dkon brtsegs): cu rtsa lnga'i spyan sngar gcig pus nyin mtshan du bshags par bya'o// de lang shags pa ni 'di yin te/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyib/ sangs rgyas la skyabs su mchi'o/ chos la
209b2(dkon brtsegs): skyabs su mchi'o// dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje'i snying pos rab tu 'joms pal
209b3(dkon brtsegs): phyag 'tshal lo// rin chen 'od 'phro la phyag 'tshal lo// klu dbang gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// dnga' bo'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo// dpa' dgyes la phyag 'tshal lo// rin chen med la phug 'tshal lo//
209b4(dkon brtsegs): rin chen rdza bong la 'tshal lo// mthong ba don yon la phyag 'tshal lo// rin chen zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo// dri ma med pa la phyag 'tshal lo// dpas sbyin la phyag 'tshal lo// tshangs pa la phyag 'tshal lo//
209b5(dkon brtsegs): tshangs pas byin la phyag 'tshal lo// chu lha la phyag 'tshal lo// chu lha'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo// dpal bzangs la phyag 'tshal lo// tsan dan dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// gzi brjid mtha' yas la phyag
209b6(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal lo// bod dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// mya ngan med pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// sred med kyi bu la phyag 'tshal lo// me tog dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i 'od
209b7(dkon brtsegs): zer rnam par rol pas mngon par mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i 'od zer rnam par rol pas mngon par mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo// nor dngal la phyag 'tshal lo//
210a1(dkon brtsegs): dram pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// mtshan dpal shin tu yongs bsgrags la phyag 'tshal lo// dbang po tog gi rgyal mtshan gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// shin tu rnam
210a2(dkon brtsegs): par non pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// g.yul las shin tu rnam par rgyal ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gnon pas gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// kun nas snang ba bkod pa'i
210a3(dkon brtsegs): dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// rin chen pad+mas rnam par gnon pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang sa dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i pad+ma la rab tu bzhugs pa'i sangs
210a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas 'i dbang gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de dag la sogs pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig
210a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol bdag gis skye ba 'ang dang skye ba thog ma dang tha ma ma mchis pa nas 'khor
210a6(dkon brtsegs): ba na 'khor ba'i skye ba gzhan dag tu sdig pa'i las bgyis bdeng bgying du stsal bangang bgying pa la rjes su yi rang ba'am/ mchod rten gyi bkor ram/ dge 'dun gyi dkor ram/ phyogs
210a7(dkon brtsegs): bcu'i dge 'dun gyi dkor phrogs pa dang 'phrog tu stsal ba dang 'phrog pa la rjes su yi rang ba'am/ mtshams ma mchis pa lnga'i las bgyis pa dang / bgyid du stsal ba dang / bgyid
210b1(dkon brtsegs): pal rjes su la ring ba 'am/ mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blang ba la zhugags pa dang 'dug tu stsal pa dang / 'jug pa la rjes su yi rang ba'am/ las kyi sgrib pa gang gis
210b2(dkon brtsegs): bsgribs nas bdag sems can dmyal bar mchi ba 'am/ dung 'gror skye gnas su mchi ba'am/ yi dgas kyi yul du mchi ba'am/ yul mtha' 'khob tu skye ba'am/ 'a khor skye ba'am/
210b3(dkon brtsegs): lha tshe ring po rnams kyi nang du skye ba 'am/ dbang po ma tshang bar 'gyur ba'am/ lta ba log pa 'dzin par 'gyur ba'am/ sangs rgyas pa byung ba mnyes par mi bgyid par 'gyur ba'i las kyi sgrib pa
210b4(dkon brtsegs): gang lags pa de dag thams cad/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ye shes su gyur pa spyan du gyur pa/ dbang du gyur pa/ tshad mar gyur pamakhyen pa gzigs pa/ de dag gi
210b5(dkon brtsegs): spyan sngar 'thol lo// 'chags so// mi 'chab bo// slad chad kyang sdom par bgyid lags so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bdag la dgongs su gsol/ bdag gis skye
210b6(dkon brtsegs): bde deng / skye ba thog ma dang tha ma ma mchis pa nas/ 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i skye ba gzhan dag tu/ sbyin pa tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa la kham gcig tsam stsal ba gang lags pa dang /
210b7(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims bsrungs pa gang lags pa dang / bdag gis tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang / bdag gis sems can yongs su smin par bgyis pa'i dge ba'i rtsa
211a1(dkon brtsegs): pa gang lags pa dang / bdag byang chub kyi sems kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang / bdag gi bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dag thams cad gcig tu
211a2(dkon brtsegs): bsdus shing bzlums te bsdoms nas/ bla na ma mchis pa dang / gong na ma mchis pa dang / gong ma'i yang gong mar yongasasu bsngo bas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar
211a3(dkon brtsegs): bgyigo/ ji ltar 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis yongs su bsngos pa dang / ji ltar ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yongs su sngo bar 'gyur ba dang / ji
211a4(dkon brtsegs): ltar da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams da ltar yongs su sngo bar mdzad pa de ltar/ bdag gis kyang yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o// sdig pa thams cad 'chags so// bsod nams
211a5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi rjes su yi rang ngo // sangs rgyas thams cad la gsol ba 'debs so// bdag gis ye shes bla na med pa'i mchog tu gyur cig/ mi mchog rgyal ba gang dag da ltar bzhugs pa dang //
211a6(dkon brtsegs): gang dag 'das pa dag dang de bzhin gang ma byon// yon tan bsngags pa mtha' yas rgya mtshor kun la// thal mo sbyar ba bgyis te skyabs su nye bar mchi/ shA ri'i bu de ltar byang chub sems
211a7(dkon brtsegs): dpas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa lnga po de dag la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag gis sdig pa thams cad rnam par dag par bya'o// de ltar sdig pa thams cad rnam par
211b1(dkon brtsegs): dag pa de la / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das des nyid kyang sems can rnam par bar bar bya ba kho na'i phyi nal nye bar ston par mdzad do// de bzhin du byis pa so so'i skye bo 'khrul pa rnams yongs su smon pa byung 'i phyir/ tshig 'brurnam pasdu
211b2(dkon brtsegs): tshogs nye bar ston par mdzad kyang / chos kyi dbyings las mi g.yol/ sems can mos pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par thar par bya ba'i phyir/ smon lam yongs su rdzogs par yang mdzad do// shA ri'i du
211b3(dkon brtsegs): la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa ni/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir// sems can dmyal ba dang / dung 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /
211b4(dkon brtsegs): lha ma yin gyi 'gro ba nye bar ston par byed do// byang chub sems dang ba sems dpa' chen po bkod pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa ni/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ khyim bdag gi gzugs nye bar smon
211b5(dkon brtsegs): bar byed do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mchog gi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa ni/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i gzugs nye bar byed do// byang chub sems
211b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po gzi brjid drag po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa ni/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ brgya byin dang tshangs pa'i gzugs nye bar ston par byed do// byang chub sems dpab sems
211b7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po rtse gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa ni/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ nyan thos kyi gzugs nye bar ston par byed do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag pa gnyis su med
212a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa ni/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ rang sangs rgyas kyi gzugs nye bar ston par byed do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba
212a2(dkon brtsegs): nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa ni/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bzugs nye bar ston par byed do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad la da
212a3(dkon brtsegs): sbyar ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa ni/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du gzugs nye bar ston par byed de/ shA ri'i bu de ltar na skyes bungs pa rnams ni/ sems can yongs su
212a4(dkon brtsegs): smon par bya ba'i phyir/ la lar ni brgya byin gyi gzugs/ la lar ni tshangs pa'i gzugs/ la lar ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i gzugs nye bar ston par yang byed la/ chos kyi dbyings las kyang mi g.yeg// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
212a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ mos pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams la rnam par rig pa'i gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs nye bar ston par byed kyang / de la bdag tu dmigs
212a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'ang med/ sems can du dmigs pa'ang med la/ sems can rnams la 'gro ba sna tshogs kyi gzugs nye bar ston par yang byed pa'i phyir ro// shA ri'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems// ri dgas kyi rgyal po seng ge'i sgra skang gA
212a7(dkon brtsegs): yin pa de byi las bzod par nus snyam mam/ shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi bzod lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i du 'di ji snyam du sems/ spos kyi glang po che'i khal
212b1(dkon brtsegs): gang yin pa de bong bus bzod par nus snyam mam/ shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi bzong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ shAri'i bu'ang ngo snyam du sems/ brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang
212b2(dkon brtsegs): gi bzi brjid bdag po gang yin pa de mi dngul pos bzong nus snyam mam/ shA ra'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'angs de ni mi bzod lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu'adi snyam
212b3(dkon brtsegs): du sems/ bya'i rgyal po nam mkha' lding gi pha rol gnon pa gang yin pa de bya rgod kyi phrug gus bzod par nus snyam mam/ shA ri'i bu gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi bzod lags so// bcom ldan 'das
212b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems dpa' ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs pa skyed pa la byung zhing / shes pa las nges par 'byung ba'i nyes pa gang yin pa dang / nyes pa
212b5(dkon brtsegs): bgyod pa'i gnas sangs rgyas mthong ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa thob pas rnam par spong ba gang yin pa de ni/ sems can thams cad dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyi
212b6(dkon brtsegs): rnam par spong bar mi nus so// byang chub sems dpab ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi mtshan 'dzin cing yongs su rjod pa dang / phung po gsum pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum
212b7(dkon brtsegs): brjod pas nyes pa 'gyod pa'i gnas las nges par 'byung zhing / ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob par 'gyur ro// / bam po gnyis pa ste rnga ma'o// / po chen tshe dang ldan pa nye ra
213a1(dkon brtsegs): 'khor nang du yang dag 'jog las langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan
213a2(dkon brtsegs): gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gcig du
213a3(dkon brtsegs): dben par mchis nas/ nang du yang dag bzhags pa na sems la yongs su rtog pa 'di lta bu 'di skyes lags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams la ni
213a4(dkon brtsegs): so sor thar pa'i sdom pa lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi bslab pa yongs su dag pa bcas la/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnams kyis ni srog gi phyir yang bslab pa yongs su mi gtong ngo zhes
213a5(dkon brtsegs): gsungs pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das sam bzhugs kyang rung ste/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi so sor thar pa'i sdom pa ni ji ltar brjod par bgyi/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa parnam
213a6(dkon brtsegs): gyi so sor thar pa'i sdom pa ni ji ltar brjod par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag ni 'dul ba 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog lags par bka' stsal na/ tsa nas kyang bdag gis bcom ldan 'das las 'dul ba la
213a7(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa mngon sum du thos shing / mngon sum du bzung nas/ mi 'jigs pa thob cing 'khor rnams rgya cher yang dag par ston par 'gyur ba de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la rgya cher yang dag par bston du
213b1(dkon brtsegs): gsol bar bgyi lags so snyam ste/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gcig pu dben par mchis nas/ nang du yang dag bzhag pa na sems la bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar mchis la 'dul ba rnam par gtan
213b2(dkon brtsegs): la dbab pa yongs su zhu'o snyam pa de lta bu'i yongs su rtog pa skyes par gyur lags na/ de'i slang du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas dge slong gi 'khor dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'khor chen po 'dus
213b3(dkon brtsegs): ba la/ 'dul ba rnam par gtan la dadab pa rgya cher lags par bstan du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// nye bar
213b4(dkon brtsegs): 'khor de'i phyir khyod kyis nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi bslab pa rnams kyi bslab pa ni sbyor sas zhan dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa gzhan gyis yongs su dag pa yin par smros shig/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par
213b5(dkon brtsegs): zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa'ang sbyor ba gzhan dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa gzhan gyis yongs su dag pa yin par smos shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nye bar 'khor nyan thos kyi theg pa ba
213b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi sbyor ba'ang gzhan/ lhag pa'i bsam dbang gzhan la/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyor ba'ang gzhan/ lhag pa'i bsam pa'ang gzhan yin pa'i
213b7(dkon brtsegs): phyir ro// nye bar 'khor de la nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i tshul khrims yongs su dag pa gang yin pa de ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims yongs
214a1(dkon brtsegs): su ma ngag pa nyid dang / shin tu 'chal ba'i tshul khrims nyid yin la/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims yongs su dag pa nyid gang yin pa de dag ni nyan
214a2(dkon brtsegs): thos kyi theg pa pa'i tshul khrims yongs su ma ngag pa nyid dang / shin tu 'chal pa'i tshul khrims nyid yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nye bar 'a khor 'di la nyan thos kyi theg pa pa ni// de skad cig tsam yang sring bar skye ba
214a3(dkon brtsegs): len par mi byed do// de ni nyan thos kyi theg pa nga'i tshul khrims yongs su dag pa nyid yon la/ de ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims yongs su ma dag pa nyid dang / shan tu 'tshal
214a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshul khrims nyid yin pa'i phyir ro// nye bar 'khor theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims yongs su dag pa nyid gang yin pa/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i tshul
214a5(dkon brtsegs): khrims yongs su ma dag pa nyid dang ga shin tu 'chal pa'i tshul khrims nyid du 'gyur ba gang zhe na/ nye bar 'khor 'di la theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bskal pa tshad med grangs med par srid par
214a6(dkon brtsegs): skye ba len kyang sems yongs su mi skyo zhing / yid yongs su mi skyong de ma theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims yongs su dag pa nyid yin la/ de ni nyan thos kyi theg pa pa
214a7(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims yongs su ma dag pa nyid dang / shin tu 'chal pa'i tshul khrims nyid yin no// nye bar 'khor de lta bas na khyod kyis theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dang ba rnam
214b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi bslab pa ni rjes su bsrung ba dang bcas pa yin par spros shig/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi bslab pa ni rjes su bsrung ba med pa yin par spros shig/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub
214b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa ni bcos su yod pa yin par spros shig/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi bslab pa ni bcos su med pa yin par spros shig/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i bung
214b3(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslang pa ni rang du rjes su zhugs pa yin par spros shig/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi bslab pa ni mthara' chags yin par smos shig nye bar 'khor de
214b4(dkon brtsegs): la ji ltar na theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa rjes su bsrung ba dang bcas pa yin la/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi bslab pa rjes su bsrung ba
214b5(dkon brtsegs): med pa yin zhe na/ nye bar 'khor 'di la theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can gzhan dag dang / gang zag gzhan dag gi sems kyi rjes su 'jug par bya dgos
214b6(dkon brtsegs): la da nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams la ni mi dgos te/ nye bar 'khor rnam grangs nges na/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa ni rjes su bsrung ba dang bcas
214b7(dkon brtsegs): ba yin la/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi bslab pa ni rjes su bsrung ba med pa yin mo nye bar 'khor ji ltar na thog pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams
215a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi bslab pa ni bcos su yod pa yin la/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi bslab pa bcos su med pa yin zhe na/ nye bar 'khor 'di la theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub
215a2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' ni gal te snga dro'i dus kyi tshe nyes pa byung ra// gung tshogs kyi dus kyi tshe thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bas gnas par byed na/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems
215a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su ma gtugs pa kho na yin no// gal te gung tshogs kyi dus kyi tshe nyes pa byung la/ phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bas gnas par byed na/ theg
215a4(dkon brtsegs): pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po ma gtugs pa kho na yin no// gal te phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe nyes pa byung la/ mtshan mo'i thun dang po la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
215a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi sems dang ma bral bas gnas par byed na/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su ma gtugs pa kho na yin no// gal te mtshan mo thun dang po la nyes
215a6(dkon brtsegs): ba byung la/ mtshan mo'i gung thun la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bas gnas par byed na/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su ma
215a7(dkon brtsegs): gtugs pa kho na yin no// gal te mtshan mo'i gung thun la nyes pa byung la/ mtshan mo'i thun mtha' ma la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bas gnas par byed na/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par
215b1(dkon brtsegs): zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dnga'i tshul khrims kyi dung po yongs su ma gtugs pa kho ma yin no// nye bar 'khor de ltar na theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dngab rnams kyi bslab pa ni bcos
215b2(dkon brtsegs): su yod pa yin te/ de la ni byang chub sems dpas 'gyod pa'i kun nas ldang ba ha cang bskyed par mi bya zhing / ha cang yid la gcags par yang ma bya'o// nye bar 'khor de la nyan thos kyi theg pa pa yang dang
215b3(dkon brtsegs): yang du nyes pa drung na ni/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po nyams pa dang / rab tu nyams pa dang / yongs su gtugs pa yin par rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyan thos kyi sa
215b4(dkon brtsegs): ba pas ni nyon mongs pa thams cad spang ba'i phyir/ mgo dang gos la me 'bar ba ltar bu dgos pa'i phyir te/ de ltar na nyan thos kyi theg pa pa lhag pa'i bsam pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'dod
215b5(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams kyi bslab pa ni bcos su med pa yin no// nye bar 'khor ji ltar na theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa rang du rjes su zhugs pa
215b6(dkon brtsegs): yin la/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi bslab pa mthar chags yin zhe na/ nye bar 'khor 'di la gal te theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpas bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi
215b7(dkon brtsegs): bye ma snyed du 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag gis rtse ba dang / dga' ba dang / dga' dgur spyad pa byas kyang byang chub kyi sems mi gtong na/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sem
216a1(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i bslab pa yongs su ma gtugs pa kho na yin par rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nye bar 'khor theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' byang chub
216a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi sems de nyid kyis legs par yongs su zin pa ni/ rmi lam na'ang nyon mongs pa thams cad kun tu reg par mi 'gyur ba'i dus kyang yod skabs yod par 'gyur ba dang / nye bar 'khor yang /
216a3(dkon brtsegs): theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpas ni srid pa gcig gis nyon mongs pa thams cad zad par mi bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa rnams kyi
216a4(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs pa dag ni rom gyis zad par 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos kyi theg papa dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su ma smin pa mgo dang gos la mo 'bar ba lta bur byed pas ni/ de skad cig tsam yang srid par/
216a5(dkon brtsegs): skye ba bskyed bar mi bya ba'i phyir te/ nye bar 'khor de ltar na theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa ni ring du rjes su zhugs pa yin la/ nyan thos kyi rig
216a6(dkon brtsegs): ba ba rnams kyi bslab pa ni mthar chags yin no// nye bar 'khor de lta bas ma khyod kyis theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa ni rjes su bsdu
216a7(dkon brtsegs): bdang bcas pa dang / bcos su yod pa dang / ring du rjes su zhugs pa yin par smos shig/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi bslab pa ni rjes su bsrung ba med pa dang / bcos su med pa dang /
216b1(dkon brtsegs): mthar chags pa yin par spros shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nye bar 'khor bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni tshogs chen po dang ldan pa yin bstan theg pa chen po la yang dag par ru
216b2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gcig tu skyobs ni/ bskal pa tshang med grangs med par mtshams sbyor zhing 'khor bar slab ma yin pa'i phyir te/ nye bar 'khor de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
216b3(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis don gyi dbang de gzigs pas na/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gcig tu skyo ba'i gtam mi gsung gcig tu 'dod
216b4(dkon brtsegs): chags dang bral ba'i gtam mi gsung / gcig tu yid 'byung ba'i gtam mi gsung bar dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba dang ldan pa'i gtam gsung ngo // zab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa
216b5(dkon brtsegs): can ma yin pa dang / dra ba dang / brtags pa dang / 'gyod pa med pa dang / kun nas ldang ba med pa'i gtam gsung ngo // thogs pa med pa dang / sgrib pa med pa dang / stong pa nyid kyi gtam
216b6(dkon brtsegs): gsung ste/ de dag gis gtam de dag thos nas mngon par dga' zhing 'khor bas yongs su mi skyo ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub chags pa med pabang yongs su rdzogs par byed do//
216b7(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das nongs pa gang lags pa de dag las kha cig ni 'dod chags dang
217a1(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs par ldan pa lags kha cig ni zhe sdang dang mtshungs par ldan pa lags kha cig ni gti mug dang mtshungs par ldan pa lags bcom ldan 'das de dag las ci'i 'don
217a2(dkon brtsegs): chags dang mtshungs par ldan pa'am/ 'on te zhe sdang dang mtshungs par ldan pa 'am/ 'on te gti mug dang mtshungs par ldan pa'am/ gang zhig theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs da'i
217a3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i nongs pa shin tu lci bar 'gyur ba lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
217a4(dkon brtsegs): nye bar 'khor gal te theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la 'dod chags dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i nyes pa bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du byung bar gyur la/
217a5(dkon brtsegs): zhe sdang dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i nyes pa gang yin pa gcig cig byung bar gyur na'ang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa tshang mar byas nazhe sdang dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i nyes
217a6(dkon brtsegs): pa gang yin pa de ni 'dod chags dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i nyes pa de dag pas ches nyes pa lci bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i byor zhe na/ nye bar 'khor zhe sdang ni sems can yongs su gtong bar
217a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba yin la 'dod chags ni sems can sdud par 'gyur ba yin te/ nye bar de la sems can sdud par 'gyur ba'o nyon mongs pa gang yin pa de la ni byang chub sems dpa'i sku bag
217b1(dkon brtsegs): dang 'jigs pa med la sems can yongs su gtong bar 'gyur ba'i 'on mongs pa gang yin pa de la ni byang chub sems dpa' sgru ba ga dang 'jigs pa yod pa'i phyir ro// nye bar 'khor
217b2(dkon brtsegs): yang de bzhin gshegs pas ni 'dod chags na 'bral ba bul la kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa byung ba dang / zhe sdang ni 'bral ba mu la kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa che ba dang ga
217b3(dkon brtsegs): mug ni 'bral ba dul la kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa che ba gsungs pa de la nye bar 'khor 'dral ba dul la kha na mtho ba dang bcas pa chung ba gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa
