246b4(dkon brtsegs): blun zhing mthun mi byed// de yi mdog kyang dag par mi 'gyur ro// gang zhig rmugs drang gnyid la dga' 'gyur ba// bad kan rlung dang de bzhin mkhris pa rnams// de dag de yi
246b5(dkon brtsegs): lus la shas cher 'gyur// de yi khams rnams rab tu 'khrug par 'gyur// gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur ba// kha zas nyes pas lto ni ma dag cing // lus kyang
246b6(dkon brtsegs): lci la zo mdog bde ma yin/ de yi tshig kyang gsal bar mi 'gyur ro// gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur ba// de yi lus la phol mig mang por 'gyur// de ni nyin dang
246b7(dkon brtsegs): mtshan du bde bar nyal// de la rma rnams mi bzang 'byung bar 'gyur// gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur ba// le lo byed cing brtson 'grus yongs su nyams// de ni
247a1(dkon brtsegs): bde las nyams shing nor rnams 'gribs// de ni rtag tu zhan cing sems kyang rmongs// gang zhing rmugs dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur ba// gti mug dra ba chen
247a2(dkon brtsegs): po 'phel 'gyur zhing // de ni the tsom can de lta ba thob// de ni lta bar 'gyur ba mang bar 'gyur// gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur ba// de yi shes rab shin tu nyams
247a3(dkon brtsegs): chung 'gyur// de yi blo yang yongs su nyams par 'gyur// ye shes las ni rtag tu de nyams 'gyur// gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur ba// mi shes le lo snyoms
247a4(dkon brtsegs): las shes rab 'chal// mi ma yin pa dag gis glags rnyed de// nags na gnas pa'i tshe nI 'tshe bar 'gyur// gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur ba// sems
247a5(dkon brtsegs): kyang rtul zhing de yi dran pa rmongs// lung nod kha ton byed la de mi gnas// chos spu na yang de ni rtag tu thogs// gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur ba/ de yi nyon
247a6(dkon brtsegs): mongs kun nas ldang bar 'gyur// rnam par 'khor zhing g.yo la rmongs pa dang // de yi sems ni rtag tu gdung bar 'gyur// gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dgar 'gyur ba//
247a7(dkon brtsegs): de yi bya ba mang po nyams shing 'gags// lus kyang gdungs shing yid kyang yongs su gdungs// bag la nyal ba 'phel bar des mi shes// gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dpa
247b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba/ de ni dge sems rtag tu mi 'dod de// de ni chos la 'dun pa skyed mi byed// phyir zhing chos ma yin la de dga' 'gyur// gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dga'
247b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba// de ni rmongs shing chos la 'dun pa nyams// byis pa yon tan kun las yongs su nyams// dkar po 'joms zhing mun par grol bar 'gyur// gang zhig rmugs dang
247b3(dkon brtsegs): gnyid la dga' 'gyur ba// 'jigs par 'gyur zhing sems kyang rab tu zhum// de ni rtag par mchog tu dga' mi 'gyur// gnyid kyis non pa lus kyang lhod par 'gyug/ gang
247b4(dkon brtsegs): zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur ba// bdag nyid mi shes lde lo can gyur nas// brtson 'grus stobs dang ldan la phrag rog byed// brtson 'grus ldan pa rnams la mi snyan/
247b5(dkon brtsegs): nyes pa 'dri 'dra 'di dag rtogs gyur na// mkhas pa su zhig rmugs gnyid dga' bar byed// shin tu gti mug lta ba mang po'i rgyu// don bzang dam chos yon tran chud
247b6(dkon brtsegs): gzon pa// gnyid 'di brtson 'grus 'phrog par rtogs gyur na// mkhas pa yon tan ldan pa su drer dga'// rtsub bsngal kun dang mun pa sel byed cing // ngan song yongs su spong
247b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i gzhir gyur pa// sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags pa'i brtson 'grus 'phags// gang yin de ni rtag tu bsten par gyis// 'jig rten 'di na bzo gang ci yod dang // 'jig rten
248a1(dkon brtsegs): 'das bzo gang dag ci yod pa// brtson 'grus brtsams la rnyed par mi dka' na// mkhas pa su dag brtson 'grus stobs kyis s+ho// gang dag sangs
248a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas byang chub zhugs gyur pa// de dag rmugs gnyid skyon rnams mthong nas ni// rtag tu brtson 'grus rtsom la gnas par byed// de ni nga yis de dag bskul byas yin//
248a3(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang rmugs
248a4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang gnyid kyi skyon 'di lta bu 'di dag thos na spong bar mi bgyid cing // skyo bar mi bgyid pa de dag dang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa mi skyed pa de dag de tsam du rmongs par 'gyur ba
248a5(dkon brtsegs): ni ngo mtshar lags so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' slob par 'tshal ba dang / lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
248a6(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal ba su zhig yang dag pa'i gnas 'di lta bu 'di dag thos nA le lo bgyid cing dge ba'i chos rnams skyed par mi bgyid/ brtson 'grus kyi yon tan dang phan
248a7(dkon brtsegs): yon 'di lta bu thos na byang chub kyi yan lag yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa'i slad du su zhig brtson 'grus rtsom par mi bgyid de/ de bzhin gshegs pas gnyid la dga' ba'i nongs
248b1(dkon brtsegs): dmigs dang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa'i phan yon 'di dag legs par bka' stsal lags so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' las la dga' ba
248b2(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten pa'i skrag pas sngags pa'i nongs dmigs ji ltar brtag par bgyi/ byang chub sems rapas gang dag la brtags na/ 'dod pa chung zhing bgyi ba nyung la rab pa'i chos
248b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i slad du rtag tu brtson zhing sbyor ba la gnas par 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos las
248b4(dkon brtsegs): la dga' ba'i nyes dmigs nyi shur brtag par bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la rtog na/ 'dod pa chung zhi bya ba nyung la dam pa'i chos btsal ba'i phyir rtag tu brtson zhing
248b5(dkon brtsegs): sbyor ba la gnas par 'gyur ro// nyi shu gang zhe na/ byams pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' las la dga' ba 'jig rten pa'i las rnams la brtson par 'gyur ba dang ga las
248b6(dkon brtsegs): ngan pa thams cad la gnas par 'gyur ba dang / lung nod pa dang kha ton la brtson pa dag gis brnyas par 'gyur ba dang / nang du yang dag 'jog la dga' ba rnams kyis smang bar
248b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba dang / 'khor ba thog ma dang tha ma med pa yongs su 'dzin pa'i las brtsams par 'gyur ba dang / bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa rnams kyi yon skyong bar mi byed pa da
249a1(dkon brtsegs): de'i sems dngos por 'dzin pa la 'jig par 'gyur ba dang / chags pa mang bar 'gyur ba dang / khyim so rnams la rgyun du sbyor bar 'gyur ba dang / dbang byed
249a2(dkon brtsegs): bar mi 'gyur ba dang / zlog byed kyi ngang tshul can yid smon pa mang po la rgyun du gnas pa dang / khyim gyi bya ba dag la brtson pa dang / re ro dag la shis cher 'dun cing chags pa bas/
249a3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / len pa med par mi dga' ba dang / kun nas mnar sems mang ba las kyi sgrib pa rgyun du mngon par 'du byed pa dang / dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma la rton par 'gyur
249a4(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / de zas kyi rnam par rtog par nyin mtshan 'da' bar byed pa dang / 'jig rten pa'i bya ba dag rgyun du 'dri bar byed pa dang / mi rigs pa'i smra ba dag la mngon par dga'
249a5(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba dang / zhal ta byed pa'i rgyags pas tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams dbang phyug gis tshar bcod par byed pa dang / pha rol gyi 'khrul pa rtog cing bdag
249a6(dkon brtsegs): gi 'khrul pa la mi rtog par 'gyur ba dang / don dang ldan zhing rnam par nges pa'i gtam dag la sbyin par shes par 'gyur ba ste/ byams pa nyi shu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'
249a7(dkon brtsegs): las la dga' zhing zhal ta byed pa'i skrag pas sngags pa'i nyes dmigs yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la rtog na 'dod pa chung zhing bya ba nyung bar 'gyur la/ 'jog rten pa'i bya ba
249b1(dkon brtsegs): spangs nas/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bya ba la brtson par 'gyur ro// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// de ni lam
249b2(dkon brtsegs): ngan dag la gnas 'gyur zhing // las mchog dag las de ni rgyud yang ring // 'dir ni rnyed pa che las ring bar 'gyur// rnam par chags sems nyes pa 'di dag yin// dge slong lung nod
249b3(dkon brtsegs): kha ton dga' rnams kyis// de la brnyas shing 'dod par mi byed la// bsam gtan byed pa rnams kyis smad par 'gyur// rtag tu las gnas skyon ni 'di dag yin// 'khor ba'o las
249b4(dkon brtsegs): la mngon par brtson pa dang // thar pa las ni rgyang ring bcings par gnas// de ni yul 'khor zas la mi rigs spyod// nyes pa 'di dag las la chags pa'o yin// rtag tu dngos
249b5(dkon brtsegs): po dgra ni len par byed// yongs su 'dzin pa med la dga' mi skyed// nor med nor ni don du gnyer bar byed// nyes pa 'di dag las la chags pa'i yon// khyim du rgyu ba
249b6(dkon brtsegs): ngag ni chags par 'gyur// 'du 'dzi dga' bas thams cad 'jigs par byed// gzeb kyi nang du bya bcug bzhin du 'gyur// nyes pa 'di dag las la chags pa'i yin// khyim pa'i
249b7(dkon brtsegs): las la de rtag mya ngan byed// yongs su gdungs par 'gyur kyang yid mi 'byung // nams kyang tshig ni btsun par mi 'gyur te// nyes pa 'di dag las la dga' ba'i yin// bla mas bskul na
250a1(dkon brtsegs): dka' blo mi bde zhing // rjes su bstan pa thun par 'dzin ma byed// de ni myur du tshul khrims nyams par 'gyur// nyes pa 'di dag las la dga' ba'i yin// khyim na/
250a2(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa'i las rnams rtag sems pas// de ni rtag tu 'dod par 'gyur ba ste// bsam gtan dang ni spong ba de mi byed// nyes pa 'di dag las la dga' ba'i yin// de yid 'dod chags
250a3(dkon brtsegs): shas ni che bar skye// de ni ro bro rnams la chags shing zhe na// de ni ngan ngon tsam gyis dgar mi 'gyur// nyes pa 'di dag las la dga' ba'i yin// de ni 'khor phal chen dgar 'gyur
250a4(dkon brtsegs): te/ de nyams na ni shin tu sdug bsngal 'gyur// de ni bong bu bzhin du lang long 'gyur// nyes pa 'di dag las la dga' ba'i yin// de sems rtag tu gnod sems ldan par 'gyur//
250a5(dkon brtsegs): las rnams 'phel zhing zad par mi 'gyur te// srid pa'i 'khri shing dag gis dam du bcings// nyes pa 'di dag las la dga' ba'i yin// de ni rtag tu bla ma rnams mi bstan/
250a6(dkon brtsegs): phyogs 'dor khyim pa la ni sten par byed// tshul khrims gnas pa dag la'ang phrag dog byed// nyes pa 'di dag las la dga' ba'i yin// nyin dang mtshan du sems gzhan med par
250a7(dkon brtsegs): ni du zas dang gos la rgyun du sems par byed// de ni rtag tu yon tan 'dod ma yin// nyes pa 'di dag las la dga' ba'i yon// de ni 'jig rten pa yi bya ba 'dri// rigs pa min/
250b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i smra ba rnams la dga'// rigs pa'i sgra la de ni dga' mi 'gyur// nyes pa 'di dag las la dga' ba'i yin// sdom brtson rnams la de ni rtag tu shes// dbang phyug mnyes pas
250b2(dkon brtsegs): de dag des tshar gcod// mi sdug las rnams mngon par 'du byed de// nyes pa 'di dag las la dga' ba'i yin// de ni rtag tu gzhan gyi skyon rtog cing // bdag la yod pa'i sbyor
250b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams mi mthong la// yon tan ldan pa rnams la 'khrul pa tshol// nyes pa 'di dag las la dga' ba'i yin// byis pa de ni gzhan gyis myur du brnyas// de ni pha rol dag la chos
250b4(dkon brtsegs): stor tshe// blo nyams pas nA mngon par shes mi 'gyur// nyes pa 'di dag las la dga' ba'i yin// gnod gyur nyes pa 'di dag mthong nas ni// lus ngan dag la su zhig dga'
250b5(dkon brtsegs): bar byed// dpa' blo dag ni rtag tu las mchog byed// byas pa gang yin chud ni gzon mi byed// lan stong brjod kyang tshig gcig mi 'dzin pa// de ni blo ngan dag gis spro ba yin// sang
250b6(dkon brtsegs): zhig las ngan dag ni byed pa la// dam pa dag gis de ltar rtag tu smad// de lta bas na mkhas mis 'di rtag tu// las ngan dag ni rnam par spangs nas kyang // thub dbang rnams kyis
250b7(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu bsngags pa yi// bzang po'i las rnams gang yin de dag bya/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di
251a1(dkon brtsegs): sad ces gsol to// som ldan 'das byung chub sems dpa' gang dag chos kyi mchog yongs su sas nas// las ngan ba com pa de dag ni shes d+ma sh-i /
251a2(dkon brtsegs): zhing shes rab kyis dman par 'gyur ba lags so// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces
251a3(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal to// byams pa de de bzhin te/ de de bzhin no// ji skad sgru ba bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag chos kyi mchog yongs su spangs nas/ las ngan pa rtsom pa de dag ni
251a4(dkon brtsegs): shes rab shin tu chung zhing / shes rab kyis dman par 'gyur ba yin no// byams pa gzhan yang khyod mos par bya'o// khyod kyis khong du chud par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' gang
251a5(dkon brtsegs): dag la sbyor ba med cing bsam gtan med la spong du med cing 'dron pa med pa dang / mang du thos pa yongs su tshol ba med pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung
251a6(dkon brtsegs): ba ma yin no// byams pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa ni bsam gtan dang song bas ze ba dang / ye shes kyis 'dus byas pa dang / ye shes kyis mnyam pa'i gzhag par dngon
251a7(dkon brtsegs): brtson pas rtse ba yin gyi/ khyim pa'i las dang zhal ta byed pas bre ba rim yin te/ 'di ltar zhal bzed pa'i las de ni mo rigs pa la sbyor ba rnams dang / 'du byed la mngon par dgan
251b1(dkon brtsegs): ba rnams dang / 'jig rten pa'i bya bas sngags pa ste/ byang chub sems dpas de la 'dod pa bskyed par mi bya'o// byams pa gal te byang chub sems dpa' zhal ta byed pa la brtson pas
251b2(dkon brtsegs): rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di bkang na/ des ni nga mnyes par byas pa ma yin/ ri mor byas pa ma yin// bkur
251b3(dkon brtsegs): sti byas pa ma yin gyi/ byams pa gal te byang chub sems dpa' tha na pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i tshig zhig pa'i tshogs su bcad pa gcig tsam 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog
251b4(dkon brtsegs): gam kun chub par byed dam/ 'chad na des ni nga la bkur sti byas// bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod par byas par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byams pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
251b5(dkon brtsegs): kyang byang chub ni mang du thos pa las byung ba yin gyi/ dngos po yongs su 'dzin pa las byung ba ni ma yin pa'i phyir ro// byams pa gal te byang chub sems dpa' zhal ta byed pa la brtson
251b6(dkon brtsegs): bas/ byang chub sems dpa' lung nod pa dang kha ton byed pa la brtson pa zhal ta byed pa'i sdug pas sngags par byed pa na/ bsod nams 'dod pa des ni bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung
251b7(dkon brtsegs): po chen po skyed par 'gyur te/ las kyi sgrib pa'ide yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi gsum po gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni shes
252a1(dkon brtsegs): rab las byung ba'i zer ro// byams pa de lta bas nang can sems dpa' zhal temed pa la brtson pas/ byang chub sems dpa' srang rod pa dang 'ato
252a2(dkon brtsegs): byed pa la brtson pa'i bar chad mo bya'o// 'dzam bu'i gling 'di zhal ta byed pas yongs su gang bar gyur pa'i zhal tu zad pa de dag thams cad smros ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
252a3(dkon brtsegs): lung nod pa dang kha ton byed pa la brtson pa gcig la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' lung nod pa dang kha ton byed pa la brtson pa 'dzam bu'i gling gang ba
252a4(dkon brtsegs): snyed kyis ni/ byang chub sems dpa' nang du yang dag 'jog la brtson pa gcig la rim gro dang bskyed bkur bya'o// de ltar byas na de bzhin gshegs pas rjes su yi rang ba dang
252a5(dkon brtsegs): gnang ba yin te/ de dag gi bsnyen bkur nI legs par byas pa yin no// gang zhig shes rab spyod pa la mos nus rim gro dang bsnyen bkur byed pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po
252a6(dkon brtsegs): ni tshad med par skye bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi las de ni dka' ba'i las dang / bla na med pa dang / gong na med pa dang / 'jig rten gsum po thams
252a7(dkon brtsegs): cang las chang par du baphags shing mngon par 'phags pa'i tshor ro// rnams pa de ska bas na byang chub sems dpa' mngon par 'thon pa ron du gcer zhing brtson 'grus sdom pas/
252b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pas shes rab la 'artson par bya zhing / shes rab yongs su btsal ba la brtson 'grus bcom par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dngag
252b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' 'du 'dzi la dga' ba dang ka las la dga' ba rnams kyi chos dmigs rnams
252b3(dkon brtsegs): ni bka' stsa la lags na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas spros pa la dga' ba'i nongs dmigs ji ltar brtag par bgyi// byang chub sems dpa' gang dag la brtags
252b4(dkon brtsegs): ra nye bar zhi ba la gnas shing rtsod pa ma mchis par gnas par 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams paca mam dpas spros pa la dga' ba'i nyes
252b5(dkon brtsegs): dmigs rnams mdor brdzu na nyi shu po 'ang dag tu brtag par bya'o// rgyas par ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtha' yas par bstan te/ mthar drug par yang mi 'gyur ro//
252b6(dkon brtsegs): shug shen/ mas kyi pa sems dpa smos pa la dag drus sbrul ba dang 'ad sa da pa mang bar ga su pa dang / yod pa'as
252b7(dkon brtsegs): ze nga / kho'i ma mdza' ba rnams mi rangs par 'gyur ba dang / de la dung cing mgro par 'gyur ba dang / de sa sa kyi'i ba ma sa pa 'gyur pa da
253a1(dkon brtsegs): / ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams skye bar mi 'gyur ba dang / skyes pa rnams med par 'gyur ba dang / 'thab pa dang / khon du 'dzin pa dang / rtson pa dang / 'gyed pa mang
253a2(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyid pas ngan song du 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i las mngon par 'du byed par 'gyur ba dang / bag med par 'gyur ba'i lam rab tu 'dzin pa dang /
253a3(dkon brtsegs): de'i lce'i dbang po rtsub par 'gyur ba dang / de'i lung mnos pa'i chos rnams la legs par gnas par mi 'gyur ba dang / mdo sde lung ma mnos pa rnams rna lam du grag par mi 'gyur ba dang /
253a4(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad kyis yongs su spangs par 'gyur ba dang / sdig pa'i grogs po rnams dang myur du phrad par 'gyur ba dang / dka' ba'i lam gyis nges par 'byung bar 'gyur
253a5(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / rgyun ma 'chad par yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshig thos par 'gyur ba dang / gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der the tsom can du 'gyur ba dang / de la mi khom pa brgyad po dag nye bar 'gyur
253a6(dkon brtsegs): smra ba dang / rtag tu de'i dkar po'i phyogs la brtson pa la bar chad 'byung bar 'gyur ba ste/ byams pa nyi shu po de dag ni spros pa la dga' ba'i nyes dmigs rnams mdor bsdus pa ldan
253a7(dkon brtsegs): te/ de dag yongs su spang bar bya'o// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di bka' stsal to// de ni tshe 'dir bde bar mi 'gyur te// bzod dang ring
253b1(dkon brtsegs): zhing khro ba'i phyogs la gnas// de yi dgra rnams dga' bar 'gyur ba ste// spos spyong de yi nyes pa 'di dag go// bdud kyang de la dga' zhing mgu bar 'gyur// bdud kyi phyogs kyang de
253b2(dkon brtsegs): dga' bar 'gyur// de yi dge ba'i chos skyes chud par 'gyur// spros spyod de yi nyes pa 'di dag go/ de ni rnams kyang dge ba mi skyed de// 'chi kar tha dang rgyu la gnas pa dang // ngan
253b3(dkon brtsegs): song 'gro ba'i las ni byed par 'gyur// spros spyod de yi nyes pa 'di dag go// mi mdzes pa dang bltan mi sdug dang // de ni rtag tu rus rigs dma' bar 'gyur// de yi lce yi dbang
253b4(dkon brtsegs): mo rtsub 'gyur te// spos spyod re yi nyes pa 'di dag go/ lung mnos chos rnams legs par mi gnas shing // lung mnos ma byas mdo sde thos mi 'gyur// dge ba'i bshes gnyen
253b5(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyang rnam par spong // spros spyod de yi nyes pa 'di reg go/ sdig pa'i grogs po dag dang phrad par 'gyur// dka' ba'i theg pas rnam par rab 'gyur zhing // mi 'dod pa yi tshig
253b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams rgyun du thos// spros spyod de yaM nyes pa 'di dag go/ byis pa'i blo can de ni gar skyes der// yin nam ma yin snyam du re rtog cing // rtag tu des ni the tsom rnyed par 'gyur/
253b7(dkon brtsegs): spros spyod de yi nyes pa 'di dag go/ de ni mi khom brgyad dang ring mi 'gyur// de ni rel ba ldan pa'i mchog mi 'gyur// de la gnod pa 'di dag rtag 'byung ste// spong spyod de yi nyes
254a1(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di dag go// de yi dge ba dag la bar chad mang // bgegs su 'gyur bas myur du thob mi 'gyur// brtson dang ldan yang de la dam rnams 'byung // spros spyod /
254a2(dkon brtsegs): yi nyes pa 'di dag go/ mkhas pas nyes 'di yang dag rig nas ni// spros pa thams cad yongs su spang bar bya// spros spyod dag ni gnod pa rnyed par smra// de lta bas na spros la gnas/
254a3(dkon brtsegs): mi byedagang na spros pa'am rtson pa yod pa las// dpag tshad brgya yi pha rol 'gro ba mchog/ gang na nyon mongs yod pa de dag tu// yud tsam zhog kyang gnas shing 'dug mi bya//
254a4(dkon brtsegs): rab byung don 'dod yon tan 'dod pa rnams// sdang ba'i sems kyis rtsod par ma byed cig/ khyed la zhing med zhing blas tsheng byar med// gang la nor phyir 'di dag 'byung ba spros// khyed la chu
254a5(dkon brtsegs): ma bu dang bu mo med// khyim dang gnyen gyi tshogs kyang yod ma yin// zan po bran mo med cing dbang phyug med// rab tu byung nas rtsod par ma byed cig/ zhi zhing rab tu zhi bas bsten pa/
254a6(dkon brtsegs): yi/ ngur smrig gos rnams dad pas blangs nas ni// zhi zhing rab zhi nye bar zhibs byos// spros pa rnam par spongs la bzod pa skyed// mi bzad sems ni sbrul gdug 'dra ba gsungs
254a7(dkon brtsegs): spos la spyod pa sems can dmyal ba dang // dud 'gro gshin rje'i yul dang ring mi 'gyur// de lta bas na bzod dang brtson 'grus skyed// tshogs pa gzhig phyir spros par byed na ni// sdug
254b1(dkon brtsegs): bsngal bsod dang 'ching ba ci yang rung // gor brdegs dang bsdig pa de dag ni// 'jig rten 'di ni gnas pa rnams la 'byung // tshogs par gyur la skyes pa 'di dag dkon// tshogs gyur/
254b2(dkon brtsegs): ngag la nyal ba 'brel ba med// tshogs gyur rnams la dga' ba 'byung 'gyur na// mkhas pa su zhig tshogs pa sbeng mi byed// glags tshol dag gis skyon rnams rnyed mi 'gyur// rnams
254b3(dkon brtsegs): kyang 'khor rnams byed par mi 'gyur te// de yi mdza' bshes dag kyang rgyun du 'byung // spros pa spangs pa'i panA yon de dag yin// theg pa'i stobs 'di yis ni dga' 'gyur zhing // las
254b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi sgrub pa ma lus byang nas ni// stobs dang bcas shing bzhon bcas bdud thul cig/ brtan pa gang yin des ni bzod pa skyed// spros pa rgyas pa la ni skyon mang chags// nyes pa de dag
254b5(dkon brtsegs): ngas ni bstan mi nus// rtag tu spos med bsngags pa mtha' yas 'gyur// su zhig dor gnyer des ni bzod pa skyed/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems
254b6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kun nas nyon mongs pa de tsam du gleng ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas legs par gsungs te/
254b7(dkon brtsegs): ngo mtshar lags so// bcom ldan 'das ci lnga brgya pa mtha' ma la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis tshig gi mchog 'di lta bu 'di dag thos na skyo bar 'gyur zhing / kun nas nyon mongs
255a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i spyod pa'ang spong bar 'gyur lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ byams pa lnga brgya pa mtha' ma la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag rnams tshig gi mchog
255a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta bu 'di dag zos na skyo bar 'gyur zhing / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i spyod pa'ang spong bar 'byung ba de dag ni nyung ngo // byams pa gang dag sems kyi rgyud khengs par 'gyur zhing gus pa med pa
255a3(dkon brtsegs): dang mngon pa'i nga rgyal la gnas pa dang / gcig la gcig the tsom za ba mang ba dag ni phal che ste/ de dag de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo sde zab mo bstan pa'i yon tan dang
255a4(dkon brtsegs): phan yon zab pa dag lung nod par mi byed/ kha ton du mi byed/ 'chang bar mi byed/ kun chub par mi byed de/ de dag ni las kyis sgrib pa shas che bas/ yon tan de dag dang phan yon de dag
255a5(dkon brtsegs): 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// de dag dad pa med pa des mdo sde de dag la the tsom za bar 'gyur te/ phyis kyang lung nod par mi byed/ 'chang bar mi byed/ kun chub par mi byed de/ de dag gi drung du bdud
255a6(dkon brtsegs): sdig can dge slong gi cha lugs su 'dug nas 'di skad du mdo sde 'di dag ni rang bzor byas pa yin te/ 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mdo
255a7(dkon brtsegs): sde 'di dag las yon tan dang phan yon bshad pa gang yin pa de dag khyed kyi 'di las mi 'byung zhing med pa'i phyir ro zhes mos pa zlog par byed do// de dag de ltar mos pa bzlog pas// mdo
255b1(dkon brtsegs): sde zab mo dag mi 'dod cing the tsom du 'gyur te/ lung nod par mi byed/ kha ton du mi byed de/ mi blun po de dag gis yon tan dang ban yon de dag thos na/ 'di ltar chos spong bar 'gyur ba'i
255b2(dkon brtsegs): las kyi rnam par smin pa ni sbyang bar mi nus so snyam du mi sems so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ bya chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces
255b3(dkon brtsegs): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi yon tan de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa gang lags pa 'di dag las gang gis sems bskyed pa gang yang
255b4(dkon brtsegs): rung ba zhig yid la bgyid cing / de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med yid la bgyid pa de sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar 'gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das sems bskyed pa de dag gang lags/
255b5(dkon brtsegs): de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byams pa sems bskyed pa gang dag gis
255b6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur bar byed pa de dag ni byis pa'i sems bskyed pa ma yin/ skyes bu dam pa ma
255b7(dkon brtsegs): yin pa'i sems bskyed pa ma yin/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sems bskyed pa ma yin te/ byams pa sems bskyed pa ni bcu po 'di dag yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ byams pa 'di lta
256a1(dkon brtsegs): skye/ sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa la zhe 'grus pas ni de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar mi nus te/ sems can thams cad la/
256a2(dkon brtsegs): byams pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / 'tshe ba yongs su spangs te/ sems can thams cad la snying rje'i sems bskyed pa dang / lus dang srog la mi lta bar dam pa'i chos srung ba'i
256a3(dkon brtsegs): sems bskyed pa dang / zab mo'i bzod pa la nges par gyur pas dam pa'i chos la mngon par zhen pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / rnyed pa dang bkur stis mgos pas bsam pa yongs su dag
256a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / brjed pa med pas thams cad mkhyer pa nyid la rin po cher sems bskyed pa dang / zhum pa med pas sems can thams cad la bla ma bzhin du gus pa'i sems
256a5(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag la nges pas nyi tshe ba'i gtam gyi ro myang bar mi bya ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / ma 'dres pas dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sems bskyed pa dang /
256a6(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma yongs su spangs te sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom pa'i sems bskyed pa ste/ byams pa sems bskyed pa bcu po ni de dag yin te/ sems bskyed pa bcu po de dag las
256a7(dkon brtsegs): sems bskyed pa gang yang rung ba'i sem bskyed pa gang yin pa de ni sems bskyed pa de dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar mi 'gyur ba de ni gnas med do// de nas
256b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das lhag pa'i bsam brtul ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'dri tsam du bsam gyis mi khyab pa
256b2(dkon brtsegs): ngo mtshar lags so// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kan dga' bo la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ kun dga' bo legs so legs so// kun dga' ro
256b3(dkon brtsegs): de'i phyir khyod kyis lhag pa'i bsam pa skul ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung zhig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa'
256b4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi 'angs
256b5(dkon brtsegs): te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po chos kyi rnam grangs stong rdzab brgya pa las lhag pa'i bsam pa skul ba'i le'u
256b6(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ste/ 'dus pa nyi shu rtsa lnga pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / su ren dra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sde la sogs pas
256b7(dkon brtsegs): bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ shr-I ka drug brgya/ bam po gnyis so// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya su bA hu pa ri prits+tsha ra ma ma hA yAr
257a1(dkon brtsegs): su tra bod skad du/ 'phags pa lag bzangs kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// / bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang
257a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ 'od ma'i tshal byA ka lan ta ka'i gnas na/ dge
257a3(dkon brtsegs): slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag bzangs shes bya ba g.yog dang bcas te rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen
257a4(dkon brtsegs): po nas byung nas/ 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan ta ka'i gnas ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba la der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom
257a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la lan gsum bkor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'drug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag bzangs kyis bcom ldan 'das ga la pa de logs su thal
257a6(dkon brtsegs): mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos du dang ldan na myur du bla na med pa yang dag par
257a7(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag
257b1(dkon brtsegs): bzangs la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lag bzangs byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyar du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bya ba'i phyir/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po ma
257b2(dkon brtsegs): dag rtag par rgyun du yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nga
257b3(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ lag bzangs byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos pha rol
257b4(dkon brtsegs): tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag rtag par rgyun du yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// lag bzangs byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
257b5(dkon brtsegs): yongs su rdzogs par byed ce na/ lag bzangs 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos kyis longs spyod rnams yongs su tshol gyi/ chos ma yin pas ni ma yin no//
257b6(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pas yin gyi/ mi mnyam pas ni ma yin no// de srog chags gzhan dag dang / sems can gzhan rnams la gnod pa mi byed/ nyam nga ba mi byed par sbyin pa sbyin te/ brjod pa dang /
257b7(dkon brtsegs): sgra dang / tshigs su bcad pa'i phyir ma yin/ 'dzem pa'i phyir ma yin/ 'jigs pa'i phyir ma yin/ lan du phan 'dogs su re ba'i phyir ma yin/ mtho ris kyi phyir ma yin/ tshul 'chos pa ma/
258a1(dkon brtsegs): yin kha gsag byed pa ma yin/ brnyas pa ma yin no// sbyin gnas sam/ sbyin gnas ma yin pa 'am/ mngon par grags pa 'am/ mngon par grags pa ma yin/
258a2(dkon brtsegs): pa 'am/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa 'am/ tshul khrims 'chal pa 'am/ 'dris pa 'am/ ma 'dris pa 'am/ mdza' ba 'am/ mi mdza' ba'ang rung ste/ bkur stir byed/ tha mar byed/ rim gro byed/
258a3(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa byed cing / 'dun pa drag po dang / dga' ba drag po dang / dad pa drag pos de nyung ngu bdog na'ang nyung ngu sbyin/ mang du bdog na'ang mang du sbyin/ dran pa bdog ma'ang ngan pa sbyin/ gya nom pa
258a4(dkon brtsegs): bdog rwa'ang gya nom pa sbyin no// lag bzangs ji ltar byang chu sems dpa' brgya stong sbyin pa dang rlabs po che'i sems dang / rangs pa'i sems kyis smyon pa de bzhin du/ ka kA ni tsam yang sbyin zhing rlabs
258a5(dkon brtsegs): po che'i sems dang / rangs pa'i sems kyis sbyin no// des zas 'dod pa rnams la sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes bla na med pa'i stobs kyis brtan pa thob par bya ba'i phyir
258a6(dkon brtsegs): zas sbyin no// skom 'dod pa rnams la ni sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa'i sgom pa thams cad bsal ba'i stobs thob par bya ba'i phyir skom sbyin no// gos 'dod pa rnams la ni sems
258a7(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa'i gos thob par bya ba'i phyir gos sbyin no// bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la ni sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa dang / rdzogs
258b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa bla na med pa thob par bya ba'i phyir bzhon pa sbyor ro// spos 'dod pa rnams la sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims kyi dri bsung thams cad thob par
258b2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir smos sbyin no// me tog 'dod pa rnams lnga ni sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi yam ga bdun gyi me tog bla na med pa thob par bya ba'i phyir me tog rnams kyino/
258b3(dkon brtsegs): phye ma 'dod pa rnams la ni sems can thams cad nyes par spyod pa'i dri nga ba'i dri ma gzhom pa'i stobs thob par bya ba'i phyir phye ma sbyin no// byug pa 'dod pa rnams la ni sems can thams cad
258b4(dkon brtsegs): nyes pa med pa'i tshul khrims dang / spyod pa'i byug pa thob par bya ba'i phyir byug pa sbyin no// gdugs 'dod pa rnams la ni sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba thams cad nye bar zhi ba'i
258b5(dkon brtsegs): stobs thob par bya ba'i phyir gdugs sbyin no// lham 'dod pa rnams la ni sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i byede ba mngon par shes pa thob par bya ba'i phyir lham sbyin no// mal cha 'dod pa rnams la
258b6(dkon brtsegs): ni sems can thams cad lha dang / tshangs pa dang / 'phags pa'i gnas pa'i mal cha'i bde bar sbyar ba'i stobs thob par bya ba'i phyir mal cha sbyin no// stan 'dod pa rnams la ni sems can
258b7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad byang chub kyi snying por bdud dang nyon mongs pa'i slob pa bar du gcod pa thams cad kyis mi phyed pa dpa' ba'i stan thob par bya ba'i phyir stan sbyin no// gnas 'dod pa rnams la ni sems
259a1(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad sgrubs dang / gnas dang / dgo dang / dbyung gnyen du gyur ba'i lus thob par bya ba'i byor gnas sbyin no// zla cog dang / zam pa dang / 'tshog nas 'dod
259a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams la ni sems can thams cad chos kyi rdzing lta bu'i lus thob par bya ba'i phyir/ khru rtag dang / zam pa dang / 'chog chas sbyin no// sems ca thams pang ni ba dang / rna bar zhi ba za
259a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad thob par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la dka' thub kyi nags tshul sbyin pa sbyin no// sems can thams
259a4(dkon brtsegs): cad skyes bu chen po'i mtshar sum cu rtsa gnyis dang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu thob par bya ba'i phyir/ mchod rten rnams la can sbyin pa sbyin no// sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs
259a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i lho'i spyan mtha' yas pa thob par bya ba'i phyir/ mun khrod kyi mchod rten nam/ lam rnams la mar me sbyin pa sbyin no// sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha'i snyan mtha' yas
259a6(dkon brtsegs): pa thob par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas la mchod pa rnams sam/ chos la mchod pa rnams sam/ dge 'dun la mchod pa rnams la rol mo'i dbyangs sgra sbyin pa sbyin no// sems can thams ca
259a7(dkon brtsegs): ma byang dang / tshul khrims dang / spyod pa mdzes pa bla na med pa thob par bya ba'i phyir/ lhung bzed dang chos gos sbyin pa sbyin no// sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba ni sbyin pa'i stom
259b1(dkon brtsegs): byar bya ba tshar/ snod rdzasas sbyin pasbyin no// sesus sa byam sa za shes payin pa rdzogs yongs su bgang bsod par byu dir smras dang / nas dang / gas du sa
259b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi khri spun sbyin pa sbyin no// sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i nad thams cad gzhom pa'i phyir/ na ba'i gsos sman dang yo byad sbyin basbyin no// sems can thams cad byang chub rnam po
259b3(dkon brtsegs): gsum gyi sa dang / bdud rtsi'i dbyings kyi sa thob par bya ba'i phyir/ sa gzhi sbyin pa sbyin no// sems can thams cad slob dpon med pa'i dam pa'i chos mthon po thob par bya ba'i phyir/ mchod rten
259b4(dkon brtsegs): mthon po dang / sku gzugs mthon po byed do// mdog pa lta na sems can thams cad mngon par shes pa myur ba thob par bya ba'i phyir/ myur zhing yongs su nyon mongs par ma gyur par sbyin pa sbyin no//
259b5(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad bar du gcod pa med par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir/ rung ba sbyin gyi rung ba ma yin pa ni ma yin no// sems can thams cad spobs pa chen po yongs su mi 'chad pa
259b6(dkon brtsegs): thob par bya ba'i phyir/ yongs su mi gcod pa yin no// sems can thams cad snang rje chen po mtshungs pa med pa thob par bya ba'i phyir/ sems can thams cad la mnyam par smin pa
259b7(dkon brtsegs): sbyin no// sems can thams cad bdud dang mu stegs byed thams cad kyis tshar mi chod pa dang / gnod par mi nus pa'i chos mngon par rdzogs par byang chub
260a1(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba'i phyir/ gzhan la mi gnod par sbyin pa sbyin no// lag bzangs gal te byang chub sems dpa' la sbyin pa 'di dag sbyin du nor med cing 'byor pa med par
260a2(dkon brtsegs): gyur na/ de 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can thams cad la sbyin pa mtha' yas shing dpag med pa 'di dag sbyin par yid kyis 'dod cing smon la/ smon lam 'debs te/ lag
260a3(dkon brtsegs): bzangs byang chub sems dpa' de sbyin pa 'di dag sbyin pa'i nus pa dang ldan yang rung / nus pa dang mi ldan yang rung ste/ gang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na sems can thams cad bdag gi
260a4(dkon brtsegs): bde bar sbyar ba nyid dang ldan pa rang yang dag par ldan par gyur grong 'bad pa med pa dang / 'dod pa med par brnag pa rnams thams cad rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du shin tu yongs su rdzogs shing
260a5(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa ma lus par yongs su rdzogs nas/ bde ba la reg par gnas par 'gyur bar bdag gi de bzang por gyur cig/ bdag gi de dge bar gyur cig ces de ltar yid kyis 'dod cing smon la//
260a6(dkon brtsegs): smon lam 'drebs so// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can thams cad la rin po che'i rgya mtsho'ang sbyin par 'dod cing smon la/ smon lam 'debs so// dbyig gi ri dang / gas
260a7(dkon brtsegs): gyi ri dang / gos kyi ra dang / yo byad thams cad kyi ri dang / bza' ba rgya mtsho dang / btung ba rgya mtsho dang / gnas legs par byas pa/ legs par gnas pa mtha' yas shing dpag tu med/
260b1(dkon brtsegs): pa dag kyang sbyin par 'dod cing ston la/ smon lam 'debs so// 'khor ba'i srid pa thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung
260b2(dkon brtsegs): ba thams cad kyi sbyin pa dang / gtong ba dang / rnam par gtong ba gang yin pa zang zing smin pa 'am/ mi 'jog pa sbyin pa 'am/ chos sbyin pa ma lus pa de dag thams cad la thA na dus gsum
260b3(dkon brtsegs): du'ang mngon par dga' zhing rjes su yi rang ngo // gal te de la bslangs la nor sbyin mi nus na'ang / rang gi zas skal sbyin pa 'am/ grogs su 'gyur ba 'am/ kun tu btsal ba'i thabs kyang de la
260b4(dkon brtsegs): ston par 'gyur ro// chos kyi gtam gyis de'i 'dod pa sel bar byed do// de sbyin pa 'dod par gyur na'ang sbyin pa de sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang / sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang /
260b5(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang / sems can thams cad yongasu mya ngan las bzla ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs
260b6(dkon brtsegs): su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o// sbyin pa dag byin nas kyang sbyin pa de sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang / sems
260b7(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad dgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang / sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas
261a1(dkon brtsegs): #kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ thun med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o// gal te sbyin pa dang / gtong ba dang / rnam par
261a2(dkon brtsegs): gtong ba de la slob pa'i nus pa dang mi ldan par gyur na/ de 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/ dus dus su 'am/ cung zad cung zad du'ang chags pa dang / ser sna dang / smin pas 'dzegs pa spang ba
261a3(dkon brtsegs): dnga'ador ba dang / bsal bar rtsol lo// 'bang ngo // dus rus su 'am/ cung zad cung zad du sbyin pa dang / gtong ba dang / rnam par gtong ba la slob pa dang / mngon par 'phel bar bya
261a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / yongs su rdzogs par bya bar rtsol lo// 'ban do// srid pa gzhan du gyur pa namang nus par mi 'gyur ning // sgyid mug par mi 'gyur ro// lag bzangs byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang
261a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi sems rjes su dran pa dang / byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa dang / byang chub tu smon pa dang / byang chub tu smon lam 'debs pa gang yin pa de nyid de dag gi sbyin pa chen po dang / gtong ba chen
261a6(dkon brtsegs): po dang / rnam par gtong ba chen po grangs med cing dpag tu med pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can thams cad la dam pa'i chos kyi char
261a7(dkon brtsegs): sbyin par 'dod pa dang / bdud rtsi'i dbyings kyi char sbyin par 'dod pa dang / dam pa'i chos kyi char gtong bar 'dod pa dang / bdud rtsi'i dbyings kyi char gtong bar 'dod pa re ni sbyin pa dang / gtong ba/
261b1(dkon brtsegs): dang rnam par gtong ba thams cad kyi nang na mchog yin no// de ni dam pa yin no// lag bzangs de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bde ba dang ldan la/ yid byed ba dang ldar zhing / tshogs chung
261b2(dkon brtsegs): rang sdug bsngal chung ngus myur du skyen par smin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// lag bzangs byang chub sems dpa' mi spong ba rnams kyis bskangs pa nu/ yan lag
261b3(dkon brtsegs): dang nying lag gcod dam bcad nas slong ba rnams la sbyin par mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag nyid kyi sems can dmyal ba chen por 'gyur ba dang / mi dge ba'i las chen po rgya che ba yongs
261b4(dkon brtsegs): su mi spong ba'i phyir ro// sems can gzhan phyir ram/ sems can gzhan gyi ched la de rang gi yan lag dang nying lag yongs su mi gtong ba ni ma yin no// lag bzangs byang chub sems
261b5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni slong bas bdog pa thams cad bslangs na/ pha ma la gnod pa byas shing spangs te/ sdug bsngal bar byas/ bu dang / chung ma dang / bran po dang / bran mo dang /
261b6(dkon brtsegs): las byed pa dang / zho shas 'tsho ba la gnod pa byas shing spangs te/ sdug bsngal bar byas nas bdog pa thams cad slong ba rnams la sbyin par mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems
261b7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' ni sems can thams cad la mtshungs par snying brtse ba yin te/ ji ltar pha ma la gnod pa mi byed cing mi spong la/ sdug bsngal bar yang mi byed pa dang / bu dang / chung ma dang bran po dang /
262a1(dkon brtsegs): zan mo dang / las byed pa dang / zho shas 'tsho ba la gnod pa mi byed cing mi song ste/ sdug bsngal bar mi byed par sbyin par sbyin pa de bzhin du sems can thams cad la
262a2(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs par gso ba byed do// de ni sems can gzhan gyi phyir ram/ sems can gzhan gyi ched la bdog pa thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba'ang ma yin no// lag bzangs de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
262a3(dkon brtsegs): ni sems can la gnod pa'i sbyin pa'i bsngags pa gsungs pa ma yin na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yan lag bcad pa lta la de ltar ga la 'gyur/ lag bzangs byang chub sems
262a4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' ji ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed ce na/ lag bzangs 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni srog gi phyir yang srog chags gzhan dag dang / sems can gzhan rnams la
262a5(dkon brtsegs): mi rdeg mi gsod cing / gsod pa la rjes su yi rang bar mi byed do// srog gi phyir yang ma byin par mi len la/ ma byin par len du mi 'jug cing / ma byin par len pa la rjes su yi rang bar mi byed do//
262a6(dkon brtsegs): srog gi phyir yang 'dod pa la log par g.yem par mi byed la/ 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa byed du mi 'jug cing / 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa la rjes su yi rang bar mi byed do// srog gi phyir yang
262a7(dkon brtsegs): brdzun mi spa la/ brdzun zer du mi 'jug cing / brdzun smra ba la rjes su yi rang bar mi byed do// srog gi phyir yang chang mi 'thung ba dang / chang 'thung du mi 'jug cing / chang 'thung ba la rjes su yi rang bar
262b1(dkon brtsegs): mi byed do// de la bslab pa'i gzhi lnga po de dag la ring du gnas shing brtan po gnas gangam bor gnas te/ mi lhong bar gnas shing srab bo// de bzhin du zhing meng pa dang / 'ang meng du 'jug pa dang /
262b2(dkon brtsegs): 'ching ba dang / 'ching du 'jug pa dang / go ra 'jug pa dang / go ra gzhug tu 'jug pa dang / rdeg pa dang / rdeg tu 'jug pa dang / gcod pa dang / gcod du 'jug pa dag spang ba dang / dor ba dang / bsal
262b3(dkon brtsegs): bar 'bad par byed do// de de ltar bslab pa'i gzhi lnga po dag la ring du gnas shing brtan por gnas la/ dam por gnas te/ mi lhod par gnas shing sgrub bo// de bzhin du phra ma'i tshig dang / ngag rtsub
262b4(dkon brtsegs): po dang / tshig 'khyal pa spang ba dang / dor ba dang / bsal bar 'bad par byed do// de srog chags thams cad dang / sems can thams cad ni bdag gi pha ma ji lta ba bzhin no// bu gcig pa 'phangs
262b5(dkon brtsegs): pa ji lta ba bzhin te/ ji ltar pha ma rang bu gcig pa 'phangs pa/ bdag la 'khu'ang slar 'khu bar mi bya la/ lag pa 'am/ bong ba 'am/ dbyug pa 'am/ ral gri 'am/ mangs brdegs kyang slar sdig
262b6(dkon brtsegs): bar mi bya/ gsod kyang slar gsang bar mi bya zhing / ji ltar pha ma dang bu gcig pa 'phangs pa/ 'khu'ang slar 'khu bar mi bya ba de bzhin du/ bdag srog chags thams cad dang sems can thams cad
262b7(dkon brtsegs): kyis lag pa 'am/ bong ba 'am/ dbyig pa 'am/ ral gri 'am/ mdas brdegs kyang slar brdeg par mi bya/ gsod kyang slar gsad par mi bya'o zhes de ltar slob bo// dper na pa 'am/
263a1(dkon brtsegs): ma 'am/ bu gcig pa 'phangs pa yun ring por yul rgyu ste/ 'ongs pa mthong na dga' zhing yid bde bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ lag bzangs byang chub sems dpa' yang srog chags/
263a2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad dang sems can thams cad mthong na dga' ba rang yid bde bar 'gyur ro// de'i srog gcod pa spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni sems can thams cad mi slob pa'i tshul khrims sreg gcod pa
263a3(dkon brtsegs): spungs pa la dgod pa'i phyir ro// de'i ma byin par len pa spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni sems can thams cad mi slob pa'i tshul khrims ma byin par len pa spangs pa la dgod pa'i phyir ro// de/
263a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni sems can thams cad mi slob pa'i tshul khrims tshangs par spyod pa la dgod pa'i phyir ro// de'i brdzun du smra ba spangs pa'i tshul
263a5(dkon brtsegs): khrims ni sems can thams cad mi slob pa'i tshul khrims brdzun du smra ba spangs pa la dgod pa'i phyir ro// de'i chang 'thung ba spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni sems can thams cad mi slob pa'i tshul/
263a6(dkon brtsegs): khrims chang 'thung ba spangs pa la dgod pa'i phyir ro// de'i zhing rmed pa dang zhing rmed du 'jug pa spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni sems can thams cad rdo rje ltar mi byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par bya
263a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir ro// de'i 'ching ba dang 'ching du 'jug pa spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i bcings pa thams cad gcad pa'i phyir ro// de'i go rar 'jug pa dang go/
263b1(dkon brtsegs): ragazhug tu 'jug pa spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni sems can thams cad kyi 'gro ba lnga dgag pa dang bsal ba'i phyir ro// de'i rdeg pa dang rdeg tu 'jug pa spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni sems can/
263b2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad bdud dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa bar du gcod pa thams cad kyis zil gyis mi non pa'i chos nyid thor par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i gcod pa dang gcod du 'jug pa spangs pa'i tshul ldas
263b3(dkon brtsegs): ni sems can thams cad lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las kun tu bsrungs pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i phra ma'i tshig spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni g.yog nyan thos kyi dge 'dun chen po mo byed
263b4(dkon brtsegs): pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i tshig rtsub po spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni yan lag lnga pa'i ngag gi lam dang ldan pa'i tshangs pa'i sgra skad thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i tshig bkyal pa spangs pa'i
263b5(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims ni tshig gzung bar 'os pa thogs pa med pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i 'chibs 'jigs skrag pa yongs su skyob pa'i tshul khrims ni sems can thams cad
263b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi skye ba dang / rgad dang / rab dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug sbal ba dang / yid mi rnyed pa dang / 'khrug pa'i 'jigs pa rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir ro//
263b7(dkon brtsegs): gzhan gyi nor dang yo byad 'jig cing chung za ba yongs su skyod pa'i tshul khrims ni sems can thams cad byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos nor bla na med 'thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i gzhan gyi
264a1(dkon brtsegs): bud med la 'dzin pa gtong bar byed pa dang / gtong bar byed du 'jug pa'i tshul khrims ni 'khrul pa med pa'i chos nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i 'gug pa gtong bar byed pa dang gtong bar byed du
264a2(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa'i tshul khrims ni rang gi sems la dbang thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i 'ching ba 'grel pa dang 'grel du 'jug pa'i tshul khrims ni dpa' bo'i stan byang chub kyi snying por bdud kyi dmag dang / nyon mongs
264a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'ching ba thams cad gzhig pa'i phyir ro// de'i khyim nas 'byung ba'i tshul khrims ni sems rnam par grol ba sgrib pa med par thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i 'ardeg pa 'chugs pa'i tshul
264a4(dkon brtsegs): khrims ni ma 'jigs pa rnam pa bzhis 'jigs pa yang dag par gzhom pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i gcod pa bzlog pa'i tshul khrims ni kun tu srung ba'i chos bzhi thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/
264a5(dkon brtsegs): de'i mi slu ba'i tshig smra ba'i tshul khrims ni dpa' bo'i star byang chub kyi snying por bdud dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa bar du gcod pa thams cad kyis mi slu ba'i chos nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir ro//
264a6(dkon brtsegs): de'i bye ba rnams kyi bsdums byed cing mdza' ba brtan par byed pa'i tshul khrims ni g.yog 'phags pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun chen po mi phyed pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i tshig snyan pa dang
264a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jam por smra ba'i tshul khrims ni sems can thams cad kyi rnar bde zhing snying du 'ong la bden pa'i tshig thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i kun tu mthun pa smra ba'i tshul khrims ni tshar mi chod cing gzung ba
264b1(dkon brtsegs): 'os la/ 'bras bu yod pa'i chos ston pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyi bsngags pa brjod pa'i tshul khrims ni 'phags pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i dge 'dun gyi g.yog
264b2(dkon brtsegs): 'khor chen po thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams thams
264b3(dkon brtsegs): cad du gtogs pa grangs med dpag tu med pa rnams la dus gsum du yan lag lngas gtugs te/ phyag 'tshal ba byed pa'i tshul khrims ni sems can thams cad dpa' bo'i sngar byang chub kyis
264b4(dkon brtsegs): por mi phyed cing / sra la shin tu brtan pa'i dad pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab mchog gi chos nyid dam pa lnga thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i dus gsum du
264b5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten thams cad la rim mo byed pa'i tshul khrims ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su bskang ba thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i dus gsum du chos kyi yon tan brjod pa
264b6(dkon brtsegs): smra ba'i tshul khrims ni chos kyi 'khor lo gnas med pa bla na med pa bskor ba'i phyir ro// de'i dus gsum du dge 'dun gyi yon tan brjod pa zla ba'i tshul khrims ni 'phags pa'i dge 'dun mi
264b7(dkon brtsegs): phyed pa'i g.yog 'khor chen po thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i dus gsum la dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba'i tshul khrims ni sems can thams cad la skyabs bla na med pa sbyin pa'i
265a1(dkon brtsegs): phyir ro// de'i dus gsum du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dkon mchog gsum dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis stongs par mi 'gyur bar gsol ba 'debs
265a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshul khrims ni bde bar 'gyur bar gcig tu nges pa'i rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i dus gsum du sangs rgyas thams cad la bskal par chos ston pa gsol ba 'debs
265a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshul khrims ni sa bcu pa chos kyi sprin theb par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i dus gsum du sdig pa thams cad so sor 'chags pa dang / sdig pa thams cad so sor 'dor ba dang / sdig pa thams
265a4(dkon brtsegs): cad la smod pa'i tshul khrims ni bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad yang dag par gzhom pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i dus gsum du dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par 'dzin
265a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshul khrims ni pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su bskang ba thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i dus gsum du sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang /
265a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / dka' byung ba thams cad dang / sems can 'grob thams cad na gnas pa/ 'jig rten gyi khacwa tha ma cang du gtog pa 'das pa
265a7(dkon brtsegs): dngar ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la rjes su yi rang ba'i tshul khrims ni byang chub kyi tshogs mtha' yas shing dpag tu med pa bsags pa yongs su
265b1(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i dus gsum du rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon pa'i tshul khrims ni rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par nges pa la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i dus gsum du dge ba'i
265b2(dkon brtsegs): rtsa ba thams cad rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par yongs su sngo ba'i tshul khrims ni gcig tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i pha ma dang / bla ma dang
265b3(dkon brtsegs): rgan pa dang / slob dpon dang / mkhan po la bsnyen bkur byed pa'i tshul khrims ni zil gyis mi non pa'i chos nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i 'jigs pa dang / skrag pa dang / nyam thag
265b4(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / mgron med pa dbugs 'byin pa'i tshul khrims ni dris pa thams cad la mi skyo bar lan 'debs pa la mkhas pa theb par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i rgyal po dang / chom rkun dang / med pa
265b5(dkon brtsegs): chu dang / bgo skal la spyod pa'i sdug bsngal gyi nang du chud pa rnams yongs su bskyab cing grogs bya ba'i tshul khrims ni gnas dang / sa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa chen po yongs su bsrung
265b6(dkon brtsegs): ba thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rjes su bsngags pa'i
265b7(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs bla na med pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i pha rol gyi sems rjes su srung ba dang mthun pa'i lus kyi las kyi tshul khrims dang
266a1(dkon brtsegs): pha rol gyi sems mngon par dga' ba dang / yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba'i lus kyi las kyi tshul khrims dang / pha rol gyi sems rjes su srung ba dang mthun
266a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i ngag gi las kyi tshul khrims dang / pha rol gyi sems mngon par dga' ba dang / yang dag par dag par 'gyur ba'i ngag gi las kyi tshul khrims ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i pha rol gyi sems
266a3(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa'i stobs mtha' yas pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i tshe 'di'i don dang / tshe rabs gzhan gyi don dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa'i don dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i don dang / rdzogs
266a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub kyi theg pa'i don rnams la bag med pa dang / brjed pa rnams kyi dran pa yang dag par skyed pa'i tshul khrims dang / dran pa 'byung bar byed pa'i tshul khrims ni brjed pa med pa'i
266a5(dkon brtsegs): chos nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i chos nyan pa'i tshul khrims dang / chos 'dzin pa'i tshul khrims dang / chos goms par byed pa'i tshul khrims dang / chos nye bar ston pa'i tshul khrims
266a6(dkon brtsegs): ni spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bskar ba thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de tshul khrims yang dag par len par 'dod pa dang / lhag par spyad par 'dod pa
266a7(dkon brtsegs): na'ang lus dang / ngag dang / sems kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de thams cad sems can thams rnaskal ba dang / sems can thams cad sgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang /
266b1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo bar byed do// yang dag par 'dzin pa dang / lhag par spyod pa dang /
266b2(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par blang ba dang / lhag par spyad nas kyang sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang / sems can thams cad sgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa
266b3(dkon brtsegs): nyid thob par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo bar byed do// gal te tshul khrims de ma zhig pa dang / ma ral ba dang / 'dren ma ma yin
266b4(dkon brtsegs): par slob pa'i nus pa dang mi ldan par gyur na de 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/ dus dus su 'am/ cung zad cung zad du'ang mi dge ba spang ba dang / dor ba dang / bsal bar rtsol lo// 'bad do//
266b5(dkon brtsegs): dus dus su 'am/ cung zad cung zad du'ang dge ba la slob pa dang / mngon par 'phel bar bya ba dang / yongs su rdzogs par bya bar rtsol lo// 'bad do// srid pa gzhan du gyur pa na'ang zhum pan
266b6(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur zhing / sgying lug par mi 'gyur ro// lag bzangs byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / byang chub kyi sems rjes su drang pa dang / byang chub kyi sems
266b7(dkon brtsegs): bsgom pa dang / byang chub tu smon pa dang / byang chub tu smon lam 'debs pa gang yin pa de nyid de dag gi rig pa'i tshul khrims yang dag par 'dzin pa dang / dge ba'i tshul khrims la lhag
267a1(dkon brtsegs): par spyod pa grangs med cing dpag tu med pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can thams cad la zag pa med pa'i
267a2(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims skyed par 'dod pa dang / mi slob pa'i tshul khrims skyed par 'dod pa dang / zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims yang dag par skyed par 'dod pa dang / mi slob pa'i tshul khrims yang dag pa
267a3(dkon brtsegs): skyed par 'dod pa de ni dge ba'i tshul khrims yang dag par 'dzin pa dang / dge ba'i tshul khrims la lhag par spyod pa'i mchog yin no// de ni dam pa yin no// lag bzangs de ltar na byung
267a4(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' bde ba dang ldan la/ yid bde ba dang ldan zhing / tshegs chung ngu dang / sdug bsngal chung ngus myur du skyen par tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do//
267a5(dkon brtsegs): lag bzangs byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed ce na/ lag bzangs 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni gzhan dag gis rang gi
267a6(dkon brtsegs): lus kyi srog gcod dam/ bdog pa thams cad 'phrog gam/ chung ma 'phrog gam/ brdzun du slu ba 'am/ phra mA dang / ngag rtsub po dang / tshig bkyil pa smra ba 'am/ gshe ba 'am/ gsod dam/
267a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin tam/ rdeg gam/ gcod kyang slar gnod par mi byed cing / slar mi khro ste/ shar gnyer zhing khor du 'dzin par mi byed do// de 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/ bdag nyid kyis sngon gyi
267b1(dkon brtsegs): srid pa rnams dang / srid pa 'di la sdig pa mi dge pa'i las 'di dag byas shing bsags pa de dag gi 'bras bu ni 'di yin/ de dag gi rnam par srir ba ni 'di yin te/ rang gi las kyi 'bras rba dang /
267b2(dkon brtsegs): rang gi las kyi rnam par smin pa bdag gis myong ba la ci'i phyir gzhan la skur gnod par bya zhing / slar khro ba dang shar gnyer zhing khon du 'dzin par bya snyam du sems so// lag bzangs gzhan
267b3(dkon brtsegs): yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/ gal te bdag gi sogs gcod pa 'am/ bdog pa thams cad 'phrog pa 'am/ chung ma 'phrog pa 'am/ brdzun du smra ba 'am/ phra ma 'am/
267b4(dkon brtsegs): ngag rtsub po 'am/ tshig bkyal pa smra ba 'am/ gshe ba 'am/ gsod pa 'am/ 'dzin pa 'am/ rdeg pa 'am/ gcod pa'ang rung ste/ gzhan dag la slar gsod pa byas sam/ slar khro 'am/
267b5(dkon brtsegs): shwar gnyer zhing khon du bzung na/ slar gnod pa byas pa dang / slar khros pa dang / shar gnyer zhing khon du bzung ba'i sdig pa mi dge ba de'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba mi 'dod pa/ mi sdug pa/
267b6(dkon brtsegs): yid du mi 'ong ba 'di bas bdag la las kyi rnam par smin pa dang / las kyi rgyu mthun pa brgya 'gyur ram/ stong gyur tam/ de bas lhag par mi 'dod pa dang / mi sdug pa dang / yid du mi 'ong
267b7(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal gzhan yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro snyam mo// lag bzangs gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar yang dag par slongab ste/ srog yod pas srog gcod par 'gyur/
268a1(dkon brtsegs): rdzas yod pas rdzas 'phrog par 'gyur/ rna ba'i dbang po yod pas brdzun du smra ba thos par 'gyur/ tshig phra ma dang / ngag rtsub po dang / tshig bkyil pa thos par 'gyur la/ lus/
268a2(dkon brtsegs): yod pas lus 'dren pa dang / 'ching ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / rdeg pa dang / gcod par 'gyur te/ bdag nyid kyis sdug bsngal gyi dngos po sdug bsngal gyi gzhi/ srog gi dbang po dang / rna ba'i
268a3(dkon brtsegs): dbang po dang / lus blangs par gyur na/ ji ltar gzhan dag la slar gnod pa dang / slar khro ba dang / shar gnyer zhing khon du gzung bar bya snyam mo// lag zangs gzhan yang
268a4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/ dper na sa'i khams kyi mtshan nyid ni slu ba ste/ de ni ngo bo nyid/ de ni chos nyid// de ni rang bzhin no// chu'i khams kyi mtshan nyid
268a5(dkon brtsegs): ni gsher ba/ me'i khams kyi mtshan nyid ni tsha ba/ rlung gi khams kyi mtshan nyid ni yang zhing g.yo ba ste/ de ni ngo bo nyid/ de ni chos nyid/ de ni rabazhin no// de bzhin du srog thams cad
268a6(dkon brtsegs): kyang zad pa'i chos can/ 'god pa'i chos can/ 'gog pa'i chos can no// dbang po thams cad kyang sdug bsngal gyi chos can/ sdug bsngal 'dus te reg pa'i chos can/ sdug
268a7(dkon brtsegs): bsngal myong ba'i chos can no// lus thams cad kyang sdug bsngal gyi chos/ sdug bsngal 'dus te reg pa'i chos/ sdug bsngal myong ba'i chos te/ de ni ngo bo nyid/ de ni chos nyid/
268b1(dkon brtsegs): de ni rang bzhin yin na// srog gi dbang po zad pa'i chos can/ 'god pa'i chos can// 'gog pa'i chos can/ zang cing rengs la 'gog pa dang / dbang po drug po sdug bsngal gyi chom can/ sdug
268b2(dkon brtsegs): bsngal 'dus te reg pa'i chos can/ sdug bsngal myong ba'i chos can rnams la sdug bsngal 'dus te reg pas ji ltar gzhan dag la slar gnod pa 'am/ slar khro ba 'am/ shar gnyer zhing khon du
268b3(dkon brtsegs): gzung bar bya/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ni nga bo nyid// 'di ni chos nyid/ 'di ni rang bzhin no snyam mo// lag bzangs gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar yang dag par slong
268b4(dkon brtsegs): ste/ bdag gi mig dang / rna ba dang / swA dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyang bdag med cing / bdag gi med pa yin la/ gzhan dag gi mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid
268b5(dkon brtsegs): kyang bdag med cing / bdag gi med pa yin na// mkhas pa rig pa dag mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid bdag med cing / bdag gi med pa la/ mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang /
268b6(dkon brtsegs): kye dang / lus dang / yid bdag med cing / bdag gi med pas ji ltar dgu' ba 'am/ rjes su chags pa 'am/ yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba 'am/ rdeg pa 'am/ skur gnod par byed pa
268b7(dkon brtsegs): 'am/ slar khro ba'am/ shar gnyer zhing khon du 'dzin par 'gyur snyam mo// lag bzangs gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/ 'di lta ste/
269a1(dkon brtsegs): #mir skyes pa'i sdug bsngal ni nyung zhing chung gi/ yid dgas kyi sdug bsngal ni ches mi bzang la/ ches bzod par dka' ba yin/ dung 'gro'i skye gnas kyi sdug bsngal dang /
269a2(dkon brtsegs): sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal yang ches mi bzad cing bzod par dka' ba yin na/ bdag gis ji ltar sdug bsngal chung zhing nyung ba tsam gyi phyir/ gzhan dag la slar gnod pa dang shar gnyer
269a3(dkon brtsegs): zhing khon du gzung bar bya snyam mo// lag bzangs gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/ gang bdag gcig pu'i don 'dod pa dang / bdag gcig pu
269a4(dkon brtsegs): la phan par 'dod pas gzhan dag la phyir gnod par byed cing phyir khre ste/ shar gnyer zhing khon du 'dzin pa de'ang mi rigs te cha ma yin na/ bdag 'jig rten thams cad kyi ron 'dod pa// 'jig
269a5(dkon brtsegs): rten thams cad la phan par 'dod pa/ go cha chen po bgos pa/ yid dam bcas pa chen pos yid dam bcas pa/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya chen po
269a6(dkon brtsegs): yongs su bslang bar 'dod pa lta la smos kyang ci dgos te/ mi bzod pa dang / d+hir gnod pa byed pa dang / phyir khro ba dang / shar gnyer zhing khon du 'dzin pas ni sangs rgyas kyi chos 'di dag sogs
269a7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / 'phel ba dang / yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur gyi/ bzod pa dang / phyir gnod pa mi byed pa dang / phyir mi khro ba dang / shar gnyer zhing khon du 'dzin pa mi byed pas/ sangs rgyas kyi
269b1(dkon brtsegs): chos 'di dag sogs shing 'del te/ yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro snyam mo// lag dbangs rigs kyi tha'am/ rigs kyi sa po sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su bslang bar 'dong bas par meng
269b2(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal gyi reg pas reg kyang / gzhan dag la slar gnod pa mi bya/ slar khro bar mi bya/ shar gnyer zhing khon du gzung bar mi bya na/ mi'i sdug bsngal gyis reg pas lta smos kyang cing /
269b3(dkon brtsegs): de spyos sam/ rgyang bkag gam/ smang ngam/ mi snyan pa byas kyang byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs shin tu dri ma med cing dag la dka' batho
269b4(dkon brtsegs): bar bya ba'i phyir bzod cing dang du len to// de drung ba shal tam/ bcings sam/ bzung yang byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems dang / skad cig gcig la ma rig pa'i sgrib pa'i sgo nga'i
269b5(dkon brtsegs): skyabs gzhom pa'i phyir brjod cing rang du len to// de brdegs kyang byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems dang / sems can thams cad kyi rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba bzlog pa
269b6(dkon brtsegs): byor bzod cing dang du len to// de rna ba bcad kyang byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems dang / sems can thams cad la dang bar bya ba'i chos kyi rna ba bskyed pa'i phyir bzod cing rang du len to// de/
269b7(dkon brtsegs): sna bcad kyang byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems dang / sems can thams cad kyi tshul khrims kyi yon tan mdzes shing bla na med pa la longs spyod par bya ba'i phyir bzod cing rang du len
270a1(dkon brtsegs): / de rkang pa bcad kyang byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems dang / sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi thob par bya ba'i phyir
270a2(dkon brtsegs): bzod cing rang du len to// de lag pa bcad kyang byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems dang / sems can thams cad la zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi ba'i chos kyi lag pa brkyang basbyin pa
270a3(dkon brtsegs): thob par bya ba'i phyir bzod cing dang du len to// de yan lag thams cad bcad kyang byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi yan lag dang nyid lag yongs
270a4(dkon brtsegs): su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir bzod cing dang du len to// de mig phyung yang byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems dang / sems can thams cad shes bzhin gyi mig g.yung drung thob par bya ba'i
270a5(dkon brtsegs): phyir bzod cing dang du len to// de mgo bcad kyang byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems dang / sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos kyi mgo thob par bya ba'i phyir
270a6(dkon brtsegs): bzod cing dang du len to// de bzod pa 'di dag dang ci mi snyam pa 'di dag mngon sum du bya bar 'dod pa dang / yid la bya bar 'dod na'ang / sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang / sems can thams
270a7(dkon brtsegs): cad sgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo bar
270b1(dkon brtsegs): byed do// mngos sum du byed pa dang / yid la byed pa dang / mngos sum du byas pa dang / yid la byas nas kyang sems can thams cad bskul ba dang / sems can thams cad stsol pa dang /
270b2(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo bar byed do// gal te
270b3(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa 'di dag dang ci mi snyam pa 'di dag ma nyams pa dang / skyon med pa dang / 'dren ma ma yin par slob pa'i nus pa dang mi ldan par gyur na/ de 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/ dus dus su 'am/ cung
270b4(dkon brtsegs): zang cung zad du'ang mi bzod pa dang / ci mi snyam par mi byed pa spang ba dang / dor ba dang / bsal bar rtsol lo// 'bad do// dus dus su 'am/ cung zad cung zad du'ang bzod pa dang / ci mi snyam pa la slob
270b5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / mngon par 'phel bar bya ba dang / yongs su rdzogs par bya bar rtsol lo// 'bang ngo // srid pa gzhan du gyur pa na'ang zhum par mi 'gyur zhing / sgyid lug par mi 'gyur ro// lag bcang
270b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / byang chub kyi sems rjes su dran pa dang / byang chub sems bsgom pa dang / byang chub tu smin pa dang / byang chub tu sngon lam 'don
270b7(dkon brtsegs): ba gang yin pa de nyid de dag gi bzod pa kun tu spyod pa dge ba dang / bzod pa yang dag par sgrub pa dge ba grangs med cing dpag tu med pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'jig
271a1(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can thams cad la zag pa med pa'i bzod pa skyed par 'dod pa dang / mi slob pa'i bzod pa skyed par 'dod pa dang / zag pa med pa'i bzod pa/
271a2(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par skyed par 'dod pa dang / mi slob pa'i bzod pa yang dag par skyed par 'dod pa de ni bsod pa kun tu spong ba dge ba dang / bzod pa yang dag par sgrub pa de dge ba thams cad kyi mchog
271a3(dkon brtsegs): yin no// do ni dam pa yin no// lag bzangs de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bde ba dang ldan la/ yid bde ba dang ldan zhing / tshegs chung ngu dang / sdug bsngal chung ngu myur du skyen par bzod
271a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// lag bzangs byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed ce na/ lag bzang
271a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/ phyogs bcu'i phyogs re rer yang 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med de/ 'jig rten gyi khams re re na'ang sems can
271a6(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yas so// de ltar sems can gyi tshogs mtha' yas mu med pa la mtha' yod pa ma yin/ mu yod pa ma yin te/ bdag ni sems can gyi chog mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa de
271a7(dkon brtsegs): la phan pa'i phyir go cha bgos la/ sems can gyi tshogs mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa la bde ba'i phyir go cha bgos na/ sems can thams cad la phan par dmigs pa mtha' yas
271b1(dkon brtsegs): shing mtha' yas pa dang // sems can thams cad la bde bar dmigs pa mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mtha' yas pa drag dgra med par gyur tam/ sems gzhan du
271b2(dkon brtsegs): gyur tam/ gnyid kyis log kyang nyin mtshan du sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cig la 'phel ba dang / rgyas pa dang / yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cig/
271b3(dkon brtsegs): la dge ba'i rtsa ba mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa dag skyed pa dang / byang chub kyi tshogs kyi phung po mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa dag skye bas rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnyed dka' bar mi 'gyur na/ bdag
271b4(dkon brtsegs): gis 'dir sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cig la dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel ba mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rgyas par 'gyur ba mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa'ang yang dag
271b5(dkon brtsegs): par rjes su mthong / gzhi de las rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnyed mi dka' bar yang dag par rjes su mthong bzhin du rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob par 'gyur ba'i brtson 'grus srog gi phyir yang ci'i
271b6(dkon brtsegs): phyir nyams par bya snyam mo// lag bzangs gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/ gang zhig sems can gyi tshogs mtha' yas shing mtha' yas
271b7(dkon brtsegs): pa de'i rga ba'i sdug bsngal gcig pu bsal ba dang / gzhom par 'dod pa de'ang sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cig la dge ba'i rtsa ba mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa 'phel la/ dge ba
272a1(dkon brtsegs): rtsa ba mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa rgyas par 'gyur na/ gang zhig sems can gyi tshogs mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa de'i skye ba'i sdug bsngal drang / 'chi ba'i
272a2(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal bsal bar 'dod pa dang / sdug pa dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal dang / mi sdug pa dang 'phrang ba'i sdug bsngal dang / 'dod pa mi 'byor pa'i sdug bsngal dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi sdug
272a3(dkon brtsegs): bsngal dang / bshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal dang / sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal dang / grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal dang / tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal
272a4(dkon brtsegs): bsal bar 'dod pa lta smos kyang ci rigos snyam mo// lag bzangs gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/ gang zhig sems can gyi tshogs mtha'
272a5(dkon brtsegs): yas shing mtha' yas pa re'i sdug bsngal sems can kyi skad cig gcig pa'i sems kyi skad cig gcig tsam dang 'brel pa bsal bar 'dod pa de'ang / sems kyi skad cig gcig la dge ba'i rtsa ba
272a6(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa 'phel la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa rgyas par 'gyur na/ gang zhig ma 'ongs shing ma phyin pa'i bskal pa mtha' yas dpag tu med pa rnams
272a7(dkon brtsegs): su sems can gyi tshogs mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa de'i skye ba'i sdug bsngal nas/ sring ba'i sdug bsngal gyi bar du bsal bar 'dod pa lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam mo// lag/
272b1(dkon brtsegs): bangs gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltalta yang dag par slob ste/ gang zhig rang sangs rgyas kyi yon tan nas nyanam thos kyi yon ngan 'dod pa ba sems kyi sang cig sems kyi skad rig sa rje
272b2(dkon brtsegs): nga'i rtsa ba mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa 'phel la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa rgyas par 'gyur na/ rigs kyi su 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi yo nga ma sa
272b3(dkon brtsegs): yas shing / yon tan mu med pa/ stobs mtha' yas shing / stobs mu med pa mtha' dag chub pa yongs su rdzogs par 'dod pa dang / mos pa dang / sbom pas lta spos kyang ci dgos te/ bgu med
272b4(dkon brtsegs): par gyur tam/ gnyid kyis log kyang rgyu bzhi dang / rkyen bzhi dang / dmigs pa bzhi po de dag ni/ de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i phung po mtha' yas shing mu med pa bzhi dang / byang chub kyi tshogs kyi phung po mtha'
272b5(dkon brtsegs): yas shing mu med pa bzhi sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cig la 'phel zhing rgyas par 'gyur ba ste/ sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cig la dge ba'i rtsa ba'i phung po mtha' yas shing mtha' yas
272b6(dkon brtsegs): pa bzhi skye ba dang / rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi tshogs kyi phung po mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa bzhi skye ba dag gis rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnyed par mi dka' na/ bdag gis 'drir sems kyi skad cig
272b7(dkon brtsegs): sems kyi skang cig la dge ba'i rtsa ba'i phung po mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa bzhi dang / rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi tshogs kyi phung po mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa bzhi yang dag par rjes su
273a1(dkon brtsegs): mthong sa/ rgyu'i delas rdzobs pa su skyed par sno 'bar dag pa skyes su 'asod da rdzogs pa nga na stso par yon nas na
273a2(dkon brtsegs): bya ya bya'i phyim rnams par thasmras so// rdul sa rgyas po nam gar tshigs mtha yang ra bye la/ spyo nga / na dang / byang byung / da/ ra shAng
273a3(dkon brtsegs): 'ang mngos pa/ des pa'i rtsa ba'i chu sa rgya chen po byang rgyar kyi tshogs kyi rgya mchomathar yas sgra med pa ba ba de dag ni mtha' 'am su medang / bdagagis sems kyi srung cig sems kyi rkang gi las
273a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rtsa ba'i rgyamatsho chen po byang chub kyi tshogs kyi rgya mchi chen po bzhi dga'aphel zhing rgyas ma rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thor par 'gyur ba la/ srog pa phyir yang ba'i dring gror 'grus thadas par blanam
273a5(dkon brtsegs): mo/ rnalag pa ngas gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/ gang dag seng ge dang / stag dang / khyi dang / be spyang dang / gya rgod dang / khrung khrung ba
273a6(dkon brtsegs): bya rog dang / thug pa dang / srin tha dang / sbrang ma dang / sbrang bu dang / sha s+dza du gyur pa de dag gis kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur na/ bdag mir 'gyur bzhin du srog
273a7(dkon brtsegs): gi phyir yang ci'i phyir rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob par 'gyur ba'i brtson 'grus nyams par bya snyam mo// lag bzangs gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar yang dag par
273b1(dkon brtsegs): slob ste/ mi brgya 'am/ mi stong gis kyang sangs rgyas nyid rtogs shing thob na/ bdag gis kyang 'dir ci'i phyir mi rtogs shing thob par mi 'gyur/ gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs
273b2(dkon brtsegs): pa ram bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang rdzogs shing brnyes/ gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
273b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis kyang rtogs shing brnyes par 'gyur na/ bdag gis 'dir srog gi phyir yang ci'i phyir rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob par 'gyur ba'i brtson 'grus nyams par bya snyam mo//
273b4(dkon brtsegs): lag bzangs gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin te/ sangs rgyas ston pa'o zhes ston na/ sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa 'am/ nyan thos kyis bshad pa 'am/ byang chub
273b5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' bshad pa 'am/ tha na smyon pa rnams kyis bshad pa'i chos gang yin pa dag dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol
273b6(dkon brtsegs): tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos
273b7(dkon brtsegs): thob par 'gyur ba dang / rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba'i chos gang yin pa de dag mgo dang gos la me 'bar ba bzhin du rtag
274a1(dkon brtsegs): par rgyun du nyan to// nges par byed do// rtog go/ mkhas pa le le med pa ni ru shing bzhin du byed cing yid la byed pas/ mdung thung dgu gis bzlog kyang / de mgo dang /
274a2(dkon brtsegs): gos la me 'bar ba bzhin du rtag par rgyun du chos de dag 'dzin to// yongs su shes par byed do// 'chang ngo // klog go/ rjes su sems so// gzhan dag la ston to// go bar byed do// mkhas
274a3(dkon brtsegs): pa le le med pa ni ru shing bzhin du byed cing / yid la byed pas mdung thung dag gis bzlog kyang / de bcol yang rung / ma bcol yang rung // sems can thams cad kyi don dang / ci bya ba chos
274a4(dkon brtsegs): can chos dang ldan pa 'jig rten 'di la bde ba 'am/ 'jig rten pha rol tu bde ba dag la/ rang gi lus nye bar spyod pa dang yo byad du gyur par byed do// 'di lta ste/ dper na 'byung ba chen po
274a5(dkon brtsegs): bsgribs pa med pa/ yongs su bzung ba med pa bzhi po 'di dag ni sems can thams cad kyi nye bar spyod pa dang yo byad du gyur pa rnams yin no// lag bzangs de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa
274a6(dkon brtsegs): yang rang gi lus sems can thams cad kyi nye bar spyad pa dang yo byad du gyur par byed de/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / slob dpon dang /
274a7(dkon brtsegs): bla ma dang / rgan pa dang / nad pa dang / mgon med pa rnams la yongs su spyad pa bya ba dang / sri zhu bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya nges bye brag tu 'gyur ro// de mgo dang gos la me 'bar ba
274b1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du gzhan gyi sems dang / gzhan gyi snying dga' bar 'gyur ba'i tshi ga dang / rjes su mthun pa dang / mthun par byed pa dang / yang dgu par 'ged pa dang / grogs byed pa dang / zugs
274b2(dkon brtsegs): su 'gyur ba dang / dge ba mthun pa dang / don mthun pas rjes su zhugs nas mngon du dad par byas shing bsdus te/ nyan thos kyi theg pa la 'os pa rnams ni nyan thos kyi theg pa la 'dzud do//
274b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dul lo// 'god do// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la 'os pa rnams ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la'o// rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi theg pa la 'os pa rnams ni rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi theg pa la 'ju
274b4(dkon brtsegs): do/ 'dul lo// 'god do// mkhas pa le lo med pa ni mdung zung dag gis bzlog kyang / mgo dang gos la me 'bar ba bzhin du dam pa'i chos kyi rgyu dang / dam pa'i chos kyi chad dang / pha rol
274b5(dkon brtsegs): tu phyin pa drug gi rgyu dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi ched dang / dge ba'i rgyu dang / dge ba'i ched la grang ba'ang khyad du gsod/ tsha ba dang / bkres pa dang / skom pa dang / sha spang dang / sbrang bu dang /
274b6(dkon brtsegs): rlung dang / nyi ma dang / sdig sbrul gyis reg pa dang / gzhan gyis ngan du brjod pa dang / ngan pa 'ongs pa'i tshig gi lam dang / ngal ba dang / nyon mongs pa dang / gnyid dang / mi dga' ba dang /
274b7(dkon brtsegs): lus dang / srog kyang khyad du gsod do// mkhas pa le lo med pa ni mdung thung dag gis bzlog kyang / de rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu dang / rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi ched la/ lha'i sdug bsngal yang
