275a1(dkon brtsegs): khyad du gsod ngo // lha ma yin gyi sdug bsngal yang khyad du gsod do// mi'i sdug bsngal yang khyad du gsod do// yi dgas kyi sdug bsngal yang khang du gsod do//
275a2(dkon brtsegs): dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi sdug bsngal dang / sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal yang khyad du gsod do// mkhas pa le lo med pa ni mdung thung dag gis bzlog kyang / ngo mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sas
275a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi chos yongs su bskang ba thob par bya ba dang / spyod lam dang pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa thob par bya ba'i phyir/ brtson 'grus brtan zhing brtul ba brtan no// de brtson
275a4(dkon brtsegs): 'grus 'di dang brtul ba 'di mngon sum du bya bar 'dod pa dang / brtsam par 'dod pa na'ang / sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang / sems can thams cad sgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad
275a5(dkon brtsegs): dbugs dbyung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo bar byed do// mngon sum du byed pa dang / rtsom pa
275a6(dkon brtsegs): dang mngon sum du byas pa dang / brtsams nas kyang sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang / sems can thams cad sgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang / thams cad
275a7(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo bar byed do// gal te brtson 'grus 'di ma nyams pa dang / skyon med pa dang / 'dren ma
275b1(dkon brtsegs): ma yin par slob pa'i nus pa dang mi ldan par gyur na de 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/ dus dus su 'am/ cung zad cu zad du'ang snyom las dang le lo spang ba dang / dor ba dang / bsal bar rtsol lo//
275b2(dkon brtsegs): babang ngo // dus dus su 'am/ cung zad cung zad du'ang brtson 'grus dang brtul ba la slob pa dang / mngon par 'phel bar byed pa dang / yongs su rdzogs par bya bar rtsol lo// 'bang // srid pa
275b3(dkon brtsegs): gzhan du gyur pa na'ang zhum par mi 'gyur zhing / sgying lug par mi 'gyur ro// lag bzangs gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / byung
275b4(dkon brtsegs): chub kyi sems rjes su dran pa dang / byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa dang / byang chub tu smon pa dang / byang chub tu smon lam 'debs pa gang yin pa de nyid de dag gi brtson 'grus dge pa dang / rtsol
275b5(dkon brtsegs): ba dge ba grangs med cing dpag tu med pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can thams cad la zag pa med pa'i brtson 'grus skyed par 'dod
275b6(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / zag pa med pa'i brtson 'grus yang dag par skyed par 'dod pa dang / mi slob pa'i brtson 'grus skyed par 'dod pa dang / mi slob pa'i brtson 'grus yang dag par skyed par 'dod pa de
275b7(dkon brtsegs): ni brtson 'grus dge ba dang / rtsol ba dge pa thams cad kyi mchog yin no// de ni dam pa yin no// lag bzangs de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bde ba dang ldan la/ yid bde ba dang ldan zhi/
276a1(dkon brtsegs): tshegs chung ngu dang / sdug bsngal chung ngus myur du skyen par brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// / bam po
276a2(dkon brtsegs): gnyis pa ste tha ma'o// / lag parangs byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed ce na ga lag bzangs 'di la byang chub sems dpa' mig
276a3(dkon brtsegs): gis gzugs rnams mthong na mtshan mar mi 'dzin cing mngon rtags su mi 'dzin pa yin te/ gang gi phyir mig gi dbang po sdom pas ma bsdams par gnas pas/ 'jig rten na brnab sems dang /
276a4(dkon brtsegs): yid mi bde ba dang / sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams la sems rjes su zag pa de dag bsdams pa'i phyir nan tan byed cing srung ste/ mig gi dbang pos mig gi dbang po sdom par byed do// de
276a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du rna bas sgra rnams thos pa dang / snas dri rnams tshor ba dang / lces ro rnams myong ba dang / lus kyis reg bya rnams la reg pa dang / yid kyi chos rnams rnam par shes nas/ mtshan mar
276a6(dkon brtsegs): mi 'dzin cing / mngon rtags su mi 'dzin pa yin te/ gang gi phyir yid kyi dbang po sdom pas ma bsdams par gnas pas/ 'jig rten na brnab sems dang / yid mi bde ba dang / sdig pa mi
276a7(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i chos rnams la sems rjes su zag pa de dag bsdam pa'i phyir nam tan byed cong srung ste/ yid kyi dbang pos yid kyi dbang po sdom par byed do// de 'gro 'am/ 'greng ngam/ 'dug gam/
276b1(dkon brtsegs): nyal lam/ cang mi smra bar myur kyang rung ste/ mnyam par gzhag pa'i gnas dang / zhi gnas kyi gnas mi 'dor ro// rnam par mi 'dor ro// de lag mi rgod pa dang / mu cor mi spang
276b2(dkon brtsegs): rang tshig mi mang ba dang / mig mi g.yeng ba dang / dbang po mi g.yeng ba dang / mi rgod pa dang / tom col med pa dang / lus 'khrul pa med pa dang / ngag 'khrul pa med pa dang / sems
276b3(dkon brtsegs): 'khrul pa med pa dang / dben yang rung mi dben yang rung / spyod la mi nyams pa yin no// bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / gnas dang / na ba'i gsos spang dang /
276b4(dkon brtsegs): yo byad ji lta bu'ang rung ba dag gis chog shes shing / gso slab dang / dgang sra ba dang / rim gro bya sla ba dang / cho ga dang spyod yul dge ba dang / 'du 'dzi las dben pa'i spyod yul yin/
276b5(dkon brtsegs): thob pa dang ma thob pa la mnyam zhing 'gyur ba med de/ mkhengs ma rung ba yin/ bde ba dang / sdug bsngal dang / bstod pa dang / smad pa dang / grags pa dang / ma grags pa dang / 'tsho
276b6(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / 'chi ba la mnyam zhing 'gyur ba med de/ ma khengs ma rung ba yin/ mdza' bo dang / ram dang / dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / yid du 'ong ba dang / 'thun pa dang / yid du mi 'ong ba
276b7(dkon brtsegs): dang mi mthun pa dang / 'phags pa dang / 'phags pa ma yin pa'i chos rnams dang / dben pa dang / lang long rnams la'ang mnyam zhing 'gyur ba med de/ ma khengs mdud pa yin
277a1(dkon brtsegs): gzugs sdug pa dang mi sdug pa rnams la'ang mthun pa dang mi mthun pa med pa yin/ sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos sdug pa dang mi sdug pa rnams
277a2(dkon brtsegs): la'ang mthun pa dang mi mthun pa med pa yin no// de 'dod pa rnams ni rang gi sems kyis kun tu bsrungs nas/ log par rnam par rtog pas ro myang ba yin pas// keng rus lte bur yid la
277a3(dkon brtsegs): byed do// 'dod pa rnams ni dam mang ba'i phyir shA sA gu lta bur yid la byed do// 'dod pa rnams ni blangs na sdug bsngal la/ yongs su btang na bde ba'i phyir rtsa'i med lta bur yid byed do//
277a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa rnams ni gnod pa mang ba'i phyir shing gi rtse mo'i shing thog lta bur yid la byed do// 'dod pa rnams ni blangs ni dbang byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir slong ba pa lta bur yid la byed do// 'dod pa/
277a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams ni skad cig tsam zhig nor bas dga' ba'i phyir rmi lam lta bur yid la byed do// 'dod pa rnams ni sdug bsngal la bde bar 'du shes pa phyin ci log gis bskyed pa'i phyir/ mdze lta bur
277a6(dkon brtsegs): yid la byed do// 'dod pa rnams ni nyes par spyod pa thams cad kyi dngos po yin pa dang / ngan 'phe log par ltung ba dang / sems can dmyal ba'i mtha' yin pas mchil ba lta bu yid la byed do//
277a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa rnams ni ngoms par mi byed pa dang / sgom pa 'phel bar byed pa'i phyir tshwa chu ltar yid la byed do// de 'dod pa las dben pa/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/ rtog pa dang
277b1(dkon brtsegs): bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa dga' ba dang bde bcan/ bsam gtan dang po bsgrubs te gnas so// de rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang bral zhing mang yongs su dang ste/
277b2(dkon brtsegs): sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas// rtog pa med pa/ dpyod pa med pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba deng bde ba cam/ bsam gtan gnyis pa bsgrubs te gnas so// de dga' ba'i
277b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags dang bral bas/ btung snyoms la gnas shing dran pa dang shes bzhin can yin te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la/ 'phags pa rnams kyis gang de dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la gnas pa/
277b4(dkon brtsegs): btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ bsam gtan gsum pa bsgrubs te gnas so// de bde ba'ang spangs te sngo nas sdug bsngal yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang mi bde ba'ang rub pas/ bde ba'ang
277b5(dkon brtsegs): ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin pa/ btang snyoms dang dran pa yongs su dag pa bsam gtan bzhi pa bsgrubs te gnas so// de sems can thams cad la bde ba'i 'du shes yid la byed pas
277b6(dkon brtsegs): byams pa tshad med pa bsgrubs te gnas so// de sems can thams cad la sdug bsngal ba'i 'du shes yid la byed pas snying rje tshad med pa bsgrubs te gnas so// de sems can thams cad la
277b7(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba'i 'du shes yid la byed pas dga' ba tshad med pa bsgrubs te gnas so// de sems can rnams la sdug bsngal ba'ang med/ bde ba'ang med pa yid la byed pas btang snyoms tshad med
278a1(dkon brtsegs): pa bsgrubs te gnas so// de gzugs la rags pa'i 'du shes yid la byed cing / nam mkha' la zhi ba'i 'du shes yid la byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched
278a2(dkon brtsegs): bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam par shes pa la zhi ba'i 'du shes yid la byed pas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas so// de ci'ang med pa la zhi ba'i 'du shes yid la byed pas
278a3(dkon brtsegs): ci'ang med pa'i skye mched bsgrubs te gnas so// de 'du shes med 'du shes med min la zhi ba'i 'du shes yid la byed pas 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched rdzogs par bsgrubs
278a4(dkon brtsegs): te gnas so// dri rang gi dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung ba ji ltar gnas shing ji ltar 'du ba bzhin du rgyun thung ba rnams la'ang rgyun thung ba'i 'du shes dang / rgyun ring ba rnams la'ang rgyun ring ba'i
278a5(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes yid la byed pas dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung ba rlan pa bsgrubs te gnas so// de sems can gyi lus rnams la mi sdug pa'i mtshan ma yid la byed pas mi sdug pa'i 'du shes bsgrubs te/
278a6(dkon brtsegs): gnas so// de 'chi ba'i mtshan ma yod la byed pas 'chi ba'i 'du shes bsgrubs te gnas so// de na ba dang rga ba'i mtshan ma yid la byed pas nyes dmigs kyi 'du shes bsgrubs te gnas so// de la
278a7(dkon brtsegs): zas yongs su tshol ba dang / 'gyur ba la nad kyi rgyu dang / gnod pa'i rgyu yid la byed pas kha zas la mi mthun pa'i 'du shes bsgrubs te gnas so// de khyim dang / grong dang / mong khyer dang / ljongs kyi 'jog
278b1(dkon brtsegs): rten thams cad la 'byor pa dang 'bral ba'i mtshan mar yid la byed pa dang / nags tshal rmad du byung ba dang / kun dga'i ra ba rmad du byung ba dang bral ba'i mtshan ma yid la byed pas 'jig rten thams
278b2(dkon brtsegs): cad la mngon par mi dga' ba'i 'du shes bsgrubs te gnas so// de nang gzugs su 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs chung ngu kha dog bzang po dang / kha dog ngan pa rnams la mtshan mar yid
278b3(dkon brtsegs): la byed pas zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched dang po bsgrubs te gnas so// de nang gzugs su 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs tshad med pa kha dog bzang po dang / kha dog ngan pa rnams la
278b4(dkon brtsegs): mtshan mar yid la byed pas zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched gnyis pa bsgrubs te gnas so// de shi ba'i lus bsregs pa de la rlung ngam/ chus thal ba'ang med par byed pa'i 'du shes dang /
278b5(dkon brtsegs): zhigs pa la phye ma'ang med pa dang / rdul du gyur pa la rdul yang med pa'i 'du shes su rnam par 'jig pa bsgoms shing bsgrubs te/ nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs
278b6(dkon brtsegs): chung ngu kha dog bzang po dang / kha dog ngan pa rnams la mtshan mar yid la byed pas zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched gsum pa bsgrubs te gnas so// de de bzhin du nang gzugs med par 'du shes
278b7(dkon brtsegs): pas phyi rol gyi gzugs tshad med pa kha dog bzang po dang / kha dog ngan pa rnams la mtshan mar yid la byed pas zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched bzhi pa bsgrubs te gnas so// de de bzhin du nang
279a1(dkon brtsegs): gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs sngon po tshad med pa yid du 'ong ba rnams la mtshan mar yid la byed pas zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched lnga pa
279a2(dkon brtsegs): bsgrubs te gnas so// de de bzhin du nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po tshad med pa yid du 'ong ba rnams la mtshan mar yid la
279a3(dkon brtsegs): byed pas zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched drug pa dang / bdun pa dang / brgyad pa la bsgrubs te gnas so// des sa 'di mtha' yas so zhes mtshan mar yid la byed pas zad par sar bsgrubs
279a4(dkon brtsegs): te gnas so// de chu dang / me dang / rlung dang / sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / nam mkha' dang / rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes mtshan mar yid la byed pas/
279a5(dkon brtsegs): zad par chu dang / zad par me dang / zad par rlung dang / bad par sngon po dang / zad par ser po dang / zad par dmar po dang / zad par dkar po dang / zad par nam mkha' dang / zad par rnam
279a6(dkon brtsegs): par shes pa bsgrubs te gnas so// de snyems par 'jug pa na dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la dmigs pa la sems nye bar 'dogs te/ snying rje chen po la dmigs pa dang / dam pa'i chos yod
279a7(dkon brtsegs): su gzung ba la dmigs pa dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs mi 'chad par bya ba la dmigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku dang rgyan la dmigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi gsung tshangs pa'i dbyangs la dmig/
279b1(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / sngon gyi smon lam la dmigs pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba la dmigs pa dang / 'jig rten rnam par sbyang bar bya ba la dmigs pa dang / byang chub kyi snying
279b2(dkon brtsegs): po'i bkod pa la dmigs pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la dmigs pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa gzhom pa la dmigs pa la sems nye bar 'dogs so// de bsam gtan
279b3(dkon brtsegs): byed pa na rnam par shes pa'i gnas bzhi dang bral bar bsam gtan byed do// de sa'i khams la mi gnas/ chu'i khams la mi gnas/ me'i khams la mi gnas/ rlung gi khams la mi gnas/
279b4(dkon brtsegs): nam mkha'i khams la ma gnas/ rnam par shes pa'i khams la mi gnas/ 'jig rten 'di la mi gnas/ 'jig rten pha rol la mi gnas par bsam gtan byed do// de ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms
279b5(dkon brtsegs): par 'jug pa bla na med pa thams cad thob par bya ba'i phyir/ bsam gtan la gnas shing / bsam gtan la dga' 'o// de bsam gtan de dang / ting nge 'dzin de la bsam gtan byed par 'dod pa dang /
279b6(dkon brtsegs): snyoms par 'jug par 'dod na'ang sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang / sems can thams cad sgrol ba dang // sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par
279b7(dkon brtsegs): bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo bar byed do// bsam gtan byed pa dang / bsam gtan byas pa dang / langs nas kyang sems can
280a1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad bskal ba dang / sems can thams cad sgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang // sangs
280a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo bar byed do// gal te bsam gtan de dang ting nge 'dzin de la slob ba'i nus pa dang mi ldan par gyur na/ de 'di ltar yang dag
280a3(dkon brtsegs): par slob ste/ dus dus su 'am/ cung zad cung zad du'ang sems rnam par g.yeng ba dang / ting nge 'dzin ma yin pa dang / dor ba dang / bsal bar rtsol lo// 'bad do// dus dus su 'am
280a4(dkon brtsegs): cung zad cung zad du'ang sems rtse gcig tu bya ba dang / sems mnyam par gzhag par slob pa dang / mngon par 'phel bar bya ba dang / yongs su rdzogs par bya bar rtsol lo// 'bad do/
280a5(dkon brtsegs): srid pa gzhan du gyur pa na'ang zhum par mi 'gyur zhing / sgyid lug par mi 'gyur ro// lag bzangs byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang // byang chub kyi sems rjes
280a6(dkon brtsegs): su dran pa dang / byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa dang / byang chub tu smon pa dang / byang chub tu sngon lam 'debs pa gang yin pa de nyid de dag gi sems mnyam par gzhag pa dge ba dang / sems
280a7(dkon brtsegs): rtse gcig tu bya ba dge ba grangs med cing dpag tu med pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la zag pa med pa'i sems mnyam par gzhag pa skyed par
280b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa dang / mi slob pa'i sems mnyam par gzhag pa skyed par 'dod pa dang / zag pa med pa'i sems mnyam par gzhag pa yang dag par skyed par 'dod pa dang / mi slob pa'i sems
280b2(dkon brtsegs): mnyam par gzhag pa yang dag par skyed par 'dod pa de ni/ sems mnyam par gzhag pa dge ba dang / sems rtse gcig tu bya ba dge ba mtha' yas mu med pa yin no// lag 'azangs de ltar
280b3(dkon brtsegs): na byang chub sems dpa' bde ba dang ldan la/ yid bde ba dang ldan zhing / tshegs chung ngu dang / sdug bsngal chung ngus bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do//
280b4(dkon brtsegs): lag bzangs byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed ce na/ lag bzangs 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni mdung thung dag gis bzlob
280b5(dkon brtsegs): kyang gang zag gang dag thos pa mang ba/ thos pa 'dzin pa/ thos pa bsags pa/ don shes pa/ bshad pa shes pa/ dpyod pa can/ ji ltar thos pa'i don la yongs su rtog pa de dag
280b6(dkon brtsegs): la snyen cing sten te/ bsnyen bkur byed do// de thos pa'i ched dang / bshad pa'i ched dang / don gyi ched dang / don la yongs su brtag pa'i ched dang / slob dpon dang mkhan po la bsnyen bkur bya
280b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i ched la grang ba'ang khyad du gsod/ tsha ba dang / bkres pa dang / skom pa dang / sha sbrang dang / sbrang bu dang / rlung dang / nyi ma dang / sdig sbrul gyis reg pa dang / gzhan gyis ngan du sorjod pa/
281a1(dkon brtsegs): #/ ngan du smras shing ngan du brjod pa'i tshig gi lam dang / lus kyi tshor ba drag pa/ rtsub pa/ mi bzad pa/ srog 'chad par 'gyur ba'ang khyad du gsod/ de chos rnams la rin
281a2(dkon brtsegs): po cher 'du shes nye bar gnas/ chos smra ba rnams la ni rin po che'i gter du 'du shes/ chos nyan pa rnams la ni dkon pa rnyed par 'du shes/ chos 'dzin pa la ni don yod par srog phyogs par du shes
281a3(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi yon tan mang du byed pa la ni srog don yod par 'du shes/ chos la yongs su rtog pa la na tshe rabs brgyar mig rnyed par 'du shes nye bar gnas pa yin te/ de chos de dag nyan cing 'dzin
281a4(dkon brtsegs): la mang du byed cing yongs su rtog pa na/ khams rnams kyang rab tu shes/ phung po rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /
281a5(dkon brtsegs): dus dang theg pa rnams dang / dge ba bsags pa'ang rab tu shes so// khams rnams ji ltar rab tu shes she na/ khams ni gnyis te/ 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas shes bya ba ste/ khams gnyis
281a6(dkon brtsegs): po de dag go// 'dus byas kyi khams ni gang / 'dus ma byas kyi khams ni gang zhe na/ gang ci'ang rung ste/ skye ba dang / gnas pa dang / 'gag pa 'di ni 'dus byas kyi khams shes bya'o// gang ci 'ang/
281a7(dkon brtsegs): rung ste/ skye ba med pa dang / gnas pa med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa de ni 'dus ma byas kyi khams shes bya ste/ de ltar 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi khams rab tu shes so//
281b1(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang khams gsum rab tu shes te/ dge ba'i khams dang / mi dge ba'i khams dang / lung du ma bstan pa'i khams te/ gsum po de dag go// dge ba'i khams ni gang / mi dge pa'i khams ni dang
281b2(dkon brtsegs): lung du ma bstan pa'i khams ni gang zhe na/ ga ci'ang rung ste/ chags pa med pa dang / chags pa med pa dang ldan pa dang / gang ci'ang rung ste/ zhe sdang med pa dang / zhe sdang med pa dang ldan pa dang /
281b3(dkon brtsegs): gang ci'ang rung ste/ gti mug med pa dang / gti mug med pa dang ldan pa de ni dge ba'i khams shes bya'o// gAng ci'ang rung ste/ chags pa dang / chags pa dang ldan pa dang / gang ci'ang rung ste/ zhe sdang
281b4(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / zhe sdang ba dang ldan pa dang / gang ci'ang rung ste/ gti mug dang / gti mug dang ldan pa de ni mi dge ba'i khams shes bya'o// de gnyis lam gtogs pa ni lung du ma bstan pa nyid de/ de ltar
281b5(dkon brtsegs): khams gsum rab tu shes so// gzhan yang khams gsum rab tu shes te/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams
281b6(dkon brtsegs): so// 'dod pa'i khams gang zhe na/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / yi dgas dang / lha ma yin dang / mi dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang /
281b7(dkon brtsegs): 'thang bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams te/ gang de dag la 'dun pa dang / chags pa dang / zhe sdang ba dang / gti mug pa dang / yid kyis smon pa dang / smon lam
282a1(dkon brtsegs): 'debs pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa de ni 'dod pa'i khams shes bya'o// gzugs kyi khams gang zhe na/ tshangs rim gyi lha rnams dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don rnams dang /
282a2(dkon brtsegs): tshangs chen dang / 'od chung dang / tshad med 'od dang / 'od gsal dang / dge chung dang / tshad med dge dang / dge rgyas dang / sprin med dang / bsod rnams skyes dang / 'bras bu che dang / 'du shes med pa'i/
282a3(dkon brtsegs): sems can dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / gya nom snang dang / shin tu mthong dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams te/ gang de dag la 'dun pa dang / chags pa dang / zhe sdang ba dang / gti mug pa dang / yid
282a4(dkon brtsegs): kyis smon pa dang / smon lam 'debs pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa de ni gzugs kyi khams shes bya'o// gzugs med pa'i khams gang zhe na/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i
282a5(dkon brtsegs): lha rnams dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched du nye bar 'tsho ba'i lha rnams dang / ci'ang med pa'i skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i lha rnams dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched du nye bar 'gro
282a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i lha rnams te/ gang de dag la 'dun pa dang / chags pa dang / zhe sdang ba dang / gti mug pa dang / yid kyis smon pa dang / smon lam bdebs pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa gang yin pa de ni/ gzugs
282a7(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i khams shes bya ste/ de ltar khams gsum rab tu shes so// gzhan yang khams bzhi rab tu shes te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang /
282b1(dkon brtsegs): gzugs med pa'i khams dang / 'dus ma byas kyi khams shes bya ba khams bzhi po de dag ni// de ltar khams bzhi rab tu shes so// gzhan yang khams drug rab tu shes te/ drug gang zhe na/ 'dod
282b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i khams dang / gnod sems kyi khams dang / rnam par 'tshe ba'i khams dang / mngon par 'byung ba'i khams dang / gning sems med pa'i khams dang / rnam par 'tshe med pa'i khams te/ khams
282b3(dkon brtsegs): drug po de dag rab tu shes so// gzhan yang khams drug rab tu shes te/ drug gang zhe na/ sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / ram ma la
282b4(dkon brtsegs): khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams te/ khams drug po de dag rab tu shes so// de la sa'i khams ni mi rtag pa/ mi brtan pa/ 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ mi rtag pa gang yin pa de sdug bsngal ba'o//
282b5(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal da gang yin pa de bdag med pa'o// de bzhin du chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang mi rtag pa/ mi brtan
282b6(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ mi rtag pa gang yin pa de sdug bsngal ba'o// sdug bsngal ba gang yin pa de bdag med pa ste/ de ltar khams drug rab tu shes so// de chos de dag
282b7(dkon brtsegs): nyam cing 'dzin pa dang / mang du byed cing yongs su rtog pa ni/ mazugs kyi phung po dang / tshor ba'i phung po dang / 'du shes kyi phung po dang / 'du byed kyi phung po dang / rnam par shes pa'i drang po ste/
283a1(dkon brtsegs): phung po lnga rab tu shes so// gzugs la lbu ba rdos pa lta bu dang / ngan pa dang / 'jig pa dang / ring du mi gnas pa dang / tshor ba la ni chu'i chu bur lta bu dang / ngan pa dang /
283a2(dkon brtsegs): 'jig pa dang / rung du mi gnas pa dang / 'du shes la ni smig rgyu lta bu dang / ngan pa dang / 'jig pa dang / ring du mi gnas pa dang / 'du byed rnams la ni chu shing lta bu dang / ngan pa dang / 'jig
283a3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / ring du mi gnas pa dang / rnam par shes la ni sgyu ma lta bu dang / ngan pa dang / 'jig pa dang / ring du mi gnas pa de ltar phung po lnga la rab tu shes so// de chos de dag nyan
283a4(dkon brtsegs): cing 'dzin pa dang / mang du byed cing yongs su rtog pa na/ nang gi skye mched drug rab tu shes te/ mig nang gi skye mched dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid nang gi skye mched ces bya ba
283a5(dkon brtsegs): nang gi skye mched drug po de dag go/ de la mig nang gi skye mched ni na ba'i chos can dang / rga ba'i chos can dang / 'chi ba'i chos can dang / bdag dang bdag gis stong pa dang / 'dod chags kyi me dang /
283a6(dkon brtsegs): zhe sdang gi me dang / gti mug gi me kun tu 'bar ba dang / skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug
283a7(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams kyis kun tu 'bar ba dang / sdug bsngal gyis kun tu 'bar bar rab tu shes so// de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid nang gi skye mched la'ang na ba'i chos can dang /
283b1(dkon brtsegs): na ba'i chos can dang / 'chi ba'i chos pan dang / bdag dang bdag gis stong pa dang / 'dod chags kyi me dang / zhe sdang gi me dang / gti mug gi me kun tu 'bar ba dang / skye ba dang / na pa dang / ra bdang /
283b2(dkon brtsegs): 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams kyis kun tu 'bar ba dang / sdug bsngal gyis kun tu 'bar bar rab tu shes te/
283b3(dkon brtsegs): de ltar nang gi skye mched drug po dag rab tu shes so// gzhan yang phyi'i skye mched drug rab tu shes te/ mig gis rnam par shes par bya ba gzugs rnams phyi'i skye mched dang /
283b4(dkon brtsegs): rnabs rnam par shes par bya ba sgra rnams dang / snas rnam par shes par bya ba dri rnams dang / lces rnam par shes par bya ba ro rnams dang / lus kyis rnam par shes par bya ba reg bya rnam dang /
283b5(dkon brtsegs): yid kyis rnam par shes par bya ba chos phyi'i skye mched rnams shes bya ba ste/ skye mched drug po de dag go// de la mig gis rnam par shes par bya ba gzugs kyi'i skye mched skyabs med pa dang /
283b6(dkon brtsegs): mgon med pa dang / stobs med pa dang / nyam chung ba ste/ de la rtug pa 'am/ brtan pa 'am/ ther zug pa 'am/ de bzhin nyid dam/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dam/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin
283b7(dkon brtsegs): nyid ni gang yang med kyi/ sgyu ma de ni yod/ sgyu mar byas pa de ni yod/ sems rmongs par byed pa de ni yod de gang ci'ang yod pa dang / de bzhin du rnabs rnam par shes par bya ba snga rnams
284a1(dkon brtsegs): dang / snas rnam par shes par bya ba dri rnams dang / lces rnam par shes par bya ba'o rnams dang / lus kyis rnam par shes par bya ba reg bya rnams dang / yid kyis rnam par shes
284a2(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba chos phyi'i skye mched la'ang skyabs med pa dang / mgon med pa dang / stobs med pa dang / nyam chung ba ste/ de la rtag pa 'am/ brtan pa 'am/ ther zug pa 'am/ de bzhin nyid dam/ mnor
284a3(dkon brtsegs): ba de bzhin nyid dam/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid ni gang yang med kyi/ sgyu ma de ni yod/ sgyu mar byas pa de ni yod/ sems rmongs par byed pa de ni yod de/ gang ci'ang yod pa'i phyir skye mched drug
284a4(dkon brtsegs): po de ltar rab tu shes so// de chos de dag nyan cing 'dzin pa dang / mang du byed cing yongs su rtog pa na/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rab tu shes so// bzhi gang zhe na/ sdug bsngal
284a5(dkon brtsegs): baphags pa'i bden pa dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po de dag
284a6(dkon brtsegs): go phung po lnga rnams dang / khams drug po dag dang / nang gi skye mched drug po dang / rtse'i skye mched drug po dag gang yin pa de ni sdug bsngal zhes bya ste/ sdug bsngal de ni mi rtag pa dang /
284a7(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal ba dang / nad dang / 'bras dang / zug rngu dang / sdig pa dang / bdag med pa dang / rab tu 'jig pa'i chos nyid du blta'o// 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nga rgyal dang /
284b1(dkon brtsegs): nga'o snyam du mngon par zhen pa dang / bdag gi bdag ni 'di yin no snyam du bdag tu mngon par zhen pa dang / 'byung bar 'gyur ro snyam pa dang / 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro snyam pa dang / gzugs can du 'gyur
284b2(dkon brtsegs): ro snyam pa dang / gzugs can ma yin par 'gyur ro snyam pa dang / 'du shes can du 'gyur ro snyam pa dang / 'du shes can ma yin par 'gyur ro snyam pa dang / 'du shes can ma yin la/ 'du shes can ma
284b3(dkon brtsegs): yin pa'ang 'du shes can ma yin par 'gyur ro snyam pa dang / phung po rnams bdag go snyam pa dang / phung po rnams las bdag gzhan no snyam pa dang / phung po rnams la bdag gi snyam pa dang / bdag
284b4(dkon brtsegs): la phung po rnams snyam pa dang / khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams bdag go snyam pa dang / skye mched rnams las bdag gzhan no snyam pa dang / skye mched rnams la bdag po snyam pa dang /
284b5(dkon brtsegs): bdag la skye mched rnams so snyam pa dang / tshor ba bdag go snyam pa dang / tshor bar byed pa bdag go snyam pa dang / gzugs can chung ngu bdag go snyam pa dang / gzugs can ma yin pa chung ngu bdag
284b6(dkon brtsegs): go snyam pa dang / gzugs can mtha' yas pa bdag go snyam pa dang / gzugs can ma yin pa mtha' yas pa bdag go snyam pa dang / bdag rtag go snyam pa dang / bdag mi rtag go snyam pa dang /
284b7(dkon brtsegs): rtag kyang rtag la/ mi rtag kyang mi rtag go snyam pa dang / rtag pa'ang ma yin mi rtag pa'ang ma yin no snyam pa dang / bdag mtha' yod do snyam pa dang / bdag mtha' yod pa ma yin no snyam pa dang /
285a1(dkon brtsegs): dushAbya/ mtha' yod kyang yod la mtha' med kyang med do snyam pa dang / mtha' yod pa'ang ma yin mtha' med pa'ang ma yin no snyam pa dang / de bzhin song ba shi nas 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
285a2(dkon brtsegs): snyam pa dang / 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro snyam pa dang / 'byung yang 'byung la mi 'byung yang mi 'byung ngo snyam pa dang / de bzhin song ba shi nas 'byung ba'ang ma yin/ mi 'byung ba'ang ma yin no snyam pa dang /
285a3(dkon brtsegs): srog de lus de yin snyam pa dang / srog kyang gzhan la lus kyang gzhan no snyam pa dang / sems can 'di gang nas 'ongs/ de 'di nas shi 'phos nas gang du 'gro bar 'gyur snyam pa dang / sems
285a4(dkon brtsegs): can yod pa las chad de/ 'jig cing med par 'gyur ro snyam pa dang / byed pa de myong ba de yin no snyam pa dang / byed pa'ang gzhan myong ba'ang gzhan no snyam pa dang / bdag yod pas bdag gi yod par 'gyur
285a5(dkon brtsegs): ro snyam pa dang / bdag gi yod pas bdag yod par 'gyur ro snyam pa dang / 'di na bdag de lta bu 'am/ bdag gzhan du 'gyur ba zhig gam/ de bzhin du 'gyur ba zhig gam/ gzhan du 'gyur bzhin gam/
285a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dir 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ de ltar 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gzhan du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ 'dir bdag sngon byung ngam/ bdag da ltar byung ngam/ bdag gzhan du byung ngam snyam du de dag la bdag tu mngon par
285a7(dkon brtsegs): zhen te 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang / nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal dang / sems kyi gnas dang / mngon par zhen pa dang / nga rgyal gyi bag la nyal ba dang / snyems pa dang / nga rgyal byed pa dang / bdag tu smra ba'i
285b1(dkon brtsegs): len pa dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nga rgyal gang yin pa thams cad dang / lus sum/ ngag gam/ sems kyi las bsod nams su nye bar 'gro ba 'am/ bsod nams ma
285b2(dkon brtsegs): yin par nye bar 'gro ba 'am/ mi g.yo bar nye bar 'gro ba 'am/ 'dod par gtogs pa 'am/ gzugs su gtogs pa 'am/ gzugs med par gtogs pa gang yin pa de ni sdug bsngal kun 'gru
285b3(dkon brtsegs): ba 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o// gang 'dod chags zad pa dang / zhe sdang zad pa dang / gti mug zad pa dang / nga rgyal zad pa dang / bdag tu mngon par zhen pa spangs pa dang / bdag tu spa
285b4(dkon brtsegs): len pa spangs pa de ni sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o// gang sdug bsngal la'ang sdug bsngal ba dang / kun 'byung ba la'ang kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa la'ang 'gog pa dang / lam
285b5(dkon brtsegs): la'ang lam du yid la byed pa dang / 'du byed rnams la nyes dmigs su lta zhing gnas pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la phan yon du lta zhing gnas pa dang / ji ltar mthong ba dang / byas pa la so sor rtog pa yang
285b6(dkon brtsegs): dag pa'i lta ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i ngag dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge
285b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin de ni sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ste/ 'di dag ni 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi zhes bya'o// de 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po de dag la dpyod cing rtog pa khong du/
286a1(dkon brtsegs): chud par byed cing rnam par 'jig pa na/ 'dus byas kyi khams la ni mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med par mthong ngo // 'dus ma byas kyi khams la ni/
286a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyabs dang / gnas dang / mgon dang / dpung gnyen du'ang mthong la/ 'dus ma byas kyi khams mngon sum du'ang mi byed do// de ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po dag rab tu shes so// de
286a3(dkon brtsegs): chos de dag nyan cing 'dzin pa dang / mang du byed cing yongs su rtog pa na/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rab tu shes te/ 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams dang / 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa dang /
286a4(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs dang / ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug dang / skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa dang / reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa dang / sred
286a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rkyen gyis len pa dang / len pa'i rkyen gyis sred pa dang / srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba dang / skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi ste/ 'di ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zhes bya'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa
286a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhi dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba mi shes pa dang / mi mthong ba gang yin pa de ni ma rig pa zhes bya'o// gang cung zad lus dang / dug dang / yid kyi las bsod rnams su nye bar 'gro ba 'am/ bsod nams ma
286a7(dkon brtsegs): yin par nye bar 'gro ba 'am/ mi g.yo bar nye bar 'gro ba 'am/ 'dod pa'i khams su nye bar 'gro ba 'am/ gzugs kyi khams su nye bar 'gro ba 'am/ gzugs med pa'i khams su nye bar 'gro ba de dag ni 'du byed rnam
286b1(dkon brtsegs): shes bya'o// de las byung bgang kyi'ang rung / sems shes bya ba dang / yid ces bya ba de ni rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// de las byung bags 'ang rung / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / sems pa dang / reg pa dang / ying
286b2(dkon brtsegs): la byed pa de ni ming zhes bya'o// gang ci'ang rung ba lhan cig byung ba mer mer po'i gzugs dang / rdzus te byung ba'i gzugs dang / rnam par rig byed kyi gzugs de ni gzugs shes bya ste// de gnyis ni ming dang
286b3(dkon brtsegs): gzugs shes bya'o// de las byung ba mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid de ni skye mched drug ces bya'o// mig la brten cing gzugs la'ang brten te/ mig gi rnam par shes pa 'byung ba dang /
286b4(dkon brtsegs): gsum 'dus pa ni reg pa'o// rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dang / chos rnams la brten te/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'byung ba dang / gsum 'dus pa ni reg pa ste/ de ni reg pa zhes bya'o// de
286b5(dkon brtsegs): las byung ba bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ sdug bsngal yang ma yin/ bde ba'ang ma yin pa de dag ni tshor ba gsum zhes bya'o// de las byung ba 'dod chags dang / chags pa dang / dga' ba de ni sred pa zhes bya'o//
286b6(dkon brtsegs): de las byung ba kun tu chags pa dang / lta ba dang / tshul khrims dang / brtul zhugs dang / bdag tu smra ba de ni len pa zhes bya'o// de las byung ba gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam
286b7(dkon brtsegs): par shes pa de ni srid pa zhes bya'o// gang srid pa de 'byung ba dang / skye ba dang mngon par 'grub pa de ni skye ba zhes bya'o// gang srid pa de 'gyur ba dang / 'jig pa dang / nye bar khrid pa de ni rga ba zhes bya'o// gang srid pa de
287a1(dkon brtsegs): / 'chi 'pho ba dang / 'bral ba de ni 'chi ba zhes bya'o// de de ltar rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la dpyod cing yongs su rtog la khong du chud bar byed cing / rnam par 'jig pa nas rlom sems
287a2(dkon brtsegs): su mi byed/ sas rlom sems su mi byed/ sa bdag gi snyam du rlom sems su mi byed do// sa la mngon par dga' bar mi byed do// chu dang / me dang / rlung dang / nam mkha' dang / rnam par shes pa la gcig pa dang /
287a3(dkon brtsegs): tha dad pa dang / mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / byed zag phyed pa dang / rnam par shes pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa rlom sems su mi byed/ mya ngan las 'das pas rlom sems su mi byed/ mya ngan las 'das pa
287a4(dkon brtsegs): ni bdag gi'o snyam du rlom sems su mi byed/ mya ngan las 'das pa la mngon par dga' bar mi byed do// de rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i chos rnams yang dag par rjes su mthong ba na/ rnam par zer pa'i sgo
287a5(dkon brtsegs): gasnang po chos rnams kyi stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa khong du chud par byed cing rnam par 'jig go// de rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i chos rnams yang dag par rjes su mthong ba na/ 'di lta ste/
287a6(dkon brtsegs): ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag/ 'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag/ rnam par shes pa 'gags pas ming dang gzugs 'gag/ ming dang gzugs 'gags pas skye mched drug 'gag/
287a7(dkon brtsegs): skye mched drug 'gags pas reg pa 'gag/ reg pa 'gags pas tshor ba 'gag/ tshor ba 'gags pas sred pa 'gag/ sred pa 'gags pas len pa 'gag/ len pa 'gags pas srid pa 'gag
287b1(dkon brtsegs): sring ba 'gags pas sreb 'gas/ skye ba 'gags pas na shi 'gag// zhwa shi 'gags pas rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba 'gab pa khong du chud par byed cing rnam par 'jig ste/ dede ltar chen cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i
287b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gog pa yang dag par rjes su mthong yang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i 'gog pa mngon sum du'ang mi byed de/ de ltar rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i 'gog pa rab tu shes so// de chos de
287b3(dkon brtsegs): ngag nyan cing 'dzin pa dang / mang du byed cing yongs su rtog pa na/ dus gsum rab tu shes te/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'das pa'i dus dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus te/ de dag ni dus gsum
287b4(dkon brtsegs): rnams shes bya'o// 'du byed gang la la 'gags pa de ni 'das pa'i dus shes bya'o// 'du byed gang la la ma 'ongs shing ma skyes pa de ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus shes bya'o// 'du byed gang la la da ltar byung ba da ltar du gyur
287b5(dkon brtsegs): ba de ni da ltar byung ba'i dus shes bya'o// de 'das pa'i dus kyi bdag gi mi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams rjes su dran na/ spyod cing gshung ste nges par spong ngo // ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi bdag gi mi dge ba'i rtsa ba rdul tsam
287b6(dkon brtsegs): la'ang gcig tu rnam par smin par mthong // mi sdug par rnam par mthong // yid du mi 'ong bar rnam par smin par mthong / 'jigs par mthong zhing gnas so// da ltar byung ba'i dus kyi bdag gi mi dge ba'i rtsa ba
287b7(dkon brtsegs): skye ba'i skabs mi 'byed de/ lus sdom pas bsdams/ ngag sdom pas bsdams/ yid sdom pas bsdams/ dbang po drug sdoms pas bsdams so// de 'das pa'i dus kyi bdag gi dge ba'i
288a1(dkon brtsegs): ya dag/ za sa su skyed padang / \u0f7f lams rtson pa dang / tshamam pa la smos pa sa brnams rgyu ba rdu ga po dang / ga gag/
288a2(dkon brtsegs): rang dad pa drag pos sems can thams cad bsngal ba dang / sems can thams cad sgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid theb par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams
288a3(dkon brtsegs): cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo bar byed do// ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / byang chub tu smon pa dang / byang chub tu smon lam 'debs
288a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'ang 'dun pa drag po dang / dga' ba drag po dang / dad pa drag pos sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang / sems can thams cad sgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa
288a5(dkon brtsegs): nyid thob par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir 'dod // mos so// yid kyis smon to// da ltar byung ba'i bdag gi dge ba'i sems kyi rgyun dang / dge ba'i sems
288a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi rgyud kyang sems can thams cad bskal pa dang / sems can thams cad sgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams
288a7(dkon brtsegs): cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ rtag par rgyun du mi 'dor ro// nyams par mi byed do// brjed par mi byed do// bag med par mi byed do// gang 'das pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched de ni 'das pa/
288b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gags pa med pa/ yod pa ma yin pa ste/ de ni da ltar bdag med pa bdag gi med pa'o// gang ma 'ongs pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched de ni ma skyes pa ma byung ba/ yod pa ma yin pa ste/
288b2(dkon brtsegs): ni da ltar bdag med pa/ bdag gri med pa'o// gang da ltar byung ba'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched de ni mi gnas pa mi 'dug pa'o// de ci'i phri zhe na/ 'jig rten ni skad cog las lhag par mi gnas pa'i
288b3(dkon brtsegs): phyir ro// skad cig la de'i skye ba'i dus kyang gzhan/ gnas pa'i dus kyang bzhan/ 'gag pa'i dus kyang gzhan gang yin pa'i srang cig de ni gnas med pa/ 'dug pa med pa'o// skad cig gi dus gang yin pa
288b4(dkon brtsegs): de ni nang dang phyi'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched do// nang dang phyi'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched gang yin pa de ni dus so// da ltar byung ba'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched gang yin pa de ni skad
288b5(dkon brtsegs): cig tsam yang mi gnas pa mi 'dug pa ste/ mi gnas pa mi 'dug pa la ni bdag gam bdag gi ba med pa'o// de'ang gang gi tshe ma 'ongs par gyur pa de'i tshe ma skyes pa/ ma byung ba / yod pa ma yin no//
288b6(dkon brtsegs): bdag tu ma gyur cing bdag gir ma gyur pa'o// gang gi tshe 'das te 'gags pa dang ma byung ste yod pa ma yin par gyur pa de'i tshe'ang bdag med pa dang / bdag gi med pa nyid du 'gyur ro// gang yang dus
288b7(dkon brtsegs): gsum rag tu bdag med cing bdag gi med pa de ni ma byung zhing yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir mkhas shing rig pa rnams kyis 'di ni bdag gi'o// 'di ni nga'o// bdag gi 'di ni yod do zhes bdag tu lta ba
289a1(dkon brtsegs): zos pa ma yin no// de srid pa thams cad dang / 'du byed thams cad la bdag med pa'i 'du shes dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i 'du shes dang / spang ba'i 'du shes dang / 'gog pa
289a2(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes can du gnas te/ 'gog pa mngon sum du byed pa'ang ma yin no// pang de ltar dus gsum rab tu shes pa de ni chos de dag nyan cing 'dzin pa dang / mang du byed cing yongs su rtog pa na// rdeg pabasu
289a3(dkon brtsegs): rab tu shes te/ gsum gang zhe na/ lha'i theg pa dang / tshangs pa'i theg pa dang / 'phags pa'i theg pa ste/ de dag ni theg pa gsum zhes bya'o// bsam gtan dang po ni lha'i theg pa ste khas mu gtan gnyis pa dang /
289a4(dkon brtsegs): gsum pa dang / bzhi pa'ang lha'i theg pa'o// byams pa ni tshangs pa'i theg pa ste/ snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms kyang tshangs pa'i theg pa'o// yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang / yang dag
289a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i ngag dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
289a6(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba de ni 'phags pa'i theg pa zhes bya'o// de dus dus su lha'i theg pa sgom ste/ sems can rnams kyang de la 'god/ dus dus su tshangs pa'i theg pa sgom ste/ sems can rnams kyang de la 'god/ dus
289a7(dkon brtsegs): dus su 'phags pa'i theg pa sgom zhing // sems can rnams kyang de la 'god la/ rnam par grol ba 'phags pa mngon sum du'ang mi byed do// gzhan yang theg pa gsum rab tu shes te/ gsum gang /
289b1(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / thes pa chen po ste/ de dag ni drug pa gsum zhes bya'o// mos pa dman pa dang / dang po man pa skad cig tsam yang srid pa la mos par mi byed / snying
289b2(dkon brtsegs): bar mi byed kyi/ 'dor te skad cig de la de ma thag tu ma ngan las 'das pa thob pa'i phas yon mthong nas/ mgo dang gos la me'abar ba bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po dag khong du chung ba dang / rtogs par bya 'i
289b3(dkon brtsegs): phyir 'dun pa dang / rtsol ba'i shas che ba de ni nyan thos kyi theg pa zhes bya'o// slong 'bring dang / dang mo 'bring dang / dbe pa dga' ba dang / rang gi don du lhur len pa dang / bsam gtan dang / snyoms par 'jug pa la gnas par brtson
289b4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la rab tu rnam par 'byed pa la mkhas pa dang / rang byang chub tu smon lam 'debs pa de ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa zhes bya'o// mos pa khyad du 'phags pa/ dbang po khyad par du
289b5(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa/ sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang / sems can thams cad sgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams
289b6(dkon brtsegs): cad yongs su bskang bar 'dod pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su bslang bar 'dod pa dang / 'jig rten gyi don du 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal la mi lta ba dang / 'khor ba'i bde ba la'ang spong ba mang ba yin na/
289b7(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal la smod pa mang ba lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ tshul khrims dang spyod pa khyad par du 'phags pa la rnam par gnas pa dang / rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi theg pa can gyi mdo sde rnams klog
290a1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / bcod byed pa dang / lung song pa dang / yidi sa byed pa rnams pa con 'grus thams padang / ma chub sems dang sems dpa chen po gang yin pa ga ge slo'i shes na /
290a2(dkon brtsegs): reg sa byin gyi rnabus pan po badren pa dang / sto ba dang / che bar ning dag se grol ma cu gangasags nang dang / dmyong bar dag 'dang / ring 'an dang / snyoms par la gru ba ma/
290a3(dkon brtsegs): cad yang dag par skyed par 'dod pa dang / rang gi don la mi ska ba dang / 'jig rten gyi ron myur len pa dang / stobs ji lta ba bzhin du sems can thams cad thes pa gsum po dag la dgod par dong ba dang /
290a4(dkon brtsegs): dgod par spro ba dang / bdag nyid kyang byang chub kyi theg pa la shin tu gnas pa dang / mi byed pa dang / mi spyong pa dang / rdo rje lta bu'i sems dang // mas rgyun du byang chub tu sngon cing / byang chub tu smon lam 'debs
290a5(dkon brtsegs): bde ni theg pa chen po zhes bya ste/ de ltar theg pa gsum po dag rab tu shes so// de chos de dag nyan cing 'dzin pa dang mang du byed cing yongs su rtog pa na/ dge ba'i thabs rab tu shes te/ san
290a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang / chos thams cad
290a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / dge 'du thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo zhes dmigs par byed do// de la phyag lan cig btsal ran/ mtha' yas shing dpag tu med par phyag 'tshal bar bya'o snyam du sems bskyed do// de byang chub
290b1(dkon brtsegs): smon pa ni sems can thams cad bsngal ba dang / sems can thams cad sgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thod par byang dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams/
290b2(dkon brtsegs): cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo bar byed do// de bzhin du skyabs su 'gro ba na'ang sems bskyed do// de 'gro ba dang / 'greng ba dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal ba dang / khrus byed pa dang /
290b3(dkon brtsegs): nga ba dang / 'thung ba dang / zhing rmed pa dang / sa bon 'debs pa dang / las thams cad byed pa na'ang mtha' yas shing dngab tu med par byang chub tu smon lam gdang bar bya'o zhes sems bskyed do//
290b4(dkon brtsegs): mang du byed do// snyoms par 'jug pa dang / bsam gtan byed pa na'ang sems can thams cad bsgral pa dang / sems can thams cad sgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang / thams cad
290b5(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ mtha' yas shing dpag tu med par byang chub tu smon lam bdab bo zhes sems bskyed do// mang du byed do//
290b6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyi mchog dang / sems can thams cad gdul ba dang / mtshungs pa med pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad dbugs da
290b7(dkon brtsegs): dang 'jig rten thams cad yongs su mya ngan las brla dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir spor lam gdang ba zhes sems rgyad/
291a1(dkon brtsegs): do// mang du byed do// de dge ba gang ci spyod kyang sems can thams cad kyi 'jigs pa med par bya ba dang / ngan 'gro'i rgyud gcod pa dang / sdug bsngal thams cad nye bar zhi bar byang dang /
291a2(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs pa thams cad nye bar zhi bar bya ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo bar byed do// nyan thos kyi theg pa can da ltar byung ba dang / ma 'ongs pa rnams kyi nyan thos kyi theg pa yongs su
291a3(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo bar byed do// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can da ltar byung ba dang / ma 'ongs pa rnams kyi rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo bar byed do// byang chub
291a4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i theg pa can da ltar byung ba dang / ma 'ongs pa rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo bar byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du
291a5(dkon brtsegs): gtogs pa 'das pa dang / mabyon pa dang / nga lta byung ba rnams bskal par bzhugs pa dang / bskal par chos ston pa dang / bsal bar dge 'dun mthun par 'gyur bar yongs su sngo bar byed do// mdze ris kyi lam la
291a6(dkon brtsegs): dgodang pa 'am/ nyan thos kyi lam la dgong ba'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi lam la dgod pa 'am/ rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam la dgod pa 'am/ sbyin pas rjes su 'jug pa 'am/ snyan par smra bas rjes su 'jug pa 'am/ don
291a7(dkon brtsegs): pas rjes su 'jug pa'am/ don mthun pas rjes su 'jug pa 'am/ ji lta ji ltar gzhan das dge ba'i phyogs yang dag par skyed cing dge ba'i rtsa ba sogs par 'gyur ba de'ang rab tu shes so// de cho
291b1(dkon brtsegs): tshig 'di dag la nyin gcig bzhin du dus gsum du 'jug go// yid la byed do// de 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten dag gi khams rnams thams cad na// yang dag bzhugs pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang // chos dang dge
291b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dun byang chub sems dpa' la// phan 'gro mgo bos mtha' yas phyag kyang 'tshal// 'gro ba'i nang na yon tan mnyam med cing // mi mnyam pa yi yon tan 'byung gnas can// yon tan dpag med de dag thams cad
291b3(dkon brtsegs): lani bdag ni mgo ngos mtha' yas skyabs su mchi/ sangs rgyas dang ni chos dang tshogs rnams dang // byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis 'jig rten khams// gang yang brgyalam stongs par mi 'gyur bar// de ltar
291b4(dkon brtsegs): gsol ba mtha' yas rab tu 'debs// zhi ba'i chos ni rab tu ston mdzad cing // bskal pa ma lus rnams su bzhugs par yang // 'jig rten khams rnams kun gyi bde gshegs la/ mgo bos gsol ba mtha' yas
291b5(dkon brtsegs): rab tu 'debs// sngon dang 'di dang skad cig tsam yang rung // bdag gis sdig pa gang dang gang gyis pa// sdig pa de dag thams cad smad par bgyi// sdig pa thams cad bdag gis spang bar bgyi// skad cig tsam yang bdag
291b6(dkon brtsegs): gis dge ba 'di// ma lus par ni yang dag gzung bar bgyi// tshe yis ji tsam thub kyi bar du ni// dge ba kun la gnas par 'gyur bar 'tshal// sangs rgyas dag dung byang chub sems dpa' rnams// byang chub chos kyi 'khor lo/
291b7(dkon brtsegs): rab bskor ba// 'jig rten 'dir ni byung dang byung gyur dang // 'byung 'gyur rnams kyi dge ba thams cad dang // rgyal ba rnams dang 'phags pa thams cad kyi// tshul khrims dang ni ye shes ting 'dzin dang // rnam grol tshe dang chos
292a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams gang yin pa// de dag 'jig rten rnams la phan gyur cig/ 'gro ba lnga yis sems can thams cad dag/ byung dang byung gyur 'byung bar 'gyur rnams kyi// dge bdag la bdag ni phyi phyir zhing /
292a2(dkon brtsegs): mgo bos mtha' yas rjes su yi rang ngo // yon tan yang dag dge ba mtha' yas pa// de dag thams cad 'gro ba ma lus pas// sems can de'i dang ni bdag nyid la'ang// yod par bdag ni smon lam mtha' yas 'dabs//
292a3(dkon brtsegs): bdag gi dge bdag ni 'das pa dang // ma 'ongs pa dang ltar thams cad kyis// 'jig rten ngag gi khams ni thams cad du// dkon mchog gsum po rtag tu 'byung bar shog/ dkon mchog rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' rnam
292a4(dkon brtsegs): bskal par bzhugs pas 'phongs par ma gyur cig gabar du gcod pa med par byang chub dang // pha rob phyin pa rnams ni rdzogs par shog/ sems can dag ni thams cad bde ba dang // 'jigs pa med cing ngan 'gro 'das pa
292a5(dkon brtsegs): dung mi ge thams cad da nizil ba dang // ge pa'i rtsa ba thams ca rdzogs gyur cig/ theg pa gsum po dag la gi rigs par// de dag pa ni sngon lam mam chin cig// tshe bya dang rnam par tshol ba nga // rgyang pa
292a6(dkon brtsegs): don kun rdzogs par shog/ rdzogs pa'i byang chub smon lam 'debs pa ma/ mtha' yas dpag tu med par rab tu 'debs// sems can thams cad dag gi sdug bsngal dang // nyon mongs dag ni nye bar zhi myur cig/ chos dang
292a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa'i bya ba rnams kyi phyir// 'jig rten dag ga khams rnams thams car gyi// rgyal bkun dang byang chub sems dpa' la// rang gi lus mis par dbul bar bgyi// rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur bar du// mngon
292b1(dkon brtsegs): ba na sngon lam mtha' yas gang ba// smre dang skye bar dkon mchog gsum po la// bdag ni yongs su spyad pa bgyid par shog/ 'jig rten dag gi khams rnams thams cad kyi// dkon mchog gsum dang byang chub sems
292b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' la// nam mkha' mnyam pa'i lha yi spos mchog dang // 'phreng ba me tog chun pos mchod byed sheg/ lhun po mnyam pa'i gser dang dngul reg dang // gos dang rin po che yi phung po dang // gzhal med khang bcas bzhon
292b3(dkon brtsegs): dang mal cha dang // bza' ba mtha' yas dag ni sbyin par shog/ 'gro ba'i bsam pa lam gyi rdzogs byed cing // skyabs dang lus dang pa 'drar myur par shog/ bzod la dga' zhing tshul khrims gtsang ba dang // grol
292b4(dkon brtsegs): chos ni rab tu ston gyur cig/ byang chub theg pa mchog ni rnyed pa dang // dkon mchog gsum phyir go cha sra pa bgo// pha rol phyin pa yongs su rdzogs byed cing // sangs rgyas chos rnams yongs su rdzogs byed sho/
292b5(dkon brtsegs): sdig pa kun dang bral zhing lus ngag dang / yid kyi las mtha' dge ba mchog gyur cig/ byang chub las ni mi ldog bdag 'gyur zhing // byang chub dga' dang byang chub sems dpa' gyur// srid dang srid par byang chub
292b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' dang // sangs rgyas rnams kyi dge ba kun la slob// bdag gis chos rnams de dag kun la yang // 'jig rten thams cad rab tu dgod par bgyi/ de de ltar bdag dang gzhan dag gis
292b7(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa rab tu shes so// de shes rab de dang ye shes de mngon sum du bya bar 'dod pa dang / yid la bya bar 'dod pa na'ang sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang / sems can thams cad sgrol ba dang /
293a1(dkon brtsegs): semasacan thams ca dums dbyung ba dang thams cad mkhyer pa nyid thob par bya ba dang / sas rgyam ma chos thams cad yos su rdzogs par byaba'i phyir yongs su sngobar byed do//
293a2(dkon brtsegs): sum du byed pa dang / yid la byed pa dang / mngon sum du byas pa dang / yid la byas nas kyang / sems can thams cad bsngal ba dang / sems can thams cad sgrol ba dang / sems can thams sa dang grags dbyung ba dang / rnam
293a3(dkon brtsegs): cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo bar byed do// gal te shes rab de dang ye shes de la slob pa'i nus pa dang mi ldan par gyur na// de 'di
293a4(dkon brtsegs): ltar yang dag par slob ste/ dus dus su 'am/ cung zad cung zad du'ang 'chal pa'i shes rab dang / mi shes pa spang ba dang / dor ba dang / bsal bar rtsol lo// 'bad do// dus dus su 'am/ cung zad cung zad du'ang shes rab
293a5(dkon brtsegs): dang / ye shes de la slob pa dang / mngon par 'phel bar bya ba dang / yongs su rdzogs par bya bar rtsol lo// 'bad do// srid pa gzhan du gyur pa na'ang zhum par mi 'gyur zhing sgyid lug par mi 'gyur ro// lag
293a6(dkon brtsegs): bzangs byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / byang chub kyi sems rjes su dran pa dang / byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa dang / byang chub tu smon pa dang / byang chub tu smon lam 'debs pa
293a7(dkon brtsegs): gang yin pa de nyid de dag gi shes rab dge ba dang / ye shes dge ba grangs med cing dpag tu med pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can thams cad la zag pa med pa'i
293b1(dkon brtsegs): shes rab skyed par 'dod pa dang / mi skyob pa'i shes rang skyed par 'dod pa dang / zag pa med pa'i shes rab yang dag par skyed par 'dod pa dang / mi slob pa'i shes rab yang dag par skyed par 'dod pa de ni/ shes rab rig pa
293b2(dkon brtsegs): dang ye shes dge ba thams cad kyi mchog yin no// de ni dam pa yin pa'i phyir ro// lag bzangs de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bde ba dang ldan la/ yid bde ba dang ldan zhing tshogs chung ngu dang / sdug bsngal chung ngus gyur
293b3(dkon brtsegs): du skyen par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// byang chub sems dpa' pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa ni/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
293b4(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ lha dang mi'i skye dgu'i sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa dag theg pa gsum dang mtho ris su skye ba'i don byas par gyur to// bcom
293b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag bzangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang /
293b6(dkon brtsegs): dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod ngo // 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam mangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ lag
293b7(dkon brtsegs): bzangs kyis zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ 'dus pa nyi shu rtsa drug pa rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po dA na shI la dang / dzin mi tra dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa baban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus na
294a1(dkon brtsegs): skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa/ bam po gnyis dang sh+lau ka brgya rtsa brgyad// // rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya sU raH
294a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i pr-i tsA nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa nges pas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// bam po gcig pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams
294a3(dkon brtsegs): cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' rang na// dge slong stong ces brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong
294a4(dkon brtsegs): gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sum khri nyis stong dag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ 'khor bzhi dang / rgyal po dang / blon po dang / mong rdal gyi mi dang / ljongs kyi mi rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/
294a5(dkon brtsegs): rim gror byas/ mchod par byas so// de'i tshe mnyan yod kyi mod khyer na/ grong khyer gyi mi dngul po nges pa zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas la dad pa mi phyed ba dang ldan pa/ chos la dad pa mi phyed pa dang ldan pa/
294a6(dkon brtsegs): dge 'dun la dad pa mi phyed pa dang ldan pa/ bslab pa'i gzhi lnga yongs su bzung ba// dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa/ byams pa la gnas te/ sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa/ snying rjes la gnas te/
294a7(dkon brtsegs): yid yongs su skyo ba med pa/ dga' ba la gnas te/ chos kyi kun dga' la dga' zhing mos pa/ gtang snyoms la gnas te/ bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyis mi skyod pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang/
294b1(dkon brtsegs): dag par zhugs pa/ sngon gyi tshul phun sum tshogs pa/ thabs la mkhas pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed cing / dngul por ming du chags pa zhig gnas te/ lha'i dbang /
294b2(dkon brtsegs): dargya byin gyis lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas grong khyer gyi dbul po nges pa shin tu 'dod pa chung ba/ chog shes pa/ tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs dang ldan pa/ yid la 'khrug pa med pa/ rtag tu bzhin
294b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dzum pa// gzhan gyi 'khrul pa dag la skyon du mi lta ba/ sems can thams cad kyi sems srung ba/ brnam pa med pa/ shes bzhin du spyod pa/ chog shis shing dgang sbal gso slab/ bsam pa sun sum tshogs pa/
294b4(dkon brtsegs): g.yo med pa/ nga rgyal med pa/ bka' blo bde ba/ 'thun par 'dzin pa/ rtag tu gso sbyong gi yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa/ lag na shing lo'i snod thogs pa/ rtswa bting ba la nyal ba/ gos ngan pa gyon pa/ rnyed kyang mi len pa/
294b5(dkon brtsegs): bzang yang rung / ngan kyang rung bgo bsha' byas nas za ba/ dus gsum du de bzhin gshegs pa la lta ba/ chos nyan par 'dod pa/ gtam sna tshogs byung ba la spobs pa dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad kyis mthong
294b6(dkon brtsegs): na dga' ba de mthong ngo // mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ ci grong khyer gyi dbul po 'di yi dam la brten nam/ mi brten pa bdag gis brtag go snyam mo// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis mi mang
294b7(dkon brtsegs): mngon par sprul nas/ grong khyer gyi dbul po ngas pa la tshig ngan pa dag gis gshe zhing spyod par byed de/ bod dang / dbyug pa dang / mtshon ma dag kyang bstan na/ nges pa de bzod pa'i stobs kyis dang du len par byed de/ mi 'khrug
295a1(dkon brtsegs): cing gnod sems mi skyed do// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis mi gzhan dag cig tu sprul nas nges pa de'i mdun du bzhag ste/ nges pa de la dga' ba'i tshig gis kho bo cag ni khyod kyi don byed
295a2(dkon brtsegs): par 'dod pa yin gyis/ ji ste khyod 'dod pa lta na/ khyod la sdig pa'i dgra gang yin pa de dag kho bo cag gis tshar gcod par bya'o zhes smras so// nges pas smras pa/ grogs po dag thong // de skad ma zer cig/ gal te mi
295a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag gis kho bo'i lus dum bu brgyar dum bu dum bur gtubs su zin kyang / kho bo ni mi 'di dag la sdig pa'i sems mi skyed de/ grogs po dag 'jig rten dag ni dge ba dang / mi dge ba'i phyogs gnyis la gnas la/
295a4(dkon brtsegs): de'i 'gro ba ni gnyis kho na ste/ dge ba'i phyogs kyi ni bde 'gro'o// mi dge ba'i phyogs kyi ni ngan 'gro'o// de bas ni kho bo ni sems can pha rol tshig pa za bar byed pa'ang mi 'dod na/ gtse ba lta ci smos/ de nas de'i tshe
295a5(dkon brtsegs): tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sa bon tsha ba rnams kyi ni// 'bras bu tsha ba skye bar 'gyur// sa bon mngar ba rnams kyi ni// 'bras bu mngar bskye bar 'gyur// dpe zlar byas pa 'di yis ni// sdig pa'i rnam smin tsha ba dang //
295a6(dkon brtsegs): dkar po'i 'bras bu mngar pa yang // mkhas pa'i mis ni shes par 'gyur// rtag tu lus dang ngag yid kyis// sdig pa rnam gsum mi bya zhing // gzhan dag byed kyang mkhas pa yis// rjes su dga' bar mi bya'o// lus dang /
295a7(dkon brtsegs): ngag dang yid rnams kyi// dkar po rnam gsum rtag tu bya// gang dag dge ba spyod byed pa// gzhan dag la yang yid rang bya/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis dus gzhan zhig na/ nges pa la dbyig dang
295b1(dkon brtsegs): gser mang po bstan nas 'di skad ces smras so// nges pa 'o ni las khyer la sbyin pa byin cig/ bsod nams ngag gyis shig/ gos rang rgyan dag kyang thogs shig/ khyod ngam cing dbul bas ci zhig bya/ nges pas
295b2(dkon brtsegs): spras pa/ grogs po sngon sems can rnams la lus kyis nyes par spyad pa dang / ngag dang yid kyis nyes par spyad pas 'dir dngul po zhes bya bar gyur to// de bas ma khe bo ni ma byin par len pa byed par mi 'dod do//
295b3(dkon brtsegs): brgya byin gyis smras pa/ nges pa khyod da ltar je bde bar 'tsho bar gyis shig/ 'jig rten pha rol bsam pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ nges pas smras pa/ grogs po gang tshe 'di ched cher 'dzin pa de ni byis pa'i chos yin gyi/
295b4(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa rnams ni tshe phyi mched cher 'dzin to// 'dod pas zil gyis non pa dang / zhe sdang gis zil gyis non pa dang / gti mug gis zil gyis non pa dang / 'dod chags kyis zil gyis non pa dag ni ma byin par len
295b5(dkon brtsegs): par byed kyi/ mkhas pa dag ni brkam pa ma yin no// sogs 'jog ched cher 'dzin pa dag ni ma byin par len par byed kyi/ mkhas pa dag ni sogs 'jog mi byed do// bdag gir 'dzin pa dang bcas shing yongs
295b6(dkon brtsegs): su 'dzin pa dang bcas pa dag ni ma byin par ya len par byed kyi/ mkhas pa dag ni bdag tu mi 'dzin cing yongs su 'dzin par mi byed do// lus dang srog la lta ba dag ni ma byin par len par byed kyi/ mkhas pa dag
295b7(dkon brtsegs): ni lus dang srog la mi lta'o// ngoms mi shes shing chog mi shes pa dag ni ma byin par len par byed kyi/ mkhas pa dag ni ngoms shes shing chog shes pa yin no// 'tsho ba yongs su ma dag pa dag ni mabyin par len par
296a1(dkon brtsegs): / byed kyi/ mkhas pa dag ni 'tsho ba yongs su dag pa yin no// las ma mthong ba dag ni ma byin par len par byed kyis// mkhas pa dag ni las mthong ba yin no// rnam par 'tshe ba cher cher 'dzin pas/
296a2(dkon brtsegs): nim byin par byed kyi/ mkhas pa dag ni rnam par mi 'tshe ba ched cher 'dzin to// byams pa'i sems med pa dag ni ma byin par len par byed kyi// mkhas pa rag ni byams pa'i sems dang ldan no// byin ci log bzhis sems
296a3(dkon brtsegs): bslad pa dag ni ma byin par len par byed kyi/ mkhas pa dag ni sems phyin ci ma log pa yin no// gzhan yang sems can dngul po gang yin pa de dag kho bos tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bshad kyis nyon cig/
296a4(dkon brtsegs): bye ba phrag stong gter yod kyang // gang dag la ni gtong med pa// de dag 'jig rten 'dir dbul zhes// thos mang rnams kyis de skad bshad// gang la zan gcig med bzhin du// de ni gtong la rab gnas na// de ni 'jig rten
296a5(dkon brtsegs): nor che zhes// yang dag gzigs pa rnams kyis bshad// gang la sdig med 'phags pa ni/ rnam pa kun gyis mdzes pa yim/ byis pa sdig pa byed pa ni// shin tu brgyan kyang mdzes ma yin// mkhas pa dag
296a6(dkon brtsegs): gis spyos bla yi// byis pas bsngags pa de lta min// byis pa sdig pa bsngags par byed// mkhas pa dag ni sdug la spod / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis dus gzhan zhig na mi gzhan zhig
296a7(dkon brtsegs): sprul to// de nas mi des gser mang po khyer te/ nges pa la 'di skad ces smras so// kye nges pa gser khyer la/ kho bo mi gzhan zhig dang rtsod pa de la khyod gcig pus che bzhi bya bar kho bos byas kyis// der khe re'i
296b1(dkon brtsegs): che bzhi gyis shig/ des pas spras pa/ grogs po thong / khyod de skad ma zer cig/ kho bo ni brdzun zer du mi 'dod ngo do// kye grogs po brdzun du smra ba ni/ bdagu la'ang spu ning pa rol yang sru la// 'phags
296b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'ang slu ba yin te/ chags pa nyams par byed pa dang / yid mi ches pa dang / yid du mi 'ong bar byed pa dang / brnyas par byed pa dang / sems yongs su gdung bar byed pa yin no// kye grogs po brdzun du sdung
296b3(dkon brtsegs): ni kha mnam par byed pa dang / lus spad par byed pa dang / lha'i yid du mi 'ong bar byed pa yin no// kye grogs po brdzun du smra ba ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams la rku ba dang / dran pa rmugs par byed pa dang / mtho ris kyi
296b4(dkon brtsegs): lam la sgrib pa yin no// kye grogs po brdzun du smra ba ni/ 'phags pa rnams kyis btsan par mi bya ba dang / yang dag par smra ba rnams kyi nang du tshig mi mdzes pa dang / mkhas pa rnams kyis spang pa dang /
296b5(dkon brtsegs): sdig pa thams cad kyi rtsa ba dang / brtul zhugs yongs su skong ba'i rtsa ba gcod pa dang / ngan 'gro thams cad kyi rtsa bar gyur pa yin no// der nas de'i tshe grong khyer gyi dbul po nges pas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so//
296b6(dkon brtsegs): brdzun du smra ba'i kha nas ni// rul ba'i dri yang mnam par 'gyur// dgon po ji ltar bcom pa bzhin// sngon gyi dkar rnams spong bar byed// rmongs pas bdag dang lha rnams dang // 'phags rnams yid kyang 'byung bar
296b7(dkon brtsegs): byed/ mau ni gang zhig brdzun zer ba// de ni rtag tu dogs par 'gyur// brdzun du smra bar byed pa re/ sdig pa kun gyi rtsa ba dang // dka' thub can gyi rtsa gcod dang // ngan 'gror 'gro ba zhes kyang bya// gal te 'dzam
297a1(dkon brtsegs): gling gang ba yi// gser dag khyod kyis byin na yang // kho bos chos ni bsrung ba'i phyir// rtag tu brdzun ni spu mi byed// de nas brgya byin gyis sprul pa'i mis nges pa brdzun zer du gzhug ma
297a2(dkon brtsegs): nus nas song ngo // de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis lha'i bu mo nyi 'od dang / spra ma yin gyi bu mo bde sogs la 'di skad ces smras so// khyed gnyis song la brtul zhugs dang dka' thung byed
297a3(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di/ ci 'dod pa la longs spyod pa zhig gam/ 'on te 'dod pa don du mi gnyer ba zhig yin pa rtogs shig/ de nas lha ma yin gyi bu mo bde sogs dang / lha'i bu mo nyi 'od nam nangs nas phyogs gang na nges pa
297a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dug pa'i phyogs der song nas// nges pa la tshig snyan par smra te/ nges pa bzhengs/ bdag cag gnyis ni khyod kyi bsnyen bkur bgyid pa lags so// nges pa bdag cag gnyis kyi gzugs phun sum tshogs pa la
297a5(dkon brtsegs): gzigs/ sha tshugs dang / kha dog dang / dbyibs dang / lus byugs pa dang / rgyan dang / ches dang / lhab lhub dag la gzigs/ na tshogs dang po'i lang tsho la bab pa la gzigs/ nges pa khyod kyis bsnyen bkur
297a6(dkon brtsegs): bgying ba 'di 'dra ba bdag nyid kyi bsod nams phun sum tshogs pa la gzigs/ nges pas bltas nas spes pa// khyed gnyis ni sems can dmyal ba dang / dung 'amo skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du su
297a7(dkon brtsegs): ba rnams kyi bsnyen bkur byed pa yin gyi/ lha dang mir zhugs pa dag gi ni ma yidan byeng gnyis kyi lus ni spyam dang rmi lam gyi rang bzhin lta bur kho bos mthong ngo // khyed gnyis kyi gzugs ni lnga ba dang / mu rur dris
297b1(dkon brtsegs): smig rgyu lta bur mthong ngo // khyed tsan dan gyi lde gus byugs pa ni pags pa rlod pa shas yog pa lta bur mthong ngo // khyed kyi rgyan dang lpang lhub ni mig sru ba'i sgyu ma byas pa lta bur mthong ngo // khyed kyi lang /
297b2(dkon brtsegs): ni mi rtog pa dang 'gyur ba'i chos can mthong ngo // bsod nams ma yin par mthong ba'i phyir khyed gnyis la kho bo ma chags so// khyed gnyis ni spre'u dang bud med kyi sems lta bur gyur pa rnams kyi bsnyen bkur
297b3(dkon brtsegs): byed pa yin gyi/ sems dran pas kun nas srung ba dag gi ni ma yin no// che zhe dag 'dod pa la rten pa ni mi sdug pa'o// 'dod pa la rten pa de ni dri nga ba'o// 'dod pa la rten pa ni rul ba'o// 'dod pa la rten
297b4(dkon brtsegs): ba ni shin tu sdug bsngal ba'o// 'dod pa la rten pa ni bde ba thams cad yongs su 'grib par byed pa'o// 'dod pa la rten pa ni sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten la rten
297b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'od 'dod pa la rten pa ni ngan 'gro na gnas pa'o// 'dod pa la rten pa ni 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dag la rten pa'o// 'dod pa la rten pa ni mi mthun pa dang go ra na gnas pa'o// 'dod pa la rten
297b6(dkon brtsegs): pa ni phyin ci log skyed pa'o// 'dod pa la rten pa ni srid pa'i bag la nyal la gnas pa'o// 'dod pa la rten pa ni rnam par rmongs shing shin tu rmongs la kun tu rmongs pa'o// 'dod pa la rten pa ni nye bar gzer cing rnam
297b7(dkon brtsegs): par gzir la kun tu gzir ba'o// 'dod pa la rten pa ni kun tu gdungs shing rnam par gdungs la yongs su gdungs pa'o// 'dod pa la rten pa ni mi dge ba'i rjes su 'jug cing dge ba yongs su nyams par byed
298a1(dkon brtsegs): #pa'od / 'dod pa la rten pa ni mi dge bu'i rtsa bskyed pa'o// 'dod pa la rten pa ni mi dge ba'i sprin gyi dra bas kun nas khebs pa'o// 'dod pa larten pa ni srin mo dang 'dris par
298a2(dkon brtsegs): byed pa dang / gzugs mi sdug pa dang 'dris par byed pa dang / sha za mo dang 'dris par byed pa'o// 'dod pa la rten pa ni baglang dang / bong bu dang / khyi dang / phag dang / rngomo dang / glang po che dang / rta dang / lug dang / wa la rten
298a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'o// 'dod pa la rten pa ni skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa la rten pa'o// 'dod pa la rten pa ni tshul khrims dang // bos pa dang / gtong ba yongs su 'dor ba la rten pa'o// 'dod pa la rten pa ni brtul zhugs dang /
298a4(dkon brtsegs): thuthub 'dor ba'o// 'dod pa la rten pa ni shin tu bag med pa'o// 'dod pa la rten pa ni nyon mongs pa shin tu 'phel bar byed pa'o// 'dod pa la rten pa ni shin tu bar du gcod par byed pa'o//
298a5(dkon brtsegs): nas de'i tshe grong khyer gyi dbul po nges pas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// 'dod pa mi rtag rtag tu smad pa ste// shin tu sdug bsngal bde ba 'jig par byed// rtag tu ngan song sa rnams khyim du gyur/
298a6(dkon brtsegs): sems rmongs gyur pa dag gis rtag tu bsten// 'thang rtsod can de mi bden mtshang du gyur// rtag tu 'gyid cing mi mthun go rar gnas// 'di dag phyin ci log skyed gzhi yin te// 'dod rten srid pa 'phel byed pa/
298a7(dkon brtsegs): ba med// rnam rmongs rab rmongs de bzhin kun tu rmongs// 'dod rten rtag tu gzer cing gnod pa ste// 'di ni kun gdungs rnam gdungs yongs su gdungs// sdig par sbyor zhing dge ba chung gzen pa// 'di ni mi dge/
298b1(dkon brtsegs): kun gyi rtsa ba ste// 'dod rten dper na smin gyi dra ba 'am/ 'dod rten sha ba mo dang srin mo dang // zad med gzugs mi sdug dang 'dris byed bzhim/ 'di ni bzang dong dra rta dag dang / drag dang ci dang la dang yongs
298b2(dkon brtsegs): glang chen lug rnams kyis kyang rten pa ste// 'dod pa skyes du dam pa rnams kyis spangs// 'dod rten tshul khrims thos dang gtong ba dang // dka' thub brtul zhugs rnams ni 'joms pa ste// 'di la rtag tu bag med ces pa
298b3(dkon brtsegs): 'phel// de phyir thar 'dod rtag tu bud med spong // gal te 'jig rten 'di dag khyed 'dra ba'i// mdangs ldan gzugs can dag gis gang gyur kyang // yon tan gnas pa kho bo'i sems gcig kyang // 'dod chags
298b4(dkon brtsegs): la ni rnams kyang rton mi 'gyur/ de nas lha ma yin gyi bu mo bde sogs dang / lha'i bu mo nyi 'od song nas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ des ni 'di na bud med
298b5(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi skyon yang dag/ gang la de dag shin tu mthong bar dogs ma mchis// ji ltar de yi sems ni yul las log gyur pa// de ltar 'dod pa rnams la sems ni chags ma mchis// de nas
298b6(dkon brtsegs): lha'i dbang po brgya byin mong khyer gyi dbul po nges pa'i thad du song nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ ci zhig don gnyer nges pa chos spyod pa// brtul zhugs de ni spyod pa rnam dag spos// 'di yis nyi zla 'am yang na
298b7(dkon brtsegs): dbang po 'am// tshangs pa 'am lha rgyal ci zhig khyod slong byed// nges pas smras pa/ nyi ma zla ba de bzhin brgya byin dang // tshangs pa'ang rgyal po'am 'di na gzhan dag kyang // 'gro ba rgya chen gang yod de dag kun// gar byed
299a1(dkon brtsegs): lnga bzhin mi rtag mi brtan na// mkhas pa su zhig de la dga' bar byed// gang la skye med rga med 'chi ba med/ sdug dang mi sdug rnams dang phrang pa'ang med // 'tsher grol mdzad sangs rgyas
299a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba zhes// de thob bya phyir sems kyi spyod pa nges// brgya byin gyis smras pa/ phan byed khyod kyi tshig la rjes su yi rang ste// khyod kyis smon lam btab pa legs par grub gyur cig/ bdud rnams sder bcas
299a3(dkon brtsegs): myur du nges par bcom nas ni// shAkya seng ge rgyal ltar byang chub theb gyur cig de nas grong khyer gyi dbul po nges pas dus gzhan zhig na nor bu rin po che rin thang med pa zhig rnyed nas/ de 'di
299a4(dkon brtsegs): snyam du sems te/ nor bu rin po che 'dzam bu'i gling na mchog tu gyur pa 'di bdag gis mnyan yod 'di na thams cad kyi nang na dbul po gang yin pa de la sbyin gor ma chag go snyam nas de grong bar du song ste/ thams
299a5(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi nang na dbul po su yin pa de la rin po che 'di sbyin no zhes sgra bsgrags pa dang / dbul po mgon med pa phal po che der 'dus te/ bdag cag dbul po yin gyis/ bdag cag la byin cig ces 'dzer to// dus
299a6(dkon brtsegs): pas sbas pa/ khyed ni dbul po ma yin gyi/ mnyan yod 'di na ches dngul po gzhan nig yod kyi// de la sbyin no// de dag gis smras pa// gang yin// des pas smras pa/ rgyal po gas rgyal 'di yin no// de dag gis
299a7(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ khyod de skad ma zer zhig/ rgyal po gsal rgyal ni phyug cing nor mngal longs spyod che ba yin gyi/ bdag cag ni dbul zhing mgon med pa yin no// des pas smras pa/ nor mang gis ni ci zhig bya// rgya mtshog
299b1(dkon brtsegs): ni rlung rnams bzhin// gang dag la ni chog med pa// ma bsnams de dag dbul po yin// gang dag 'dod pa rab 'phel zhing // yang yid ni skye 'gyur ba// rmongs pa de dag tshe 'di dang // pha rol tu yang dngul por 'gyur// de nas
299b2(dkon brtsegs): grong khyer gyi dbul po nges pa skye bo phal po che de dag gis yongs su bskor cing nor bu rin po che de khyer nas/ rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi don bya ba'i sa ga la ba der song ngo // de'i tshe rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis kyang tshong
299b3(dkon brtsegs): dpon dang / khyim bdag rigs dang ldan pa'i mchog lnga brgya tsam zhig g.yon chung ngu'i phyir bdog pa thams cad thogs so// grong khyer gyi dngul po nges pas nor bu rin po che de rgyal po la phul te/ rgyal po chen po nor
299b4(dkon brtsegs): bu rin po che rin thang ma mchis pa 'dzam bu gling thams cad ri ba bdag gis rnyed pa 'di bdag gis 'di snyam du bsams te/ mnyan yod 'di na thams cad kyi nang na dbul po gang lags pa de la stsal te snyam mo//
299b5(dkon brtsegs): de la bdag gis 'di snyam du bsams te/ khyod ni 'di na thams cad kyi nang na dbul po lags so snyam bgyid kyis// kye nor bu rin po che 'di bzhes su gsol/ de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal yul
299b6(dkon brtsegs): yul por gyur cing ngo tsha bar gyur nas/ grong khyer gyi dbul po nges pa la 'di skad ces smras so// nges pa cing khrod pas kyang ches dbul lam// nges pas smras pa/ lha de lnga lags te bdag pas ches khyod dbul
299b7(dkon brtsegs): lags so// rgyal pos smras pa/ rnam grangs gang gis dbul/ nges pas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ gang gis 'dod pa rab mang rnam par 'phel zhing longs spyod dag gis chog ma 'tshal/
300a1(dkon brtsegs): gnod pa bgyid pa'i slang du rgyal sring 'khrug cing bdag nyid kyang ni 'dor bgyid pa// de ni 'dri na 'jig rten mi srung yon tan chung dra dag la mchog tu 'dzin// de phyir 'di nid de la rtag tu chos
300a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dod rnams ni dngul po lags par sems// gang zhig byams pa rab tu bsgoms te sems can rnams la za ba ma mchis shing // rtag par rgyun du ngan ngon tsam gyis chog par 'dzin cing 'dod pa ma mchis la/
300a3(dkon brtsegs): nyam thag mthong na rtag tu snying rje bgyid cing shar gnyer bgyid pa ma mchis pa// de ni phyug cing nor bzang shin tu nor che dang pa la sogs longs spyod gnas// gang zhig 'tshe ba 'di na dbang phyug rgya chen ldan la chos
300a4(dkon brtsegs): srung mi bgyid dang // gang zhig 'di na skye bo dman zhing sdug bsngal gzir ba bzung nas chad pas gcod// gang zhig chung ma dag gis mdun bltas dga' zhing 'jig rten pha rol mi lta ba// de ni chos srung mi bgyid
300a5(dkon brtsegs): shin tu dngul zhing dman pa'i mi zhes rig par bgyid// dad pas bsams pa dri ma med cing rang rten tshul khrims dag la yang dag gnas// rtag tu ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod thos pa 'dzin te gtor la dga' ba dang /
300a6(dkon brtsegs): shes rab kyi ni mthar phyin blo gros ldan zhing 'jig rten kun la lta bgyid pa// de dag rtag tu mi dbul thob cing chos 'dod rnams kyis mchod par 'os pa lags// gang dag longs spyod rnams la rab chags
300a7(dkon brtsegs): bde la dga' zhing gtong ba ma mchis la// lus dang srog la snying por 'dzin cing rtag par snying po don du mi gnyer dang // gang dag glang chen myos pa lta bur rtag tu yod myos rnam par rgyu ba dang // lhan cig/
300b1(dkon brtsegs): gang dag dran pa ma mchis de dag dngul ba nyid ni thob pa lags// gang dag dkon mchog gsum po dri ma med la gus pa shin tu che ba dang // lus dang srog dang nor rnams las ni rtag tu snying po sgrub pa'i
300b2(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa dag/ rtag tu mi brkam sdang bar mi bgyid glen pa ma lags rab tu rgyags ma mchis// lha gcig gang dag chos kyi brgyan pa de dag nor che skyes bu dam pa lags// lha gcig me ni rtag tu nags
300b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi spun spun skam po bsregs pas chog ma 'tshal// lha gcig 'di na rgya mtsho chu klung rnams kyi rgyu 'dzin pas kyang cho ga ma 'tshal// 'di na nyi ma zla ba 'di dag mkha' la mthar gyis rgyu bas chog ma 'tshal/
300b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po brkam phyin rtag tu longs spyod dag gis chog mi mkhyen pas rlag par 'gyur// zhugs ni gum par gyur pas rtsa mang dag gis slar yang 'bar bar yongs mi bgyid// de bzhin mkhas pas shes rab
300b5(dkon brtsegs): chog par mi 'dzin nyon mongs rnams kyis 'bar mi bgyid// chu yi thigs pa bzhin du rgyal srid dag kyang mi brtan 'jig par rang phyogs na// gnod pa'i rtsa bar gyur cing dge ba 'joms pa'i rgyal srid de ni sra
300b6(dkon brtsegs): zhig 'tshal/ de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal sems 'khrugs nas// grong khyer gyi dbul po nges pa la 'di skad ces smras so// nges pa de ltar nga ni dbul la/ khyod la phyug par khyod la dbang su yod
300b7(dkon brtsegs): nges pas smras pa/ lha de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mnyan yod 'di nyid na bzhugs pa khyod kyis ma gas na tam// rgyal pos smras pa/ ngas mthong yang mthong ngo //
