301a1(dkon brtsegs): nges pas smras pa/ lha de ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mig tu gyur cing tshad mar gyur pa ste/ de ni bdag gi dbang lags so// rgyal pos smras pa/ song la de bzhin gshegs pa de
301a2(dkon brtsegs): spyan drongs shig dang / res ji skad du lung bstan pa de bzhin du ngas gzung bar bya'o// des pas smras pa ka ston pa de la ngan bu 'am/ po nya gzhan gtar 'os ma lags// 'dir ni bdag gis
301a3(dkon brtsegs): bsam bgyis na// de mkhyen nas ni gshegs par 'gyur// 'jig rten 'di 'am pha rol la// de ni mi mkhyem sang me mnga'// thugs kyis bsam pa mkhyen nas kyang // 'dren pa de ni gshegs par 'gyur//
301a4(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams la thugs brtse bas// de la nga rgyal skyo mi mnga'// sems can rnams la legs dgongs pas// shin tu rab tu 'ang gshegs 'gyur gyis// rgyal chen bdag gis gsol pa la// du ni
301a5(dkon brtsegs): legs par thugs ches mdzod// gang gis ston pa 'dir gshegs pa'i// bden pa'i byin brlabs bgyi bar 'tshal// me tog spos dang me tog 'phreng // rgyal mtshan gdugs dang byug pa dang // sil
301a6(dkon brtsegs): snyan sta gon mdzod cig dang // 'dren pa de ni gshegs par 'gyur// nges pas thal mo sbyar nas kyang // phrag pa gcig tu gos gzar 'dug/ pus mos la btsugs byas nas// 'di skad du ni tshig kyang spras/
301a7(dkon brtsegs): kun mkhyen bden pa gang gis su// bdag gi bsam pa mkhyen ce na// bden pa'i tshig ni 'di nyid kyis// thub pa bdag gi mdun du bzhugs/ de nas tshig 'di smras nas kyang // sa ni
301b1(dkon brtsegs): rab tu g.yos par gyur// sa gzhi rnam par brtol nas ni// de bzhin gshegs pa byung bar gyur// rdzu 'phrul rag dang ldan pa yi// nyan thos lnga brgyas yongs su skor// brgya phrag 'du gcis snyed
301b2(dkon brtsegs): ngag gi/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang ni// skyong ba dang ni lha klu dang // brgya byin tshangs pas mdun gyis bltas// de 'dri'i rdzu 'phrul mthong nas ni// de tshe 'jig rten ngo mtshar 'dzin//
301b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po dpung bcas blon por bcas// ston pa'i zhabs la 'dud par byed// der ni srog chags stong dag gis// ston pa la ni mchod pa byas// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mchod byas nas// byang chub
301b4(dkon brtsegs): don du yid btung ngo // de nas grong khyer gyi dbul bi des pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan bdun bskor ba byas te/ 'di skad
301b5(dkon brtsegs): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag mnyan yong 'di na 'khyam zhing mchis mchis pa las/ nor bu rin po che rin thang ma mchis pa zhig rnyed nas/ de la bdag 'di snyam bgyid de// many+dzu na yod
301b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di na thams cad kyi nang na dngul po gang lags pa de la stsal to snyam nas// de la bdag 'di snyam bgyid de/ rgyal po gsal rgyal 'di ni thams cad kyi nang na ches dbul ba ste/ 'di ni pha rol gyi nor
301b7(dkon brtsegs): 'phrog par dgyid pas na/ ngoms ma 'tshal ba lags so// sbar zhing don du gnyer bar bgyid pas na/ chog ma 'tshal ba lags so// gzhan gyi longs spyod dag gis ngoms ma 'tshal ba lags/
302a1(dkon brtsegs): sod / sdug bsngal ba rnams la rnam par mtho 'tsham pa lags so// skying pa rnams thal mar 'byin pa lags so// daphul po rnams rab tu rung bar gyid pa lags so//
302a2(dkon brtsegs): po rnams tshar gcod pa lags so// shin tu rab tu myos pa lags so// rgyal po'i longs spyod rnams dang sred pas rnam par bcings pa lags so snyam nas/ de la bdag gis stsal na len par mi bgyid par
302a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad du de ltar nga ni dbul la/ khyod ni 'byor par khyod la dpang su yod ces kyang mchi'o// de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad la thugs snyoms pa/ ngo zlog gi spyod pa mi mnga' ba/ tha ba dang /
302a4(dkon brtsegs): dri ma dang / khong khrob mi mnga' ba/ bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di legs par lung bstan par gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rgyal po chen po khyod ni tshe 'di'i rgyal srid kyi
302a5(dkon brtsegs): dbang phyug gi longs spyod gser dang / nor bu dang / mug tig dang bi TuR+Sha dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byung ru dang / sa le sbram dang / dngul dang / rta dang / glang po che dang / shing rta dang / dpung
302a6(dkon brtsegs): bu chung dang / bzhon pa dang / mdzod dang / bang mdzod thob pa gang yin pa 'di dag gis bdag phyug go snyam du sems so// rgyal po chen po nges pa ni sbyin pa dang / dul ba dang / legs par sdom pa dang /
302a7(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa dang / nges pa dang / tshul khrims dang / brtul zhugs dang / bka' thub dang / bag yod pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / yo byad bsnyungs pa la gnas pa dang / byams pa dang ka snyig
302b1(dkon brtsegs): rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms la gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la dang ba dang / dang pa dang / tshul khrims dang / ngos pa dang / gtong ba dang / shes rang dang /
302b2(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang // khrel yod pa dang / brtan pa dang / sdom pa gang yin pa de dag gis bdag phyug go snyam du sems so// rgyal po chen po khyod kyi 'og tu gtogs pa'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag 'di
302b3(dkon brtsegs): ltar khyod dang 'dra bar nor dang ldan par gyur kyang / de dag ni nges pas gom pa bdun bor ba'i bar gyi tshul khrims dang // thos pa dang / brtul zhugs dang / dka' thub dang / bag yod pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i
302b4(dkon brtsegs): nga rgya'i char yang mi phod pa nas/ de pa'i bar du'ang mi bzod do// gsal rgyal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi yul na sems can yon tan gyi che ba nyid 'di lta bu dang ldan pa dag
302b5(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa ni/ bdag gi rnyed pa legs par rnyed lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa la/ rgyal po chen po khyod kyi yul na sems can yon tan gyi che ba nyid 'di lta bu dang ldan pa dag mang du gnas so//
302b6(dkon brtsegs): de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis nges pa la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ khyod kyis glengs pas kho bo'i nga rgyal nges bcom phyir// nges pa khyod mi ngo bo'i ston pa gnyis pa ste// rgyal
302b7(dkon brtsegs): srid 'di kun khyod sbyin kho bo dpung dang bcas// khyod kyi slob ma yin gyis khyod kyis bdag slobs shig/ kho bo yun ring dag tu nga rgyal gyis kyang bslus// sdig pa'i grogs po dag gis bskor cing
303a1(dkon brtsegs): bzung ba las// nges pa khyod nyid las ni chos 'di thos pas ma// rab tu bsdams te kho bos chos bzhin spyad par bya// khyim na gnas pa brgya phrag lnga po 'di dag ni// nor gyi ched du lo
303a2(dkon brtsegs): bos go rang bcug pa ste// kho bos thams cad gtang gis bde bar 'khod par gyis// phyin chad 'di 'dra ba dag kho bos yongs mi byed// lnga brgya btang bar gyur pa gang yin de dag kyang // des pa la ni zhes legs par
303a3(dkon brtsegs): bskyed nas kyang // sems ni skyo bar gyur kyang ci la'ang mi lta bar// bde ba thams cad mkhyed pa nyid du smon lam btab// nga ni dbul po ma yin khyod ni dbul po zhes// nges pa khyod kyis tshig 'di legs par smras pa ste/
303a4(dkon brtsegs): nges pa la ni gang zhig dngul po zhes brjod pa// mi de rgyal po'i khrims dang 'gal bar byed pa yin/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la// rigs kyi bu nges pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
303a5(dkon brtsegs): skye bo'i tshogs chen po 'dus pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das la blta bas chog ma 'tshal ba lags na/ bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du ci nas 'di dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba don mchis par gyur pa de lta de
303a6(dkon brtsegs): ltar 'di dag la legs par chos bstan du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nges pa rigs kyis bu chos bzhi dang ldan na// de bzhin gshegs pa legs par mthong ba yin no// bzhi gang zhe na/
303a7(dkon brtsegs): yid ches pa dang / dad pa dang / 'phangs par 'dzin pa dang / gus pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na// de bzhin gshegs pa legs par mthong ba yin no// gzhan yang bzhi ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
303b1(dkon brtsegs): gzugs kyi sku mthong ma// bdag kyang 'di 'dra bar gyur cig ces bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni slu bar mi mdzad pa'i phyir lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs
303b2(dkon brtsegs): su dag par sems skyed pa dang / sems can thams cad rton cing cher na rab tu grol bar bya ba'i phyir yang sems skyed pa dang // dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi 'chad par bya ba'i phyir dam pa'i chos yongs su
303b3(dkon brtsegs): bzung bar yang sems de skyed pa ste/ bzhi po de dag dang ldan na// de bzhin gshegs pa legs par mthong ba yin no// gzhan yang bzhi ste/ gzugs dben par mthong ba dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
303b4(dkon brtsegs): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dben par mthong ba dang / khams bzhinam mkha' dang 'dra bar mthong ba dang / skye mched grong stong pa lta bur mthong ba ste/ bzhi po de dag dang ldan na// de bzhin gshegs pa
303b5(dkon brtsegs): legs par mthong ba yin no// gzhan yang bzhi ste/ bdag med pa'i phyir bdag rnam par dag pa dang // sems can med pa'i phyir sems can rnam par dag pa dang / srog med pa'i phyir srog rnam par
303b6(dkon brtsegs): dag pa dang / gang zag med pa'i phyir gang zag rnam par dag pa ste/ bzhi po de dag dang ldan na// de bzhin gshegs pa legs par mthong ba yin no// gzhan yang bzhi ste/ lha'i mig mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang /
303b7(dkon brtsegs): shes rab kyi mig kun tu spyod pa dang / chos kyi mig gis so sor rtog pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyan rjes su rtogs par byed pa ste/ bzhi pa de dag dang ldan na// de bzhin gshegs pa legs par mthong ba yin no//
304a1(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang bzhi ste/ mi dmigs pa'i phyir tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su dag pa dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po yongs su dag pa dang /
304a2(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes khong du chud pa'i phyir shes rab kyi phung po yongs su dag pa dang / de'i rnam par grol ba mthong ba'i phyir rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phu po yongs su dag pa ste/
304a3(dkon brtsegs): nges pa rigs kyi bu chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ de bzhin gshegs pa legs par mthong ba yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo'i tshogs chen po de dag chos kyi gtam gyis
304a4(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par dga' bar mdzad nas/ ngad pa'i rgyal po ltar 'khor dang bcas te bar snang la gshegs so// de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis// rigs kyi bu nges pa la 'di skad
304a5(dkon brtsegs): ces smras so// des pa khyod nam de bzhin gshegs pa la ltar 'gro ba de'i tshe kho bo la'ang sbron cig dang / kho bo'ang de bzhin gshegs pa la ltar 'gro'o// nges pas smras pa/ rgyal po chen po de ltar bgyi'o//
304a6(dkon brtsegs): bdag ni khyod bud med dang / gzhon nu dang / blon po la sogs pa'i 'khor dang bcas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa gzigs su gshegs par 'tshal lo// rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bdag gcig
304a7(dkon brtsegs): bu la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa ma lags te// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'khor phal chen mdzes so// rgyal pos smras pa// des pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gang yin/ nges pas smras pa/
304b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chen po yongs su smin par bgyid dang / gdul ba'i slad du sems can thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so// rgyal po chen po gzhan yang theg pa gzhan la 'dod pa ma mchis pa'i slad du/
304b2(dkon brtsegs): gzhan dag kyang byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa'i byang chub kyi sems ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so// rgyal po chen po sems can g.yon can 'dul bar 'gyur nga'i lhag pa'i bsam pa ni byang chub
304b3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i 'khor lags so// rgyal po chen po phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba'i 'dun pa drag po ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so// rgyal po chen po sems can ser sna can yongs su smin par bgyid par
304b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba'i sbyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so// rgyal po chen po sems can tshul khrims 'tshal pa yongs su smin par bgyid par 'gyur ba'i tshul khrims ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so//
304b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chen po sems can gnod sems can yongs su smin par bgyid par 'gyur ba'i bzod pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so// rgyal po chen po sems can le lo can yongs su smin par bgyid par 'gyur
304b6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i brtson 'grus ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so// rgyal po chen po sems can sems rnam par g.yengs pa yongs su smin par dgyid par 'gyur ba'i bsam gtan ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags
304b7(dkon brtsegs): so// rgyal po chen po sems can 'chal pa'i shes rab can yongs su smin par bgyid par 'gyur ba'i shes rab ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so// rgyal po chen po sems can thams cad la sems snyoms
305a1(dkon brtsegs): / pa'i byams pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so// rgyal po chen po 'khor ba la yongs su mi skyo ba'i snying rje ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so// rgyal po chen po chos kyi kun
305a2(dkon brtsegs): bga' la dga' zhing mos pa'i dgab pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so// rgyal po chen po rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba spong ba'i btang snyoms ni byang chub sems dpa'i khor lags so// rgyal po
305a3(dkon brtsegs): chen po sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bgyid par 'gyur ba'i bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so// rgyal po chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyid par
305a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa sna tshogs sogs pa ni byang chub sems dpe'i 'khor lags so// rgyal po chen po bdud gyi las thams cad las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ba'i stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
305a5(dkon brtsegs): ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnams ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so// rgyal po chen po tshig btsun par 'gyur ba'i bden pa dang / mi rtsub pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so// rgyal
305a6(dkon brtsegs): po chen po spobs pa phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba'i mi 'phya ba dang // 'thing slad mi bgyid pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so// rgyal po chen po brjed ngas par mi 'gyur ba'i thos pa'i yod byed sogs
305a7(dkon brtsegs): pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so// rgyal po chen po thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ba'i slad du slob dpon dang mkhan po la gus pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so// rgyal po chen po dam
305b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba'i thos pa 'dzin pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so// rgyal po chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsnyen pa yang dag par 'dzin par 'gyur ba'i
305b2(dkon brtsegs): dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so// rgyal po chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i dben pa la gnas pa ni byang chub sems dpas
305b3(dkon brtsegs): 'khor lags so// rgyal po chen po sems can ma dad pa dad par 'gyur ba'i 'tsho ba yongs su dag pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so// rgyal po chen po byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sgrubs par
305b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba'i bag yod pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so// de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal dga' zhing mgu la yi rangs ste/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde bskyes nas/
305b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po la 'os pa'i ras bcos bu zung stong chos la dgab pa'i phyir nges pa la byin no// nges pas smras pa/ rgyal po chen po bdag la bkur sti dang mchod pa mdzad pas 'tshal to// gang gis bdag
305b6(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal bar 'gyur ba'i gos ras rul ba'i dum bu brgya btsems pa bdag la mchis kyis/ bdag ni bdag gir 'dzin pa dang bcas shing yongs su 'dzin pa dang bcas pa'i gros rnams mi 'tshal lo//
305b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chen po dpyid kyi dus na ras rul ba'i dum bu'i gos 'di shing gi yal ga la bkal te dgung gcig gam// dgung gnyis sam/ dgung bcu 'am/ dgung brgyar mchis kyang // de la su'ang len pa
306a1(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis shing / de la su'ang chags pa'i sems skyed pa ma mchis te/ bdag kyang de bor nas mi lta bar mchi ba'i dus de mchis so// rgyal po chen po bdag ni bdag gir 'dzin
306a2(dkon brtsegs): pra dang yongs su 'dzin pa dang bcas pa'i gos rnams mi 'tshal lo// rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpas ni gang la bdag nyid kyang 'dod pa spong bar 'gyur zhing / gzhan yang 'dod pa'i sems skyed par
306a3(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gos bcang bar bgyi'o// rgyal pos smras pa// nges pa gal te de ltar ras bcos bu zung 'di dag khyod mi len mkho bo la snying brtse ba'i phyir rkang pas rdzis shig/ nges pas lce de
306a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du bgyi'o zhes smras nas/ ras bcos bu zung de dag la rkang pas brdzis te song ngo // rgyal pos smras pa/ nges pa ras bcos bu zung khyod kyi rkang pa'i sman mar gyur pa 'di rnams ji ltar bya// des
306a5(dkon brtsegs): bas smras pa ka/ rgyal po chen po sems can dbul po gcer bu gos ma mchis pa gang lags pa de dag la stsal cig/ rgyal pos nges pa de ltar bya'o zhes smras nas/ rgyal po'i mi rnams la bsgo ste// de dag
306a6(dkon brtsegs): gis kyang ji skad bsgo ba bzhin du byas so// ras bcos bu zung de dag dbul po de dag gis bgos ma thag tu 'di snyam du sems bskyed de/ bdag cag gis nges pa la ji ltar lan blan par bya snyam pa las/ sangs
306a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / nges pa'i smon lam gyi stobs kyis// de dag gis bar snang las tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag thos so// 'dod pa bzhin du lan ni bla na bya ba// me tog dang ni spos dang byug pang/
306b1(dkon brtsegs): zas som nor rnams kyis kyang mi rus te// byang chub sems kyis nges pa dgapa par 'gyur// nges pa gos dang bas 'dod ma yin te// rnyed dang bkur sti grags pa 'dod pa 'in// nges bza
306b2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems las chos 'dod de// byang chub sems kyis nges pa dga' ba ste/ de nas dus gzhan zhig na rigs kyi bu nges pa dang / rgyal po gsal rgyal btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas
306b3(dkon brtsegs): blon po dang bcas/ 'khor dang bcas pa dang / mnyan yod kyi skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / srog chags brgya phrag mang po dag/ bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir rong
306b4(dkon brtsegs): / de nas mnyan yod dang rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi bar du lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'khor gyi khyams chen po bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa/ yangs shing mdze la rgyan thams cad kyis
306b5(dkon brtsegs): brgyan pa/ 'di lta ste/ dper na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi khang bzangs rnam par rgyal ba lta bu zhig sprul te/ dbus su shing yongs 'du sa ba rdol sprul to// yongs 'dus brtol gyi drung
306b6(dkon brtsegs): ru'ang / bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan seng ge'i khri bkru ba blta na sdug cing chu zheng gang pa la/ lha'i ras bcos bu brgya stong du ma bting ba mngon par sprul to// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stan drug
306b7(dkon brtsegs): khri dag kyang mngon par sprul te// lha ma yin gyi bu mo bde sogs la sogs pa lha'i bu mo khri nyis stong yang me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog 'phreng dang / byug pa dang / lha'i tsan dan gyi
307a1(dkon brtsegs): phye ma dag khyer nas sil snyan dang pheg rdob pa dag byed cing // nges pa'i g.yog bya ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi seng ge'i khri brgyan par byed do// de nas bcom
307a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis skye bo'i tshogs chen po de dag 'ong bar thugs su chud nas/ gtsug lag khang nas byung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' dang nyan thos rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing gdan bshams pa la zhugs
307a3(dkon brtsegs): so// de nas dri zi'i bu gtsug pud lnga pas lha'i bu mo nyi 'od la smras pa/ bzang mo tshur shog/ nges pa'i g.yog bya ba'i phyir rgyud kyi sgra dang glu'i sgra dbyangs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod
307a4(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o// de nas lha'i bu mo nyi 'od kyis lha'i bu mo lnga brgya tsam dang thabs cig tu rgyud kyi sgrar sbyar ba'i tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bstod pa/ khyod kyis bskal pa brgyar ni sngan chad dka' thub spyad// khyod
307a5(dkon brtsegs): ni bsdu ba dag dang dul dang sbyin la dgyes// khyod kyi sku gsung thugs rnams yongs su dag pa ste/ srid gsum 'jig rten b+h+ra ma la ni bdag phyag 'tshal// khyod ni tha ba mi mnga' bzod dang byams la dgyes/
307a6(dkon brtsegs): khyod ni brtson 'grus brtan dang stobs kyis pha rol gshegs// khyod ni bsam gtan blo dang tshul rnams snang la dgyes// dri ma gsum gyi nyes pa sel la bdag phyag 'tshal// khyod ni 'dod chags zhe sdang
307a7(dkon brtsegs): gti mug sel la dgyes// khyod kyi thugs ni zhi zhing snyoms la thugs rjer ldan// khyod ni yang dag gsung zhing dam pa'i don yang mkhyen// srid pa gsum po thar par mdzad la bdag phyag 'tshal// khyod ni
307b1(dkon brtsegs): mthong ba rnams kyi the tsom sel bar mdzad// khyod ni mthong ba rnams kyi skyon rnams mtha' dag sel// khyod ni mthong ba rnams la mchog tu dga' bar mdzad// bdag ni rgyal la srog gis skyabs su
307b2(dkon brtsegs): mchi bar bgyi// lha yi bu mo mchog ni 'dod chags chags gyur pa// gang gis mthong ba de yang chos la dga' bar 'gyur// dga' bas dran pa shin tu rgya chen thob 'gyur te// dga' bas sdug la
307b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa'i dga' dang bral bar 'gyur// mtshan mchog sum cu rtsa gnyis dag gi rgyan rnams kyis// legs par brgyan pa gsal ba'i yon tan mchog mnga' ba// gsung mchog mi yi dmi pa
307b4(dkon brtsegs): gsung ni rnam par dag/ mtshungs pa med pa'i 'od mnga' khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal// 'phags pa 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser mdog phyag mthil sdug/ thub pa'i sku stod seng ge'i 'dra zhing glang chen
307b5(dkon brtsegs): stabs// smin tshugs legs shing shangs legs tshems snyoms thags bzang mdzes// dpal gyi snying po shAkya thub mchog khyod la 'dud// rgyal ba yon tan brgya phrag dag gis rgyas gyur pa// bde
307b6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs shin tu dga' ba skyed mdzad bstod pa yi// bsod nams yon tan mtha' yas bsgrub pa gang lags pa// de yis 'dir ni 'jig rten sangs rgyas mnyam gyur cig/ de nas
307b7(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu nges pa skye bo'i tshogs chen po de dag gis yongs su bskor nas// bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu
308a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dug go// de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis/ rigs kyi bu nges pa la khri'u stan bzang po bdag nyid kyis byin te/ 'di la 'dug cig ces byas nas/ rigs kyi bu nges pa'i/
308a2(dkon brtsegs): stan bzang po de la 'dug go// rgyal po gsal rgyal ba khor dang bcas pa'ang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas rang rang gi bstan la 'khor ro// de na rigs kyi du gang dag gis// des
308a3(dkon brtsegs): pa sngon ma mthong ba de dag 'di skad du dbul po gos ngan pa gyon pa 'dri la 'di lta bur mchod pa byed do zhes 'dzer to// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// grogs
308a4(dkon brtsegs): po dag 'di la brnyas par ma byed cig/ rigs kyi bu 'di yon tan gyi che ba nyid ji snyed pa dang ldan pa de ni kho bo'i mngon sum du gyur to// grogs po dag khyer re zhig sdod cig dang / rigs kyi bu 'di'i yon tan gyi bkod
308a5(dkon brtsegs): pa mthong bar 'gyur ro// de nas rigs kyi bu nges pas/ lha'i bu de dag gi bsam pa rtogs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems can
308a6(dkon brtsegs): yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i bkod pa'i thabs dang / ye shes kyi bkod pa'i thabs bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sku las 'od phyung ste/ 'od des des
308a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i lus la reg nas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi gzugs kyi lus yongs su grub pa ci 'dra ba de las 'dum gyur pas kyang ches lhag par gyur to// de nas lha'i bu de dag ya mtshan du 'dzin par gyur te/ nges pa
308b1(dkon brtsegs): la me tog drug gis gtor to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rigs kyi bu nges pa la bka' stsal pa// nges pa gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje lta bu'i mthul gnas pa'i tshe'ang / sems can yongs su smir
308b2(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba'i phyir dman par ston cing dman pa'i mthu la gnas kyang // sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir mchog tu ston par byed pa 'di ni de'i dkod pa yin no// ye shes la gnas kyang mi shes par ston
308b3(dkon brtsegs): cing mi shes par ston kyang shes par snang ba 'di ni de'i bkod pa yin no// ye shes ma thob pa rnams la'ang lus kyi spyod pa dang / spyod lam gyis dad pa skyed par byed cing // ye shes thob pa rnams la'ang spyod
308b4(dkon brtsegs): pa thams cad yang dag par ston pas/ rdzu 'phrul ston par byed pa 'di ni de'i bkod pa yin no// rtag tu sems la dbang byed pas ngan cing dbul bar ston kyang // tshangs pas kyang mchod pa dang / mchog gi bkod pa
308b5(dkon brtsegs): la gnas kyang skye bo phal gyis kyang mchod pa 'di ni de'i bkod pa yin no// sems can bsdu ba'i phyir ngan cing dbul bar yang nye bar ston la/ sems can rnams la mngon par 'byung ba bskyed pa'i phyir longs
308b6(dkon brtsegs): spyod rgya chen po dang ldan yang mngon par 'byung ba ston pa 'dri ni de'i bkod pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
308b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dis rigs kyi bu nges pas ji srid cig nas byang chub kyi phyir spyad pa bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu nges pa ni sangs rgyas bye ba mang po la bsnyen bkur byas
309a1(dkon brtsegs): pa sngon gyi tshul phun sum tshogs pa/ bzod pa gsum thob pa/ spobs pa thob pa/ mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse bar byas pa/ sems can yongs su sbyin par bya
309a2(dkon brtsegs): ba la mkhas pa ste/ ngan cing dbul bas sems can rnams 'dul bar byed do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'dis ngan cing dbul ba 'dis sems can ji snyed cig btul lags/ bcom ldan
309a3(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis dka' stsal ba/ kun dga' bo lha'i bu 'bum phrag mang po dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas te/ mi rnams kyang de dang 'dra'o// kun dga' bos
309a4(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das ji srid cig na ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ 'di'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa rnams ni ci 'dra ba
309a5(dkon brtsegs): zhig tu 'gyur/ ming ni ji skad ces bgyi ba zhig tu 'gyur lags/ 6/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ sems can don la brtson
309a6(dkon brtsegs): dang brtul zhugs brtan pa dang // grags pa rgya chen dag gis bsam pa khyab byas dang // byang chub yon tan gnas pa'i spyod pa ci 'dra ba// ngas ni khyod la bshad kyis kun dga' khyod nyon cig
309a7(dkon brtsegs): 'di na rgyal la mchod mchog phyir ni gus byed cing // dam pa'i chos ni bsrung phyir rab tu brtson byed pa// nges pa yi ni spyod po'i rnam pa gang yin pa// de dag 'dir ni bzang bar nus par mi 'gyur ro//
309b1(dkon brtsegs): pha rol phyin pa 'di dag la ni legs par bsgrubs// mngon par shes pa dag gis sngan chad rtse bar byas// tshangs pa'i gnas rnams kyi ni mtha' mar phyin par song // thangs la mkhas pa'i spyod pa/
309b2(dkon brtsegs): dag la legs par bslabs// 'dir ni de yis 'dus byas skyon rnams legs par mthong // sangs rgyas byang chub kyang ni mngon sum gyur par byas// 'dis ni sems can ji lta ji ltar bar gyur pa'i//
309b3(dkon brtsegs): rnam par smin pa'i mtshan nyid la yang legs par bslabs// 'jig pa med cing blo dang rtogs dang dran dang ldan// spobs pa dang ni gzungs rnams dang yang ldan pa ste// bdud kyi lcags kyi nyon mongs
309b4(dkon brtsegs): rdzab las nges byung zhing // sangs rgyas spyod yul dron chen la ni rab tu gnas// 'jig rten chos rnams mang po dag gis ma gos la// chags pa la sogs rnams kyis brag ltar yongs mi
309b5(dkon brtsegs): g.yos// su yi drung du mi 'gro ring du byed pa'ang min// nam mkha' lta bur bcings dang grol ba med pa yin// snying rjes gnas shing sems can yongs su skyo ba med// shin tu bsdabs
309b6(dkon brtsegs): shing nem nur can la byams sems ldan// sems can kun la bdag dang 'dra bar sdug par lta// skyon la mi lta 'khrul pa dag dang ldan ma yin// ji ltar bstan pa bzhin du bsgrubs
309b7(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams la gnas// 'di ni ji skad smras pa bzhin du spyod par byed// chos nyid la ni chos kyi tshul gyis legs par bslabs// stong pa nyid la mos shing gnyis las rnam par grol/
310a1(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa gsum thob skye ba'i spyod yul ma yin te// sangs rgyas tshul dang yon tan dag la rab tu gnas// 'di ni 'jig rten gang du rgyu ba byed pa na// der ni skye bo mang po rnam
310a2(dkon brtsegs): par grol bar byed// sangs rgyas kyi ni sras 'di gang du gnas pa der// de bzhin gshegs pas yul ni stongs pa ma yin te// de la lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten ma lus pas// ji ltar sangs rgyas
310a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du 'di la gus par gyis// da ni mya ngan 'das nas nyams pa'i dus bab tshe// nges pa 'di ni sangs rgyas spyod pa spyad nas kyang // sngon chad gnas pa mngon par dga' ba'i 'jig rten khams// /
310a4(dkon brtsegs): mi 'khrugs 'jig rten nyid du phyir yang 'gro bar 'gyur// brten po srog chags rnams la phan par bya ba dang // zhing gi 'byor pa dag ni yongs su btsal ba dang // byang chub tu ni sems can yongs su smin
310a5(dkon brtsegs): bya'i phyir// bskal pa mangs med gsum du spyad pa spyod par byed// de yi 'og tu de ni skyob pa rgyal bar 'gyur// ming ni 'jig rten rgyal po dbang phyug ces kyang bya// de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs
310a6(dkon brtsegs): pa zhes bya ba yi// zhing dang de yi 'jig rten du ni mtshungs pa yin// 'jig rten khams de lags par sprul pa zhes bya ste// yon tan thams cad dang ni ldan par 'gyur ba yin// de yi tshe yi tshad
310a7(dkon brtsegs): ni lo khrir thub par 'gyur// de yi dge 'dun shin tu mang ste bgrang las 'das// nyan thos theg pa can gyi dge 'dun nyung bar 'gyur// phal cher byang chub don du brtson pa byas nas su// de dag thams cad
310b1(dkon brtsegs): ye shes stobs dang rdzu 'phrung ldan// rnam par thar pa rnams dang ldan zhing 'jig pa med// gcig tu nges par chos ni legs par bshad rnams kyis// 'jig rten khams der rtag tu sgra ched
310b2(dkon brtsegs): bsgrags par 'gyur// de na bdud rnams med cing srid par chags pa med// de dag thams cad yang dgra rig cing rnam par dag/ dade bar gshegs de yongs su mya ngan 'das gyur nas// lo ni
310b3(dkon brtsegs): durgyad cu dag las bzhi lhag rnams su yang // de yi dam pa'i chos ni rab tu spyod par 'gyur// de tshe de yi chos kyi tshul ni 'khrugs pa med// nges pa de yis gang dag yongs su smin byas pa/
310b4(dkon brtsegs): de dag byang chub bla na med pa'i don du spyod// ning der sems can gang dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba rnams// de dag thams cad skyon rnams dang ni bral ba yin/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
310b5(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu nges pa'i lung bstan pa baishar ma thag tu/ de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/ lha'i me tog dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / rgyan gyi
310b6(dkon brtsegs): char yang mngon par bang po// thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyis kya ba rang rang gi gos rnam rigs kyi bu nges pa la bkab bo// tshong dpon dang / khyim bdag dang / zam ze brgya drug mang po dag sa
310b7(dkon brtsegs): rab tu byung ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ nges pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag kyang legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu dbyung bar gsal// de nas bcos
311a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu nges pa'i mgo bo la phyag gis byugs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu nges pa'i mgo bo la reg ma thag tu/ gos ngur smrig bgos
311a2(dkon brtsegs): shing dge slong du snang bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' be la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo snyigs ma lnga po dus kyi snyigs ma dang /
311a3(dkon brtsegs): sems can gyi snyigs ma dang / zhing gi snyigs ma dang / tshe'i snyigs ma dang / nyon mongs pa'i snyigs pa'i dus su nga byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ der nges pas ji ltar 'dul ba las
311a4(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa gzhan gyis gdul bar mi bya'o// kun dga' bo nga ni 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du sangs rgyas kyi 'dul bas sems can rnams 'dul bar mi byed kyi// kun dga' bo nga ni ngan cing dbul ba dang /
311a5(dkon brtsegs): ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pas bsdigs pas sems can rnams 'dul bar byed do// kun dga' bo gal te 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir ngas sangs rgyas kyi yul gyis chos bstan cing / sangs rgyas kyi yul
311a6(dkon brtsegs): nye bar bstan du zin na// sems can gcig kyang 'dul bar mi 'gyur la/ chos kyang rtogs par mi 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo de lta bas na/ nga dang nges pa ji ltar 'dul bar byed pa de bzhin du khyod kyis kyang
311a7(dkon brtsegs): sems can gdul bar gyis shig/ kun dga' bo sems can dad pa can dang rtog pa mang ba dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos ma dad pa rnyed cing de bzhin du sgrub par
311b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / byang chub sems dpa' nges pa dang / byang chub sems dang ba de dag dang / dag slong /
311b2(dkon brtsegs): de dag dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin drang / rgyal po gsal rgyal dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gsungs pa la mngon par
311b3(dkon brtsegs): bstod // 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya pa las/ 'phags pa nges pas zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ 'dus pa nyi shu rtsa bdun pa rdzogs
311b4(dkon brtsegs): so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / su ren dra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
311b5(dkon brtsegs): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya bI ra dad ta pa ri prits+tsha na ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa dpal sbyin gyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo//
311b6(dkon brtsegs): bam po gcig pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal
311b7(dkon brtsegs): byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang dam bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang dang ldan
312a1(dkon brtsegs): par gyur pa/ sems shin tu rnam par grol ba// shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/ cang shes pa// glang po chen po// bya ba byas pa byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba// ba /
312a2(dkon brtsegs): gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa/ mngon par
312a3(dkon brtsegs): shes pa/ mngon par shes pa sha smug ste/ gang zag gcig ma gtogs pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'o// byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya thams cad kyang gzungs thong ba/ ting nge/
312a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin thob pa sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ re'i tshe grong khyer chen po mnyan yod na/ khyim bdag dpa' sbyin zhes bya ba phyug pa/ nor che ba/ bdag dngang ba mang ba/
312a5(dkon brtsegs): nor dang yo byad mang ba/ nor dang / 'bru dang / mdzod dang / bang ba'i tshogs mang ba/ glang po che dang / rta dang / rnga mo dang ra lug dang / ba glang mang ba/ zan po dang / za mo dang / las byed
312a6(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / zho shas 'tsho ba mang ba/ dbyig dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUr+Ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byu ru dang / sa le sbrum dang / dngul mang ba zhig gnas pade/
312a7(dkon brtsegs): khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam dang lhan cig tu 'dus te 'dug par gyur to// de dag 'dus te 'khod pa'i tshe/ bar skabs su 'di lta bu'i gtam brjod do// kye grogs po dag sangs rgyas
312b1(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba rnyed par dka'/ mir skye brnyed par dka'/ ral ba sum sum tshogs pa rnyed par dka'/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rang ba rnyed par dka'/ rab du 'byung ba rnyed par dka'/ dge
312b2(dkon brtsegs): skyong gi dngos po rnyed par dka'/ nan tan byed pa rnyed par dka'/ sems can gang dag byas pa gzo zhing / byas pa shes la/ gang dag byas pa chung ngu'ang chung mi gzon na// mang po ltan
312b3(dkon brtsegs): smos te/ de dag rnyed par dka'/ de bas kyang sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la yid ches pa de dag ches rnyed par dka'/ de bas kyang sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i
312b4(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa la yid ches nas/ nan tan gyis sgrud pa ches rnyed par dka'/ de bas kyang sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la mdzes pa de dag ches rnyed par dka'/ 'khor ba las grol
312b5(dkon brtsegs): brnyed par dka' na/ ci bdag cag nyan thos kyi theg pas yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya ba 'am/ 'on te rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas sam/ 'on te theg pa chen po bla na med pas yongs su bya
312b6(dkon brtsegs): ngan las bzla bar bya zhes 'thun par 'dus te/ 'khod pa de dag thams cad de lta bu'i dpyod pa skyes nas/ bdag cag theg pa chen po bla na med pas yongs su mya ngan las badz+ra dar bya ba ni mchog yin gyi/
312b7(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos kyi theg pas ni ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas ni ma yin no snyam mo// de nas khyim bdag dpa' sbyin// khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam de dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du/
313a1(dkon brtsegs): / bdar te/ lhan cig tu grong khyer chen po mnyan yod nas byung ste/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der
313a2(dkon brtsegs): song ste byin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mge bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
313a3(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen bzhin du/ khyim bdag dpa' sbyin dang / khyim dag lnga brgya tsam de dag la bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag rnams khyed don gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
313a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi thad du lhags/ de nas khyim bdag dpa' sbyin dang / khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam de dag stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la
313a5(dkon brtsegs): btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dus gcig cig na/ bdag cag khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam
313a6(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu 'dus te mchis par 'gyur nas/ de'i tshe bdag cag 'dus te mchis pa thams cad bar skabs su 'di lta bu'i bka' mchid brjod pa de byung ste/ kye grogs po rag sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnyed par dka'
313a7(dkon brtsegs): mir skye ba rnyed par dka'/ dal ba phun sum tshogs pa rnyed par dka'/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la dad pa rnyed par dka'/ rab tu 'byung ba rnyed par dka'/ dge slong gi dngos po rnyed par dka'/
313b1(dkon brtsegs): nan tan byed pa rnyed par dka'/ sems can gang dag byas pa gzo zhing byas pa shes la/ gang dag byas pa chung ngu'ang chung mi gsonan/ mang po lta ci smos te/ de dag rnyed par dka'/ de bas kyang sems can/
313b2(dkon brtsegs): gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la yid ches pa de dag ches rnyed par dka'/ de bas kyang sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la yid ches nas/ nan tan gyis sgrub pa de dag
313b3(dkon brtsegs): ches rnyed par dka'/ de bas kyang sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la mdzes pa de dag ches rnyed par dka'/ 'khor ba las grol ba rnyed par dka' na/ cing bdag cag nyan thos kyi theg
313b4(dkon brtsegs): pas yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya 'am/ 'on te rang sangs rgyas kyi theb pas sam/ 'on te theg pa chen po bla na med pas yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya zhes mchid bgyis so// bcom ldan 'das deg
313b5(dkon brtsegs): tshe na bdag cag thams cad 'di lta bu'i rtog pa skyes te/ bdag cag theg pa chen po bla na med pas yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya ba ni mchog lags kyi/ nyan thos kyi theg pas ni ma lags/ rang sangs rgyas
313b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi theg pas ni ma lags pa snyam bgyid de/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag chos kyi skyes 'di dang chas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi thad du mchis na
313b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal bas ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ bde bar gshegs pa ji
314a1(dkon brtsegs): ltar bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar gnas par bgyi/ ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ khyim bdag dpa' sbyin dang / khyim bdag lnga rgya /
314a2(dkon brtsegs): de dag la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ khyim bdag rnams legs so legs so// khyim bdag rnams khyed 'di ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs nas/ de bzhin
314a3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi thad du lhags pa khyed yang legs so// khyim bdag rnams de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang / byang chub sems
314a4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang brgya par 'dod pas ji ltar bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar gnas par bya ba dang / ji ltar bsgrub par
314a5(dkon brtsegs): bya ba ngas khyed la bshad do// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol te/ khyim bdag dpa' sbyin dang / khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam de dgra bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom
314a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khyim bdag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
314a7(dkon brtsegs): rgya bar 'dod pas/ sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed par bya/ kun tu bstan par bya/ nges par bsten par bya/ bsgom par bya/ mang du bya'o// khyim bdag rnams byang chub
314b1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des lus la chags par mi bya/ srog la chags par mi bya/ de bzhin du me dang / 'ju dang / khyim dang / chung ma dang / bu dang / bu mo rnams la chags par ri
314b2(dkon brtsegs): bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / bgo nga dang / bzhon pa dang / mal cha dang kame tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / 'phreng du rnams la chags par mi r+ya/ yo byad thams cad la
314b3(dkon brtsegs): chags par mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ khyim bdag rnams sems can dag ni phal cher lus dang sog la chags par gyur nas/ sdig pa'i las rnams byed de/ de dag sdig pa'i las byas shing
314b4(dkon brtsegs): bsags pa des ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye'o// sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed de/ lus dang srog la ma chags par byas na bde
314b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gro rnamasu skye'o// khyim bdag rnams de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs pas 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/ sems can
314b6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed de lus la chags par mi bya/ srog la chags par mi bya/ de bzhin du nor dang / 'bru dang / khyim dang / chung ma dang / bu dang / bu mo rnams la chags par mi bya/
314b7(dkon brtsegs): bza' pa dang / btung ba dang / dgo ba dang / bzhon pa dang / mal cha dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa rnams la chags par mi bya/ yo byad thams cad la chags par mig
315a1(dkon brtsegs): bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtang bar yongs su gtang ba mang ba dang / rnam par smin pa la re ba med par bya/ tshul khrims rnam pa gsum yongs su dag par tshul khrims kyi sdom
315a2(dkon brtsegs): pa la gnas par bya/ sems can thams cad kyis nyes pa byas pa la ji mi snyam par bzod pa dang / nges pa phun sum tshogs par bya/ lus dang srog la mi lta bar brtson 'grus kyi go cha chen po bgo bar bya//
315a3(dkon brtsegs): rnam par mi g.yeng ba'i sems rtse gcig tu bya/ bdag dang / sems can dang / srog dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed las skyes pa dang / shed bur lta ba dang thal bar shes rab kyis/
315a4(dkon brtsegs): rnam par dpyad pa la mkhas par bya/ des sbyin pa sbyin pa na/ sems can thams cad yid la byas te/ sbyin pa sbyin par bya/ sems can thams cad yid la byas te/ tshul khrims bsrung bar bya/ sems /
315a5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad yid la byas te/ bzod pa bsgom par bya/ sems can thams cad yid la byas te/ brtson 'grus brtsam par bya/ sems can thams cad yid la byas te/ bsam gtan la mnyam parda gzhag par bya/
315a6(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad yid la byas te/ shes rab bsgom par bya/ sems can thams cad yid la byas te/ thabs la mkhas pa la bslab par bya'o// de nas khyim bdag dang ba byin dang
315a7(dkon brtsegs): khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam de dag gis// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni lus la lta zhing gnas pa lags/ srog la lta zhing gnas pa lags/ de bzhin du nor dang /
315b1(dkon brtsegs): 'bru dang / khyim dang / chung ma dang / mu dang / bu mo rnams la lta zhing gnas pa lags/ bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / dgo ba dang / bzhon pa dang / mal cha dang / me tog dang / spos dang / bdug pa
315b2(dkon brtsegs): 'brang ba dang / byug pa rnams la lta zhing gnas pa lags/ yo byad thams cad la smra zhing gnas pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' so sor tog cing lus la mi lta ba lags/ 'des/
315b3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa ji ltar srog pa mi lta ba lags/ de bzhin du nor dang / 'bru dang / khyim dang / chung ma dang / bu dang / bu mo rnams la mi lta ba lags/ bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / bgo ba dang / bzhon pa dang /
315b4(dkon brtsegs): mal cha dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa rnams la mi lta ba lags/ yo byad thams cad la mi lta ba lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/
315b5(dkon brtsegs): bdag dpa' byin dang / khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam de dag la 'dri skad ces bka' stsal to// khyim bdag rnams 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lus 'di la rnam pa du mar so sor brtag
315b6(dkon brtsegs): bar bya'o// rnam pa du ma gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus 'di mthar gyis grub pa dang / mthar gyis 'jig pa dang / rdul phra rab bsags pa dang / khong stong dang / gye gu can dang / Tag dgu dang / sru'i
315b7(dkon brtsegs): khung bu nas zag pa dang / grog mkhar ltar sprul gdug pa'i gnas su gyur pa dang / sprul gdug pa ltar byas pa mi gzo ba dang / ma skyes dgra'i spre'u ltar grogs la 'khu ba dang / bshes gnyen ngan pa
316a1(dkon brtsegs): ltar 'dring pa'i bdag nyid can dang / lbu ba rdos pa ltar rang bzhin gyis nyam chung ba dang / chu'i chu bur ltar byung nas 'jug cing 'jub dang / smig rgyu ltar sru ba'i bdag nyid can dang /
316a2(dkon brtsegs): chu shing ltar bshig na snying po med pa dang / sgyu ma lhur slu ba'i bdag nyid can dang / rgyal po lhur bsgo drug mang ba dang / dgra ltar glags lta ba dang / rkun po ltar yid brdzun du mi rung ba dang / gsheg ma ltar
316a3(dkon brtsegs): rjes su chags pa med pa dang / mi mdza' ba ltar mi phan par 'dod pa dang / gsod pa ltar shes rab kyi srog gi bar chad byed pa dang / phyir rgol ba ltar dge ba'i phyogs kyi chos kyi ngar chad byed pa dang / grong
316a4(dkon brtsegs): stong lngar bdag dang bral ba dang / rdza mkhan gyi snod ltar mthar 'jig pa dang / rdzang lhar mi gtsang ba sna tshogs kyi yongs su gang ba dang / sbrang ma'i snod ltar mi gtsang ba zag pa dang / sbrul dang / mi dang /
316a5(dkon brtsegs): khyi'i ro ltar dri mi zhim pa dang / ngan skyugs kyi khung ltar mi gtsang ba'i 'byung gnas dang / rma ltar bskyod mi bzod pa dang / zug rngu ltar gnod pa'i bdag nyid can dang // je bo sdang ba ltar bsnyen par dka' ba dang /
316a6(dkon brtsegs): khang rnying ltar bcos legs byas shing brten pa dang / gru rnying ltar bcos legs bya zhing spyad pa dang / bum pa so ma btang ba ltar nan tan gyis bag bya dgos pa dang / grogs po mi bsrun pa ltar rtag tu rjes su bsrus
316a7(dkon brtsegs): dgos pa dang / chu 'gram gyi shing ltar g.yo zhing 'gul ba dang / chu klung chen po'i rgyun ltar mthar 'chi ba'i rgya mtsho la thug pa dang / gro bur ba'i khyim ltar sdug bsngal thams cad kyi gnas su gyur pa dang
316b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gron po med pa'i gnas khang ltar yongs su 'drang ba med pa dang / btson srungs ltar gsug gis bsgrub par drang dang / mtha' 'khob kyi grong khyer ltar rtag tu gnod pa 'byung ba dang / rtse ma'i grong khyer
316b2(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu 'jig pa'i bdag nyid can dang / me ltar chog mi shes pa dang // rgya mtsho ltar dgang dka' ba dang / sbrul gyi gzeb ltar nan tan gyis ngag bya ba dang / byis pa chung ngu ltar rtag tu yongs su bsrung dgos pa
316b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / snod chag pa ltar rtag tu bag bya dgos pa dang / yul dran pa ltar rtag tu gnod pa 'byung ba dang / zas dug can ltar rtag tu yongs su spang bar bya ba dang / re zhig dgos pa'i phyir sdod brnyan ma lta
316b4(dkon brtsegs): bu dang / khur bkur ba'i phyir shing rta bu yin pa 'ba' zhig tu blos gzung bar bya'o// khyim bdag rnams gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas lus 'di thog ma dang tha ma'i rgyu la so sor brtag
316b5(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o// pha ma'i khu chu dang khrag 'dus pa las 'byung ste/ 'di la khu chu dang khrag ni lus kyi thog ma'i rgyu yin no// tha ma'i rgyu ni zas 'ju ba la sogs pa ste/ kham gyis bzab pa'i zas rjes ma thag tu bang
316b6(dkon brtsegs): kan gyi gnas su 'gre'o// bad kun gyi gnas su phyin nas/ bar kan gyis rgyang rgyang por byas te shin tu mi gtsang bar 'gyur ro// de'i 'og tu mkhris pa'i gnas su 'gro ste/ mchis pa'i gnas su phyim nas
316b7(dkon brtsegs): zhu zhing skyur por 'gyur te/ rlung gi gnas su 'gre'o// zhu ste rlung gi gnas su phyin nas rlung gis tshigs ma logs shig/ dngas ma logs shig tu rnam par 'byed de/ tshigs ma las ni gcin dang ngan
317a1(dkon brtsegs): #skyugs la sogs te dri ma rnams 'byung / rangs ma las ni khrag tu 'gyur te/ khrag las sha'o// sha las tshal lo// tshil las rus pa'o// rus pa las rkang ngo // nang las
317a2(dkon brtsegs): khu chu'o// khu chu las lus 'di lta ste/ de ltar thog ma dang tha ma'i rgyu mi gtsang ba'i phyir lus mi gtsang bar byang chub sems dpas bsam par bya'o// lus la mi gtsang bar lta ba na/ byang chub sems
317a3(dkon brtsegs): dpas 'di snyam du bsam par bya ste/ lus shes bya ba 'di ni rus pa sum brgya drug cus khog pa bslang ba/ shing ngan pa'i khyim ltar tshigs sum brgyas sbyar ba/ rtsa'i dra ba bzhi brgyas glags pa/ sha swar
317a4(dkon brtsegs): tshad lnga brgyas g.yogs pa/ sdom rtsa drug gis khebs pa rtsa bdun brgyas gang ba/ rgyas pa bdun brgyas sbrel pa/ chu bcu drug brtan pa/ chub gnyis kyis khyab par dkris pa/ rgyu ma 'dom phyed dang
317a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhis nang rol byas pa/ long ka dang / pho ba dang 'brel ba'i gnye ma rim pa cu drug tu 'khyil ba/ rtsa bran nyis stong lnga brgyas skar khung byas pa gshis brgya rtsa bdun gyis snod chag bltar shig shig/
317a6(dkon brtsegs): por gyur pa/ spu'i khung du bye ba brgya stong phrag brgyad cus rtsa lngar khengs pa/ dbang po lnga'i bu ga dgu yod pa/ gnas bdun dang ldan pa/ mi gtsang bas yongs su gang ba/ klad pa snyim pa gang dang /
317a7(dkon brtsegs): tshil snyim pa gang dang / zhag snyim pa gsum dang / bad kan snyim pa drug dang / mkhris pa snyim pa drug dang / rlung gi mtha' dag drangs pa dang / khrag ze gang dang / ngan skyugs phul gang dang / de dag
317b1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyis dang ba bar char can ltar so sor yongs su gad nga/ pags pa rim pa bdun gyis kun nas bskor ba/ re dzong drug gis gso ba lus kyi me la ngan skyugs kyi sbyin sreg byed pa/ cag tu mthar/
317b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dzag pa/ lus kyi yan lag de dag thams cad kyis dalta na mi sdug pa/ dri ba rnag gi rang bzhim yin na/ 'di la su zhig gus pa byed de/ skad cig dgos pa'i phyir snod brnyan ma tsam du rang ba dang /
317b3(dkon brtsegs): khur bskur ba'i phyir shing rta lnga bu 'ba' zhig yin par chos kyi blos gzung bar bya'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ 'di ltar mi gtsang phung po'i lus la ni// gzugs mngon nga rgyal can
317b4(dkon brtsegs): gang gus byed pa// byis pa'i blo can de ni mngon bzhin du// mi shes ngan skyugs bum pa thogs shing 'gro// de yi sA nas rnag pa 'dzag/ kha nas dri mi zhim pa rtag tu 'byung // mi sdug chags
317b5(dkon brtsegs): shing skye bo'i srin bu can// de la su zhig chags shing gus par byed// dper na byis pa sol ba thogs nas su// 'di ni dkar po bya zhes bdar byed kyang // dkar po'i dngos por mi 'gyur zad
317b6(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur// byis blo byin ci log gi nga rgyal tsam// de ltar mi gang gtsang sbra'i blo gros can// nga yis lus 'di gtsang mar b+ha zhes te// bskus phyir 'dab stegs brgyar ni khrus byas kyang /
317b7(dkon brtsegs): 'ching dag dbang gis zad 'gyur gtsang mi 'gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang / khyim bdag dpa' byin dang / khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam de dag la dka' stsal pa/ khyim
318a1(dkon brtsegs): bdag rnams 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/ rnam pa bzhi brgya
318a2(dkon brtsegs): rtsa bzhis lus la brtag par bya ste/ rnam pa bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ khyim bdag rnams 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ lus yid du mi 'ong ba dang / rang
318a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gyis mi mthun pa ste/ smad par brtag par bya// byang chub sems dpas lus rnab zag pa ste/ dri mi zhim par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus thamar 'jig pa ste/ snying po med
318a4(dkon brtsegs): par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus rgyas pa'i 'og res sbrel ba ste/ nyam chung bar brtag par bya// byang chub sems dpas lus mi gtsang ba zag pa ste/ mi gtsang bar brtag par bya/
318a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpas lus yang dag pa ma yin pa ste/ sgyu ma lta bur brtag par bya// byang chub sems dpas lus skye bo mi mkhas pa byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams 'khrul par byed par brtag par
318a6(dkon brtsegs): bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus 'jig pa dang / bu ga dgu'i sgo nas 'dzag par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus 'dod chags kyi mes kun tu 'bar bar brtag par bya/ byang chub
318a7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpas lus zhe sdang gi mes tshig par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus gti mug gi mes me lce gcig tu gyur par brtag par bya// byang chub sems dpas lus 'dod chags
318b1(dkon brtsegs): dang zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams kyis ljongs par brtag par bya// byang chub sems dpas lus 'dod chags kyi drangs khebs shing sred pa'i dra bar chung par dag par bya// byang chung sums dpa
318b2(dkon brtsegs): lus kun nas bu gas yongs su gang bas/ bu ga'i gnas su brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus nang brgya rtsa bzhis gtses par brtag par bya// byang chub sems dpas lus srin du'i rigs
318b3(dkon brtsegs): brgyad khri bzhi stong gi gnas su brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus 'chi ba'i chos nyid yin pas mi rtag par brtag par bya// byang chub sems dpas lus chos la rmongs pas bems po yin pa
318b4(dkon brtsegs): brtag par bya// byang chub sems dpas lus mthar gyis grub cing tha mar 'jig pas bum pa lta bur brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus mya ngan gyi gnod pa mang pos gang bas nyam thag par
318b5(dkon brtsegs): brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus mthur rga shir 'gyur bas rton pa med par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus g.yo dang sgyu'i nye bar spyod pa dag gis glags par brtag par bya/ byang
318b6(dkon brtsegs): chub sems rabs lus dbang dka' bas sa'i gting lta bur brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus dga' ba'i gzug dang bde ba'i gzugs la zhen pas me lta bur brtag par bya/ byang chub
318b7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpas lus 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag gis chog mi shes par brtag par bya// byang chub sems dpas lus rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba dag gis 'jom par brtag par bya// byang
319a1(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpas lus bsti stang dang gnod pa myong bas mi brtan par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus chu klung gi rgyun bzhin du gzhan dang gzhan 'byung brkyen
319a2(dkon brtsegs): gzhan dang gzhan du brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus tshul bzhin ma yin pa rnam pa sna tshogs yid la byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa dag gis yid kyis sems pa yin par brtag par bya// byang chub
319a3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpas lus tha mar dur khrod la thug pas byas pa mi gze bar brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus spyad ki dang / ce spyang dang / khyi rjen sha za ba gzhan gyi zas su brtag par bya/ byang chub
319a4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpas lus rus pa dang rgyus pa'i 'og res sbrel bas 'khrul 'khor lta bur brtag par bya// byang chub sems dpas lus bshang ba dang / gci ba dang / mchil ma dang / snabs dang / rnag dang /
319a5(dkon brtsegs): khrag gis yongs su gang ba ste/ blta ba'i 'os ma yin par brtag par bya// byang chub sems dpas lus zas dang skom las byung ba ste/ rang gi kha na las pas yin par brtag par bya/ byang chub
319a6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpas lus mi rtag ste shin tu zad pa'i chos nyid yin pas/ don med pa'i glag bla glags par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus phyir rgol ba mang po 'byung bas dgra lta bur brtag par bya/
319a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpas lus yang dang yang sdug bsngal myong bas gsod pa lta bur brtag par bya'o// byang chub sems dpas lus sdug bsngal gsum gyis gtses te// gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
319b1(dkon brtsegs): 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal nyid dang / 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal nyid dang / sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal nyid kyis te/ sdug bsngal gyi snong yin par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus phung po lnga mngon par
319b2(dkon brtsegs): zung bas sdug bsngal gyi gong du yin par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus rkyen tha dad pas byung bas // bdag med pa dang bdag po med par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus skyes pa/
319b3(dkon brtsegs): dang bud med dang bral bas srog med par brtag par bya// byang chub sems dpas lus phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams kyis stong par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus rmi lam
319b4(dkon brtsegs): lta bu ste/ gsog tu brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus sgyu ma lta bu ste/ yang dag pa ma yin par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus smig rgyu lta bu ste/ 'khrul par byed par brtag/
319b5(dkon brtsegs): bar bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus drag cha lta bu ste/ smra dar brtag par bya// byang chub sems dpas lus mig yor lta bu ste/ slu ba'i bdag nyid du brtag par bya ste/ khyim bdag rnams
319b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi po de dag gis lus la sags bya'o// de ltar rtag pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus la lus su bdun pa dang /
319b7(dkon brtsegs): lus la dga' ba dang / lus bdag gir byed pa dang / lus la sred pa dang / lus la gnas pa dang / lus la zhen pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad spong ngo // srog la srog tu 'dun
320a1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / srog la dga' ba dang / srog bdag gir byed pa dang / srog la sred pa dang / srog la zhen pa gang yin pa dang / de bzhin du nor dang / 'bru dang / khyim dang / chung mad/
320a2(dkon brtsegs): du dang / bu mo dang / bza' ba dang / btung nga dang / dgo ba dang / bzhon pa dang / mal cha dang / me tog dang A bdug pa dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa rnams dang / yo byad thams ca/
320a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi bar dag la 'dun pa dang / dga' ba dang / bdag gir byed pa dang / sred pa dang / gnas pa dang / zhen pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad spong ste/ de lus dang sreg la mi lta'o//
320a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du nor dang / 'bru dang / khyim dang / chung ma dang / bu dang / bu mo dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / bgo ba dang / bzhon pa dang / mal cha dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / 'phreng
320a5(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / byug pa rnams la mi lta bar pha rol tu phyin pa drug myur du yongs su rdzogs par byed do// khyim bdag rnams byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su
320a6(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs nas/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lus rgya cher yongs su bstan pa'i
320a7(dkon brtsegs): phyir// de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa de dag bka' stsal to// mi rnyed shin tu rnyed dka' rnyed pa la// lus kyi phyir ni sdig pa ma byed cig/ 'di ni dur khrod pa ste ce spyang zas// lus kyi phyir ni ya ngang ma 'jug
320b1(dkon brtsegs): cig g.yo ldan lus la sred pa bskyed nas ni// byis pa rtag tu rnam par rmongs te 'khyam// lus 'di byas pa mi gzo dngos yin pas// nyin dang mtshan du sdug bsngal tshor ba myong // rtag
320b2(dkon brtsegs): nad 'dra sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor te// lus 'di ngan skyugs rnams dang mchil mas gang // bkres dang sgom pas rtag tu mngon par gtses// mkhas pa su zhig lus la sred pa skyod// lus
320b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di sa gting 'dra ste chog mi shes// gshed ma mi mdza' 'dra yang byis pas gso// lus kyi ched du sdig pa'i las kyang byed// de phyir de dag sdug bsngal tshor ba skyed// lus 'di rdo rje lta bur snga ma
320b4(dkon brtsegs): yin// lus kyi ched du sdig pa ma byed cig/ 'chi bar rtogs nas bsod nams myur du byos// de bzhin sangs rgyas bstan la dad pa skyed// zas dang skom dang byug pa gos rnams kyis// lus 'di ji
320b5(dkon brtsegs): srid yun ring bsnyen bkur te// brtan par byas kyang 'jig par 'gyur yin na// 'di la 'bad pa don med ci phyir bya// bskal pa ngargyar yang shin tu rnyed par dka'// thub pa 'byung 'di khyed kyis rnyed pa la/
320b6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bstan la de bzhin dngad pa skyed// shin tu 'jigs pa'i ngan 'gror ma 'gro zhig/ le stong bye badra su zhig 'tsho gyur pa// des kyang chags pa yongs su spang byan// su zhig long rgya zung bar mi 'gyur/
320b7(dkon brtsegs): ba de phyir dga' ba mi rnyed smos ci dgos// ma bsdams mi rnams kha cig 'di skad du// mi rnyed shin tu dka' ba rnyed pa la// gzhon tshe rtsed mo dag dang dga' bya zhing // nor btsal bde ba myong bas
321a1(dkon brtsegs): bya zhes zer // nor tshol ba la bde bag la yod// bsrung ba'i phyir yang sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur// de phyir mkhas pas chags pa yongs spangs la// ngan ngon tsam gyis
321a2(dkon brtsegs): chog shes thob par byos// longs spyod sgyu ma 'dra zhing rmi lam mtshungs// 'di dag byis pa'i skye bo 'drid pa yin// skad cig 'byung zhing skad cig 'jig par 'gyur// mkhas pa su zhig longs
321a3(dkon brtsegs): spyod sred pa skyed// sgyu ma 'dra zhing gang mkhan lha dang mtshungs// dri za'i grong khyer sna tshogs ci 'dra ba// longs spyod de dag 'di 'dra byis pa 'drid// de ltar log pa tshol zhing byis pa 'khyam//
321a4(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal brgya yis longs spyod btsal btsal ba// lus la gnod pa mtshungs med bskyed byas nas// rgyal po'i mthu yis de dag phrogs gyur pa// de dag la ni mkhas gang dga' ba skyed// bu dang
321a5(dkon brtsegs): chung ma'i dbang du mi 'gyur bar// rgyal po nyes pa byung ba'i nor phrogs pa// nyes pa 'di 'dra de dag rig nas su// mkhas pa rnams ni khyim la sred mi skyed// rtag tu brlad cing longs spyod tshol
321a6(dkon brtsegs): byed pa// de ni pha dang ma la mi gus shing // bu drang chung ma las yang mi byams par// de dag rtag tu chags la 'jug par byed// bdag gi longs spyod 'grib par 'gyur 'ong zhes// brnab mo byas/
321a7(dkon brtsegs): gzo nams kyang rnyed mi 'gyur// g.yo dang sgyus ni nor rnams tshol byed pa// brnab mo dag la mkhas pa yid mi rton// sems can brnang mo g.yo ldan 'dring pa nyid// yid gzhan sems la tshig gis
321b1(dkon brtsegs): dga' bar byed// yid brtan kyang ni de la yid mi rten// 'on kyang bu 'drar sdug par ston par byed// sems can brnab mo 'jig rten gang rgyu ba// sman dang bstan bcos dag la mkhas ston cing /
321b2(dkon brtsegs): smad 'tshong lta bur tshig gis 'drid byed la// khong nas mi bde shin tu rtsub pa yin// brnab me dgra la mdza' bo rnams kyang med// nye du med cing snying sdebs grogs kyang med// 'on kyang de dag nor
321b3(dkon brtsegs): phyir sten par byed// skye bo brna ba la mkhas pa yid mi rton// brnab mo longs spyod ched du bya min byed// shin tu mi bzad sems ni kun tu skyed// de phyir mkhas pas yang dag rtogs byas la//
321b4(dkon brtsegs): ngan don ci yang rung bas chog shes kyis// gser dang mu tig nor bu byu ru dang // las dgras de dag lbu ba las kyang 'byung // de dag sgyu ma'i rang bzhin ma rtogs nas// de dag phyir ni 'thab
321b5(dkon brtsegs): cing rtsod par byed// byams pa zhes bya gang zhig 'dir 'byung ste// de bzhin gshegs pa de ni 'byung ba'i tshe// sa 'di gser gyis rab tu gang bar 'gyur// de yi tshe na de ni ga las 'byung // 'dod
321b6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i yon tan lnga dag slu ba ste// brdzun pa'i chos can 'khrul byed rmongs par byed// dper na sos ka'i nyi ma gung dus ma// smig rgyu chur snang 'dod pa de bzhin no// bskal pa gcig lon nas ni
321b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten 'di// nam mkha'i rang bzhin nam mkhar 'gyur bar 'ong // lhun po dag kyang tshig cing rnam par 'jig/ de dag gang nas 'ongs shing gang du 'gro// chu mig mtshe'u dang rdzing dang rgya mtsho
322a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams// de dag med 'gyur ba skams 'gyur 'byung bar 'gyur// de bzhin 'dod pa gsog ste snying po med// mkhas pa gang dag de la dga' bar byed// mkhas pa su
322a2(dkon brtsegs): zhig blo yi stobs ldan pa// de dag rtag tu khyim gyi skyon la rtog/ 'di la re myong byed pa su yod na// 'di dag ci phyir khyim ni spyong mi byed// 'dren ma'i las kyis longs spyod tshol byed cing /
322a3(dkon brtsegs): bu dang de bzhin chung ma gas bar byed// shin tu sdug bsngal gyur pa de dug na// bu dang chung ma skyabs su 'gyur ma yin// ji ltar sna tshogs las byas blangs pa bzhin// bu dang chung ma dag kyang
322a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dod bar 'gyur// bdag nyid gcig pus sdug bsngal myong bar 'ong // de dag de tshe bdag gi skal mi len// mi ngan rnams kyis bde phyir de dag blangs// 'di ni de dag sdug bsngal mya ngang
322a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// srid gsum 'jigs pa 'di ni bshes kyang med// de bzhin bu dang chung ma rtsa lag med// pha ma sman dang bu dang chung ma dang // zan dang nor dang rtsa lag tshogs kyi rnams// shi
322a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i ga shin phyir de dag 'gro ba med // las rnams rjes su 'drang zhing byis pa 'amo// las ni rjes su 'brang zhing mi kun 'dod // las kyi gnas pa'i 'jig rten rnams su rgyu// skye 'di las
322a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi bdag nyid rig gyur nas// mkhas pa dag ni dge ba'i las rnams byed// mnar med song tshe de dag skyabs min pas// pha ma spun dang snying sdug pu rnams dang // rtsa la gnye du sdug
322b1(dkon brtsegs): gi gAny+dzan mtshams dang // de dag ched du mkhas pa sdig mi byed// las de yongs su zad pa ma gtogs par// rab tu mi bzad 'jigs lnga mi mi 'grol// de phyir sdig pas 'jigs
322b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i mi rnams kyis// bsgrims te sdig pa yongs su spang dar bya// ji ltar las rnams byas pa ma gtogs par// gshin rje dang ni gshin rje'i rang rta dang // mdza' bshes dag dang rtswa lag
322b3(dkon brtsegs): tshogs dang spun// pha ma bu dang chung ma srung mi byed// khyod kyis mi yi lus ni thong gyur la// thong nas sdig pa spang bar ma byas pas// kye ma da ltar sdug bsngal mi bzad myong // 'di ni mi
322b4(dkon brtsegs): dge'i las kyi rnam smin yin// las kyi rnam par smin la yid ma ches// khyod ni rang gi sems kyis mi dge byas// 'di la ngas ni ci yang ma lan zhes// de la chos rgyal gshin rje ska
322b5(dkon brtsegs): smra/ rang gis las byas rang la rnam par smin// rang gi las kyis khyod ni 'dir 'ongs kyis// ji ltar sngon chad mi 'dod las byas pa// sdug bsngal de ni nyid kyis myong bar gyis// de tshe pha ma
322b6(dkon brtsegs): rang gi chung ma rnams// sdug bsngal nyen pa yongs su thar mi byed// legs pa'i lus byas pas ni grol bar 'gyur// de ltas khyim ni yongs su spang bar bya// khu sgo dbyug pa lhung gi chad pa
322b7(dkon brtsegs): rnams// su zhig spong 'dir zhi ba don gnyer bas// khyim la 'jigs par bgyis te par byos la// 'jig rten mkhas pa'i bstan la chos spyod cig/ khyim ni rab babar sdug bsngal mang
323a1(dkon brtsegs): po'i rtsa// sems las byung ba rnams kyis rtag tu 'bar// me mur 'obs 'dra 'jigs par byed pa la// mkhas pa su zhig de la sred pa skyed// khyim gnas bu dang /
323a2(dkon brtsegs): chung ma'i mya ngan byed// khyim gnas de bzhin longs spyod mya ngan byed// nyes pa 'di dang gzhan yang dpag med de// de ltas khyim ni yongs su spang bar bya// 'dren pa rnams kyi bstan la dga' byed pa/
323a3(dkon brtsegs): ma brtab ma rmos bde dang yid bde'i rgyu// sdug bsngalo mang po'i rtsa ba khyim 'di la// blun po dga' yi mkhas pa gzhar mi dga'// pags pa chu rgyus sha dang rus pa'i lus// 'di ni nga yi
323a4(dkon brtsegs): chung ma 'du shes bskyed// byis pa rmongs pa 'dod chags skyed par byed// bud med sgyu ma lta bur yong ma shes// shes rab ldan pas khyim gyi nyes rig nas// de phyir 'dod pa'i dga' ba kun sbas te/
323a5(dkon brtsegs): chos la sman gyi 'du shes bzhag byas nas// ma chags khyim nas myur du 'byung bar byed/ de nas khyim bdag dpa' byin dang / khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam de dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs
323a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di zos nas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur to// de dag bzod pa thob nas mchog tu dga' ba dang mgu bar gyur te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to// sangs rgyas
323a7(dkon brtsegs): chos la 'dod gyur nas// gang dag gis ni sems bskyed pa// kye ma rnyed pa rnyed pa che// 'di ni rnyed pa kun gyi mchog/ byang chub sems ni dga' ba ste// sems can thams cad bde bgyid pa'i
323b1(dkon brtsegs): sems 'dir su dag dga' bskyed pa// de dag 'tsho ba legs par 'tsho// sems can kun la phan bgyid pa'i// sems 'di gang dag bskyed gyur pa// de dag sems can thams cad dga'/
323b2(dkon brtsegs): de dag mthong nas dga' bar 'gyur// byang chub sems la su dga' dang // de dag lus ni gser 'dra zhing // mtshan gyis shin tu sbas pa dang // 'jig rten snang ba byed par gyur// byang chub sems
323b3(dkon brtsegs): ni sems che ste// sems kun nang na dge ba mchog/ yon tan thams cad phun sum tshogs// nad kun rab tu zhi bar bgyid// sems can bsod nams chung ngu rnams// byang chub sems ni 'o/
323b4(dkon brtsegs): mo bgyid// 'khor ba la ni mi rtog pa// byang chub sems kyis skyo bar 'gyur// byang chub sems kyi bsod nams gang // de la gal te gzugs mchis na// nam mkha'i khams ni kun gang ste/
323b5(dkon brtsegs): de ni de bas lhag par 'gyur// gang+gA'i bye ma'i grangs snyed kyi// sangs rgyas zhing rnams mi gang gis// rin chen dag gis rab bkang ste// 'jig rten mgon la phul ba bas// gang gis thal mo//
323b6(dkon brtsegs): sbyar bgyis te// byang chub tu ni sems btud na// mchod pa 'di ni khyad par 'phags// de la mtha' ni ma mchis so// byang chub sems ni ci 'dra // drang srong mchog gis bstun mdzad pa// de/
323b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dra'i mchod pa gzhan ma mchis// dpal yang gzhan ni mchis ma lags// sman gyi dam pa nang ma mchis// byang chub sems ni yon tan ldan// nad kun rab tu zhi bar bgyid// sems can/
324a1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad bde bar bgyid// mi gsum dag gis gdungs pa yi// sems can sdug bsngal mthong nas ni// bskal pa dpag tu med par spyod// mkhas rnams skyo bar
324a2(dkon brtsegs): yong mi 'gyur// gang dag byang chub spyad spyod pa// dpa' bo sman pa'i rgyal po 'dra// de dag sems can sdug bsngal skyob// skyo ba rtag tu rnams par spangs// dpa' bo sangs rgyas chos 'tshal
324a3(dkon brtsegs): ga 'gro ba'i skye ba thams cad du// sems ni 'dor bar mi bgyid cing // de dag brtul zhugs de yang ston// sems 'di la ni gang dga' ba// shAkya seng ge mi yi mchog/ sangs rgyas ci 'dra de
324a4(dkon brtsegs): 'drar 'gyur// bdag cag rnyed pa legs par rnyed/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa na/
324a5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid de// bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od 'phro ba kha dog sna tshogs kha dog du ma byung ba 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar
324a6(dkon brtsegs): dro dang / le brgan dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta bu ste/ 'od des 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag khyad par byas nas/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par byung ste/
324a7(dkon brtsegs): nyi zla rnams kyi gzi brjid zad par byas nas slar log ste/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nung ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan bkun
324b1(dkon brtsegs): dga' bo stan las langs te/ bla gros phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i ltu nga sa la gtsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba bdud nas/ bcom ldan
324b2(dkon brtsegs): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rgyu ma mchis rkyen ma mchis par ni de bzhin gshegs pa dam bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/
324b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang gsol to// rgyu ma mchis par rnam 'dren rgyal ba mchog/ sangs rgyas skyob pa 'dzum pa mi ston na/
324b4(dkon brtsegs): ci slad bcom ldan khyod kyis 'dzum mdzad pa// 'jig rten phran dgongs thugs brtse bdag la gsungs// khyod kyis ci skad de ring 'dzum bstan gsungs// bka' mchod mi ldan nor mchog sbyin
324b5(dkon brtsegs): mdzad pa// dbul por gyur pa nor dang ldan par mdzod// 'jig rten ldongs la myur du mig kyang stsol// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis// tshe dang ldan pa
324b6(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gan du lhags pa'i khyim bdag lnga
324b7(dkon brtsegs): brgya tsam 'di dag mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bde bar gshegs pa mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyim bdag
325a1(dkon brtsegs): lnga brgya tsam 'di dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob ste/ kun dga' bo khyim bdag 'di dag thams cad ni/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag pa
325a2(dkon brtsegs): bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa dag ste/ khyim bdag 'di dag 'di nas shi 'phos nas/ nam du'ang ngan 'gro log par ltung ba
325a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gro bar mi 'gyur zhing / phyis kyang lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bde ba myong nas// mthar gyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa mnyes par byed cing /
325a4(dkon brtsegs): thugs byung bar mi byed de/ bsti stang byed par 'gyur/ btsun par byed par 'gyur/ rim gro byed par 'gyur// mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro// bskal pa bzang po pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams
325a5(dkon brtsegs): cad kyang mnyes par byed cing / thugs byung bar mi byed de/ bsti stang byed par 'gyur/ btsun par byed par 'gyur/ rim gro byed par 'gyur// mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
325a6(dkon brtsegs): de dag las chos kyang nyan par 'gyur te/ thos nas kyang 'dzin par 'gyur/ kun chub par byed par 'gyur// gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher rab tu ston par 'gyur ro// de'i 'og tu bskal pa nyi shu rtsa lnga na
325a7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa dag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma'i dang/
325b1(dkon brtsegs): gyi snying po zhes bya bar mtshan 'thun par 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma chos kyi rnam
325b2(dkon brtsegs): grangs 'di/ 'di ltar rgya che ba ni bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to// bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan
325b3(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byang chub sems dpa'i rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa bstan pa zhes bya bar zung zhig/ dpa' byin gyis zhus pa zhes bya bar yang zung
325b4(dkon brtsegs): zhig bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces dka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam po de
325b5(dkon brtsegs): dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa rkyen
325b6(dkon brtsegs): po'i chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya pa las/ khyim bdag dpa' byin gyis zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ 'dus pa nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzin
325b7(dkon brtsegs): mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba bamed ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa// / rgya gar
326a1(dkon brtsegs): skad du/ Ar+ya A da ya na bad sa rA dza ba ri prits+tshanA ma pa ri brta/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'a sa'i rgyal po 'char byed kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba'i le'u// bam po
326a2(dkon brtsegs): gcig pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ko'u sham 'in dbyangs can gyi san
326a3(dkon brtsegs): dga' ra ba na/ dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe na ma
326a4(dkon brtsegs): du'i bu mo btsun mo dpe med ma phrag dog dang ser snas zin pas/ btsun mo sngo bsangs can la lhag par dmigs nas/ bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed la lha mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ btsun mo sngo
326a5(dkon brtsegs): bsangs can la sogs pa bud med lnga brgya ni/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma dang lhan cig tu rab tu skyon chags par 'gyid de/ de'i sad du bdag gis lha la gsol ba lags kyis/ ji ltar mkhyen pa de bzhin
326a6(dkon brtsegs): du mdzad du gsol zhes brdzun gyi tshig gis dbyen byas par gyur to// de nas badra sa'i rgyal po 'char byed/ ma du'i bu mo btsun mo dpe med kyis dbyen byas pas/ bcom ldan 'das dang / nyan thos
326a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi dge 'dun rnams la tha ba dang / 'khrug pa dang / khro ba skyes par gyur to// de yi ma rangs shing khro ba dang bajam pas zil gyis non pas/ btsun mo sngo bsangs can gsad pa'i phyir gzhu bdus
326b1(dkon brtsegs): nas mnga' ste'u ka nya rdza ma blangs te 'phangs so// de nas de'i mod la btsun mo sdong sangs can gyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
326b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas shing / bcom ldan 'das kyi bsngags pa brjod nas/ byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas 'di
326b3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi mthus mda' ste'u ka nya rnga ma de de nas phyir log ste/ bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed de nyid kyi mgo'i drang thad kyi steng gi bar snang lnga 'bar/ rab tu 'drar/ kun tu rab tu mched de
326b4(dkon brtsegs): 'bar zhing / me lce gcig tu gyur te/ phar 'gro tshur 'gro zhing 'dug 'dug nas/ bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed ga la ba der song nas/ dad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed kyi g.yon rol logs su
326b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dug par gyur te/ de'i lus la ni ma dog go// lan gnyis lan gsum du de ltar gyur pa dang / de nas btsun mo sngo bsangs can gyis/ dang sa'i rgyal po 'char byed la 'di skad ces smras so//
326b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chen po de lta lags pas/ gal te khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal na/ khyod la'ang bde legs su 'gyur lags so// de nas bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed
326b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs shing spangs la/ sgyid lug cing spu zing zhes byed par gyur te/ sa la 'gyel nas btsun mo sdo ngasangs can la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ khyod ni lha mo 'am dri za mo// sha za mo 'am
327a1(dkon brtsegs): srin mo 'am/ ngas ni ji ltar gzung bar bya// nga yis dris pa de spros shig/ gang la mtshon gyis mi gnod pa'i// bud med 'gra' yang yod min te// dus ni 'di lag
327a2(dkon brtsegs): su yang // thos sam mthong ngam shes pa'ang med// nga ni stobs ldan btson 'grus can// 'phong gi shes pa legs bslabs pas// nga yi mda' ni gdon mi za// nam yang mi phog yod min
327a3(dkon brtsegs): te spre'u 'am yang na bya dang ni// mi 'am yang na 'bem yang rung // gang la nga yis mnga' 'phangs pa// nam yang mi phog yod min na// de ring mda' 'dri 'brangs pa ni// bzlog pa'i tshul
327a4(dkon brtsegs): du phyir 'ongs te// lus la gnod pa med par ni// nga yi mdun du 'dug par 'gyur// gzhan gyi tshig ni mnyan nas kyang // nga ni khyod la gsod 'dod pa// da ni khyod la skyabs su 'gros// sdug
327a5(dkon brtsegs): bsngal gyur pa nga la skyobs// phyin chad 'di 'dra mi byed kyis// sdug bsngal ba la deng bzod kyis// khyod sngon dga' ba dran byos la// dang bar gyis shig khro thul cig de nas
327a6(dkon brtsegs): btsun mo sngo bsangs can gyis// pad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed la tshigs su bcad de smras pa// bdag ni lha min dri za min// sha za mo min srin mo min// bdag ni btsun mo sngo bsangs can//
327a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten mgon po'i nyan thos ma// lha khyod la ni snying brtsengs// bdag gis sems ni mnyam bzhag gis// khyab bdag 'jig rten mgon po la// thugs ni rab tu dang bar mdzod//
327b1(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa bye ba stong rnams su// gang gis byams pa legs bsgoms te// byams la gnas pa'i skyes bu dang // bud med dag ni mi gsod gsungs// gang zhig lo tog smin pa la/
327b2(dkon brtsegs): ser ltar yang dag rdzi bzhin mkhyen// bud med rnams kyis gnod med pa// de yi bstan la bdag dgo' lags// 'jig rten mgon po thams cad kyis// bud med rnams ni smad par gsu
327b3(dkon brtsegs): bud med rnams la mi lta ba// 'jig rten mgon po rnams kyis bsngags// sangs rgyas rnams dang rang sangs rgyas// byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos rnams// bud med sten par mi mdzad de//
327b4(dkon brtsegs): de ni byis pa'i spyod yul lags// bud med rnams la brten pa ni// kun nas bdud kyi zhags par gsungs// sdig pa rnams la chags pa ni// rkun 'jom dkrug pa'i shul dang 'dra// mi
327b5(dkon brtsegs): mkhas bud med chags pa dang // sdig pa'i las ni bgyid pa dang // ye shes spong bar 'tshal ba yis// sems can rnams ni ngan 'gror khrid// mkhas pa thar par 'tshal ba yis// bud med
327b6(dkon brtsegs): bsten par mi bgyi ste// zhugs bltams du ba ma mchis pa'i// dong du mchongs pa mi dong lags// yid 'ong bka' mchid bgyis pa dang // bltas pas kyang ni 'ching bgyid cing // mi bzad dmyal
327b7(dkon brtsegs): bar ltung bas na// khyod ni bud med tshig ma gsan// bdag ni khro ba ma mchis te// bdag gi yid ni rab tu dang // khyab bdag 'jig rten mgon po la// thugs ni rab tu dang bar mdzod// rgyal po
328a1(dkon brtsegs): chen po bzhud mdzod de// khyod kyis rkang gnyis mchog gzigs la// de yis chos ni gang bstan pa// g.yel mya mchis par khyod kyis gson/
