328a2(dkon brtsegs): de nas bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed/ btsun mo sngo bsangs can gyis bskul bas/ rgyal po'i mthu chen po dang / rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen po dang / skye bo'i tshogs bal po ches yongs su
328a3(dkon brtsegs): bskor cing mdun du bdad nas/ rtab cing myur ba myur bar bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ba dang / des bcom ldan 'das mdzes pa/ dang bar gyur pa/ dbang po zhi ba/ thugs zhi ba kA dul
328a4(dkon brtsegs): ba dang zhi gnas kyi mchog dam pa'i pha rol tu byon pa// bsam gtan dam pa rnams kyi pha rol tu gshegs pa/ gser gyi mchod sdong ltar mngon par 'phags pa/ dpal gyis mdzes shing
328a5(dkon brtsegs): lham me/ wAn ne/ lhang de ste/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis sku legs par brgyan pa/ dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge snyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / byang chub
328a6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor ba lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang /
328a7(dkon brtsegs): mi ma yin pa rnams kyis mdun gyis bltas pa mthong bar gyur to// mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs te/ bcom
328b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sngon ma mthong ba'i rmad du byung ba zhig mthong ba/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol bar 'tshal na/ som ldan 'das kyis
328b2(dkon brtsegs): bdag la skabs dbye bar ciganang / de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ bad sA'i rgyal po 'char byed la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po/
328b3(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de ltar smos shig/ zos shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das lA/ bAd sa'i rgyal po 'char byed kyis 'dri skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag 'dod pa'i rgyu dang /
328b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa'i gzhi dang / 'dod pa la ldag par zhen pas/ deng ma du'i bu mo dpe med kyi tshig gis khros shing brngam pas zil gyis non nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa
328b5(dkon brtsegs): la tha ba dang zhe sdang gi sems kyang bskyed/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mchis zang sngo bsangs can bkum pa'i slad du mda' ste'u ka nya rnga ma zhig 'phangs nu/ de bar snang lnga 'bar/ rab tu
328b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dar/ kun tu rab tu mched de/ 'bar zhing me lce gcig tu gyur nas/ bzlog pa'i tshul du sngar log ste/ bdag gi g.yon rol logs su mchis par gyur cing / lus la ni ma phog nas/
328b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mchis dra sngo bsangs can gyi sug pa rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te/ mchis drang sngo bsangs can la 'di skad du/ khyed lha mo zhig gam/ bon te klu mo 'am/
329a1(dkon brtsegs): dri za mo 'am/ shu za mo 'am/ srin mo 'am/ su zhig lags shes bgyis pa dang / des bdag la 'di skad rgyal po chen po bdag ni lha mo'ang ma lags DA klu mo'ang /
329a2(dkon brtsegs): ma lags/ dri za mo'ang ma lags/ sha za mo'ang ma lags/ srin mo'ang ma lags kyi/ bdag ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
329a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas de'i nyan thos mo lags te/ khyod nyid la snying brtse ba'i slad du/ sems mnyam par bzhag pa lags so zhes mchi nas/ de nas mchis brang sngo ba sangs can gyis bcom ldan
329a4(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyi bsngags pa rnam grangs du mas brjod pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de la bdag 'di snyam du/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dam bcom yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
329a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas de'i nyan thos ma 'di'ang de lta bu'i snying rje'i bsam pa dang / de lta bu'i byams pa thob pa dang / de ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba dang / de ltar mthu che ba dang / de ltar dbang che bar grags pa
329a6(dkon brtsegs): lags na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lta spos kyang ci 'tshal snyam du sems par gyur lags te/ bcom ldan 'das
329a7(dkon brtsegs): bdag 'di ltar byis pa lta bu dang / 'di ltar rmongs pa dang / 'di ltar mi gsal ba dang / 'di ltar mi mkhas pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la bdag gis za ba
329b1(dkon brtsegs): dang zhe sdang gi sems bskyed pa de/ bcom ldan 'das la bzod par gsol zhing // nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi mdun du'ang nongs pa 'chags shing mchis nA/ thugs brtse ba'i slang du bdag gis
329b2(dkon brtsegs): bra nongs par bshags pa de/ bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par rjes su gzung bar gsol/ dreng srin chad kyang sdom par 'tshal lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal po
329b3(dkon brtsegs): chen po khyod longs la rang gi stan gang yin pa la 'dug cig ces/ bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed kyis nyes pa bgagus pa rjes su gzung bar gnang ngo // de nas rangs
329b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po 'char byed kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phrag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang / bcom ldan 'das la rnabang sa'i
329b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po 'char byed kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni gtum zhing gzu lums che la/ drag shul can lags pas/ bdag gis bud med kyi tshig gis sdig pa'i
329b6(dkon brtsegs): sug las mngon par 'du bgyis pa des/ bcom ldan 'das bdag sems can dmyal bar mchi bar bdag gis yang dag par 'tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag la thugs brje ba'i slad du/
329b7(dkon brtsegs): ci nas kyang bdag slan chad bud med kyi dbang du mchis nas/ sdig pa'i sug las mngon par 'du bgyid par mi 'gyur zhing // sems can dmyal bar mi ltung ba dang / bdag dang sems
330a1(dkon brtsegs): / can thams cad la yun ring po'i don dang / sman pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bud med kyi skyon de dag legs par yang dag par rab tu
330a2(dkon brtsegs): bshad cing / bud med kyi spyod pa rnams dang / bud med kyi mtshan ma rnams dang / bud med kyi sgyu rnams dang / bud med kyi g.yo rnams dang / bud med kyi gya gyu rnams dang / bud med kyi mi brdzun
330a3(dkon brtsegs): papa rnams dang / bud med kyi 'gyur log rnams dang / bud med kyi sten pa rnams dang / bud mod kyi tshig rnams dang / bud med kyi 'khrul pa rnams yang dag par rab tu bshad du gsol/ de
330a4(dkon brtsegs): skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ bang sa'i rgyal po 'char byed la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po gnas de lta bu yongs su zhus pas khyod
330a5(dkon brtsegs): la ci zhig bya// bcom ldan 'das la/ bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed kyis yang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci nas bdag bud med kyi dbang du mchis par gyur na/ bud med ni/
330a6(dkon brtsegs): ma rungs pa/ khron can// gtum mo// drag shul can lags te/ bcom ldan 'das bud med de ni bdag sems can dmyal bar mchi bar bgyid 'tshal ba lags pas/ bcom ldan 'das
330a7(dkon brtsegs): las bdag don de nyid nyan par 'tshal ba lags so// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
330b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chen po khyod kyis je rang gi skyon rnams yongs su rtogs shig dang / de nas phyis bud med kyi skyon rnams yongs su rtogs par 'gyur ro// de skad ces dka' stsal ba dang / som nA/
330b2(dkon brtsegs): 'das la / bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das legs legs so legs lags so// skyes pa skyon ji lta du dag dang ldan na// skyes pa bud med kyi
330b3(dkon brtsegs): dbang du mchi bar 'gyur ba'i skyes pa'i skyon rnams/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la yang dag par rab tu bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dang
330b4(dkon brtsegs): sa'i rgyal po 'char byed la 'ad skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po de'i phyir khyod legs par nyon la rab tu yid la zung zhig dang // ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o//
330b5(dkon brtsegs): sa'i rgyal po 'char byed kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'dri skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen
330b6(dkon brtsegs): be skyes pa skyon gang dag dang ldan na/ skyes pa bud med kyi dbyang du 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i skyes pa'i skyes bu'i skyon ni bzhi po 'di dag yin no// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rgyal po chen po 'di
330b7(dkon brtsegs): ba skyes pa 'dod pa rnams la chags par gyur cing // de 'dod pa rnams la bag med par gyur nas/ phyir zhing bud med la lta 'dod de/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ yon tan dang ldan pa/
331a1(dkon brtsegs): ts+tsha n+ya/ shes rab dang ldan pa'i dge sbyong dang bram ze dag la lta bar mi 'dod cing des tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ yon tan dang ldan pa/ shes rab dang ldan pa'i dge sbyong dang /
331a2(dkon brtsegs): bram ze dag mthong na bsnyen par mi byed/ bsten par mi byed/ bsnyen bkur mi byed pas/ de tshul khrims dang ldan g.yon tan dang ldan pa/ shes rab dang ldan pa'i dge sbyong dang bram ze dag gos
331a3(dkon brtsegs): yongs su spangs pas/ dad pa las yongs su nyams tshul khrims las yongs su nyams gtong ba las yongs su nyams/ shes rab las yongs su nyams shing / dad pa dang bral ba/
331a4(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims 'chal bA thos pa nyung ba/ ser sna can du gyur pa/ yi dwags kyi yon tan gyi chos la kun tu spyod pa/ sher rab 'chal pa/ rma la chags pa/ brtseg pa'i spyod yul can/ bshul
331a5(dkon brtsegs): bar mnam pa'i la mngon par dga' ba/ mi gtsang ba la dgra' ba/ bud med la dad che ba zhi ba yongs su mi tshol ba/ chags pa'i spyod yul can/ 'gro bar bya ba ma yin par song ba/ smad pa
331a6(dkon brtsegs): 'os pa/ mi gtsang ba'i srin bu dang 'dra ba/ snyigs ma len pa/ 'dod pa la brkam pa/ khrel dang ngo che bor ba / lha dang mi'i chos las nyams pa/ ngan par smad pa'i 'ardzobs 'tshong / ma
331a7(dkon brtsegs): pas smad pa byis pa'i skye bo la rten pa/ sdig pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa/ sdig pa'i sogs po la rten pa/ sdig pa la kun tu 'jug pa/ sdig pa la gzhol ba/ bud med kyi thul 'og tu chud
331b1(dkon brtsegs): ba/ bud med kyis 'bol ba/ bud med kyi dbang du song ba/ bud med la gzhol ba/ bud med dang gnas pakra rma'i zho'i spyod yul can/ rma'i sgrol rten pa/ rnga'i sgrol gnas pa/ jur/
331b2(dkon brtsegs): snabasu dang / mchil ma dang / ngar snrubs dang / rnag dang / she'u rul dang / klang rgyas dang / mi gtsang ba'i spyod yul tsan/ lug dang / ba klung dang / bra gag dang / khyi dang / phag dang / wang
331b3(dkon brtsegs): bong bu'i chos spyod pa/ gnod pas 'tsho ba/ pha ma la 'phangs par mi 'dzin pa// dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / sbyin gnas la 'bangs par mi 'dzin pa / sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge
331b4(dkon brtsegs): bdun la dad pa yongs su nyams pa/ mya ngan las 'das pa las yongs su nyams pa/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten lnga zhugs shing gzhol ba/
331b5(dkon brtsegs): seng ge dang nam mkha' lding gi lus la yang dag par zhugs pa/ lcags kyi shing shal ma ri mthon po dang me ma mur la gzhol ba/ sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang / zig nag dang / bsdus
331b6(dkon brtsegs): gzhom dang / ngu 'bod dang // ngu 'bod chen po dang / tsha ba dang / rab tu tsha ba dang / mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por zhugs pa ni/ bud med kyi skyon 'di lta bu 'di dgra zos kyang / bud
331b7(dkon brtsegs): med la chags shing bud med la rten pas// bgad pa dang / ngus pa dang / ca co 'don pa dang / zo brdungs pa dang / glu blangs pa dang / rol mo byas pa dag rjes su dran par byed cing skyo ba mi skyed/
332a1(dkon brtsegs): du / yid 'byung bar mi byed de/ rgyal po chen po byis pa'i chos la kun tu spyod cing / kun tu spyod pa de dag dang ldan pa'i skyes pa ni ngan song rnams su skye bar 'gyur te/ rgyal po chen po drad
332a2(dkon brtsegs): med kyi dbang du song nas 'dod pa la rten cing / ngan 'thor 'gro bar 'jug pa de ni skyes pa'i skyes bu'i skyon dang po yin no// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka'
332a3(dkon brtsegs): su la to// 'dod pa dri nga mi gtsang smad par 'os pa dang / mi mthun 'jigs byed mi rtag las byung sdug bsngal byed// don med phur bar byed cing dman pa yin pa swa na// mkhas pa su zhig
332a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa'i skom la rten par byed// btsog pas gang ba'i chub khung dri nga lta bu dang / mnam par gyur cing rul ba'i khyi rnams ji bzhin dang // shi ba dur khrod sra ni shin tu smad pa ltar// de bzhin
332a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa rnams kyang mchog tu smad pa yin// sdang bu rma zhig mthong nas rgyug pa ci 'dra dang // phag ni ngan skyugs mthong nas rgyug pa ci 'dra dang // khyi ni sha yi don du shen sar 'gro ba ldur// de
332a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin mi mkhas bud med dag la dga' bar byed// grags pa med cing mi snyan yon tan 'bri ba dang // de lus tshul khrims dam pa nyams par 'gyur ba dang // mtho ris nyams shing dmyal
332a7(dkon brtsegs): ba dag tu ltung bas na// mkhas pa su zhig 'dod pa'i skom la rten par byed// ji ltar ha la ha la'i dug ni zos pa na// lus ngag rmya zhing rmongs pa skye bar 'gyur ba ltar// de bzhin 'di na
332b1(dkon brtsegs): byis pa rnams ni 'dod pa'i rgyus// rang gi lus kyi dbyibs ni dug tu mi rig go// ji ltar sgyu ma shin tu bslabs pa'i mi zhig gis// rnam par 'phrul pas sems can brgya dag dga' byed lhag
332b2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin byis pa bdag la bde bar 'dod pa rnams// 'dod pa'i dga' ba'i rgyu lngas ngan 'gror rab tu ltung // rdzas som skyon mo bzang po tha dad pa dag dang // klu rdo sil snyan badrang po tha dud bdag
332b3(dkon brtsegs): gis// khang pa mchog nas byung ba'i chung ma len pa ni// gnod pa rnyed pa yin zhing sdug bsngal sogs pa yin// 'dod pa'i dga' la brkam pa dag ni gnod yin te// mi gtsang mtshon 'dra
332b4(dkon brtsegs): rmongs 'gyur dag la bsngags pa rjod// 'dod pa dman pa dag la bsngags shing brten nas ni// dman pa de dag ngan 'gror rab tu ltung bar 'gyur// gnod pa 'dod pa dag gis yul
332b5(dkon brtsegs): rnams rab bsngags shing // 'dod pa gnod pa yin la dga' ba'i byis pa rnams// de drag don med 'tsho ba rnam par spangs nas ni// mi bzad ga yang sA chen por rab tu ltung bar 'gyur//
332b6(dkon brtsegs): nga rgyal rmongs pas bcom pa'i skye dgu 'di drag ni// rgya mtsho'i pha rol ma mthong ba yi bya bzhin du// lcags kyi me lce lnga po dag la chags gyur nas/ byis pa rnams ni rab tu 'brar zhing
332b7(dkon brtsegs): 'khyam par 'gyur// 'di na byis pa myos shing shin tu rmongs pa rnams// shel du mi mthong snod mchog yin par sems par ltar// lam la rnam par rmongs rnams 'dod pa'i ched kyi phyir// rtag
333a1(dkon brtsegs): tu 'dir gnas 'di ni gya nom yin zhes 'dzer// grang phyir rnam pa sna tshogs las dag mi shes pas// 'gro ba thams cad rab nyams gus pa yod min pas/
333a2(dkon brtsegs): pha drang ma dang bu drang bu mo dag la ni// don gyis mchod pa mi byed gnod pa thob pa yin// de dag rtag tu bud med 'dris pa rjod byed cing // de 'dra'i las kyi tshul la rab tu 'jug par byed// de dag
333a3(dkon brtsegs): gti mug dra ba sdig pa rab sogs shing // ngan song 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i lam yang sogs par byed// mi rnams de dag der chags bde bar 'du shes shing // pa dang ma yang yongs su rab tu spangs
333a4(dkon brtsegs): bar byed// de dag mchod 'os rnams la mchod par mi byed cing // smad par 'os pa'i 'dod pa dag ni tshol bar byed// phan tshun gdung bar 'gyur ba la ni gzhol byed cing // rnam rtog mu yis nges bcos mi
333a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams nyon mongs pa// bkur sti yongs su tshol la dga' zhing ma 'phags rnams// chos ma yin pas 'jig rten rab tu 'dzud par byed// gzhi de las ni mtshon cha dag drang lcags rnams dang / de bzhin bcing
333a6(dkon brtsegs): ba dang ni 'thab cing rtsod pa dang // nges par 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal rab tu myong bar 'gyur// shi 'phos nas ni mnar med 'jigs su rung bar 'gro// tshe 'di nyid la de bzhin sdug bsngal 'byung 'gyur zhing/
333a7(dkon brtsegs): nor nyams snying du sdug pa rab tu 'jig 'gyur la// mtho ris nyams shing dmyal bar rab tu ltung bas na// mkhas pa su zhig 'dod pa'i 'du shes skyed par byed// lcags las grub pa'i nags tshal
333b1(dkon brtsegs): sngon po'i zong dag tu// mkhas pas bdag nyid rab tu bor ba de bla zhing // mdzangs pa spu gri'i so yis bcad pa byas dz+wa la// ral gri dag gi zong du mal yangasas rba zhing // rasu me 'a bar thulum/
333b2(dkon brtsegs): bzung ba de bla la// de bzhin lcags kyi thu lum 'bar ba zu bla zhing // me drong 'jigs su rung ba rnams la reg bla yi// lag pa gnyis kyis nam yang bud med reg mi bya// mis ni ji lta ji ltar 'dod
333b3(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams bsten pa// de lta de ltar bde ba thams cad rab spong zhing // 'di ltar 'dod rnams gcig tu sdug bsngal mi gtsang bas// 'dod pa sdug bsngal mi gtsang ba dag rnam par spongs// 'dod pa sdug
333b4(dkon brtsegs): bsngal kun gyi gzhi por gyur pa dang // gang phyir nor ni cung zad 'gyur bar byed pa dang // yid 'ong skye bo rnams kyi nyams pa'i rtsa ba bas// bud med nges par sten pa gnod pa thob pa yin// skyes pa gang gis de
333b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dra'i chos tshul rig nas ni// bud med rnams la rab tu bag med mi 'gyur ba// des ni rtag tu mtho ris lam yang rnam sbyangs shing // des ni byang chub dam pa rnyed par dka' ma yin/ rgyal po
333b6(dkon brtsegs): nen po gzhan yang mi'i pha ma dag ni dka' ba byed pa yin te// zla bu dgu bum zla ba bcur mngal na bzung ste/ shin tu sdug bsngal bar gsos shing / gcin dang phyi sa yang 'phyi bar byed/ pang du blangs nas nu
333b7(dkon brtsegs): zho ldud par byed/ phung po rnams skyed par byed/ khams rnams gso bar byed/ 'jig rten ston par byed/ 'dzam bu gling sna tshogs ston par byed/ don du 'dod/ phan par 'dod// grub pa dang bde bar 'dod//
334a1(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten la'ang phan par 'dod pa ste/ sbyin pa'i gnas yin la/ bu la phan pa dang bde bar 'dod pas / de dag gis rang gi nor gyi tshogs kyis gzhan gyi khyim nas gzhan gyi bu mo
334a2(dkon brtsegs): blangs pa dang / de de la chags shing myos la/ 'chums shing brgyal ba dang / lhag par zhen pa dang / lhag par zhen cing 'dug par gyur nas/ gzhan gyi khyim nas blangs pa'i bud med de la chags shing myos pas/
334a3(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa'i gnas pa ma dag rgas 'bogs pa/ gtugs la lus nyam chung zhing mig mi mthong ba dag la brnyas shing longs spyod med pa dang / nor med par byas nas/ rang gi khyim nas phyung ste spyod par byed do//
334a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chen po 'di ltar pha ma dka' ba byed byed pa sbyin pa'i gnas la// rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par yang dag pa'i bde bas bsti stang du bya/ bla mar bya/ rjed par bya/ mchod par bya ba'i rigs na/ des de'i tshe pha ma dag
334a5(dkon brtsegs): rang gi khyim nas phyung ste bskrad nas/ gzhan gyi khyim nas blangs pa'i bud med la bzu' ba dang / btung ba dang / gos rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byed cing bsti stang du byed/ gces su byed/ rim gro byed la
334a6(dkon brtsegs): mchod par byed cing / yang dag pa'i bde bas bsnyen bkur byed kyi/ phra ma la ni mi byed pa'i mi'i snying brtse ba med pa dang / mi lba ba dang / ngan pa'i sems dang ldan pa la ltos/ rgyal po chen po des bde
334a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gror 'gro ba'i chos gang yin pa de ni spangs la/ ngan 'gror 'gro ba'i chos gang yin pa de ni yang dag par blangs te 'dug pa'i mi de la'ang ltos/ rgyal po chen po bud med kyi dbang du song nas// 'dod pa
334b1(dkon brtsegs): rnams la rten cing ba ma la brnyas pa dang / ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'jug pa de ni skyes pa'i skyes du'i skyon gnyis pa yin no// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa
334b2(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag bka' stsal to// gang dag pa ma rgas pa gso bar byed pa ni// de dag rjeg tu bde zhing yid kyang bder 'gyur la// 'di la lha dang bcas pa dang ni dbang po dang // de bzhin 'di la tshangs par bcas pa'i
334b3(dkon brtsegs): rigs su 'gyur// gang dag pa ma rgas pa gso brar byed pa ni// de dag song na phyir 'ong ba yung 'grub 'gyur zhing // rgya mtsho chen po nas kyang bde zhing legs 'ong ste// de ltar byed pa dag ni rang mchog rnyed pa
334b4(dkon brtsegs): yin/ gang dag pha ma rgas pa gso bar byed pa yin// tshong dpon de dag yon tan kun gyi gtsor 'gyur zhing // de bzhin zhing las 'bras du phun sum tshogs 'byung ste// bsod nams dgrang ba'i don du brjod
334b5(dkon brtsegs): par mi nus so// gang dag pa ma rgas pa gso bar byed pa ni// de dag khur rnams 'khyer ba'i rnga mo rnams dang yang // yang na glang dang bong du dag tu'ang mi 'gyur te// mi rnams de dag spu gri'i so la rje mi
334b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ gang dag pa ma rgas pa gso bar byed pa ni// de dag chu bo rab med dang ni me mur dang // spu gri so dang ldan pa la yang mi rgal te// de dag zangs khu bskol ba 'thung bar yong mi 'gyur// gang dag
334b7(dkon brtsegs): pha ma rgas pa gso bar byed pa ni// de dag nor dang 'bru ni mi nyung ba dag dang // chung ma bu dang bu mo dam pa dag dang yang // bai DUR+Ya dang rin chen sa le sbram yang rnyed// gang dag pha ma rgas pa gso bar byed pa ni/
335a1(dkon brtsegs): dedag drul rgyal po dag // cu 'a 'i rgyas pa'i la yang sadzod gyur te/ rnas dums a ra lug// mi mam
335a2(dkon brtsegs): yi lngar myur pa// thub pa chen po 'di 'dra ba gsung ni thos gyur na// rgas shing dbang po shin tunyam chung myur ba yi// pa mA sbyi gnas dab pa sa sdig gas mi / rdul ba chen
335a3(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa ni/ skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa'i las byed cing / log par lta ba la mngon par zhen pa yin te/ de ni dge ba dang mi dge ba gang yin zhes bdag gi don mi shes shing mi
335a4(dkon brtsegs): brtan pa yin pas/ skye bo mang po rnams mi dga' zhing / byis pa'i skye bos bsngags pa la mngon par dga' ba dang / 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dag gis rmongs par gyur pa dang / skyes bu mdzangs pa dag
335a5(dkon brtsegs): gis smad pa dang / khro bas zil gyis non cing sdig pa'i las bred pa dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yongs su spangs pa dang / longs spyod kyi rgyags pas myos pa dang / sder
335a6(dkon brtsegs): sna can du gyur pa dang / gzhan la gnod par mngon par dga' zhing / chos sgom pas mi dga' ba yin te/ rgyal po chen po skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa/ skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa'i lus la mngon par dga' zhing /
335a7(dkon brtsegs): skyes bu dam pa'i las la mi dga' ba de la ltos// rgyal po chen po 'dod pa rnams la rten cing // ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'jug pa de ni skyes pa'i skyes bu'i skyon gsum pa yin no// des
335b1(dkon brtsegs): de'i ma bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su cad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// 'dod pa rnams kyi gzhis ni skyes bu rnam nyams shing // gzhi de las ni sdig padag kyang ra tu byed// log par lta bas
335b2(dkon brtsegs): rmongs nas 'dir ni labyam 'gyur zhing // de ni rnam par 'khrul pas ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur// log dang ldan pas yon tan kun gyis rnam spangs shing // de ni rtog pa med cing hUM yang nor pa yin// ga
335b3(dkon brtsegs): dag chu klung dag tu ut+pal rtswa tshol ltar// log par lta bas yongs su 'khor bar byed pa yin// bde ba'i don du bdag nyid yongs su sbyong byed cing // chos ma yin la chags pa'i mi rnams mang po dag
335b4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin bde ba'i rgyu phyir 'dod pa rnams tshol ba// de dag gti mug rmongs pas sems can dmyal bar 'gro// gang dag 'dod pa rnams kyi don du rtag tu ni// de bzhin sems la gcags pa'i skyes bu tha mad/
335b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa'i bdag nyid can dang skye bo sdig can dang // 'du shes log pa dag la bde ba ga la yod// mi rnams de dag byas pa mi ga zo sdig bcas shing // dad pa rnam nyams tshul 'chos gus pa med pa dang /
335b6(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa'i tshogs kyis rtag tu rnam par spangs pas na// dmyal ba bzod rlag shin tu 'jigs su rung bar ltung // gzugs dang sgra dang ro la chags pa'i mi rnams ni// byang chub sems dpa' rnams das
335b7(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa mi mchod cing // log par lta bas ches kyang nyan par mi byed la// lan 'ga' yang dge 'dun legs par mchod par mi byed pas// 'phags pa rnams kyis rnam spangs ngan song ltung bas na// de phyir
336a1(dkon brtsegs): mi yi srid pa 'di ni rnyed pa la// sbyin du la yang dag sdom la nges par rten cig dang // de las byang chub dam pa mchog kyang thob par 'gyur/ rgyal po chen po gzhan
336a2(dkon brtsegs): skyes pa ni bzo'i gnas sna tshogs dang / las kyi gnas sna tshogs dag gis 'tsho bar byed de/ rgyal po chen po 'di ltar yi ge 'am/ rtsis sam/ grangs sam/ lag rtsis sam/ mtshon cha'am/ rgyal po la
336a3(dkon brtsegs): zho gas 'tsho ba 'am/ zhing las sam/ tshong byed pa 'am/ ba glang 'tsho ba 'am/ de lta bu'i bzo'i gnas sna tshogs dang / las kyi gnas sna tshogs dag gis 'tsho bar byed cing / 'di lta ste/ nor gyi phyir lam
336a4(dkon brtsegs): ma yin par yang 'gro bar byed/ lam ngan par yang 'gro bar byed/ gcong rong can dang / chu klung can gyi lam du'ang 'gro bar byed/ mtshon cha'i lam du'ang 'gro bar byed/ rgya mtshor 'jug par yang 'jug par byed/
336a5(dkon brtsegs): grang ba'i dus na'ang lhags pas gnod par byed/ dro ba'i dus na'ang tsha bas gnod par byed cing / bkres pa dang skom pa dag gis gnod bzhin du 'gro ba la'ang spro bar byed de/ longs spyod yongs su tshol ba na/
336a6(dkon brtsegs): de lta bu'i sdug bsngal bdag gis longs spyod yongs su btsa lnga nas kyang / rang gi 'tsho ba dag gi phyir nye bar sgrub par byed pas/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dag dang / bkren pa dang / sdug 'phongs pa dang/ slongs
336a7(dkon brtsegs): mo pa dag la sbyin pa sbyin par mi bzod cing bud med rnams kyi dbang du byas pa dang / bud med rnams kyis thul 'og tu chud pa dang / bud med rnams kyis bkol ba dang / bud med rnams la byams pa de nyid kyis/
336b1(dkon brtsegs): bud med de dag nyid gso ba'i phyir sbyin pa sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims yang dag par len par mi nus shing / dri de la chags la/ bud med kyis smyos pa bzod par byed cing / bud med kyis bsdigs pa dang / bltas
336b2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / brtad pa dag kyang bzod par byed do// de skyes par gyur kyang bud med kyis bsdigs pa dang du len cing mi dga' ba med pa/ de'i dror lta bar byed pa ni 'dod pa'i gzhis drud med kyi dbang du song ba yin te rtug
336b3(dkon brtsegs): po chen po bud med la rten cing ngam 'gror 'gro bar 'jug pa de ni/ skyes pa bud med la brkam zhing ngan skyugs kyi sgo la gdu ba dang / mi gtsang ba la dga' ba dang / shes bzhin med par spyod pa'i skyes pa'i skyes
336b4(dkon brtsegs): bu'i skyon bzhi pa yin te/ rgyal po chen po skyon de dag dang ldan pa'i skyes pa ni/ 'dod pa rnams kyi dbang du 'gro ba yin no// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi tshigs su bcad pa 'dri dag bka'
336b5(dkon brtsegs): stsal to// 'dod pa rnams ni tshol ba na// rab tu myos pa ga la bde// 'dod pa dman pa rnams sten pa// de ni gang gis bde bar 'gyur// skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa'i// las rnams byed cing mi sdom la/
336b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa'i 'dod chags tshol byed pa// de dag rab nyams chud kyang za// mi rnams gang dag mi mkhas pa// rnga mo bong bu'i chos spyod cing // bud med mthong na rab bsnyegs pa// dran skyugs gnas la ngag
336b7(dkon brtsegs): rnams bzhin// gang la byis pa gus bcas pa'i// 'dod rnams dri nga mi gtsang yang // 'dod pa'i skyon rnams mi mthong ba// sa yi steng na dmus long bzhin// gdugs kyi 'ching bas bcings pa
337a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams// 'dod pa'i 'du shes rab tu 'jug/ byis pa 'dod rnams sten pa dag/ khyi dang wa rnams ji bzhin no// spa dri 'o dang reg rnams kyis// gang la so so'i skye bo rnams/
337a2(dkon brtsegs): byis pa 'khor bar yongs 'khor bar// spre'u rnams phur la btags pa bzhin// byis pa ma rig khebs pa rnams// mun pa'i phung pos bsgribs gyur cing // bud med rnams la chags pa ni/
337a3(dkon brtsegs): mi gtsang gnas la khwa bzhin no// gang gis ngan 'gror rab 'jug pa// de ni bdud kyi spyod yul yin// ro myang 'du shes chags gyur pa// ngan skyugs gnas la srin bu bzhin// bsrad pa'i gshed
337a4(dkon brtsegs): mA rnams kyis ni// ji ltar mi zhig bor ba ltar// shes na thar pa 'thob 'gyur zhing // bud med dbang du 'gro mi 'gyur// 'dod pa bud med lta byed pa'i// kun tu sbyor las 'jigs pa skye//
337a5(dkon brtsegs): byis pa mtshan mar 'dzin pa rnams// 'dod pa'i srid pas rab tu 'phel// sos ka'i dus na mi zhig ni// dgon pa chen por song gyur nas// byis pas lan tshwa'i chu 'thungs na// skom pa
337a6(dkon brtsegs): phyir zhing rab skye ltar// de bzhin bden pa ma mthong ba'i// byis pa rmongs pas 'tsho ba rnams// 'di na phyir zhing bud med la// 'dod pa'i sred pa brtan par 'gyur// ji ltar mi lus mdze can la/
337a7(dkon brtsegs): srog chags rnams ni za ba ltar// 'dod brkam so so'i skye bo rnams// de bzhin bud med rnams kyis zos// mi gtsang bum pa khra bo zhig/ kha rog ldan par snang mod kyi// nang na ha la ha la'i
337b1(dkon brtsegs): dug kA drug po chen po yod da ltar// de bzhin bud med brgyan pa dag/ gang dang gang na snang ba yang // gcin dang byi sa sa gang du yi// rgyal ba rlung gis bkang du bzhin// 'bru mar gyis ni
337b2(dkon brtsegs): bdar ba'i mtshon// gos kyis dkris pa ji bzhin du// de bzhin bud med brgyan pa yang / khrel mi gling pa g.yogs pa bzhin// ji ltar medong gang gyur lnga// du ba med cing 'bar ldan lngar//
337b3(dkon brtsegs): bud med de bzhin me 'dra zhing // srin bu gtum po bzhin du g.yo// sreg pa'i bskal pa 'dir byung na// sa ni kun tu 'bar 'gyur la// rtswa dang gel bu 'jig 'gyur zhing // chu klung dag kyang
337b4(dkon brtsegs): bskams par 'gyur// 'byung ba chen po'i gnas gyur pa// rgya mtsho yang ni skam 'gyur zhing // ri bo chen po rnams sreg la// de bzhin lhun po'ang 'jig par 'gyur// rgyal chen 'byung po 'dzin
337b5(dkon brtsegs): ba yi/ nas 'di'ang rnam par 'jig 'gyur zhing // drag chen rnams ni 'jigs 'gyur yang // skyob par byed pa yod ma smin// ji ltar me yis rir bcas dang // rgya mtshor bcas pa sreg pa lngal/
337b6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin bud med me 'dra ste// gtum zhing skyes du g.yo bar byed// snabs dang mchil ma kha chu dang // klad rgyas rul ba'i klad pa dang // lus las dri nga 'dzag de la// byis pa rnams ni sbra
337b7(dkon brtsegs): rtsi bzhin// kha sgo rus pas gang ba dang // sha dang pags la sogs bsags shing // de bzhin lus ni 'bras 'dra ste// dri nga smad par bya ba yin// mi gtsang sna tshogs gang ba dang //
338a1(dkon brtsegs): 'bras ni smin par gyur pa ltar// de ltar lus 'di mi gtsang ba// sna tshogs rnams kyi snod yin no// lho ni gnye ma mcher ba dang // glongs gang zhing mkhal ma dang //
338a2(dkon brtsegs): khrag drang madris pas gang gyur la// klad rgyas kyis ni klad pa gang // khong pa'i nang na srin po'i rigs// brgyad khri po dag gnas gyur kyang // gti mug dra bas bsgribs pa yi// byis pa rnams
338a3(dkon brtsegs): kyis mi mthong ngo // rma ske dgu nas rtag tu ni// mi gtsang rul pa zag gyur kyang // smra ba dag dang lta ba la// bus pa rnams ni mtshan mar 'dzin// gang zhig kun gyis smad pa'i yul// chags
338a4(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams kyis phyis mi shes// mi gtsang spyod yul byis pa rnams// snabs dang mchil ma za bar byed// smad par 'os la chags byed pa// sbrang bu rnams kyis rma mthong bzhin// mtsham dung
338a5(dkon brtsegs): dag nas rdul 'dzag cing // smad pa'i dri ni 'byung bar 'gyur// byis pa sdug bsngal chags byed pa// de dag bdag la gnod phyir g.yos// des ni myur du 'phongs 'gyur te// nya rnams chu nas/
338a6(dkon brtsegs): bton pa bzhin// 'jigs rung lag na mtshon thogs kyis// ji ltar mi zhig gtses pa ltar// mtshon 'dra'i bud med sdig can gyis// 'dod la chags rnams de bzhin no// rnam rgyal lag
338a7(dkon brtsegs): na mtshon thogs pas// ji ltar rgyal po gtses pa ltar// 'dod chags me dang 'dra ba yis// 'dod la chags rnams de bzhin sreg/ shin pa'i gnas la khyi rnams ltar// myang bar 'du shes/
338b1(dkon brtsegs): byis pa rnams// ji ltar sgra yis sreg pa ltar// myur du sdug bsngal spong bar 'gyur// rang gi las kyi nyes pa yis// de la skyob pa med pa ltar// de bzhin bdag ni skyes pa yis// sems na/
338b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams ni ngan 'gror 'gro// de dag sangs rgyas chos spangs nas// bud med rnams kyi rnag la rten// sems ni rol chags gyur pa// de yis ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur// ji ltar spre'u zhig shing las ni/
338b3(dkon brtsegs): shin gzhin du ni rgyu ba'i tshe// de ni gnas der gtses gyur na// de nyid du ni sdug bsngal gyur// de bzhin 'dod la brkam pa dang // sdug bsngal 'dod chags sten pa dang // gti mug rgyal thogs pa rnams/
338b4(dkon brtsegs): dus ni yang dang yang du 'da'// mi dkren rnams ni gsal shing lnga// rab tu btsugs nas 'phyang ba ltar// de bzhin 'dod la chags pa rnams// shal ma la'i ni mtho la 'phyang // ji ltar mon sran sde'u dang
338b5(dkon brtsegs): gre'u// lcags zangs rnams su blugs nas kyang // mes ni rab tu bsregs pa na// dbu bar bcas shing khol ba ltar// de bzhin dge ba ma mthong zhing // 'dod la chags pa'i skye bo rnams// shinas
338b6(dkon brtsegs): ngan song 'gro 'gyur zhing // lcags zangs rnams su btso bar 'gyur// mi rnams gang dag sdig byed pa'i// sems can sdig pa rnams kyi gnas// zangs ni bye ba drug cu dang // gzhan yang bzhi po dag
338b7(dkon brtsegs): yin no// zangs ni so so re re la// tshad ni dmigs su yod min zhing // me yi phung por ldan rnams su// bskal pa du mar btso bar 'gyur// kha cig zangs rnams de dag tu// rang gi las kyis bskal
339a1(dkon brtsegs): brgya'am// nyis brgya sum brgya tshang bar 'tshed// yang na bzhi brgyar btso bar 'gyur// pra skam rnon po rnams kyis ni// bzung zhing yang dang yang bsgrags pas// de dag pa
339a2(dkon brtsegs): ni yod min zhing // dung ltar dkar ba rnams su 'gyug// grags kyi gzhong par 'dug nas ni// rab tu tsha zhing 'dren pa med// shi zhing shi shing sde 'gyur te// rang gi las kyis granas par 'gyur/
339a3(dkon brtsegs): gang tshe dmyal ba'i srungs rnams kyis// ngan pa'i mi rnams de dag ni// gtun la sogs pas brdungs pas na// sha rkang rus pa phye mar 'gyur// de yi tshen de dag la// shin tu grang ba'i rlung yang
339a4(dkon brtsegs): ldang / des ni dmyal ba'i sems can rnams// sdug bsngal grub pa de las 'tsho// mi rnams gang dag sdig byed pa// gtun bu drag po rnams kyis 'joms// sta re rnams kyis gshog pa dang //
339a5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gsal shing gzugs par 'gyur// mi rnams gang dag sdig byed pa'i// sems can rnams kyi lus la ni// ljags mdung rtse mo bzhi pa dang // rtse gsum pa dang rtse lnga 'bag// mi rnams
339a6(dkon brtsegs): grang dag sdig byed pa// ral gri'i mchu can khwa rnams kyis// mgo dang klad pa gtogs 'gyur zhing // tha dang spyang kis zos par 'gyur// mi rnams gang dag sdig byed pa// ngan skyugs rul pa
339a7(dkon brtsegs): dri nga zhing // kun gyis smad par ltung gyur la// spu gri'i chu klung rnams su ltung // mi rnams gang dag sdig byed pa// rab tu tsha bar sreg 'gyur zhing // ngu 'bod dang ni ngu 'bod che// thig nag tu yang
339b1(dkon brtsegs): sreg par 'gyur// mi rnams gang dag sdig byed pa// thig nag tu ni skyes nas kyang // yang dang yang du me mur dang // spu gri'i chu klung rnams su ltung // gang tshe lcags kyi zangs por che ga/ mi rnams
339b2(dkon brtsegs): de dag 'tshed pa na// khyi rnams kyis ni gtses gyur nas// de dag bde ba tshol bar byed// mi rnams gang dag sdig byed pa// dmyal nga drag po chen por ni// lhung nas dpung gnyen yod min zhing //
339b3(dkon brtsegs): thugs kyi thu lum za bar 'gyur// mi rnams sdig pa byed pa dag/ lkugs las grub pa'i zag chen dang // mi sdug ri bo rnams kyis ni// de'i tshe kun nas lus 'joms byed// de ni rang gis
339b4(dkon brtsegs): las byas pa'i// 'bras bu de 'dra thob gyur cing // de yis tshor ba myong ba na// de la skyob pa 'ga' yang med// ji rnyed rten pa thams cad ni// bdag gi mdun der 'ga' yang med// der ni
339b5(dkon brtsegs): mgon med bdag gcig pu// sdug bsngal tshor ba myong bar byed// gang dag bde phyir don min par// sngan chad nyes par smad byas kyang // pha ma de dag de ring ni// rnam par grol ba'i mthu yang med//
339b6(dkon brtsegs): gang dag bde phyir 'dod min par// sngan chad nyes par spyad byas kyang // du dang bu mo chung ma rnams// de ring bdag la 'grel mi nus// gang dag bde phyir don min par// sngan chad nyes pa spyad
339b7(dkon brtsegs): byas kyang // mdza' bshes nye du de dag kun// rnam par grol bar yong mi nus// gang dag bde phyir don min par// sngan chad nyes par spyad byas kyang // bdag gi rtsa lag de dag kun// de ring sgrol
340a1(dkon brtsegs): par mi nus so// 'dod pa dman pa rnams sbyin cing // dman pa'i chos rnams bsten nas ni// nyes pa'i las rnams byed pa dag/ de yis ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur/
340a2(dkon brtsegs): shes rab 'chal pa mnar med par// song nas sdug bsngal tshor ba myong // sangs rgyas rnams kyis bud med dgra/ byi sa 'dra ltar dman par bsgrags// de phyir dman pa rnams dang nI/
340a3(dkon brtsegs): dman pa'i bud med rnams bsten pa// byis pa de ni phyi sa yi// rkyal ba bzung nas gnas pa yin// ci 'dra'i las ni byed pa ltar// de 'dra'i 'bras bu 'thob 'gyur te// rgyal po yi ni nad pa
340a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / sdug bsngal bcing ba'ang myong bar 'gyur// bud med gzhi las skyes pa yang // bsad dang bcing ba myong 'gyur zhing // dmyal srungs rnams kyis bsreg pa dang // nges par 'chi ba'ang
340a5(dkon brtsegs): myong bar 'gyur// bud med rnams la brkam pa yi// blo ngan de dag bde mi 'gyur// gsal shing mthon po rnams su ni// brtsegs shing chur yang bcug par 'gyur// sra yi ser kar bcug nas
340a6(dkon brtsegs): ni/ de bzhin ral gris gdab par 'gyur// de 'dra ba dag thos nas ni// de dag yi nang bde mi 'gyur// rmongs pa bud med lhun gcig tu// yang dang yang du 'du 'dzi byed// sdug bsngal
340a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa rnams sten cing // smad pa rnams kyang smra bar byed// rmongs pa rnams kyis chos thos nas// dge bar gsungs shes rjod byed kyang // de sems bud med phyi bzhin song // byi ba la ni
340b1(dkon brtsegs): dril bzhin// rgyal bas gsungs pa thos gyur nas/ yud tsam zhig ni yid byung yang // hal ba lnga'i drug 'dra ba'i// 'dod chags kyis ni de yang 'jug/ ji ltar bag ni rung tsam zhig rdzas
340b2(dkon brtsegs): shing skrag pa byung gyur kyang // des ni phyis mthong ba na// chags pa skyed par byed pa ltar// de bzhin byis pa bde 'dod rnams// rgyal ba'i bsten pa spangs nas ni// 'dod par ldan pa rnams
340b3(dkon brtsegs): sten pa// des ni ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur// 'dod pa rnams la chags myos nas// shin tu sdig pa'i las byas shing // tshul khrims can dag bsdus byas nas// phyis ni ngan 'grom
340b4(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur// shes rab can gyis dral byed cing // de 'dra'i chos ni zlos gyur nas// 'dod kun spangs nas 'di la ni// mkhas pa mngon byung rab byung zhig/ rdul po chen po
340b5(dkon brtsegs): skyes pa 'dod pa la rjen pa rnams kyi skyon ni de dag yin te/ 'dod pa'i gzhi dang / 'dod pa'i rgyu dang / 'dod pa la lhag par zhen pa rnams ni// sems can dmyal ba pa rnams kyi tshor ba myong bar
340b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po de lta bas na/ khyod kyis rtag par rgyun du sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o// khyod kyis lus su gtogs pa'i sems rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o//
340b7(dkon brtsegs): de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis/ pad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed la de lta de ltar chos ston par mdzad de/ chos bstan pa des bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed/ de bzhin gshegs pa la dga' ba dang / rab
341a1(dkon brtsegs): tu dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba thob par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ bad sa'i rgyal po 'chur byed kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
341a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das ji tsam du/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas skyes pa dang bud med rnams kyi skyon bsam gyis mi khyad pa'i bar de dag bka'
341a3(dkon brtsegs): stsal cing legs par gsungs pa ni ngo mtshar lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi ste/ mtshon cha spangs shing /
341a4(dkon brtsegs): dbyug pa spangs la/ ngo tsha mchis shing / srog chags 'byung po thams cad la snying brtse bar zhugs pa lags kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol//
341a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nus/ pad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lga dang / myi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas
341a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya pa las/ pad sa'i rgyal
341a7(dkon brtsegs): po 'char byed kyis zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ 'dus pa nyi shu rtsa dgu pa rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / su ren nga bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba band
341b1(dkon brtsegs): ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ bam po gcig sh+lo ka nyis brgya// / 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam
341b2(dkon brtsegs): grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u sum cu pa ste/ bu mo dro gros bzang mos zhus pa/ bam po byed do// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sum
341b3(dkon brtsegs): tidA ri ka br-its+tsha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa bu mo blo gros bzang mos zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tsha
341b4(dkon brtsegs): lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khang na/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub
341b5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' khri'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po na/ khyim bdag drag shul can gyi bu mo mo
341b6(dkon brtsegs): gros bzang mo zhes bya ba btsas nas lo brgyad len pa 'dra ba/ gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba
341b7(dkon brtsegs): byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa/ sangs rgyas 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu med pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba
342a1(dkon brtsegs): / bskyed pa zhig 'dug pa de 'khor dang bcas par bya rgod kyi phung po'i rig la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der srong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo
342a2(dkon brtsegs): bros phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das lnga lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug sde/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol ba/ gal tre skams phye bdag
342a3(dkon brtsegs): gis ni// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog/ 'jig rten snang bar mdzad pa le/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod gang zhu// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// yid la ci 'dod
342a4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad ni// bu mo khyod kyis dri bar gyis// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa kun// ci 'dra khyod la bstan par bya/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ bu mo blo gros bzang mos
342a5(dkon brtsegs): tshogs su bcad de gsol ba/ gang gis su ni mdzes par 'gyur// gang gis nor ni che ba dang // mi phyed 'khor dang ldan par 'gyur// thub pas 'di ni bdag la gsungs// chos kyi rgyal po'i/
342a6(dkon brtsegs): spyan sngar ni// gang gis rdzus te skye 'gyur zhing // 'dab ma stong ldan pad+ma la// mchis par yang ni gda' ba dang // zhing rnams bye ba dpag yas par// sangs rgyas phyag bgyir mchi ba yi//
342a7(dkon brtsegs): rdzu 'phrul pha rol phyin 'gyur ba'i// spyod pa rgyal bas lung bsan gsol// dgra zla ma mchis gang gis 'gyur// tshig kyang btsun par 'gyur ba dang // las kyi slob pa ma mchis dang /
342b1(dkon brtsegs): bdud kyi las kun ma mchis dang // 'chi ba'i dus ni bgyid pra na// mngon sum sangs rgyas mthong ba dang // de las chos kyang nyan pa dang // sdug bsngal tshor ba spyod mi 'gyur/
342b2(dkon brtsegs): de skad ces gsol ba dang // bcom ldan 'das kyis/ bu mo blo mos bzang mo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bu mo khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di 'dri bar sems
342b3(dkon brtsegs): ba legs so legs so// bu mo de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dngangs bshad do// bu mo bro gros bzang mes/ bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan
342b4(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i chos bzhi dang ldan na mdzes par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
342b5(dkon brtsegs): tha na ras la'ang khro bar mi byed pa dang / byams pa la gnas pa dang / chos 'dod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgra gzug byed du 'jug pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi de de dag
342b6(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan na/ mdzes par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gnod pa'i rtsa ba khro ba 'phel mi byed// byams la gnas par byed dang chos 'dod dang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs/
342b7(dkon brtsegs): byas na ni// mdzes par 'gyur te blta bar 'os pa yin// bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ nor che bar 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dus su sbyin pa dang / 'gyod
343a1(dkon brtsegs): pa med par sbyin pa dang / yid du 'ong ba sbyin pa dang / rnam par smin pa la re ba med par sbyin pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ nor che
343a2(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dus su byin dang 'gyod pa med pa dang // yid 'ong sbyin dang rnam smin mi re ga/ dpa' bo rnams ni las 'di byas pa na// rtag tu longs spyod chen po
343a3(dkon brtsegs): thob pa yin// bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ 'khor mi byed par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phra ma'i tshig spangs pa dang / sems can log par lta ba rnams yang dag
343a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i lta ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'jog par byed pa dang / dam pa'i chos 'jig pa'i tshe dam pa'i chos srung ba dang / sems can rnams sangs rgyas kyi byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing
343a5(dkon brtsegs): 'jog par byed pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na// 'khor mi phyed par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ phra ma de bzhin log par lta ba spong // dam chos 'jig
343a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshe na srung bar byed// sems can byang chub yang dag 'dzin 'jug na// 'khor rnams mi phyed phun sum tshogs par 'gyur// bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan ma/ sangs rgyas bcom
343a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das rnams kyi thad du/ rin po che chen po'i pad+ma las rdzus he skye bar 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phye ma 'am/ me tog ut+pa la 'am/ ku mu da 'am/ pad+ma dkar pos lag pa bkang ste/
343b1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la 'bul ba dang / gzhan dag la'ang gnod sems mi skyed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs bad+ma'i
343b2(dkon brtsegs): gdan la bzhugs pa byed du 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la nges pa rgya cher mos pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tha
343b3(dkon brtsegs): du rin po che chen po'i pad+ma las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ phye ma me tog bkang ste 'bul ba dang // gnod sems spyod zhong sku gzugs byed pa dang // mos pa rgya
343b4(dkon brtsegs): chen la ni gnas byed na// rgyal ba dag gri zed du rdzus te skye// bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ rdzu 'phrul gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyis zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur te/
343b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gzhan dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar chad mi byed pa dang / gzhan dag chos nyan pa la bar chad mi byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mched rten dag la mar me 'dul ba
343b6(dkon brtsegs): dang ting nge 'dzin sgom pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ rdzu 'phrul gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces
343b7(dkon brtsegs): bya ste rje dge ba dag gi bar chad mi byed dang gzhan gyi chos gtam dag la mi smod dang // rgyal ba'i mchod rten dag la mar me 'bul// ting 'dzin bsgoms pas de ni zhing du 'gro// bu mo
344a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ dgra zla med par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ g.yo med par dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag la rten pa dang /
344a2(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i rtsa ba la ser sna mi byed pa dang / gzhan gyi rnyed pa la dga' ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bya ba dang / gnas pa thams cad la khong khro bar mi byed cing / mi snyan pa mi
344a3(dkon brtsegs): sgrogs pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ dgra zla med par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la de g.yo med//
344a4(dkon brtsegs): gzhan gyi rnyed pa dga' zhing ser sna med// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod la mi smod na// rtag tu dgra zla med par spyod par 'gyur// bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ tshig btsun par
344a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa dang / mdza' bo dag la yod pa'i rang bzhin mi 'chab pa dang / kran+da ka mi tshol bar chos nyan pa dang / gzhan chos smra ba dag la 'phya/
344a6(dkon brtsegs): sgyur mi byed pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' ches bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ tshig btsun par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa dang / mdza' la yod pa'i rang bzhin
344a7(dkon brtsegs): mi 'chab cing // klan ka me tshol chos ni nyan byed na// 'jigs pa med cing tshig kyang btsun par 'gyur// bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ las kyi sgrib pa med par 'gyur zhing yongs
344b1(dkon brtsegs): su dag pa'ang myur du rtogs par 'gyur te/ bzhig pa zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ skrag pa'i bsam pa bsgrubs pas sdom pa gsum yang dag par len pa dang / mdo sde zab mo rnams mi song ba dang / sems dang po
344b2(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'du shes bskyed pa dang // sems can thams cad la byams pa bsgom pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ las
344b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi sgrib pa med par 'gyur zhing yongs su dag pa'ang myur du rtogs par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ lhag pa'i bsam pas sdom pa gsum la gnas// mdo sde zab mo rnams la rtag tu mos//
344b4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas sras la thams cad ma khyen lhur lta// sems can rnams la byams pas las dag 'gyur// bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ bdud kyi las med par 'gyur te/ bani gang zhe na/ 'di/
344b5(dkon brtsegs): g+ha ste/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du bsgom pa dang / brtson 'grus brtsam pa dang / sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po/
344b6(dkon brtsegs): de dag dang ldan na/ bdud kyi las med par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ chos rnams la ni chos kyi tshul rtogs la// brtson 'grus gnas shing sangs rgyas rjes su dran// yongs su bsngo zhing bshags/
344b7(dkon brtsegs): dang phyag 'tshal ba// de la bdud kyis glags ni rnyed mi 'gyur// bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe mdun du sangs rgyas bzhugs shing / de las chos kyang nyan la sdug
345a1(dkon brtsegs): bya/ bsngal yang myong bar mi 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gzhan dag gi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / mos pa mang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa
345a2(dkon brtsegs): bkod pa sna tshogs nye bar sgrub pa dang / dkon mchog gsum mchod pa la brtson pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe mdun du sangs rgyas bzhugs/
345a3(dkon brtsegs): shing rnga de las chos kyang nyan la sdug bsngal yang myong bar mi 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ de ni gzhan gyi bsam pa rdzogs byed cing // mos pa dang ni sbyin pa rgya che ba// mkhas pa de nig
345a4(dkon brtsegs): tu sbyin par byed// de phyir de mdun de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs// de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la/ bu mo rje chos bzang mos 'di skad ces gsol to// sum
345a5(dkon brtsegs): pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa ji skad bcas pa 'di dag la bdag gis bslab par 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gis bzhi pa bcu po ji skad du bka' stsal pa 'di
345a6(dkon brtsegs): dag las ches gcig gcig ma spyad na'ang / bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bslus par gyur cig/ de nas gnas brtan mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos/ bu mo blo gros bzang mo//
345a7(dkon brtsegs): la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa ni nyams 'og tu chud par dka' na/ khyod 'di lta bu yang dag par len par byed na/ ci khyod kyis sems la dbang thob bam/ de
345b1(dkon brtsegs): skad ces smras nas/ bu mo b+h+yo gros bzang mos/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa mo'u 'ga' kyi bu 'dren pa dang / bden pa'i tshig gang gris bdag gis
345b2(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ba'i bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig des spyong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dri rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/ lha'i me tog gi char
345b3(dkon brtsegs): 'bab par gyur cig/ ma dkrol bar yang sil snyan gyi sgra byung bar gyur cig ces byas so// de nas bu me bre gros bzang mos de lhur bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs byas ma thag tu/ de'i modado la stong gsum
345b4(dkon brtsegs): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/ lha'i me tog gi char bab par gyur cing / ma dkrol bar lha'i sil snyan gyi sgra'ang byung bar gyur to// sun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu bden pa
345b5(dkon brtsegs): dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ji lta ba de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ bdag de bzhin gshegs par
345b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bdag la bdud kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba dang / ngam song rnams kyi ming yang med pa dang / bud med kyi skyon rnams med par 'gyur ba'i bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig nges 'a'o//
345b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di gser gyi kha dog can du gyur cig/ bu mo blo zos bzang mos tshig de skad ces smras ma thag tu de'i mod la thams cad dang ldan po'i 'khor de gser gyi kha dog can du gyur to// de nas
346a1(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po stan las langs te/ chos gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la/
346a2(dkon brtsegs): ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tsha
346a3(dkon brtsegs): lo/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ bu mo blo gros bzang mo la 'di skad ces smras so// blo gros bzung mo khyod chos gang la gnas te/ bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs 'di byas
346a4(dkon brtsegs): blo gros bzang mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal chos kyi dbyings ni gnas pa ma mchis pas/ de la gnas par mi nus te/ 'di la dri ba ma mchis so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ blo gros bzang mo/
346a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub ces bya ba 'di gang gi tshig bla dgas yin/ blo gros bzang mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub ces bgyi ba ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i chos kyi tshig bla dgas so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/
346a6(dkon brtsegs): blo gros bzang mo 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di gang gi tshig bla dgas yin/ blo gros bzang mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba ni nam mkha' dang mnyam
346a7(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyi chos kyi tshig bla dgas so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ blo gros bzang mo ci de bzhin gshegs pa'ang byang chub kyi phyir spyad pa mdzad dam/ blo gros bzang mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal dper na
346b1(dkon brtsegs): smig rgyu dang brag chas byang chub kyi phyir spyad pa de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas kyang byang chub kyi phyir spyad/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa blo gros bzang mo khyod kyis ci las bsams te de skad ces smras/
346b2(dkon brtsegs): gros bzang mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'di la chos 'ga' la'ang bsam pa 'am/ bsam pa ma lags pa ma mchis so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ blo gros bzang mo bsam pa de lta bu yin
346b3(dkon brtsegs): du zin na/ byis pa thams cad kyang byang chub tu 'gyur ro// blo gros bzang mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du dgongs/ byis pa rnams kyang gzhan la/ mkhas pa rnams kyang gzhan te/ byang
346b4(dkon brtsegs): chub kyang gzhan par gzigs sam/ de co'i slad du zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul du 'di ni dbyings gcig pa lags te/ blang ba ma mchis shing dor ba ma mchis la spro btags pa ma
346b5(dkon brtsegs): mchis so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ blo gros bzang mos bshad pa 'di'i don shes pa ji snyed cig yod/ blo gros bzang mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal bshad pa 'di'i don 'tshal ba ni sgyu ma
346b6(dkon brtsegs): sprul pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba ji snyed mchis pa de snyed do// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ blo gros bzang mo sprul pa nyid kyang med na/ de'i sems dang sems las byung ba lta ga la yod
346b7(dkon brtsegs): blo gros bzang mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal chos kyi dbyings mchis pa'ang ma lagasan ma mchis pa'ang ma lags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'ang de dang 'dra'o// de nas bcom ldan
347a1(dkon brtsegs): 'das la/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bu mo blo gros bzang mo 'di ni dab mo'i bzod pa dang ldan pa nI //
347a2(dkon brtsegs): mtshar lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa bzhin te/ bu mo blo gros bzang mo yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yung
347a3(dkon brtsegs): dag par zhugs nas/ bskal pa sum cu lon pa'i 'og tu gdod ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// khyod kyang bu mo blo gros bzang mo 'di nyid kyis mi skye
347a4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i chos la zhugs par byas so// de nas 'jam dpal gzho// nur gyur pa stan las langs te/ bu mo blo gros bzang mo la phyag byas nas/ tshig 'di skad du bdag gis slob dpon
347a5(dkon brtsegs): yun ring po zhig na mthong dro zhes kyang smras so// blo gros bzang mos smras pa/ 'jam dpral ma rtog cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir ro// 'jam
347a6(dkon brtsegs): dpal gyis smras pa/ ci'i phyir slob dpon gyis bud med kyi lus las da dung ma bsgyur/ blo gros bzang mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'di ni bud med do// 'di ni skyes pa'o zhes bya ba de ni dmigs pa ste/
347a7(dkon brtsegs): 'on kyang khyod kyis theg tshom med par bya'o// bden pa gang gis bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba'i bden
347b1(dkon brtsegs): pa des bdag skyes par gyur sdi// bu mo blo gros bzang mos tshig de skad ces smras ma thag tu de'i mod la/ de'i bud med kyi dngos po mi snang bar gyur nas/ skyes par red de/ chos gos
347b2(dkon brtsegs): ngur smrig gyon nas/ des 'di skad du bden pa gang gris bdag gis byang chub thob pa na/ dge slong tshur shog ces byas pas rab tu byung bar 'gyur ba dang / bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing
347b3(dkon brtsegs): der bdud kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba dang / ngan song gi ming yang med pa dang / bud med kyi skyon rnams kyang med par 'gyur ba'i bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig des bdag dge slong bsnyen
347b4(dkon brtsegs): bar rdzogs nas lo sum cu lon pa'i spyod lam ci 'dra ba de lta bur gyur cig ces byas so// byang chub sems dpa' blo gros bzang pos tshig de skad ces smras ma thag tu de'i mong
347b5(dkon brtsegs): la de dge slong bsnyen par rdzogs nas li sum cu lon pa'i spyod lam ci 'dra ba de lta bur gyur to// 'jam dpal bden pa dang / bden pa'i chog gang gis bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi ni
347b6(dkon brtsegs): du sems can rnams kyi lus gser gyi kha dog lta bur 'gyur ba dang / bsams pas bza' ba dang btung ba 'grub par 'gyur te/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi longs spyod
347b7(dkon brtsegs): dang yongs su smod pa ji lta bzhin du 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na ngan song gsum yongs su spangs par 'gyur ba dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi shing ljon pa dang / rin po che'i
348a1(dkon brtsegs): suH/ dra bas yongs su bskor cing rin po che sna bdun gyi pad+ma dag gis rgyas la/ steng rin po che'i bla re bres te/ 'jam dpal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing ci 'dra ba khon dang mnyam
348a2(dkon brtsegs): zhing mi lhag pa de lta bur 'gyur ba'i bden pa dang / badren pa'i tshig des 'khor 'di gser gyi kha dog can du gyur cig ces byas so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros bzang pos tshig de skad smras ma
348a3(dkon brtsegs): ma thag tu de'i mod la thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de gser gyi kha dog can du gyur to// dri nas su bu'i lha rnams kyi lha'i lus kyis gcig nus gcig tu sgra bsgrags shing skad kyis go
348a4(dkon brtsegs): bar byas te/ kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros bzang po byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ni de lta bur 'gyur ro zhes ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do//
348a5(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' blo gros bzang po 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
348a6(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan
348a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jas yon tan rin chen dpal gyi snying po zhes bya bar 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bka' stsal pa na/ srog chags bye ba zag sum cu bla na med pa
348b1(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa nyid la yang dag par gnas par gyur to// lnga bye ba phrag brgyad cu ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/
348b2(dkon brtsegs): srog chags brgyad stong gis ni ye shes mngon par rdzogs par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i dge slong byang chub kyi sems las phyir mi ldog par 'dod pa lnga sdong tsam yang
348b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' blo gros bzang po'i lhag pa'i bsam pa rtogs shing dge ba'i rtsa ba'i che ba nyid mthong nas/ de dag rang rang gi blo gos bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la gsol te/ lhag pa'i bsam pa dran
348b4(dkon brtsegs): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos nas tshig 'di skad du/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur cig ces
348b5(dkon brtsegs): smras so// dge slong de dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos ma thag tu bskal pa dgu bcu'i 'khor ba bsnyil tre dor nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par
348b6(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gnas par gyur to// de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis lung bstan te/ 'jam dpal dge slong 'di dag ni bsal ba bcu gnyis
348b7(dkon brtsegs): na rje bskal pa dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba la/ de bzhin gshegs pa bzod par dka' ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer can du bskal pa gcig la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i/
349a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa spobs pa'i rgyun ces bya bar thams cad ming 'thun par 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
349a2(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal de ltar na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / nyan thos rnams la rdzu 'phrul chen po byed pa yin no// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/
349a3(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu mo byang chub 'dod pa gang gris bskal pa stong gi bar du thabs mkhas pa dang ma thul bas/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug spyad la/ gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bris nas zla ba phyed kyi bar du ldan re dkrug
349a4(dkon brtsegs): na rje bsod nasas kyi phung po snga mas ni/ bsod nams kyi phung po 'di'i brgya'i char yang mi phod/ stong gi cha dang / brgya stong gi cha dang / bye ba brgya stong gi cha dang / grangs dang / dpe dang / rgyur yang mi bzod do//
349a5(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal de bas na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di khyod la gtad kyis khyed mthun par gyis la sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam las byung ba'i mdo 'di lta bu 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus na zung zhig/ kun chud par
349a6(dkon brtsegs): gyis shig/ chongs shig/ shod cig/ lhogs shig/ ston cig/ gzhan dag la rgya che rab tu ston cig/ 'jam dpal dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ji srid du gnas pa de srid du rin po che sna bdun
349a7(dkon brtsegs): med par mi 'gyur la/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po shi na rin po che sna bdun med par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal de bzhin du chos kyi rnam grangs pa de lta bu 'di 'jig rten ni ji srid du spyod pa de srid du/ de
349b1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi yang lag rin po che sna bdun dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi tshul thams cad med par mi 'gyur la/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu 'di med par myu na/ dam pa'i chos
349b2(dkon brtsegs): nub par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal de bas na mdo sde rin po che 'di lta bu 'di yi ger bri ra dang / lung 'bogs pa dang / bcang ba dang / klog pa dang / gzhun drug la rgya cher rab tu bsan pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
349b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis brtson 'grus brtsam par bya'o// 'di ni nga'i rjes su bstan pa yin no// phyis 'gyod par gyur tA re/ 'di ni rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo byang chub 'dod pa
349b4(dkon brtsegs): la ngas bstan pa yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' blo gros bzang po dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / thams cad dang
349b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dkon mchog
349b6(dkon brtsegs): brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya pa las/ 'phags pa bu mo blo grongs bzang mos zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste sum cu pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po
349b7(dkon brtsegs): dzi na mi tra dang / su ren dra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// / rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya ga
350a1(dkon brtsegs): go ta ra brits+tsha mA hA yA na nAm sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa gang ga'i mchog gis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' tha
350a2(dkon brtsegs): cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad dgu gis thos be dus gcig na nA bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rdul bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/
350a3(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe grong khyer chen po mnyan yod na/ dge bsnyen ma gang ga'i mchog ces bya ba zhig gnas so// de nas dge bsnyen ma gang ga'i mchog mnyan yod nas byung nas/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal
350a4(dkon brtsegs): mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba ga la ba der srong sde phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang / bcom
350a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis mkhyen bzhin du dge bsnyen ma grang gA'i mchog lA/ gang gA'i mchog khyod da gzod gang nas 'ongs shes smras// gadra ga'i mchog gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang zhig gis
350a6(dkon brtsegs): sprul pa la smras te/ khyod da gzod gang nas 'ongs shes de skad bgyis na/ ji skad lan 'drebs bur 'gyur lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang ga'i mchog sprul pa la ni 'bed pa med/
350a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dug pa med/ nyal ba med/ 'ong ba med/ 'gro ba med/ 'chi 'pho med/ skye ba med na 'di nas 'ongs so zhes de ci zhig ston par 'gyur/ gang ga'i mchog gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci chos
350b1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad sprul pa lnga bu ma lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ gang ga'i mchog de bzhin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad sprul pa lta bu lags na/ gang ga'i mchog khyod da gzod
350b2(dkon brtsegs): gdu nas 'ongs zhes ci'i slad du sU/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang ga'i mchog sprul pa ni ngan song du mi 'gro/ mtho ris su mi 'gro/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das par mi 'gro na/
350b3(dkon brtsegs): ga'i mchog kyang ngan song du mi 'gro/ mtho ris su mi 'gro/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das par mi 'gro 'am/ gang gA'i mchog gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gis dge bsnyen ma
350b4(dkon brtsegs): gang ga'i mchog sprul pa'i rang bzhin las gzhan lags par mthong na ni/ dge bsnyen ma gang ga'i mchog ngan song du mchi ba 'am/ mtho ris su mchi ba 'am/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das par
350b5(dkon brtsegs): mchi ba ma lags so zhes bdag sprul pa dang bstun du'ang mi rung lags na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni dge bsnyen ma gang ga'i mchog sprul pa'i rang bzhin las gzhan lags par ma mthong ste/
350b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gi ma mthong na/ dge bsnyen ma gang ga'i mchog ngan song du mchi ba 'am/ mtho ris su mchi ba 'am/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das par mchi ba zhes ji skad bstan par bgyi/
350b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de lta lags kyis kyang / g.yo ba dang / rlom sems dang / bskyod pa dang / spros pa mchis na/ 'di snyam du bdag ngan song du 'gro ba 'am/ mtho ris su 'gro ba 'am/ yongs su mya
351a1(dkon brtsegs): ngan las 'das par 'gro ba'o snyam du sems lags te/ bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings ni nams kyang dran song du mchi ba'am/ mtho ris su mchi ba 'am/
351a2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su mya ngan las 'das par mchi ba ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das dge bsnyen ma gang ga'i mchog kyang de lta bu'i dbyings can lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang gi mchog
351a3(dkon brtsegs): khyod ci yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la yang dag par ma zhugs sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das su zhig gis mi skye ba la rmas te/ khyod yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la ma zhugs sam zhes de dad
351a4(dkon brtsegs): bgyis na/ ji skad lan 'debs par 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang ga'i mchog mi skye ba zhes bya ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshig bla dgas yin na/ de ci zhig lan 'debs
351a5(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur/ gang ga'i mchog gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci chos thams cad mya ngan las 'das pa dang mtshungs pa lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ gang gA'i mchog de de bzhin te/ chos tham
351a6(dkon brtsegs): cad ni mya ngan 'das pa dang mtshungs so// grasol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad mya ngan las 'das pa dang mtshungs pa lags na/ gang ga'i mchog khyod yongs su mya ngan las 'das
351a7(dkon brtsegs): pa la yang dag par ma zhugs sam zhes de ci zhig smra ste/ bcom ldan 'das su zhig gis sprul pa la smras te/ khyod yongs su mya ngan las 'das par yang dag par ma zhugs sam zhes de skad gyis
351b1(dkon brtsegs): na/ ji skad lan 'debs par 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ grang ga'i mchog dri ba 'di ni dmigs pa med pa'o// gsol pa/ ci som ldan 'das kyis dmigs pa dang sa
351b2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sbu bas smras lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ gang ga'i mchog dri ba 'di ni dmigs pa med mod kyi/ 'on kyang 'khor 'di na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'dul ba dag yod de/ de dag
351b3(dkon brtsegs): gi don chen por 'gyur bas dris so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang ga'i mchog de bzhin gshegs pas ni chos nyid ces pa'ang mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas na/ gang de lus byung ba'i chos
351b4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa gnas pa lta ga la zhig yod/ gsol pa/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis chos nyid ces bgyi ba'ang mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas te/ de las byung
351b5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i chos lta ga la zhig mchis par gyur nu/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub kyi slad du ji ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bsgrubs lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkakra' stsal pa/ gung
351b6(dkon brtsegs): ga'i mchog gang dmigasu pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa du ma yin te/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de ni gang gi tshe yang drag par sgrib pa'i tshe 'ang bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid mi 'dir/ gang gi ni
351b7(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par mi sgrub pa de'i tshe'ang bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid mi 'dor ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bsam gyis mi khyab pa la bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bgyi ba ci'i slad du/ bsam gyis
352a1(dkon brtsegs): mi khyab pa lA bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang ga'i mchog chos 'di ni sems pas thob par bya ba ma yin te/ sems
352a2(dkon brtsegs): bras rdzob par bya bar mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar 'di ni sems nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang sems las rab tu byung ba'i chos lta ga la yod/ gang ga'i mchog sems mi dmigs pa nings/
352a3(dkon brtsegs): gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyud ces bya'o// bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyud gang yin pa de ni thob pa ma yin/ mngon par rtogs pa ma yin/ shes pa ma yin/ mngon sum du byas pa ma yin te/ de ni thob par bya
352a4(dkon brtsegs): ba ma yin/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang ga'i mchog 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pas ni chos thams cad nam mkha' ltar nges par thugs su
352a5(dkon brtsegs): chung de/ gang ga'i mchog chos thams cad ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa gnyen po med pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa gnyen po ma mchis/
352a6(dkon brtsegs): pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gzugs shes btags pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zhes btags pa dang / phung po rnams dang / khams rnams
352a7(dkon brtsegs): dang skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa ma mchis pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / 'khor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das/
352b1(dkon brtsegs): pa zhes btags pa ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang gA'i mchog 'di lta ste/ dper na bdag bdag ces 'dogs kyang / bdag gang yang mi dmigs pa de bzhin du// gangaga'i
352b2(dkon brtsegs): mchog ngas gzugs shes btags te/ gzugs gang yang mi dmigs so// de bzhin du ngas tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zhes btags te/ rnam par shes rag
352b3(dkon brtsegs): yang mi dmigs so// phung po rnams dang / khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam
352b4(dkon brtsegs): bar byang ba dang / 'khor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba'ang ngas btags te/ mya ngan las 'dras pa gang yang mi dmigs so// gang ga'i mchog 'di lnga ste/ dper na smig rgyu rnams la ni chu yong med de mi
352b5(dkon brtsegs): dmigs so// gang gA'i mchog de bzhin du ngas gzugs shes bya ba btags kyang gzugs gang yang mi dmigs so// ngas tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba
352b6(dkon brtsegs): btags kyang rnam par shes pa gang yang mi dmigs so// phung po rnams dang / khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / zug pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang //
352b7(dkon brtsegs): kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / 'khor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba ngas btags kyang / don dam par na de dag thams cad med cing mi dmigs so// gang ga'i mchog gang chos la
353a1(dkon brtsegs): mchog tu 'dzin pa med par tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa de lta bu ni legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa yin no// gang ga'i mchog mngon pa'i nga
353a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyargyul can gnas la dmigs nas tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa de dag gi tshangs par spyod pa de ni yongs su ma dag pa'o zhes nga smra'o// gang dag tshangs par spyod pa yongs su ma dag pa de dag ni zab mo rgyud chad pa'i
353a3(dkon brtsegs): chos 'di lta ba 'di thos nas sngangs skrag par 'gyur te/ de dag skye ba dang / rku ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / bzug pa rnams
353a4(dkon brtsegs): las yongs su mi 'grol te/ de dag ni sdug bsngal gyi skal ba can du 'gyur ro zhes nga smra'o// gang ga'i mchog da ltar ram/ nga 'das pa'i phyi na'ang rung ste/ gang dag zang mo rgyud chad pa 'di lta bu'i chos ston pa de
353a5(dkon brtsegs): dag la/ mi gti mug pa dag bsod pa'i 'du shes skyed par 'gyur te/ de ltar mi gti mug pa de drag log par zin pas bsad pa'i zhe sdang bskyed nas/ ngan song du 'gro drar 'gyur ro// gang gA'i mchog gis
353a6(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rgyud chud pa rgyud chad pa zhes bgyi ba ci'i sdud du na rgyud chad pa zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang ga'i mchog tshes 'di ni rgyud bcad pa 'am/ dbye ba 'am/
353a7(dkon brtsegs): rnam par gzhig pa ma yin te/ de'i phyir rgyud bcad pa zhes bya ste/ 'di ni yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyud ces bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe
353b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs kha dog du ma 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / btsod ku dang / shes dang /
353b2(dkon brtsegs): dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag kyang byung nas/ de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag snang bar byas te/ 'od kyis khyab par byas nas/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par byung ste/
353b3(dkon brtsegs): slar log nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgor nung // de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzur te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lga nga sA la gtsugs nas/
353b4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni rgyu ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi
353b5(dkon brtsegs): mdzad na/ 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo ngas mngon par shes te/ sa phyogs 'di nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa stong
353b6(dkon brtsegs): gis gang ga'i mchog ces bya ba kho na'i dge bsnyen ma sha sug las brtsams te chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad do// dge bsnyen ma de dag thams cad ni rab tu byung nas/ phung po med pa'i mya ngan las/
353b7(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol te// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam thas
354a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dri ma med pa zhes bya ste/ 'di dri ma med pa zhes
354a2(dkon brtsegs): bya bar zung zhig/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa na dge slong bdun brgya dang / dge slong ma bzhi brgya len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa
354a3(dkon brtsegs): dang gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis lha'i me tog rnams dang / tsan dan gyi phye ma rnams mngon par sprul te/ bcom ldan 'das la gtor nas tshig 'di skad ces 'di ltar grong khyer ma nyan yod na
354a4(dkon brtsegs): dge bsnyen ma 'di lta bu gnas la/ de de bzhin gshegs pa dang lhan cig spa'ang / de'i lus ngal bar yang mi 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar gang ga'i mchog 'di sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas shing dge ba'i
354a5(dkon brtsegs): rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / yun ring po nas dge ba spyad pa dang / yun ring po nas tshangs par spyad pa dang / sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa 'di ni ngo mtshar te zhes smras so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
354a6(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag de de bzhin te/ 'di ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ yum ring du tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa'o// bcom ldan
354a7(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge bsnyen ma gang ga'i mchog dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa
354b1(dkon brtsegs): la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya pa las/ 'phags pa gang ga'i mchog gis zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ 'dus pa su
354b2(dkon brtsegs): cu rtsa gcig pa rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ran+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang cos
354b3(dkon brtsegs): nas gtan la phabA pa/ shr-i ka brgya dang bcu'o// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ma sho ka dang ta b+ha ka ra Na~M nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa
354b4(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan med kyis byin pa lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// / bam po gcig go/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad
354b5(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la/ dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' brgyad stong thams cad
354b6(dkon brtsegs): kyang gzungs thob pa/ spobs pa thogs pa med pa/ mngon par shes pa bsgrubs pa la mkhas pa/ chos zab mo'i tshul la gnas pa/ stong pa nyid la gnas pa/ mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa/ smon pa
354b7(dkon brtsegs): med pa la gnas pa/ mi dmigs pa'i chos la gnas pa/ mi gnas par chis ston pa/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa dang ldan pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' lhun po dang /
355a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' lhun po chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' ye shes lhun po dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin chen seng ge dang / byang chub sems dpa' seng ge blo gros
355a2(dkon brtsegs): dang byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu lag brkyang dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu lag bsgreng dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu brtson dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu 'dzum zhing rab tu dga' ba dang /
355a3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' dbang po las 'das pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu gdung dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin chen sems dang / byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin chen dang / byang chub sems
355a4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' lag ni rin chen thogs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rin chen bkra ldan dang / byang chub sems dpa' kha lo sgyur dang / byang chub sem dpa' kha lo sgyur ba chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' bden pa la
355a5(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / skyes bu dam pa brgyad la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' bzang skyong dang / byang
355a6(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' dkon mchog 'byung gnas dang / byang chub sems dpa' phug sbas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dbang po'i lha dang / byang chub sems dpa' chu lha'i lha dang / byang chub sems dpa'
