355a7(dkon brtsegs): blo gros yangs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros khyad par can dang / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros 'phel dang / de la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' brgyad stong dang thabs cig tu zhugs
355b1(dkon brtsegs): so de nas de'i tshad bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po na gnas shing bzhugs pa la/ rgyal po ma skyes dgu dang / rgyal po'i dka' la gtogs pa dang / blon po dang / snga
355b2(dkon brtsegs): chen po la gtogs pa dang / zhang lon gyi bu tsa dang / zhabs drung na 'khod pa dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi drang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis bsti stang du byas/ rdza mar byas/
355b3(dkon brtsegs): mor byas/ mchod par byas te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston pa 'di lta ste/ tshangs par spyod pa/ thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge
355b4(dkon brtsegs): brda thar mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba rab tu ston to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i
355b5(dkon brtsegs): bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang / tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa rta thul dang / tshe rang
355b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa nye bar 'khor dang / tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin dang / tshe dang ldan pa nam gru dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / tshe dang ldan pa mu 'gags pa dang / de dag dung gzhan yang nyan thos chen po rab tu
355b7(dkon brtsegs): mang po rnams snga dro'i dus kyi tshe/ chos gos dang sham thabs bgos nas/ lhung bzed thogs te/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs so// de nas nyan
356a1(dkon brtsegs): thos chen po de dag rgyal po khab kyi grong khyer chen por mthar chags so bsod snyoms kyi phyir rgyu zhing / mthar gyis rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i pho brangag la ba der dong ste/ lhags nas
356a2(dkon brtsegs): phyogs gcig tu cang mi smra bar 'khod do// yang de'i tshe rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i pho brang na bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa zhes bya ba btsas nas lo bcu gnyis lon pa 'dra ba/ gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/
356a3(dkon brtsegs): blta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po/ rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rdzab bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas brgya stong mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa/ bla na med
356a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa de rang gi pha'i khang bzangs na khri gser gyi rkang pa can yod pa la 'dug par gyur to// de nas bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas nyan thos chen po de dag mthong nas khri de las
356a5(dkon brtsegs): ma langs te/ bsur yang mi 'gro/ phyag kyang mi byed/ gtam yang mi zer/ stan yang mi 'ding / bsod snyoms kyang mi 'bul bar kha rog ste 'dug go de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras
356a6(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos chen po de dag rgyal po'i pho brang du 'ongs zhes thos nas/ rang gi khung bzangs kyi snga gang ga la ba der song ste phyin+da nas/ nyan thos chen po de dag la mchog tu sdug par 'dzin pas/ mngon par
356a7(dkon brtsegs): dga' zhing stan yang bting ngo // rgyal po ma skyes dgras bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas nyan thos chen po de dag mthong bzhin du kha rog ste 'dug pa mthong nas/ bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa la 'dis
356b1(dkon brtsegs): ces smras so// bu mo 'di dag ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de'i nyan thos chen po ste/ che ba nyid kyi yon tan gyi chos dang
356b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa/ zag pa zad pa/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur byor ba/ bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba/ yongs su zad pa/ yang drag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol
356b3(dkon brtsegs): brda bsod nams kyi zhing du gyur pa/ snying brtse ba can yin te/ 'jig rten la snying brtse ba'i phyir/ bsod snyoms kyi phyir rgyu bar khyod kyis mi shes sam/ ci ma khyod kyis de dag mthong la/ mthong bzhin du rmi
356b4(dkon brtsegs): las kyang mi ldang / bsu bar yang mi byed/ phyag kyang mi 'tshal/ gtam yang mi zer/ stan dang bsod snyoms la'ang spyan mi 'dren/ dad pa dang gus pa'ang mi skyed par/ ci'i phyir ma gus pa ston cing
356b5(dkon brtsegs): kha rog ste 'dug/ khyod kyis don gyi dbang ci zhig mthong // de skad ces smras pa dang // bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas/ rang gi pha rgyal po ma skyes dgra la 'di skad ces smras so// yab
356b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di ji snyam du dgongs/ ci 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rgyal phran la ldang ngam/ bsur mchi ba nam yang gsan tama?/ gzigs sam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ bu mo de ni ma yin no// bu mos smras pa/
356b7(dkon brtsegs): yab ci lha'i dbang po brgya byin lha gzhan dag la ldang ngam/ bsur mchi 'am/ rgyal pos smras pa/ bu mo de ni ma yin no// bu mos smras pa/ yab ci mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa lha gzhan dag la ldang
357a1(dkon brtsegs): dam/ bsur mchi 'am/ rgyal pos smras pa/ bu mo de ni ma yin no// bu mos spras pa/ yab ci rgya mtsho chen po mtsho dang / mtshe'u dang / chu mig dang / mtsho bran dang / lteng ka dang /
357a2(dkon brtsegs): khron pa la phyag 'tshal ba gsan tam/ gzigs sam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ bu mo de ni ma yin no// bu mo sa smras pa/ yab ci ri'i rgyal pori rab ri nag po gzhan dag la 'dud pa 'am/ phyag 'tshal ba
357a3(dkon brtsegs): gsan tam/ gzigs sam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ bu mo de ni ma yin no// bu mos smras pa/ yab ci nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / skar ma'i tshogs srin bu me khyer gyi 'od 'dod pa gsan tam/ gzigs
357a4(dkon brtsegs): sam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ bu me de ni ma yin no// bu mos smras pa/ yab ci ri dgas kyi rgyal po seng ge wa la ldang ba 'am/ bsur mchi ba gsan tAm/ gzigs sam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ bu mo de
357a5(dkon brtsegs): ni ma yin no// bu mos smras pa/ yab de bzhin du su zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po'i seng ge'i sgra bsgrags la/ dman
357a6(dkon brtsegs): pa la mos pa'i nyan thos wa lta bur gyur pa/ byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po dang bral ba dag la dga' zhing ldang ba 'am/ bsur mchi ba 'am/ phyag 'tshal ba 'am/ bkur sti bgyid/ yab chos kyi rgyal
357a7(dkon brtsegs): po chen po su zhig chos kyi 'khor lo bla na med pa bskor tam/ skor bar bgyid pa na/ nyan thos dman pa/ zhan pa/ zhum pa/ nyi tshe ba'i shes pa dang ldan pa rnams la dga' bas phyag 'tshal ba 'am/ bdud par bgyid/
357b1(dkon brtsegs): yab lha'i bdag po lnga'i dbang po lta bu su zhig rnam par dag pa'i lha'i bdag po don du gnyer ba na/ dge ba chung ba'i lha lta bu'i rnan thos dag la 'dod pa 'am/ phyag 'tshal ba 'am/ ldang ba'am/ bsur mchi bar
357b2(dkon brtsegs): bgyid/ yab mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa lta bu su zhig 'jig rten na tshangs pa'i snga gang bla na med pa don du gnyer ba na/ dge ba'i rtsa chung ba'i tshangs pa lta bu'i nyan thos dag la 'dod pa'am/ ldang ba 'am/
357b3(dkon brtsegs): bsur mchi ba 'am/ phyag 'tshal bar bgyid/ yab su zhig ye shes rgya mtsho dpag tu med pa/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos rtogs pa 'tshol ba na/ ba lang gi rmig rjes kyi chu lta bu'i tshul khrims kyi
357b4(dkon brtsegs): rjes su song ba'i nyan thos dag la 'dod pa 'am/ ldang ba 'am/ bsun+ta mchi nga 'am/ phyag 'tshal bar bgyid/ yab su zhig ri rab lta bu'i bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs
357b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gzugs kyi sku don du gnyer ba na/ yungs 'bru lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang ldan pa'i nyan thos dag la ldang ba 'am/ bsur mchi ba 'am/ phyag 'tshal ba 'am/ 'dud pa 'am/ 'dod pa skyed
357b6(dkon brtsegs): par bgyid/ yab su zhig sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi che ba nyid shes rab dang / bsod nams dang / ye shes dang / yon tan nyi ma dang zla ba'i snang ba dpag tu med pa lta bu thos nas/ srin bu
357b7(dkon brtsegs): mkhyer gyi 'od lta bu'i rang gi rgyud la snang ba gnas pa/ gzhan gyi sgra'i rjes su song ba'i nyan thos dag gi rnam par grol ba la 'dod pa skyed par bgyid/ bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yongs su mu
358a1(dkon brtsegs): ngan las 'das kyang / nyan thos rnams la phyag mi 'tshal na/ bzhugs bzhin du lta ci smos/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ su zhig zla ba dang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor btang ste/ srin bu me
358a2(dkon brtsegs): khyer la phyag 'tshal bar bgyid/ yab gang nyan thos la rten pa ni nyan thos kyi sems dang gnas par 'gyur ro// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang stan na thams cad mkhyen pa rin po che'i sems
358a3(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa dang gnas par 'gyur ro// de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras/ bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'di ltar khyod nyan thos 'di dag mthong bzhin du mi ldang zhing bsur mi 'grol//
358a4(dkon brtsegs): phyag mi 'tshal zhing bsnyen bkur mi byed de/ 'di dag stan dang bsod snyoms la spyan mi 'dren pa ni/ bu mo khyed lhag pa'i nga rgyal can zhig go// de skad smras pa dang / bu mo mya dran med kyis byin pas/ rang gi
358a5(dkon brtsegs): pa rgyal po ma skyes dgra la 'di skad ces smras so// yab bdag ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal can ma lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ yab khyod nyid grong khyer gyi dbul po rnams la mi bzhengs/ bsub mi bzhud/ sman
358a6(dkon brtsegs): mi 'ding ba lags na/ khyod nyid lhag pa'i nga rgyal can lags pa snyam bgyid do// rgyal pos smras pa// bu mo de dag ni nga dang mtshungs pa ma yin no// bu mos smras pa/ yang de bzhin du byang chub sems
358a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa ni/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang mtshungs pa ma lags so// rgyal pos smras pa/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni nga rgyal dang dregs pa spangs te/ sem/
358b1(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad lnga 'dud cing phyag 'tshal bar mi byed dam/ bu mos spras/ yab byang chub sems dpa' ni/ khon du 'dzin pa dang / za ba dang / khro ba dang / gnod sems dang / nyes pa spang ba dang / dge ba'i
358b2(dkon brtsegs): rtsa ba yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du/ sems can thams cad la 'dud cing phyag 'tshal lo// yab nyan thos chen po 'di dag la mi ngon du 'dzin pa dang / khro ba dang / gnod sems dang / nyes pa spang ba dang /
358b3(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du/ khro ba dang / gnod sems dang // nyes pa bsal bar bgyi ba'ang ma mchis/ spang bar bgyid pa dang / dge ba 'phel bar bgyi ba'ang ma mchis te/ yab nyan
358b4(dkon brtsegs): thos thams cad la ni sangs rgyas 'bum gyis nyan thos kyi tshul khrims ji snyed pa dang / ting nge 'dzin ji snyed pa dang / shes rab ji snyed pas chos bstan du lags kyang / yab de dag la ni tshul khrims kyang ga
358b5(dkon brtsegs): las mchis/ ting nge 'dzin kyang ga las mchi/ shes rab kyang ga las mchi/ rnam par grol ba'ang ga las mchi/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'ang gA las mchi/ yab 'di lta ste/ dper na bum pa chab
358b6(dkon brtsegs): kyis bltams pa'i nang du char bab na/ de rab kyi thigs pa gcig kyang mi len la/ der gnas par yang mi 'gyur ro// yab de bzhin du nyan thos rnams la gal te sangs rgyas 'bum gyis chos bshad du lags
358b7(dkon brtsegs): kyang / de dag 'dzin par yang mi 'gyur la/ tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'ang de dag la gnas par mi 'gyur zhing / rnam par
359a1(dkon brtsegs): 'phel bar yang mi 'gyur ro// yab 'di lta ste/ dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni chu klung thams cad dang / char gyi rgyun thams cad 'dzin cing / der gnas par 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/
359a2(dkon brtsegs): rgya mtsho chen po ni tshad ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// yab byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgya mtsho lta bu de dag kyang de bzhin te/ rjes thams cad bstan pa'i chu thams cad yang dag par 'dzin cing / chos
359a3(dkon brtsegs): bsnun pa thams cad de la yang dag par gnas so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems kyi snod de ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
359a4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i slad du'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ ma skyes dgra yi bu mor gyur pa ni/ mya ngan med byin yon tan gzi brjid brgyan/ nyan thos lnga brgya dag ni lpags gyur kyang / de la phyag bya'i phyir ni de
359a5(dkon brtsegs): ma langs// ma skyes dgra yis de la smras pa ni// bu mo don 'di nga las mnyan par gyis// khyod kyis nyan thos lnga brgya mthong bzhin du// phyag bya'i phyir ni ci phyir ldang mi byed// bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin na
359a6(dkon brtsegs): re/ nyan thos 'di dag bdag gis mthong ba na// ci phyir phyag 'tshal bsam pa mi skye ba// bdag mchis yab cig tshig ni gsan par gsol// dper na mi zhig rgya mtshor mchis nas kyang // rin chen
359a7(dkon brtsegs): 'byung khung nas ni mching bu blangs// de bzhin bdag ni nyan thos thams cad kyang // ye shes dbyings nas nyan thos blangs snyam bgyid// dper na rgyal po nor gyi dbang phyug po// sa bdag 'khor los sgyur ba
359b1(dkon brtsegs): mnyes bgyis nas// kar sha pa Na gcig tsam gsol na nI// de yis rgyal po bsten pa don ma mchis// gang gis 'khor los sgyur ba mnyes bgyis nas// bye ba zag stong gsol ba bgyis nani/
359b2(dkon brtsegs): des ni dngul mang nor dang ldan par bgyid// des ni rgyal po legs par bstan pa lags// kA sha pa Na spong ba'i mi bzhin du// gang zhig sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas rnams// thos nas theg pa
359b3(dkon brtsegs): dman la 'dod skyed pa// nyan thos kun la bdag ni de snyam bgyid// nor rnams sgrub bgyid mi ni ji lta ba// byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa de 'dra ste/ rgyal ba chos kyi rgyal po mnyes bgyis shing /
359b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub reg nas sems can 'dul bar bgyid// dper na nad brgyas gzir rnams sman pa yis// grol bgyid de bzhin gzhan gyi sgra phyir 'brang ba yi// / nyan thos nyon mongs rnams kyis gzer ba
359b5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyang // byang chub sems dpa' sman pa lta bus grol bar dgyid// sems can mang po grol bgyid sman pa btang nas ni// sos gyur sems can la ni su zhig 'dud par 'gyid/
359b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sman par gnyer ba na// sos gyur nyan thos la ni su zhig 'dud par bgyid// ji ltar nad pa sos par gyur pa thams cad la// sman pa dag gis gso bar nus par 'gyur
359b7(dkon brtsegs): ba de bzhin nyan thos thams cad sos par gyur pa la// sangs rgyas sman pa dag gis gso bar mi spyod do// 'di na sman pa gang zhig bdag gis bdag nyid la// gso bar sems kyi sems can
360a1(dkon brtsegs): gzhan la ma lags te// de 'dra'i bdag nyid khengs par bci ba'i dargyal gyi// sman pa de dag la ni 'dod pa'i sems mi steg/ spyan pa gang zhig snying rje bsnyed nasu pa/
360a2(dkon brtsegs): nyid ji lta bu// de bzhin pha rol rnams kyang nang las grol bgyid pa// de ni mchod par 'os shing bsngags par bgyi ba dang // 'jig rten kun gyis gdung bar bgyi ba'i gnas kyang lags// glang gis
360a3(dkon brtsegs): ye shes rig pa gtso bo rtogs gyur nas// bdag nyid grol bar bgyid kyi sems can gzhan ma lags// de ni sman pa bdag nyid grol bar bgyid pa ltar// mkhas pa dag gis mchod par dgyi ba'i gnas
360a4(dkon brtsegs): ma lags// gang gis ye shes rig pa gtso bo rtogs gyur nas// sems can grangs med sdug bsngal dgra las grol bgyid pa// de dag byang chub mchog la 'dun pa skyed pa ste// de ni 'jig rten
360a5(dkon brtsegs): kun gyis bsngags par bgyi ba lags// e ran da yi shing sdong mdzes pa ma lags la// de dag rnams kyi grib ma'ang yangs pa ma lags te// e ran da yi shing 'dra nyan thos thams cad kyi// rnam
360a6(dkon brtsegs): par grol ba'i grib ma nye bar bsten ma lags// tsan dar mchog gi sdong chen dag ni tsha ba yis// gdungs pa'i skye bo rnams kyis nye bar bsten pa lags// de bzhin bdag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams
360a7(dkon brtsegs): la yang // lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dag gi don bgyid snyam// ba lang rmig rjes chu ni yangs ma lags// tshabs gdungs bzhi par mi bgyid la// gang+gA'i klung ni sems can bye ba spong // tshim pa
360b1(dkon brtsegs): bgyis nas rgya mtsho chen por mchi// ba lang rmig rjes chu 'dra'i nyan thos kun// sems can kun gyi tsha bzhi mi bgyid// gang+gA'i klung 'dra'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams// sems can mtha' yas chos/
360b2(dkon brtsegs): kyis tshim par bgyid// ji ltar rin chen char ni 'bab pa na// dbul po dag ni 'gron bu len par bgyid// gang zhig noraru mang de dag blangs nas ni// sems can dngul por nor dang ldan par dgyid// de
360b3(dkon brtsegs): lhur sangs rgyas rin chen chos char 'bebs// nyan thos rnams ni dam chos rin chen las// chung ngu 'dzin te byang chub sems dpa' rnams// sems can don srad mang du len par bgyid// ji ltar
360b4(dkon brtsegs): sems can dag ni ri rab kyi// drung du mchis na gser gyi mdog tu 'gyur// ri bo gzhan la sems can rnams mchis na// gser gyi kha dog can du yong mi 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' rnams
360b5(dkon brtsegs): nI ri rab bzhin// gang dag mthus ni lngar bcas skye dgu rnams// rnam grol mdog tu kha dog gcig tu 'gyur// nyan thos rnams kyi ye shes 'dod mi bgyid// yab cig ji ltar rtswa bran rtse mo yi
360b6(dkon brtsegs): zil pa'i thigs pas le tog rgya sna mi bgyid// rab tu khebs pa'i sprin gyis sa steng 'drir// tshim par bgyid cing lo trog 'phel bar bgyid// nyan thos thams cad zil pa'i thigs pa bzhin//
360b7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rang khebs sprin dang 'dra// snying rje mngon byas gang dag bsten na ni// stong gsum dam chos chu yis tshim par 'gyid// ka ra bI ra'i me tog dri mchog min// des mi skyes
361a1(dkon brtsegs): pa budra med dga' mi 'gyur// tsam pa ka yi me tog dril dga'// ut+pal bar shi ka yang de bzhin no// nyan thos kar bI ra'i dri bzhin te// de dag shes pas skye dgu
361a2(dkon brtsegs): dga' mi 'gyur// kun ma khyen dri can byang chub sems dpa' la// lha dang mi rnams rab tu dga' bar 'gyur// gcig pu mchi ba de la mtshar ci mchis// brang zhig sems can mtha' yas
361a3(dkon brtsegs): khrid pa rmad// nyan thos mi ring gcig pu mchi ba bzhin// byang chub sems dpa' dag ni ded dpon 'dra// mgron zhig gzhan gyis sul ba 'tshal ba dang // skye bo kun la stsol bgyid kun mgron
361a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin// sgra 'brang nyan thos kun ni mgron dang 'dra// byang chub sems dpa' kun la mgron bgyid bzhin// gzings la brten pas chu be chen po las// gzhan dgra bsgral bar nus par mi
361a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur gyi// brtan bgyis gru yi nang du zhugs na ni// sems can bye ba mang po sgrol bar bgyid// nyan thos gzings la rten pa lta bu ste// sems can gzhan dag sgrol bar ji ltar nus/
361a6(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub grur zhugs byang chub sems// sdug bsngal mtsho lus sems can sgrol bar bgyid// ji ltar g.yul der bong bu zhon na ni// dgra las rgyal bar nus par mi 'gyur gyi/
361a7(dkon brtsegs): glang chen rnga dang shing rta zhon na ni// g.yul du lhags pa'i dgra rnams choms par nus// nyan thos rnams ni bong bu zhon pa bzhin// byang chub sems dpa' glang chen zhon 'dra ste// sems can
361b1(dkon brtsegs): kun la phan dang de skad du// de dag shing dbang drung du 'dud kyang 'joms// ji ltar bar snang sar mas rgyas gyur cing // de dag gis ni mtshan mo mdzes mi 'gyur// zla ba rab tu rgyas pa sha bas rmi/
361b2(dkon brtsegs): mtshan mo mnga' la thig le bzhin du mdzes// yab cig nyan thos 'di dag skar ma 'dra// rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' zla ba bzhin// gang dag sems can kun la sman spyad du// ye shes na
361b3(dkon brtsegs): bas skye bo snang bar bgyid// yang cig srin bu me khyer tshogs 'od kyis// las rnams la ni 'jug par mi nus kyi// 'jam gling 'dra mchi ma'i 'od rnams kyis// bya ba sna tsog su bcu dag bgying
361b4(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur// nyan thos 'di dag sprin du me khyer 'dra// de dag shes 'od yang dgra mthong mi 'gyur// sangs rgyas rnam grol nyi ma lta bu yi// shes rab ye shes kyis ni sems can 'grol// yab cig
361b5(dkon brtsegs): wa brgya dag gis skad phyung yang // ri dgras tshogs rnams 'drog par mi 'gyur gyi// seng ge'i sad kyis glang chen ri dgus dang // byar bcas rnams kyang phyogs bcur 'byer bar 'gyur// yub cig
361b6(dkon brtsegs): de ltar nyan thos lnga 'drar gzigs// de dag skad kyis bdud rnams skrag mi 'gyur// rgyal po byang chub sems dpa'i spyod spyad pas// bdud dang de bzhin bdud ris skrag par 'gyur// yab cig rgyu
361b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di bdag gis mthong bas na// theg pa dman pa dag la 'ded mi skyed// su zhig bla med byang chub spangs nas ni// theg po dmon la 'dod pa skyed par bgyi// gang dag byang chub dam pa yongs spangs nas
362a1(dkon brtsegs): theg pa dman la 'dod pa skyed par bgyid// de dag 'tsho ngan rnyed pa thob ma gyur// de dag mir skyes pa ni nyes par mchi// gang dgra ltar bcas 'jig rten sman srad du// byang chub
362a2(dkon brtsegs): mchog la bdun pa skyed par bgyid// de dag legasa'i tsho rnyed pa legs par rnyed// de dag mi lus thob pa legs par mchis// gang dag lus dang ngag drang yid kyis kyang // 'jig rten sman smad las bgyid
362a3(dkon brtsegs): yid kyang rton// gang dag rtag tu sems can sman slad brtson// de dag u dum ba ra'i me tog bzhin// de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgra bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas tshigs su bcad pa bstan pa 'di dag thos nas
362a4(dkon brtsegs): cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'dra snyam du sems te/ kye ma bu mo 'di spongs pa thogs pa med pa zhig na/ ci bzod pa thob bam/ ma thob pa bdag gis 'di brtag par byar
362a5(dkon brtsegs): des so snyam mo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ bu mo mya dran med kyis byin pa la 'dri skad ces smras so// ci bu mo khyod nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs sam/ smras pA/ ma yin no// rang sangs
362a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs sam/ smras pa/ ma yin no// bu mo khyod ci zhig dron du gnyer na/ 'di ltar seng ge'i sgra sgrogs par byed/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu gal te bdag chos 'gru
362a7(dkon brtsegs): zhig don du gnyer na ni/ bdag seng ge'i sgra ci'ang mi sgrogs pa zhig na/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar bdag ni chos gang yang den du mi gnyer te/ de'i phyir bdag seng ge'i sgra sgrogs so// btsun pa shA ri'i
362b1(dkon brtsegs): bu gang yang 'di skad du ci bu mo khyod theg pa la yang dag par zhugs sam zhes zer ba ni/ btsun pa shA ri'i bus chos gang mngon sum du byas pa'i chos de la ni/ ci nyan thos zhes byaba'am/ rang sangs
362b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas zhes bya ba 'am/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i theg pa rnam par gzhag pa yod dam/ gnas brtan shA ri'i bus smras pa/ bu mo chos de la ni theg pa rnam par gzhag pa med de/
362b3(dkon brtsegs): chos de ni 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bla mtshan nyid med pa'i chos la don du gnyer ba ci zhig yod/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ bu mo chos de la ni don
362b4(dkon brtsegs): du gnyer ba ci'ang med do// gnas brtan sha ri'i bus/ bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa la gzhan yang 'dri skad ces smras so// bu mo sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / so so'i spyi bo'i chos rnams la bye brag
362b5(dkon brtsegs): ni ci yod/ tha dad du dbye ba ni ci yod/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu stod pa nyid dang dben pa nyid la bye brag ni ci yod/ tha dad du dbye ba ni ci yod/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ bye brag med cing tha dad du
362b6(dkon brtsegs): dbye ba ci'ang med do// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu stong pa nyid dang dben pa nyid la ji ltar bye brag med cing tha dad du dbye ba ci'ang med pa de bzhin du/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams
362b7(dkon brtsegs): dang so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams la'ang bye brag med cing tha dad du dbye ba med do// btsun pa shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha' dang bla gab med pa la'ang bye brag med cing tha dad du dbye ba ci'ang med/
363a1(dkon brtsegs): bya bya/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams la'ang bye brag med cing tha dad du dbye ba ci'ang med do// gnas brtan shA ri'i bu cang mi smra bar
363a2(dkon brtsegs): gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos/ bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo ci byed de skad zer ba las na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni ci
363a3(dkon brtsegs): tu ches lhags pa zhig tu mthong la/ nyan thos kyi chos rnams ni shin tu dman par mthong ngam ci na/ khyod nyan thos chen po rnams mthong na ldang bar yang mi byed/ phyag kyang mi 'tshal/ bsuru yang mi
363a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gro/ gtam yang mi zer/ stan dang bsod snyoms la'ang spyan 'dren par mi byed/ de skad ces smras pa dang / bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas/ gnas brtan mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces
363a5(dkon brtsegs): smras so// btsun pa me'u 'gal gyi bu chen po stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na skar ma'i gzugs su gtogs pa ji snyed cig yod pa shes sam/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos
363a6(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ bu mo snyoms par zhugs na ni kho bos grangs shes kyi/ snyoms par ma zhugs na ni mi shes so// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po de bzhin gshegs pas ni ldan
363a7(dkon brtsegs): cig mnyam par bzhag pa nyid kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba thams cad kyi
363b1(dkon brtsegs): sems kyi spyod pa'ang rab tu mkhyen na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi lda ci smos te/ btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi du chen po 'di ni
363b2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa dang nyan thos rnams kyi khyad par yin te/ 'di ni thA dad du dbye ba yin no// btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po phyogs dacu'i 'jig rten na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig pa ni ji rnyed
363b3(dkon brtsegs): cig yod/ 'chags pa ji skad cig yod shes sam/ mo'u 'gal gyi bus smras pa/ bu mo de ni mi shes so// bu mos smras pa/ sun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'dus
363b4(dkon brtsegs): pa ni ji snyed cig yod/ ma 'ongs pa ni ji snyed cig yod/ dra lngar bzhugs pa ni ji snyed cig yod shes sam/ mo'u 'gal gyi bus smras pa/ bu mo de ni mi shes so// bu mos smras pa/ btsun parjo'u
363b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gral gyi bu chen po sems can 'dod chags la spyod pa ni ji snyed cig yod/ zhe sdang la spyod pa ni ji snyed cig yod/ gti mug la spyod pa ni ji snyed cig yod/ cha mnyam pA la spyod pa ni ji snyed cig
363b6(dkon brtsegs): yong shes sam/ mo'u 'gal gyi bus smras pa/ bu mo de ni mi shes so// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i semaswa tsAn ni ji skad cig yod/ rang sangs
363b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi theg pa pa ni ji snyed cig yod/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa ni ji snyed cig yod shes sam/ mo'u 'gal gyi bus smras pa/ bu mo de ni mi shes so// bu mos smras pa/
364a1(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po nyan thos kyis 'dul ba'i sems can ni ji skad cig yod/ rang sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba ni ji snyed cig yod/ sangs rgyas kyis 'dul
364a2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sems can ni ji snyed cig yod shes sam/ mo'u 'gal gyi bus smras pa/ bu mo de ni mI shes so// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po yang dag pa nyid du nges pa'i sem
364a3(dkon brtsegs): can ni ji snyed cig yod/ leg pa nyid du nges pa'i sems can ni ji snyed cig yod/ ma nges pa'i sems can ni ji snyed cig yod shes sam/ mo'u 'gal gyi bus smras pa/ bu mo de ni mi shes so// /
364a4(dkon brtsegs): bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po de bzhin gshegs pas ni de dag dang / gzhan yang de'i gong du gang nyan thos drang rung sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sa ma yin pa dag kyang rab tu
364a5(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen na/ sems can gzhan dag gi lta ci smos te/ btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bla ma'i khyad par yin no// btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po gzhan yang de bzhin
364a6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas khyod rdzu 'phrul chen po rnams kyi mchog tu bstan gyis/ btsun pa me'u 'gal gyi bu chen po 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi 'od ces bya ba gang na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
364a7(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spos rab tu 'gyed pa'i 'od zer da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na/ shing
364b1(dkon brtsegs): ljon pa thams cad las tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i spos gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de khyab par 'gyur ba'i spos kyi drang ldang ba yod pa der song zhig/ gnas brtan mo'u bgal gyi bu chen pos sna
364b2(dkon brtsegs): pa bu mo sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i ming yang du kho bos gdod thosu na/ sangs rgyas la blta ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir ji ltar 'gro bar bya/ de na bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas khri de las ma
364b3(dkon brtsegs): langs bzhin tshig 'di skad ces smras te/ badren pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems bskyed ma thag tu nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis
364b4(dkon brtsegs): gyis gnon pa lnga na/ bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des de bzhin gshegs pa spos rab tu 'gyed pa'i 'od zer des bdag nyid dang / rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyan thos chen po 'di dag la ston par gyur
364b5(dkon brtsegs): cig/ tsan dan gyi dri de dag kyang nyan thos chen po 'di dag gis tshor bar gyur cig ces byas so// de nas bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas tshig de skad ces smras ma thag tu/ bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs des/
364b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa smos rab tu 'gyed pa'i 'od zer gyis/ de nyid kyi tshe 'od gang gis nyan thos chen po de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi 'od de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa/
364b7(dkon brtsegs): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spos rab tu 'gyed pa'i 'od zer de chos ston cing bzhugs pa mthong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 'od sku las bkye'o// chos bstan pa de'ang sangs
365a1(dkon brtsegs): #rgyas kyi mthus 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir thos so// tsun dan sbrul gyi snying po'i dri nges kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di khyab par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa spos rab tu
365a2(dkon brtsegs): med pa spyod dres byagasu 'as sa d+hA rgya nga byu pa'i tshigagis 'di sa du smran so// rdo bo rtsab me gyis byeng su sa badzis / rlu sa
365a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen pos sems dang po bskyed ma thug tu nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis gno to// de nas byang chub sems dpa'a'i sems dpa' chen po byams pa bya rgod kyi phung po la
365a4(dkon brtsegs): gnas pas tsan dun sbrul gyi snying po'i dri tshor nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das can dran sbrul gyi snying po'i dri 'dig las byung lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang /
365a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byams pa bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa 'dis nyan thos chen po rnams kyi mdun du seng ge'i sgra bsgrags te/ des
365a6(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos chen po de dag la bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi 'od ces bya ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa spos rab tu 'gyed pa'i 'od zer byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
365a7(dkon brtsegs): la chos ston cing bzhugs pa'ang bstan/ 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi 'od de'i tsan dang sbrul gyi snying po'i dri des kyang 'jig rten gyi khams 'di khyab par byas so// de nas bu mo mya ngan med
365b1(dkon brtsegs): kyis byin pas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi du chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po mkhas pa su zhig byung chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gi mo dru'adza/
365b2(dkon brtsegs): rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis ma khyad pa rlung du byung ba 'di lta bu dag mthing ngam/ thos na/ nyan thos dman pa/ zhan pa/ zhum pa/ nyi tshe ba'i shes pa dang ldan pa rnams la ldang ba 'am/ bsu 'a/
365b3(dkon brtsegs): ba 'am/ phyag 'tshal bar byed/ btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi 'od de ji tsam du thag ring ba shes sam/ mo'u 'gal gyi bus smras pa/ bu mo de ni mi shes so//
365b4(dkon brtsegs): bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po gal te khyod 'dra ba'i rdzu 'phrul can sha stag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dper na bu ram shing gi tshal lam/
365b5(dkon brtsegs): 'ong ma'i tshal lam/ 'dam bu'i tshal lam/ 'bras sA lu'i zhing bzhin du mtshams med par gang bar gyur nas/ de dag thams cad kyis bskal par brtsis kyang 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi
365b6(dkon brtsegs): 'od ces bya ba de sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji skad cig 'das pa'i pha rol na 'dug pa bgrang ba'i thabs kyis rtogs par mi nus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa spos rab tu
365b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyed pa'i 'od zer gyis 'od de dag mi snang bar mdzad de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'ang mi snang bar mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen pos/ bu mo mya ngan med kyis
366a1(dkon brtsegs): byin pa la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de sngon mthong
366a2(dkon brtsegs): dam bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srungs chen po de bzhin gshegs pa mthong brla nus sum/ de bzhin gshegs bAs/ grang dag da la gzugs su mthong / gang dag du lnga sgrar shes pa/
366a3(dkon brtsegs): log pas spong bar zhugs pa ste// skye bo de dag nga mi mthong // sangs rgyas rnams ni chos nyid lta// 'dren pa rnams ni chos kyi sku// chos nyid shes par bya min pas// de ni rnam par shes mi
366a4(dkon brtsegs): nusadz+dza/ zhes ma gsungs sam/ btsun pa 'od srungs chen po gzhan yang bu me khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub
366a5(dkon brtsegs): pA sngon mthong ngam zhes de skad zer ba ni/ btsun pa 'od srungs chen po bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong mod kyi/ sha'i mig gis ma yin te/ gzugs su ma yin no// lha'i mig gis ma
366a6(dkon brtsegs): yin te/ tshor bar ma yin no// shes rab kyi mig gis ma yin te/ 'du shes su ma yin no// chos kyi mig gis ma yin te/ 'du byed du ma yin no// sangs rgyas kyi mig gis ma yin te/ rnam
366a7(dkon brtsegs): par shes par ma yin no// btsun pa 'od srungs chen po gzhan yang bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ste/ dper na gnas brtan gyis ma rig pa dang srid pa la sred pa mthong ba bzhin no//
366b1(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa 'od srungs chen po gzhan yang bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ste/ dper nA gnas brtan gyis ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yIr 'dzin pa mthong ba bzhin no// gnas brtan 'od srungs chen
366b2(dkon brtsegs): bos smras pa/ bu mo 'di ltar ma rig pa dang sid pa la sred pa dang / ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa'i chos 'dri gnyis ni med pa yin no// chos gang med pa de ni blta bar mi nus so// bu mo/
366b3(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan med kyis byin pas spras pa/ btsun pa 'od srungs chen po de de bzhin no// chos thams cad ni med pa yin te/ de dag ni blta bar mi nus so// 'od srungs chen pos smras pa/ bu mo ci sangs
366b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi chos kyang med dam/ bu mos smras pa/ gnas brtan sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sam/ so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams kyang rung ste/ chos 'ga' zhig yongs su grub par 'dod dam/ 'od srungs
366b5(dkon brtsegs): chen pos smras pa/ bu mo kho bo ni so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams la'ang yongs su grub par mi 'dod na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la lnga ci smos/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srungs chen po
366b6(dkon brtsegs): chos gang dag yongs su grub pa med pa'i chos de dgra ci yod pa yin nam/ 'on te med pa yin/ 'od srungs chen pos smras pa/ bu mo med pa de dag ni med pa yin no// bu mos smras pa/ btsun
366b7(dkon brtsegs): kha 'od srungs chen po de bas na/ chos thams cad ni med pa nyid do// med pa gang yin pa de dag la ni lta ba rnam par sbyang bar bya ba med do// btsun pa 'od srungs chen po rigs kyi bu'am/
367a1(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu mo sangs rgyas la lbu ba rnam par sbyang bar 'dod pas ni bdag la lta ba rnam par sbyang bar bya'o// 'od srungs chen pos smras pa/ bu mo bdag la lta ba ji ltar
367a2(dkon brtsegs): rnam par dag par 'gyur/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srungs chen po gang gi tshe badrag rang bzhin med pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyang rang bzhin med pa nyid du myos na/ dre tsamra gyis na bdag
367a3(dkon brtsegs): la lta ba rnam par dge par 'gyur ro// 'od srungs chen pos smras pa/ bu mo bdag gi rang bzhin ci yin/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srungs chen po bdag gi rang bzhin ni stong pa nyid do// /
367a4(dkon brtsegs): bdag gi rang bzhin med pa'i phyir/ bdag dben pa'ang yin no// rang bzhin med pa des bdag dben no// rang bzhin med pa des chos thams cad dben no// 'od srungs chen pos smras pa/ bu
367a5(dkon brtsegs): mo khyod kyis su las chos thos na/ 'di ltar khyod kyi yang dag pa'i lta ba skyes par gyur/ bu mo yang dag pa'i lta ba skye ba la ni rgyu gnyis dang rkyen gnyis yod de/ gzhan gyi sgra dang / bdag nyid kyi tshul
367a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin yid la byed pa las 'byung ngo // zhes de skad gsungs so// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srungs chen po gang dag gzhan gyi dring 'jog pa'i shes rab can+da de dag ni gzhan gyi sgra dang tshul
367a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du so sor rtog pa las lta ba rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// btsun pa 'od srungs chen po gang dag gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa'i shes rab can dag ni gzhan gyi sgra mi 'tshol lo// btsun pa 'od srungs
367b1(dkon brtsegs): chen po ji ltar na dge slong tshul bzhin du zhugs pa yin// 'od srungs chen pos smras pa/ bu mo gang gi tshe dge slong ji skad thos pa'i chos rnams kyi don la che bar rtog par byed pa de ltar na dge slong
367b2(dkon brtsegs): tshul bzhin du zhugs pa yin no// 'od srungs chen pos smras pa/ bu mo ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin du zhugs pa yin/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srungs chen po gang gi tshe bya
367b3(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems can+da thams cad dang lhan cig gnas kyang semaswa tsan du 'du shes skyed par mi byed pa de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin du zhugs pa yin no// btsun pa 'od srungs
367b4(dkon brtsegs): chen po zhugs pa zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad ni sngon gyi mtha'i de bzhin nyid dang ldan no// chos thams cad ni phyi ma'i mtha'i de bzhin nyid dang ldan no// chos thams cad ni da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin
367b5(dkon brtsegs): nyid dang ldan no zhes/ btsun pa 'od srungs chen po byang chub sems dpa' sbyor ba de lta bus sbyor bar mi byed na/ de tsam gyis nA byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin du zhugs pa yin no// 'od srungs
367b6(dkon brtsegs): chen pos smras pa/ bu mo chos de dag la ji ltar sbyar bar bya/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srungs chen po ji ltar de bzhin nyid la sbyor ba'ang med/ mi sbyor ba'ang med par mthong ba de bzhin du chos
367b7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o// 'od srungs chen pos smras pa/ bu mo ji ltar mthong na chos thams cad mthong ba yin/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srungs chen po chos thams cad la gnyis su med
368a1(dkon brtsegs): par mthong la/ mi 'byed cing 'jig par yang mi byed na/ de ltar na chos thams cad mthong ba yin no// btsun pa 'od srungs chen po mthong zhes bya ba de ni mthong med pa'i
368a2(dkon brtsegs): tshig bla dgas so// 'od srungs chen pos spras pre/ bu mo bdag ji ltar blta bar bya/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srungs chen pos ji ltar mthong ba bzhin du blta bar bya'o// 'od srungs chen
368a3(dkon brtsegs): bos smras pa/ bu mo kho bos ni bdag dang bdag gri ma mthong ngo // bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srungs chen po ji ltar bdag med cing bdag gi med pa de bzhin du chos thams cad blta dang
368a4(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// gtam de skad du brjod pa'i skabs su gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis/ bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo khyod kyi spobs pa 'di 'dra ba ni khyod
368a5(dkon brtsegs): kyis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do// bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor rnyed pa las ni spobs par mi 'gyur gyi/ gang gis ci'ang ma rnyed pa de spobs pa dang ldan zhing / gang gis
368a6(dkon brtsegs): nang ngam phyi rol ci'ang mi dmigs pa de spobs pa dang ldan pa yin no// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ bu mo gang ma rnyed na spongs pa dang ldan pa yin/ bu mos smras pa/ gang gis bdag ma rnyed cing
368a7(dkon brtsegs): gzhan ma yin/ dge ba ma yin/ mi dge ba ma yin/ kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa ma yin/ kha na ma tho ba med pa ma yin/ zag pa dang bcas pa ma yin/ zag pa med pa ma yin/ 'dus byas ma yin/
368b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dus ma byas ma yin/ 'jig rten pa ma yin/ 'jig rten las 'das pa ma yin/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byung ba ma yin te/ 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa mnyed la/ sos
368b2(dkon brtsegs): skye bo'i chos mi dmigs shing // 'phags pa'i chos kyang mi dmigs te/ sangs rgyas kyi ches mi dmigs na/ btsun pa rab 'byor de ltar na gang gis ci'ang ma rnyed pa spobs pa dang ldan pa yin no// 2
368b3(dkon brtsegs): 'byor gyis smras pa/ ji ltar spobs par 'gyur/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor gyis ji ltar chos thams cad ma rnyed pa de bzhin du de spobasdu par 'gyur ro// chos kyi de bzhin nyid gang gis
368b4(dkon brtsegs): gnas brtan nyin mongs pa med pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa'i chos kyi de bzhin nyid de ci brjod cing smrar rung ngam/ nyon mongs pa med pa de dang / chos kyi de bzhin nyid de la ci spongs pa ci'ang yod dam/
368b5(dkon brtsegs): rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa dang de bzhin nyid ni bstan pa'am/ brjod par mi nus so// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor chos thams cad ni brjod du med pa yin na/ khyod kyis bu mo
368b6(dkon brtsegs): khyod spongs pa 'di lta bu dang ldan pa ni khyod kyis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do zhes bya ba de ji lta bu yin/ rang 'byor gyis smras pa/ bu mo khyod ni 'di ltar med pa'i spobs pas ston to// bu mos smras pa/
368b7(dkon brtsegs): gnas brtan rab 'byor chos thams cad la brag cha lta bur mos sam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ bu mo mos so// bu mos smras pa/ gnas brtan rab 'byor ci brag cha la spobs pa ci'ang yod dam/ rab
369a1(dkon brtsegs): bya/ 'byor gyis smras pa bu mo de ni med de/ bu mo rgyu dang rkyen tshogs pa las sgra 'byung bar zad do// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor brten nas sgra 'byung ba gang yin pade
369a2(dkon brtsegs): la ni rang bzhin gyis grung pa ci'ang med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar glang chen nas byung ba de la ni skye ba ci'ang med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ bu mo chos thams cad ni brten nas 'byung
369a3(dkon brtsegs): ba'o// dbu mos smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de bas na chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa'o// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ bu mo gal te chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa yin na/
369a4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed ni 'das te gshegs so// de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed ni ma 'ongs pa na 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshes
369a5(dkon brtsegs): ba gAng+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed ni da ltar bzhugs so zhes ci'i phyir bstan/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun+da pA rab 'byor mi skye ba ni skye bar mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ btsun pa rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings
369a6(dkon brtsegs): la ni skye ba 'am/ nub par 'gyur ba mi 'dod pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ bu mo khyod ni 'di ltar skye ba med pa don dam pa'i tshig ston to// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor bsnun pa thams
369a7(dkon brtsegs): cad ni bstan du med pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bstan pa thams cad bstan du med ce na/ de ni bstan kyang rung ma bstan kyang rung dngos po ma yin te/ dngos po med pa dang brjod du med pa'i mtha' mi spong ba'i
369b1(dkon brtsegs): phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ bu mo khyod ni khyim na gnas bzhin du 'di lta bu'i chos la gnas shing / 'di lta bu'i rnam pa dgra ston pa 'di ni ngo mtshar to// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor
369b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la mi khyim pa 'am/ rab tu byung ba zhes gzung bar mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag ni bsam pas phye ba yin/ shes rab kyis byi ba yin/ ye shes kyis
369b3(dkon brtsegs): bye ba yin pa'i phyir ro// btsum pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i gnas pa khyod kyis shes sam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyis shod cig dang / kho bos mnyan to// bu mos smras pa/
369b4(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos brgyad dang ldan na khyim pa 'am/ rab tu byung ba zhes mi bya ste/ spyod lam gang dang gang gis gnas kyang kha na mtho ba med par 'gyur ro//
369b5(dkon brtsegs): brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ btsun pa rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa yin te/ lhag pa'i bsam pa de'ang bla na med pa yang dag par
369b6(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir ro// sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong bar gnas pa'i phyir byams pa la gnas pa'ang yin no// 'jig rten pa'i dga' ba dang / spyod pa dang bral ba'i phyir snying rje che
369b7(dkon brtsegs): po la gnas pa'ang yin no// lus dang srog la mi lta ba'i phyir btang snyoms la gnas pa'ang yin no// yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pa shin tu rdzogs pa'i phyir thab so la mkhas pa'ang yin no//
370a1(dkon brtsegs): lta ba thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nges par byung ba'ang yin no// dge ba'i rtsa ba 'tshol ba la brtson pas chog mi shes pa'i phyir brtson 'grus
370a2(dkon brtsegs): brtsams pa'ang yin no// bzod pa shin tu thob pa'i phyir ma bstan par shes pa'ang yin te/ btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos brgyad po de dag dang ldan na khyim pa 'am/ rab tu
370a3(dkon brtsegs): byung ba zhes mi bya ste/ spyod lam gang dang gang gis gnas kyang thams cad du kha na mtho ba med par 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin gyis/ bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa la 'di skad
370a4(dkon brtsegs): ces smras so// bu mo khyod mal khri ga ser gyi rkang pa can la 'dug cing / stan shin du mtho ba la 'dug nas/ nyan thos chen po dag dang gtam zer ba de ni rung ba ma yin par gnas pa yin no// bu mo min
370a5(dkon brtsegs): bar stan mthon po la 'dug pa la stan dma' ba la 'dug pas ches bshad par mi bya'o zhes bya ba ci khyod kyis ma thos sam/ de skad ces smras pa dang / bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas/ tshe dang ldan pa sgra ga can
370a6(dkon brtsegs): zin la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa skra gcan zin 'jig rten na gang dag ni rung ba yin/ 'jig rten na gang dag ni rung ba ma yin pa khyod kyis shes sam/ sgra gcan zin gyis smras pa/ bu mo kho bos shes
370a7(dkon brtsegs): terjegang dag ji ltar bcas pa'i bslab pa la slob cing / bslab pa de las 'gal bar mi byed pa de dag ni rung ba zhes bya'o// gang dag bslab pa de las 'gal bar byed pa de dag ni rung ba ma yin pa zhes bya'o//
370b1(dkon brtsegs): bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas smras pa/ btsun pa sA gcan zin thong de sang ma zer cig/ btsun pa sgra gcan zin gang dag ji ltar bcas pa'i bsgrud pa la slob pa de dag ni rung ba ma yin pa'o// de ci'i phyir/
370b2(dkon brtsegs): zhe nA/ 'di ltar de dag ni rtog cing rnam par mi rtog pa de drag ni rung ba zhes bya'o// btsun pa sgra gcan zin+da rung ba zhes bya ba 'di ni dge slong dgra bcom pa zag pa rjod pa rnams kyi tshig bla dgas yin te/ de
370b3(dkon brtsegs): dag ni bslab pa las 'gal bar mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos rnams ni bslab pa las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir te/ de dag ni phyir yang bslab par 'dod pa ma yin pas de
370b4(dkon brtsegs): dag ni rung ba ma yin no// de dag khams gsum du phyir mi 'ong ba yin/ de dag ni bslab pa las yang dag par 'das pa yin te/ mi slob pa zhes bya'o// de ltar na de dag gi bslab pa ni mi dmigs te/ khams
370b5(dkon brtsegs): gsum pa btags pa tsam du shes so// de'i phyir de dag ni rung ba zhes bya'o// sgra gcan zin gyis smras pa/ bu mo rung ba dang rung ba ma yin pa la tha dad du dbye ba ci zhig yod/ bu mos smras pa/ btsur pa snga
370b6(dkon brtsegs): gcan zin 'di lta ste/ dper na gser dngul rgyan du byas pa dang / rgyun du ma byas pa la tha dad du dbye ba ci zhig yod/ sma gcan zin gyis smras pa/ bu mo tha dad du dbye ba ci 'ang med do// bu mos smras pa/ btsun
370b7(dkon brtsegs): ba sgra gcan zin de bzhin du rung ba dang rung ba ma yin pa la'ang yi ge'i tha snyad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir tha dad du dbye ba ci'ang med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni ci dang yang bral ba'i phyir te/ rang bzhin
371a1(dkon brtsegs): gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin no// btsun pa sgra gcan zin yang 'dri skad du stan shin tu mthob la 'dug ste chos nyan tam zhes zer ba la/ byang chub sems dpa' miT+Ta bting
371a2(dkon brtsegs): ba la 'dug kyang shin tu mtho ba la 'dug pa yin no// sgra gcan zin gyis sbas pa/ rnam grangs gang gis khyod de skad smra/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa sgra gcan zin 'di ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems
371a3(dkon brtsegs): dpas gang la 'dug ste byang chub thob par gyur/ sgra gcan zin gyis smras pa/ rtswa bting ba la bzhugs nas byang chub thob bo// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa sgra gcan zin ci byang chub sems dpa' rtswa banyid
371a4(dkon brtsegs): ba la 'dug pa la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na tshangs pa 'am/ brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ngam/ de las gzhan pa'i 'og min man chad kyi lhag gang yin pa de dag thams cad
371a5(dkon brtsegs): kyis lus btud de thal mo sbyar nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i zhabs la gtug par byed dam/ sgra gcan zin gyis smras pa/ bu mo de de bzhin te/ khyod kyis ji skad smras pa bzhin no// bu mos smras pa/
371a6(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa sgra gcan zin de'i phyir rnam grangs des kyang / dper na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtswa bting ba la 'dug kyang stan shin tu mtho ba la 'dug pa yin gyi/ nyan thos tshangs pa'i 'jig
371a7(dkon brtsegs): rjen na 'dug pa ni de lha ma yin par rig par bya'o// de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras/ bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo btsun pa sgra gcan zin ni/ bcom
371b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das shAs thub pa de nyid kyi sras yin te/ bslab pa 'dod pa rnams kyi ni mchog yin ra/ ci khyo gyis mi shes sam/ bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas smras pa/ yang tho rig thong rig/ 'di ltar/
371b2(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa sgra gcan zin/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de'i sras yin zhes ma gsungs shig/ ri dgas kyi rgyal po seng ge ral pa can cod pan+da btags pa lta bus la skyed par 'gyur ba rnam la
371b3(dkon brtsegs): gsan tam/ gzigs sam+ba/ rgyal pos smras pa/ bu mo de ni ma yin no// bu mos smras pa/ yab de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i rtsal lta bus gshegs pa/ dam pa'i chos kyi 'byor
371b4(dkon brtsegs): los sgyur ba'i zhwam ring ba ni nyan thos mdzes pa ma lags so// yab de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras gang yin zhes yang dag pa'i smra bas gang smra ma/ byang chub sems dpa' nyid yin no zhes de
371b5(dkon brtsegs): ngag yang dag pa'i smra bas smra'o// yab de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras su khas len par 'tshal bas ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o//
371b6(dkon brtsegs): gtamu 'di brjod pa'i skyabs su rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i btsun mo'i 'khor nas/ btsun mo nyi shus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// lha'i bu brgya tham pas kyang bu
371b7(dkon brtsegs): mo de'i seng ge'i sgra 'di thos nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ tshig 'di skad du bdag cag 'di rnams 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i
372a1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sras su khas len to zhes kyang smras so// lha'i bu de dag gis 'di ltar bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/
372a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po thams cad zhwa'i me tog gis mngon par gtor to// de nas bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa khrigs kyi rkang pa can las 'bas te/ can thos chen med
372a3(dkon brtsegs): ngag gi rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nus/ bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / bldag pa dang / gzhib pa dang / myang bar bya ba bsod pa mang po dgra gis bkur stir byas te/ dad pa dang gus pas
372a4(dkon brtsegs): rang gi lag nas nyan thos chen po de dag tshim par byas nas/ 'di skad du btsun pa dag rang dgar skad dro bcom ldan 'das la chos nyan du bzhud cig/ btsun pa dag bdag kyang mchi bar 'tshal lo
372a5(dkon brtsegs): zhes kyang smras so// de nas bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa pha ma la sogs pa 'khor mang po dang / skye bo phal po che yongs su bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/
372a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pas kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhangs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas
372a7(dkon brtsegs): gnang ste phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// nyan thos chen po de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du dong ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//
372b1(dkon brtsegs): de nas som ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa'i spobs pa ni ngo mtshar lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
372b2(dkon brtsegs): bka' su lA pre/ shA ri'i bu bu mo 'dis ni thog ma nyid du byang chub don du gcer ban/ sangs rgyas byeb khrag jig phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis la dge ba'i rdza ba dag bskyed do// shA ri'i dus gsol pa/ bcom
372b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das ci'i slad du bu mo 'dis bud med kyi lus ma bsgyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa la bud med do snyam du sems na de ltar
372b4(dkon brtsegs): mring lnga'o// byang chub sems dpa' dag ni sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir smon lam gyis bdag nyid bud med kyi gzugs su ston to// de nas dri'i tshe bu mo mya ngan med kyis
372b5(dkon brtsegs): byin pas bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs byas te/ bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs gang gAs chos thams cad skyes pa'ang ma yin/ bud med kyang ma yin pa lta na/ bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des bdag skyes pa'i
372b6(dkon brtsegs): lus su gyur cig/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 'dis kyang mthong bar gyur cig/ tshig de skad ces smras ma thag tu dud med kyi mtshan ma mi snang bar gyur te/ skyes pa'i mtshan ma byung bar gyur nas/
372b7(dkon brtsegs): gau bar snang la ta la bdun srid tsam du 'phags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtsa
373a1(dkon brtsegs): byu bya/ ngan med kyis byin pa steng gi bar snad la 'phags pa khyod kyis mthong ngam/ shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
373a2(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med kyis byin pa 'di ni bskal pa grangs med pa bdun gyis 'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya bar/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
373a3(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa brgyar 'gyur ro// dam pa'i chos ni bskal pa bcur gnas par 'gyur ro// de'i dge 'dun ni byang chub sem
373a4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' 'ba' zhig tu 'gyur te/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa gnyis yod do// 'jig rten gyi khams de'ang bai DUn+dar+ya las grub pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyis
373a5(dkon brtsegs): bkra bar byas shing / mig mangs ris su bres pa/ rin po che'i pad+mas khebs pa dang / ngan song thams cad rnam par spangs par 'gyur ro// lha dang mi rnams kyi longs spyod dag kyang khyad par med de/ sha ri'i
373a6(dkon brtsegs): bu dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi nye bar spyad pa dang / longs spyod ji lta ba bzhin du mi rnams kyi'ang der de bzhin du 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' mya ngan med kyis byin pa'i ma/
373a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i btsun mo dam po zla ba can zhes bya ba des thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis skyes bu dam pa 'di dgung zla
373b1(dkon brtsegs): dgur rum na bzung ba ni/ bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi ste/ dge ba'i
373b2(dkon brtsegs): rtsa ba 'dis bdag 'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med pa'i 'od de nyid du/ 'di'i 'og tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig
373b3(dkon brtsegs): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shA rI'i bu sring mo zla ba can 'di khyod kyis mthong ngam/ shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so//
373b4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu rgyal po'i btsun mo zla ba can 'di ni 'di nas shi 'phos nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur zhing / lha'i bu rin
373b5(dkon brtsegs): chen mchog ces bya bar 'gyur te/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' byams pas byang chub thob par 'gyur ba de'i tshe/ rgyal po dung zhes bya ba'i bu rgyal po gzhon nu mthong na dga' ba zhes bya bar gyur nas/
373b6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa la mchod pa byas te/ rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro// des de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'i dam pa'i chos thog ma dang / bar ma dang / tha ma'i bar du 'dzin par 'gyur te/
373b7(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa bzang po 'di la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang mnyes par byed cing mchod par 'gyur ro// de mthar gyis de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med
374a1(dkon brtsegs): pas byang chub thob pa na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mu khyud 'dzin ces bya bar 'gyur te/ des de bzhin gshegs pa de la mchod pa tshad med pa dag byas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi
374a2(dkon brtsegs): zhing de lta bu de nyid du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu 'od zer ces bya bar 'gyur ro// de nas rgyal po'i btsun mo
374a3(dkon brtsegs): zla ba can gyis bdag nyid lung bstan pa thos nas/ tshim zhing mgu ste yi rangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mu tig gi ro shal brgya stong ri ba phul te/ tshangs par spyod par rgyal pos gnang nas bslab
374a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gzhi dag bzung ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med kyis byin pas/ lhas phul ba'i me tog man da ra ba dag gis bcom ldan 'das dang 'khor
374a5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la gtor to// de nas bar snang las babs te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ tshig 'di skad du bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis byang chub thob pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
374a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po de dag thams cad rdzus te skye zhing / chos gos ngur smrig gyon la/ rin po che'i pad+ma dag la skyil mo krung bcas te skye bar 'gyur ba lta na/ bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des dper na dge slong
374a7(dkon brtsegs): bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo brgya lon pa'i spyod lam ji lta bzhin du bdag gnas par gyur cig ces smras so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med kyis byin pas bden pa'i
374b1(dkon brtsegs): byin gyis brlabs byas ma thag tu dge slong gi spyod lam dang ldan par sdang bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med kyis byi pas/ brgyal
374b2(dkon brtsegs): bo ma skyes dgra la 'di skad ces smras so// yab 'di ltar chos thams cad ni bac+doMs ma ste/ rnam par bsgrubs par nye bar gnas pa'i mtshan nyid dang / yongs su brtags pa las langs pa med
374b3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du phyin ci log dang mtshungs par ldan pa ljags so// rgyal po chen po gzigs shig dang / de ring kho na'i gdugs gcig la bu mo'i gzugs su'ang gzigs/ khye'u'i gzugs su'ang
374b4(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis gzigs/ da ni bdag la dge slong gi gzugs su'ang khyod kyis gzigs na/ 'di lnga gang yang dag pa'i gzugs lags/ rgyal po chen po de ltar na ya ma brla'i chos thams cad la/
374b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dri na kha cig lta pa'i kun nas dkri bas kun nus glags shing mchis te/ rang gi rgyud la mchis pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyis yongs su sreg go// yongs su bsregs pas chos 'dul
374b6(dkon brtsegs): ba' ma 'tshal te/ 'gyod pa ma lags pa la 'gyed par sems so// rgyal po chen po'i ltar na khyod kyis bag yod par mdzod la/ rgyal srid nyam nga ba na bzhugs bzhin du/ rtag tu com ldan
374b7(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyi thad du bzhud cig dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas khyod kyi yod pa ma yin pa phyin ci logs las byung ba'i 'gyod pa sel bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po khyod ni bya ba mang zhing / byed
375a1(dkon brtsegs): pa mang ba lags kyis bzhud cig de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgra dang / tsun mo zla ba can dang / btsun mo'i 'khor thams cad kyis/ bcom ldan
375a2(dkon brtsegs): 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' mya ngan med kyis byin pa dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams la phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag
375a3(dkon brtsegs): cag ni bgyi ba mang zhing bgyid pa mang ba lags kyis/ bdag cag mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po du de'i dus la bab par shes na song zhig ces bka' stsal nas
375a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po ma skyes dgra btsun mo zla ba can la sogs pa btsun mo'i 'khor chen po dag dang lhan cig tu bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri las rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por dong ngo // de nas
375a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis chos kyi rnams grangs 'di zung zhig/ chongs shig/ lcogs shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/
375a6(dkon brtsegs): gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher rab tu ston cig/ kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'dri bdag gis bzung lags na/ bcom ldan 'das ches kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming
375a7(dkon brtsegs): ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mya ngan med kyis byin pa'i seng ge'i sgra zhes bya ba dang / mya ngan
375b1(dkon brtsegs): med kyis byir pa lung bstan pa zhes bya bar zung zhig/ gzhan dag la'ang ston cig/ kun dga' bo gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rim po me sna tshogs kyis yongs su
375b2(dkon brtsegs): dkang sde sbyin pa byin pa bas/ grang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di tha na rna lam du thos na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams mang du skyed na/ gang 'dzin pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / 'chang ba dang /
375b3(dkon brtsegs): klog pa dang / rjod pa dang / lung ji skad phog pa bzhin du nan tan du sgrub pa lnga ci smos/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de snyed ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
375b4(dkon brtsegs): po mya ngan med kyis byin pa dang / nyan thos chen po de dgra dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par sdod do//
375b5(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya pa las/ 'phags pa mya ngan med kyis byin pa lung bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste/ 'dus pa sum cu rtsa gnyis
375b6(dkon brtsegs): pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / su ren dra bo d+hi dang / lo tsa ba zhang ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ bam po gcig/ sh+lo ka sum
375b7(dkon brtsegs): brgya/ rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya bi ma la dang ta pa ri prits+tsha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa dri ma med kyis byin pas zhus pa zhes
376a1(dkon brtsegs): bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis
376a2(dkon brtsegs): thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong spong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po thams
376a3(dkon brtsegs): cang dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/ sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ shes rab shin tu rnam par grol
376a4(dkon brtsegs): badz+ra cang shes pa/ glang po chen po/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin
376a5(dkon brtsegs): tu rnam par grol ga sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stug ste/ gang zag gcig ma gtogs pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'o// byang
376a6(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' stong phrag bcu phal cher thams cad kyang phyir mi ldog pa skye ba gcig gis thogs pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rin chen 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' shes
376a7(dkon brtsegs): rab brtsegs dang / byang chub sems dpa' dpal gyi snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' grags pa'i blo gros dang / spobs pa brtsegs dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / mthu chen thob dang /
376b1(dkon brtsegs): byams pa dang / mya dran med kyis byin dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / gom pa 'dor ba dron yod dang / mthong ba don yod dang / ngan song spong dang / mya ngan gyi mun pa thams cad 'joms pa dang /
376b2(dkon brtsegs): yon tan rin po che'i me tog gis rtag tu brgyan dang / gser gyi 'phreng ba'i 'od kyi dpal can dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems thogs pa med pa dang / de dag
376b3(dkon brtsegs): la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' khri dang yang thabs gcig go/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu ga
376b4(dkon brtsegs): bo dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang / tshe dang ldan pa nam gru dang / tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / nyan thos chen po
376b5(dkon brtsegs): brgyad po de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' ngan song spong dang / rin po che tog dang / mthong ba don yod dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang // 'dug
376b6(dkon brtsegs): ba spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / spobs pa brtsegs dang / byang chub sems dpa' gom pa 'dor ba don yod dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brgyad po de dag snga dro'i dus kyi tshe/
376b7(dkon brtsegs): sham thabs dang chos gos bgos nas/ lhung bzed thogs te/ bsod snyoms kyi phyir grong khyer chen po mnyan yod du zhugs nas/ de dag lam gyi bar skabs su gtam 'di skad ces/ gang gis grong
377a1(dkon brtsegs): khyer du skye bo'i tshogs thams cad kyis 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam thos pas 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ grong khyer du 'jug pa
377a2(dkon brtsegs): bya'o zhes brjod par gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus smras pa/ gang gis grong khyer du 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la/ skye bo'i tshogs thams cad kyi shes 'bru thogs pa
377a3(dkon brtsegs): med de/ de dag gi shes rab la mun pa mun nug med par 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la kho bo snyoms par zhugs te/ grong khyer du 'jug par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen
377a4(dkon brtsegs): pos smras pa/ gang gis grong khyer du skye bo'i tshogs thams cad la bdud kyi las rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i ting 'dzin la kho bo snyoms par zhugs te/ grong khyer du 'jug par bya'o//
377a5(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu glang pos smras pa/ ci nas kyang gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang / kun tu rgyu dang / gcer bu pa dang / 'tsho ba pa dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag gang dag grong khyer na
377a6(dkon brtsegs): 'khod pa de dag sdig pa can gyi lta ba dang ldan par mi 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la kho bo snyoms par zhugs te/ grong khyer du 'jug par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen pos smras
377a7(dkon brtsegs): pa rda ci nas kyang grong khyer na skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo gang dag bdag cag la bsod snyoms sbyin par byed pa 'khod pa de dag thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la thug gi bar du
377b1(dkon brtsegs): longs spyod zad mi shes pa rnyed par 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la kho bo sboms par zhugs te/ grong khyer du 'jug par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ gang gis grong
377b2(dkon brtsegs): khyer du skye bo'i tshogs thams cad nyon mongs pa med pa thob par 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la kho bo snyoms par zhugs te/ grong khyer du 'jug par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa nam grus smras pa/
377b3(dkon brtsegs): gang gis grong khyer du skye bo'i tshogs thams cad kyis ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la kho bo snyoms par zhugs te/ grong khyer du 'jug par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags
377b4(dkon brtsegs): pas smras pa/ gang gis grong khyer du skye bo'i tshogs thams cad nad med pa'i bde ba thob par 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la kho bo snyoms par zhugs te/ grong khyer du 'jug par bya'o//
377b5(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos smras pa/ gang gis grong khyer du skye bo'i tshogs thams cad la sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams mngon du 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la kho bo snyoms par zhum
377b6(dkon brtsegs): te/ grong khyer du 'jug par bya'o// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas spras pa/ ci nas kyang gang gis grong khyer na sgo dang / skar khung dang / rtsig pa dang / snod dang / rgyan dang / shing dang / lo ma dang /
377b7(dkon brtsegs): me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / gos rnams las stong pa nyid kyi sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / mtshan ma med pa'i sgra dang / smon pa med pa'i sgra dang / skye ba med pa'i sgra dang / dngos po med pa'i sgra dag /
378a1(dkon brtsegs): bdag med pa'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur bu rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' ngan song spong gis smras pa/ gang gis grong khyer na sems can
378a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi las ngan song myong bar 'gyur ba gang yod pa de tshe 'di nyid la yang zhing chung ngu myong bar 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba don yod
378a3(dkon brtsegs): kyis smras pa/ ci nas kyang grong khyer na sems can gang dag kho bo'i mig lam na snang bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs mthong bar 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa
378a4(dkon brtsegs): kho bos bsam par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' rin po che tog gis smras pa/ gang gis grong khyer na khyim thams cad du rin po ches gang ba'i gter rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho
378a5(dkon brtsegs): bos bsam par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas smras pa/ gang gis mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen po'i skye bo'i tshogs thams cad kyi sgrib pa lnga po dag rnam par sel
378a6(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis smras pa/ ci nas kyang grong khyer na sems can gang dag bcings pa dang / gas
378a7(dkon brtsegs): par bkra ba de dag thar pa dang / 'jigs pas nyen pa rnams kyang 'jigs pa med pa thob par 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' spongs pa brtsegs
378b1(dkon brtsegs): kyis smras pa/ gang gis grong khyer na skye bo'i tshogs thams cad phan tshun du tshigs su bcang ba'i dbyangs dang / byams pa'i sems kyis smra bar 'gyur ba dang / spongs pa'ang thob par 'gyur ba rnam pa des
378b2(dkon brtsegs): bu'i bsam po kho bos bsam par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' gom pa 'dor ba don yod kyis smras pa/ ci nas kyang grong khyer na sems can gang dag kho bo'i mig lam na snang bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cang dran
378b3(dkon brtsegs): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa khro bos bsam par bya'o// de nas nyan thos chen po de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag rnam pa de lta bu'i gtam
378b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di rjod cing / mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen por phyin to// yang de'i tshe yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pa zhes bya ba/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/
378b5(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa/ chos zab mo la bzod pa dang ldan pa/ mngon par shes pa lnga po dag thob pa zhig yod de/ bu mo des lha'i mig dag pa mi'i las 'das pas
378b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag mthong zhing de ngag lam gyi ngar skabs su gtam ci brjod pa de dag thams cad kyang thos so// bu mo de'ang gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/
378b7(dkon brtsegs): kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa/ pha ma dang nang mi la byams pa/ btsas nas lo bcu gnyis lon pa ste/ de dpyid zla tha chung tshes brgyad skar ma rgyal gyi nyin par pha mas dge mtshan dang bkra shis byid du gan
379a1(dkon brtsegs): nas/ bram ze zho dang / rtswa ku sha dang / me tog dang / yam sreg shing dang / mar dang / bum pa thogs pa lnga brgyas yongs su bskor te khrus bya bar khrid pa las/ bram ze de dag gis byang
379a2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang bkra mri shis so snyam pa'i 'du shes kyis gnas par gyur to// de nas bram ze de dag gi nang nas bram ze ches bkres tshungs pa'i
379a3(dkon brtsegs): lha zhes bya ba des/ bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo dge slong dag mdun na 'khod pa ni bkra mi shis te/ de dag mthong na dgos pa 'am/ nor ram/ brtul zhugs sam/ mchod sbyin nam/
379a4(dkon brtsegs): bkra shis kyang rung ste/ ma 'grub kyis grong khyer du slar bzhud do// de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas/ bram ze tshangs pa'i lha de la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ 'di dag chags med mchog tu dge shes pa// skye
379a5(dkon brtsegs): bo mang po'i sdig pa 'jig par byed// 'di dag rnam par dag cing bden bzhi mthong // dul la grol bar gyur cing mnyam par bzhag/ 'di dag rkang gnyis dam pa bsod nams zhing // 'di la yon phul mtho ris
379a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gro bar 'gyur// 'di la yon phul 'bras bu 'chi med 'thob// byin nas sems can ngan 'gror 'gro mi 'gyur// tshul khrims dang ni dul bar ldan pa yin// 'dod las brgal zhing sdig med re ba med// 'di
379a7(dkon brtsegs): dag sman pa mchog ste 'jig rten rgyu// sdug bsngal gzir ba'i srog chags thar par byed// sangs rgyas 'jig rten dag na chos kyi rje// de'i sras 'di dag rdul med nyon mongs med// 'di dang byang chub sems
379b1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' gzhan yang mang // shes rab ldan mis 'di dag ji ltar spang // 'di dag brtul zhugs spyad cing 'dod chags zhi// bkra shis gyur cing mkhas pa sbyin char phab// 'dri dag rnams la bkur sti chung byas kyang /
379b2(dkon brtsegs): mi rnams chos dang de bzhin nor yang 'grub// 'di dag mtshan rnams yongs rdzogs dge shis ldan// 'di dag zhing mchog rnam dag sems dang ldan// bram ze 'di la su zhig drang byed pa// de ni bsod rnams mang
379b3(dkon brtsegs): po skyed par 'gyur/ de nas bram ze tshangs pa'i lhas/ bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pa la tshigs su bcad de spur spras pA/ byis pa'i sems kyi dbang du ma bzhud cig/ mchod sbyin dus 'dir dge slong
379b4(dkon brtsegs): ma gzigs shig/ ngur smrig gos can de bzhin mgo bregs pa// de drag dron 'dod pas ni blta mi bgyi// yab dang yum yang dgyes par mi 'gyur zhing // bdag kyang mkhas pa rnams kyis smad par 'gyur// khyod
379b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi mchod sbyin 'grub par mi 'gyur gyis// de bas dge slong rnams ni shin tu spongs// de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas// bram ze tshangs pa'i lha de la tshigs su bcad de slar smras pa/ yon tan ldan pa 'di
379b6(dkon brtsegs): dag ma rtogs par// pha dang ma yang kho mo'i skyabs ma yin// gnyen gyi tshogs dang nor dang lang tsho min// 'di dag 'khor bar bying ba rnams kyi skyabs// bdag ni sangs rgyas dga' bas lus btang zhing // de
379b7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin srog dang longs spyod rnams kyang btang // dkon mchog gsum nyid skyabs yin ma gtogs par// kho mo'i skyabs rten sems can 'di na med// de nas bram ze tshangs pa'i lhas/
380a1(dkon brtsegs): bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo btsas nas khyod kyis sdom sangs rgyas kyang ma gzigs/ sngon chos kyang ma gsan/ sngon dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur yang
380a2(dkon brtsegs): ma mdzad na/ khyod ci'i slad du sangs rgyas la dad par gyur// bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas spras pa/ bram ze kho mo btsas nas zhag bdun lon pa na/ tsan dan gyi khang bzangs kyi nang na gser gyi khri lnga bzhag pa'i tshe/
380a3(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu lnga brgya steng gi bar snang la 'dod pa kho mas mthong ste/ de dag rnam grangs du mas sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa rjod// chos dang dge 'dun gyi bsngags brjed pa kho mos thos so// de nas lha'i bu de dag gi nang
380a4(dkon brtsegs): nas gang gis sngon de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba gcig pu de la/ lha'i bu rnams kyis dris pa/ grogs po de bzhin gshegs pa ni ci 'dra ba zhig/ de ni ji ltar shes par bya/ de nas lha'i bu des kho mo'i bsam
380a5(dkon brtsegs): bshes nas/ lnga'i bu de dag kyang dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// de yi dbu skra dri med snum zhing mdzes// gtsang 'jam g.yas su 'khyil ba'i ljang lo can// zhal mdog bAdz+ra
380a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dab pa rgyas pa 'dra// zla nya mtshan mo nam mkhar mdzes pa bzhin// de yi mdzod spu kha ba shel mdog bzang // sprin mtshams bar nas 'khyil cing shin tu mdzes// de yis 'khor rnams zil gyis
380a7(dkon brtsegs): mnan te 'dug/ rgyal ba'i zhal yang shin tu mdzes par byed// mi dbang spyan mdzes 'gram pa seng ge'i 'dra// sems stobs mi zhum tshems mnyam thags kyang bzang // de yi ljags che zhal gyi dkyil
380b1(dkon brtsegs): 'khor khebs// de yi zhal ni dri med rnams par mdzes// de yi gsung ni pham zhing snyam la rang // tshig rtsu spangs shing mi 'byed sdig pa med// skye bo dpag tu med pa dang mdzad cing // 'grol pa/
380b2(dkon brtsegs): phyir rgyal ba gsung yang sgrogs// de yi mgur ni dung dang mtshungs shing 'dra// de bzhin mi dbang phyug gi sor mo ring // de yi phyag ni glang chen sna dang 'dra// brang yangs dri med lte ba gzhol zhing zag/
380b3(dkon brtsegs): mchog lta bur mdoms kyi sba ba nung // de bzhin spu yi khung bu grwa sder dang 'dra// bArba yi dbyibs ni glang po'i lag dang mtshungs// zhabs ni legs gnas byin pa e n+ya'i 'dra// thub pa'i dbang po bden
380b4(dkon brtsegs): gsung rgyags pa'i skyon dang bral// ngan lhas bcom pa rnams kyi sdig pa'i lnga pa 'jig/ 'khor gyi nang du dri ba bye ba dris byas kyang // 'khrul med skyon dang bral bas sems can kun tshim mdzad// gya rgya
380b5(dkon brtsegs): med dra tshig gis lus ni tshim mdzad cing // mya ngan 'das pa bde mchog yid 'ong yang dag zhi// skye bo kun gyi yid 'ong mya ngan 'das ston cing // mtha' gnyis dag dang bral ba'i dbu ma'i lam yang
380b6(dkon brtsegs): sdom de ni rang gis sangs rgyas gyur pa ste// bdag nyid brgal cing pha rol rnams kyang sgrol// 'gro ba'i skyob dang skyabs dang dge shis shing // 'jig rten kun la thugs brje phan par mdzad// sngon
380b7(dkon brtsegs): pa de yi yon tan 'di dag dang // gzhan yang mtha' yas kho mos de ma brjod// thos nas lha rnams yid dga' dang gyur nas// rgyal ba la ni dang ba'i yid kyang skom// de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis
381a1(dkon brtsegs): byin pas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras nas// bram ze tshangs pa'i lha la 'di skad ces smras so// bram ze kho mo btsas nas zhag bdun lon nas/ sangs rgyas kyi don
381a2(dkon brtsegs): tran rnam pa 'di lta bu dag thos so// mngon par dran te de tshun nam yang rmugs pa dang / gnyid kyis non par ma gyur to// nam yang 'dod pa la rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang / gnod sem
381a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang / 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par rtog par ma byas so// mngon par dran te de tshun chad nam yang ba la dga' ba 'am/ ma la dga' ba 'am/ ming po la
381a4(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba 'am/ spun la dga' ba 'am/ nye du la dga' ba 'am/ nor la dga' ba 'am/ rgyan la dga' ba 'am/ gos la dga' ba 'am/ lus la dga' ba 'am/ srog la dga' ba'am/ grong khyer la
381a5(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba 'am/ skye mched la dga' ba ma bskyed kyi/ bram ze gzhan du na sangs rgyas nyid rnam pas rjes su dran no// bram ze kho sos ni gsum sems ni yid la bya ba yid la byas te/ de bzhin
381a6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa phyogs gang na bzhugs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pas chos gang bshad pa de thams cad kho mos legs par yongs su bzung zhing / kho mos don tam tshig 'bru las yi ge dang tshig
381a7(dkon brtsegs): gcig kyang chud zos par ma byas so// de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor ba kho mos nam yang yid la ma byas par ma gyur to// kho mos nyin mtshan gang du'ang sangs rgyas ma/
381b1(dkon brtsegs): mthong ba dang / chos ma thos pa dang / dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur ma byas par ma gyur to// bram ze kho mo ni sangs rgyas la blta ba dang / chos mnyan pa dang / dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur bya bas chog pa
381b2(dkon brtsegs): med do// bram ze tshangs pa'i lhas/ bram ze'i khye'u zhig la smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u khyod sdong la le rgyus dadi rgyal po dang btsun mo la gsol cig/ de nas bram ze'i khye'u de rings pa'i tshul
381b3(dkon brtsegs): du song ste/ ji ltar mthong ba'i lo rgyus thams cad rgyal po dang btsun mo la gsol to// bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas kyang ji ltar bram ze tshangs pa'i lha la sogs pa bram ze lnga brgya po de dag gis bla na
381b4(dkon brtsegs): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de ltar sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa brjod/ chos dang dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa rjod do// de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin
381b5(dkon brtsegs): pa shing rta las babs nas/ bram ze de dag dang lhan cig tu byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ de dag gi rkang pa la mgro bos phyag 'tshal te/
381b6(dkon brtsegs): gus pa dang bcas zhe sa dang bcas pas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i mdun du 'dug nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ga la bde logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras
381b7(dkon brtsegs): so// shA ri'i bu bud med ni shes rab sor gnyis pa/ nyon mongs pa drag pa/ bag med pa mang pa/ dman pa la mos pa/ tshul bzhin ma lags pa yid la bgyid pa'i dbang du mchi ba lags na/ bdag la
