382a1(dkon brtsegs): / thugs brtse ba nye brar bzung ste/ cin su bdag gi yun ring po'i don dang / sngan pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ba'i slad du/ btsun pas de ltar bdag la chos legs par bstan du gsol/
382a2(dkon brtsegs): sdu pa'i tshul lags pa rnal rgyas sa phru di dang / bram ze'i rig rjesanas byur ba'i tshul rgyas rgya pa gyur te/ sa tu chos deng drung/ cang chubasams dang 'dug la rdzus nas/
382a3(dkon brtsegs): rang gi bu mo la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo khyod na re kho mo nam yang rmugs pa dang gnyid kyis non par ma gyur to// nam yang dga' ba dang rtse ba dang ldan pa'i sems ma bskyed do zhes zer ba de lhur khyod bde ba
382a4(dkon brtsegs): dang yid bde ba la brtson nam/ 'on te 'di ltar yid byung ba'i tshul gyis smra/ de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis/ rang gi bu mo la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ khyod kyi gzugs byung lha yi bu mo mtshus
382a5(dkon brtsegs): shing 'dra// rgyan rnams kyis ni de nyid chas pa'i cha byad 'dzin// ji ltar khyod ni nam yang gnyid kyis ma non pa// ci phyir bu mo khyod ni 'di 'dra'i yid byung gyur// khyod kyi rgyal srid rgyas shing shin tu legs par 'byo/
382a6(dkon brtsegs): ma ni rtag tu khyod kyi dbang du gyur pa yin// bu mo dga' bde las ci 'dra gzhan yod na// de yis khyod kyi lus ni dga' ba rnyed ma gyur// sdug cing 'phangs lnga yid du 'ong ba ste// skye bo kun la dga' ba skyed yin na/
382a7(dkon brtsegs): yon tan brgya phrag du mas brgyan pa khyod// ci yi phyir na khyim 'dir dga' ba med// bu mo khyod kyis ci zhig thos gyur cing // ci zhig mthong na 'di ltar yid mi bde// yongs su nyams shing yid byung sems su gyur//
382b1(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyi 'dod pa ci 'dra la spros/ de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas/ rang gi pha rgyal po gsal rgyal la tshigs su bcad de smras pa// yang cig phung po nyes dmigs snod rnams dang // khyim
382b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi skyon rnams thugs su ma chung dram// 'khor ba'i gnas ri gar la lha dang mtshungs// 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten mi gnas 'jig pa can// sbrul gdug nang na gnas pa'i khyim 'di la// gnyid dang 'dod pa'i bdun pa
382b3(dkon brtsegs): ga la mchis// khams 'di dag ni gdug pa'i sprul bzhi ste// srid pa sems pa bde ba ga la mchis// mi mdza' tshogs kyis rab tu gtses gyur cing // dgon par phyin la dga' bag la mchis// kun nas
382b4(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs dgra yis yongs bskor ba// ji ltar don 'thong rgyal pos bka' stsol cig/ dug 'thungs pA la bde ba ga la mchis// gsang sar bkri la dga' ba gra la mchis// g.yangs che 'dir su zhig yid rton brjid/
382b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten de dag mtshungs// blo ngan dag gis lus rnams bor ba ni// ri rab tsam gyi phung por gyur to zhes// de bzhin gshegs pas dpe ni bka' stsal na// 'dus byas slu ba'i chos la su yid rtom
382b6(dkon brtsegs): pha dang ma dang sdug dang ming po dang // bu dang rtsa lag gnyen grogs 'gro ba kun// 'dus byas thams cad med long gzugs brnyan 'dra// 'di 'dra'i mi sdug gang la su yid rton// gang tshe bdag gis rang byung rgyal
382b7(dkon brtsegs): ba mthong // de tshe sangs rgyas 'gyur snyam sems kyang skye// byang chub sems dpa' bag med 'gyur ba ni// yab cig bdag gis ma mthong ma thos so// bdag ni mtshan rdzogs rgyal ba lta 'tshal 'gyur// bde
383a1(dkon brtsegs): / bar gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos kyang thos// rgyal ba rgyal ba'i sras po 'di dag mthong // yab cig ji ltar 'dod pa bstan par bgyi// de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal bu mo'i tshig
383a2(dkon brtsegs): thos nas cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas rang gi bcang mi smra bar gyur par rig nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyod la
383a3(dkon brtsegs): zhu ba zhus pa thugs brtse bar dgongs te lan gdab tu gsol/ 'di ltar btsun pa shA ri'i bu ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis shes rab dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa lags na/ ci shes rab de 'dus byas
383a4(dkon brtsegs): lags sam/ 'on te 'dus ma byas lags/ de gal te 'dus byas lags na/ de bzhin gshegs pas 'dus byas thams cad ni brdzun pa slu ba'i chos can no zhes bka' stsal to// ci ste 'dus ma byas lags
383a5(dkon brtsegs): na/ 'dus ma byas la ni skye ba ma mchis so// gang la skye ba ma mchis pa de la ni phrad pa ma mchis na/ phrad pa ma mchis pa'i shes rab kyis ji ltar btsun pa shA ri'i bu shes rab chen po zhes dgyi/ de nas tshe dang
383a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa shA ri'i bu cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos/ tshe dang ldan shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// shA rI'i bu bu mos dris pa'i lan thob cig/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/
383a7(dkon brtsegs): bu mo ni 'dus byas mi 'dri'i/ bu mos ni skye ba med pa dris te/ de ni lan gdab par mi nus so// de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad
383b1(dkon brtsegs): ces smras so// 'di ltar btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po khyod ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa lags na/ ci sde mo dang ldan pa sems can du 'du shes pa laganas
383b2(dkon brtsegs): te rdzu 'phrul sngon tam/ 'on te chos su 'du shes pa la gnas te rdzu 'phrul sdom/ gal te sems can du 'du shes pa la gnas te ston na/ sems can ni ma mchis pa ste/ de lta bas na rdzu 'phrul de'ang ma mchis
383b3(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro// ci ste chos su 'du shes pa la gnas te ston na/ chos nyid ni 'gyur ba ma mchis pa'o// 'gyur ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de la ni rnam par rtog pa ma mchis na/ rnam par mi rtog pas ji ltar
383b4(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul 'byor par gyur/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po'ang cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas byams ma'i bu gang pos/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so//
383b5(dkon brtsegs): mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po bu mos dris pa'i lan thob cig/ mo'u 'gal gyi bus smras pa/ bu mo ni 'gyur ba mi 'di'i/ bu mos ni 'gyur ba med pa dris te/ 'gyur ba med pa dang / rnam par mi rtog pa ni de bzhin
383b6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub yin pas/ de ni lan gadrab par mi nus so// de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas/ byams ma'i bu gang po la 'di skad ces smras so// 'di ltar tshe dang ldan
383b7(dkon brtsegs): pa gang po ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis chos smra ba rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa lags na/ ci tshe dang ldan pa dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i chos ston tam/ 'on te dmigs pa ma mchis pa'i chos ston/
384a1(dkon brtsegs): / gal te dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i chos ston na ni/ khyod byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams dang mtshungs so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad ni dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i
384a2(dkon brtsegs): smad du ste/ de lta bas na btsun pa'ang byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi chos rnams dang ma bral ba lags so// ji ste dmigs pa ma mchis pa'i chos ston na ni/ chos slab nyid dngos po ma mchis par gyur te/
384a3(dkon brtsegs): mi 'thad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa gang po'ab cang mi slu bar gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen pos/ gang po la 'di skad ces smras so// gang po bu mos dris pa'i lan thob cig/ tshe dang ldan pa ga
384a4(dkon brtsegs): pos smras pa/ bu mo ni kun rdzob mi 'dri'i/ bu mos ni don dam pa dris te/ de ni lan gdab par mi nus so// de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po la 'di skad
384a5(dkon brtsegs): ces smras so// 'di ltar btsun pa 'od srungs chen po ni rnam par thar pa brgyad la snyoms par zhugs nas langs te gzhan dag la chos ston cing / gang dag las thA na gzar bu gang tsam gyi bsod snyoms yongs su
384a6(dkon brtsegs): blangs pa de dag thams cad mtho ris su 'gro bar 'gyur ro sen/ de ci btsun pas lus kyis sbyin pa spyong ngam/ 'on te sems kyis sbyin pa spyong/ gal te lus kyis sbyong na/ lus ni bems po g.yob ma mchis pa/
384a7(dkon brtsegs): byed pa ma mchis pa ste/ rtswa dang / shing dang / rtsig pa'i chos lta bu mig yor dang mtshungs pas/ des kyang sbyong bar mi nus so// ci ste sems kyis spyod na/ sems ni sgyu ma lta bu gnas pa ma mchis pa ste/ des
384b1(dkon brtsegs): kyang spyod bar mi nus so// ci ste lus dang sems kyi phyi rol gyis spyod na/ de ni ma mchis pa ste/ ma mchis pas ji ltar spyod bapar bgyid/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po'ang cang mi spangar gyur to//
384b2(dkon brtsegs): 'byor gyis spras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po bu mos dris pa'i lan rdzob cig/ 'od srungs chen pos smras pa/ bu mo ni len pa mi 'dri'i/ bu mos ni len med pa dris shing / yang dag pa'i mtha' 'dribs/
384b3(dkon brtsegs): do na lan gdab par mi nus so// de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas/ gnas brtan rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// 'di ltar btsun pa rab 'byor ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis nyon mongs
384b4(dkon brtsegs): ba med par gnas pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa lags na/ ci nyon mongs pa med pa de dngos pos rab tu phye ba lags sam/ 'on te chos nyid kyis rab tu phye nga lags/ gal te dngos pos rab tu phye ljags nA ni bdus
384b5(dkon brtsegs): byas su 'gyur ro// ji ste chos nyid kyis rab tu phye ba lpags na/ chos nyid ni skye ba ma mchis pa'i mtshan nyid dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa'i mtshan nyid de/ skye ba ma mchis pa dang 'gag pa ma mchis pa'i mtshan
384b6(dkon brtsegs): nyid gang lags pa de ni mnyam pa nyid do// mnyam pa nyid gang lags pa de ni de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin nyid gang lags pa de ni 'gyur ba ma mchis pa'o// 'gyur ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni tha snyad ma
384b7(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa'o// tha snyad ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// bsam gyis mi khyab pa gang lags pa de ni bstan du ma mchis pa'o// bstan du ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni dngos po ma
385a1(dkon brtsegs): / mchis pa'o// dngos po ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni ma byung ba'o// ma byung ba gang lags pa de ni 'phags pa rnams mi ston to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor cang mi smra
385a2(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa nam grus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor bu mos dris pa'i ldan thob cig/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'di la
385a3(dkon brtsegs): brjod du ci yang med// cang mi smra ba bde 'thob byed// spros pa med pa'i chos 'di dag/ bu mo yongs su 'dri bar byed// ji sri dngos po sgyu yod pa// de sid skyon gyis gos par 'gyur// chos kyi dbyings ri nga sna /
385a4(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni nyon mongs med pa'i tshul/ de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas/ tshe dang ldan pa nam gru la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa nam gru ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bsam gtan pa rnams kyi
385a5(dkon brtsegs): mchog tu bstan pa lags na/ ci sems la gnas te bsam gtan mdzad dam/ 'on te sems ma mchis pa la gnas te bsam gtan mdzad/ gal te sems la gnas te bsam gtan mdzad na/ sems ni brjod
385a6(dkon brtsegs): du ma mchis shing sgyu ma lta bu ste/ yang dag pa ma yin pa kun btags pa lags na/ ci yang dag pa ma yin pa kun btags pa ma mchis pa la gnas te bsam gtan mdzad/ ji ste sems ma mchis pa la gnas
385a7(dkon brtsegs): te bsam gtan mdzad min/ rtswa dang / shing dang / rtsig pa dang / rdo la sogs pa byung ba dang / zhig pa de dag thams cad kyang ting nge 'dzin du 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag ni sems ma mchis pa'i sang du'o//
385b1(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa nam gru'ang cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas/ tshe dang ldan pa nam grul 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa nam thu du mos dris pa'i lan thob cig/ nam grus smras pa/
385b2(dkon brtsegs): bu mo ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul yongs su 'dri ste/ de ni nyan thos rnams kyis bstan par mi nus so// bu mos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa nam gru chos kyi dbyings de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi 'dug nam la ShAn
385b3(dkon brtsegs): thos rnams kyi'ang gzhan lags sam/ gal te chos kyi dbyings gzhan lags na ni tha dad du 'gyur ro// de bzhin nyid ni gnyis su ma mchis te/ de bas na de bzhin nyid dang gnyis ni bye brag ma mchis na/ ci'i sra
385b4(dkon brtsegs): du tshe dang ldan pa num gru de skad gsung / nam gru'adra cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas/ tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'di ltar tshe dang ldan pa
385b5(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gags pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i mig can rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa lags na/ ci lha'i mig gis dngos po gzigs sam/ 'on te dngos po ma mchis pa gzigs/ gal te dngos po gzigs
385b6(dkon brtsegs): na ni rtag par lta bar 'gyur ro// ji ste dngos po ma mchis pa gzigs na ni chad par lta bar 'gyur te/ de'ang mi rigs so// ma 'gags pa'ang cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ tshe dang
385b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa ma 'gags pa la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa bu mos dris pa'i lan thob cig/ tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas smras pa/ bu mos ni shes rab kun du 'jom pa dris pas// de ni
386a1(dkon brtsegs): lan gdab par mi nus so// de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so// 'di ltar tshe dang ldan pa kun dpa' bo khyod ni/
386a2(dkon brtsegs): som ldan 'das kyis mang du thos pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa lags na/ ci mang du thos pa rjid de don du balnga 'am/ bon te tshig 'brur blta/ gal te don du blta ni/ don ni brjod du ma mchis shing bsnang du ma mchis pa
386a3(dkon brtsegs): sne tA de ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pas shes par bgyi ba ma lags pa nas/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar gyis shes par bgyi ba ma lags pa ste/ rnam pa de lta bu gang lags pa de ni bsnun du ma mchis pa'o// ci
386a4(dkon brtsegs): ste tshig 'brur blta na ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis don la rton pa yin gyi/ tshig 'bru la rton pa ma yin no zhes gsungs pas/ de bas na tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i mang du thos pa nyid ni rton pa ma lags so//
386a5(dkon brtsegs): de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'ang cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas 'jam dbul gzhon nur gyur pas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bu mos dris pa'i lan thob
386a6(dkon brtsegs): cig/ kun dga' bos smras pa/ bu mo ni yi ge dang bral ba 'dri ste/ de ni smras tshim par byed par mi nus so// bu mo ni sems dang bral ba'i mnyam pa nyid 'dri ste/ slob pa rnams kyi sa ma yin na/ de ji ltar bstan pa
386a7(dkon brtsegs): bya ste/ ches kyi mnga' bdag de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu dgos so// de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal khyod ni de
386b1(dkon brtsegs): bzhim gshegs pas zab mo la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa lags na/ ci rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zab pas khyod thub pa 'am/ 'on te ngo bo nyid thub pas zab/ gal
386b2(dkon brtsegs): te rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab pas khyod bab na ni/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang ldan pa'i chos gang yang ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ni song ba ma lags/
386b3(dkon brtsegs): 'ong ba ma lags te/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung sa mig gi rnam par shes pas shes par bgyi ba ma lags pa nas/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar gyis shes par bgyi ba ma lags shing / gnyis su ma mchis la/
386b4(dkon brtsegs): kun tu 'byung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// ji ste ngo bo nyid zab pas zab na ni/ ngo bo nyid gang yang sus kyang brtag par mi nus so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo yang dag pa'i mtha' zab pas kho bo zab bo//
386b5(dkon brtsegs): bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas smras pa/ 'jam dpal yang dag pa'i mtha' ni mtha' ma lags te/ de'i slad du rnam par shes pas 'tshal ba ma lags so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo yang dag pa'i
386b6(dkon brtsegs): mtha' zhes bya ba 'di ni dmigs su med pa'i tshig bla dgas so// bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas smras pa/ 'jam dpal dmigs su ma mchis pa ni gang gi tshig bla dgas kyang ma lags te/ dmigs su ma mchis
386b7(dkon brtsegs): pa ni tshig bla dgas las yang dag par 'das pa lags so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo 'di ji ltar gzhan dag la bstan par bya/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub
387a1(dkon brtsegs): n+ya/ ni bstan pa las yang dag par 'das pa lags te/ de ni brjod pas bstan par mi nus so// 'jam dpal yang cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis
387a2(dkon brtsegs): byin pas/ byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba don yod la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod 'di skad du/ ci nas kyang grong khyer 'di ni skyes pa 'am/ bud med dam/ lde'u 'am/ bu mo gang dag kho bo'i mig lam
387a3(dkon brtsegs): na snang bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs mthong bar 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o// zhes gsungs pa de ci de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs kyi skur
387a4(dkon brtsegs): mthong bar mdzad dam/ 'on te chos kyi skur mthong bar mdzad/ gal te gzugs kyi skur mthong bar mdzad na/ de ni sangs rgyas kyi bka' ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ni 'di skad du/ gang dag dA la gzugs
387a5(dkon brtsegs): su mthong / gang dag du la slar shes pa/ 'dun pa 'dod chags ldan pa ste// skye bo de dag nga mi mthong // zhes gsungs so// ci ste de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi skur mthong bar mdzad na/ chos kyi sku ni bstan
387a6(dkon brtsegs): du mi nus pa'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi sku ni mig gi rnam par shes pa las yang dag par 'das pa ste/ blta bar mi nus pa'i slad du'o// mthong ba don yod kyang cang mi
387a7(dkon brtsegs): smra bar gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' rin po che tog gis smras pa/ mthong ba don yod bu mos dris pa'i lan thob cig/ mthong ba don yod kyis smras pa/ bu mo ni dngos po med pa 'dri ste/ de ni bstan par nus
387b1(dkon brtsegs): so/ bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas smras pa/ bdag ni dngos po 'am/ dngos po ma mchis pa mi 'dri'o// bstan pa spobs la de nas ston cig/ mthong ba don yod kyang cang mi smra bar gyur to//
387b2(dkon brtsegs): de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rin po me tog la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'di skad du/ gang gis grong khyer na khyim thams cad du rin po ches gang ba'i gter
387b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o// zhes gsungs pa de ci zang zing dang bcas pas phan 'dregs pa mdzad dam/ 'on te zang zing ma mchis pas phan 'dogs pa mdzad/
387b4(dkon brtsegs): gal te zang zing dang bcas pas phan 'dogs na nI/ byis pa so so'i skye bo'i phan 'dogs pa dang bye brag ma mchis par 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi dga' ba ni zang zing
387b5(dkon brtsegs): dang bcas pa'i slad du'o// ci ste zang zing ma mchis pas phan 'dogs pa mdzad na/ zang zing ma mchis pa ni bsgrub tu ma mchis pa lags so// rin po che tog kyang cang mi smra bar gyur to//
387b6(dkon brtsegs): de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas/ byang chub sems dpa' ngan song spong la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'di skad du/ gang gis grong khyer 'di na sems can rnams kyi las ngan song myong bar
387b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba gang yod pa de tshe 'di nyid la yang zhing chung ngu myong bar 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o zhes gsungs pa de/ de bzhin gshegs pas las ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid du
388a1(dkon brtsegs): bya/ bstan te/ de ni khyod kyis bsam par mi spyod do// gal te smod na de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro// ji ste bsam par mi spyod na/ mi mkhyen bzhin du mang po myong bar
388a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba'i las tshe 'di nyid la yang zhing chung ngu myong bar ji ltar mdzad de/ bdag po ma mchis pa'i chos rnams la bdag po rnyed par 'gyur ro// gal te de ltar mdzad na de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' dang 'gral bar
388a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// ngan song spong gis smras pa/ kho bo ni smon lam gyi dbang gis mang du myong bar 'gyur ba'i las nyung ngu myong bar 'gyur bar byed do// bu mos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu chos rnams kyi chos 'di ni smon lam gyi
388a4(dkon brtsegs): dbang gis bsgyur du mi nus lags so// gal te nus par gyur na sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla'o zhes/ de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i dgongs pa de/ smon lam gyi dbang gis ji ltar mi
388a5(dkon brtsegs): 'grub ste/ rnam grangs 'dis na smon lam gyi dbang gis bsgyur bar mi nus par rig par bya'o// ngan song spong yang cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas/ byang chub
388a6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par spel ba la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod 'di skad du/ gang gis mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen por skye bo'i tshogs thams cad kyi sgring pa lnga po dag
388a7(dkon brtsegs): rnam par sel bar 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o zhes gsungs pa de ci ting nge 'dzin de bdag la rag las pa lags sam/ 'on te gzhan la rag las pa lags/ gal te
388b1(dkon brtsegs): bdag la rag las pa lags na ni/ mi 'pho ba'i chos can lags te/ ji ltar khyod snyoms par zhugs pas gzhan dag gi sgrib pa rnams rab tu zhi bar mdzad/ ci ste gzhan la rag las pa lags na ni/
388b2(dkon brtsegs): ting nge 'dzin de khyod kyi ma lags so// gang khyod kyi ma lags pa des ni gzhan la phan par mdzad par mi spyod do// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas smras pa/ bu mo kho bo'i sbyor ba
388b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni byams pa sngon du 'gro ba'o// bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas smras pa/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyang byams pa la gnas pa lags na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams na sems
388b4(dkon brtsegs): can rnams la sgrib pa rnams kyis gnod pa'ang mchis so// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'ang cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas/
388b5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'di skad du/ ci nas kyang grong khyer na sems can gang dag bcings pa dang gsad par bkri ba de dag thar pa
388b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / 'jigs pas nyen pa rnams kyang 'jigs pa med pa thob par 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o zhes gsungs pa de/ ci khyod kyi sbyor ba 'di len pa dang bcas pa lags sam/
388b7(dkon brtsegs): 'or te len pa ma mchis pa lags/ gal te sbyor ba de len pa dang bcas pa lags na ni/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyang len pa dang bcas pa lags te/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams dang mtshungs par
389a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// de lta bas na de'ang mi rigs so// ji ste sbyor ba de len pa ma mchis par lags na ni/ mngon par 'dus ma byas pa lags te/ mngon par 'dus ma byas pa la ni nye bar bsgrub
389a2(dkon brtsegs): pa ma mchis so// byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kyang cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa brtsegs kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la
389a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces smras so// spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bu mos dris pa'i lan thob cig/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis smras pa/ bu mo ni skye ba dang 'gag pa mi 'dri ste/ de ni lan
389a4(dkon brtsegs): gdag par mi nus so// bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas smras pa/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gang na skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa de ni dri ba ma mchis pa'o//
389a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis smras pa/ bu mo gang na skye ba med cing 'gag pa med pa de ni yi ge 'jug pa med do// bu mos smras pa/ 'jug pa ma mchis pa dang / yi ge ma
389a6(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa'i chos thams cad la ni mkhas pa dag yi ge dang 'jug pa mi ston te/ yi ge rnams la mi chags so// chags pa ma mchis pa ni chos kyi dbyings te/ de la ni rtogs par bgyi ba'i slad du chags pa
389a7(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis so// byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kyang cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas/ byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa brtsegs la 'di/
389b1(dkon brtsegs): skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'di skad du/ gang gis zong khyer na spre bo'i tshogs thams cad phan tshun du tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs dang / byams pa'i sems kyis smra bar 'gyur ba dang / spongs
389b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'ang thob par 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o// zhes gsungs pa'i khyod kyi spobs pa nye bar bsgrub pa gang lags pa de ci rnam par rtog pas bskyed pa lags sam/ 'on te rgyu ma
389b3(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa las byung ba lags/ gal te rnam par rtog pas bskyed pa lags na ni/ 'dus byas thams cad kyang rnam par rtog pas bskyed pa lags te/ de lta bas na rnam par zhi bar mi 'gyur ro// ci sna rgyus
389b4(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa las byung ba lags na ni/ ma byung ba la sgro 'dogs par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa brtsegs kyis smras pa/ bu mo sems can gang dag kho bo'i mig lam na snang bar 'gyur ba de dag thams
389b5(dkon brtsegs): cad spobs pa thob par gyur cig/ ces bya ba'i kho bo'i smon lam 'di ni dang po sems bskyed pa nas bzung ste btab bo// bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas smras pa/ rigs kyi bu sems bskyed pa gang gis smon
389b6(dkon brtsegs): lam btab pa'i sems bskyed pa de mchis sam/ 'on te ma mchis/ gal te mchis na ni rtag par lta ba lags so// ci ste ma mchis na nang par lta ba lags te/ de gsungs na ni khyod kyi gsung ba log pa/
389b7(dkon brtsegs): lags so// byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa brtsegs kyang cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas/ byang chub sems dpa' gom pa 'dor ba don yod la 'di skad ces smras/
390a1(dkon brtsegs): so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'di skad du/ ci nas kyang grong khyer na sems can gang dag kho bo'i mig lam na snang bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
390a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos byasam par bya'o// zhes gsungs pa de ci byang chub de mnus pa zhes brjod par bgyi 'am/ 'on te ma mchis pa zhes brdo
390a3(dkon brtsegs): par bgyi/ gal te mchis ni ni rtag pa ste/ yod pa'i mthar 'dzin pa lags so// ci ste ma mchis na ni chad pa ste/ med pa'i mthar 'dzin pa lags so// byang chub sems dpa' gom pa 'dor ba don
390a4(dkon brtsegs): yod kyis smras pa/ bu mo byang chub ces bya ba 'di ni ye shes kyi tshig bla dgas so// bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas smras pa/ ci ye shes de skye bas rab tu phye ba lags sam/ 'on te zhi bas rab tu phye
390a5(dkon brtsegs): ba lags/ gal te skye bas rab tu phye ba lags na ni tshul bzhin ma lags pa yid la bgyid pa las byung ba 'dus byas su 'gyur te/ shes pa de ni byis pa rnams kyi lags so// ci ste zhi bas rab
390a6(dkon brtsegs): tu phye ba lags na ni/ de la dmigs pa ma mchis so// gang la dmigs pa ma mchis pa de lnga 'di ni so so'i skye bo'o zhe 'am/ nyan thos so zhe'am/ rang sangs rgyas so zhe 'am/ byang chub sems dpa'
390a7(dkon brtsegs): 'o zhe 'am/ sangs rgyas so zhes rnam par rtog pa mi skye'o// de ci'i srad du zhe na/ byang chub ni rnam par mi rtog pa lags na/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams ni byang chub la rnam par rtog ste/ mkhas
390b1(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams ni mi rdog pa'i slad du'o// byang chub sems dpa' gom pa 'dor ba don yod kyang cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' de
390b2(dkon brtsegs): ngag la 'dri skad ces smras so// bsod snyoms kyi phyir grong khyer du 'jug par mi bya'i skur 'dong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ deng bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pa las chos thos pa gang yin pa de ni
390b3(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa'i zas yin pas chog par 'gyur ba'i phyir te/ chos kyi zas bza' bar bya'o// de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas/ gnas brtan rab 'byor la 'dri
390b4(dkon brtsegs): skad ces smras so// btsun pa rab 'byor gang na gdeg pa med pa dang / gzhag pa med pa de la khyod kyis ci zhig btsal bar sems/ btsun pa rab 'byor dge sbyong gi tshul ni spros pa ma mchis pa lags kyi/
390b5(dkon brtsegs): spros pa la dga' ba ni ma lags so// btsun pa rab 'byor dge sbyong gi chos ni gnas pa ma mchis pa/ gnas par mi dgyi ba lags te/ 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul ni mi 'khrugs pa lags
390b6(dkon brtsegs): so// rnabam po gnyis pa ste tha ma'o// de nas nyan thos chen po brgyad po de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' brgyad po de dag dang / bram ze lnga brgya
390b7(dkon brtsegs): tsam po de dag dang / bu mo dri sa med kyis byin pa dang / rgyal po gsal rgyal dang / de las gzhan pa skye bo phal po che rnams/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
391a1(dkon brtsegs): / zhabs la so bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ phyog gcig tu 'khod do// de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas/ bcom ldan 'das
391a2(dkon brtsegs): la lan stong bskor ba byas te/ gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha dA sa la gtsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ tshigs su bcad
391a3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ ting 'dzin stobs ldan grags pa mtha' yas mnga'// 'jig rten mgon po bdud rtsi dga' stsol ba/ mtshungs med ye shes bde gshegs khyod la 'u// byang chub
391a4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' ji ltar spyad pa spyod// ji ltar shing dbang drung bzhugs bdud rnams 'joms// ji ltar ring bcas sa rnams g.yo bar bgyid// grags pa mtha' yas ji ltar 'od zer gtong // byang chub
391a5(dkon brtsegs): spyod tshul legs par bshad du gsol// sangs rgyas nor gyi gzungs ni ji ltar 'thob// ting 'dzin zhib dam pa ji ltar skom// mi yis rdzu 'phrul stobs ni ji ltar 'thob// sems can rim
391a6(dkon brtsegs): tshon rnams kyi spyod pa gsungs// gang gis dran dang rtogs dang blo gros 'gyur// spobs pa mdzes dang ldan par gang gis 'gyur// gang dang rab tu ldan na 'khor nang du// snyan cing shin tu mdzes pa
391a7(dkon brtsegs): smra bar bgyid// gang gis mi ni tshe rabs dran par 'gyur// dri ma ma mchis lnga yi mig kyang 'thob// lha rje 'thob cing pha rol sems tshul rig/ rdzu 'phrul gyis ni zhing rnams dargyar yang mchi// ji na
391b1(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa gtong la brtson par 'gyur// rtag tu tshul khrims dag cing bzod la dga'// ji ltar brtson 'grus bsam gtan mkhas par 'gyur// shes rab la yang ji ltar shin tu brtson// mngal gyi gnas
391b2(dkon brtsegs): ni ji ltar rnam spangs nas// pad+ma las ni rtag tu rdzus te skye// sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngar mchis par bgyid// bdag med stong pa nyid kyi sgra yang brjod// ji ltar de yid dga' dang mi dga' mtshungs//
391b3(dkon brtsegs): sred pa spangs shing tha ba zhe sdang spong // mtho bar mi sems dma' bar sems ma mchis// sems brtan g.yo ba ma mchis ri rab mtshungs// rnyed dang ma rnyed grags dang ma grags dang // bstod dang
391b4(dkon brtsegs): smad dang bde dang sdug bsngal dang // ji ltar 'jig rten chos rnams zil mnan gnas// 'jig rten kun la zla ba lta bur spyod// nga yi ma mchis tshul 'chos g.yo ma mchis// ji ltar rdul bral
391b5(dkon brtsegs): nga rgyal rgyags pa spong // zhi dang rab tu zhi dang zhe gnas brtson// blo ldan ji ltar ye shes mchog tu 'gyur// chung ma bu nor mdza' la dga' ma mchis// ji ltar bas mtha'i mal la mngon par dga'/
391b6(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu bya dang mtshungs shing rdza ba 'dra// ji ltar chos kyi nor la dga' zhing mos// chu dang mtshungs shing sa 'dra rlung dang mtshungs// mkhas pa ji ltar me dang 'dra bar 'gyur// rtag tu ci yang ma mchis mi rtog
391b7(dkon brtsegs): lags// mnyam pa nyid la dga' zhing nam mkha' mtshungs// ji ltar rtag tu chos ni spong mi bgyid// bdag 'dor bgyid kyi chos mchog yod mi gtong // 'jig rten dag tu ston pa'i sems bskyed nas//
392a1(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar gnas te byang chub 'jug par bgyid// zhing gi bkod pa ji ltar gnas par 'gyur// dge 'dun dag par ji ltar 'gyur ba lags// ji ltar dus gsum du yang chos thos shing //
392a2(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar tshe ring sems can bde bar 'gyur// rtag tu sred pa 'gog pa'i pha rol son// dgra bcom 'dul bar bden bzhi ji ltar mthong // sems can brgya dag byang chub 'jog bgyid par// spyod cing rtag
392a3(dkon brtsegs): tu dga' mos ji ltar 'gyur// gang gis shin tu mdzes par 'gyur// rdzus te skye bar gang gis 'gyur// longs spyod che dang shes rab che// kun+da mkhyen rtogs par khong du chud// gang gis sum cu rtsa
392a4(dkon brtsegs): gnyis mtshan// dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu 'thob// bsod nams kun la mkhas pa lags// spobs pa gang gis skye bar 'gyur// zhing ni ji ltar dag 'gyur lags// dge slong dge 'dun phun sum/
392a5(dkon brtsegs): tshogs// gang du de yis spon btab pa// der ni ji ltar skye 'gyur lags// tshe rabs dran par ji ltar 'gyur// ji ltar sangs rgyas rnams dang mjal// bskal pa bye ba stong rnams su// ngan 'char
392a6(dkon brtsegs): mchi bar mi 'gyur lags// rnam par 'dren pa ji ltar na// mdog dang gzi brjid snyan grags 'thob// stobs dang mthu drang brtson 'grus rnams// ji ltar thub par mi 'gyur lags// ji ltar sangs
392a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas chos dang yang // dge 'dun la ni skyabs su mchis// lus dang srog ni gtong bgyid kyi// de dag chos ni 'dor mi bgyid// byang chub spyad pa spyod bgyid cing // the tsom ma mchis ji ltar 'gyur// 'gyod/
392b1(dkon brtsegs): khathams cad smras nas su// srog chags rnams la chos kyang ston// khyod la mi mkhyen cang mi mngag/ thub cher khyod ni thams cad mkhyen// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod gang lags// go sa bzhin
392b2(dkon brtsegs): du bstan du gsol// de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bu mo legs so legs so// bu mo de bzhin gshegs
392b3(dkon brtsegs): ba la don 'di lta bu 'dri bar sems pa ni khyod yang legs so// bu mo de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang bshad do// bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes gsol te/
392b4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na bdud 'dul bar byed de/ bzhi gang zhe na/ gzhan gyi rnyed pa la phrag
392b5(dkon brtsegs): dog med pa dang / phra ma'i tshig yongs su spong ba dang / skye bo mang po dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / sgrib pa med pa'i byams pa sgom pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang
392b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan na bdud 'dul bar byed do// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ phrag dog mi bu phra ma spu mi bya// skye bo mang po dge ba rnams la sbyar// phyogs bcu rnams su byams pa bsgom byas na// bdud 'dir btul nas
392b7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub reg par 'gyur/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas pa dag g.yo bar byed de/ bzhi gang zhe na/ ji skad smra ba de bzhin byed pa dang /
393a1(dkon brtsegs): chos zab mo la mos pa dang / yi dam la brtan pa dang / skye bo mang po byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ sangs/
393a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas pa dag g.yo bar byed do// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ ji skad spras pa de bzhin byed// mkhas pa zab mo'i chos la bzod// yi dam la yang shin tu brtan// dkar po'i chos la 'dzud par byed/
393a3(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub bla med la// skye bo mang po dga' bar byed// de ltar chos bzhi de dag gis// zhing rnams bye ba g.yo byar byed/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sangs
393a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas mu med pa rnams su 'od zer dgra gtong ste/ bzhi ga zhe na/ mar me sbyin pa dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa dang / sems can bag med par gyur cing mi khom par gyur pa rnams
393a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi gan du song ste chos ston pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten dag la rin po che'i dra bas 'gebs pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha'
393a6(dkon brtsegs): yas mu med pa rnams su 'od zer dag gtong ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ mar me byin pas 'od ni rnam par 'dag/ zad pa'i dus na dam chos yongs su 'dzin// bag med gyur pa rnams la chos sbyin
393a7(dkon brtsegs): byed// mchod rten dag la rin chen dra ba 'bul// des na bya ba mtha' yas zhing 'gro zhing // byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer gtong bar byed// reg nas sems can bde dang ldan par 'gyur// mkhas pa byang /
393b1(dkon brtsegs): chub pa med don du gnyer/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na// gdungs 'thob ste/ ba'i gang zhe nA/ rgyan sA tshogs gtsang zhing dag pa sbyin pa dang / bu mo rgyan thams cad
393b2(dkon brtsegs): kyis brgyan te 'dod pa rnams la sbyin pa dang / rgyun mi 'chang bar de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags pa rjod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mang du gnas pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems
393b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na gzungs 'thob bo// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sna tshogs byin pas gzungs ni thob par 'gyur// spong ba rnams la bu mo brgyun te sbyin// rgyun mi
393b4(dkon brtsegs): 'chad par sangs rgyas bsngags brjod// rgyal ba'i ye shes don du shes rab sgom// chos bzhi 'di dag gis ni gzungs thob 'gyur// bskal pa brgyar yang thos pa chud mi za// phyogs
393b5(dkon brtsegs): bcur de bzhin gshegs pa gang 'chad pa// de dag thams cad dran pa'i stobs kyis 'dzin/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ ting nge 'dzin 'thob ste/ bzhi ga
393b6(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ 'khor ba la yid byung ba mang ba dang / bcig pur kun tu dga' zhing mgu la mos pa dang // brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang / las kyi mtha' shin du yongs su mthar phyin pa yin te/ bu mo byang chub
393b7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chos bzhi pa de dag dang ldan na/ ting nge 'dzin 'thob bo// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ srid pa'i 'gro ba kun la yid kyang byung // bse ru lta bur gcig pur spyod la dga'// rtag tu shin tu
394a1(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin// de'i las rtag tu shin tu mthar yang byin// rtag tu chos bzhi dag la zhugs nas su// byang chub spyod pa zhi ba myur 'tshol byed/
394a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' ting 'dzin la gor 'thob// rgyal ba rnams kyi spyod yul byang chub rtogs/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ rdzu 'phrul 'thob ste/ zhi
394a3(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ lus yang ba dang / sems yang ba dang / chos tham cad pa mngon par zhen pa med pa dang / khams bzhi nam mkha'i khams dang mnyam pa nyid du byin gyis rlob pa ste/ bu mi byang chub sems dpa'
394a4(dkon brtsegs): chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ rdzu 'phrul 'thob bo// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ lus yang ba dang sems kyang de bzhin yang // chos rnams kun la gnas pa med pa nyid// nam mkha'i khams dang
394a5(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs shing 'dra nyid du// khams bzhi po dag byin gyis rlob par byed// chos bzhi 'di dag nges par bsten byas na// blo ldan de yis rdzu 'phrul mtha' yas thob// skad cig gcig pazhing rnam stong
394a6(dkon brtsegs): du 'gro// sangs rgyas stong phrag mang po rnams kyang mthong / bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ mdzes par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ khro ba med de/ rtsod pa dang /
394a7(dkon brtsegs): za ba dang / zhe sdang dang bral ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten 'phyag par mngon par dga' ba dang / tshul khrims kyi sdom pas bsdams shing / tshur shog legs par 'ongs so zhes rtag tu smra bdas /
394b1(dkon brtsegs): chos smra ba rnams la khro gnyer dang bral zhing zhe 'gras pa'i sems med pa yin te/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ mdzes par 'gyur ro// de lnga 'di skad ces bya ste/ gzhan pa
394b2(dkon brtsegs): khro dang khon du 'dzin mi byed// nga rgyal rgyags dang tha ba zhe sdang bral// rtsod pa med la dga' zhing snyan par sla// gus par rgyal ba'i mchod rten 'phyag par byed// de ni tshul khrims rnam dag rtag tu
394b3(dkon brtsegs): srung / de ni rtag tu legs par 'ongs zhes smra// chos smra rnams la de ni thab med// de yi sems na rdo rje ri rab mtshungs/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ rdzus te
394b4(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs pad+ma'i sbeng na bzhugs pa byed du 'jug pa dang / me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / pad+ma dkar po dag gis lag pa bkang ste/ de bzhin
394b5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la mngon par 'thor ba dang / phan pa'i dngos po mang zhing yang dag par dga' bar byed pa'i ngang tshul can dang / gzhan dag gi skyon mi 'dzin pa dag /
394b6(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/
394b7(dkon brtsegs): rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sangs rgyas sku gzugs pad+ma mchog bzhugs byed du 'jug/ chu skyes me tog lag pa bkang ste 'phul bar byed// pha rol dag la dga' ba bskyed pa'i
395a1(dkon brtsegs): tshig kyang smra// dga' bar byed la mngon par brtson gyi skyon mi 'dzin// sems can kun la phan phyir bsod nams yongs su bsngo// thub mchog rnams kyi sangs rgyas byang chub
395a2(dkon brtsegs): sgrub pa shes// sangs rgyas gsungs pa'i yon tan 'di bzhi pa sten na de// rgyal ba mchog rnams drung du rdzus te skye bar 'gyur/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/
395a3(dkon brtsegs): longs spyod chen por 'gyur te// bzhi gang zhe na/ bsdus pa med par sbyin pa'i tshul can dang / chags pa med par dngos po yongs su gtong ba dang / mos pa mang ba dang / lta bar gyur pa thams cad dang bral
395a4(dkon brtsegs): ba yin te/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ longs spyod chen por 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ nges pa bsdus pa med par sbyin pa sbyin par byed// de ni dngos po kun la rtag
395a5(dkon brtsegs): tu 'dzin pa med// rgyal ba'i ye shes mchog la mos pa bskyed byas na// de ni phyir zhing longs spyod chen po 'thob par 'gyur// dad dang ldan par 'gyur zhing g.yo med sgyu yang med// pha rol dag gi skyon ni
395a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin par yong mi byed// lhag pa'i bsam pas gang gis lte ba rang gyur pa// des nade 'dir longs spyod bzang po rnams dang ldan/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang
395a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan na/ shes rab chen por 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ chos la ser sna mi byed pa dang / mi mthun par mi 'jug pas 'gyod pa sel ba dang / gsol ba 'debs pa la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du gdams
395b1(dkon brtsegs): ngag smon pa dang / spyong pa nyid smos pa la mdu gnas pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ shes rab chen por 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ mkhas pa nam yang sar/
395b2(dkon brtsegs): snga yong mi byed/ mi mthur 'jug pa med pas 'gyod pa sel/ yang dag rang ldan gdams ngag smon par byed// rgyal ba'i spyod pa gang yin spyod nyid sdom// chos bzhi 'di dag nges par bster byas na/
395b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyal bas bzhed pa'i byang chub myur du 'thob// sangs rgyas rjes su bstan la bslabs byas nas// rkang gnyis dam pa sangs rgyas de 'gyur ro// bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos
395b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhi dang ldan na/ tshe rabs dran par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ lung nod pa dang / kha ton la brtson pa rnams lung mnod pa dang / gdams ngag brjed nas yun ring du lon te gsol ba 'debs pa la lung
395b5(dkon brtsegs): 'bog cing dran par byed pa dang / 'di ltar kun dga' ba'i tshig gis gzhan dag la dang ban+de bar sgrub pa dang / 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las nges par 'byung ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba thob
395b6(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba'i phyir gzhan dag la chos ston pa dang / yongs su bsngo ba la mngon par brtson zhing ting nge 'dzin gyi mtshan ma la mkhas pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/
395b7(dkon brtsegs): tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ lung mnos kha ton brjed la dran par byed// gzhan la yid du 'ong ba'i sgra yang sgrogs// skyo ba med par chos kyang rjod par byed// ti
396a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin sgom pa'i mtshan ma legs par 'jim// chos bzhi 'di dag nges par bsten byas na/ mthu chen ldan pa tshe rabs dran par 'gyur// bskal pa stong phrag bsam
396a2(dkon brtsegs): yas rjes su dram// rnam par 'dren pa'i mchog nyid myur du 'thob/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas rnams dang phrad pa 'thob ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/
396a3(dkon brtsegs): srog gi phyir yang dam pa'i chos mi spong ba dang / srog gi phyir yang sdig pa'i grogs po rnams dang mi sten pa dang / srog gi phyir yang chos smra ba la skur pa mi 'debs pa dang / sangs rgyas rjes su
396a4(dkon brtsegs): dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgom pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas rnams dang zad par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sangs rgyas byang chub kyi tshom
396a5(dkon brtsegs): spong mi byed// chos smra ba la skur pa yod mi 'debs// nges pa sdig pa'i grogs rnams rnam par spong // g.yel ba med par rtag tu sangs rgyas dran// chos bzhi 'di dag nges par bsten
396a6(dkon brtsegs): byas na/ bde gshegs rnams dang phrad pa des 'thod bo// bla med byang chub ma thob bar du yang // 'dren pa ga la bzhugs pa der de skye/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos
396a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhi dang ldan na/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag 'thob ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la rin po che spar gyis 'thor ba dang /
396b1(dkon brtsegs): 'bru mar dri zhim po dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten 'khru bar byed pa dang / me tog dang / spos dang / sil snyan sna tshogs 'bul ba dang / yid du 'ong ba'i g.yog 'khor gyis blang
396b2(dkon brtsegs): dang slob dpon la bsnyen bkur bya bas rim gro byed pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis pa de dag 'thob ngo bo// de la 'di skad
396b3(dkon brtsegs): ces bya ste/ mchod rten la ni spar gyis dbyig rnams 'thor// dri zhim 'bru mAr rnams kyis mchod rten 'khru// spos dang me tog sil snyan sna tshogs 'bul// yid du 'ong bas mkhan po slob
396b4(dkon brtsegs): dpon sten// de'i lus sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan dang ldan// rab tu mdzes shing yon tan kun dang ldan// gang gis shes rab mchog ldan rgyal mdzes pa/ chos de dag gis skyes chen mtshan du
396b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu po dag 'thob ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ stan rgyu sna tshogs chos kyi stan du 'bul ba dang / gzhan
396b6(dkon brtsegs): la bsti spang byed pas mi skyo ba dang / chos smra ba la 'thab mo mI rgol ba dang / sems can rnams byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang
396b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan na/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu bo dag 'thob bo// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ stan rgyu sna tshogs chos kyi stan du 'bul// gzhan la bsti stang byed pas skyo ba med// chos smra ba la 'thab mo
397a1(dkon brtsegs): yod mi rgol// sems can rnams ni byang chub 'dzin du 'jug/ 'di bzhis lus la dpe byad bzang po rnams// 'di na de yis rnyed pa dga' ba med// yon tan 'di
397a2(dkon brtsegs): ngag rtag tu bsten byas na// byang chub sems dpa' 'di na brgyan par 'gyur/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na// spobs pa 'thob sde/ bzhi gang zhe na/ byang
397a3(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i sde snod 'dzin pa dang / nyin mtshan du phung po gsum pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs kha ton byed pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub 'jig rten thams cad drang
397a4(dkon brtsegs): mi mthum pa skye ba med cing 'gag pa med par nges pa la mchog tu dga' ba skyes nas 'dzin pa dang / lus dang / srog dang / yo byad rnams la mi lta ba ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi
397a5(dkon brtsegs): po de dag dang ldan na/ spobs pa 'thob bo// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod ni/ nyin mtshan rab tu 'don par byed/ 'jig rten kun la mI mthun pa// skye ba med par rab
397a6(dkon brtsegs): tu sgrogs// mchog tu dga' ba rnyed gyur nas// sangs rgyas bstan pa 'dzin par byed// lus drang srog la mi lta bar// de ni byang chub lta bar byed// bzhi po 'di dag bsten byas na// de yi
397a7(dkon brtsegs): spogs pa 'phel bar 'gyur// lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten kun// sna tshogs 'phreng 'dras tshim par byed/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas
397b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhing yongs su dag pa 'thob ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ phrag dog med pa dang / ser sna med pa dang / sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa dang / 'khor dang 'dre ba med pa ste/ bu
397b2(dkon brtsegs): mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa 'thob bo// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gzhan gyi rnyed pa nam yang phrag dog med// mthong
397b3(dkon brtsegs): nas dga' bar 'gyur te ser sna med// sems can kun la de yi sems kyang snyoms// 'khor dang 'dren par de ni yong mi byed// chos bzhi 'dis ni zhing gi bkod 'thob cing // myur du
397b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub mchog kyang thob par 'gyur/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ dge 'dun phun sum tshogs pa 'thob ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ gzhan gyi 'khor mi 'byed
397b5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / mi mthun pa rnams sdums byed pa dang / lung nod pa dang / kha ton+da byed du 'jug pas phan 'dogs pa dang / phra ma'i tshig yongs su spong ba ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos
397b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ dge 'dun phun sum tshogs pa 'thob bo// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gzhan gyi 'khor ni nam yang yod mi 'byed// skye bo mi mthun pa dag 'dum par byed// lung
397b7(dkon brtsegs): nod kha ton byed la yang dag 'dzud// pha rol dag la dbyen gyi tshig mi smra// chos bzhi 'di dag nges par bsten byas na// dge 'dun rgya che rnam dag thob par 'gyur// de bas dge 'dun rnam par sbyang
398a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir// mkhas pas chos ba'i rtag tu bsten par bya/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang du sems
398a2(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa der skye ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ gzhan dag gi shes kyi khe dang / rnyed pa la phrag dog mi skyed pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug po yongs su dag pa yongs su 'tshol ba dang /
398a3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la sbyor bar 'du shes skyed de/ tha na sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la'ang bsti stang byed pa dang / shes kyi khe'i phyir tshul 'chos pa med pa ste/
398a4(dkon brtsegs): bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang du sems bskyed pa der skye'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gzhan la mchod pa mthong na phrag dog med/
398a5(dkon brtsegs): rol phyin pa dag pa yongs su 'tshol// byang chub sems dpa' ston par rtag tu sems// shes khe bde ba'i don du tshul 'chos med// yon tan 'di dag rtag tu bsten byas na// de bzhin
398a6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa rnams dang de phrang 'gyur// zhing gang dag tu smon lam btab byas pa// 'dod pa bzhin du zhing der skye bar 'gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ bu mo dri ma med kyis
398a7(dkon brtsegs): byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar chos btags pa 'di dag bdag gis yang dag par blangs te/ gnas par ma bgyis na/ bdag
398b1(dkon brtsegs): gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyis khams na 'tsho zhing gzhes la/ chos kyang ston pa de dag thams cad bsdus par gyur cig/ de
398b2(dkon brtsegs): nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos/ bu mo dri med gyis byin pa la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo khyod 'di skad smra bA ni ngo mtshar te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang
398b3(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bsgrub dka' bar myi shes sam/ de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas/ gnas brtan mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'dri skad ces smras so// btsun pa mo
398b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gal gyi bu chen po bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na ji ltar da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum du zhugs pa bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang
398b5(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar btags pa'i chos 'di dag kyang yang dag par blangs te gnas par 'gyur zhe na/ bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des stong
398b6(dkon brtsegs): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur cig/ sems can gang la'ang gnod pa med par gyur cig/ bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis bcom ldan
398b7(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis ji ltar btags pa'i chos 'di dag yang dag par blangs te gnas par 'gyur zhe na/ bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des lha'i me tog gi char mngom par bab par gyur cig/ ma dkrol
399a1(dkon brtsegs): bar sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong sgra 'byin par gyur cig/ bdag kyang bud med kyi lus las gyur te/ skyes pa'i lus su red cing / lo bcu drug lon
399a2(dkon brtsegs): ba 'dra bar gyur cig/ smon lam re skad btab cing bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs 'di byas mjug tu/ de nas de'i ming la stong gsub kyi snong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i di rjem
399a3(dkon brtsegs): drug tu g.yos/ ma dkrol bar sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dag gi sgra'ang byung / lha'i me tog gi char yang mngon par bab bo// bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pa'ang bud med kyi lus mi snang
399a4(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur te/ skyes pa'i dbang po thob nas/ lo bcu drug lon pa tsam gyi gzhon nu 'dra bar snang ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos
399a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni ngo mtshar che ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das dang po sems bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ byang chub kyi snying po la
399a6(dkon brtsegs): gnas kyi bar gyi byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// de ci'i srad du zhe na/ 'dri ltar 'di'i bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis rgyu 'di dag so sor yongs su rdzogs pas/ bu mo dri ma med
399a7(dkon brtsegs): kyis byin pa 'di ni 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/ 'di ltar dbang che bar grags pa/ 'di ltar mthu che ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu de de bzhin no//
399b1(dkon brtsegs): ji skad smras pa bzhin te/ dang po sems bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ byang chub kyi snying po'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mchod rten dang spyir gnas yin
399b2(dkon brtsegs): te nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyang zil gyis gnon te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
399b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi chos nyid de/ gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog dum/ kha dog sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / demar po dag
399b4(dkon brtsegs): dkar po dang / le brgan dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung ste/ 'od des 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag snang bas khyab par byas nas/ tshangs pa'i
399b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par 'phags de/ slar log nus bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub par gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan lus langs te/ hA
399b6(dkon brtsegs): gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i b+ha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de
399b7(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ lha dang tshangs pa'i sgra dang mi mjed bdag po'i sgra dang 'brug sgra dbyangs ldan pa// mgon po lnga sba yid 'ong ldan zhing 'dod chags zhe sdang zhi bar mdzad pa po// gti mug spong ba
400a1(dkon brtsegs): / 'jig rten dag na dga' ba bzang po gzhal yas skyed mdzad pa// stobs bcu yon tan rgya mtsho mnga' ba gang gi don du 'od btang bstan du gsol// rir bcas nags tshal
400a2(dkon brtsegs): bcas shing cha ba dang bcas pa'i sa rnams rnam pa drug tu g.yos// lha rnams nam mkhar gnas shing lha yi me tog yid du 'ong ba'i char pa 'bebs// seng ges la pham bgyis pa bzhin du khyod
400a3(dkon brtsegs): kyis mu stegs gzhan kun pham par mdzad// dpa' bo gang gi don du 'od kyi ltas 'di bstan pa mdzad pa bka' stsal gsol// nyi zla bye ba stong gis 'od bkye ba dang glog dang nor bu rnams 'od
400a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / lha dang klu dang dri za gnod sbyin dag gi 'od rnams 'bar ba gang lags pa// shAkya thub pa'i zhal nas dge zhing dag pa'i 'od byung ba dang mjal gyur nas/ 'od rnams thams cad mog mog
400a5(dkon brtsegs): por bgyis spangs rgyas 'od ni phyogs bcu rnams su mdzes// khyod kyi sprin mtshams bar gyis mdzod spu rab mdzes dkar zhing dri mra mu mchis bzang // 'bar zhing pad+ma'i rtsa dang du sa ma tog kun
400a6(dkon brtsegs): da 'dra bas phyogs gsal bgyid// thams cad mog mog bgyis nas gdugs kyis srin bu ma khyer bzhin du rgyal ba mdzes// mi yi seng ge thub 'di gang gi don chen bzang por deng gyur bstan du
400a7(dkon brtsegs): gsol// de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces/ bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo khyod kyis bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pa 'di byin gyis brlabs
400b1(dkon brtsegs): gang gis bud med kyi dngos por gyur te/ skyes pa'i dbang po thob par gyur pa mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa'adri
400b2(dkon brtsegs): ma med kyis byin pa 'di bskal pa grangs med pa 'bum phrag brgyad bcu bla ma med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir spyad de/ bskal bgrangs med pa 'bum phrag drug cur spyad nas/ byis bu mo
400b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri dag
400b4(dkon brtsegs): gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa gang dag yod pa de 'dra ba dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' dri mA med kyis byin pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa gcig tu 'gyur ro//
400b5(dkon brtsegs): de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos/ byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi du khyod de ltar yun ring du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
400b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi phyir spyod spyod na/ ci'i phyir khyod kyis de'i tshe bud med kyi dngos po ma bsgyur/ byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med kyis byin pas smras pa/ gnas brtan mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po ni rdzu 'phrul
400b7(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa yin na/ btsun pa khyod ci'i phyir skyes pa'i lus las mi bsgyur/ gnas brtan mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa
401a1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po dri ma med kyis byin pas/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po bud med kyi lus kyis byang chub
401a2(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'ang ma yin/ skyes pa'i lus kyis byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'ang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub ni ma skyes pa ste/ de ni lus sam sems
401a3(dkon brtsegs): kyis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus pa'i phyir ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'dri
401a4(dkon brtsegs): ltar byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med kyis byin pa 'di zab mo la mos pa ni ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ 'jam dpal 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med kyis byin pa 'dis
401a5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bye ba phrag drug cu'i thad na tshangs par spyod pa spyad do// stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin bsgoms so// bskal pa brgyad cur mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa bsgoms so// sangs rgyas bye ba phrag
401a6(dkon brtsegs): sum cu dang / byang chub sems dpa' zab mo'i tshul dang ldan pa rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dris so// sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig phrag brgyad cu la na bza' dang zhal zas kyis bkur
401a7(dkon brtsegs): sIr byas so// spobs pa rnam par nges pa bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'ang yongs su dris so// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
401b1(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag rin po che sna bdun gyis rab tu bkang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la dbul ba phul ba bas/
401b2(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nya tam / len tam/ 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam/ gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher rab tu ston na/
401b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams mang du skyed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sgrub pa 'di ni byang chung thob par byed pa'i phyir ro// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon dur gyur
401b4(dkon brtsegs): la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung zhig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston cig/ de nas
401b5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das
401b6(dkon brtsegs): kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spongs pa rnam par nges par bstan pa zhes bya bar zung zhig/ gzungs kyi rdo rje'i tshig ces bya bar yang zung zhig/ byang chub sems
401b7(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i sde snod ces bya bar yang zung zhig/ dri ma med kyis byin pas zhus pa zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa na/ lha dang mi'i skye dgu las srog chags khrag
402a1(dkon brtsegs): khrig phrag brgyad cu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du nges par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa
402a2(dkon brtsegs): brtsegs kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med kyis byin pa ji srid cig na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/
402a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med kyis byin pa 'di bskal pa brgya stong phrag grangs med pa bgrang ba las 'das pa na sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyan thos dang rang
402a4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas rnams med pa/ tshe'i tshad dpag tu med pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa/ lha'i longs spyod pas shin tu lhag pa dang ldan pa yon tan dpag tu med pa bkod pa
402a5(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhad cing 'dzum pa dri ma med pa'i tog gi rgyal po zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' dri
402a6(dkon brtsegs): ma med kyis byin pas bcom ldan 'das las mngon sum du lung bstan pa thos nas/ dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba des ta la bye ba phrag brgyad cu srid du nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te/ sangs
402a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing stong 'od kyis khyab par byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi steng du rin po che'i gdugs dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong yod pa byin gyis brlabs te/ rin po che'i gdugs des stong
402b1(dkon brtsegs): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di khebs so// des yang nam mkha' de nyid la rdzu 'phrul dpag tu med pa byas nas/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag la bstod
402b2(dkon brtsegs): cing phyag 'tshal te/ bsti stang byas nas nam mkha' de las babs te/ bcom ldan 'das pa lan stong bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go de nas bram ze tshangs pa'i wa
402b3(dkon brtsegs): la sogs pa bram ze lnga brgya po de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med kyis byin pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul yang mthong / lung brtan pa de'ang thos nas/ tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te rab
402b4(dkon brtsegs): tu dga' nas bde ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ snga skad mthun par bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ gang
402b5(dkon brtsegs): dgra sangs rgyas gus mchis dang // gang dag sangs rgyas chos skad du// blo ni shin tu nges gyur pa// de dag rnyed pa chen po rnyed// sngon chad sdig pa'i lus bgyis pas// bdag cag dram
402b6(dkon brtsegs): ze'i khyim du skyes// ston pa'i nyan thos mthong gyur na// bkra mi shis zhes tshig tu brjed// sangs rgyas sras dag mthong gyur na// bkra mi shis zhes bgyis pa yi// tshig tu brjod pa gang
402b7(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa// btsun pa nongs pa bshags par bgyi// tshogs kyi rgyal po'i mchog gyur pa// sangs rgyas gang dag ma mthong na// mi de dag gis nongs pa rnyed// de dag kha zas ngan pa 'tshal//
403a1(dkon brtsegs): dri mdu byin pas mchod byin spyad// bdag cag mgron du bos gyur pa// ston pa'i nyan thos rnams mthong nas// ma gus pas ni sdod cing mchis// de la bdag cag
403a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis dris// khyod kyis 'dren pa gang na mthong // de spras btsas nas zhag bdun nas// kho mos sangs rgyas mtshan thos mchi// de yi sangs rgyas bsngags mang ba// de bzhin gzhan
403a3(dkon brtsegs): du mi 'gyur brjod// de yi tsig thos bdag cag kun// byang chub mchog tu yang dag zhugs// bdag cag sngon gyi bsod nabs dang // sangs rgyas zhes bgyi smras bskul bas// shAkya sa
403a4(dkon brtsegs): go'i zhabs la ni// phyag bgyi'i slad du lpags pa lags// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mthong phyag bgyis// chos kyi dam pa thos par 'gyur// rkang gnyis dam pa 'di mthong nas// bdag cag sdus
403a5(dkon brtsegs): bsngal kun las grol// skyob pa shAkya seng ge yis// chos gang bshad par mdzad pa rnams// sangs rgyas chos kyi don slad du// bdag cag de la slob par bgyid// sangs rgyas chos thob babyed
403a6(dkon brtsegs): smad du// byang chub spyod pa thos gyur nas// bdag cag yang dag nan tan gyis// spyod pa de la bslab par bgyi// byang chub sems dpa' spyod gang dang // lam dang spro yang bstan pa la// nan tan
403a7(dkon brtsegs): gyis ni gnas par bgyi// 'jig rten rnams kyi mchod rten 'gyur// de dag lhag pa'i bsam mkhyen nas// thub pas de tshe 'dzum pa mdzad// thub chen lung bstan mdzad gsol zhes// sangs rgyas la ni
403b1(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' zhus// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to// bram ze lnga brgya 'di dag dang // bram ze tshangs pa'i lha de dang // de kun bskal pa gcig gi tshe// rnam par 'dren pa sangs rgyas 'gyur/
403b2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas lnga brgya tham pa la// tshe rabs snga mar mchod byas pa// de nas phyin chad spyod rje yang // sangs rgyas bye ba mthong bar 'gyur// bskal pa bye ba brgyad cur ni// de dag ngan 'gror 'gro mi 'gyur//
403b3(dkon brtsegs): de dag bsngal pa re re la'ang // sangs rgyas bye ba mthong bar 'gyur// de dag bskal pa gcig de la// rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog 'gyur te// 'od ces bya ba'i bskal gcig la// tshangs pa'i sgra zhes
403b4(dkon brtsegs): bya bar 'gyur// de lnga tshe tshad mtshungs 'gyur te// bskal pa bye ba brgyad cu thub// zhing mtshungs dge 'dun mtshungs 'gyur te// dge slong bye ba brgyad cu yod// sems can rnams kyi don spyad
403b5(dkon brtsegs): cing / chos 'di la yong spyad byas nas// de dag thams cad mthar gyis su// mya ngan 'das pa zhi ba thob/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub
403b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' spobs pa brtsegs dang / byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med kyis byin pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / bram ze de dag dang / rgyal po gsal rgyal dang / nyan thos chen
403b7(dkon brtsegs): po de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa
404a1(dkon brtsegs): / chen po chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ dri ma med kyis byin pas zhus pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste/ 'dus pa sum cu rtsa gsum pa rdzogs so//
404a2(dkon brtsegs): rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / su rem po d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa baM ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ bam po gnyis dang shriM ka bcwa lnga bcu yod do//
404a3(dkon brtsegs): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya gu Na rat+na sa ku su mi ha phrid tsha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyus pas zhus
404a4(dkon brtsegs): pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/
404a5(dkon brtsegs): bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag rab tu mang po rnams dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/
404a6(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe 'khor de nyid du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grong khyer yangs pa'i li tsa byi gzhon nu yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba zhig 'dus par gyur te 'dug go// de nas
404a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pa stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te
404b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te zhus nas zhub lung bstan pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das
404b2(dkon brtsegs): kyis bdag la skabs dbye bar gnang na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ram bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu lags so//
404b3(dkon brtsegs): de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// yon tan rin
404b4(dkon brtsegs): chen me tog kun tu rgyas pa khyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la ci dang ci 'dod pa zhus shig dang / zhu ba de dang de nyid kyi lung bstan pas ngas khyod
404b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi sems rangs par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
404b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das da ltar na 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes pa de rnams kyi mtshan bzung na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu
404b7(dkon brtsegs): mo myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dag bzhugs lags sam// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub
405a1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pa legs so legs so// yon tan rin chen
405a2(dkon brtsegs): me tog kun tu rgyas pa khyod da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don
405a3(dkon brtsegs): dang phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyi'i khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di zhu bar sems pa ni/ yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pa khyod yang legs so// de'i phyir yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas
405a4(dkon brtsegs): ba khyod legs par rab tu nyon la yong la zung zhog dang ngas khyod la bshad do// bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'tshal lo zhes gsol nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin chen me
405a5(dkon brtsegs): tog kun tu rgyas pas bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pa shar phyogs na chos thams cad kyi yon tan bkod
405a6(dkon brtsegs): nga'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan rin chen dpag tu med pa bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal po lta bu zhes bya ba zhig da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho
405a7(dkon brtsegs): zhing gzhes pa yong ngo // bskal bden rgyas pa thams cad kun nas sdud pa zhes bu'o// de na sems can rnams kyi tshe ning bag tu med do// bcom ldan 'das da'i byang chub sems dpab thams cad kyi 'khor
405b1(dkon brtsegs): dpag tu med do// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan rin chen dpag tu med pa bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal po lta bu de'i mtshan 'dzin par
405b2(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can bskal pa stong phrag drug chub 'khor ba bsnyil bar byed do// chob rjes nas kyang sgrib med par ston pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs thob par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing
405b3(dkon brtsegs): bye ba phrag bcu rnams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis spobs panye bar bsgrub par mdzad do// chos stor ba na bag tsha ba med par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ mi gang sangs rgyas mtshan
405b4(dkon brtsegs): dang rjod byed pa// de la yon tan 'di rnams myur du 'byung // de la de bas lhag pa gzhan yang 'byung // de la bla med byang chub dka' ma yin// yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pa lho phyog
405b5(dkon brtsegs): na yon tan rin chen bkod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan rin chen dpal bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal po lta bu zhes bya ba
405b6(dkon brtsegs): zhig da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa yod do// bskal pa de ni yon tan rgyas pa zhes bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan rin
405b7(dkon brtsegs): cheran dpal bkong ba'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal po lta bu de'i mtshan 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dang pa can tshe brjes ma bag tu nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi mtha' snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge na
406a1(dkon brtsegs): thob par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yon tan dpag tu med pa bkod pa'ang yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro// che rjes ma thab tu skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis thob par
406a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang du smon lam 'debs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dang der skye bar 'gyur ro// skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
406a3(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad pa'ang thob par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ mi gang sangs rgyas mtshan 'di rjod byed pa// de la ting 'dzin bsam yas de skye zhing // sum
406a4(dkon brtsegs): cu rtsa gnyis mtshan ldan lus thob la// de ni byang chub skye ba gcig thogs 'gyur// yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pa nub phyogs na mya ngan dang mun pa thams cad bral ba'i 'jig rten gyi
406a5(dkon brtsegs): khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos thams cad la spobs pa bkod pa'i dpal zhes bya ba zhig da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa yod do// bskal pa
406a6(dkon brtsegs): nI shAkya mngon par mdzes pa zhes bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos thams cad la spobs pa bkod pa'i dang la de'i mtshan 'dzin pa'i
406a7(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo rad pa can ni mtshon gyis 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// dug gis ma yin/ chus ma yin// mes kyang 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// rdzus te skye bar yang 'gyur ro//
406b1(dkon brtsegs): che brjes ma thag tu bang shugs brgya pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs thob par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ mi gang sangs rgyas mtshan 'di rjod byed pa/ de la mi de'i lus mes mi 'chi zhing // mtshon gyis min la
406b2(dkon brtsegs): chus min dug gis min// de ni rdzus te skye ba kho nar 'gyur/ yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pa byang phyogs na mun pa dang rdul dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/
406b3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spobs pa dpag tu med pa bkod pa yang dag par spyod pa'i blo zhes bya ba zhig da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa yod do// bskal
406b4(dkon brtsegs): pa de ni grags pa chen po 'dzin pa zhes bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spobs pa dpag med bkod pa yang dag par spyod pa'i blo de'i mtshan /
406b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can ni sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig phrag bcu mnyes par byed par 'gyur ro// thams cad du rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i gzugs kyang thob por 'gyur ro// zang ni shes
406b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i za ma tog ces bya ba'i gzungs kyang thob par 'gyur ba nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i bar du'ang 'gyur ro// ngan song gsum po rnams su skye bar mi
406b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i sdud pa spyod pa na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang du skye bar 'gyur ba de dang der ngan song du skyes pa'i sems can rnams yongs su thar par byed do// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
407a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub la surgya ma ldog par yang 'gyu ro// de la 'di sa dus bya ste/ mi ba sangs rgyas sa ngas du du byed pa/ sa yon tan dumang b.rang su da /
407a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyab ma pa 'bod par bcom med// del la tsam med par gzungs s+ho/ tan chen ma thos kun tu nus pa shar marnams kyi thobs kyi tu 'angs pa da pa'i 'dzis
407a3(dkon brtsegs): kyai khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dam com pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jug stong bslags pa'i bla skang kyi rgyam po zhes bya ba ni pa lung brlags te 'tsho zhing gan pa 'od du/ bskal
407a4(dkon brtsegs): pa de ni yon tan 'byung ba zhes bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jug spong ba sgra skad kyi rgyal po de'i mtshan 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi bungs/
407a5(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can de ni che brjes ma thag tu mi 'jigs pa pa ni thod par 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi thob par 'gyur ro// byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po thob par
407a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa co rgyang thob par 'gyur ro// dan ga shegs pa che dmig med kyis sa rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa 'i 'ja' des bu thob par 'gyur ro/
407a7(dkon brtsegs): bud med kyi che brjes nas skyes pa'i lus thob par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gang zhig rgyal ba'i mtshar 'di 'dzin byed pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' yon tan 'di dang gnan pas
407b1(dkon brtsegs): gyis mi khyang rtag tu thob par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas mang po mthong / yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pa lho nub mtshams kyi phyogs na bkod pa dpa tu
407b2(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i 'jigs rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser mchog 'od dpal zhes bya ba zhig da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa yod do// bskal ba
407b3(dkon brtsegs): de ni chos thams cad yang dag par skyed pa zhes bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser mchog 'od dpal de'i mtshan 'dzin pa'i rigs
407b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu 'am// rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can de mtshan re thos pa des/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bye ba phrag dgu mnyes par byed par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad mchog tu 'gro bar byed pa zhes bya
407b5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro// gru gang gis na sems can thams cad mchog tu 'gro bar byed ces bya zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas nas chos ston par 'gyur zhing // de chos ston
407b6(dkon brtsegs): pa na ting nge 'dzin de'i chos nyid thob pas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur te/ de de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
407b7(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yid 'ong gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing na sems can rnams gcig tu bde ba dang ldan zhing // sems can ngan song du skyes pa thams cad yongs su thar par 'gyur te/ de dag de nas yongs su
408a1(dkon brtsegs): bya/ grol nas lha dang mi'i lus thob par 'gyur zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ba bzhin no// de la 'di skad ces pa ste/ gser mchog 'od
408a2(dkon brtsegs): dpal gyi ni mtshan 'dzin pa// de la gzi brjid dpal mdog stobs dbang po// tshe rabs kun tu rnyed par dka' ma yin// de la blo thogs med par mtha' yas 'gyur/ yon tan rin chen
408a3(dkon brtsegs): me tog kun tu rgyas pa nub byang mtshams kyi phyogs na sdig pa dang bral ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gzi brjid kyi rgyal po
408a4(dkon brtsegs): rnam mang dpal snang zhes bya ba zhig da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa yod do// bskal pa de ni khyim rgyas pa zhes bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
408a5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas gzi brjid kyi rgyal po rnam mang dpal snang de'i mtshan 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi bu bar/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can de ni tshe brjes mthag tu spobs pa dpag tu med pa bkod pa zhes bya ba'i bzung
408a6(dkon brtsegs): thob par 'gyur ro// tshegs chung ngus de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bye ba
408a7(dkon brtsegs): phrag brgyad cu'i chos ston pa'ang thos par 'gyur/ 'dzin par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gang zhig rgyal ba de yi mtshan 'dzin pa/ tshe dpag med pa sangs rgyas zhing du de/ de ni tshe dpag med ldan chos
408b1(dkon brtsegs): shes 'gyur// rtse gcig thogs pas byang chub rdzogs 'chang rgya/ yon tan rin cher me tog kun tu rgyas pa bya shar mtshams kyi phyogs na mya ngan thams cad las rgal ba'i 'jig rten kyi
408b2(dkon brtsegs): na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bskal pa bye ba grangs med par byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs pa zhes bya ba zhi ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa yod do// bskal pa de ni
408b3(dkon brtsegs): spobs pa bkod pa zhes bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bskal pa byed grangs med par byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs pa de'i mtshan 'dzin
408b4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can de ni tshe brjes ma thag tu rnam pa drug cu dang ldan pa'i sgra dbyangs kyi spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa thob par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgyad tshul dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa
