408b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sgra dbyangs yan lag drug cu phun tshogs ldan// de ni kun tu shes pa'ang pha rol phyin// rgyal ba bye ba brgyad cu mchod byed pa'i// bsod nams pang
408b6(dkon brtsegs): yid bsam yas des thob 'gyur/ yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pa steng gi phyogs na yon tan dpag tu med pa bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhir gshegs pa
408b7(dkon brtsegs): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser bzang po dang / nam mkha' nges par sgrogs pa bkod pa'i 'od ces bya ba zhig da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa yod do// bskal pa de ni tshad med len
409a1(dkon brtsegs): ces bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bser bzang po dang / nam mkha' nges par sgrogs pa bkod pa'i 'od
409a2(dkon brtsegs): de'i mtshan 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can de ni tshul khrims kyi phung po dpag tu med pa yongs su sbyor bar 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dpag tu med pa dang / shes rab kyi phu
409a3(dkon brtsegs): po dpag tu med pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dpag tu med pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po dpab tu med pa yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ro// sa nas sar yang thob par 'gyur ro// tshi
409a4(dkon brtsegs): gzung bar 'os pa nyidi kyang 'thob par 'gyur ro// spobs pa bul ba med pa phun sum tshogs pa'ang 'thob par 'gyur ro// myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
409a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// yi ge dang sgra'i brda'ang 'thob par 'gyur ro// rigs mthon po dang / rigs mthon po chen po'ang 'thob par 'gyur ro// mngon par shes pa lnga'ang 'thob par 'gyur ro// tshe rabs dran par yang
409a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyar kyang 'thob par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gang zhig rgyal ba'i mtshan mchog 'dzin byed pa// de ni yan lag brgya dbyangs phun sum thob/
409a7(dkon brtsegs): de ni sangs rgyas bral bar yong mi skye// mi de mi thogs byang chub 'tshang rgyar 'gyur/ yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pa 'og gi phyogs na tha dad pa med pa 'di la dga' ba'i 'jig rten gyi
409b1(dkon brtsegs): khams na// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos thams cad kyi tshul la rnam par 'phrul pa'i gzi brjid kyi 'od ces bya ba ni gang ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gnas
409b2(dkon brtsegs): pa yod do// bskal pa de ni ye shes kun nas bsdus pa zhes bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos thams cad kyi tshul la rnam par
409b3(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul pa'i gzi brjid kyi 'od de'i mtshan 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can de ni che brjes ma thag tu sangs rgyas yongs su 'grub pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'thob par 'gyur ro//
409b4(dkon brtsegs): pa gcig gis thogs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu'i chos bstan pa'ang thos par 'gyur ro// thos
409b5(dkon brtsegs): nas kyang thams cad kun tu 'dzin par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sangs rgyas mtshan 'dzin sangs rgyas bye ba phrag/ dgu bcu rnams kyis chos bstan thos 'gyur zhing // skye ba gcig thog
409b6(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa yi// byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas 'gyur/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin chen me rtog kun tu rgyas pa dang // byang chub
409b7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin chen thams cad dang ldan pa'i spobs pa'i skad kyis gzungs thob par 'gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag brgyad cus bla na med pa yang dag par
410a1(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa'i sa thob bo// lha dang mi'i skye dgu sum khris ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// bcom
410a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pa dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang lha dang ka mi dang /
410a3(dkon brtsegs): lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong
410a4(dkon brtsegs): phrag brgya pa las yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pas zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ 'dus pa sum cu rtsa bzhi pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi ne mi tra dang
410a5(dkon brtsegs): pradz+nyA war ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban+de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ sh+lo ka brgya bzhi bcu yod/ @rgya gar skad du/
410a6(dkon brtsegs): Ar+ya a tsin tu bad+d+ha bi Sha ya ni de sha/ nAM ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ ma
410a7(dkon brtsegs): po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon
410b1(dkon brtsegs): med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na sa dge slong stong du tshang ba'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpal khri dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na
410b2(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang / gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i bu rnams dang yang thabs cig go de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor te/ mdun gyis bltas nas
410b3(dkon brtsegs): chos ston to// yang de'i tshe 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go/ lha'i bu dpal bzangs kyang 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go/ de nas bcom
410b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpalangs khyed la bskul gyis/ khyod kyis chos dang ldan pa'i gtam las rtsoms te/ lha'i 'khor 'di dang / byang chub sems dpa'
410b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag la spobs par gyis shig/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ci las brtsams te spobs par bgyi lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis
410b6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyis yul las rtsoms te spobs par gyis shig/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi yul ni/ gang mig gi yul ma lags pa dang / gzugs kyi yul ma lags pa dang rna ba'i
410b7(dkon brtsegs): yu ma lags pa dang / sgra'i yul ma lags pa dang sna'i yul ma lags pa dang dri'i yul ma lags pa dang / lce'i yul ma lags pa dang / ro'i yul ma lags pa dang / lus kyi yul ma lags pa dang /
411a1(dkon brtsegs): reg bya'i yul ma lags pa dang / yid kyi yul ma lags pa dang / chos kyi yul ma lags pa te/ de sangs rgyas kyi yul zhes bya'o// bcom ldan 'das yul khyad par ma
411a2(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi yul lags te/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rib kyi bu mo sangs rgyas kyi yul khong du chud par 'tshal bas/ khong du chud pa ma mchis pa'i tshul du sangs
411a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi yul de ltar khong du chud par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub brnyes pa'i yul ci lags/ bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal lta bar gyur pa ma'am pa nyid kyi phyir stong
411a4(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid ni ngas byang chub thob pa'i yul lo// mtshan ma mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir mtshan ma med pa ni yul lo// khams gsum pa mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir smon pa med pa ni yul lo// 'du byed mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir mngon
411a5(dkon brtsegs): par 'du bya ba med pa ni yul lo// 'dus byas mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir skye ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / 'du byed pa med pa ni yul lo// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
411a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dus ma bgyis kyi yul gang lags dka' stsal pa 'jam dpal sems med pa ni 'dus ma byas kyi yul lo// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sems ma mchis pa ni sangs rgyas kyi
411a7(dkon brtsegs): yul lags te/ de la brjod pa ma mchis lags so// brjod pa ma mchis pa la bstan pa ma mchis labs so// bstan pa ma mchis pa la mngon par brjod pa ma mchis lags so// bcom
411b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das mngon par brjod pa ma mchis pa'i yul ni/ sangs rgyas kyi yul lags so// bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi yul bang du btsal bar bya// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das sangs/
411b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi yul ni sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rnams las yongs su btsal bar bgyi lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon
411b3(dkon brtsegs): mongs pa yongs su rtogs pa ni/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul ma lags kyi/ gang 'di sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa yongs su rtogs pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi yul lags pa'i slar
411b4(dkon brtsegs): du'o// bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi yul la 'jug pa 'am ldog pa yod dam/ ci nas 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi yul sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rnams las yongs su brtsal/
411b5(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi yul ni 'jug pa ma mchis sdog pa ma mchis lags so// bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal gal te sangs rgyas kyi yul 'jug pa med cing ldog pa med na
411b6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi yul ji ltar sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rnams las yongs su shes/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi yul 'jug pa ma mchis shing ldog pa ma
411b7(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa de bzhin du nyon mongs pa de dag gi rang bzhin gang lags pa de'ang 'jug pa ma mchis shing ldogs pa ma mchis lags so// bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal nyon mongs pa rnams kyi rang bzhin
412a1(dkon brtsegs): ji lta bu gsol pa sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi rang bzhin gang lags pa de nyid nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin lags so// bcom ldan 'das gal te nyon mongs
412a2(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yang gzhan du gyur la/ sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi rang bzhin yang gzhan zhig lags na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par
412a3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas so zhes kyang bstan par mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar nyon mongs pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gang lags pa de nyid sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi rang bzhin lags te/
412a4(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes smon lags so// bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa mnyam
412a5(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid gang gis gnas pa shes sam gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'tshal lags so// bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa mnyam pa nyid gang gis gnas
412a6(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams mnyam pa 'di gang la gnas nas/ 'dod chags dang ne sdang dang / gti mug kun tu 'byung ba'i mnyam pa nyid des de bzhin
412a7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa gnas lags so// bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams mnyam pa nyid gang la granas te/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang gti mug kun tu
412b1(dkon brtsegs): babyung gsol pa/ stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma mchis pa dang / ston pa ma mchis pa mnyam pa 'di la gnas pa rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid des de bzhin gshegs pa gnas
412b2(dkon brtsegs): lags so// bka' stsal pa 'jam dpal ci stong pa nyid la 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang / gti mug yod dam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mchis pa gang
412b3(dkon brtsegs): gis stong pa 'di mchis pa'i mchis pa des 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams mchis lags so// bka' stsal pa 'jam dpal yod pa gang gis stong pa nyid
412b4(dkon brtsegs): yod cing yod pa gang gis 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams yod/ gsol pa/ yig dang skad dang / brjod pa'i mchis pas/ stong pa nyid mchis lags so// yi ba dang /
412b5(dkon brtsegs): skad dang / sgra dang / brjod pa'i mchis pas/ 'dod chags dang // zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams mchis lags so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du dge slong dag ma skyes pa dang / ma byung ba dang /
412b6(dkon brtsegs): ma byas pa dang / mngon par 'dus ma byas pa dang / mngon par 'du mi byed pa ni yod de/ dge slong dag ma skyes pa dang / ma byung ba dang / ma byas pa dang / mngon par 'dus ma byas pa dang / mngon par 'du mi byed pa ni ma
412b7(dkon brtsegs): yin no// dge slong dag gal te ma skyes pa dang / ma byung ba dang / ma byas pa dang / mngon par 'dus ma byas pa dang / mngon par 'du mi byed pa med du zin na/ skyes pa dang / byung ba dang / byas pa dang / mngon par 'du/
413a1(dkon brtsegs): byas pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa 'di dag las 'byung bar gdags par mi 'gyur pa zhig na/ dge slong dag 'di ltar ma skyes pa dang / ma byung ba dang ma byas pa dang / mngon par 'dus ma byas pa
413a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / mngon par 'du mi byed pa ni yod de/ de'i phyir skyes pa dang / byung ba dang / byas pa dang / mngon par 'dus byas pa dang // mngon par 'du byed pa 'di dag las 'byung bar gdabs so zhes bka' stsal ba de bzhin du/
413a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das gal te stong pa nyid ma mchis su lags na// 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi nyon mongs pa 'di dag las 'byung bar gdags par mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar stong pa nyid ni
413a4(dkon brtsegs): mchis te/ de'i slad du 'dod chags dang // zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi nyon mongs pa rnams las 'byung bar gdags lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis dka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis ji skad bstan pa de de
413a5(dkon brtsegs): lha yin du zin na/ gang su dag stong pa nyid la gnas pa de dag thams cad 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug la gnas par 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor spyod pa gang 'dod chags dang /
413a6(dkon brtsegs): zhe sdang dang / gti mug las bud du stong pa nyid tshol ba de ni rnal 'byor la mi spyod pa lags te/ rnal 'byor ma lags pa'o// de ci'i slad du ne na/ bcom ldan 'das 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang gti mug sa las
413a7(dkon brtsegs): gud du stong pa nyid btsal bar bgyi ba ma mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug nyid stong pa lags so// bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal ci khyod 'dod chags dang
413b1(dkon brtsegs): bcas/ zhe sdang dang bcas/ gti mug dang bcas pa yin nam 'on te 'dod chags dang bral ba/ zhe sdang dang bral ba gti mug dang bral ba yin / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'dod
413b2(dkon brtsegs): chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de dang bdag mnyam pa ste/ gang mnyam pa nyid de thob pa de ni 'dod chags dang bcas pa'ang ma lags// 'dod chags
413b3(dkon brtsegs): dang bral ba'ang ma lags te/ zhe sdang dang bcas pa'ang ma lags/ zhe sdang dang bral ba'ang ma lags gti mug dang bcas pa'ang ma lags/ gti mug dang bral ba'ang ma lags so// bcom ldan
413b4(dkon brtsegs): 'das dge sbyong dang bram ze gang dag bdag la 'dod chags dang bral ba/ zhe sdang dang bral ba/ gti mug dang bral bar yang dag par rjes su lta zhing / pha rol la 'dod chags dang bcas pa dang / zhe sdang dang
413b5(dkon brtsegs): bcas pa dang // gti mug dang bcas par yang dag par rjes su lta ba de dag ni lta bar gyur pa gnyis la chags pa lags so// yi 'a na a par sna ba dang / rtag par lta ba lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/
413b6(dkon brtsegs): gang bdag la 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / zhe sdang dang bral ba dang / gti mug dang bral ba yang dag par rjes su lta ba de ni de dag gi chad par lta ba lags so// gang pha rol la 'dod chags dang bcas
413b7(dkon brtsegs): pa/ zhe sdang dang bcas pa/ gti mug dang bcas par yang dag par rjes su lta ba de ni de dag gi rtag par lta ba lags so// yang bcom ldan 'das yang dag par zhugs pa'i dge slong ni pha rol dman pa dang / bdag
414a1(dkon brtsegs): khyad par du 'phags par yang dag par rjes su mi lta ba lags so// bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal gang yang das par zhugs pa de gang du zhugs pa na// gsol pa/ bcom
414a2(dkon brtsegs): 'das gang yang dag par zhugs pa de ni gang du'ang zhugs pa ma lags so// bka' stsal pa// bajam dpal gang yang dag par zhugs pa de lam la zhugs pa me yin nam/ gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das gang 'am
414a3(dkon brtsegs): la zhugs pa de ni 'dus bgyis pa la zhugs pa lags te/ gang 'dus bgyis pa la zhugs pa de mnyam pa nyid du ba la 'gyur lags// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'dus dbyis pa ni skye ba dang /
414a4(dkon brtsegs): 'jig pa dang / gnas pa dang ldan pa'i slad du'o// bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal 'dus ma byas la grangs gang yang yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'dus ma bgyis la grangs gang yang
414a5(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das gal te 'dus ma dbyis la grangs mchis par gyur na/ de 'dus bgyis pa nyid du 'gyur gyi/ 'dus ma bgyis ma lags so// bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal gang 'dus
414a6(dkon brtsegs): ma byas thob pa'i 'phags pa thams cad la grangs gang yang yod par 'gyur ba'i rnam grangs yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa rnams la grangs gang yang ma mchis te/ bcom ldan
414a7(dkon brtsegs): bdas 'phags pa rnams ni grangs ma mchis pa grangs dang bral ba lags so// bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal ci khyod 'phags pa'i chos dang ldan pa yin nam 'on te 'phags pa ma yin pa'i chos
414b1(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa yin/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni 'phags pa'i chos dang ldan pa'ang ma labs/ 'phags pa ma lags pa'i chos dang ldan pa'ang ma lags so// ci lags bcom
414b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis sprul pa de 'phags pa'i chos dang ldan pa lags sam/ 'babs pa ma lags pa'i chos dang ldan pa lags/ bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal sprul pa ni 'phags pa'i chos dang ldan pa'ang
414b3(dkon brtsegs): ma yin/ 'phags pa ma yin pa'i chos dang ldan pa'ang ma yin no// gsol pa/ chos thams cad sprul pa lta bu'o zhes/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ma bstan lags sam/ bka' stsal pa
414b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal de lta'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad sprul pa'i rang bzhin gyi mtshan 'di lags pas/ bdag kyang de'i rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid lags te/ de'i slad du dag
414b5(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa'i chos dang ldan pa'ang ma lags 'phags pa ma lags pa'i chos dang ldan pa'ang ma lags so// bka' stsal pa / 'jam dpal khyod ci dang ldan ka gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
414b6(dkon brtsegs): bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi yul mnyam pa nyid dang mi 'gal ba dang ldan lags so// bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi yul rnyed dam/ gsol pa/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis brnyes na/ bdag
414b7(dkon brtsegs): gis kyang rnyed lags so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi yul
415a1(dkon brtsegs): ma brnyes sam/ smras pa/ gnas brtan gyis nyan thos kyi yul gang yang rnyed ngam/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'phags pa'i rnam par grol ba'i yul yang med yul rnyed pa'ang
415a2(dkon brtsegs): med do// smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba'i yul yang med/ yul brnyes pa'ang med do// smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ni rjes su bsrung ba med pa/
415a3(dkon brtsegs): chos ston te/ khyod ni las dang po pa rnams rjes su mi srung ngo // smras pa/ de bas na gnas brtan nyid la yongs su dris khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa bzhin du lan thob cig/ btsun pa rab 'byor 'di/
415a4(dkon brtsegs): ji snyam du sems gang sman pa mkhas pas nad pa yongs su srung zhing / kha ba dang / skur ba dang / tsha ba'i sman ma byin na/ ci des nad pa de la nad med pa'i bde ba byin pa yin nam/ smras pa/ 'jam
415a5(dkon brtsegs): dpal de ni ma yin no// smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin du gang chos smra bas/ las dang po pa yongs su srung zhing zab mo'i gtam bcabs te/ gtam sna tshogs bstan na/ des de yang dag
415a6(dkon brtsegs): yang 'chi ba las thar par byas par mi 'gyur kashin tu bde ba mya ngan las 'das pa la rab tu bzhag par mi 'gyur ro// bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ dge slong lnga brgya len pa med par zad pa rnams
415a7(dkon brtsegs): las sems rnam par grol lo// lha'i bu brgyad brgya chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go// lha'i bu bdun brgya 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i spobs pajog
415b1(dkon brtsegs): nas 'dod cing zhus pa'i bsan pas dran med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed po yang tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'ang ma dpas duzhon nu myu
415b2(dkon brtsegs): la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal khyed nyan thos kyi theb pas sems can rnams 'dul na// ci khyod nyan thos kyi theg pas rnam par mol ba yin namago smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor khe bo na zag
415b3(dkon brtsegs): pa thams cad kyis rnam par grol te/ btsun pa rab 'byor kho bo ni nyan thos kyi theg pas rnam par grol ba'ang yin no// kho bo ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas rnam par grol ba'ang yin no// btsun pa
415b4(dkon brtsegs): rab 'byor kho bo ni theg pa chen pos rnam par grol ba'ang yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ci nyan thos sam/ 'on te rang sangs rgyas sam/ 'on te yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
415b5(dkon brtsegs): yin/ smras pa btsun pa rab 'byor kho bo ni nyan thos yin te/ pha rol las mnyan pa'i sgra la sbyor bar brtson pa ni ma yin no// kho bo ni rang sangs rgyas yin te/ snying rje chen po dang / mi
415b6(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs pa dang bral ba ni ma yin no// kho bo ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin te/ bya ba'i rgyun bcad pa ni ma yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ji ltar nyan thos yin/ smras pa/ chos ma
415b7(dkon brtsegs): thos pa mnyan pa sems can thams cad la thos par byed de/ des na kho bo nyan thos yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ji ltar rang sangs rgyas yin/ smras pa/ kho bos chos thams cad rten cing
416a1(dkon brtsegs): / 'brel par 'byung bar rtogs te/ des ni kho bo rang sangs rgyas yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ji ltar yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin/ smras pa/ kho bos chos
416a2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad chos kyi dbyings su mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam par khong du chud de des na kho bo yang dag par rdzogs pa ni sangs rgyas so// smras pa / 'jam dpal khyod nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs
416a3(dkon brtsegs): chus kyi sa 'am/ 'on te yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa 'am/ sa gang la nges pa yin par gzung bar bya// smras pa btsun pa rab 'byor kho bo ni sa thams cad la nges pa yin par zung zhig/
416a4(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod so so'i skye bo'i sa la'ang nges par gzung bar bya 'am/ smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ btsun pa rab 'byor chos thams cad ni yang dag pa nyid du nges
416a5(dkon brtsegs): par nges pa'o// nges pa der sems can thams cad kyang nges pa ste/ ngo bo'ang nges pa der nges pa nyid do// des na kho bo so so'i skye bo'i sa la'ang nges par gzung bar bya'o// smras pa/ 'jam dpal gal te chos thams cad
416a6(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa nyid du nges par nges pa yin na/ 'di ni so so'i skye bo'i sa'o// 'di ni nyan thos kyi sa'o// 'di ni rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'o// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa'o// 'di ni sangs rgyas kyis sa'o zhes// sa rnam par
416a7(dkon brtsegs): gzhag pa gdags par ga la 'gyur/ smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na phyogs bcu'i nam mkha' la 'di ni shar phyogs kyi nam mkha' 'o// 'di ni lho phyogs kyi'o// 'di ni nub byobs
416b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi'o// 'di ni byang phyogs kyi'o// 'di ni shar lho lo// 'di ni lho nub kyi'o// 'di ni nub byung ba'o// 'di ni byang bar gyi'o// 'di ni 'og pa'o// 'di ni snang gi phyogs kyi nam mkha' 'o zhes brjod par
416b2(dkon brtsegs): kyang phyogs cha la tha dad pa yod kyi/ nam mkha' la ni tha dad pa med do// btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin du/ chos thams cad yang dag pa nyid du nges par nges pa la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thabs la mkhas pas
416b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni so so'i skye bo'i sa'o// 'di ni nyan thos kyi sa'o// 'di ni rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'o// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa'o// 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi sa'o zhes sa rnam par 'jog kyang / sa rnam par bzhag pa la
416b4(dkon brtsegs): tha dad pa yod kyi/ yang dag pa nyid du nges pa la ni tha dad pa med do// smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod yang dag pa nyid du nges pa la zhugs sam/ smras pa/ zhugs pa'ang yin la byung ba'ang yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpa
416b5(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar ma khyod zhubs pa'ang yin la byung ba'ang yin/ smras pa/ sun parab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs dang / shes rab dang / ye shes blta bar bya ste/ btsun pa rangab 'byor 'di ni
416b6(dkon brtsegs): skyes bu mkhas pa kha cig bshed pa'i don dpes shes par 'gyur ba yod de/ de'i phyir khyod la dpe bstan par bya'o// btsun pa rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na 'phong gi slong dpon chen po zhig la
416b7(dkon brtsegs): sdug pa mdzes pa yid du 'ong ba blta na sdug pa'i bu gcig pa zhig kyang yod/ de la mi sdug pa yid du mi 'ong ba phyir rgol ba zhig kyang yod pa las/ des bu gcig pa de zag ring po lam bol ba'i
417a1(dkon brtsegs): phyogs shig na 'dug pa mthong nas/ de 'di snyam du de ni bdag la phyir rgol nga yin no snyam du sems skye sa te/ des de gsad pa'i phyir mnga' 'phangs nas/ 'phangs mthas tu bu bcig pa yin pa
417a2(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes skye ste/ re sngon goms par byas pas shin tu brgyubs te/ mnga' de nu gcig pa'i lus la ma phog pa nyid du lag gis 'dzin pa 'di ni don rnam par shes par bya ba'i phyir dper byas pa'o// de la
417a3(dkon brtsegs): don du blta ba gang zhe na/ btsun pa rab 'byor 'phongs gi slong dpon zhes bya ba de ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshig bla dgas so// btsun pa rab 'byor bu gcig pa zhes bya ba ni sems can thams cad la byang chub sem
417a4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' bu gcig pa'i 'du shes nye bar 'jog pa yin no// gsod pa phyir rgol ba zhes bya ba 'di ni nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi tshig bla dgas so// btsun pa rab 'byor mnga' zhes bya ba 'di ni 'phags pa'i shes
417a5(dkon brtsegs): rab kyi dbang po'i tshig bla dgas so// btsun pa rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na 'phong gi slob dpon gyis mnga' 'ang ngas la/ bu gcig pa'i lus la ma phog par shin tu brgyugs te 'dzin pa de bzhin du/
417a6(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stongs bskyed pas/ 'du byed thams cad skye ba med par so sor rtog go// yang dag pa nyid du nges pa la rnam par bltas nas/ snying rje chen po
417a7(dkon brtsegs): dang thabs la mkhas pa'i stobs bskyed pas/ yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du byed kyang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la mi gnas kyi/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa la gnas so// sangs rgyas kyi sa la'ang 'dzud
417b1(dkon brtsegs): do// smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'di byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gi yul yin/ sbas pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' gang dag 'jig rten na'ang spyod la/ 'jig rten gyi chos rnams kyis
417b2(dkon brtsegs): kyang mi gos shing 'jig rten na'ang snang la/ chos thams cad la'ang snang ba med pas/ rab tu phye ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi yul lo// btsun pa rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' yang dag
417b3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la'ang snang la/ sa ngan pa la'ang mi gnas pa dang / btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sems can thams cad kyis nyon mongs pa spang ba'i phyir yang brdzun la/ chos kyi dbyings zad par ni
417b4(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rjes su ma lnga pa dang / btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' gang dag 'dus byas las kyang bskyod la/ 'dus ma byas kyang yang dag par ma rnyed pa dang / btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'
417b5(dkon brtsegs): gang dag 'khor ba la skyed mos tshal dang / gzhal med khang du'ang 'du shes la/ mya ngan las 'das pa'ang don du mi gnyer zhing / bsam pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang / btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sen/
417b6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' gang dag bdag med pa'i bzod pa'ang thob la/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir yang brdzun pa dang / btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' gang dag chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin nam mkha'i rang
417b7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du'ang shes la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba la'ang brdzun pa dang / btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sangs rgyas thams cad chos kyi dbyings dang mtshungs par yang mthong/
418a1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi rgyan gyi phyir brtson 'grus kyang mi gtong ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi yul lo// smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa'i
418a2(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa 'di ni 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa'o// smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'jig rten gyi chos yongs su shes pa dang ldan yang / 'jig rten gyi chos las
418a3(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par 'da' ba'i phyir/ sems can rnams la chos ston to// smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod 'jig rten gyi chos las yang dag par 'da' ba la rtsoms te spobs par gyis shig/ ji ltar byang chub sems
418a4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams 'jig rten gyi chos las yang dag par 'da'/ smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor 'jig rten zhes bya ba ni phung po lnga'o// lnga gang zhe na/ gzugs kyi phung po dang / tshor ba dang / 'du she/
418a5(dkon brtsegs): dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i phung nge'o// de la gzugs ni lbu ba rdos pa lta bu'o// tshor ba ni chu'i chu bur lta bu'o// 'du shes ni smig rgyu lta bu'o// 'du byed ni chu shing lta bu'o// rnam
418a6(dkon brtsegs): par shes pa ni sgyu ma lta bu'o// lbu ba dang / chu'i chu bur dang / sdig rgyu dang / chu shing dang / sgyu ma gang yin pa de la 'jig rten yang med/ 'jig rten du garags pa'ang med/ phung po rnams
418a7(dkon brtsegs): kyang med/ phung por gdags pa'ang med par gang phung po'i rang bzhin la de ltar mos pa de ni yang dag par zhugs pa'o// gang yang dag par zhugs pa de 'jig rten gyi chos rnams dang ma 'dres/
418b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'o// gang 'jig rten gyi chos rnams dang ma 'dres pa de 'jig rten gyi chos las yang dag par 'da' bo// btsun pa rab 'byor gzhan yang phung po lnga ni rang bzhin gyis spong ngo // gang rang bzhin gyis
418b2(dkon brtsegs): sdong pa de la gnyis su med do// gnyis su med pa de la ngar 'dzin pa med pa nga yir 'dzin pa med do// gang la ngar 'dzin pa med pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa med pa de la chags pa med de/ chags pa med
418b3(dkon brtsegs): pa rnyed pa ni 'jig rten las yang dag par 'da' 'o// btsun pa rab 'byor gzhan yang phung po lnga ni rkyen la rag lus pa'o// gang dag rkyen la rag lus pa de dag rag lus pa med pa'o// gang dag rab lus
418b4(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa de dag bdag po med pa'o// gang dag bdag po med pa de dag bdag gi ba med pa'o// gang dag bdag gi ba med pa de dag yongs su 'dzin pa med pa'o// gang dag yongs su 'dzin pa med pa de la 'thab pa med do//
418b5(dkon brtsegs): gang la 'thab pa med pa de la rtsod pa med do// gang la rtsod pa med pa de dag dge sbyong gi chos rtsod pa med pa'o// gang dag dge sbyong gi chos mi rtsod pa de dag nam mkha' la lag pa dang mtshungs te/ chos thams cad
418b6(dkon brtsegs): kyang nam mkha' la lag pa dang mtshungs par shes nas/ 'jig rten las yang dag par 'da' 'o// btsun pa rab 'byor gzhan yang phung po lnga ni chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa'o// chos kyi dbyings kyang dbyings
418b7(dkon brtsegs): med pa ste gang dbyings med pa de la mig gi khams med do// gzugs kyi khams med do// mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams med do// rna ba'i khams med do// sgra'i khams med do// rna ba'i rnam
419a1(dkon brtsegs): par shes pa'i khams med do// sna'i khams med do// dri'i khams med do// sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams med do// lce'i khams med do// ro khams med do// lce'i rnam par
419a2(dkon brtsegs): shes pa'i khams med do// lus kyi khams med do// reg bya'i khams med do// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams med do// yid kyi khams med do// chos kyi khams med do// yid kyi rnam par
419a3(dkon brtsegs): shes pa'i khams med do// gang khams med pa de la sa'i khams med do// chu'i khams med do// me'i khams med do// rlung gi khams med do// nam mkha'i khams med do// rnam par shes
419a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i khams med do// 'dod pa'i khams med do// gzugs kyi khams med do// gzugs med pa'i khams med do// 'dus byas kyi khams med do// 'dus ma byas kyi khams med do// gang
419a5(dkon brtsegs): khams med pa de la bdag med/ sems can med/ srog med/ gso med/ gang zag med/ shes las skyes med/ shed du med de/ gang gis de dag rjes su rtogs pa med pa'i tshul gyis
419a6(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa de 'jig rten las yang dag par 'daba'o// bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ 'khor de nas dge slong sdong nyis brgya len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// /
419a7(dkon brtsegs): de dag sems rnam par grol nas/ rang rang gi bla gos kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' ste/ tshig 'di skad du gang dag chos zab mo bstan pa 'di la mos pa med pa'i sems can de dag ni thob
419b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'ang med/ mngon par rdzogs pa'ang med do zhes 'dzen to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ dge sbyong de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa dag gis ci zhig rdo sa
419b2(dkon brtsegs): ci zhig mngon par rdzogs/ dge slong de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa rab 'byor dge sbyong ni thob pa med pa/ mngon par rtogs pa med pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thob pa zhes bya ba de ni g.yo ba nyid do//
419b3(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rdzogs pa zhes bya ba de ni rlom sems 'di ro// g.yo ba dang rlom sems gang yin pa de ni bdud kyi las so// lhag pa'i nga rgyal can dag ni bdag gis thob bo// dag gis mngon par rtogs so zhes
419b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta bu 'di dag gi tshul du rnam par rjog par 'gyur ro// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag gis lhag pa'i nga rgyal can rnams shes sam/ smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das mkhyen pa dang ldan pas mkhyen te/ bdag
419b5(dkon brtsegs): cag ni ji ltar sdug bsngal gyis mtshan nyid mi shes par bdag gi sdug bsngal yongs su shes so zhes smras pa lhag pa'i nga rgyal can du rig par bya zhing / kun 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid dang / 'gog pa'i mtshan nyid dang /
419b6(dkon brtsegs): lam gyi mtshan nyid mi shes par bdag gis lam bsgoms so zhes smras pa lhag pa'i nga rgyal can du rig par bya'o snyam mo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sdug bsngal gyi mtshan nyid dang / kun 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid dang /
419b7(dkon brtsegs): 'bog pa'i mtshan nyid dang / lam gyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa de ni skye ba med pa'i mtshan 'di de/ skye ba med pa'i mtshan nyid ni mtshan nyid med pa'o// mtshan nyid med pa ni 'phags pa rnams kyi rnam par grol
420a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'o// chos thams cad kyang rnam par grol ba'i mtshan nyid de/ de la ni gang sdug bsngal yongs su shes so// gang kun 'byung ba spong ngo // gang 'thob pa mngon du byed do// dang /
420a2(dkon brtsegs): lam sgom mo zhes bya ba gang yang mi dmigs te/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid 'di thos nas skrag pa de lhag pa'i nga rgyal can yin par rig par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge
420a3(dkon brtsegs): slong de dag la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ gnas brtan rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor dge slong 'di dag gis ji skad bstan pa de de bzhin no// rab 'byor dge slong 'di dag gis de bzhin
420a4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa 'od srungs kyi gsung rab la/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa nyid las zab mo'i chos bstan pa 'di lta bu thos te/ chos zab mo mnyan pa de nyid kyi rgyus 'di ltar mngon pa shes pa myur bar gyur
420a5(dkon brtsegs): to// zab mo'i chos bstan pa 'di la'ang rjes su mthun par gyur te/ mi mthun pa yin no// rab 'byor rnam grangs des na theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams ma rtogs par/ gang dag nga'i
420a6(dkon brtsegs): gsung rab 'di la chos zab mo bstan pa 'di nyan cing thos nas kyang lhag par mos pa de dag thams cad ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'i gsung rab la 'dus pa gsum gyi grangs su gtogs par rig par
420a7(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// gang yang theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa de dag ni bzod pa gang yang rung ba thob par 'gyur ro// de nas lha'i bu dpal bzangs kyis// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam
420b1(dkon brtsegs): dpal khyod rgyun du 'dzam bu'i gling na chos ston tam/ 'jam dpal dga' ldan gyi gnas su bzhud de/ der dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha rnams la chos bstan du gsol/ de na lha'i bu sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya bar
420b2(dkon brtsegs): byas pa// dge pa'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dag yod de// de dag yul phun sum tshogs pas bas med pa'i dbang gis/ bcom ldan 'das dang khyod la chos nyan du mi 'ong bas na// de dag chos mi nyan pas yongs su rnams par 'gyur te/
420b3(dkon brtsegs): de dag khyod las chos thos nas dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po 'phel bar 'gyur ro// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de'i tshe/ gang gis lha'i bu dpal bzangs dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag
420b4(dkon brtsegs): dga' ldan gyi gnas su zhugs par bdag nyid kyis shes pa dang / nyams dga' ba'i kun dga' ra ba dang / nyams dga' ba'i tshal dang / nyams dga' ba'i rdzing dang nyams dga' ba'i skyed mos tshal dang / rim pa
420b5(dkon brtsegs): 'a dang / brgyang dang / cu dang / cigu pa'i 'ang ba rtsegs pa bsila'ang dang / bkram dang / glegs du dang / rlababs dang / skam pang dang ldan pa de dag kyang blang ba dang / lha'i bu mo nangs pa 'jas mi /
420b6(dkon brtsegs): pase ci brdzun pong rnam par dug pa smin ma legs pa ka dbral ba legs pa / bzhini legs pa/ tshig brla 'a sa ma brgyamasngon pos bur mdze shing / drim med nga mi tu langs pa/ 'dod pa'i sems
420b7(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa/ zlang ches paltar mngon par dga' ba bzhin 'dzum pa dang bcas pa de dag rgyud gcig pa dang / pi wang dang / bla stan dang / 'khar ba'i sil grol dang / thebardob pa dang / Na thus sa
421a1(dkon brtsegs): rdza rnga dang rnga snyam pa dang / gling bu dang / glu dbyangs dang / rol mo'i dbyangs sgra dang / gar dang / bzhad gang dang / 'jo ba dang / sgeg pa dang / rtse bas rgyags shing /
421a2(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba dang / rtse ba dang / dga' mgur spyod pa dag kyang snang ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par bya ba mngon par byas so// de 'dra ba'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs so// de nas rmyi
421a3(dkon brtsegs): bu dpal bzangs kyis/ rang gi gnas rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'ang mthong / rang gi g.yog 'khor rnams kyang mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang ngo mtshar du gyur te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
421a4(dkon brtsegs): pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal bdag cag 'di ltar myur du dga' ldan gyi gnas su phyin te/ nyams dga' ba'i kun dga' ra ba 'di dag dang zhes bya ba nas/ dga' ba dang / rtse bdas
421a5(dkon brtsegs): dga' dgur spyod pa dang / bdag gi rang gi gnas 'di dang / rang gi g.yob ces bya ba'i bar du sbyar to// de dag snang ba ngo mtshar to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ lha'i
421a6(dkon brtsegs): dpal bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so// lha'i bu khyod ni 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'di nas gang du'ang ma g.yos la/ dga' ldan gyi gnas su'ang ma phyin te/ lha'i bu 'on kyang thams cad dang ldan pa'i/
421a7(dkon brtsegs): 'khor 'di dag dga' ldan gyi gnas su zhugs par bdag nyid kyis shes pa dang / lha'i bu kho bo cag kyang dga' ldan gyi gnas su zhugs par bdag nyid kyis shes pa de ni/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
421b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul dang / ting nge 'dzin byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs so// nas bcom ldan 'das la/ lha'i du dngul 'a'adas kyis 'di gad ces gsol po
421b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa'i stobs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ 'di ltar thams cad dang ldan pa
421b3(dkon brtsegs): 'khor 'dis phyogs 'di nas gang du'angam g.yos par/ bA sA pa du bdag cag dga' ldan gyi gnas su phyin to snyam pa ni ngo mtshar lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' rdul pa/ lha'i bu 'jam dpal
421b4(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nur gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa ji snyed cig ngas shes pa las// khyed kyis ji tsam zhig shes te/ lha'i bu 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ni 'dod na// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa gang+gA'i rlung
421b5(dkon brtsegs): gi bye ma snyed gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad zhing gcig tu yang dag par ston to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed gang dag yod pa de dag gtsug phud kyis phug ste/ steng pi bar snang gi nam mkha'i la
421b6(dkon brtsegs): 'jog go// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na rgya mtsho chen por gyur pa'i chu'i phung po gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad spu'i khung bu gcig tu thugs kyang // chu'i sems can rnams la gnod pa med de/ thams cad kyang /
421b7(dkon brtsegs): rang rang gi rgya mtsho chen po na gnas par bdag nyid kyis shes so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na ri'i rgyal po ri rab gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad ri gcig tu byin gyis brlabs te/ ri de dag yungs kar gyi 'bru'i nang du
422a1(dkon brtsegs): bcug kyang / ri rab la gnas pa'i lha de ngag la gnod pa'ang med de/ thams cad kyang rang ranga'i gnas na 'khod par bdag nyid kyis shes so gsangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na 'gro bsgyur
422a2(dkon brtsegs): skyes pa'i sems can gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad lag pa g.yas pa'i mthil du bzhag ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa'i sems can rnams kyi bde bar sbyar ba cing
422a3(dkon brtsegs): ba de lta bu dag de dag la sgrub bo// gang yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed sreg par byed pa ni me de dag thams cad mar me'i snying po gcig gi me lce tsam gyi mer byin gyis rlob ste/ des bya ba byed pa gang
422a4(dkon brtsegs): yin pa de byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing pang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na nyi ma dang zla bzhi 'od gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad spu'i khung bu gcig gi 'od kyis zil du rlab par byed do// lha'i du 'jam dang la gzhon nur
422a5(dkon brtsegs): gyur ba'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa'i tshe 'phrul las brtsams nas gang bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa las lhag par yang chos ston to// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ni rdzu 'phrul dang byin gyi rlabs kyis stobs pa sa
422a6(dkon brtsegs): phying mi khyab pa 'di lta bu dang ldan mo// bam po nyis pa ste bla ma'o// de nas bdud sding can 'khor shing du 'dus par gyur nas 'dus ste / nges bdas
422a7(dkon brtsegs): 'di dge slong gi bzugs su byin gyis brlabs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces bsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa'i tshe 'phrul de bdag gis blta bar kyog sa
422b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das tshig tsam du gsungs pas ci snam gyis / bdag la mngon sum du gyur cig de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud sdig can du mkhyen bzhin du sems can chad med pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par spel
422b2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'jam dpal khyod langs bskul gyis/ khyod kyis 'khor 'di dag la rang gi rdzu 'phrul bri stobs dang cho 'phrul sngon cig dang / sems can
422b3(dkon brtsegs): tshad med pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bskul bar shes nas/ chos thams cad sems kyis dbang sgyur
422b4(dkon brtsegs): ba rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas chos thams cad sems kyis dbang sbyar ba rnam par 'phrul pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma pas
422b5(dkon brtsegs): tu de nas de'i mod la thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul rnams par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad gsungs pa de bzhin du/ ma chad pa dang /
422b6(dkon brtsegs): ma lhag pa dang / mi mang bar mthong ngo // de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyis cho 'phrul de mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur te/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba legs so legs so// sangs rgyas 'byung
422b7(dkon brtsegs): ba ni sems can rnams la don chen por nye bar gnas so// de byung bas skyes bu dam pa 'di lta bu 'di dag kyang 'jig rten du 'byung ba yin no// cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di'ang 'jig rten na snang ba yin no zhes ched du brjod pas
423a1(dkon brtsegs): ched du brjod do/ de nas bdud sdig can gyis tshe 'phrul de mthong na ngo mtshar 'gyur nas thal mo gyur te/ 'jam dpal btson nur gyur pa la rgyan 'tshal ning
423a2(dkon brtsegs): tshig 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyad pa ste ngo mtshar to// sems can gang dag cho 'phrul bshad pa 'di thos nas mos pa de dag ngo mtshar cha
423a3(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis bsams so// bcom ldan 'das gal te bdud rdzob can gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma stong du gyur kyang / de lngar mos pa'i sems can de la bar chad bgyi ba'i jom tho bas lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdud sdig can /
423a4(dkon brtsegs): ni rtag tu rgyun mi chad par de bzhin gshegs pa la grags lha zhing skabs tshol ba dang / sems can rnams la'ang brtse bar sems pa dang / brtson pa'i gang zag rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar chad bgyi ba'i slad du'ang zhugs
423a5(dkon brtsegs): pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das deng slan chad grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / pho brang 'khor gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu spyod pa der 'khor khor yug tu dpag
423a6(dkon brtsegs): tshar brgya tshun chad du mig gis mi rtsol bar bgyi ba'i srad du bdag mi mchi bar bdag yi dam de lta bu blang bar bgyi'o// gang dag 'chang ba dang / 'chad pa dang / ston pa dang / so sor rtog pa dang / sgrub par
423a7(dkon brtsegs): la ston pa la bgyi ba ltar gus pa skyes par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'on du lags kyang bdag gi 'khor gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa'i bar chad bgyi ba dang / brtson pa rnams g.yengs par bgyi ba'i slad du/
423b1(dkon brtsegs): zhugs pa dag mchis te/ de dag chad pas dgum pa'i slad du/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis bsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag dran par 'gyi'o// tad+yaH/ a ma la/ bi ma le/ TI ta tri
423b2(dkon brtsegs): a ka la pa ni/ rdzi ta sha tA/ dza ye/ dza ya ba ti/ b+hu tra ma ti/ sha me/ shAn ti/ a ru me/ phu phu me/ d+hi re/ a khe/ ma khe/ kha khe/ mi si le/ a ga me/ pu la le/ phu la/ phu le
423b3(dkon brtsegs): pa shu me/ shu shu me / an pan te/ b+hita trA~M/ ri hA te/ lidi ta rid d+ha/ bai ro tsatA nA/ sad d+hamar+thAHoM h+ya/ srarba tra s+ya d+hA raka/ a b+hU mug ta mib su bany+tsa swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das
423b4(dkon brtsegs): chos smra pa gang gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di rnams kyis kun tu bsrungs pa de la/ bdud kyi ris kyis lha'i bu rnams kyis bar chad bgyi ba ni gnas ma lags shing / skabs ma labs te/ de ni gnas ma mchis
423b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi steng du de la gos dang / zas dang mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub pa dang / spro bar bgyi ba dang / spobs par bgyi bar spro bar 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das
423b6(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag brjod nas/ g.yeng ba ma mchis pa'i rgyud kyis gdugs mtshan 'das par bgyid pa de dag lha rnams kyis gsungs par 'gyur/
423b7(dkon brtsegs): klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma lags pa rnams kyis bsrungs par 'gyur te/
424a1(dkon brtsegs): de dag la sman rgol ba 'am/ mi mdza' bu gang gis grags bltas kyang / glags rnyed par mi 'gyur lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
424a2(dkon brtsegs): bdud sdig can pa lags sems kyang byin te/ sa gas so lags so// 'dus ma khyod kyis sa thabs kyi tshig btsun pa da pas/ 'jig rten gyi rnams pad+ma'i drung gyi me nas pargyas
424a3(dkon brtsegs): g.yas te// khyod kyi stongs pa de thams can nI/ 'jam dpral gzhon nur gyur pa'i byin gyi rlabs su ribs par bya'o// 'jam dang la gnon nur gyur ba'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa'i tshe 'phrul dang / byin gyi rnam di
424a4(dkon brtsegs): ban pa dang / bdud kyis gsang sngags kyi stobs dang / rig thags kyi stobs bstan pa na/ sos chags kyi bri bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang rgyang tu sems brgyad par gyur to// nas
424a5(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dang la gzhon nur gyur pas rdzu 'phrul bsdus nas/ lha'i bu dpa' bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so// lha'i bu khyod dga' ldan gyi gnas su song la// naga' ljin gyi ros kyi lha'i bu rnams cus shig dang /
424a6(dkon brtsegs): kho rong der 'ong / de nas lce'i bu dpal brdzangs kyis// 'jam dpa' gzhon nur gyur pa'i lhar man te/ bcom ldan 'das dang / 'jamed pal gzhon nur gyur pa dang
424a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' dge 'dun thams cad dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun la bskor ba byas nas/ 'khor dang bcas par 'khor de nas mi snang bar gyur te/ dga' ldan gyi gnas su phyin to//
424b1(dkon brtsegs): de nas lha'i bu dpal bzangs kyis/ dga' ldan gyi lha'i bu ris kyi bu rnams la smras pa/ grogs po dag shes par gyis shig/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'o bu cag la snying brtse ba'i
424b2(dkon brtsegs): phyi 'dir 'ong gis/ de la dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha bu khyed dga' ba dang / rtse ba la bag med pa dor te/ bag yod par gyis la/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la chos nyan du shog cig de nas lha'i bu
424b3(dkon brtsegs): dpal bzangs kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ dga' ldan gyi gnas kyi dbus su lnga'i yid la byung ba rin po che thams cad las byas pa'i 'khor gyi khyams/
424b4(dkon brtsegs): rlur shar nub tu dpag tshad sum brgya drug khri nyis stong yod la/ zheng lho byang du dpag tshad khri drug stong yod pa byas te/ der seng ge'i khri sna tshogs blta na sdug pa'i lha'i ras bcos bu brgya stong dun
424b5(dkon brtsegs): bting ba stong phrag du ma byas so// de nas lha'i bu dpal bzangs kyi rnam pa 'di lta bu'i 'khor gyi khyams bkod pa de dag dang / seng ge'i khri rnams kyang byas nas thal mo sbyar te/ 'jam dpal gzhon
424b6(dkon brtsegs): nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal 'khor gyi khyams bkod pa dang / seng ge'i zi bkod pa bgyis lags na kar de'i dus la bab par mkhyen na gshegs su gsol/ de nas 'jam dpal
424b7(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nur gyur pa/ byang chub sems dpa' khri nyis stong dang / nyan thos kyi mchog lnga brgya dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za stong phrag du ma dag dang lhan cig tu yongs su bskor cing bdun du bdar
425a1(dkon brtsegs): te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi drung nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ skad
425a2(dkon brtsegs): cig thang cig yud tsam de la dga' ldan gyi gnas su phyin to// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa rin po che bkod pa'i 'khor gyi khyams der rang gi khri ji ltar bshams pa la 'dug go// byang chub
425a3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams dang / nyan thos chen po rnams dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor yang stan ci rigs pa la 'khod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang 'thab bral dang /
425a4(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / bdud kyi ris rnams dang / gzugs na spyod pa tshangs ris kyi lha nas bzung ste/ 'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams kyis gcig nas gcig tu bla thos pas/ 'di
425a5(dkon brtsegs): lhar 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dga' ldan gyi gnas su 'phel ba'i chos kyi gtam chen po smra bar 'gyur gyis/ bdag cag kyang chos nyan pa'i phyir nges par der 'dong bar bya'o// skyes bu dam pa de lta bu dag
425a6(dkon brtsegs): mthong ba ni legs par mthong ba'o// de dag las chos thos pa ni legs par thos pa'o zhes sgra thos nas/ skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu tshad med grangs med
425a7(dkon brtsegs): pa dag/ rang rang gi gnas nas mi snang bar gyur te dga' ldan gyi gnas su phyin to// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de lta bu'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pas ki des lha'i 'khor re tsam
425b1(dkon brtsegs): du tshad med pa dag rin po che bkod pa'i khyams kyi 'khor dezhing du go skabs yangs par gnas par gyur to// de nas lha'i bu dpal bzangs kyis / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces
425b2(dkon brtsegs): smras so// 'jam dpal lha'i 'khor chen po 'di 'dus lags na/ chos kyi bka' mching las brtsams te spobs par mdzad du gsol// de skad ces smras pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas
425b3(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu dpal bzangs dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la 'di skad ces smras so// grogs po dag chos bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i chos thams cad sdud par 'gyur bdag
425b4(dkon brtsegs): / bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims la gnas pa'i thos pa dang / bsam gtan la gnas pa'i shes rab dang / mngon par shes pa la gnas pa'i ye shes dang / thabs la gnas pa'i bag
425b5(dkon brtsegs): yod pa ste/ grogs po dag chos bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i chos thams cad sdud par 'gyur ba'o// grogs po dag de la yongs su dag pa rnam pa brgyad kyis tshul khrims la
425b6(dkon brtsegs): 'jug ste / yongs su dag pa rna ba brgyad kyis ji ltar 'jug ce na/ 'di lta ste ka lus dag pa'i rnam pas 'jug pa dang / ngag dag pa'i rnam pas 'jug pa dang / sems dag pa'i rnam pas 'jug pa dang /
425b7(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa dag pa'i rnam pas 'jug pa dang / 'tsho ba dag pa'i rnam pas 'jug pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / yo byad bsnyungs pa dag pa'i rnam pas 'jug pa dang / tshul 'chos pa dang / kha gas ga dang /
426a1(dkon brtsegs): gzhog slongs dang // thob kyis 'jal ba thams cad rnam par spongs pa'i rnam pas 'jug pa dang / byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa'i rnam pas 'jug pa ste/ grogs po dag de ltar yongs/
426a2(dkon brtsegs): su dag pa rnam pa brgyad kyis tshul khrims la 'jug go/ grogs po dag de la yongs su dag pa rnam pa brgyad kyis thos pa yongs su dag pa ste/ rnam pa brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bla ma la gus pas
426a3(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pa dang / nga rgyal bcom pas yongs su dag pa dang / brtson 'grus dang 'dzin pas yongs su dag pa dang / dran pa mi g.yengs pas yongs su dag pa dang / bstan pa dang rab tu bshad pas yongs su dag
426a4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / bdag la mi bstod cing gzhan la mi smod pas yongs su dag pa dang / tshul bzhin du so sor rtog pas yongs su dag pa dang / ji ltar thos pa'i chos sgrub pas yongs su dag pa ste/ grogs po dag de ltar
426a5(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa brgyad kyi thos pa yongs su dag go grogs po dag de la rnam pa brgyad kyis bsam gtan yongs su dag ste/ rnam pa brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dgon pa la gnas shing dben pa
426a6(dkon brtsegs): la dga' bas yongs su dag pa dang / 'du 'dzi spong bas yongs su dag pa dang / yul dang mi 'dre bas yongs su dag pa dang / lus dang sems las su rung bas yongs su dag pa dang / kha zas bsnyungs te lus 'tsho bas yong/
426a7(dkon brtsegs): su dag pa dang / dmigs pa la 'jog pas yongs su dag pa dang / sgra dang mtshan ma thams cad rnam par 'jig pas yongs su dag pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / zang zing med par so sor yang dag par 'gyed pas yongs
426b1(dkon brtsegs): su dag pa / thogs pa deg de su rnam pa brgyad kyis bsam gtan yongs su dag go mobs po dag de la rnam pa brgyad kyis shes rab yongs su dag ste/ rnam pa rgyad gang ne na/ 'di sngas
426b2(dkon brtsegs): phung po la mkhas pa'i rnam pas yongs su dag pa dang / khams la mkhas pa'i rnam pas yongs su dag pa dang / skye mched la mkhas pa'i rnam pas yongs su dag pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa'i ma
426b3(dkon brtsegs): pas yongs su dag pa dang / bden pa la mkhas pa'i rnam pas yongs su dag pa dang / dbang po la mkhas pa'i rnam pas yongs su dag pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la mkhas pa'i rnam pas yongs su dag pa dang ka dag
426b4(dkon brtsegs): la nyal ba dang / kun nas dkris pa dang / lta ba thams cad yang dag par 'jom pa la mkhas pa'i rnam pas yongs su dag pa ste/ grogs po dang de ltar rnam pa brgyad kyis shes rab yongs su dag go/
426b5(dkon brtsegs): bo dag de la rnam pa brgyad kyis mngon par shes pa yongs su dag sde/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sgrib pa med par gzugs thams cad mthong bas lha'i mig yongs su dag pa dang / sgrib pa med par sgra thams cad
426b6(dkon brtsegs): thos pas lha'i rna ba yongs su dag pa dang / sems cad thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa la rnam par lta bas pha rol gyi sems shes pa yongs su dag pa dang / sgrib pa med cing chags pa med par sngon gyi mtha' rjes su dran
426b7(dkon brtsegs): bas sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i shes pa yongs su dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas par 'gro bas rdzu 'phrul gyi bya ba yongs su dag pa dang / zab pa thams cad zad pa shes pas bsal cing dus ma yin pa
427a1(dkon brtsegs): yongs su spangs pas zab pa zad pa yongs su dag pa dang / g.yo ba dang rlom sems thams cad dang bral bas dge ba'i rtsa bas mngon par shes pa yongs su dag pa dang / ji ltar sngon dam bcas
427a2(dkon brtsegs): pa nyams 'og tu chud par byed pas bshes pa bsnun pa yongs su dag pa ste/ grogs po dag de ltar rnams pa brgyad kyis mngon par shes pa yongs su dag go thogs po dag de la rnam pa brgyad
427a3(dkon brtsegs): kyis ye shes yongs su dag ste/ rnam par rgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phung po lnga yongs su shes pas sdug bsngal shes pa yongs su dag pa dang / sred pa shin tu spong bas kun 'byung ba shes pa yongs su dag pa dang /
427a4(dkon brtsegs): brten nas skyes pa la skye ba med par so sor rdog pas 'gog pa shes pa yongs su dag pa dang / 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas mnyam pa nyid du 'jug pas lam shes pa yongs su dag pa dang / las dang bya ba dang mi 'gal
427a5(dkon brtsegs): bas rgyu shes pa yongs su dag pa dang / bdag med pa dang / sems can med pa dang / srog med pa dang / gso ba med pas rkyen shes pa yongs su dag pa dang / 'khor gsum yongs su bcod pas dus gsum shes
427a6(dkon brtsegs): pa yongs su dag pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ye shes thams cad la 'jug pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su dag pa ste/ grogs po dag de ltar rnam pa brgyad kyis ye shes yongs su dag go
427a7(dkon brtsegs): grogs po dag de la rnam pa brgyad kyis nges par sems pa yongs su dag ste/ rnam pa brgyad kyis yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nar re bar zhi ngas yongs su dag pa dang / phyi rol tu
427b1(dkon brtsegs): ma n+tu ngas yongs su dag pa dang / khams gsum la mi gnas pas yongs su dag pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang 'dzin pas yongs su dag pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pas yongs su rab pa dang /
427b2(dkon brtsegs): mngon par 'du byed pa med par so sor rtob pas yongs su dag pa dang / chos thams cad la bdag med par so sor rtogs pas yongs su dag pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis shin tu mi 'jug
427b3(dkon brtsegs): bas yongs su dag pa ste/ grogs po dag 'di ni rnam pa brgyad kyi nges par sems pa yongs su dag pa'o// grogs po dag de la rnam pa brgyad kyis bag yod pa yongs su dag ste/ rnam
427b4(dkon brtsegs): pa brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims mchog tu 'dzin pa med pas yongs su dag pa dang / thos pa yongs su byung bas yongs su dag pa dang / bsam gtan de la chags pa med
427b5(dkon brtsegs): pas yongs su dag pa dang shes rab dang gsung rab kyis yongs su dag pa dang / mngon par shes pa las ma nyams pas yongs su dag pa dang / ye shes kyi rlom sems med pas yongs
427b6(dkon brtsegs): su dag pa dang // nges par sems pas rtsod pa med pas yongs su dag pa dang / dge ba'i chos chud mi za bas yongs su dag pa ste/ grogs po dag rnam pa brgyad po de dag gis bag yod pa yongs
427b7(dkon brtsegs): su dag go grogs po dag de lta bas na khyed bag yod par gyis shig/ bag yod pa la rton pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bde ba gsum las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ro//
428a1(dkon brtsegs): gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lha'i bde ba dang / bsam gtan gyi bde ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba'o// ngan song gsum las yongs su thar par 'gyur te//
428a2(dkon brtsegs): gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten te/ gsum po de dag go// sdug bsngal gsum gyis 'phrogs par mi 'gyur te/
428a3(dkon brtsegs): gsum gang zhe na/ skye ba'i sdug bsngal dang / rma ba'i sdug bsngal dang / 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal dang / gsum po de dag go// 'jigs pa gsum las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur te/ gsum
428a4(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ 'tsho ba med pa'i 'jigs pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa med pa'i 'jigs pa dang / 'khor la bag tsha ba'i 'jigs pa ste/ gsum po de dag go// srid pa gsum las yangs dag par 'da' bar 'gyur te/
428a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa'i srid pa dang / gzugs kyi srid pa dang / gzugs med pa'i srid pa'o// dri ma gsum skyong ste/ 'dod chags kyi dri ma dang / zhe sdang gi dri ma dang / gti mug gi dri ma'o// bslab pa gsum yongs
428a6(dkon brtsegs): su rdzogs par byed do// lhag pa'i tshul khrims dang / lhag pa'i sems dang / lhag pa'i shes rab bo// yongs su dag pa gsum thob par 'gyur te/ lus yongs su dag pa dang / ngag yongs su dag pa
428a7(dkon brtsegs): dang sems yongs su dag pa'o// bsod nams bya ba las byung ba'i dngos po gsum yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ sbyin pa las byung ba dang / tshul khrims las byung ba dang / sgom pa las
428b1(dkon brtsegs): byung ba'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum sgom par byed de/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'o// rigs gsum rgyun mi gcod de/ sangs rgyas kyi rigs dang / chos kyi
428b2(dkon brtsegs): rigs dang / dge 'dun gyi rigs so// pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs gsum rab su spong ste/ ser sna'i dri ma dang / saur sna'i kun tu sbyor ba dang / gtong ba dang ldan pa rnams pa
428b3(dkon brtsegs): sdang ba dang / 'chal ba'i tshul khrims dang / tshul khrims las zlog pa dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnams la sdang ba dang / gnod sems dang / bzod pa las zlog pa dang / bzod pa dang ldan pa
428b4(dkon brtsegs): rnams la sdang ba dang / le lo dang / brtson 'grus las zlog pa dang / brtson 'grus dang ldan pa rnams la sdang ba dang / rnam par g.yeng ba dang / bsam gtan las zlog pa dang / bsam gtan dang
428b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa rnams la sdang ba dang / 'chal ba'i shes rab dang / shes rab las zlog pa dang / shes rab dang ldan pa rnams la sdang ba'o// pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyis rton pa gsum gsum gyis nye bar
428b6(dkon brtsegs): rngon te/ gsum gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang / rnam par smin pa la mi re ba dang / byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba dang / tshul khrims yang dag par
428b7(dkon brtsegs): len pa dang / tshul khrims mchog tu 'dzin pa med pa dang / byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba dang / bzod cing nges pa dang / bdag dang gzhan rjes su srung ba dang / byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba dang /
429a1(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus gces pa mi 'dor ba dang / blang ba med cing dor ba med pa dang / byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba dang / bsam gtan nye bar len pa dang / mi gnas par bsam
429a2(dkon brtsegs): gtan byed pa dang / byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba dang / shes rab kyi snang ba dang / spros pa med pa dang / byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba ste/ grogs po dag bag yod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam
429a3(dkon brtsegs): ni pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyis rton pa 'di gsum gsum gyis nye bar ston to// grogs po dag de lta bas na/ khyed cag bag yod par gyis shig/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub dang /
429a4(dkon brtsegs): de las gzhan pa'i dge ba byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos gang yin pa dag kyang bag yod pas thob bo// rdzogs po dag bag yod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni tshegs chung ngus dran pa nye bar
429a5(dkon brtsegs): gzhag pa bzhi bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi bsgom pa gang zhe na/ gang la lus kyi gnas med pa dang / tshor ba'i gnas med pa dang / sems kyi gnas med pa
429a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / chos kyi gnas med pa ste/ chos thams cad kyi gnas med cing rten med pa 'di ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bsgom pa zhes bya'o// tshogs chung ngus yang dag par spong ba bzhi bsgom pa
429a7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ yang dag par spong ba bsgom pa gang zhe na/ gang chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa dang / gzod ma nyid nas ma skyes pa dang / ma byung ba dang / ma mthong ba dang /
429b1(dkon brtsegs): mngon par ma grub par yang so sor rtog cing / sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir 'dun pa skyed cing 'bar la/ brtson 'grus rtsom zhing sems rab tu 'dzin te/ yang dag
429b2(dkon brtsegs): par rab tu 'jog pa dang / chos thams cad la las kyi rnam par smin pa med par yang so sor rtog cing / sems can gzhan dag dang / gang zag gzhan rnams kyis mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spang
429b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir 'dun pa skyed cing 'bad la/ brtson 'grus rtsom zhing sems rab tu 'dzin te/ yang dag pa rab tu 'jog pa dang / sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spang ba'i phyir 'dun pa skyed cing ba
429b4(dkon brtsegs): la brtson 'grus rtsom zhing sems rab tu 'dzin te/ yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa dang / chos thams cad la stong pa nyid du'ang mos la/ dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir/ 'dun
429b5(dkon brtsegs): bskyed cing 'bad la/ brtson 'grus rtsom zhing sems rab tu 'dzin te/ yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa dang / chos thams cad rnam par grol bar yang yid ches la/ dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams
429b6(dkon brtsegs): gnas par bya ba dang / nyams par mi 'gyur bar bya ba dang / phyir zhing 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir 'dun pa skyed cing 'bad la/ brtson 'grus rtsom zhing sems rab tu 'dzin te/ yang dag par rab tu
429b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jog la/ chos thams cad la rtsom pa med cing brtul ba med par yang mthong ba ste/ yang nyams pa nyid gang yin pa de la chos gang gi skye ba'ang med// 'gog pa'ang med pa 'di ni yang dag pa'i spo
430a1(dkon brtsegs): bsgom pa'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bsgom pa gang zhe na/ gang lus dang sems las su rung ba ste
430a2(dkon brtsegs): de sems las su rung bas dge ba'i chos la 'dun pa'ang mi 'dor la 'dod pa'i 'dod chags spang ba'i phyir yang mngon par brtson pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir
430a3(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus kyang rtsom la/ brtags nas kyang chos thams cad mi dmigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i phyir/ byang chub kyi sems kyang mi
430a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dor la/ sems sgyu ma lta bur yang rab tu shes pa dang / ji ltar thos pa'i chos la tshul bzhin du'ang spyod la/ chos rnams la gnas par yang mi byed cing / mngon par zhen pa'ang med pa'o// de dag
430a5(dkon brtsegs): po lnga bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ dbang po drug la rten par mi byed cing / sems can thams cad kyi dbang po yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir shes pa'ang gtong la/ gcig tu gnas pa'ang thob
430a6(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur zhing // gzhan gyi dad pas kyang mi 'gro ba dang / thams cad kyang yongs su thob la/ blang ba'ang med cing dor ba'ang med pa dang / thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam la'ang rmongs pa med la// dran pa 'ang med cing /
430a7(dkon brtsegs): yid la byed pa'ang med pa dang / thams cad kyi rjes su'ang song la/ rtag tu mnyam par yang bzhag par gyur cing // chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la snyoms par zhugs pa dang / rab rib med pa'i ye she/
430b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi snang ba'ang thob par gyur la/ spros pa dang lha ba'ang yang dag par chad pa 'di ni/ de'i dbang po bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs pa'o// de stobs lnga bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ dad pa'i stobs dang ldan
430b2(dkon brtsegs): bsanapas kyis rgol ba thams cad kyis mi brdzi ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyis bdud thams cad kyis thub par dka' ba dang / dran pa'i stobs kyis nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis thams cad
430b3(dkon brtsegs): ming phrogs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis sgrib pa rnams kyis zim gyis mi non pa dang / shes rab kyi stobs dang ldan pas lnga bar gyur pa rnams kyis mngon par zhen pa med pa ste/ de ltar stobs lnga lo
430b4(dkon brtsegs): su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de byang chub kyi yan las bdun bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ byang chub kyi yan lag bsgom pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i chos thams cad mi brjed par bya ba'i phyir/
430b5(dkon brtsegs): dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag bsgom pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang 'thun par bya ba'i phyir/ chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag bsgom pa dang / byang chub kyi lam las mi ldog
430b6(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba'i phyir/ brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag bsgom pa dang / zad zing med pa'i chos la dga' ba rab tu myong bar bya ba'i phyir/ dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag bsgom pa dang / lus dang
430b7(dkon brtsegs): sems kyi g.yo ba dang bral ba'i phyir/ shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag bsgom pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas mngon par bslab pa'i ting nge 'dzin yang dag
431a1(dkon brtsegs): #byang chub kyi yan lag bsgom pa dang / mthon dman med pa'i btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag bsgom pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub kyi yan lag bsgom pa zhes bya'o// grogs po dag
431a2(dkon brtsegs): bag yod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni tshogs chung ngus 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ lam bsgom pa gang zhe na/ gang 'di rtag pa dang / char pa dang bral ba'i yang
431a3(dkon brtsegs): dag pa'i lta ba bsgom pa dang / 'dod pa dang / gnod sems dang / rnam par 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba'i yang dag pa'i rtog pa bsgom pa dang / bdag dang gzhan la gdung ba med pa'i yang dag pa'i
431a4(dkon brtsegs): ngag bsgom pa dang / tshul 'chos pa dang / kha gsag dang / gnog slongs dang / thob kyis 'jal ba dang bral ba'i yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba bsgom pa dang / lus dang sems nyam chung ba dang bral ba'i yang dgapa/
431a5(dkon brtsegs): las kyi mtha' bsgom pa dang / bdag la bstod pa dang gzhan la smod pa dang bral ba'i yang dag pa'i rtsol ba bsgom pa dang / gti mug dang rmongs pa dang bral ba'i yang dag pa'i dran pa bsgom pa dang / rtog pa dang
431a6(dkon brtsegs): rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba'i yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa ste/ 'di ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa zhes bya'o// des na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi
431a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub dang / de las gzhan pa'i dge ba'i byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos gang yin pa dag kyang bag yod pas thob ces bya'o// grogs po dag de ltar na bas yod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ltar byang chub kyi
431b1(dkon brtsegs): phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun po 'di dag la 'jug go/ zugs nas 'du byed thams cad kyi 'dam las rgal lo// brgal nas kyang rnam par lta ste/ rnam par bltas na mi mthong ngo // mi 'bar ro// shin tu nye bar zhi ba steg rnam
431b2(dkon brtsegs): par 'jug par mi byed do// shin tun par ni bgang zhe na/ banye bar ma bsgrubs pa de ma byas pa'o// gang ma byas pa de spong ba med pa'o// gang myong ba med pa de la gdags pa med do// gang gdags pa med pa de ni
431b3(dkon brtsegs): shin tu nye par zhi ba'o// bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ lha'i bu khri nyis stong chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go lha'i bu dpal bzangs kyis/ kuzhan
431b4(dkon brtsegs): yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' lam ji ltar sgom/ smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' ni 'khor ba'ang mi spong lag 'khor ba'i nyes
431b5(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams kyis kyang mi gos so// 'dus ma byas su'ang mi lhung la/ 'dus ma byas kyi yon tan rnams kyang myong ngo // pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi lam yang sgom la// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yul 'al
431b6(dkon brtsegs): snang ngo // lha'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam ni stong pa nyid kyi rnam par dag pa'ang yin la/ lta bar gyur pa la'ang mkhas shing / lta bar gyur pa la mngon par zhen pa'ang med do//
431b7(dkon brtsegs): mtshan pa med pas rnam par dag pa'ang yin la/ mtshan ma la'ang mkhas shing / mtshan ma la mngon par zhen pa'ang med do// smon pa med pas rnam par dag pa'ang yin la/ ban gdul pa pa nga ma gag shig sa
432a1(dkon brtsegs): gsum pa la mngon par nan pang med do// skye ba med pa dang 'byung ba med pas rnam par dag pa'ang yin la/ skye ba dang 'jig pa la'ang mkhas shing // skye ba dang 'jig pa la mngon par zhen pa'ang med do//
432a2(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems nges par sems pa rnams ni sems can chos thams cad stong pa'o snyam pa'i lta bar gyur par zhugs pa/ lbu bar gyur pa bag lanyal bar byas pa rnams kyi lbu bar gyur pa
432a3(dkon brtsegs): spang ba'i phyir chos kyang smon la/ lta bar gyur pa de dag kyang stong pa nyid du mthong ngo // de bzhin du sbyar te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems nges par sems pa ni mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang /
432a4(dkon brtsegs): mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa'i chos thams cad la 'byung ba dang 'jig pa'i rjes su 'thun pa/ 'byung ba dang 'jig pa bag la nyal bar bya ba rnams kyi 'byung ba dang
432a5(dkon brtsegs): 'jig par lta ba spang ba'i phyir chos kyang ston la/ 'byung ba dang 'jig pa de'ang 'byung ba dang 'jig pa med pa 'di du mthong ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam bsgom pa zhes bya'o//
432a6(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam ni 'gro ba dang 'ong ba zhes bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'gro ba ni sems can gyi bsam pa rnams la'o// 'ong ba
432a7(dkon brtsegs): ni so so ci rigs par chos ston pa'i phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa'i 'gro ba ni snyoms par 'jug pa bskyed pa'i phyir ro// 'ong ba ni 'dod pa'i khams kyi sems can gyi nang du skye ba'i phyir ro// byang chub
432b1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i 'gro ba ni 'phags pa'i lam du'o// 'ong ba ni 'phags pa ma yin pa'i sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i phyir ro// 'azo ba ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par byed pa'i phyir ro// 'ong ba ni jo
432b2(dkon brtsegs): pa de sems can gyis khong du chud par byed pa'i phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa'i 'gro ba ni 'byung ba la mkhas pa la'o// 'ong ba ni 'byung ba ma yin par 'byung ba'i phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa'i 'gro ba ni
432b3(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan las 'das par 'gro ba'i phyir ro// bong ba ni 'khor ba na sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i phyir ro// 'gro ba ni gang du'ang 'gro ba dang 'ong ba med par so sor rtog pa'i phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa'
432b4(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi 'ong ba ni chos khong du chud par byed pa'i phyir ro// 'gro ba ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa bsgom pa'i phyir ro// 'ong ba ni rnam par rtog pa gsum spang ba
432b5(dkon brtsegs): chos ston pa'i phyir ro// 'gro ba ni ram bcas pa brtan par byed pa'i phyir ro// 'ong ba ni dam bcas pa nyams 'og tu chud par byed pa'i phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa'i 'gro ba ni byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba'i phyir
432b6(dkon brtsegs): ro// byang chub sems dpa'i 'ong ba ni byang chub kyi sdud pa spyod pa'i phyir te/ lha'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam 'gro ba dang 'ong ba zhes bya'o// bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ byang chub
432b7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' lnga brgya mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa skyes so// de nas lha'i bu dpal bzangs kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal bdag gis
433a1(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan thams cad kyi 'od ces bgyi ba zhig thos na/ 'jam dpal 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan thams cad kyi 'od de phyogs gang na mchis / de na de bzhi/
433a2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i mtshan ji skad ces bgyi ba zhig chos ston/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu steng gi phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gad+hA'i klung bcu gnyis kyi
433a3(dkon brtsegs): byem snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan thams cad kyi 'od ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba
433a4(dkon brtsegs): chos ston to// smras pa/ 'jam dpal bdag gis 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan thams cad kyi 'od de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu bzang po
433a5(dkon brtsegs): de blta bar bgyi'o// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ de'i tshe dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa snyoms
433a6(dkon brtsegs): par zhug ma thag tu lus las de dang 'thun pa'i 'od byung ste/ 'od ngos sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung bcu gnyis kyi bye ma snyed po de dag spang bar byas nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan thams
433a7(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi 'od de'ang snang ba chen pos khyab par 'gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu bzang po de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du byang chub sems dpa' gang dag skyes pa de
433b1(dkon brtsegs): dag gis 'od de mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur te gathal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'od 'di ltar yongs su dag pa 'di gang nas mchisapa/ bcom ldan 'das des dka' blangs/
433b2(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu dag 'og gi phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung bcu gnyis kyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa
433b3(dkon brtsegs): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so// 'tshe'o// gzhes so// chos kyang ston to// de na phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
433b4(dkon brtsegs): ba zhes bya dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de'i lus kyi 'od kyis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med grangs med pa dag snang ba chen pos khyab bo// des 'jig rten gyi
433b5(dkon brtsegs): khams 'di'ang snang ba chen pos khyab bo// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed de dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de dang / 'jam das
433b6(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nur gyur pa blta bar bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu bzang pos zhabs kyi 'og gi mthil gyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs stong dang ldan pa las 'od zer stong phyung ste/ 'od zer na
433b7(dkon brtsegs): dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing bad+ma'i klung bcu gnyis kyi bye ma snyed las 'das te/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di mthong
434a1(dkon brtsegs): zhing / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams
434a2(dkon brtsegs): cad kyang mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag gis kyang 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan thams cad kyi 'od de mthong zhing / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
434a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu bzang po de dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang mthong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu bzang pos/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag
434a4(dkon brtsegs): la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag der chos kyi gtam chen po 'byung bar 'gyur na/ khyed kyi nang nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der 'gro bar spro ba su yod/ byang chub sems dpa' ye shes smon ma 'dzin
434a5(dkon brtsegs): ces bya ba der 'dus par gyur te/ 'dug pa des bcom ldan 'das de la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der mchi bar sgro lags so// bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rig
434a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu 'i'i dus la bab par shes na song zhig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes smon ma 'dzin// byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bcus yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ bcom ldan
434a7(dkon brtsegs): 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das de la lan bdun bskor ba byas te/ dper na skyes bu stobs dang / ldan pas lag pa bsgrub pa las brkyang ba dang / brkyang ba las bskum pa
434b1(dkon brtsegs): tsam gyi skad cig zang cig yud tsam de la / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas // 'jig rten gyi lams mi mjed 'dir dga' ldan gyi gnas su 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i mdun gyi steng gi bar snang lags
434b2(dkon brtsegs): bgi ngad pa 'ardegs par phyin to// de'i g.yo 'khor de dag kyang khang pa brtsegs pa legs par gnas pa rnams su phyin to// de dag nga rang gi na las langs nas bal mo gyur te/ 'jams dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal zhing
434b3(dkon brtsegs): tshig 'di skad ces kyang smras so// 'jam dpal bdag cag ni/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu bzang po des khyod la bsdu ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /
434b4(dkon brtsegs): chos na pa'i phyir 'dir btang ngo // khyod kyis 'od brtse bde'ang 'jig rten gyi khams der phyin to// de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis / byang chub sems dpa 'de
434b5(dkon brtsegs): rab mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur te/ kye ma ji tsam du 'di ltar myur bar 'od zer 'di 'jig rten gyi khams der phyin pa dang / 'di ltar myur bar byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir phyin pa 'di ni skyes bu
434b6(dkon brtsegs): dam pa de dag gis mngon par shes pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i stobs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs bsam gyis mi khyab bo zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa/
434b7(dkon brtsegs): lha'i 'khor de ltar 'dus pa de la ci nas kyang lha khrag khrig phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis bsam pa thag pa nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes pa de ltar chos bstan to// de nas
435a1(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ji srid du dga' ldan gyi gnas su lha rnams kyi don bya ba de srid du byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' byeb phrag bcu po de dag dang lhan cig/ rang gi sa khor
435a2(dkon brtsegs): dang lhan cig/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong pa lha'i bu dang bcas pa dang lhan cig tu dga' ldan gyi gnas nas mi snang bar gyur te/ sems kyis 'gyur ba tsam gyis / bcom ldan 'das
435a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi spyan sngar phyin nas/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan bdun bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ste/ phyogs gcig tu rang
435a4(dkon brtsegs): rang gi spyan la 'khod do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' yeng shes sgron ma 'dzin dang lhan cig lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bcu po de dag gis// bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag
435a5(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal te/ lan bdun bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thal mo skur te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das la/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu babang po ga no/
435a6(dkon brtsegs): ba chung ngam// nyam nga ba chung ngam/ spyod pa yang ngam/ spobs dang bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes snyun gsol lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan
435a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'khor de chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par dga' bar mdzad// yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad do// yang dag par dga' bar mdzad cing / yang dag par 'dzin du bcun
435b1(dkon brtsegs): la ga yang dag par gzengs bstod de/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas kyang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la bka' stsal pa/ thogs po dag skyes bu dam pa 'di dag dang / 'jam dpa' sanon nur gyur pa dang / byang
435b2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' ye shes smon ma 'dzin gyi mngon par shes pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs dang / sems can sdud pa dang / yongs su smin par byed pa dang / thabs dang / rigs pa dang / le sheb
435b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / shes rab kyi rab tu bye ba dang / spobs pa la ltos/ grogs po dag byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni bskal pa grangs med pa nas bzung ste/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pas sems can rnams la nye bar gnas pa dab bo//
435b4(dkon brtsegs): sems can gang dag gi dbang po drug po dag la skyes bu dam pa 'di dag mngon par 'gyur ba de dag ni phyis bdud kyi yul la gnas par mi 'gyur ro zhes brjod par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' bang rang byang chub sen
435b5(dkon brtsegs): dngabal shes rlon ma badzin dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi lam mi mjed 'dir phyin pa de dag / bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa las chos thos nas/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems
435b6(dkon brtsegs): ye shes sgron ma 'dzin dang lhan cig lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bcu po de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan bdun bskor ba byas nas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi laH
435b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di rab tu g.yos par byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi drung nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams der phyin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo
436a1(dkon brtsegs): la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyed kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung zhig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher rab tu ston cig
436a2(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung lags na/ 'di'i ming ji skad bgyi bar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de bas na khyod
436a3(dkon brtsegs): kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'jam dpal gyi le'u dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyad par bstan pa zhes bya bar zung zhig bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal
436a4(dkon brtsegs): nas/ lha'i bu dpal bzangs dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
436a5(dkon brtsegs): gsus pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa da ni mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya pa las/ sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa// 'i bu dpal bzangs kyis zhus pa zhes bya
436a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i le'u / 'dus pa su cu rtsa lnga pa rdzogs so// rgya gan gyi ma ngan po rjen mi tra dang / dran shI la dang / mun par ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba nang le shes sdes bsgyur cing chu sa te gtan
436a7(dkon brtsegs): la phab pa/ sh+lo ka drug brgya bam po gnyis/ slar yang phyi mo dag pa gsum dbang por byas te dag par nus/
